verse_text: Uwɔng ulenɛ lakɔɔl itutum a Jesus Christ wa ussinɛ ka kikkwu a David, la kikkwu Abraham.
Abraham ɔfɔɔn Isaac; Isaac ɔfɔɔn Jacob; Jacob ɔfɔɔn Judah la itele a Judah.
Judah ɔfɔɔn Perez la Zerah, (Abakka abbɛ ɔdɔkɔ ɔzzanga Tamar); Perez ɔfɔɔn Hezron; Hezron ɔfɔɔn Ram;
Ram ɔfɔɔn Amminadab; Amminadab ɔfɔɔn Nahshon; Nahshon ɔfɔɔn Salmon;
Salmon ɔfɔɔn Boaz (Rahab ɔdɔkɔnɛ abakka); Boaz ɔfɔɔn Obed (Ruth ɔdɔkɔnɛ abakka); Obed ɔfɔɔn Jesse;
Jesse ɔfɔɔn Ubeet David. David ɔfɔɔn Solomon (abakka Solomon ɔdɔkɔ wanavva Uria)
Solomon ɔfɔɔn Rehoboam; Rehoboam ɔfɔɔn Abijah; Abijah ɔfɔɔn Asa;
Asa ɔfɔɔn Jehosaphat; Jehosaphat ɔfɔɔn Joram; Joram ɔfɔɔn Uzziah;
Uzziah ɔfɔɔn Jotham; Jotham ɔfɔɔn Ahaz; Ahaz ɔfɔɔn Hezekiah
Hezekiah ɔfɔɔn Manasseh; Manasseh ɔfɔɔn Amon; Amon ɔfɔɔn Josiah;
Josiah ɔfɔɔn Jechoniah la itele a Jechoniah ka ɛkɛtɛ ya basamnɛ balɔɔt a Israel bamii ka Babylon.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balenɛ ka Babylon; Jechoniah ɔfɔɔn Shealtiel; Shealtiel ɔfɔɔn Zerubbabel;
Zerubbabel ɔfɔɔn Abiud; Abiud ɔfɔɔn Eliakim; Eliakim ɔfɔɔn Azor;
Azor ɔfɔɔn Zadok; Zadok ɔfɔɔn Achim; Achim ɔfɔɔn Eliud;
Eliud ɔfɔɔn Eleazar; Eleazor ɔfɔɔn Matthan; Matthan ɔfɔɔn Jacob;
Jacob ɔfɔɔn Joseph walam a Mary, wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ abakka Jesus, wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.

Ɔdɔkɔ bɛkkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil, ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Abraham uffu ɔffɔ a ka ɛkɛtɛ a David. Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ a David, ɔdɔkɔ bɛkkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya basamnɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bamii Babylon. Bɛkkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ bamiinɛ Babylon uffu ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ bamaatnɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
Uwɔng ɔdɔkɔnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatnɛ Jesus Christ, Joseph ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ Mary, abakka Jesus. Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ballu, Mary ɔggba lɛsan ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔmaat waan ka likke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Walam ammɛ Joseph ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa bbwak ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, usi lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔssɛɛn Mary ka izzit ppwool ppwool. Ɔnaang luttina gwa kitunu iggyan ka lalup.

Ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang ka uttinanɛ utum lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utuma ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ka lɔlakala, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Joseph wa kikkwu a David, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ kɛtɔk a Mary tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wanavva annɔ. Ɔyɛ̀ɛm ka likke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Vvenɛ ɔmaat waanawalam, wa ale akɔlɔmɛ Jesus, ka ule ɔkkala balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bubbi abbɛ.”
Nkwɔng kɔnaangbong nkwaaning kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ uppyee-kutolo ammɛ uffu ɔyaam ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ammɛ ɔttɛ,
“Waanawanavva wa ɔtakanɛ la walam limini vvenɛ ɔyɛɛm ka likke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔmaat waanawalam wa bale bakkwɔɔmɛ Emmanuel.” Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule la ayyɔɔt.”
Ɔzzànga Joseph ufungalanɛ ka bilaa, ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm Ebinukkpaapi ɔlɔɔknɛ; ɔtɔk Mary.
Ɔzzànga la ammɛ usi limini tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔyɛɛm ɔmaat waanawalam. Joseph ɔkɔlɔmɛ Jesus.

Jesus badɔkɔ bamaatmɛ ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethlehem ka ɛkpansi a Judea. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Herod ɔdɔkɔnɛ ubeet. Usi lɛmmɛ, balɔɔt ba bakkoopnɛ bwaanittuma bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm baffu Jerusalem. Babap battɛ
“Waan wa ɔzzanganɛ ubeet-a-Jews bamaatmɛ ka ’yang ee? Iyɛnbong waanettuma ammɛ ka ussinɛ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm uffu. Mung iffubong kɛzɔɔm innyimɛ.”
Ubeet Herod uppyeenɛ ning baang, luppyam lɔbbɔlmɛ. Gɔɔ lɔbbɔl lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Jerusalem.
Ɔkkwɔɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ bamaatmɛ ka ’yang ee?”
Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Bamaatmɛ ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethlehem ka ɛkpansi Judea. Nkwɔng mung kulenɛ kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɔknɛ ɔttɛ,
‘Annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Bethlehem ka ɛkpansi a Judah, annyɔɔng lissi attanɛyɔng lissup ka lɔkaan a Judah; Uzzilɛttɔ ule ussi ka annyɔɔng uffu, Ammɛ ule ɔat Israel, balɔɔt anaam’.”
Ɔzzanga Herod ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba, bassinɛ ka lusso livve-luwee lɔfɔm, likup uloko ka wɛɛk, ɔbapbɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ya waanettuma utumanɛ.

Ɔzzánga ɔtɔɔmbɛ bamii Bethlehem la lɔttama ’gwɔng ɔttɛ, “Ammiiyɔng, anaangyɔng bɛtɛbɛtɛ, asanyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a waantiti ulenɛ. Alemɛnɛyɔng lɛyɛn anaangnɛyɔng anaam nsan, nkwaaning nssɛ nmii nzɔɔm nnyimɛ.”
Bafeele la lɔttama ’gwɔng baffɔ ka ɛtɔk waanettuma utuma. Ammɛ baang vvɔn wa bayɛnmɛnɛ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm. Ɔzzanga ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk uffu ɔkɔɔng baang ubee ka ɛfɛɛn waantiti ɔdɔkɔnɛ.
Baggele gaang gaang, ka bayɛnnɛ waanettuma.

Bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon bayɛn waantiti la abakka ammɛ, Mary. Bakun laddu bazɔɔm bannyimɛ. Ɔzzánga bawongolo issɔ abbɛ banaangmɛ lɛsɔɔk la gold, la frankincense (bɔfɛɛn bwa bafɔɔpnɛ buyyɛɛp kizoom ka ggwoon a luzɔɔm), la myrrh (wa appwɔɔngnɛ asi lɛddɔlɔ).
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttamabɛ ka lɔlakala ɔttɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bappyɛlɛ isimi-isimi bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Herod. Ɔzzánga bappyɛɛ bassɛ ɛtɔk ɛlɔk bafula.

Balenɛ lɛgbata, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a Joseph ka lɔlakala, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele asam waantiti la abakka agbata amii Egypt. Ataa bakang tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ appyɛlɛ. Herod ule ka kɛggyan ɛtɔk ya kɛwwɔɔl a waantiti ’wɔng baang.”
Ɔzzanga Joseph ufeele ɔsam waantiti la abakka, bagbata ka kasɛkɛ kɛtɔm bamii Egypt.
Ɔtaa bakang tɔttɔt Herod ubbe. Nkwɔng kɔdɔkɔ kɔnaang nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛtɔɔmnɛ uppyee-kutolo annyɛ uffu ɔyaam, kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɜ ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Nkkwɔɔ Waan anaam ka Egypt.”

Herod ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ bakoolo-lukoolo ’bɔng baang ba bassinɛ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm, banaangmɛbong lagban, kutunmɛ gaang gaang. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ bawwɔɔl bwaanabwalam ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Bethlehem, la billu bya ballunɛ bakkpit Bethlehem, ka ussinɛ ka bwɔɔn ba likkpa liffa ɔppyɛlɛ kuttɔɔk. Ɔnaang ning baang ukup kwa bakoolo-lukoolo babwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ batum ɛkɛtɛ ya waanettuma utumanɛ.
Nkwɔng mung kɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Jeremiah ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ,
“Bappyee kibungu ka Ramah, Kibungu akama la kullu, Rachel ɔkkwanɛ bwaan ammɛ, Ɔkkwa usimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛkkyaa, Ka bwaan ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ balenɛ libbe.”
Herod ulenɛ libbe, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ebinukkpappi utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a Joseph ka lɔlakala ka Egypt ɔttɛ,
“Afeele asam waantiti la abakka appyɛlɛ isimi-isimi amii ɛkpansi a Israel, ka balɔɔt ba babumnɛ battɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ balenɛ libbe.”
Ɔzzánga Joseph ufeele ɔsam waantiti la abakka, ɔppyɛlɛ isimi-isimi umii ka ɛkpansi a Israel.
Uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Archelaus ɔtɔkbong lɛttɔ kibeet abassɛ ka Judea, Joseph ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ killu baang. Ɔyanga lɔttama ɔgbaa ka lɔlakala ɔzzànga ufeele umii ka ɛkpansi a Galilee.
Ɔnaang ssala ka lɛffɛ za bakkwɔɔnɛzɛ Nazareth. Nkwɔng baang kɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Vvenɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ wa Nazareth.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, uffunɛ, utte kɛyaam ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat a Judea.
Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Afooloyɔng lafal annyɔɔng, akkyaayɔng bubbi afɔngɔyɔng, Itutum la Likke-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.”

John ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Isaiah, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔknɛ utummɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule akang ning ka ubungunɛ ka kɛmat ɔttɛ, ‘Alɔngɔlɔyɔng ɛtɔk ya Uyini, alokomɛyɔng; anaangyɔngyɛ bbit, alokomɛyɔng ɔssɛ!’ ”
Iwɔkɔlɔ a John badɔkɔ battayɛ la issɔp-ɛsɛɛn. Ukwula ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ka kɛsan, uzzi ogelese, uggyeel itɔngɔtɔngɔ.
Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ Jerusalem, la ba bassinɛ ka ɛkpansi a Judea la ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ ya illunɛ ikkpit lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan, baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ.
Bayila kamma bubbi abbɛ, ɔnaangbɛ baptizim ka lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan.

John, ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt a Pharisees la Sadducees ka baffunɛ ggbadam ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ battɛ ɔnaangbɛ baptizim, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng bwɔɔn igbazim mbɔng, nnyinɔɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ akkwoong mung amma akɔngɔyɔng binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm pya bile ka biffunɛ?
“Anaangyɔng linaang sa ayɔɔnɛyɔng kifoolo lafal annyɔɔng.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛ vvenɛ attayɔng ka akkwɛ ka ale alɔɔk attɛyɔng, ‘Abraham ulenɛ uyini kikku ayyɔɔt.’ Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔsam lattaal ’zɔng mung ɔnaangzɛ lasikili bwɔɔn unnyi Abraham.
Ɛbwɔt etii ka kɛfɔk a bɛssɛ. Lɛsan a kɛssɛ duu za lisinɛ lakkpo za doddo lɛwɔm, vvenɛ babbɔkzɛ bazzɔɔk, battɔng bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn.

Anaam nnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la bannyi, ning baang ulenɛ kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ akkyaayɔngbong bubbi afɔngɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ule uffunɛ ukupnɛ anaam, ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lɔkɔɔn. Ammɛ ule ɔttanɛ anaam liggbenge, anaam gɔɔ ba nkkɔnɔ wa nkɔɔmnɛ ikkpa-bukkpa ammɛ.
Ɔyanga uggwul a bɛfɛɛn ammɛ wa uggwulnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn uggumu ya doddo uloko ka ukunu, ɔttɔng lɔkɔɔn ɔssɛɛn bippwo bɛkkɔm lɔkɔɔn lusi lɛbɛlɛ lizum.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus ussi ka Galilee umii Jordan, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a John ɔttɛ ɔnaangmɛ baptizim.
Ɔzzánga John ubum ɔttɛ usikilimɛ luppyam. Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa buffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ anaangnɛ baptizim, annɔ appyɛɛnɛ affu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam ɔɔ?”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɔkɔɔm kɔtaa ning baang gedegede mung. Inaangnɛ ning mung, vvenɛ inaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.” Ɔzzánga John uyila.
Uvvenɛ Jesus baptizim lɛnaang, Jesus ɔtta ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi, kikku a ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiwongolo kinnyimɛ. Ɔzzanga ɔyɛn Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kusininɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lekkpelekete kuffu kuttelemɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka libat lɛlɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Waan a luppyam anaam wa ɔwaanɛnɛ kwa ammɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔmana Jesus kumii ka kɛmat, Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng ubummɛ kɛllɛ.
Ulenɛ bakang lɛtaa ka lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa usi bɔfɛɛn lizzi, buwɔɔng busaapmɛ.
Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng uffu ɔlɔɔkmɛ ɔttɛ, “Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, adda lɛttaal ’zɔng mung lasikili brɛɛd ee.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt kwa brɛɛd kɛyɔɔng lissi ka uddunɛ, uddu kwa lutini lɛmmwɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ.’ ”
Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng ɔsam Jesus umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala kɛyyɛɛp, utdelemɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ya ggologgolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,

Ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, akut attɔ ka lisse ee, kɔttɛ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔdda bayila-bɔtɔɔm ammɛ bakimiwɔ la labɔɔk abbɛ, nkwaaning kikkpɔ annɔ ssɔn gbɔɔ kisi ka lɛttaal lilip.’ ”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔbbal lɛlɔɔk lɔttɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ allɛ Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ.’ ”
Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng ɔsam Jesus umii ka libat ekpok ya ggologgolo, ɔyɔɔmɛ ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ a vveng-odde la iyyɛɛp annyɛ.
Ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nsam bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ nnyiwɔ, akunnɛ laddu azɔɔm annyinɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Agbata assekenɛ, Satan, luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Azɔɔm annyi Ebinukpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ keem, annyɛ elenɛ ya atelenɛyɛ!’ ”
Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng ɔgbata ussekemɛ. Bayila bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu bayaam Jesus.
Jesus uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ bassɛɛnbong John igbakkɔpɔ, ufeele umii Galilee.
Ka Nazareth usi lillu, ɔdɔkɔ ufeele umii ullu ka Capernaum kɛtɛkɛtɛ libbwe a Galilee ka ɛkpansi Zebulun la Naphtali.
Nkwɔng baang kɔnaangnɛ basan battɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ,
“Ɛkpansi a Zebulun la ɛkpansi a Naphtali, ka lusso lihu, ka lufoom a Jordan, Galilee wa ikanakana!
Annyɔɔng ba allunɛyɔng ka kisul vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng buppwolo bwa lɛbaang. Balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ka ɛkpansi kisul a ntɛm a lubbe, vvenɛ bayɛn buppwolo bwa lɛbaang.”
Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus ɔyaam ibwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔttɛ, “Akkyaayɔng bubbi annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng, Itutum la Likke-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.”

Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee, ɔzzánga ɔyɛn etele la etele, balɔɔt baffa, ba balapnɛ kulap isɛɛnabannyi. Simon (wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Peter) la etele ammɛ, Andrew, balenɛ ka kɛkaa isɛɛnabannyi ka liggbɔ ka libbwe.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛyɔng, vvenɛ nkopolowɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale akkwɔɔyɔng balɔɔt.”
Eseese bakkyaa liggbo abbɛ bafɔngɔ, bamii bakup Jesus.
Ɔbbal ka lusso limii, ɔyɛn etele la etele, balɔɔt baffa, James la John, bwaan a Zebedee. Badɔkɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat abbɛ la abassɛ abbɛ Zebedee. Babamabong liggbɔ abbɛ baloko, Jesus ɔkkwɔɔbɛ.
Eseese bagbata bakɔngɔ akkpaat abbɛ la abassɛ abbɛ, bamii bakup Jesus.
Jesus ɔssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ Galilee ududa ukopolobɛ ka idda mitin. Ɔyaam Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Uttula balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa, ɔppwabɛ.

Kuttu ammɛ kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ lɔkaan a Syria. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt bakɔɔm balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa bafeemɛ: ba ɔssɔpnɛbɛ bɛssanga bɛssanga, la balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ ipiliza, la balɔɔt ba battɔnɛ lɔbbaak, la balɔɔt ba bannɔknɛ kikkwu. Jesus uttulabɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Balɔɔt ggbadam bakupmɛ ba bassinɛ Galilee la Laffɛ Zzɔɔp, la ba bassinɛ Jerusalem, la Judea, la ɛkpansi ya lufoom a Jordan ’gwɔng kang.
Jesus, ɔyɛnnɛ kibbi ’sɔng baang, ufeele umii ka libat ekkpok ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɔtaanɛ lɔtaa. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baggba bataa bakkpitmɛ.
Ɔzzanga ukopolobɛ ɔttɛ:
“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba basannɛ battɛ abbɛ banaang-a-bubbi; Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya abbɛ.
“Laggele za balɔɔt ba bataanɛ bukee; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangbɛ ɔwaabɛ!
“Laggele lale za bakeebwɔɔn; vvenɛ batɔk bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛbɛ.
“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba kɔbɛtɛnɛbɛ ka kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangbɛ buddoddo bbwak.
“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba balɔɔt babbenɛbɛ lɛttɔ; vvenɛ bassɛ babbe Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ!
“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba luppyam abbɛ lɔllaatnɛ; vvenɛ bayɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!
“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bɔkaat la ba abbɛ; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkkwɔɔbɛ bwaan ammɛ.
“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛ akama ka banaangnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ; Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya abbɛ!
“Laggele lale za annyɔɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ balɔɔt banyɔɔkawɔnɛyɔng; bayɔɔwɔyɔng akama; balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a kɛkkala lɛlaak ɔkkpɛlɛ batumwɔyɔng, ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam.
Ɔwaawɔyɔng aggeleyɔng ka lɛsɔɔk za lɛbaang a lɛbaang lilewɔnɛyɔng ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ badɔkɔ bayapbɛ akama ning baang.

“Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bunɔk ɔssɛbbitbbit ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ulenɛ ka bunɔk businɛ lɛbɛlɛ liggwoom, ɛtɔk ya ale abbalbwɛ lɛnaang buzzanga bunɔk ba ɛbɛlɛ lile, busseke ubbu bɔfɛɛn bwa asamnɛ azzɔɔk balɔɔt basing bukkpɔ.
“Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng buppwolo a vveengodde. Killu sa ballunɛ ka libat ekpok, ɔlɔɔt sɛ ba ukkwoong usi lɛyɛn.
Ɔlɔɔt wa uyengenɛ otinika, ɔsam, ulup ka tɔkɔlɔ ekkpo ba ule. Lutini ’gwɔng utelemɛ ka okkpokkolo wa ɔggbanɛ lissi utele otinika ka ɛfɛɛn a ule uppwolo ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyɛn buppwolo ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon.
Kɔssɛ kule ning baang la annyɔɔng. Buppwolo annyɔɔng vvenɛ buppwolo ka lusso balɔɔt nkwaaning bayɛn budoddo lilɔɔk sa anaangnɛyɔng. Usseke babungu Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat.
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛyɔng mung nffu kɛbɛpɛ Lafɔɔ a Moses la lukopolo bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kɛbɛpɛ abbyɛ ba nffu. Nffu nnyibɛ ifɛɛt abbyɛ ya bbwak.
Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ! Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ libat la ɛkpansi bile bittumu bɛffɔ, lifɔɔ zzɔɔn gɔɔ, gɔɔ kufoom a lifɔɔ kwa kule kɔbɛpɛ baala kule tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka lakpeke bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lafɔɔ litele nkkpa lassup ning, ukopolo balɔɔt balɔk bassɛ banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔm. Ɔzzàngà ɔlɔɔt wa utelenɛ lafɔɔ, ukopolo balɔɔt balɔk bassɛ banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ; ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule ɔlɔɔt wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang baala akkwoong amalyɔng ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kiyila annyɔɔng kisinɛ lɛsak sa bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees ka kɛnaang a bɛnaang bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
“Aggbayɔng lippyee ka bakopolonɛ balɔɔt iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ battɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl balɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔwwɔɔlnɛ ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ bakɔɔmmɛ baffu ka lusso kɛkaal’.

Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt duu wa kɔlɔɔk kutunmɛnɛ la wabbɛ, vvenɛ bakɔɔmmɛ baffu ka lusso kɛkaal! Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔlɔɔknɛ la wabbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ mung ayyɛɛp gbɔɔ ka bulɔk ba affɔ’, vvenɛ bakɔɔmmɛ baffu ka lusso ikkansulu; ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ wabbɛ uzingizingi wa bgɔɔ, usinɛ lɛsan ɔnaang, vvenɛ ule ka ɛtɔk akama ya kimii ka lɔkɔɔn a hell.
Alenɛ ka annyinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsɔɔk annɔ ka labun ammɛ, akkenɛ attɛ wannyɔɔng ɔyanga kɔlɔɔk la annɔ,
akkyaa lɛsɔɔk annɔ afɔngɔ baang ka lusso labun a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, afeele eseese amii anaang bɔkaat la ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ appyɛlɛ affu asam lɛsɔɔk annɔ annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

“Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛ kɛkaal ka attɔmɛnɛ ka lafɔɔ, akkpengemɛ ka atakanɛ ka ɔdda ɔdda-kɛkaal lɛffɔ. Alenɛ bakang lɛffɔ vvenɛ ɔsamwɔ unnyi ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal. Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal vvenɛ ɔsamwɔ unnyi ippoloosi, bassɛɛnwɔ igbakkɔpɔ.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ vvenɛ ataa baang ka igbakkɔpɔ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ avve ikkpoko ya bazzawɔnɛ linnyi.
“Aggbayɔng lippyee ka battɛnɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt. Wanavva tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup walam ɔlɔɔt.’
Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ wanavva ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang budoddo la ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔnaangbong bubbi ka luppyam ammɛ biini.

Zzeen annɔ za kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk lɛnaangwɔnɛ attɔ ka bubbi, kɔyyɛɛp ka asanganɛzɛ azzɔɔk kang. Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka atakanɛ kikkeep a kkwɔɔt annɔ, ssɔn, lutini ayanganɛ bikkeep a kkwɔɔt annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ amii ka lɔkɔɔn.
Kɔbɔɔk annɔ kwa ɛlaabɔɔk kɔnaangwɔnɛ attɔ ka bubbi, azzakwɛ azzɔɔk. Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka abɛpɛnɛ kikkeep a kkwɔɔt annɔ ssɔn lutini ayanganɛ bikkeep a kkwɔɔt annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ amii ka lɔkɔɔn.
“Balɔɔk ngbaa battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt duu wa oggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ, ɔkkpɔk luvva luteele unnyimɛ.’

Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ ka ɔtakanɛ la walam ɔlɔk limini, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔnaangbong bubbi utum wanavva ammɛ. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔbbalnɛ walam ɔlɔk lillu, ɔtɔm a walam ammɛ ɔnaangmɛbong ɔnaang bubbi. Walam ’wɔng baang wa ɔtɔkmɛnɛ ɔssɛbong ɔnaang bubbi ɔgbaa.
“Aggbayɔng lippyee ka baggbanɛ balɔɔt lɛbwɔɔlɔ battɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛpɛyɔng nsekele; ɔzzànga anaangyɔng kwa alenɛyɔng liyim ka lusso Ebinukkpaapi attɛ vvenɛ anaangyɔng.’
Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ anaangnɛyɔng nsekele. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng libat. Libat lilenɛ ugbaal a kibeet, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng ɛkpansi, ɛkpansi elenɛ ɛfɛɛn a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usingnɛ bukkpɔ ammɛ, ɔlɔk ayimyɔng Jerusalem. Akkenɛ attɛ Jerusalem ulenɛ killu Ubeet wa lɛbaang.
Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng lɛttɔ annyɔɔng ka asinɛ kikkwoong anaang ulata eggbe kittulu nnyɔn gbɔɔ ɔlɔk ubili.
Alɔɔk gbɔɔ bwɛt attɛ, ‘Iii’ ɔlɔk ‘Maaye!’ Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kulenɛ bakang kwa attinanɛ kɛlɔɔk agbaa kussi ka Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm.
“Appyeeyɔngbong ka badɔkɔnɛ balɔɔk battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔtwɔnɛ zzeen, assɛ abwɔɔtmɛ za ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkpɛɛwɔnɛ lɛsaal assɛ akkpɛɛmɛ za ammɛ.’

Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ apipiliyɔng ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utupwɔnɛ kabut ka kugga kwa kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk asikili kwa ɛbyakɔm, alokomɛ ɔbbal litup ɔgbaa.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkaawɔnɛ umii ka ɔdda kɛkaal ɔttɛ ɔsam uwɔkɔlɔ annɔ, afɔngɔmɛ ɔbbal wa vvɔn lɛsam ɔgbaa.
Ullu-lɛkɔɔng ɔttɛnɛ atɔkɔmɛ bɛfɛɛn ka maal vvɔn, abbal wa vvɔn lɛtɔkɔ agbaa.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbapwɔnɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ayanganɛ, annyimɛbwɛ, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uffuwɔnɛ kifolo bɔfɛɛn, annyimɛbwɛ ufolo.
“Appyeeyɔngbong kkpal ka balɔɔknɛ battɛ inngwa annyɔɔng isaapwɔyɔng, balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annyɔɔng batunwɔyɔng!
Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ balɔɔt a kɔfok annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng. Azɔɔm annyiyɔng balɔɔt ba bayɔɔwɔnɛyɔng akama,

nkwaaning azzangayɔng bwaan a Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat. Ammɛ ɔnaangnɛ livve-luwee ammɛ lippwolo lɛllɔt babbyap la balɔɔt ba bayyɛɛpnɛ. Uteep ɔllɔt balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa bbwak la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa kɔbbolnɛ.
Anaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ aggyanyɔng lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka atelenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba batelewɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng keem. Nlɔɔk ka batɔk-innamba bassɛnɛ banaang ning baang.
Atolonɛyɔng kutolo la inngwa annyɔɔng keem, attina attɛyɔng baang anaangyɔngbong kɔlɔɔk kwa ssɔng ɔɔ? Nlɔɔk ka balɔɔt ba batakanɛ baptizim lɛnaang bassɛnɛ banaang ning baang.
Anaangyɔng bbwak bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng wa ulenɛ ka libat ɔnaangnɛ.”

“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng kɛnaang a luzɔɔm annyɔɔng ka kkpelegede nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɛn kwa anaangnɛyɔng. Anaangnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ka kkpelegede, lɛsɔɔk baala ayangayɔng ka labɔɔk a Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat.

“Annyinɛ ɔlɔɔt bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔggyannɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaang linaang sa alemɛnɛ bɔfɛɛn linnyi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bayɔɔnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng ka idda mitin la itɔk battɛ abbɛ balenɛ banaang-a-budoddo. Banaang battɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt babungubɛ. Akke asan attɛyɔng kikkpele abbɛ kɛggba lɛsaal tɛ.
Ɔzzànga ayaamnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbyamɛnɛ, anaangkwɛ ka ɛtɔk ya ɛnngwa?-?luppyam annɔ ele esikwɛ lɛsan.
Kule kɔlɔɔk a lalup, Ssaawɔ annɔ wa ɔyɛnnɛ kwa anaangnɛ ka lalup vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔ lɛsɔɔk.

“Ɛkɛtɛ azɔɔmnɛyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, basaap kibee ka idda mitin la lufoom a itɔk bazɔɔm nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɛnbɛ. Akke asan attɛyɔng kikkpele abbɛ kɛggba lɛsaal.
Ale ka azɔɔmnɛ luzɔɔm, amii ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk-a-ggwoon, annɔ afɛɛn lɛmma ggwoon, azɔɔm annyi Ssaawɔ annɔ wa asimɛnɛ lɛyɛn. Ssaawɔ annɔ wa ule ɔyɛn kwa anaangnɛ ka lalup, vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔ lɛsɔɔk.
“Azɔɔmnɛyɔng luzɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ́ azɔɔmyɔng tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a ikaan ilɔk, ba battinanɛ battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule uppyeebɛ ka bazɔɔmnɛ mmɛmmɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng, ɔggba lɛsan bwa aggyannɛyɔng ka labɔɔk ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ abapmɛyɔng.
Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale azɔɔmnɛyɔng: ‘Dedde ayyɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka libat, Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ikɔɔm lɛkɔɔl annɔ ka budoddo, itelezɛ.
Afɔngɔyɛlɛ ifula ka Itutum annɔ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bya aggyannɛ attɛ inaangbyɛ, anaangyɛlɛ inaangbyɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛ ka libat.
Annyiyɛlɛ bwa kuzzi bwa iggyannɛ mmwɔɔn.
Asɔɔkyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt isɔɔknɛ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi batumyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
Afɔngɔyɛlɛ kɛllɛ gaang gaang, ɔzzànga akatyɛlɛ asseke Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm.’
“Asɔɔknɛ balɔɔt kɔlɔɔk kwa banaangnɛ kɔbbɔl batumwɔ, Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng.
Ɔzzànga asinɛ balɔɔt balɔk lɛsɔɔk, Ssaawɔ annɔ ka libat baala ɔssɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔ annɔ ka kɔlɔɔk kwa anaangnɛ kɔbbɔl.

“Ɛkɛtɛ ya ale ka ataanɛ buwɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abbɔl lusso tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng. Bassɛ baang bakkpit la lɛppyɛɛk a buwɔɔng nkwaaning balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ basan battɛ bale ka kɛtaa buwɔɔng. Akke attɛyɔng kikkpele abbɛ kɛggba lɛsaal tɛ.
Ayilayɔng lusso, assakayɔng bittulu ka ɛkɛtɛ ataanɛyɔng buwɔɔng
nkwaaning balɔɔt balɔk basi lɛsan battɛ aleyɔng ka kɛtaa buwɔɔng. Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng kɛyɔɔng wa asimɛnɛyɔng lɛyɛn ule ɔsan. Ammɛ wa ɔsannɛ bwa anaangnɛyɔng ka lalup vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng lɛsɔɔk.
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɔngɔlɔyɔng iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung, ka ɛfɛɛn itilikɔɔt la bisili bile bɛbɛpɛyɛ, bassip vvenɛ babwɔɔt bamal bamii bayip.
Lutini ’gwɔng, abɔngɔlɔyɔng iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng ka libat, ka ɛfɛɛn a itilikɔɔt la bisili bile bisi likkwoong bɛbɛpɛyɛ, bassip basi likkwoong babwɔɔt bamal bayipyɛ.
Ɛfɛɛn a kibeet annɔ kilenɛ, luppyam annɔ lɔssɛ lule baang ɔgbaa.
“Zzeen lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ otinika ka kkwɔɔt ɔlɔɔt. Zzeen annɔ lalenɛ kkpaladada, kkwɔɔt annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ liyanga buppwolo.
Ɔzzànga zzeen annɔ labbɔlnɛ, kkwɔɔt annɔ lile ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul. Buppwolo bwa ayanganɛ bulenɛ kisul, nzang kisul kɛttalawɔ gaang gaang ka tɔkɔlɔ.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔtaa bubili ibassɛ ammɛ iffa ba ule; vvenɛ vvɔn utunwɔ, wa vvɔn ɔsaapwɔ. Vvenɛ annyi vvɔn latele, wa vvɔn utunwɔ. Ba akkwoong atele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ikkpoko ɛkɛtɛ kkwɔn.

“Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ: tɛ̀ttɛ́ attinayɔng gaang gaang kwa kazzi la bannyi ba avvanɛ adduyɔng, ɔlɔk attinayɔng kwa iwɔkɔlɔ ya kɛwɔkɔlɔ ka kkwɔɔt. Kkpɔɔ mung kuddu lissi kɔttanɛ kazzi ɔɔ? Faa kuddu lissi kɔttanɛ iwɔkɔlɔ?
Ppyɛɛkyɔng bunɔɔn bwa bukutnɛ bukkpitwɔyɔng mung. Iwopowo ba buwoop, ɔlɔk buyaat liyaat buloko ka ikunu. Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat ɔkɔɔmnɛbwɛ. Kkpɔɔ annyɔɔng lissi attanɛyɔng bunɔɔn ɔɔ?
Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng baang nnyinɔɔng uttinanɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔtaa likkpa ggbadam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uffiknɛ?
“Ngkka bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ luppyam lɔzzawɔyɔng kwa ibba? Ppyɛɛkyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo kɛmat immalanɛ. Kɛnaang ba inaang ɔlɔk vvenɛ ikaang iwɔkɔlɔ issɛɛnyɛ kɛyɔɔng.
Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, gɔɔ Solomon ka iyyɛɛp ammɛ ka utiinɛ ikokolo, iwɔkɔlɔ usi lɛyanga ya iyyɛɛpnɛ ikkɛtɛ la idodo ’yɔng mung.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukulanɛ lifaat sa lilenɛ mung mmwɔɔn ibba, vvenɛ likkɔm lɔkɔɔn lufat, ba attina attɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ ɔppyɛɛkwɔyɔng ɔsak ɔɔ? ’Bɔng kiyila kissupwɔnɛyɔng ning!
Afɔngɔyɔng kɛbɛlɛ littina attɛyɔng, mung bwa kuzzi nle nyɛn yang nzzi ee? ɔlɔk bannyi mung nle nyɛn yang nvva ee?
(Mbyɔng bilenɛ kɛssanga bɛfɛɛn bya balɔɔt a ikaan a vveengodde baggyannɛ.) Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat, ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛsaapwɔyɔng lɔsaap.
Lutini ’gwɔng, akɔɔm ɛtɔk assɛɛnyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luppyam la bɛfɛɛn bya aggyannɛ ka ibɔɔk annyɔɔng, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bya aggyannɛyɔng.
Afɔngɔyɔng kittina kwa lufat, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ittina iffu iyipiwɔyɔng ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang. Akama wa kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ɔyyɛɛpbong ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang.”
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ annyi balɔɔt kibbi ggbɔɔgbɔɔ nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiwɔ annɔ lɛssɛ unnyi.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ùlé ɔkaal kɛkaal annɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akaalnɛ kɛkaal a balɔɔt balɔk. Ule ɔkɔɔm kɛssanga kɛkaal sa annɔ akaalnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ɔkaal kɛkaal annɔ.
Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ appyɛɛk kwa ezuku bɔfɛɛn ya tɔkɔlɔ a zzeen etele annɔ, asi kwa lɛffɛ-kɛssɛ za lɛbaang za lilenɛ ka zzeen annɔ biini lɛppyɛɛk?
Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akkpenge ɔkpana annɔ attɛ ‘Nsangawɔ ezuku bɔfɛɛn ka zzeen.’ Ka bɔfɛɛn bwa lɛbaang bulewɔnɛ ka zzeen za annɔ biini?
Annɔ ɔnaang-a-lagban ’wɔng! Akɔɔm ɛtɔk asanga bɔfɛɛn bwa zzeen za annɔ biini, tɛ́ttɛ́ vvenɛ akkwoong appyɛɛk asanga bɔfɛɛn bwa bulenɛ ka zzeen a ɔkpana annɔ.
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asam bɔfɛɛn bwa bulenɛ bwa latele annyi ibbwa, nzang vvenɛ isikili iddopowɔ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asam ifɔɔk-akpana atɔɔp ka lusso ikkumma; atɔɔpnɛ ning baang, vvenɛ isusukuyɛ ka bukkpɔ.
“Abapnɛ, vvenɛ atɔk; aggyannɛ, vvenɛ ayɛn; alipnɛ, vvenɛ lɛmma liwongolowɔ.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbapnɛ, vvenɛ ɔyanga ’bwɛ; ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ, vvenɛ ɔyenbwɛ; ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulipnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon, vvenɛ liwongolomɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa waan ammɛ ɔkkwanɛ kazzi, ɔsam lɛttaal unnyimɛ ɔɔ?
Ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔsam ɛzzɔkɔ unnyi awan, ka awan ɔkkwanɛ ɛsɛɛnabannyi ɔɔ?

Ka abbɔlnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɔlnɛyɔng lɔbbɔl baang, asanyɔng lɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyinɛyɔng bwaan annyɔɔng bɛfɛɛn bya doddo, la nzang Ssaawo annyɔɔng ka libat, usi balɔɔt ba babapmɛnɛ bɛfɛɛn bwa doddo linnyi ɔɔ!
“Anaangyɔng linaang la bannyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggyannɛ attɛ bannyɔɔng banaang la annyɔɔng. Ning baang ulenɛ ifɛɛt a Lafɔɔ-a-Moses la lukopolo bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
“Assɛyɔng ka lɛmma-kikku za ppyep ammiiyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ɛtɔk ya ɛggbamnɛ, ɛyyɛɛp, emii ka Hell. Balɔɔt bale batta ka annyɛ lɛssɛ.
Lɛmma-kikku za ppyep za likoolnɛ lɔssɛ, limiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a kuddu, bwaan a balɔɔt ssup basannɛ ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang.
“Akatyɔng kwa bakkaalalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bale baffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ka appyɛɛknɛyɔngbɛ ka zzeen. Ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ igɔɔt.
Vvenɛ akɔɔlɔyɔngbɛ ka eleme abbɛ. Lalaak-ɛkkpɛ la lifaat, lakkpo mangolo ba bɛwɔm.
Kɛssɛ sa doddo kɛwɔmnɛ lakkpo za layyɛɛpnɛ. Kɛssɛ sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛwɔm babbu lakkpo.
Kɛssɛ sa doddo lakkpo za lasinɛ lɛyyɛɛp ba kɛwɔm. Kɛssɛ sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp lakkpo za layyɛɛpnɛ ba kɛwɔm.
Lɛsan-a-kɛssɛ za lisinɛ lakkpo za doddo lɛwɔm, vvenɛ bazzasɛ bazzɔɔk babbɔk bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn.
Ka ussinɛ baang vvenɛ akɔɔlɔyɔng bakkaalalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
“Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔkkwɔɔnɛnɛ ‘Uyini’, ‘Uyini’ lissi ule ɔmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga ule balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa Dedde anaam ka libat ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ banaang ka bale bamal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ɛkɛtɛ ya kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang kile kiffu, balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bakkwɔɔnɛ ‘Uyini, Uyini’, balɔɔk battɛ, ‘Ibwɔɔlɔ ibwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ. Iggbabong ipiliza ggbadam ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ, inaang bɛmaanga ggbadam igbaa.’
Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ nlɔɔk la abbɛ nttɛ, ‘Wɔyɔng ba ntaka nsan, agbata assekenɛyɔng, annyɔɔng banaang-a-bubbi.’
“Ka ussinɛ mung, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam utelezɛ, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔsan-a-kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔɔknɛ ggwoon ammɛ ka libat akpana.
Usini bannyi uteep, iyɔngɔ iyipi, ɛlɔlɔ etuma, kɛffa kɛffa gaang gaang kibum kitut a ggwoon kɛzzɔɔk. Ɔzzànga ggwoon lusi lɛttɔ, ka babɔɔknɛ gwɛ ka libat akpana.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam usizɛ litele, ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzingizingi ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔɔknɛ ggwoon ka libat a kususuk.
Usini bannyi uteep, iyɔngɔ iyipi, kɛffa kɛffa gaang gaang kitut ggwoon lɔttɔ, kɛttɔ kɛbbɔl.”
Jesus uvvenɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng lɛlɔɔk, kibbi ’sɔng baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka lukopolo gwa ukopolonɛ.
Ba ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ abbɛ. Ammɛ ukopolo la lakke.
Jesus usininɛ ka ekpok uffu kuttɔɔk, kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam kikupmɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt-ɔffaal uffu ukunmɛ laddu ɔttɛ, “Dedde kɔsaapwɔnɛ, anaangnɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
Jesus utuulu kɔbɔɔk usingimɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔppwawɔ.” Eseese ɔffaal ɔsaalmɛ.

Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔ! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ! Amii ssɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, ɔppyɛɛkwɔ, anaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ Moses lalɔɔknɛ, usseke ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔppwawɔbong.”
Jesus ɔffɔnɛ Capernaum, Akkala Rome uffu ukupmɛ ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ uttelemɛ.
Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Dedde, bɔɔyi anaam ulenɛ ka ssala ka igolo ka umininɛ ka usimɛnɛ lɛppwa, ba ukkwoong ufeele, ɔssɔpmɛ gaang gaang.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nmii nttulamɛ.”
Akkala ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ning lissi, Dedde, nsi lɛggyan nttɛ annɔ vvenɛ affu ka ssala anaam. Azza lɛmmwɔɔl azzɛ azzɛ, usseke bɔɔyi anaam ɔppwanɛ.

Anaam mgbaa nssɛ nyanga balɔɔt ba battanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge. Anaam mgbaa nssɛ nyanga isɔdya ya nkɔɔmnɛ. Nlɔɔknɛ la ’wɔng nttɛ umii, umii. Nlɔɔknɛ la ’wɔng nttɛ uffu, uffu. Nlɔɔknɛ la ubili anaam nttɛ ɔnaang bwɔng, ɔnaang bwɛ.”
Jesus uppyeenɛ ’kwɔng mung, kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ gaang gaang, ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba bakupmɛnɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, kɛssanga kiyila ’sɔng ba ntaka nyɛn ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyanganɛ ka Israel.

Akkeyɔng attɛyɔng balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm baffu, balɔk bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee kulele baffu bataa ka okkpokolo ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Abraham la Isaac la Jacob.
Balɔɔt ba bulenɛ ba Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ bassangbɛ ballɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul ka ɛfɛɛn a bale bataa bakkwa bazzi lasaal.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la akkala ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Amii ka ssala. Kwa alenɛ kiyila lɛyanga atum, vvenɛ kubee la annɔ.” Ubili akkala ’wɔng baang ɔppwamɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang eseese.
Jesus umii ka ssala Peter. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang ɔyɛn abakka wanavva Peter ka kisi lɛppwa ka igolo ka umininɛ; ɔffaakmɛ buyili.
Jesus usingimɛ ka kɔbɔɔk, eseese buyili busaalmɛ. Ufeele ɔtaa lɔtaa unnyibɛ kazzi.
Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, balɔɔt bakɔɔm balɔɔt ipiliza bafee Jesus. Jesus ɔkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl, ɔggba ipiliza, uttula balɔɔt ba ɔssɔpnɛbɛ.
Ɔnaang nkwɔng ngkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa Isaiah, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Ammɛ biini ɔtɔknɛ bukoolo a kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt ɔsam iffaak ayyɔɔt ɔgbata.”
Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ kibbi sa kikkpitmɛnɛ, ɔdda balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ bafeele bamii ka kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn.
Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ uffu ukup Jesus, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, nyilabong kɛssɛ la annɔ kimii ka ɛfɛɛn duu ya amiinɛ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Lifat liyanga ibbe ya lillunɛ, bunɔɔn buyanga lakɔt za bukkwununɛ, ɔzzànga Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛfɛɛn ya umininɛ ɔfɛkɛlɛ ba ɔyanga.”
Ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Dedde, afɔngɔnɛbong nmii nlli dedde anaam.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛ, afɔngɔ babbu balli ba abbɛ babbu.”
Jesus ɔmal ka akkpaat; balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bakupmɛ.
Kitipili kitipili, kɛffa-bannyi sa lɛbaang kɛffa ka libbwe ’zɔng baang. Ɔzzánga bannyi bakupa bassɛɛn ka akkpaat ka Jesus ulenɛ ka bilaa.
Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii bafungalamɛ, battɛ “Mung ile ka ɛtɔk a lubbe tɛ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔng abbwɔpɔnɛyɔng ning? Bɔka kiyila kissupwɔnɛyɔng ning!” Ufeele ubee ubee, ɔkkpa kɛffa la labba-bannyi kiwele. Kɛffa kizum eseese.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ balɔɔk battɛ, “Mung bɔka kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt wa kɛffa la labba-bannyi bitelemɛnɛ?”

Jesus uffunɛ ka ɛkpansi a Gadarenes, ka lufoom a libbwe gwa ggwɔn, ududa balɔɔt baffa ba battanɛ ka ulupu. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayanga ipiliza, babbwɔpɔ kɛppyɛɛk. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔnɛ ɔbbal ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang lɛssɛ ba ule.
Eseese bazzɔɔk kibungu batte, “Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aggyan bɔng la ayyɔɔt? Affubongyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔ akama tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ɛffɔ ɔɔ?”
Ɛfɛɛn ikkumma idɔkɔnɛ ka kazzi ba efulu.
Ipiliza ’yɔng baang ikkpenge Jesus ittɛ, “Ale ka aggbanɛyɛlɛ itta isseke ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung, atɔɔmyɛlɛ imii ka kibbi ikkumma ’sɔng baang.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ipiliza ’yɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ammiiyɔng.” Ɔzzánga annyɛ igbata imii ikup ikkumma. Kibbi ikkumma ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛmma kisini kuttɔɔk a lɛttaal kimii kɛttɔ ka bannyi kɛtaak.
Balɔɔt ba bakatnɛ ikkumma ’yɔng baang bamma bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala babwɔɔlɔbɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ batum balɔɔt baffa ba bayanganɛ ipiliza.
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ussinɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ufeele umii kɛyɛn a Jesus. Bayɛnmɛnɛ bakkpengemɛ battɛ ɔgbata usseke lɛffɛ abbɛ.
Jesus ɔmal ka akkpaat ukum libbwe ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi ufula ka lɛffɛ ammɛ biini.
Balɔɔt balɔk batɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt ositta baffu ka ewula. Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ ka kiyila balɔɔt ’bɔng baang kɛttalanɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt a ositta ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Kkaam luppyam, waan anaam, nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ.”
Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔkpɛnbong Ebinukkpaapi!”
Jesus ɔggba ittina abbɛ lɛsan. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attinayɔng babbu lilɔɔk ning?
Mung kule bbwɛt kɛttɛ ‘Nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ’ faa kɛttɛ, ‘Afeele asse’?
Vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔng, nyɔɔwɔyɔng ayɛnyɔng ka zzeen nttɛ, Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyanga lakke za kɛsɔɔk a bubbi.” Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ositta ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Afeele, asam ewula annɔ afula.”
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ufeele ɔsam ewula ammɛ ufula.
Balɔɔt bayɛnnɛ ning baang, ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ukkwoongnɛ unnyi balɔɔt likke ’zɔng baang.

Jesus ɔgbatanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang, ulenɛ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ, ɔyɛn ɔtɔk-innamba wa ɔzzanganɛ Matthew ka ɔtaanɛ ka ggwoon a kɛnaang ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la Matthew ɔttɛ, “Feele akupnɛ.” Ɔzzánga Matthew ufeele ukupmɛ.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kizzi kazzi ka ssala Matthew, batɔk-innamba ggbadam la babbyap baffu batoolo baang ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bazzi kazzi ka okkpokkolo.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk, bayɛnnɛ ning baang, balɔɔk la balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a Jesus battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ukopolo-lukopolo annyɔɔng utul kazzi la batɔk-innamba, la babbyap uzzi?”
Jesus uppyeenɛbɛ ka balɔɔknɛ ning baang, ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba ɔppwanɛbɛ uttula-ittula ba baggyan, ule balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa ka baggyannɛ uttula-ittula.

Amii akkoopyɔng bwa luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Luzɔɔm gwa akɔɔmnɛyɔng isɛɛn azɔɔmyɔng ba nggyan, nggyan kɛyyɛɛp a bɛnaang.’ Kɛkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a latele lissi ka nffunɛ, nffu kwa balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi.”
Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, baffu babap Jesus battɛ, “Mung ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayyɔɔt la balɔɔt a Pharisees itaa buwɔɔng kpɛtkpɛt, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ basi lɛtaa?”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Attina attɛyɔng bakekeen ba baffunɛ libbeel vvenɛ bataa bukee ka uyini libbeel ulenɛ baang ɔɔ? Ning baang baala kule. Ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya bale basam uyini libbeel bagbata bakɔngɔbɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ bafula buwɔɔng a buwɔɔng.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ufaa ubba ɔsal lemmɛ ɔtɔm ubba ba ule. Akɔɔmnɛ ning baang ufaa vvenɛ ɔyaak ɔtɔm, ɔnaangmɛ lɛmma lɛggbam lɛgbaa.

Ɔlɔk asam batak asikili assɛɛn ka ɔtɔm ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn. Assɛɛnnɛ ning baang vvenɛ ɛssɔ etuma batak ballɔt ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang esseke ubbu bɔfɛɛn. Lutini ’gwɔng ufaa batak bassɛɛn ka ufaa ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn. Ɔssɛɛnnɛ ning baang ɔpkpɛlɛ abbyɛ vvenɛ bɛtaa ka budoddo.”
Ka Jesus ulenɛbɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk nkwɔng baang, Akkala wa Jew uffu ukupmɛ, ukunmɛ laddu ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam wa wanavva ussuma libbe gedegede mung. Affu atelemɛ labɔɔk nkwaaning uddu.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele ukupmɛ. Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ batɔɔmɛ.
Wanavva vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa linnyi lissimɛnɛ ka likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus, usingi Jesus ka ewuula.
Ɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, “Nsinginɛ ewuulu ammɛ mung, vvenɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
Jesus usikili ɔyɛnmɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Akkaam luppyam waan anaam! Kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ.” Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔppwamɛ eseese.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele umii ka ssala akkala ’wɔng baang ɔyɛn bakkpa ibin ka kɛnaang a ibin ka kullu ’kwɔng baang, la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bassɛnɛ yɔngɔlɔ-yɔngɔlɔ-yɔngɔlɔ.
Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔtta ka vveeng; waan a wanavva ’wɔng baang kubbe lissi ka ubbenɛ, ule ka bilaa.” Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ basseke ka banyɔɔkamɛnɛ, basɛɛk.
Baggbanɛ balɔɔt basaal, Jesus ɔmal ka lɛnɔk a waanawanavva ’wɔng baang, ɔlɔm waantiti ka kɔbɔɔk, ufeele, ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.
Kuttu kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang.
Jesus ɔgbatanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, bassi-ifim baffa bakupmɛ la kibungu la kibungu battɛ, “Waan a David ibbewɔ lɛttɔ.”
Jesus ulenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon lɛmal, bassi-ifim ’bɔng baang baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ayila mung attɛyɔng nkkwoong mung nnaang ’kwɔng ɔɔ?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Iii tɛ Dedde;”
Jesus usingibɛ ka zzeen, ɔttɛ, “Buttɛ kɔnaang ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayilanɛyɔng.”
Ɔzzánga ifim abbɛ isaalbɛ. Jesus ɔttamabɛ kɔkɔlɔm ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ!”
Bagbatanɛ, bamii babwɔɔlɔ kuttu budoddo bwa Jesus ɔnaangnɛ la abbɛ bakkpit lufoom ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bagbatanɛ, balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt wa ipiliza inaangmɛnɛ usi kɛlɔɔk lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong, baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
Ɔggbanɛ ipiliza ’yɔng baang ussekemɛ, utte kɛlɔɔk eseese. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ. Battɛ, “Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ba itaka iyɛn ka ɛkpansi a Israel.”
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔɔk battɛ, “Ubeet ubbukanggbe unnyimɛnɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza itta isseke balɔɔt.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssɛ ukkpit laffɛ la igyila ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ukopolobɛ ka idda mitin. Ɔyaam Kuttu?-?budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Uttula balɔɔt bɛssanga iffaak duu ya ɔffaaknɛbɛ.
Ɔyɛnnɛ kibbi ’sɔng baang, babbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang, ka balenɛ ggbɔɔ ka bassɛnɛ bawɔngɔ bakkpit, uttele uttele ba bayanga. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ya isɛlɛnɛ ɔkat-ɔkat.
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Liyaat sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang lissolobong. Ɔzzànga bayaat-ɔyaat bale ssup.
Azɔɔm annyiyɔng Uyini-liyaat nkwaaning ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt ggbadam bamiinɛ liyaat.”
Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn unnyibɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza la kittula balɔɔt ba ɔssɔpnɛbɛ la bɛssanga iffaak duu bya ɔffaaknɛbɛ.
Uwɔng ulenɛ lakɔɔl a bayila bɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba zzɔɔpabaffa. Ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk, Simon (wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Peter) la etele ammɛ Andrew. James la etele ammɛ John, bwaan a Zebedee.
Philip la Bartholomew, Thomas la Matthew, ɔtɔk-innamba; la James, waan Alphaeus, la Thaddaeus.
Simon, wa lɔkaan ammɛ lɔsaapmɛnɛ, la Judas Iscariot, wa uzzinɛ issɛ a Jesus.
Jesus ɔtɔɔm Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ la lɔttama ’gwɔng ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ amiiyɔng ka laffɛ ikaan ilɔk, ɔlɔk ka laffɛ a Samaria.
Lutini ’gwɔng ammiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a Israel ba balenɛ lɛtaak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn.
Amii ayaam abwɔɔlɔyɔngbɛ attɛyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.
Attulayɔng balɔɔt iffaak, afungalayɔng balɔɔt ba babbenɛ, attulayɔng balɔɔt ɔffaal, aggbayɔng ipiliza. Atɔkyɔngbong lakke ’zɔng ka lɛsɔɔk, annyɔɔng assɛnɛ annyiyɔng balɔɔt balɔk ka lɛsɔɔk.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛɛnyɔng Naira, gɔɔ sili, gɔɔ kobo, ɔlɔk nddeli ka ɛssɔ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng ɛssɔ lubbwoom ka kɔssɛ kwa ale ka ammiinɛyɔng, gɔɔ uwɔkɔlɔ, gɔɔ ikkpa-bukkpɔ, gɔɔ lukut a kɔssɛ. Ɔnaang-a-kɛnaang ule wa bannyimɛnɛ bwa ɔggyannɛ.
Affɔnɛyɔng ka lɛffɛ ɔlɔk ɛ̀sàm, amiiyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala aggyanyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔtɔkwɔyɔng ka laggele, ataayɔng baang la ammɛ tɔttɔt agbatayɔng baang.
Amiinɛyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon, alɔɔk attɛyɔng ‘Bɔkaat butaa la annyɔɔng.’
Balɔɔt ba ssala ’sɔng baang batɔkwɔnɛyɔng, bukaat butaa la abbɛ. Ɔzzànga basiwɔnɛyɔng ka laggele lɛtɔk, appyɛlɛ luwomo bɔkaat annyɔɔng atɔkyɔng.
Ule ssala ɔlɔk lɛffɛ za basiwɔnɛyɔng ka laggele lɛtɔk; basi lɛmmwɔɔl annyɔɔng lɛgɔpɔlɔ, akkwɔlɔ ibut-a-bukkpɔ annyɔɔng allɔtyɔng baang, agbata assekeyɔng ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvene ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Sodom la Gomorrah kibbe lɛttɔ ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal ɔtta balɔɔt a killu ’sɔng baang.
“Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! mung ntɔɔmwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ka kɛtaa igɔɔt. Abbɔnɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ izzɔkɔ, anaangyɔng bɛtɛbɛtɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakkpelekete.
Akatyɔng tɛ, balɔɔt bale bale baang ba bale bakaawɔyɔng basamwɔyɔng bamii ka idda kɛkaal. Vvenɛ batupwɔyɔng ka idda mitin abbɛ.
Vvenɛ bakɔɔmwɔyɔng bamii kɛkaal ka lusso bayini lusse la babeet ka lɛttɔ anaam, ka abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng balɔɔt a Jews la balɔɔt ikaan ilɔk Kuttu budoddo.
Ɛkɛtɛ ya bale bakɔɔmwɔyɔng bamii kɛkaal, tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina atumyɔng kwa ale alɔɔkyɔng ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale anaangyɔng. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɛffɔnɛ vvenɛ nnnyiwɔyɔng bwa ale alɔɔkyɔng.
Lɛmmwɔɔl za ale alɔɔkyɔng ka luttina annyɔɔng baala lissi, lissiwɔyɔng ka Kuyeeng a Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng.
“Balɔɔt vvenɛ basam itele abbɛ bannyi battɛ bawwɔɔl. Ibassɛ a bwɔɔn bale banaang ning baang la ibbwɔɔn ɔgbaa. Ibbwɔɔn vvenɛ kusikili kutunbɛ la ibassɛ abbɛ la ibakka, basambɛ bawwɔɔl.
Vvenɛ atunyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa uttumunɛ ka budoddo, ɔffɔ ka lakpeke, vvenɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu kwa doddo.
Bayɔɔwɔnɛyɔng akama ka lɛffɛ zzɔn afoto amma amiiyɔng ka za zzɔn. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, kɛnaang annyɔɔng baala avveyɔng ka laffɛ a Israel ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu.
“Waan wa uggbengenɛ ɔtta ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ ba ule. Ubili wa uggbengenɛ ɔtta abassɛ ammɛ ba ule.

Waan ɔwaamɛ ka uggbengenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ. Ubili ɔssɛ ɔwaamɛ ka uggbengenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abassɛ. Ulenɛ ka Beelzebul (ubeet ubbukanggbe) ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ itutum, bwaan itutum ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bakɔlɔbɛ lakɔɔl za labbɔlnɛ lasak!
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt babbwɔpɔwɔyɔng ka ussinɛ mung. Lutini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bavvoongnɛbwɛ vvenɛ buwongolo. Lutini likup ɔkkpɛlɛ za babwɔpnɛ, vvenɛ lɛtta ka vveeng.
Kwa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng mung ka kisul, vvenɛ abbalyɔngkwɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ kikoon; ɔzzànga kwa appyeenɛyɔng ka lalup, vvenɛ abwɔɔlɔyɔngkwɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ addongonɛyɔng ka bɛsanga.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba bawwɔɔlnɛ kkwɔɔt kɛyɔɔng basi likkwoong bawwɔɔl lɛfɛkɛlɛ babbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔwwɔɔl kkwɔɔt la lɛfɛkɛlɛ ka lɔkɔɔn.
Akkwoong mung alɛɛp buggwele buffa ka kobo; ɔzzànga ppyɔn gbɔɔ ka lisse baala bittɔ, Ssaawɔ usi lɛsan.
Ulenɛ kwa annyɔɔng iggbe bittulu annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ itii ka lukkwoon.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng; attayɔng buggwele ggbadam.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ppwool ɔttɛ ammɛ ule wa anaam, vvenɛ nssɛ nnaang ning baang la ammɛ ka Iusso a Dedde anaam ka libat.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkalanɛ ppwool ppwool ɔttɛ, ammɛ wa anaam lissi, anaam vvenɛ nssɛ nkalamɛ ka lusso a Dedde anaam ka libat.
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛyɔng mung nkɔɔm bɔkaat nffu ka vveeng ’wɔng. Bɔkaat lissi ka nkɔɔmnɛ nffu, nkɔɔm ogge.
Nffu nssɛɛn bwaanabwalam la ibassɛ abbɛ kɔlɔɔk; nssɛɛn bwaanabwanavva kɔlɔɔk la ibakka abbɛ. Nssɛɛn bakka lilɔɔk la ibakka abbɛ.
Kɔfɔk ɔlɔɔt kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ kussi ka itutum ammɛ biini.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttanɛ abassɛ la ibakka litele ussekenɛ anaam usinɛ litele, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa anaam lissi. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ awaan litele ussekenɛ anaam usinɛ litele, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa anaam lissi.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ cross ammɛ lɛsam ukup ɛtɔk anaam, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa anaam lissi.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ubumnɛ ɔggyan kwa kuddu ammɛ biini, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔtakakwɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtakanɛ kuddu ammɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam, vvenɛ uddu.
“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔkwɔnɛyɔng ka latele, ɔtɔknɛbong anaam ɔgbaa. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛnɛ anaam ka latele, ɔtɔkbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ anaam.

Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka latele, ka ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; vvenɛ batul lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang la ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ka latele, ka ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ule ɔlɔɔt wa doddo; vvenɛ batul lɛsɔɔk la ammɛ.
Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! ɔlɔɔt duu wa unnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam bannyi ɔvva, ka ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ule ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam; vvenɛ ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk ammɛ.”
Jesus uvvenɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa lɔttama ’gwɔng linnyi, ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang umii ukopolo, ɔyaam kuttu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka laffɛ za lɛkkɛtɛnɛ baang ɔgbaa.
John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ɔtaanɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ, uppyee kɔlɔɔk a kɛnaang a Christ, ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔk ufeemɛ.
Babap Jesus battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, mung annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa John ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ uffu ɔɔ? Faa ikat ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Appyɛlɛyɔng isimisimi amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng John bwa appyeenɛyɔng, ayɛnyɔng ka zzeen agbaayɔng.

Bassi-ifim bakkwoong bayɛn; basi-kɔssɛ-likkwoong, bakkwoong bassɛ. Balɔɔt-ɔffaal ɔppwabɛ; bassi-latɔɔk bappyee. Babbu bafungala ka lubbe bataa ka kuddu, bayaam Kuttu-budoddo babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ bɛkangala ka luppyam lɛssɛɛn utumnɛ, vvenɛ ɔtaa ka laggele za lɛbaang.”

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John balenɛ ka kifula, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la kibbi ’sɔng baang utum John ɔttɛ, “Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya amiinɛ akupyɔng John ka kɛmat, adɔkɔ attina attɛ ale ayɛnyɔng bɔng? Ɛmma lɔfaat ya ɛtɛngɛnɛ ekup kɛffa ɔɔ?
Adɔkɔ amii ayɛnyɔng bɔng? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya iyyɛɛpnɛ gaang ɔɔ? Balɔɔt ba bawɔkɔlɔ ya ning baang ballu ka igala babeet.
Bwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng! mung adɔkɔ attɛ atta amii ayɛnyɔng bɔng? Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Iii nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ayɛnyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
John ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm anaam wa nle ntɔɔmmɛ ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk uffu ɔlɔngɔlɔ ɛtɔk ulokowɔ.’
Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ liggbenge. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ussupnɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔttamɛ liggbenge.
Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya John ɔyaamnɛ kuttu ammɛ tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iyɛnbong akama kullu gaang gaang, bábbyap babumyɛ kɛnnaa.
Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la Lafɔɔ-a-Moses tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ a John, balɔɔk batum kɔlɔɔk a Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Aggyannɛ kiyila kɔlɔɔk kwa balɔɔknɛ, John ulenɛ Elijah wa babwɔɔlɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ kiffu ammɛ ka isimi ka isimi.
Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk.
“Gedegede mung nle nssa balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng la bɔng ee? Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ba bakkyeetnɛ ka ogyila kappya, likup zzɔn libungu linnyi za zzɔn.
‘Isoom ibin a libbeel ilokowɔyɔng, afimyɔng kɛtɔm. Ikkwa ittɔl layilili, ɔzzanga annyɔɔng afimyɔng kɛkkwa!’
John ka uffunɛ ɔtaa buwɔɔng, batak usi lɛvva. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ, ‘John ɔyanga ipiliza’.

Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffunɛ, uzzi kazzi, ɔvva kɛvva. Balɔɔt battɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk ɔwɔnɔwɔnɔ ’wɔng! Ɔvva-batak-ɔlɔɔt, ɛnngwa batɔk-innamba la banaang a bubbi!’ Kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛyɔɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kɛttanɛ ka vveeng.”
Jesus ɔwɔlɔ laffɛ ’zɔng baang za ulenɛ bɛmaanga ggbadam baang lɛnaang, ka batakanɛ bubbi abbɛ lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ.

“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang, annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Chorazin! Vvenɛ assɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang, annyɔɔng Bethsaida! Bɛmaanga ’byɔng bya nnaangnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng mmɛmmɛ bakang, bulenɛ ka nnaangnɛ ka Tyre la Sidon, nzang balɔɔt ’bɔng baang basseke ka bawɔkɔlɔnɛ bissaka issɔ bakook ibili baggbɔbɛ kɛyɔɔng, bayɔɔ battɛ bakkyaabong bubbi abbɛ bafɔngɔ.
Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ!, ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Tyre la Sidon kibbe lɛttɔ gaang gaang ɔttawɔyɔng annyɔɔng.

Kwa annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Capernaum, anaangyɔng nang tɛ́ttɛ́ aggyan attɛ ayeekwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng amiiyɔng ka libat? Vvenɛ basamwɔyɔng bassɛɛn ka Hell! Bɛmaanga bya nnaangnɛ ka laffɛ annyɔɔng, bulenɛ ka nnaangnɛbyɛ ka Sodom, nzang Sodom utii baang ɔffɔ mmwɔɔn mung.
Akkeyɔng tɛ!, ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ kibbe lɛttɔ ammɛ gaang gaang la balɔɔt a Sodom battawɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Dedde, Uyini libat la ɛkpansi, nwomowɔ kɛnaang ka ayɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ba batakanɛ likkoop bwa alupnɛ asseke basan-a-kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba balenɛ likkoop.
Iii, Dedde, anaang ’kwɔng mung ka luttina annɔ la kɛsaap.
“Dedde anaam unnyinɛbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ Awaan ba ule, usinɛ Abassɛ lile. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ Abassɛ ba ule, usinɛ Awaan lile, la balɔɔt ba Awaan ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ basan.
“Affu akupnɛyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba atɔkɔnɛ latɔkɔ ɔkɔɔtwɔyɔng, vvenɛ nnyiwɔyɔng kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Asamyɔng ikpooka anaam awɔkɔlɔyɔng ka lukat.
Akupnɛyɔng ka itɔk anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ akoopyɔng lilɔɔk anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bɛɛm, nyánga kɛppwa luppyam ka tɔkɔlɔ, vvenɛ ayangayɔng kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
Ikpooka ya nle nnyiwɔyɔng ba ikɔɔt. Latɔkɔ za nle nnyiwɔyɔng ba lalɔɔp.”
Usi lɛmmɛ, Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka kasɛkɛ bibwoto-isasa ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ buwɔɔng busaapbongbɛ. Ɔzzánga batɛngɛnɛ lasan-isasa bakkwɔlɔ ifɔɔk bassɛɛn ka eddu basam bazzi.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees bayɛnnɛ ning baang, balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Ppyɛɛk ule kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt ka bɛnaang bya balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ banaangnɛ baang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ!”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akkwɔɔyɔngbong luvva gwa kɔlɔɔk kwa David ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔnaang la balɔɔt ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya buwɔɔng busaapnɛbɛ ɔɔ?

Ɔgbata umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la balɔɔt ammɛ, bamii basam brɛɛd wa bakɔɔmnɛ bassɛɛn luzɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bazzi, ɔzzanga ɔdɔkɔ kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ka bazzinɛ brɛɛd ’wɔng baang. Ule Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm kɛyɔɔng ka bazzinɛ.
Faa ka luvva Lafɔɔ a Moses ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng ka lutini Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ duu bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm babɛpɛnɛ lafɔɔ-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga basi ka Lafɔɔ lɛttɔ ɔɔ?
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, bɔfɛɛn bulɔk bule mung bwa buggbengenɛ butta Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Kɛkɔɔm a lakɔmɔlɔ kɛzɔɔm kinnyinɛ ba nggyan, nggyan kɛyɛɛp a bɛnaang.’ Bulenɛ ka asannɛ attɛyɔng kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nzang balɔɔt ba batakanɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛttɔ, ka kɔlɔɔk yɔngbɛ baala assɛɛnyɔng.
Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ Uyini Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.”
Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang umii ka ɔdda mitin abbɛ vvɔn.

Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang la ubbu kɔbɔɔk. Balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ baang ba baggyannɛ Jesus kɛssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk ka usinɛ bbwak lɛnaang. Ɔzzánga babapmɛ battɛ, “Mung ule kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt ka ɔlɔɔt uttulanɛ ittula ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ale anaangyɔng nang ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ɔyanganɛ ɛbal emii ɛttɔ ka lubbe gwa lɔddɔngnɛ ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Yɛ baala umii ɔsanga ɔɔ?
Ɔzzanga kaang ɔlɔɔt ɔtta ɛtɔɔn! Kwakkwɛ Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lafɔngɔnɛyɛlɛ ittele ɔlɔɔt ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.”
Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Tuulu kɔbɔɔk.” Ammɛ utuulukwɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ ɔppwamɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔbɔɔk kwa kkwɔn.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees bagbata bamii banaang likup za kɛwwɔɔl a Jesus.
Jesus uppyeenɛ utumkwɛ, ɔgbata baang. Balɔɔt ggbadam bakupmɛ. Uttula balɔɔt ba ɔssɔpnɛbɛ.
Ɔzzanga unnyibɛ lɔttama ’gwɔng ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk atumnɛyɔng tɛ.”
Nkwɔng kɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ uppyee-kutolo ammɛ wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah, ɔttɛ vvenɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Isaiah ɔttɛ;
“Yɛn bɔɔyi anaam mung wa nlenɛ lɛsanga, wa ntelemɛnɛ. Luppyam anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ lule ka ammɛ. Vvenɛ nssɛɛnmɛ kuyeeng anaam ɔlɔɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk a kɛkaal anaam.
Ɔzzanga baala ule ɔkangala-ikangala, ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔk kɛlɔɔk sa gagaga, gɔɔ balɔɔt baala bappyeemɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ka ɛtɔk.
Baala ɔkpɛɛlɛ lɔfaat gwa lukokonɛ. Gɔɔ vvenɛ uzum lɛlaak a lɔkɔɔn za lilenɛ ka kizum. Vvenɛ upiiti ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔnaang lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk luyeek kɔbɔɔk.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ baloko ittina abbɛ ka ammɛ.”
Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ifim usi kɛlɔɔk likkwoong bafee Jesus. Ɔyanga ipiliza ya ibbɔlnɛ. Jesus uttulamɛ ukkwoong kɛlɔɔk ɔyɛn ka zzeen.
Kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, babap battɛ, “Baang Waan-a-David ɔɔ?”
Balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyeenɛ ning baang, battɛ, “Beelzebul, uzzilɛttɔ lippyem, unnyimɛnɛ lakke ɔttɛ ɔggba ipiliza.”

Jesus ɔggba lɛsan bwa battinanɛ, ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Lɔkaan duu gwa lɔbɛngɛlɛnɛgwɛ kɛyɔɔng lusseke lakup lakup, likup zzɔn lillu zakang, lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang baala luttumu. Lɛffɛ duu ɔlɔk itutum ya ibɛngɛlɛnɛyɛ kɛyɔɔng ballubɛ kɛyɔɔng vvenɛ babbum.
Ɔzzanga likup zzɔn lillunɛ za zzɔn kullu ka itutum a Satan, ning baang vvenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsan ɔttɛ babɛngɛlɛbongbɛ kɛyɔɔng basseke lakup lakup. Lakup ’zɔng baang baala ɔmmɛ labbum.

Attɛyɔng anaam Beelzebul unnyinɛnɛ lakke nggba ipiliza. Kɔyyɛɛp mung, ngkka nnyinɔɔng unnyinɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annyɔɔng lakke za kɛssɛ kɛggba ipiliza? Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annyɔɔng balɔɔkbong battɛ annyɔɔng bbwak ba anaangyɔng!
Ning ba kule. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛnɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza kɔyɔɔ kɔttɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itiiwɔyɔng baang ka kkwɔɔt.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔmal ka ggwoon ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkaamnɛ umii uyipmɛ bɛfɛɛn ba ule, usinɛ Uyini izzi lɛggbɔ uloko kang bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsam bɛfɛɛn.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ wa anaam lile, ule ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛnɛ littele nkkwɔɔk bɛfɛɛn nbbi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, nzang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulebyɛ ka kibbum.

Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlcɔm ukkwoong mung ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt bubbi bwa banaangnɛ la lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bbɔlbbɔl utum Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi ’bwɔng baang mɛ baala ɔsɔɔk.

Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔlɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ utum Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔsɔɔkmɛ. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔlɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk za libbɔlnɛ utum Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, mɛ baala ɔsɔɔk kɛfal a kɛfal.

“Aggyannɛ attɛ ayanga lakkpo bɛssɛ za doddo, ale akɔɔn lasan-a-bɛssɛ bya doddo. Akɔɔnnɛ lɛsan-a-kɛssɛ za lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, vvenɛ affa lakkpo bɛssɛ za lasinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Kɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ikɔɔlɔsɛ ka lakkpo assɛ.
Annyɔɔng izzɔkɔ ’yɔng! anaang nang akkwoong alɔɔkyɔng lilɔɔk sa liyyɛɛpnɛ ka abbɔlnɛyɔng ning? Nlɔɔk ka kamma ɔlɔɔt kalɔɔknɛ kwa uttinanɛ ka luppyam.
Ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka ɔyanganɛ luppyam gwa doddo. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔlnɛ ɔnaang lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ, ka ɔyanganɛ ubbu luppyam.
“Ɔzzanga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛkaal, lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ babbu lammwɔɔl za ussinɛ utolo.
Bale bakɔɔm lammwɔɔl annyɔɔng bakaal kɛkaal annyɔɔng. Ulenɛ ka ale attayɔng ka akkwɛ, attayɔng. Ulenɛ ka attɔyɔng ka akkwɛ, attɔyɔng.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, bakopolo-Lafɔɔ, la balɔɔt a Pharisees bafeele battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, iggyan ittɛ anaang bɛmaanga ayɔɔyɛlɛ.”

Jesus ɔkɛɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng nnaang nang abbɔlnɛyɔng ning asiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele! Abapnɛyɔng kwa bɛmaanga ɔɔ? Maaye! Bɛmaanga bya nle ka nyɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ule bya Jonah, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jonah ukkununɛ ka lɛmmɛ ɛsɛɛnabannyi ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔssɛ ukkunu ning baang ka tɔkɔlɔ lisse ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.

Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛkaal, balɔɔt a Nineveh vvenɛ bafeele babee bakatawɔyɔng lilɔɔk ka bakkyaane bubbi abbɛ bafɔngɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bappyeenɛ Jonah ka ɔyaamnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzanga kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kule mung kwa nle nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng. Kule kuggbenge kɔtta Jonah.

Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛkaal, ubeet a wanavva wa ussinɛ kuttɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn vvenɛ ubee ɔkatawɔyɔng lilɔɔk, ka ulenɛ lɛssɛ ukkpit kufaak a vveengodde, ɔgɔpɔlɔ lukopolo kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk a Solomon. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ bulɔk bule mung bwa buttanɛ Solomon!
“Ipiliza ya ibbɔlnɛ ittanɛ ɔlɔɔt kkwɔɔt issɛ imii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛbbɔlnɛ iggyan ɛfɛɛn a kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Isinɛ ɛfɛɛn a kɛfɛkɛlɛ lɛyɛn,

ilɔɔk kɛyɔɔng annyɛ ittɛ, ‘Vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ isimisimi nmii ka ɔtɔm a ssala anaam sa ngbatanɛ.’ Ɔzzánga ippyɛlɛ, isimisimi imii ka ssala annyɛ sa igbatanɛ ikɔngɔ, imiinɛ ssala litii ppwool yyɛɛp-a-yyɛɛp ka balenɛsɛ lɛlɔngɔlɔ.

Vvenɛ imii iggyan babbɛ ipiliza bannambakkyaat ya ibbɔlnɛ gaang gaang ittamɛ ammɛ iffu igbaa illu baang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Ipiliza vvenɛ ikama-ɔkama inaang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang isak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ittemɛnɛ lɛnaang. Banaang a bubbi bɛtɔm mbyɔng kule kɔnaangbɛ ning baang.”
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ utii ka kɛlɔɔk la balɔɔt ka ɛkɛtɛ itele ammɛ la abakka baffunɛ. Baffunɛ bakɔɔng bakang ka vveeng babee baggyan battɛ balɔɔk la ammɛ.
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk ssakawɔ la itele annɔ ka babeenɛ bakang ka vveeng, baggyan battɛ batolo kutolo la annɔ tɛ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɔɔng ulenɛ ɛnɛ anaam? Babang balenɛ itele anaam?”
Ɔzzanga ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛkyɔng! Mbɔng balenɛ ɛnɛ anaam la itele anaam!
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ammɛ baang ulenɛ etele anaam la Ɛnɛ anaam.”
Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ssɔn Jesus ɔgbata ka ssala umii kukupa libbwe. Ɔtaa bakang ukopolo.
Kibbi balɔɔt kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ɔmal ka akkpaat ɔtaa baang ka tɔkɔlɔ. Kibbi ’sɔng baang kibee ka likum.
Ɔkɔɔm ifɛɛt ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ lilɔɔk ggbadam ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ufeelenɛ umii ɔkɔɔn bɛfɛɛn.
Ka ulenɛ baang ka kɛkɔɔn a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ka bɔtɔɔm, ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ɛtɔk-ɛtɔk, bunɔɔn buffu buttɔng buzzi.
Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛkpansi ya lattaal a lattaal, ka ɛfɛɛn a lisse lilenɛ ssup. Ifɔɔk ’yɔng baang imeet immala. Keem ɛkpansi ka esinɛ lɛddɔng,
iffaat imal ka lisse doddo, luwee lɔsanganɛ lutup lasan ’zɔng baang usi lɛmmɛ labbe.
Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a billeep a billeep. Imeetnɛ immala, billeep bɛwwɔɔl lasan ’zɔng baang.
Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka lisse sa doddo immala iwɔm ifɔɔk. Lasan lalɔk lawɔm lalɔp ifɔɔk kubbwɔɔk, lalɔk lalɔp lakkyaat, lalɔk lɔlɔp la ifɔɔk zzɔɔp.”
Ɔzzanga Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk!”
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akɔɔm ifɛɛt atolo kutolo la abbɛ ee?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng nnyiwɔyɔngbong kukele kwa kɛsan kɔlɔɔk-a-lalup Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga abbɛ nsibɛ linnyi.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn vvenɛ ɔyanga ɔgbaa ɔtta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggbanɛ lissi ɔyanga. Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ bulɔk lɛyanga vvenɛ bakup ezuku ya ɔyanganɛ batɔk.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nkɔɔmnɛ ifɛɛt ntolo kutolo la abbɛ, nttɛ ɔlɔk nkkpa bappyɛɛk, baala bayɛn. Nkkpa bagɔpɔlɔ, baala bappyee, ɔlɔk basankwɛ.

Ɔzzanga biyɛnɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔyɛnnɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ɔttɛnɛ, ‘Vvenɛ agɔpɔlɔ abbal lɛgɔpɔlɔ ɔzzànga baala appyee. Vvenɛ appyɛɛk abbalyɔng lɛppyɛɛk, ɔzzànga baala ayɛnyɔng.

Ka ittina balɔɔt ’bɔng mung isinɛ ya kippyee kɔlɔɔk lile, balakabong latɔɔk bavvoong zzeen. Usinɛ ning lile, nzang zzeen abbɛ vvenɛ layɛn, latɔɔk abbɛ lappyee, lɔtan abbɛ lɔsan, ɔlɔk basikili bappyɛɛknɛ nttulabɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ ning.’
“Annyɔɔng mung kɛyyɛɛp a lɔfɔm kɛttalawɔyɔngbong gaang, zzeen annyɔɔng layɛn, latɔɔk annyɔɔng lappyee.

Akke attɛyɔng bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ggbadam la balɔɔt a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔk babum gaang gaang battɛ bayɛn bwa annyɔɔng ayɛnnɛyɔng gɔɔ ba bakkwoong. Babum battɛ bappyee bwa annyɔɔng appyeenɛyɔng, basi lippyee.
“Agɔpɔlɔyɔng akkoopyɔng kwa ifɛɛt ya ɔkɔɔn a bɛfɛɛn itumnɛ.
Balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa butumnɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basi lɛsan batumbwɛ, bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya ittɔnɛ ka lufoom a ɛtɔk. Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng uffunɛ ɔffɔ baang, ɔttɔngyɛ umii.
Ifɔɔk ya illɔtnɛ ka akpana itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba batɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka laggele ka kɛggɔ kippyee.
Ɔzzànga ka luttina bɛ ba lɛmal. Ɛkɛtɛ ya kɔlɔɔk akama kuffunɛ kutum lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang bakkyaa kiyila bafɔngɔ eseese.

Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka billeep itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzanga lilɔɔk a vveengodde ’wɔng la kusapa iyyɛɛp, bɛdɛmbɛ bakkyaa kiyila abbɛ bafɔngɔ. Balɔɔt ba ning baang ba bammala.

Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basan kwa lɛlɔɔknɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bammalanɛ bawɔm lakkpo lalɔk layipi luyipi laffɔ lalɔp kubbwɔɔk, lalɔk lalɔp lakkyaat, lalɔk lɔlɔp la lakkpo zzɔɔp.”
Jesus ɔbbalnɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng lɛssa ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔmmyangnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya doddo ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
Kɛtɔm ssɔn ka ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ ka bilaa, ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk ammɛ ɔbɔɔl umii ɔkɔɔn lifaat sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp ka bɛfɛɛn bya ɔmmyangnɛ ɔgbata ufula.
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bigbengenɛ bitte kɛnaang a bizza, lifaat ’sɔng baang limmala littabyɛ.
Ubili ammɛ umii ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, ɔdɔkɔ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya doddo ka ammyangnɛ, ngkka lifaat ’sɔng sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp lissi yang?’
Ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Baang balɔɔt a kɔfɔk anaam balɔk bale banaang ning baang.’ Babili ammɛ ’bɔng baang babapmɛ battɛ, ‘Ngkka aggyan attɛ imii ilɔp lifaat ’sɔng baang ɔɔ?’
Ɔttɛ, ‘Ihii, alɔpnɛyɔng lifaat ’sɔng baang, vvenɛ alɔpyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya ikɔɔnnɛ baang ɔgbaa.

Afɔngɔyɔng lifaat la bɛfɛɛn byɔng bɛtaa baang, bɛmmala tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ liyaat. Ɔffɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ kwɔng baang. Vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a liyaat nttɛ balɔp lifaat ’sɔng baang sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp baggbɔ bisat bisat bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn. Appyɛlɛ affu abbɔkyɔng bizza bɛfɛɛn bya nmmyangnɛ assɛɛnyɔng ka ukunu.’ ”
Jesus ɔbbalbɛ ifɛɛt ilɔk lɛssa ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya ɔlɔɔt ɔsamnɛ ɔkɔɔn ka bɔtɔɔm ɔmmɛ.

Essup-lussup ɛtta ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔsamnɛyɛ ɔkɔɔn vvenɛ egbenge ɛzzanga lɛsan a kɛssɛ za lɛbaang a lɛbaang kɛtta bɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Vvenɛ kɛzzanga lɛsan a kɛssɛ za uggboggbo za bunɔɔn bule buffu bulɔɔk lakɔt ka bɛbɔɔk assɛ.”
Jesus ɔbbalbɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng lɛssa ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ yeast wa wanavva ɔsamnɛ ɔnɔk la ɔzzɔngɔ a brɛɛd, tɔttɔt ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’wɔng baang utum uggboggbo ning.”
Jesus ɔkɔɔm ifɛɛt, ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɔlɔɔk gbɔɔ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ usi ifɛɛt lɛkɔɔm kusi lile.

Ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nkɔɔm ifɛɛt ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk la abbɛ, vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔbɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔlɔɔt ɔtakanɛ lɛsan ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ussinɛ ɔlɔɔm vveengodde.”
Jesus ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon. Balɔɔt a Kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔtaanɛ battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ bwa ifɛɛt ya lifaat ka bɔtɔɔm itumnɛ.”
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔnnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya iyyɛɛpnɛ, ammɛ ule Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Bɔtɔɔm ulenɛ vveeng ’wɔng, ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ulenɛ balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Lifaat ulenɛ balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng.
Ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk wa ɔkɔɔnnɛ lifaat ’sɔng baang ulenɛ Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng biini. Kɛyaat a liyaat kilenɛ lakpeke a vveengodde. Bayaat a liyaat balenɛ bayila-bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔpnɛ lifaat babbi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, battɔng lɔkɔɔn bassɛɛnsɛ likkɔm kule kule ning baang ka lakpeke a vveengodde.

Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ bamii ballak balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba banaangnɛ balɔɔt banaang bubbi, la balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ba banaangnɛ lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ baffu babbi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
Vvenɛ basam balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛ gaang gaang bataa bakang bakkwa, bazzi lasaal.
Balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ bayanga buppwolo bwa bussinɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ buppwolo bwa livve-luwee. Gɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk!

“Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyyɛɛp ya balupnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyɛnnɛyɛ, ɔsamyɛ ɔbbal lilup, uggele gaang gaang ufeele umii ɔtaan bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ ɔppyɛlɛ umii ɔlɛɛp bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang.
“Ɔgbaa Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛ-kappya wa ɔggyannɛ ifɔɔk akpana ya iyyɛɛpnɛ.
Ɔyɛnnɛ ɛfɔɔk akpana ya ɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ufeele umii ɔtaan bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔlɛɛp ɛfɔɔk akpana yɔng baang.
“Ɔgbaa Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kuggbɔ kwa batɔɔpnɛ ka bannyi bakaa bɛssanga isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Isɛɛnabannyi ilenɛ liyipi, bayini kuggbɔ bamii battulu kuggbɔ baffu ka likum. Bataa-ɔtaa bassang isɛɛn ya iyyɛɛpnɛ bassɛɛn ka isangala; ya isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp batɔɔp kang.
Kule kule ning baang la annyɔɔng ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke a vveengodde. Bayila-bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ batta ka vveeng bamii bassang balɔɔt ba bbɔl-bbɔl basseke balɔɔt ba bayyɛɛpnɛ.
Vvenɛ bayila-bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basam balɔɔt ba babbɔlnɛ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛ gaang gaang bataa bakang bakkwa bazzi lasaal.”
Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng asanyɔng mung bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔɔ?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Iii.”

Ɔzzanga ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛ́ttɛ́ ukopolo-Lafɔɔ duu wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ ssala, ɔsanga bafaa la batɔm a bɛfɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk a ggwoon ammɛ ɔtta.”
Jesus uvvenɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung lɛssa, ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
Ufeele ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii lɛffɛ ammɛ. Ukopolo ka idda mitin abbɛ. Balɔɔt ba bappyeemɛnɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ. Battɛ, “Lakke ’zɔng ɔyanga ka yang ee?” Babbal lɛttɛ, “Ngkka kɛnaang-imaanga ammɛ ngbaa bɛɛ?
Mung ammɛ lissi ulenɛ waan a kapenta ɔɔ? Mary lissi ulenɛ abakka ɔɔ? James, Joseph, Simon la Judas lissi balenɛ itele ammɛ ɔɔ?
Itele ammɛ ya bwanavva lissi ballunɛ mung ɔɔ? Ngkka ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bissimɛ yang?”
Ɔzzánga bafimmɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batelemɛ ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ usseke ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ la itutum ammɛ.”
Usi bɛmaanga ggbadam baang lɛnaang ka basɛlɛnɛ kiyila.
Ɔdɔkɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak ya Herod, uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi a Galilee, uppyeenɛ kuttu a Jesus.
Ɔbwɔɔlɔ ikkala ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Baang ka lɔkkwɔɔn John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ufungalabong ka lubbe kwakkwɛ lakke lalenɛ baang ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ: ukkwoong ɔnaang kɛnaang ’sɔng mung tɛ.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng bakang, John ɔbwɔɔlɔ Herod ɔttɛ, “Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka atɔknɛ Herodias, wanavva etele annɔ Philip tɛ.” Ɔzzánga Herod uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔkaa John ɔggbɔ izzi ɔsammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ.
Herod ɔnaang luttina gwa kɛwwɔɔlmɛ, usi lɛbbɔ, ɔmma balɔɔt a Jews ka batɔknɛ John tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Uffu ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm ekokomele Herod, waanawanavva wa Herodias ɔmaatnɛ ufeele ɔtɔm ka lusso kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔwaa Herod gaang gaang.
Ɔssɛɛn nsekele ɔttɛ, “Nyimbong nttɛ vvenɛ nnyiwɔ bɔfɛɛn duu bwa aggyannɛ.”
Waantiti ɔbapnɛ abakka, Herodias, Herodias ɔttɛ ɔffaam lɛttɔ a John. Ɔzzánga waantiti ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Assɛɛnnɛ lɛttɔ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ka kɛkkpala ’sɔng mung.”
Ubeet livve lɛbbɔlmɛ, keem ka ulenɛ nsekele lɛffɔ ɔssɛɛn ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, usi lɛbbɔ ufim. Ɔttɛ bwa waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔggyannɛ vvenɛ unnyimɛ.
Ɔzzanga Herod ɔlɔɔkbɛ bazza lɛttɔ a John ka tɔkɔlɔ a igbakkɔpɔ,
bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ kɛkkpala, bafee waanawanavva ’wɔng baang. Ammɛ ɔsam ufee abakka.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a John baffu basam kakkwu ammɛ bamii balli. Bafeele bamii babwɔɔlɔ Jesus.
Jesus uppyeenɛ kuttu lubbe a John, ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang la akkpaat umii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ulenɛ kɛyɔɔng. Balɔɔt bappyeenɛ ning baang bagbata ka laffɛ abbɛ bamii bakupmɛ.
Jesus ɔtta ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat ka ɔyɛnnɛ kibbi balɔɔt ggbadam. Babbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang, uttula balɔɔt iffaak.
Kulele ’kwɔng baang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu balɔɔkmɛ batte, “Mung usulbong, ɔlɔɔt mung ba ule ka ullunɛ. Abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala balɛɛp kazzi kɛyɔɔng bazzi.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bagbata, annyɔɔng annyiyɔngbɛ kazzi, bazzi.”
Bappyɛlɛ Jesus kamma battɛ, “Bwa iyanganɛ mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ule igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛnabannyi iffa keem tɛ.”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Asamyɔngbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ afeenɛyɔng kaang.”

Ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ bataa-ɔtaa ka lifaat. Balenɛ lɛtaa, ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛnabannyi iffa uyeek, ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Ɔsamyɛ ɔbbɔk, unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ. Basam, babɛngɛlɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt uzzi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kaddumɛnɛ. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɔng isangala kazzi zzɔɔppiffa ya issekenɛ.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang badɔkɔ innɔ zzɔɔppiffa la lalɔp zzɔɔp. Bwanavva la bwɔɔntiti ka lukkwoon ba bale.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ bamal ka akkpaat bawaat bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bassɛ bamii kukupa libbwe za zzɔn. Ammɛ ɔkɔɔm ubee ɔbwɔɔlɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ bakkyaap.
Ulenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang lɛbwɔɔlɔ bagbata, ufeele umii ka libat ekpok kɛyɔɔng ammɛ ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm. Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, usseke kɛyɔɔng.
Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang akkpaat utii fulufulu ka tɔkɔlɔ libbwe ɔkɔɔm uggbuku ka kɛffa kilenɛ baang ka kɛffanɛ.
Bɛzzɔkɔ ikalangka ikkyaat la ikalangka bwɔlanning ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus ɔssɛnɛ ka ɛkkpa bannyi, umii ukupbɛ lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bayɛnmɛnɛ ka ɔssɛnɛ ka ɛkkpa-bannyi, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang battɛ, “Baang ubbu-kɔwɔkɔlɔ tɛ.” Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ baffula.
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kkaamyɔng luppyam! Anaam tɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng.”
Peter ufeele ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ulewɔnɛ annɔ ka lɔkkwɔɔn anaangnɛ ntta ka akkpaat nssɛ ka bannyi nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Affu.” Ɔzzánga Peter ɔtta ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat, ɔssɛ ka ɛkkpa-bannyi umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
Uppyeenɛ kɛffa, ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ. Ɔbbwɔpɔmɛnɛ upiti ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi. Ɔkkwa ɔttɛ, “Uyini akkalanɛ.”
Eseese Jesus umii ɔffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔlɔmmɛ, ɔttɛ, “Bɔng waan a kiyila ussupwɔnɛ ning! Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayanga ndeeta ka luppyam?”
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat. Kɛffa kizum eseese.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat bazɔɔm battɛ, “Isanbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn ittɛ annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Bakum libbwe ’zɔng baang baffu ka ɛkpansi Gennesaret,
ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakɔɔlɔnɛ Jesus. Ɔzzánga batɔɔm ka balɔɔt iffaak ba ballunɛ bakkpit ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
Bakkpengemɛ battɛ ɔfɔngɔ balɔɔt iffaak basingi ligook ewuulu ammɛ. Ɔzzanga balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basinginɛzɛ ɔppwabɛ.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bassi Jerusalem baffu babap Jesus battɛ,
“Mbɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ basinɛ kwa lukopolo balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-yɛddɛ liyila? Ibɔɔk ba bayila tɛ́ttɛ́ bazzi kazzi!”
Jesus oppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ asiyɔng Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele, appyɛɛ allɛwɔyɔng kikup kwa lukopolo annyɔɔng biini?
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ, ‘Atele ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ! Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bubbi utum abassɛ ɔlɔk abakka, vvenɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ.’
Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng akopolonɛ attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa bukɔɔmnɛ ɔyaam abakka ɔlɔk abassɛ, ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ ‘Bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm’, ule bbwak ka ufimnɛ abakka la abassɛ litele.
Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ afimnɛyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; akupyɔng lukopolo annyɔɔng biini.
Annyɔɔng banaang-a-lagban ’bɔng! Isaiah ɔdɔkɔ bbwak ka biyɛnɛ pya ɔyɛnnɛ utumwɔyɔng! ɔttɛ,
‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung batelenɛ ka bɛkkpa-kamma keem, ippyam abbɛ ile fulufulu issekenɛ.
Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka bassɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm bannyinɛ ka bakopolonɛ lafɔɔ za balɔɔt banaangnɛ lataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!’ ”
Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang kiffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔ appyeeyɔng!
Bɔfɛɛn bwa bumiinɛ ɔlɔɔt ka kamma lissi bunaangmɛnɛ ɔbbɔl, bwa buttanɛ ka akkwɛ bunaangmɛnɛ ɔbbɔl.”
Nkwɔng baang kɔsaalnɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bassinɛ bakang baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ battɛ, “Asan mung attɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa alɔɔknɛ baang kutunbong balɔɔt a Pharisees ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɛssɛ duu sa usinɛ Dedde anaam lile ɔkɔɔnnɛ, vvenɛ balɔpsɛ bazzɔɔk.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attinayɔng kwa abbɛ, baang bassi-ifim a bazzi-lɛttɔ. Ussi-ifim ɔkɔɔmnɛ wabbɛ ussi-ifim ɛtɔk, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ vvenɛ battɔ ka lubbe.”
Peter ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ bwa ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung itumnɛ.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk ba ataka asan asakyɔng balɔɔt balɔk.
Ba asanyɔng ɔɔ? Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ɔlɔɔt uzzinɛ bumiimɛ ka kifulu tɛ́ttɛ́ buttamɛ ka kkwɔɔt.
Ɔzzanga bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ ka kamma bussimɛ ka luppyam. Lilɔɔk sa ning baang linaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔbbɔl.
Ubbu luttina ɔnaangmɛnɛ ka luppyam ɔdɔmmɛ ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt, ukup bwanavva balɔɔt, ɔssɛ-kɛzak, uyip, ɔnnaa bɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ka lakke, ɔkkala-lɛlaak, ɔbwɔɔlɔ-ibwɔɔlɔ ya ibbɔlnɛ utum balɔɔt balɔk.
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔbbɔl. Kizzi kazzi asi ibɔɔk liyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔɔknɛ lissi kɛnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔbbɔl.”
Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, umii ka ɛkpansi a Tyre la Sidon.
Wanavva wa ussinɛ Canaan ule baang ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ka ullunɛ, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ɔttɛ, “Waan-a-David Dedde! Mbbewɔ lɛttɔ, Waan wa wanavva ɔyanga ipiliza ya ibbɔlnɛ lɔbbɔl.”
Ɔzzànga Jesus lɛmmwɔɔl usimɛ lɛzza. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ bakkpengemɛ battɛ, “Aggbamɛ umii ussekeyɛlɛ! Ule baang ka ukupnɛyɛlɛ la lɔsap la lɔsap!”
Tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔtɔɔmnɛ kwa balɔɔt a Israel ba balenɛ lɛtaak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn.”
Wanavva ’wɔng mung uppyeenɛ ning baang uffu ɔttɔ Jesus ka lataak ɔttɛ, “Dedde attelenɛ!”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bbwak ba kule ka itɔknɛ kazzi kwa bwɔɔntiti, illɔt ibbwa, izzi.”
Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛ Jesus kamma ɔttɛ, “Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn Dedde; Gbaak la ibbwa ittɔng mung bwa kuzzi bwa bussinɛ ka okkpokolo ibassɛ annyɛ, buttɔ ka lisse, izzi.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ wanavva wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila sa lɛbaang! Bwa aggyannɛ vvenɛ nnyiwɔ.” Eseese waan ammɛ ɔppwamɛ.
Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang umii ka lufoom a libbwe Galilee. Umii ɔtaa ka libat ekpok.

Bɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam biffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, bakɔɔm bannɔk-a-kikkwu, la bassi-ifim, la babbe-labɔɔk, la basi-kɛlɔɔk-likkwoong, la balɔɔt iffaak balɔk ggbadam baffu bawulu Jesus ka lataak. Jesus uttulabɛ ɔppwabɛ.
Balɔɔt kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka bayɛnnɛ usi-kɛlɔɔk-likkwoong ka ukkwoongnɛ ɔlɔɔk kɛlɔɔk. Babbe-labɔɔk la bannɔk-a-kikkwu bakkwoong bassɛ, bassi-ifim bayɛn. Ɔzzánga babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Israel.

Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung babbenɛbong lɛttɔ gaang, bataabong la anaam mung ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, ɔzzànga mung bulɔk ba bataka bazzi. Ba nggyan nttɛ bafula ka batakanɛ kazzi lizzi, tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔk baffu babbe buwɔɔng ka ɛtɔk.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Kazzi ile iyɛn ka yang kaddu balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ kizzi ka kasɛkɛ atingating ’kwɔng?”
Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ilewɔyɔng ifang?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Iyanga igɔngɔ a brɛɛd innamikkyaat la isɛɛnabannyi ssup mung tɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ bataa-ɔtaa ka lisse.
Ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang innamikkyaat la isɛɛnabannyi uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔsam ɔbbɔk unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ. Abbɛ basam batan balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bazzi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kaddunɛbɛ. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɔng izuku ya issekenɛ bassɛɛn, isangala innamikkyaat iyipi.
Balɔɔt ba bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang badɔkɔ innɔ zzɔɔp. Bwanavva la bwɔɔntiti ka lukkwoon ba bale.
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bafula. Ammɛ ɔmal ka akkpaat umii ka ɛkpansi a Magadan.

Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk, la balɔɔt a Sadducees baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus, battɛ bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzanga babapmɛ battɛ ɔnaang bɛmaanga, ɔyɔɔbɛ, basan battɛ baang ɔnaang kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Livve lile ka lipitinɛ, attɛyɔng, ‘Kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn vvenɛ kile sa ssayii,’ ka ayɛnnɛyɔng libat ka likootnɛ.

Ɔffɔnɛ lɔfɔmalɔfɔm, attɛyɔng, ‘Ule ka uteepnɛ ka iyɛnnɛyɔng libat ka lisulnɛ.’ Akkwoong mung abwɔɔlɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn kile kile ka appyɛɛknɛyɔng ka libat. Ɔzzànga ba akkwoong abwɔɔlɔyɔng linaang sa litumnɛ ɛkɛtɛ yɔng!
Balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm mbyɔng, abbyapyɔngbong, asiyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan! Abapnɛ attɛyɔng nyɔɔwɔyɔng bɛmaanga ɔɔ? Maaye! Bɛmaanga bya nle nyɔɔwɔyɔng ule bya Jonah kɛyɔɔng.” Ɔzzánga ɔgbata umii ussekebɛ.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bakupmɛ bamii kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn, basumala brɛɛd kɛsam kɛkɔɔm kimii.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛkyɔng! akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng yeast a balɔɔt a Pharisees la balɔɔt a Sadducees tɛ.”
Batte kɛlɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔk ka isinɛ brɛɛd lɛkɔɔm.”
Jesus ɔggba lɛsan bwa balɔɔknɛ abbɛ abbɛ: Ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ alɔɔkyɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng atumyɔng kisi kazzi lɛkɔɔm? Kiyila kissupwɔyɔngbong kɛsak!

Ba ataka asanyɔng ɔɔ? Ba akkeyɔng ka nsamnɛ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk, nbbɔk, nnyi innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔppiffa la lalɔp zzɔɔp bazzi ɔɔ? Isangala idɔkɔ ifang ka attɔngnɛyɔng izuku ya issekenɛ assɛɛnyɔng iyipi?
Ɔzzánga kwa igɔngɔ ya innamikkyaat ya nnyinɛ innɔ zzɔɔp bazzi bɛɛ? Isangala ifang ka attɔngnɛyɔng iyipi?
Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ asiyɔng lɛsan attɛyɔng kwa brɛɛd lissi ka nlɔɔknɛ ntum? Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng yeast a balɔɔt a Pharisees la balɔɔt a Sadducees.”
Ɔzzànga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baggɔgɔ basan battɛ ba ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ kwa yeast wa ɔnaangnɛ brɛɛd utum. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ bakatbɛ kɛyɔɔng basseke lukopolo balɔɔt a Pharisees la balɔɔt a Sadducees.
Jesus ufeele umii ka ɛkpansi ya ɛkkɛtɛnɛ lɛffɛ a Ceasarea Philippi. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang ɔbap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung balɔɔt battina battɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ nnyinɔɔng?”
Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ ammɛ ulenɛ John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim. Balɔk battɛ Elijah. Balɔk battɛ Jeremiah ɔlɔk uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk.”
Ɔbapbɛ abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ngkka annyɔɔng bɛɛ? Attina attɛyɔng anaam nlenɛ nnyinɔɔng?”
Simon Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm-a-kuddu.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Simon, waan a John, aggele gaang gaang. Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ’gwɔng mung ka ɔssɛbibbit ba lussi luffu ka annɔ, Dedde anaam ka libat unnyiwɔnɛgwɛ.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ tɛ! Peter, annɔ alenɛ akpana. Vvenɛ nbɔɔk Ggwoon-a-Luzɔɔm anaam ka libat a akpana ’wɔng baang. Lubbe baala lukkwoong lɔbɛpɛ Ggwoon-a-Luzɔɔm anaam.
Vvenɛ nnyiwɔ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ lɛmma ggwoon a Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bwa bulenɛ bwa lafɔɔ ka ɛkpansi bussɛ bule bwa lafɔɔ ka libat. Bwa akkyaanɛ afɔngɔ ka ɛkpansi, vvenɛ nssɛ nkkyaabwɛ nfɔngɔ ka libat.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk attɛyɔng anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ tɛ.”

Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Jesus ɔlɔɔk ppwool ppwool ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nmii Jerusalem, nyɛn akama wa lɛbaang ka labɔɔk a bagɛlɛnya la bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ. Vvenɛ basamnɛ bamii bawwɔɔl, ɔzzanga ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat vvenɛ nfungala ka lubbe.”
Peter ɔkkwɔɔmɛ uloko kufɛngɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini anaam, Laggbo-laggbo, tɛ̀ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔ ning baang. Nkwɔng annɔ wɔ baala kɔnaang tɛ.”
Jesus usikili ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Agbata mung assekenɛ annɔ Satan ’wɔng! Ale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa bubeenɛ buzzanɛ ɛtɔk buttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ nsak. Luttina annɔ, luttina balɔɔt; gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ule ka uffunɛ ukupnɛ, usumalamɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔsam cross anaam ukupnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkala kuddu ammɛ biini, vvenɛ ɔtakakwɛ. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ kuddu ammɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam, vvenɛ ɔyangakwɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔyanga lutini bɔfɛɛn la duu ka vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔtaka lɛfal ammɛ isak ilemɛ ka ’bɔng? Ning baang ba kule; bɔfɛɛn bulɔk bwa ule ukkwoong ɔsam ussila lɛttɔ kuddu ammɛ ba bule.
Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka uffunɛ la latele Abassɛ la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Uffunɛ, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔt duu bwa ɔnaangnɛ.
Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ, balɔɔt balɔk bale mung ba basi libbe tɔttɔt bayɛn Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ule uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubeet.”
Bɛtɔm bwɔlaaning bɛsaknɛ, Jesus ɔsam Peter la James la John, etele a James, bamii ka libat a lɛttaal za ggologgolo bataa bakang kɛyɔɔng.
Bale baang ka bappyɛɛknɛ, Jesus ufoolo kɛssanga kɛlɔk: Lusso luppwolomɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ livve-luwee, iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ilaat inyanya.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba bakkyaat ’bɔng baang bayɛn Moses la Elijah ka kutolo la Jesus.
Ɔzzánga Peter ufeele ubee-ubee ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uyini, kɔyyɛɛp gaang ka ilenɛ mung; kɔsaapwɔnɛ, vvenɛ nnaang idda ikkyaat, vvɔn wa annɔ, vvɔn wa Moses, vvɔn wa Elijah.”
Utii baang ka kɛlɔɔk, ikkpálá ya illaatnɛ inyanya iffu ivvoongbɛ kuyeeng, lɛmmwɔɔl lɛtta ka tɔkɔlɔ ikkpálá ’yɔng lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Waan a luppyam anaam wa ɔsaapnɛnɛ gaang; agɔpɔlɔmɛyɔng.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang, ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, bakun laddu balli isso ka lisse.
Jesus uffu ka ɛfɛɛn abbɛ usingibɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeeleyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng.”
Ɔzzánga bayeek bappyɛɛk ka libat; ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn ɔgbaa la Jesus.
Ka balenɛ baang ka kisini lɛttaal, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk atumyɔng biyɛnɛ pya ayɛnnɛyɔng tɔttɔt Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ufungala ka lubbe tɛ.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔɔk battɛ Elijah ule utte liffu?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Elijah uttenɛ liffu ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔbama bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko.
Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Elijah ɔggba liffu ɔzzànga balɔɔt mɛ ba bakɔɔlɔ. Bakɔɔmmɛ gbɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ. Bale bassɛ bakɔɔm Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ.”
Balɔɔt a Kɔssɛ ammɛ basan battɛ ɔlɔɔk utum John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim.
Bappyɛlɛnɛ bamii ka kibbi ’sɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn uffu ukun Jesus laddu.
Ɔttɛ, “Uyini, waan anaam ubbewɔ lɛttɔ! Ɔyanga lɔbbaak, ɔssɔpmɛ gaang gaang, ɔtaa ɔttɔ ka lɔkɔɔn, ɛkɛtɛ elɔk ɔttɔ ka bannyi.
Nkɔɔmmɛbong nffu ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ, ɔzzanga basi likkwoong battulamɛ.”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔng annyɔɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng asɛlɛnɛyɔng kiyila, anaangyɔng ubbu kɔlɔɔk ning! Nle ntaa ɔmmɛ ɔffɔ nang la annyɔɔng? Nle nlɔɔk nang la annyɔɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ appyeeyɔng? Akɔɔm waan ’wɔng baang affu mung.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ipiliza, itta, isseke waanawalam ’wɔng baang, ɔppwamɛ lɔbbaak eseese.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffu babapmɛ ka wɛɛk battɛ, “Mung ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayyɔɔt isi lɔbbaak likkwoong ittula ee?”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kussi ka asinɛyɔng kiyila doddo lɛyanga. Akke attɛyɔng bulenɛ ka ayanganɛyɔng kiyila kɛffɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛfɔɔk-ɛsasa, nzang akkwoong mung alɔɔkyɔng la ekpok ’yɔng mung attɛyɔng, ‘Gbata mung, amii kang’ vvenɛ emii, nzang vvenɛ akkwoong anaangyɔng bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ!
[Ule kɛtaa-buwɔɔng la kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm kɛyɔɔng ka kikkwoongnɛ kɛggba kɛssanga bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, bulɔk ba bule.]”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffunɛ baggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka Galilee, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bale ka basamnɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi balɔɔt
ba bale bawwɔɔlmɛ, ɔzzanga ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ɔtaa ka kuddu.” Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ bappyeenɛ ning baang, bukee bunaangbɛ gaang gaang.
