Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffunɛ ka Capernaum, batɔk-innamba Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter babapmɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-ukopolo annyɔɔng unnyi mung innamba Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ?”

Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii.” Peter umiinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon, Jesus ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ “Simon, annɔ attina nang? Nyinɔɔng ɔkkpɛɛnɛ innamba ka eddu babeet ɛkpansi ’yɔng? Bayini ɛkpansi faa bakekeen?”
Peter ɔttɛ, “Bakekeen bakkpɛɛnɛ.” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔyyɛɛpɔyyɛɛp! ning ulenɛ kɛttɛ bayini ɛkpansi innamba ba bakkpɛɛ.

Ayyɔɔt ba iggyan ittɛ inaang kwa kutunnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung. Amii assɛɛn ɔbaana ka libbwe. Appyɛɛk ɛsɛɛnabannyi ya ikeeng ya ale akaa ka kamma. Vvenɛ ayɛn sili wa ɔggbanɛ ka kikkpele innamba Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam la annɔ. Asam sili ’wɔng baang amii akkpɛɛ inamba ayyɔɔt.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Mung nnyinɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?”
Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ waantiti, ɔsammɛ, ubee ka lusso abbɛ ɔttɛ,
“Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Asinɛyɔng lafal annyɔɔng lifoolo assekeyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti, ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala amalyɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ busook a wabbɛ, usseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti ’wɔng mung.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa uwomonɛ waantiti ’wɔng ka lɛkɔɔl anaam, nzang uwomonɛ anaam.
“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bwɔɔntiti basi kunaam liyila, kɔyyɛɛp ka asamnɛ kizzi, asiki ka kukook kwa lɛbaang, asikimɛ ka lukat asammɛ assɛɛn ka lihu.

Vvveeng ’wɔng vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama ka bɛfɛɛn ppwap bilenɛ baang bya bɛnaangnɛ balɔɔt basɛlɛ kiyila. Kɛssanga bɛfɛɛn byɔng baang bile bɛnaang kpɛtkpɛt. Ɔzzànga akama ule wa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔggyannɛ lilɔɔk nsɔng baang!

“Ulenɛ kɔbɔɔk annɔ ɔlɔk kikkpɔ annɔ kɛnaangwɔnɛ azzɔɔk lilɔɔk ’sɔng azzasɛ azzɔɔk. Kɔtta kɛyyɛɛp ka asɛlɛnɛ kɔbɔɔk la kikkpɔ ataa ka kuddu, lutini ayanganɛ kɔbɔɔk la kikkpɔ basamwɔ bamii bassɛɛn ka akama wa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Ulenɛ zzeen annɔ lɛnaangwɔnɛ anaang bubbi; kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka akpakalanɛzɛ azzɔɔk ayanga kuddu, lutini ayanganɛ zzeen laffa basamwɔ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn ka Hell.”
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ alokoyɔng kɔlɔɔk la bwɔɔntiti ba sɛkɛsɛkɛ. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ bayila-bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ ka libat bataa ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde anaam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
[Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu ɔkkala balɔɔt ba bataaknɛ.]
“Attinayɔng nang? Ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ lalɔp itɔɔn kubbwɔɔk, nnyɔn ɛfakala ɛtaakmɛ, ule ɔnaang nang? Vvenɛ ɔgbata lalɔp itɔɔn za lanna la itɔɔn ɔsɛlɔlɔp ɔkɔngɔ umii ɔggyan ya ɛtaaknɛ.
Ɔyɛnnɛyɛ, vvenɛ uggele gaang gaang, ka ɛtɔɔn ya ɛtaaknɛ ɛttanɛ lalɔp itɔɔn za lanna la itɔɔn ɔsɛlɔlɔp ya isinɛ lɛtaak.
Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat ngbaa ba ɔssɛ ɔggyan ɔttɛ waantiti vvɔn gbɔɔ ɔtaak.

“Ɔkpana annɔ ɔnaangnɛ bubbi utumwɔ, amii abwɔɔlɔmɛ bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ utumwɔ. Ɔzzànga akupmɛ ka wɛɛk atoloyɔng kutolo ’kwɔng baang annyɔɔng balɔɔt baffa kɛyɔɔng. Ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ kwa alɔɔknɛ nzang uyilabong kwa annɔ. Akkwɔɔmɛ assɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt.
Ɔzzànga usinɛ kwa alɔɔknɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ, akɔɔm ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔk balɔɔt baffa amii akupmɛ nkwaaning itɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang iffa ilɔɔknɛ, balɔɔt basan battɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Usinɛ kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang lɛgɔpɔlɔ asam kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang amii abwɔɔlɔ ka luzɔɔm. Usinɛ kwa lɛbbal lɛgɔpɔlɔ, anaangmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt a lɔkaan lɔlɔk, ɔlɔk ɔtɔk-innamba.
“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ; Kɔlɔɔk duu kwa kulenɛ kwa lafɔɔ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng, kɔssɛ kule kwa lafɔɔ ka libat. Kwa kusinɛ kwa lafɔɔ lile ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung kwa lafɔɔ ba kɔssɛ kule ka libat.
“Nbbalwɔyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ, ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya annyɔɔng balɔɔt baffa alokonɛyɔng luttina ka bɔfɛɛn bwa azɔɔmnɛ aggyanyɔng, vvenɛ Dedde anaam ka libat ɔnaangbwɛ unnyiwɔyɔng.
Ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt baffa, bakkyaat bataanɛ ka lɛkɔɔl anaam, anaam nssɛ nle baang la abbɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Peter uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini, mung ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ bubbi utumnɛ nle nsɔɔkmɛ bikkpit bɛfang? Bikkpit bɛnnambɛkkyaat ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Maaye, bikkpit bɛnnambɛkkyaat lissi, ale asɔɔkmɛ nnɔ la lalɔp lanna la bikkpit zzɔɔp (70x7).
Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubeet wa uttinanɛ kiffik a ikkpoko ya ilenɛ ka labɔɔk a babili ammɛ.
Utii ka lutte luffik annyɛ gbɔɔ, bakɔɔm ubili ammɛ vvɔn wa ulemɛnɛ la ippwoot a innɔ innɔ Naira baffu.

Ubili ’wɔng baang ikkpoko usi lɛyanga ya ule ɔtaknɛ ippwoot. Ɔzzánga abassɛ ammɛ ɔddabɛ ɔttɛ bakaamɛ la wanavva ammɛ la bwaan ammɛ bamii bataan. Bataan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ nkwaaning ikkpoko iffɔ ka ippwoot ’yɔng baang.
Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ukun laddu ka lusso abassɛ, ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Abbe luppyam vvenɛ ntak ippwoot annɔ la bwɔn la bwɔn.’
Ɔzzánga bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ubbe abassɛ lɛttɔ, ɔtɔk ippwoot ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsɔɔkmɛ, ɔkkyaa mɛ ɔfɔngɔ umii.
“Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbata umii gbak la wabbɛ bɔɔyi wa ɔssɛnɛ ulemɛ ammɛ la bwaan ippwoot; ɔggbɔmɛ, uggbe ɔttɛ, ‘Ataknɛ bɛfɛɛn anaam bya alenɛnɛ la ippwoot.’
Wabbɛ a bɔɔyi ’wɔng ɔttɔ ka lisse, ukunmɛ laddu, ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Abbe luppyam vvenɛ ntakwɔ ippwoot annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.’
Ufim, ɔkaamɛ umii ɔssɛɛn ngbakkɔpɔ ɔttɛ ɔtaa bakang, ɔyɛn akama tɔttɔt ɔtak ippwoot ammɛ.
Babbɛ ibɔɔyi bayɛnnɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔssɔpbɛ gaang gaang, bafeele bamii ka ɛfɛɛn abassɛ abbɛ, babwɔɔlɔmɛ.
Ɔzzánga abassɛ abbɛ ɔkkwɔɔ bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon, ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ ubili wa asinɛ wa kɔlɔɔk lile ffet, nsɔɔkwɔ ikkpoko ’yɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ya alenɛnɛ la ippwoot, ka akkpengenɛnɛ.
Tɛ nzang wa annyɔɔng ubili ɔssɛ ubbewɔ lɛttɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ abbenɛnɛ anaam lɛttɔ.’
Abassɛ abbɛ ’wɔng baang kɔssɔpmɛ gaang gaang, ɔkaa bɔɔyi ammɛ ’wɔng baang ɔssɛɛn ngbakkɔpɔ ɔttɛ ɔtaa bakang, ɔyɛn akama tɔttɔt ɔtak ippwoot ammɛ isaal ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Dedde anaam ka libat ule ɔyapwɔyɔng akama ning baang kusiwɔnɛyɔng ka luppyam lissi asɔɔkyɔng Wannyɔɔng bubbi.”
Jesus ulenɛ bɛfɛɛn byɔng livve lɛlɔɔk, ɔgbata ka ɛkpansi a Galilee ɔssɛ ka lufoom a lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan gwa ggwɔn umii Judea.
Bɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam bikupmɛ, uttulabɛ bakang.

Balɔɔt a Pharisees bakɔɔm ibap, baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus nkwaaning bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Babapmɛ battɛ, “Mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt layila mung ɔlɔɔt ɔggba wanavva ammɛ ka ɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kusimɛnɛ lɛsaap ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ka ussinɛ ka lutte, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbɛ wanavva la waanwalam.
Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Waanwalam vvenɛ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ abassɛ la abakka, umii ullu ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la wanavva ammɛ. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baffa basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn.’
Balɔɔt baffa ba babɛlɛ lile, basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn. Ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ́ ubbum bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsam utoolo ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.”
Balɔɔt a Pharisees babapmɛ battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Moses unnyi lafɔɔ za kɛttɛ waanwalam ule ka ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ, ɔkkpɔk luvva-luteele unnyi avva tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔggbamɛ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Moses unnyiwɔyɔng lakke za kɛggba wanavva ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba akoolonɛyɔng kikopolo kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzànga ning baang kusi lile ka ussinɛ ka lutte a vveeng.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ ka ɔtakanɛ la ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk limini, ɔtɔknɛ wanavva ɔlɔk, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔnaangbong bubbi.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Killu a wanavva la waanwalam kilenɛ ning kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp kɛtaa buyya.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Lukopolo ’gwɔng mung gwa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi, lule gwa balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ gwɛ linnyi.

Itɔk ile buu buu ya balɔɔt basinɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk. Balɔɔt balɔk ɔlɔɔmbɛ ning baang; balɔk babbɛ balɔɔt basanganɛbɛ idakɔp, balɔk bafim kɛtɔk a wanavva kwa Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔtɔk lukopolo ’gwɔng.”
Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm bwɔɔntiti bafee Jesus, battɛ utelebɛ labɔɔk ammɛ, ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm unnyibɛ, ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baggba balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng bwɔɔntiti baffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ atunuyɔngbɛ. Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya kɛssanga balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ’sɔng mung.”
Jesus utelebɛ labɔɔk, ɔgbata.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɛdɔkɔ baang ya ɔlɔɔt uffunɛ ka Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung nle nnaang bɔka budoddo tɛ́tt’t vvenɛ ntɔk kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abapnɛ lɔbap atum kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ? Ule Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn kɛyɔɔng ka ɔyyɛɛpnɛ. Aloko lafɔɔ, aggyannɛ attɛ amal ka kuddu.”
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Lafɔɔ ’zɔzɔng?” Jesus Ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt; Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip; Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkala lɛlaak.
Atele ssakawɔ la ssaawɔ; Balɔɔt basaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
Okolobya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nlokobong lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, mung nbbal bɔka abbwɛ lɛnaang?”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Aggyannɛ attɛ anaang affata, amii ataan bɛfɛɛn bya ayanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, asam ikkpoko annyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Vvenɛ ayanga kibeet ka libat. Avvenɛ ning baang lɛnaang, affu akupnɛ.”
Okolobya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔgbata la kɛbbɔl a livve ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt iyyɛɛp.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, kukoolo lukoolo kɔsak tɛ́ttɛ́ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ufula ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Nbbalwɔyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ nttɛ vvenɛ kukoolo uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt kifula ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtta ɔgɔdɔ kɛmal ka lɛmma-ɔnnya.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bappyeenɛ ning baang, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang battɛ, “Nnyinɛ ule ukkwoong ɔsɛɛm ka ɛkɛtɛ yɔng baang?”
Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛkbɛ zzip ka isso ɔttɛ, “Nkwɔng mung kukoolo balɔɔt lukoolo, ɔzzànga ka labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kule kkpɛkɛlɛm.”
Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk igbatabong bɛfɛɛn ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ikɔngɔ, iffu ikupwɔ, mung ile ibbal ’bɔng lɛyanga?”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ɛkɛtɛ ya Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔtaa ka ugbaal-a-kibeet ammɛ ka ufaa kɛkkpa, annyɔɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng ba zzɔɔppabaffa mung ba akupnɛnɛyɔng anaam, vvenɛ assɛ ataayɔng ka igbaal-a-kibeet akaalyɔng kɛkaal ifɔɔn a Israel ya zzɔɔppiffa.

Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa ɔgbatanɛ ssoon ammɛ ɔkɔngɔ, ɔlɔk etele ammɛ, ɔlɔk abassɛ, ɔlɔk abakka, ɔlɔk bwɔɔntiti ɔlɔk bɔtɔɔm ammɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam, vvenɛ ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bikkpit lalɔp kubbwɔɔk ɔgbaa. Vvenɛ ɔbbal kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal lɛyanga ɔgbaa.
Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bale bakɔɔm ɛtɔk ka gedegede mung, vvenɛ basseke isimi. Ba bassekenɛ isimi ka gedegede mung, vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk.”
“Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ bɔtɔɔm, ɔfɔm lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm umii ɔtɔk balɔɔt ba bale banaangmɛ kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm.
Uyila kamma kinnyibɛ ikipili kɛssanga ssɔn ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔttɛ vvenɛ ukipilibɛ lalɔp a ikkobo lakkyaat ka livve. Ɔsangabɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ bamii banaang kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
Ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ka kappya ka ikalangka ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp. Ɔyɛn balɔɔt balɔk ka babeenɛ gbɔɔ.
Ɔzzánga ɔttɛ, ‘Annyɔɔng ngbaa assɛ amii anaangyɔng kɛnaang ka ɛbwɔɔma bɔtɔɔm. Vvenɛ nkipiliwɔyɔng doddo.’
Ɔzzánga bamii. Ka ikalangka zzɔɔppiffa la ka ikalangka ikkyaat ɔbbal ning baang lɛlɔɔk la balɔɔt balɔk.
Usseke ssup ɔffɔ ikalangka kubbwɔɔk ka umiinɛ ka kappya, ɔbbal balɔɔt balɔk lɛyɛn baang ka babeenɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abɛpɛyɔng kɛtɔm ’sɔng mung gbɔɔ asiyɔng bulɔk lɛnaang?’
Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt usinɛyɛlɛ lɛtɔk ka kɛnaang; kwakkwɛ.’ Ɔttɛ, ‘Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa amii anaangnɛyɔng kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm.’

“Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, uyini ɔkkwɔɔ uzzilɛttɔ ɔttɛ ɔkkwɔɔ banaang a kɛnaang ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ unnyibɛ ikipili abbɛ, ka ussinɛ ka balɔɔt ba bamalnɛ kɛnaang basseke isimi, uffu ɔffɔ ka balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk bamal kɛnaang.
Balɔɔt ba battenɛ kɛnaang abbɛ ka ikalangka kubbwɔɔk ukipilibɛ lalɔp ikkobo lakkyaat.
“Ɔzzánga uffu ɔffɔ ka balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk banaang kɛnaang batɔknɛ ikipili abbɛ, battina battɛ vvenɛ imii ka lusso. Abbɛ ngbaa ɔssɛ ukipilibɛ lalɔp ikkobo lakkyaat.
Batɔk ikkpoko abbɛ la lɔzzɔ la lɔzzɔ batum ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛbɛ ka kɛnaang.
Battɛ, ‘Balɔɔt ba atɔknɛbɛ ka kɛnaang gedegede kulele mung, banaang kɛnaang ka awa vvɔn keem, akipilibɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akipilinɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ba iggbanɛ lissi lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm inaang kɛnaang ka luwee.’
Uyini bɔtɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Gɔpɔlɔ ɛnngwa anaam, isakwɔyɔng ba ntaka nzzi ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng. Annyɔɔng ayilanɛyɔng kwa kɛnaang a kɛnaang ka lalɔp ikkobo lakkyaat ka kɛtɔm.
Atɔk ikipili annyɔɔng afulayɔng. Nle ka nkipilinɛ balɔɔt ba nssumanɛ lɛtɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkipiliwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng.
Lakke ba nyanga za nnaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nttinanɛ la ikkpoko anaam ɔɔ? Annyɔɔng kutunwɔyɔng ka nggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk ɔɔ?’ ”
Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba bassekenɛ isimi vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk. Balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk vvenɛ basseke isimi.”
Jesus ka ulenɛ ka kimii Jerusalem, ufeele la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa. Bale baang ka bassɛnɛ, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ka lalup ɔttɛ,
“Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Mung ile ka imiinɛ Jerusalem ka ɛfɛɛn a bale bakaa Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, bannyi bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba bale bazza kɛkaal ammɛ, battɛ ubbe.
Vvenɛ basammɛ bannyi ikanakana bannyɔɔkamɛ, batupmɛ, bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka cross. Ɔzzànga ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
Ɔzzánga abakka bwaan a Zebedee ba bwaanbwalam uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus la bwaan ammɛ ukun Jesus laddu, ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaangmɛ ammɛ budoddo.

Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyan ’bɔng?” Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛ Jesus kamma ɔttɛ, “Ayila kamma attɛ bwaan anaam ’bɔng mung baffa vvenɛ bataa ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk annɔ la kɔbɔɔk-ɛbyakɔm annɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ale àzzánga Ubeet.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ba asan bwa abapnɛyɔng. Akkwoong mung avvayɔng ka ommonggo wa nle ka nvvanɛ ɔɔ?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Ikkwoong mung ivva.”

Jesus ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ avvayɔng ka ommonggo anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzànga lakke ba nyanga za kɛsanga ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk anaam la kɔbɔɔk-ɛbyakɔm anaam. Bɛtaa ’byɔng baang bile bya balɔɔt ba Dedde anaam ulenɛ lɛlɔngɔlɔ ulokobɛ.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔp bappyeenɛ ning baang, kutunbɛ la etele la etele ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt baffa.
Jesus ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, baffu babbi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɔttɛ, “Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng bazzi-lɛttɔ bayanga lakke batta balɔɔt. Bazzi-lɛttɔ ’bɔng baang bakɔɔmnɛbɛ.
Nkkpa kɔnaang, ’kwɔng ning baang la annyɔɔng baala kule. Ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng vvɔn ɔggyannɛ lɛbaang, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔ̀zzánga ubili babbɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng vvɔn ɔggyannɛ kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔ̀zzánga ubili annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀
Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa usinɛ liffu kɛggyan a latele ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt, uffu ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔ̀zzánga bɔɔyi abbɛ, nkwaaning ɔsam lɛfal ammɛ unnyi ɔkkala balɔɔt ppwap.”
Ka balenɛ ka kɛgbata ka Jericho, kɛkaan a balɔɔt ppwap ning kikup Jesus.
Bassi-ifim baffa badɔkɔ baang ka bataanɛ ka lufoom ɛtɔk. Bappyeenɛ battɛ Jesus ule ka ɔsaknɛ, babungu battɛ, “Waan a David, ibbewɔ lɛttɔ, Dedde!”
Kibbi ’sɔng baang bakkpabɛ lɛmmwɔɔl battɛ bataa zzum. Keem bakama ɔkama babungu bagaga battɛ, “Waan a David, ibbewɔ lɛttɔ, Dedde!”
Jesus ɔkɔɔng baang ubee, ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyan attɛ nnaangwɔyɔng bɔng?”
Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Dedde, iggyan ittɛ anaangyɛlɛ iyɛn!”
Jesus ɔppyɛɛkbɛ, babbemɛ lɛttɔ, ɔkɔɔm kɔbɔɔk usingibɛ ka zzeen, eseese bayɛn bafeele bakupmɛ.
Bakkɛtɛnɛ Jerusalem, baffu baffɔ Bethphage ka lɛttaal Olives. Jesus ɔsanga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa ɔttɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bassɛ.
Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka killu sa lusso baang, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng eyim ka basikinɛ la waan annyɛ baang. Akkyaayɔngyɛ afeenɛyɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔkwɔnɛyɔng kɔlɔk, abwɔɔlɔmɛ attɛyɔng, ‘Uyini ɔggyannɛbyɛ.’ Vvenɛ ɔfɔngɔwɔyɔng eseese.”
Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ɔttɛnɛ,
“Abwɔɔlɔyɔng tɔkɔlɔ a ssala Zion Ubeet annyɔɔng ule ka uffunɛ ukupwɔyɔng, ule ɔppwa-luppyam ɔlɔɔt, ule uttele eyim, la waan annyɛ.”
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng baang bakɔɔm bassɛ, bamii banaang kwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛbɛ ɔttɛ banaang.
Bakɔɔm eyim la waan annyɛ baffu. Baggbolo iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ bavvoongyɛ la awaan. Jesus ukut utteleyɛ.
Balɔɔt ggbadam ballɔt iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ ka ɛtɔk, balɔk babbɔk liteet-uddi ballɔt ka ɛtɔk.
Kɛkaan sa kɛssɛnɛ ka lusso a Jesus la sa kɛssɛnɛ kikupmɛ ka isimi babungu battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Waan-a-David! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ, ammɛ wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl a Uyini! Kibungu kile sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
Jesus ɔffɔnɛ Jerusalem, ɛfɛɛn ebubutu. Balɔɔt babap battɛ, “Baang nnyinɛ ee?”
Bɛkaan ’byɔng baang babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Jesus, Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ussinɛ Nazareth ka ɛkpansi a Galilee.”

Jesus ufeele umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ɔggba balɔɔt ba bataanɛ bɛfɛɛn la ba balɛɛpnɛ-ɔlɛɛp ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Usikili ikkpokkolo balɔɔt ba bafoolonɛ balɔɔt ikkpoko uggup, la ikkpokkolo ya balɔɔt ba bataanɛ idugbɔnnyɛ.
Ɔttɛ, “Bakkpɔkbong ka luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Ggwoon anaam bale bakkwɔɔgwɛ ggwoon a luzɔɔm mung, asikiliyɔngbong gwɛ lusseke kiddumu bassip!’ ”
Bassi-ifim la bannɔk-a-kikkwu baffu bakupmɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttulabɛ.
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ kutunbɛ gaang gaang ka bayɛnnɛ bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ bya ɔnaangnɛ. Bwɔɔntiti babungu bakkwa ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Abunguyɔng, Waan a David.”

Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Mung appyee mung kwa balɔɔknɛ baang ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii, nppyee mung. Mung ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng kwa Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ ɔɔ? lɔttɛ, ‘Akopoloyɔngbong bwɔɔntiti ba lisse la ba eddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale babungu ɔlɔɔt kibungu sa lɔkkwɔɔn.’ ”
Jesus ɔgbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang umii ukkwunu Bethany.
Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo ka ulenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kɛppyɛlɛ kimii tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, buwɔɔng busaapmɛ.

Ɔyɛn kɛssɛ ka lufoom ɛtɔk. Ɔbɛnɛ, umii ka lɛsan assɛ. Umiinɛ, likkpo gbɔɔ usi lɛyɛn. Ule livva livva keem. Ɔzzánga ɔzɔɔmsɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɛfal a kɛfal likkpo ba abɛlɛ lɛwɔm!” Eseese lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang linikili.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bayɛnnɛ ning baang, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, babap battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang linikili like-like ning?”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Ulenɛ ka ayanganɛyɔng kiyila asiyɔng lɛkangala, akkwoong mung anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nnaangnɛ la kɛssɛ ’sɔng mung. Nkwɔng baang kɛyɔɔng lissi, gɔɔ akkwoong mung alɔɔk la ekpok attɛyɔng ‘Gbata mung abbumwɔ kɛyɔɔng allɔt bakang ka lihu’ Vvenɛ ebbumyɛ kɛyɔɔng ɛllɔt.
Ayanganɛyɔng kiyila, vvenɛ akɔɔmyɔng luzɔɔm ayangayɔng bwa aggyannɛyɔng.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ isimi-simi uffu ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule baang ka ukopolonɛ, bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya Jews baffu battɛ, “Nyinɔɔng unnyiwɔnɛ lakke za kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Fɔngɔyɔng ssii, nbapwɔyɔng lɔbap ggwɔn. Appyɛlɛnɛnɛyɔng kamma, vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lakke za nyanganɛ nkɔɔm nnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung.

John lakke kɛnaang-a-baptizim lassimɛ yang? Lassimɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm faa ka ɔlɔɔt?” Ɔzzánga bazzɔɔk bɛkangala abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Mung ile ilɔɔk nang? Iyilanɛ ittɛ lassimɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔttɛ ‘Anaang nang asinɛyɔng kwa John liyila?’
Ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ lassimɛ ka ɔlɔɔt, ba isan bwa balɔɔt bale banaang ka ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ balenɛ liyila battɛ John uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Bappyɛlɛ Jesus kamma battɛ, “Ayyɔɔt ba isan.” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzànga anaam baala nssɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a lakke za nkɔɔmnɛ nnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng lassinɛnɛ.”
“Attinayɔng nang gedegede mung? Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔfɔɔnnɛ bwaanabwalam baffa. Ufeele umii ukup waan ammɛ wa utumalɔɔt ɔttɛ, ‘Amii anaangnɛ kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm mmwɔɔn’.
Awaan ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ka kimii ba nle’. Ɔmmɛ ssup usikili luttina ufeele umii kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm.
Abassɛ ufeele umii ukup waan wa vvɔn ɔbbal ning baang lɛlɔɔk. Waan ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Kɔyyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp, Dedde’. Ɔzzànga usi limii.

Mung bwɔɔn ’bɔng baang baffa, uwɔwɔng ɔnaangnɛ kwa abbassɛ ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang?” Battɛ, “Waan wa utumalɔɔt.” Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ batɔk innamba la ikkpàlà bale ka bamiinɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakɔngɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ka isimi.

John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, uffu ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng ɛtɔk ya bbwak ya bukupnɛ, afimyɔng kwa ammɛ liyila. Batɔk innamba la ikkpàlà bayila kwa ammɛ. Gɔɔ ka ayɛnnɛyɔng ’kwɔng asiyɔng ippyam lisikili ayilayɔng kwa ammɛ.”

Jesus ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng ifɛɛt ilɔk. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm, ɔbba kikoom ukkpit bwɛ. Ɔtɔɔk lubbe gwa bale bakaam batak bassɛɛn. Ɔbɔɔk ggwoon gwa bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm. Ɔsam bɔtɔɔm unnyibɛ kɔkat. Ɔgbata ka ssala umii kɔssɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ liyaat ɛffɔnɛ, ɔtɔɔm babili ammɛ ɔttɛ bamii batɔk etini liyaat ya ammɛ bafeemɛ.
Bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang bakaa babili ammɛ. Batup vvɔn. Bawwɔɔl wa vvɔn. Batɔɔp wa vvɔn lattaal.
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbbal babili ammɛ balɔk lɛtɔɔm ba battanɛ ba uttenɛ lɛtɔɔm, bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang babbalbɛ kɛssanga akama ’sɔng baang lɛyɔɔ.
Ka lakuma, ɔsanga waan ammɛ ɔbbal lɛtɔɔm, ɔttɛ, ‘Bayɛnnɛ waan anaam, vvenɛ batelemɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn’.
Bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang bayɛnnɛ waan abassɛ abbɛ, balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ ‘Mung waan a uyini bɔtɔɔm tɛ, feele iwwɔɔlmɛyɔng nkwaaning isamyɔng bɔtɔɔm ilɛkɛ.’
Ɔzzánga babwɔɔpmɛ tangam bazzɔɔk kukupa bɔtɔɔm bappyɛl bawwɔɔl.”
Jesus ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya uyini bɔtɔɔm uffunɛ ule ɔnaang bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang nang?”
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Vvenɛ ɔwwɔɔl banaang-a-bubbi ’bɔng baang; ɔsam bɔtɔɔm unnyi bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm balɔk ba bale bannyimɛ etini liyaat ya ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak.”

Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɛtɔm kɛlɔk ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng kwa luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ ɔɔ? ‘Lɛttaal ’zɔng baang za ɔbɔɔk-a-ggwoon ɔttɛnɛ ba lɛyyɛɛp, lile za gbɔɔ, lɛppyɛlɛbong lɛzzanga lɛttaal za lɛyyɛɛpnɛ lɛsak. Nkwɔng mung uyini ɔnaangnɛ tɛ; kule kɔlɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ kɔsak.’ ”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔgbaa ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔggbawɔyɔng ka Itutum ammɛ, ɔsanga balɔɔt ba bale bawɔm lakkpo za doddo ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ɔssɛɛn.
[Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɔnɛ ka libat a lɛttaal ’zɔng, vvenɛ ɔbɔbɔlɔ usseke lakkpɔ lakkpɔ. Ulenɛ lɛttaal ’zɔng lɛttɔnɛ lɛbɛtɛmɛ, vvenɛ likookmɛ usikili ubut.]”
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyeenɛ ifɛɛt ya Jesus ɔssanɛ baang, basan battɛ ɔlɔɔk utumbɛ abbɛ.
Ɔzzánga babummɛ kɛkaa. Keem kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛbbwɔpɔbɛ, basi lɛbbɔ bakaamɛ ka balɔɔt ’bɔng battina battɛ Jesus uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Jesus ɔbbal ifɛɛt ’yɔng lɛkɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ɔttɛ,
“Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubeet wa ɔbamanɛ bɛfɛɛn a libbeel uloko awaan wa waanwalam.
Ɔtɔɔm babili ammɛ ɔttɛ bamii babumala baffu-libbeel. Ɔzzánga baffu-libbeel bafim kiffu.

Ɔbbal babili balɔk lɛtɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng baffu-libbeel attɛyɔng nbamabong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ nlokobɛ, bwakuzzi ɔkkpɛlɛ bubalbong. Bawwɔɔlbong balam igɔdɔ la bitook a igɔdɔ bya biggbengenɛ gaang. Affuyɔng libbeel bɔk.’
Keem balɔɔt ba babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ libbeel basi lɛgɔpɔlɔ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔgbata umii lɛkkɔ za ammɛ. Balɔk bagbata bamii ka itɔɔm abbɛ, balɔk bagbata bamii ka ssoon a lippya abbɛ.
Balɔk bakaa babili ’bɔng batup bawwɔɔl.
Ubeet kutunmɛ gaang gaang ɔtɔɔm isodya ammɛ bamii bawwɔɔl balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ba bawwɔɔlnɛ babili ammɛ. Bassɛɛn killu abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛkkɔm.
Ɔkkwɔɔ babili ammɛ libbeel ɔttɛ, ‘Nbamabong bɛfɛɛn a libbeel nvve, ɔzzànga balɔɔt ba nbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ bafimbong latele.
Amiiyɔng ka itɔk ka itɔk abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt duu wa ayɛnnɛyɔng uffu libbeel.’
Ɔzzánga babili ammɛ bafeele bamii itɔk itɔk babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayɛnnɛ mkkpa babbɔl, bayyɛɛp, nkwaaning balɔɔt ggbadam baffu ggwoon a libbeel luyipi.
“Ubeet ufeele umii kikoolo balɔɔt ba baffunɛ libbeel, ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ uwɔkɔlɔ libbeel lɛwɔkɔlɔ.
Ubeet ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛnngwa anaam, anaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ amal mung asi uwɔkɔlɔ libbeel lɛwɔkɔlɔ?’ Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang lɛmmwɔɔl usi lɛzza.
Ɔzzánga ubeet ɔbwɔɔlɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ggbɔmɛyɔng izzi ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ asamnɛyɔng azzɔɔkyɔng ka vveeng ka kisul; ɔtaa baang ɔkkwa ɔkɔɔm uzzi lasaal.’ ”
Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ balɔɔt, ɔkkwɔɔ ggbadam; ɔzzànga ɔffɔnɛ ka ɔsanganɛ, ɔsanga ssup.”
Balɔɔt a Pharisees bamii banaang likup za bale bakɔɔm ibap bassɛɛn Jesus ka kɔlɔɔk.

Ɔzzánga batɔɔm balɔɔt a kɔssɛ abbɛ balɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Herod bamii ka ɛfɛɛn Jesus battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo isan lɔsan ittɛ ale ɔlɔɔt wa ayyɛɛpnɛ bɛnaang, akopolo balɔɔt lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk atum kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ la ɔlɔɔt. Ba akeke kwa balɔɔt battinanɛ. Wɔ ba kɔbɛtɛ ka kwa balɔɔt baggyannɛ battɛ bale.
Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ bbɔk, annɔ attina nang atum Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt? Mung ikkpɛɛ innamba ayyɔɔt ka labɔɔk a uzzilɛttɔ a Rome faa ifɔngɔ?”
Jesus ɔggba babbu ittina abbɛ lɛsan. Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng banaang-a-lalaak ’bɔng, mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abumnɛyɔng kɛssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk?
Ayɔɔnɛyɔng sili wa akkpɛɛnɛyɔng innamba!” Bakɔɔm sili bafeemɛ.
Ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Baang lusso nyinɔɔng la lɛkɔɔl ammɛ ka sili ’wɔng baang?”
Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome.” Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annyiyɔng uzzilɛttɔ a Rome bwa bulenɛ bwa ammɛ, annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Bappyeenɛ ning baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, bagbata bakɔngɔmɛ.
Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ssɔn, balɔɔt a Sadducees balɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. (Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ libbe ka lubbe, ba ɔbɛlɛ lifungala.)
Babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, Moses ukopoloyɛlɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛfɔɔn ubbenɛ, etele ammɛ ɔtɔk wanavva ubbu ’wɔng baang, ɔlɔk bwɔɔn ɔfɔɔn unnyi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ulenɛ libbe.’
Ɔzzànga etele la etele balɔɔt bannambakkyaat badɔkɔ ballu mung. Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk abbɛ ɔtɔk wanavva, ubbe ɔkɔngɔ wanavva ammɛ ka ɔtakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛfɔɔn. Wanavva ammɛ ufeele umii ullu la etele ulam.

Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng kɛbbal etele ammɛ lɛnaang. Ɔbbal libbe ɔkɔngɔ wanavva ’wɔng baang. Ɔbbal etele ulam wa vvɔn lillu tɔttɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bannambakkyaat babbe basaal, bwɔɔn basi lɛfɔɔn bannyi etele abbɛ wa ɔgɛlɛnya.
Ka lakuma, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔssɛ ubbe.
Mung ka kɛtɔm sa babbu bale bafungala ka lubbe bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu, wanavva ’wɔng baang ule ule wa nnyinɔɔng ka ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ balemɛnɛ lɛtɔk?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bbwak baleyɔng ka nakanaka! Kussi ka asinɛyɔng luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan ɔlɔk lakke ammɛ.
Ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya babbu bale bafungala ka lubbe, bàssèkè ka bale bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat. Killu ba kɛbɛlɛ lile.
Ulenɛ kwa babbu kifungala ka lubbe; ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ,
‘Anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Isaac, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Jacob.’ Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanganɛ bakokolo la babbu; kwakkwɛ baang babbu bale bafungala!”
Kibbi ’sɔng baang bappyeenɛ ning baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka lukopolo ammɛ ’gwɔng baang.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyeenɛ battɛ Jesus ɔbɛtɛbong balɔɔt a Sadducees ka kɛlɔɔk, baggba ka ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn.
Ɔlɔɔt abbɛ vvɔn wa ukopolonɛ-Lafɔɔ ubum ɔttɛ ɔkɔɔm lɔbap ɔssɛɛn Jesus ka kɔlɔɔk.
Ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung lafɔɔ ’zɔzɔng lattanɛ liggbenge?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “ ‘Atele Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ, la luppyam annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ la lɛfɛkɛlɛ annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la luttina annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.’
Uwɔng ulenɛ lafɔɔ za lɛbaang. Azzɛ lalenɛ lafɔɔ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Lifɔɔ za lissɛnɛ liggbenge likup ’zɔng baang lile littɛ, ‘Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.’
Lafɔɔ a Moses la lukopolo bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lutum lafɔɔ ’zɔng mung laffa.”
Balɔɔt a Pharisees baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ,
“Attinayɔng nang atumyɔng Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ? Ussi ka kikkwu sa nyinɔɔng?” Abbɛ battɛ, “Ussi ka kikkwu a David.”
Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyi David bikɔɔm pya kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ‘Uyini’? David ɔttɛ,
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Uyini anaam ɔttɛ: Taa mung ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlabɔɔk anaam tɔttɔt nsam balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ nlokowɔ asing bukkpɔ.’
David ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ ‘Uyini’: ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule waan a David?”
Ɔlɔɔt wa úkkwoongnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ Jesus lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng usi lile. Ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ɔlɔɔt usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛbbɔ ɔbap Jesus lɔbap.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la kibbi ’sɔng baang la balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ,
“Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees balebong babwɔɔlɔ ifɛɛt a Lafɔɔ a Moses.
Ayilayɔng duu bwa babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng; ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ akeetyɔng eleme abbɛ. Kwa bakopolonɛ, akkwɛ ba banaang.
Basam latɔkɔ za lalɔɔpnɛ bafeek balɔɔt, gɔɔ luttina gwa kɛyaambɛ latɔkɔ ’sɔng baang ba bayanga.
Banaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɛn. Ppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn bya bassɛɛn lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basam baggbɔ ka lattɔ lusso la labɔɔk biggbengenɛ. Iwuulu abbɛ ilɔm iffɔ kang.
Baggyan bɛtaa bya doddo ka libbeel la idda mitin.
Baggyan battɛ balɔɔt bawomobɛ la latele ka itɔk a kappya, bakkwɔɔbɛ ‘Bakopolo-lukopolo’.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bakkwɔɔwɔ ukopolo-lukopolo ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ɔkpana la ɔkpana, ayangayɔng ukopolo-lukopolo vvɔn.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkwɔɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka ɛkpansi mung ‘Dedde’, ka ayanganɛyɔng Dedde vvɔn keem ka libat.
Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bakkwɔɔwɔ ‘Uzzilɛttɔ’ ka Uzzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn keem wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng mung ule ule ubili annyɔɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt, ule uyila busook. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ busook vvenɛ ɔ̀zzánga uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt.”

“Annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees! Bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama ka afɛɛnnɛyɔng lɛmma kikkwu Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; Ɔssɛbibbit usi ɛtɔk lɛyɛn. Ɔzzànga, annyɔɔng biini ba amalyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ. Balɔɔt ba babumnɛ kɛmal ba afɔngɔyɔng bamal![

“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Kwa annyɔɔng kɔsaalwɔyɔngbong! Alokoyɔng bwanavva babbu asokoloyɔng kizzi isak, atɔkyɔngbɛ ssala akɔɔmyɔng; anaangyɔng buggboggbo ka kɛzɔɔm a luzɔɔm gbɔlɔng. Akama wa annyɔɔng ule ɔtta lɛbbɔl.]

“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Awookyɔng iyɔngɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ akum aggyanyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ule uyila kwa annyɔɔng. Ayɛnmɛnɛyɔng, anaangmɛyɔng ɔnaang bubbi ɔsakwɔyɔng annyɔɔng biini. Vvenɛ amiiyɔng ka lɔkɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ.

“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama annyɔɔng bassi-ifim a bakat-ikata ’bɔng. Akopolo attɛyɔng ‘Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafɔɔ mɛ ba lakaa. Ɔzzànga uyimnɛ ikkpoko ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafɔɔ lakkwoong mung lakaamɛ.’
Annyɔɔng bazingizingi ’bɔng, bassi-ifim a bɛfɛɛn! Bɔng buttanɛ liggbenge, ikkpoko faa Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa lɔnaangnɛ ikkpoko ile ka latele.
Abbalyɔng likopolo attɛyɔng, ‘Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafɔɔ mɛ ba lakaa, ɔzzànga uyimnɛ lɛsɔɔk za labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafɔɔ lakkwoong mung lakaamɛ’.
Anaang nang azizinginɛyɔng ning! Bɔng buttanɛ liggbenge, lɛsɔɔk faa labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lanaangnɛ lɛsɔɔk lɛyanga latele?
Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, uyimbong ɔgbaa la lɛsɔɔk za lilenɛ baang.
Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, uyimbong ɔgbaa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ullunɛ baang.
Ɔlɔɔt wa uyimnɛ libat, uyimbong ugbaal-a-kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal ’wɔng baang ɔgbaa.

“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Akkwoongyɔng kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm waan a kufaak a bɛfɛɛn a lifaat annyɔɔng keem afimyɔng kitele lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn gwa lutumnɛ lafɔɔ: tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, kibbelɛttɔ la bɔllɛ luppyam. Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa ale akkoopyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng bɛlɔk usseke bɛlɔk.
Annyɔɔng bassi-ifim a bakat-ikata ’bɔng! Asangayɔng esing ka tɔkɔlɔ batak annyɔɔng azzɔɔkyɔng, appyɛɛ amɛɛlyɔng ɔgɔdɔ!

“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala-lalaak ’bɔng! Azzaayɔng immonggo la bɛkkpala ka isimi abbyɛ usseke tɔkɔlɔ ɔtaa nyɔk la bɛfɛɛn bya akɔɔmnɛyɔng kɛssɔp-a-bɔfɛɛn la likke ayangayɔng.
Annyɔɔng bassi-ifim ’bɔng, Pharisees! Atteyɔng bwa bulenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ommonggo lɛzzaa, bwa bulenɛ ka vveeng vvenɛ bukkpɔlɔ!

“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang, annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lilli za bappwɔɔngnɛzɛ ulata abente. Liyyɛɛp lɛppyɛɛk ka vveeng, ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ ayɛn bɛkɔp a babbu balɔɔt.
Annyɔɔng aleyɔng ning baang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔppyɛɛkwɔnɛyɔng ka kkwɔɔt aleyɔng balɔɔt ba doddo, ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ ulewɔyɔng kɛnaang a lalaak la bubbi.”

“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees bakkala-lalaak ’bɔng! Anaangyɔng lalli za doddo alokoyɔng bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, alɔngɔlɔyɔng libat a lalli balɔɔt ba ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔyyɛɛpbɛ ka bukokolo.
Attɛyɔng, ‘Bulenɛ ka iggbanɛ lɛfal ka ɛkɛtɛ balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, nzang ba inaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ badɔkɔnɛ banaang bawwɔɔl bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.’
Ayilayɔngbong attɛyɔng annyɔɔng bwaan a balɔɔt ba bawwɔɔlnɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!
Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng, akeeleyɔng kɛnaang a issaawɔ annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ battenɛ.
Annyɔɔng bwaan-izzɔkɔ ’bɔng! Anaang nang attina attɛyɔng kɛkaal wɔyɔng baala kɛbbɔl amiiyɔng ka Hɛɛl?

Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng vvenɛ ntɔɔm bappyee-kutolo la basan-a-kɔlɔɔk la bakopolo-lukopolo nfeewɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ awwɔɔlyɔng balɔk, akamayɔng balɔk bɛfɔl akakayɔng ka Cross, atupyɔng balɔk ka idda mitin, aggbayɔng balɔk ka laffɛ ka laffɛ.

Akkwɛ baang kɔnaangnɛ akama wa bawwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ kkwɛ lɛsan, ule ɔttɔ ɔffɛlɛwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ka ussinɛ ka kɛwwɔɔl sa bawwɔɔlnɛ Abel wa usinɛ kkwɛ lɛsan tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka Zachariah, waan a Berechiah, wa awwɔɔlnɛyɔng ka bɛzzɔkɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ akama wa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm ’byɔng mung.”

“O, Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Annɔ awwɔɔlnɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, atɔɔp balɔɔt ba balɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ufeewɔ lattaal. Nttɛ nzang nkkwɔɔ balɔɔt annɔ nssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttè bikɔkɔ biwupnɛ bwɔɔn appyɛ. Ɔzzànga ba ayilanɛ.
Vvenɛ amma Ggwɔɔn-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akɔngɔ, lisseke ubbu-a-ssala.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ; ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso: nɛ ba abɛlɛ lɛyɛn, ning ning alɔɔk attɛ ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ammɛ wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini ppyɛɛ!’ ”
Jesus ule ka kɛgbata ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, keem balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu bayɔɔmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babɔɔknɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Jesus ɔttɛ, “Iii, ayɛnyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ doddo. Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ waan a lɛttaal zzɔn gbɔɔ wa ule usseke ka ggwoon ’gwɔng mung baala ule. Lutini lɛttaal la zzɔn za lilenɛ baang vvenɛ lɛbɔl sukusuku lɛllɔt.”

Jesus ule baang ka ɔtaanɛ ka lɛttaal Olives, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu babapmɛ ka wɛɛk battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bɛnaang. Mung mbɔng bule bunaang buyɔɔyɛlɛ isan ittɛ ɛkɛtɛ kiffu annɔ la lakpeke a vveengodde ɛffɔbong.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akatyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt balɔk banaangwɔyɔng agbigbiniyɔng.
Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ baffu ka lɛkɔɔl anaam, battɛ ‘Anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ’ badɛm balɔɔt ggbadam bagbigbini.

Vvenɛ appyeeyɔng lɔsap a lɛkɔɔng kɛtɛkɛtɛ mung, kuttu azzɛ fulu-fulu. Ɔzzànga gɔpɔlɔyɔng: Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Bɛssanga a lilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbyɛ baang vvenɛ bɛnaang, ɔzzànga ’kwɔng baang lissi kulenɛ lakpeke a vveeng.
Lɔkaan ngwakang vvenɛ ballu gwakang; ellu yakang vvenɛ ballu la yakang. Buwɔɔng vvenɛ buttɔ gaang gaang. Ɛkpansi vvenɛ ɛnnyɛkɛ ebutu la ɛfɛɛn la ɛfɛɛn.
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp ikeeng bwa wanavva uppyeenɛ ka kɛppwɔlɔ imala.
“Balɔɔt vvenɛ bakaawɔyɔng, basam bannyi balɔɔt ba bale bayapwɔyɔng akama, bawwɔɔlwɔyɔng. Vvenɛ atunyɔng ɔssɛbibit ’wɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam.
Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bakkyaa kiyila abbɛ bafɔngɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang. Vvenɛ bazzi issɛ abbabbɛ, batunbɛ abbɛ-abbɛ kɛyɔɔng.
Bakkaalalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ batuma ggbadam, banaang balɔɔt ppwap bagbigbini.
Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bubbi bule buwaala, kɛsaap a balɔɔt ggbadam kɛkkpɛɛm.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kɛsaap ’sɔng baang ɔffɔ ka lakpeke vvenɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.
Ɔzzánga Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ kule la kikopolo ka vveengodde ka kulenɛ itɛɛsɛ ɔssɛbibit; tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk lakpeke laffu.
“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng ‘Lakkpi-za-labbɔlnɛ’, za uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Daniel ɔlɔɔknɛ ka labeenɛ ka labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” (Ɔkkwɔɔkwɔɔ, akke tɛ!)
“Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka Judea vvenɛ bamma babbulu ikpok.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka libat a ggwoon ammɛ, baala usini umii ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ, isimisimi ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛppyɛlɛ umii ɔsan iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ.
Bwanavva-zzɛɛm la ibakka bwɔɔn ba sɛkɛsɛkɛ vvenɛ bayɛn akama.
Azɔɔm akkwɔɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning asiyɔng lɛtta ammayɔng akɔngɔyɔng ssala ka ɛkɛtɛ a lukook ɔlɔk ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
Kɔlɔɔk kwa ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔngbaang vvenɛ kɔbbɔl gaang gaang kɔtta lilɔɔk za lissinɛ linaang ka ussinɛ ka lutte ɛkpansi uffu udum ka kɛtɔm-a-mmwɔɔn; kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk baala kɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwɛ baang.
Ɔzzanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang lɛzza: usinɛ ning baang lɛnaang, ɔlɔɔt wa ule uddu ba ule. Ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ nkkpa kɔnaang, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔzza bɛtɔm.
“Ka ɛkɛtɛ yɔng bang ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔkwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ’ ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛkmɛ kang’, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayilamɛyɔngkwɛ.

Bakkala-lalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔlɔk abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; bakkwoongnɛ, vvenɛ banaang bɛfɛɛn ggbadam bya bɛkɛɛlɛnɛ balɔɔt nkwaaning balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ bayila kwa abbɛ.
Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Nkka wɔyɔngbong lɛbwɔɔlɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔ tɛ.
“Ɔlɔk, ulenɛ ka balɔɔt bale babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng battɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk, utii ka kasɛkɛ atingating’ tɛ̀ttɛ́ amiiyɔng baang, ɔlɔk balɔɔk battɛ ‘Pyɛɛk ule mung ka uddumunɛ’ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayilayɔngbɛkwɛ.
Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ immwalang ya ifakanɛ libat ka ussinɛ ka lusso gwa livve-lɛttanɛ umii ɔffɔ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lipitinɛ.
“Lutini ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ubbu-ɛsɛɛn ubbenɛ umini, idɛlɛ iggba lattɔ baang.”

“Lilɔɔk sa bɛtɔm byɔng baang lisaalnɛ ɛsaal ɛsaal, livve-luwee vvenɛ lizum, ettuma vvenɛ ba ɛbɛlɛ lɛllaat, bwaanittuma vvenɛ baffaat ka libat baffu battɔ ka lisse. Lakke za libat vvenɛ lannyɛkɛ ɛfɛɛn ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Eleme ya ɛnaangnɛ isan ittɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka uffunɛ vvenɛ ɛtta ka libat. Ifɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ilenɛ ka ɛkpansi vvenɛ ikkwa. Vvenɛ bayɛn Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ule ussi ka libat la ikkpálá lukpaaggbeede uffu la lakke la buppwolo bwa lɛbaang.

Iffi ya lɛbaang vvenɛ iwɔl. Vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba bassinɛ ka lagook ɛkpansi azzɛ lanna, bamii bakkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ulenɛbɛ lɛsanga ka ussinɛ ka lɛttɔ ɛkpansi za zzɔn umii ɔffɔ ka za zzɔn baffu baggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
“Afɔngɔ lɛsan a kɛssɛ likopolowɔyɔng kukele. Bɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ bɛppwɔtnɛ, livva libil, kittenɛ kɛkkwɔlɔ a livva, asanbong attɛ usɔngɔ ɔkkɛtɛbong.
Kule ning baang. Ɛkɛtɛ ayɛnnɛ bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, asan attɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong Uyini utii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.
Akkeyɔng tɛ! Bɛfɛɛn byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛnaang bong tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba balenɛ ikokolo gedegede mung babbe ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Libat la ɛkpansi vvenɛ bɛsak bimii, ɔzzànga lɛmmwɔɔl anaam baala lɛsak.
“Nkkpa kɔnaang, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ livve ’zɔng baang la ɛkɛtɛ yɔng baang ba ule. Gɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat, gɔɔ Awaan: Abassɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔsannɛ.
Kiffu a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ kile kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔdɔkɔnɛ kɔnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ a Noah.
Kule kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛtɔm mbyɔng bakang bya isimi ka ɛlɔlɔ ɛtakanɛ liffu; balɔɔt bazzinɛ lizzi, bavva kɛvva, bwaanbwalam batɔk la bwanavva tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa Noah ɔmalnɛ ka akkpaat.
Basi lɛsan kwa kɔnaangnɛ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɛlɔlɔ effu ɛmɛɛlbɛ. Kule kɔtaa ning baang ka kɛtɔm sa Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt baffa balenɛ ka kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm, vvenɛ basam vvɔn bagbata, usseke vvɔn ɔtaa baang kɛyɔɔng.
Bwanavva baffa bale bale ka kikook a bɛfɛɛn. Vvenɛ basam vvɔn bagbata, usseke vvɔn.
Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ale asiyɔng lɛsan kɛtɔm sa Uyini annyɔɔng ule uffu.
Akkeyɔng tɛ! Bulenɛ ka uyini a ssala ɔsannɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya bassip bale baffu, nzang ɔtaa kkwetkkwet, baala uyila bassip babwɔɔtmɛ ggwoon bamal ka tɔkɔlɔ.
Kwakkwɛ baang annyɔɔng ɔgbaa ale abama akatyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya asinɛyɔng zzeen litele.
“Uwɔwɔng ulenɛ ɔsan-a-kɔlɔɔk a bɔɔyi ɔlɔɔt wa utelenɛ abbassɛ? Ammɛ ulenɛ wa abassɛ unnyimɛnɛ kizzi-lɛttɔ ibɔɔyi, ɔttɛ unnyibɛ kazzi ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak.
Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang vvenɛ uggele gaang gaang ka abassɛ ule ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyenmɛ ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ abassɛ ammɛ vvenɛ ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ unnyimɛ kɛppyɛɛk.
Ɔzzànga ulenɛ bɔɔyi wa ɔbbɔlnɛ eleme vvenɛ uttina kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde anaam baala ɔkka lɛppyɛlɛ’.
Vvenɛ ubee kitup a babbɛ. Uzzi kazzi, ɔvva batak la bavva-batak.
Abassɛ bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ule ɔppyɛlɛ ka kɛtɔm sa usinɛ zzeen litele, usi littina utum.
Abassɛ vvenɛ ɔmmwangmɛ ikaal ka kkwɔɔt zɛkɛzɛkɛzɛkɛ ɔnaangmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛ babbɔl a bɛnaang. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ɔkkwa, uzzi lasaal.
“Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwanabwanavva zzɔɔp, ba bakɔɔmnɛ itinika bamii kiddu uyini libbeel.
Ba kubbwɔɔk badɔkɔ bazingizingi, ba bassekenɛ basan a kɔlɔɔk.
Ba bazizinginɛ, basam itinika abbɛ usseke bannɛ basi lɛkɔɔm, bakeke kwa kɛsaal.
Ba basannɛ kɔlɔɔk bakɔɔm bannɛ bakeke kwa kɛsaal.
Uyini libbeel usi lɛkka liffu, bwaan a bwanavva ’bɔng baang, bilaa biyɛkɛlɛbɛ, balaa.
“Kɛtɔm kɛppwabong ka bappyeenɛ kibungu battɛ, ‘Uyini libbeel uffubong, affu awomomɛyɔng.’
Bwanabwanavva ’bɔng baang ba zzɔɔp bafungala bannyɛkɛ itinika abbɛ.
Ba bazizinginɛ balɔɔk la basannɛ kɔlɔɔk battɛ, ‘Anaangyɔng waan a bannɛ annyiyɔngyɛlɛ bɛɛ? Itinika ayyɔɔt ile ka izumnɛ.’ Bwanabwanavva ba basannɛ kɔlɔɔk bafim battɛ,
‘Maaye, bannɛ isi lɛkɔɔm ikkwoon kamma annyɔɔng. Amii alɛɛpyɔng ba annyɔɔng biini ka ggwoon-a-kappya’.

Ɔzzanga bazingizingi a bwanabwanavva ’bɔng baang bafeele bamii kɛlɛɛp a bannɛ. Bamiinɛ, uyini libbeel ɔffɔ. Bwanabwanavva ba kubbwɔɔk ba basannɛ kɔlɔɔk bamal ka ggwoon a libbeel la ammɛ, battulu lɛmma bafɛɛn.
“Ɔmmɛnɛ bwanabwanavva ’bɔng bakang ba bazingizinginɛ bappyɛlɛ baffu. Bakkwɔɔ battɛ, ‘Dedde, awongoloyɛlɛ lɛmma, imal.’
Ammɛ walam ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Wɔyɔng ba nsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn.’ ”
Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ussinɛ mung, ka ale asiyɔng livve ’zɔng baang ɔlɔk ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang lɛsan.”
“Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ule ka ɔgbatanɛ ka ssala umii kɔssɛ. Ɔkkwɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ammɛ usekelebɛ.

Unnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ule ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm. Unnyi wa vvɔn innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak. Wa vvɔn unnyimɛ innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk. Wa ussekenɛ isimi unnyimɛ innɔ-okkpoko iffa la kufaak; ɔgbata, umii kɔssɛ.
Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak ɔkɔɔmyɛ, ɔssɛ kappya, ɔsanga isak a innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak ɔgbaa.
Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk ɔsanga isak a innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk ɔgbaa.
Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko iffa la kufaak ufeele umii ɔtɔɔk lubbe, ɔsam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang, ulli.
“Ulenɛ lɛsak lɛmmɛ, abassɛ ibɔɔyi ’yɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛ. Ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔbap isak ya balenɛ lɛyanga ka ikkpoko ya unnyinɛbɛ.

Bɔɔyi wa ɔtɔknɛ innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak, ɔmal ɔsam ikkpoko umii ukkpelemɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Adɔkɔ annyinɛ innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak tɛ dedde, ppyɛɛk innɔ-okkpoko ’yɔng zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak ilenɛ isak ya nsanganɛ.’

Abassɛ kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Anaang doddo, annɔ alenɛ bɔɔyi wa doddo. Ka akkwoongnɛ akɔɔm bwaan ikkpoko ’yɔng anaang ikkpoko ya lɛbaang, vvenɛ nnyiwɔ ikkpoko ya lɛbaang kɛppyɛɛk. Affu kaang ning ka tɔkɔlɔ, itul laggele anaam, iggele.’
Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk ɔmal umii ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde anaam, annyinɛ innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk. Innɔ-okkpoko ya kubbwɔɔk ’yɔng ilenɛ ya nzzinɛ isak tɛ.’

Abassɛ abbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Anaang doddo, annɔ bɔɔyi wa doddo. Ka akkwoongnɛ akɔɔm ikkpoko ya utiti anaang ikkpoko ya lɛbaang, vvenɛ nnyiwɔ ikkpoko ya lɛbaang kɛkɔɔm. Affu kaang ning ka tɔkɔlɔ, itul laggele anaam, iggele.’

Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko iffa la kufaak ɔmal, umii ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde anaam, nsan lɔsan nttɛ ale ɔlɔɔt wa akoolonɛ eleme. Ayaat liyaat ka ɛfɛɛn a asinɛ liwoop. Affa lakkpo-bɛssɛ ka ɛfɛɛn asinɛ lɛkɔɔn.
Ɔdɔkɔ ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ ɔzzánga nsam ikkpoko annɔ nlup ka lisse. Yɛn bɔfɛɛn annɔ.’
Ɔzzánga abassɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ubbu bɔfɛɛn, ɔkpɛkkpɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn! Asan mung attɛ nyaat liyaat ka ɛfɛɛn a nsinɛ liwoop, nffa lakkpo-bɛssɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a nsinɛ lɛkɔɔn.
Kɔyyɛɛp. Tɛ nzang assɛɛn ikkpoko anaam ka bank. Nzang mung isak ittabong issɛɛnnɛ.
Tɔkyɔng ikkpoko ammɛ, annyiyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔpiffa la kufaak.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn vvenɛ ɔyanga ɔgbaa, vvenɛ ɔyanga buddumɛ busseke. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ bulɔk lɛyanga, waan ezuku wa ɔyanganɛ vvenɛ bakup batɔk.
Kwa uzingizingi a bɔɔyi ’wɔng mung, asammɛ azzɔɔkyɔng ka kisul ka vveeng ɔtaa baang ɔkkwa ɔkɔɔm uzzi lasaal.’
“Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ubeet la bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ule ɔtaa-ɔtaa ka ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ.
Balɔɔt ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ baggba ka lusso ammɛ. Vvenɛ ɔbɛngɛlɛbɛ lakup laffa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkat-itɔɔn ɔssangnɛ itɔɔn usseke bakele-ibal.
Vvenɛ uloko itɔɔn ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk, bakele ibal ka ɛbyakɔm.

Ubeet ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ba Dedde ulewɔnɛyɔng ppyɛɛ lɛnaang. Affu amal yɔng ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya ulenɛ lɛggba lɛlɔngɔlɔ ulokowɔyɔng ka lutte a vveeng.
Buwɔɔng busaapnɛ; annyinɛyɔng kazzi nzzi. Bannyi basaapnɛ; annyinɛyɔng nvva. Ndɔkɔ ukekeen; atɔknɛyɔng ka laggele.
Ndɔkɔ kɛkɔɔ; akwulanɛyɔng ikkwa. Ka ɔffaaknɛnɛ; appyɛɛknɛyɔng. Ka nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ; akoolonɛyɔng.’
Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa bbwak vvenɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, ‘Uyini, ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya iyɛnwɔnɛ ka buwɔɔng busaapwɔnɛ, innyiwɔ kazzi. Ɔlɔk ka bannyi basaapwɔnɛ, innyiwɔ bannyi avva?
Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya iyɛnwɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukekeen, ittɔngwɔ, issɛɛn ka ssala. Ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ kɛkɔɔ, innyiwɔ ikkwa, akwula?
Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya iyɛnwɔnɛ ka ngbakkɔpɔ ɔlɔk usiwɔ lɛppwa; iffu ikoolowɔ?’
Ubeet ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya anaangnɛyɔng lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung, annyiyɔng bakee-bwɔɔn; anaang annyinɛyɔng anaam.’

“Uvvenɛ; usikili, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba kɔbɔɔk-ɛbyakɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Nsɔɔng amii assekenɛyɔng. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ka nzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ. Nsɔɔng amiiyɔng ka akama lɔkɔɔn gwa lɛbaang gwa babamanɛ baloko Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
Ndɔkɔ buwɔɔng; kazzi asinɛyɔng linnyi. Bannyi basaapnɛ; afimnɛyɔng kinnyi, nvva.
Ndɔkɔ ukekeen; afimnɛyɔng kɛttɔng kɛssɛɛn ka ssala. Ndɔkɔ kɛkɔɔ, afimnɛyɔng ikkwa kikwula. Ndɔkɔ ka kisi lɛppwa, asinɛyɔng likoolo. Ndɔkɔ ka igbakkɔpɔ, asinɛyɔng likoolo.’

Vvenɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, ‘Uyini, ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya iyɛnwɔnɛ ka buwɔɔng busaapwonɛ ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ ka bannyi basaapwɔnɛ, ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ ka alenɛ ukekeen ɔlɔk kɛkɔɔ, ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ ka usiwɔnɛ lɛppwa, ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ ngbakkɔpɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ isiwɔ littele?’
Ubeet ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Ka afimnɛyɔng bakee-bwɔɔn littele, afimnɛyɔng anaam kittele oo.’
Vvenɛ ɔggba balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bamii ka akama wa kɛfal a kɛfal. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ eleme ya doddo vvenɛ bataa ka kuddu yoyyoyyo.”
Jesus uvvenɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ likopolo, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ,
“Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng usseke bɛtɔm bɛffa Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kassolo. Vvenɛ basam Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyibɛ bakama bɛfɔl ka Cross.”
Ɔzzánga bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews baffu badudda ka ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ka ugala Caiaphas, Uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang.
Batini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaang bakaa Jesus ka wɛɛk bamii bawwɔɔl.
Balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaangyɔngkwɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ kazzi; nzang balɔɔt vvenɛ bàllù.”
Ka Jesus ulenɛ ka ssala Simon wa ɔffaal ɔnaangmɛnɛ, wa ullunɛ ka Bethany,
wanavva ussi bakang la bilim a bannɛ ba bakkaamnɛ kappya uffu. Usikili ɔllɔt Jesus ka lɛttɔ, ka ulenɛ baang ka kazzi.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bayɛnnɛ ning baang, kutunbɛ babap battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abɛpɛ bannɛ ’bɔng mung gbɔɔ ning baang?
Tɛ nzang asam bannɛ ’bɔng baang ataan ka ikkpoko ggbadam annyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.”
Jesus uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔttɛ, “Akatayɔng wanavva ’wɔng baang kɔlɔɔk kwabɔng? Ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ lɔyyɛɛp bbit, unnyinɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ale aleyɔng mung la balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, ɔzzànga anaam la annyɔɔng baala nle ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Kɛllɔt a bannɛ sa ɔllɔtnɛnɛ mung, ɔlɔngɔlɔnɛ kkwɔɔt ɔkat kɛtɔm-a-kullu anaam.
Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ! Ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi ya bale bakopolo lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ bakke kwa wanavva ’wɔng mung babwɔɔlɔ kwa ɔnaangnɛ.”
Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Judas Iscariot ufeele umii ka ɛfɛɛn a bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
Ɔttɛ, “Ale annyinɛyɔng ’bɔng usseke nkaa Jesus nfeewɔyɔng?” Ɔzzánga bakkwoon lɔlɔp la Naira zzɔɔp, batɔk bannyimɛ.
Judas ussi ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔggyan ɛtɔk ya ɔfɛɛtnɛ Jesus unnyibɛ bakaa.
Ka ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk a kɛtɔm sa banaangnɛ kazzi kwa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffu babapmɛ battɛ, “Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kwa annɔ ibama ilokowɔ ka yang!”

Jesus ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, ka ssala ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔk, abwɔɔlɔmɛyɔng attɛyɔng, ‘Ukopolo-lukopolo ɔttɛ, Ɛkɛtɛ ammɛ ɛffɔbong, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ la ammɛ biini vvenɛ bazzi Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ka ssala annɔ.’ ”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus banaang ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ. Banaang Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ’kwɔng baang.
Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu bataa bazzi kazzi ’kwɔng baang.
Bale baang ka kazzi: Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ule mung wa ule ka uzzinɛ issɛ anaam.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ luppyam lɔzzabɛ. Basikili babapmɛ la vvɔn la vvɔn battɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn anaam lissi ka akkwɔɔnɛ ɔɔ, Uyini?”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa iddɔknɛ ulɔlɔ vvɔn la anaam, ule ka uzzinɛ issɛ anaam.

Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ubbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ ubbe. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛnɛ issɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama wa ɔsaknɛ. Kɔdɔkɔ kɔyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang businɛ kɛfal liffu!”
Judas, uzzi-issɛ a Jesus, ufeele ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn akkwɔɔnɛ anaam ɔɔ Uyini?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alɔɔknɛ ning.”
Badɔkɔ baang ka kizzi kazzi, Jesus ɔsam brɛɛd; ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm a luwomo; ɔlɔmnɛ ɔbbɔk ɔtan balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Atɔk azziyɔng, ’wɔng ulenɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam.”
Ɔsam ommonggo, ɔzɔnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔsam unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Avvayɔng, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng.
Uwɔng ulenɛ linnyi anaam sa lilenɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Linnyi sa littanɛnɛ ka lɛttɔ kɛsɔɔk a bubbi balɔɔt ggbadam.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ batak ba nbɛlɛ lɛvva tɔttɔt ɔffɔ kɛtɔm sa nle nvva ufaa abbɛ la annyɔɔng ka Itutum a Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Bavvenɛ basoom kisoom bagbata bamii ka libat a lɛttaal Olives.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ amma akɔngɔnɛyɔng nsseke kɛyɔɔng. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔwwɔɔl ɔkat-itɔɔn, itɔɔn ikyakyama.’
Ɔzzànga nlenɛ lifungala ka lubbe vvenɛ nkɔɔm ɛtɔk nmii Galilee.”
Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Baala nmma nkɔngɔwɔ, mkkpa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bamma!”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Akke tɛ! Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl kɛtɔm-a-mmwɔɔn, vvenɛ akalanɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat; attɛ, nɛ ba asan.”
Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Baala nttɛ wɔ ba nsan mkkpa ndɔk ule kibbe la annɔ.” Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bassɛ balɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Peter ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Jesus ufeele la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ umii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛzzanganɛ Gethsemane. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ataayɔng mung; anaam nmii kang, nssɛɛn luzɔɔm.”
Ɔsam Peter la bwaan a Zebedee baffa, ɔkɔɔm umii. Bukee la akama bunaangmɛ.
Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bukee buttalanɛbong ka luppyam naanga buwwɔɔlnɛ. Abeeyɔng mung ikatyɔng.”

Uzuma ssup umii ka lusso, ɔmɛkɛlɛ ɔttɔ, ukun laddu, ugupu lusso ka lisse, ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Dedde, kulenɛ bbwak, asam ommonggo ’wɔng mung assekenɛ, ɔzzànga ba nggyan nttɛ nnaang kwa anaam nggyannɛ, nggyan nttɛ nnaang kwa annɔ aggyannɛ.”

Uvvenɛ; ɔppyɛlɛ, uffu ukup balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng baang bakkyaat, ɔyɛnbɛ ka bilaa. Ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Bɔng bunaangwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng balɔɔt bakkyaat asiyɔng likkwoong ataayɔng kwetkwet, akatyɔng akalangka vvɔn?
Akat, akɔɔm, azɔɔmyɔng, nkwaaning basi likkwoong bafɛɛtwɔyɔng bassɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk. Luttina lulewɔyɔng baang; ɔzzànga kkwɔɔt limɛɛmwɔyɔngbong.”
Jesus ɔbbal lifeele umii luzɔɔm ka bikkpit bɛffa. Ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Dedde anaam, attɛnɛ, ommonggo ’wɔng baala asam assekenɛ ntakabong nvva ka ammɛ, nyilabong; kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ.”
Ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbbal liffu, ɔyɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka bilaa. Ba bakkwoong bataa kwetkwet.
Jesus ɔbbal lɛgbata, ɔkɔngɔbɛ; umii ɔzɔɔm ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat. Ɔzɔɔm kɛssanga ssɔn baang.

Ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Atiiyɔng ka bilaa ’pyɔng ɔɔ? Ppyɛɛkyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya bale ka basamnɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ; bamii, bannyi banaang-a-bubbi.
Afeele imiiyɔng, ɔlɔɔt wa ule ka uzzinɛ issɛ anaam utii mung.”

Jesus utii baang ka kɛlɔɔk; Judas, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ vvɔn, utuma. Ɔdɔkɔ la kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam. Badɔkɔ la iggɛ la ikkpong ka bakɔɔmnɛ. Bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews batɔɔmnɛbɛ.
Uzzi-issɛ ɔyɔɔbong kɛkaan ’sɔng baang eleme ya ule ɔnaang basan ɔlɔɔt wa baggyannɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa nle ka ngbugbamɛnɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa aggyannɛyɔng. Akaamɛyɔng!”
Judas utumanɛ, ɔsak ssɔng, umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Ugbugbamɛ, ɔttɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annɔ Ukopolo-lukopolo.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkaamwɔ, ɛnngwa anaam.” Ɔzzánga baffu bakaa Jesus balɔmnɛ kkpɔk.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang la Jesus uttulu ogge, ɔsanga, ɔkkwɛɛ kɔtɔɔk ubili wa Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ɔzza.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Sam ogge annɔ assɛɛn ka uffɔ, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ogge, ullu kullu, ule ubbe lubbe ogge.
Ba asan attɛ nkkwoong mung nkkwɔɔ Dedde nttɛ ɔyaamnɛ ɔɔ? Nkkwɔɔmɛnɛ nttɛ ɔyaamnɛ, vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm innɔ innɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ufeenɛ ɔɔ?
Kulenɛ ning baang kule kɔnaang nang kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ kɔnaang ning baang.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk ka kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔmyɔng igge la ikkpong affunɛyɔng kɛkaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛzzɔɔk ɔɔ? Kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ntaa baang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkopolo, ɔzzànga nɛyɔng ba akaayɔng.
Mbyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaang nkwaaning kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkpɔknɛ ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.” Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bamma bakɔngɔmɛ.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakaanɛ Jesus, basammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Caiaphas, Uzzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang, ka ɛfɛɛn a bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bagɛlɛnya baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn.
Peter ufeele ukup Jesus tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka ɔdda kɛkaal ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm. Umii ɔtaa ka ssala kɛkaal la bakat-ɛfɛɛn; ɔttɛ ɔyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule kule.
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la ikkansulu ɔkkpɛlɛ babum kɛggyan ɛtɔk ya bale bakkala lɛlaak batum Jesus, nkwaaning bakaamɛ bamii bawwɔɔl.
Keem ɛtɔk basi lɛyɛn. Uvve balɔɔt ppwap bakkala lalaak batummɛ. Ka lakuma balɔɔt baffa batta babee ka lusso
battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ ammɛ ukkwoong mung utut Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung ɔzzɔɔk, ɔzzànga ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbɔɔkgwɛ lɔsaal.”
Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ufeele ubee-ubee ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ayanga mung kɛppyɛlɛ kamma atum lilɔɔk sa balɔɔknɛ batumwɔ mung ɔɔ?”

Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔtaa zzum. Uzzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ufeele ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ka lɛkɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm-a-Kuddu, nggyan nttɛ ayim gedegede mung abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ?”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Alɔɔkbong ning baang, ɔzzánga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ka ussinɛ mmwɔɔn umii ka lusso, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɔtaanɛ ka lufɔɔm ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ uffu la ikkpálá ka libat.”

Nkwɔng kutun Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ɔlɔm iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔyaak ɔttɛ, “Jesus ɔkkalabong lɛlaak utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ittɛɛsɛ ilɔk ba ibɛlɛ lɛggyan ka lɔkkwɔɔn kɔttɛ appyeeyɔngbong babbu lammwɔɔl za ɔlɔɔknɛ baang.
Attinayɔng nang?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Iwwɔɔlmɛ kɔbbɔlmɛbong.”
Bakwula libaak ballɔtmɛ ka lusso, bakɔɔm batupmɛ. Balɔɔt ba batupmɛnɛ labut
balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Ayɛnyɛlɛ biyɛnɛ, Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ! Attina ɔlɔɔt wa utupwɔnɛ.”

Peter ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ ka vveeng ka ssala sa bakaalnɛ kɛkaal. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang waanawanavva wa ulenɛ bɔɔyi Uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ɔgbaa assɛ ale la Jesus wa Galilee.”
Ɔzzánga Peter ɔkala ka lusso abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam ba nsan bwa alɔɔknɛ atumyɔng.”
Ɔtta ɔssɛ umii ka lɛmma kikkwu. Wanawanavva ɔlɔk, wa ulenɛ bɔɔyi, ɔbbalmɛ lɛyɛn. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba babeenɛ baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔdɔkɔ la Jesus wa ussinɛ Nazareth.”
Peter ɔbbal lɛkala ɔttɛ, “Nyimbong nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ba nsan.”

Waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ɔsaknɛ, balɔɔt ba babeenɛ baang baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter, battɛ, “Mkkpa alɔɔk, alɔɔk gbɔɔ, isan lɔsan ittɛ annɔ ale ka likup. Kwa kɔnaangnɛ isan kussi ka ɛtɔk ya annyinɛ kamma kɛkaal annɔ.”
Ɔzzánga ɔbbal liyim ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛ akama nsinɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn lɛlɔɔk. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ba nsan.” Eseese balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl.
Peter ukke kwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ́ttɛ́ balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl, vvenɛ akalanɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat attɛ, nɛ ba asan.” Ɔzzánga Peter ɔtta ka vveeng ɔkkwa kɔssɔpmɛ.
Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm, bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews banaang likup za kɛwwɔɔl a Jesus.
Bassɛɛnmɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ka labɔɔk, basammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Pilate, Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome.
Judas, wa uzzinɛ Jesus issɛ, ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ bazzabong kɛkaal a Jesus, battɛ ubbe, ɔnaang busannɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔsam lɔlɔp la Naira zzɔɔp, ufee bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya ɔttɛ,
“Nnaangbong bubbi ka nzzinɛ issɛ ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛkwɛ lɛsan, bale ka bawwɔɔlmɛnɛ.” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Ngkka ’kwɔng baang kule la ayyɔɔt ɔɔ? Uwɔng baang kɔlɔɔk annɔ”
Judas ɔsam ikkpoko ɔllɔt ka ɛfɛɛn a Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ baang umii uzzenge.

Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm battɔng ikkpoko ’yɔng baang battɛ, “Ikkpoko ’yɔng mung, ikkpoko-linnyi. Ɔzzànga mung ule lafɔɔ ka ayyɔɔt kɛsam ikkpoko ’yɔng mung kimii kɛssɛɛn ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la ya ilenɛ ka libɔngɔlɔ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Balenɛ lɛlɔɔk kɔkaatbɛ, bakɔɔm ikkpoko ’yɔng baang balɛɛp ɛkpansi Ɔfaak-ikkpo ya bale balli ikanakana.
Kwakkwɛ baang bakkwɔɔnɛ ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang “Ɛkpansi-Linnyi” pyip ka mmwɔɔn mung.

Kɔlɔɔk kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Jeremiah ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔnaangbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Jeremiah ɔkkpɔk ɔttɛ, “Basam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang ya balɔɔt a Israel balenɛ kamma liyila battɛ vvenɛ bannyimɛ.
Bakɔɔmyɛ balɛɛp ɛkpansi Ɔfaak-ikkpo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ebinukkpaapi ɛggyannɛ ɛttɛ nnaang.”
Jesus ubee ka lusso uzzilɛttɔ lusse; ɔbapmɛ ibap. Ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ ubeet a Jews ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alɔɔknɛ.”
Kɔlɔk usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛlɔɔk utum kibbi sa bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya bannyimɛnɛ. Ɔzzańga Pilate ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ,
“Appyee mung lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ sa bakatawɔnɛ ɔɔ?”
Jesus ufim lɛmmwɔɔl zzɔn gbɔɔ kɛzza. Uzzilɛttɔ lusse kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ.
Ka kɛtɔm a Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ la kkwɔn, uzzilɛttɔ lusse ɔyanga lakke za kɛsanga ɔlɔɔt duu wa kibbi kɛggyannɛ kɛttɛ ɔsangamɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka igbakkɔpɔ wa basanmɛnɛ gaang gaang. Ɔ̀zzànga Jesus Barabbas.
Keem balɔɔt baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, Pilate ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyan attɛyɔng nsanga nyinɔɔng ka igbakkɔpɔ nnyiwɔyɔng; Jesus Barabbas faa Jesus wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Christ?”
Ɔggba lɛsan ɔttɛ, bakɔɔm Jesus, bafeemɛ ka banaangnɛ Jesus luleep.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Pilate ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɔdda kɛkaal ka ɔtaanɛ, wanavva ammɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaang kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang tɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kwɛ ba ɔsan tɛ. Nlakala kɛtɔm ka nyɛnnɛ akama gaang gaang ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng wa usinɛkwɛ lɛsan.”
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya badda kibbi ’sɔng baang battɛ babwɔɔlɔ Pilate ɔkkyaa Barabbas ka igbakkɔpɔ ɔfɔngɔ, bawwɔɔl Jesus.
Ɔzzánga uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi ’wɔng baang ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung kwa balɔɔt ba baffa ’bɔng bɛɛ, nyinɔɔng ulenɛ wa nle nsanga ka igbakkɔpɔ ee?” Abbɛ battɛ “Barabbas”.
Pilate ɔbapnɛbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ngkka nle nnaang nang la Jesus wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Christ?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Kamamɛ bɛfɔl, akaka ka Cross.”
Pilate ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ule bɔkkakkwɛ lɛnaang kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ?” Abbɛ babungu bagaga battɛ, “Akamamɛ bɛfɔl, akaka ka Cross.”

Pilate, ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, ɔttɛ ba kɔbɛlɛ lile kwa kɛbbal bɛkaal lɛtta, nzang vvenɛ kullu kɔttɔ kwa lɛbaang; ɔsam bannyi, uyila labɔɔk ka lusso kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Kɔbɔɔk anaam ba kule ka kɛwwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng, nkwɔng baang kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng.”
Kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Afɔngɔ akama lubbe ammɛ ukupyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt la bwɔɔn ayyɔɔt!”
Pilate ɔsanga Barabbas ka igbakkɔpɔ. Ɔsam Jesus, unnyibɛ, batup, bamii bakama bɛfɔl, bakaka ka Cross.
Ɔzzánga isodya Pilate basam Jesus bamii, ka ugala Uzzilɛttɔ-lusse abbɛ. Ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛkaan ssɔn baang baggba bakkpitmɛ.
Baggbolomɛ iwɔkɔlɔ, basam ukolo-uwɔkɔlɔ bawɔkɔlɔmɛ.
Banaang kɛttɔpɔ bizze-bizze, battɔpɔmɛ ka lɛttɔ. Bazza lukut bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔbɔɔkɛlaabɔɔk. Bakunmɛ laddu ka lusso, banyɔɔkamɛ battɛ, “Mgbeede, ubeet a Jews.”
Bakwula libbaak bavvoongmɛ ka lusso, batɔk lukut batupmɛ ka lɛttɔ.
Balemɛnɛ livve lɛnyɔɔka; balɔm uwɔkɔlɔ wa bawɔkɔlɔmɛnɛ, baggbolo. Basam iwɔkɔlɔ ya ammɛ biini bawɔkɔlɔmɛ. Basammɛ bamii kɛwwɔɔl ka Cross.
Ka balenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii, baduda ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ussinɛ Cyrene wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon. Batutmɛ battɛ ɔtɔkɔ Cross a Jesus.
Baffu baffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ya bakkwwɔɔnɛyɛ Golgotha, ning baang ulenɛ “Ɛfɛɛn a Ukɔɔk-a-lɛttɔ.”
Baffɔnɛ baang bannyimɛ batak ba banɔknɛbɛ la bilɔlɔ battɛ ɔvva. Ɔllɛnɛ, ufim kɛvva.
Bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka Cross. Basam iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ batta illɔ babɛngɛlɛ abbabbɛ.
Balenɛ ’kwɔng baang livve bataa-ɔtaa bakatmɛ.
Bakkpɔk lilɔɔk sa babilimɛnɛ ka libat a lɛttɔ ammɛ battɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ Jesus, Ubeet a Jews.”
Bakama babbyap baffa baang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la Jesus. Vvɔn ka kufoom kwa ɛlaabɔɔk, wa vvɔn ka kufoom ɛbyakɔm.
Balɔɔt basaknɛ baang bammyang lattɔ banɔk Jesus battɛ,
“Attɛ annɔ vvenɛ atut Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, azzɔɔk, appyɛlɛgwɛ abɔɔk ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat! Akkwoongnɛ, akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng tɛ! Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asini ka libat a Cross!”
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ, la bagɛlɛnya bassɛ banyɔɔkamɛ battɛ,
“Ɔkkala balɔk, ɔzzànga ammɛ biini ba ukkwoong ɔkkala. Ammɛ lissi ulenɛ ubeet a Israel ɔɔ? Ukkwoongnɛ usini ka Cross gedegede mung, iyila kwa ammɛ.
Uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɔyyɛɛp mung, ifɔngɔ iyɛnyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ka ɔkkalamɛnɛ gedegede mung!”
Gɔɔ babbyap ba bazzengenɛbɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la ammɛ bassɛ banyɔɔkamɛ ning baang.
Ɔffɔnɛ kikoon, ɛfɛɛn esikili kɛtɔm tɔttɔt uddum ikalangka ikkyaat.
Ɔffɔnɛ ikalangka ikkyaat, Jesus ɔfaka lɛmmwɔɔl a kullu ɔttɛ, “Ɛli, Ɛli, lama sabachthani?” Ning baang ulenɛ “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam, mbɔng ammanɛ akɔngɔnɛ?”
Balɔɔt balɔk ba babeenɛ baang bappyeemɛ ka ɔkkwanɛ battɛ, “Ule ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ Elijah!”
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔmmɛ eseese ɔsam okkokkya, ɔssɛɛn ka batak, ɔkpaka ka bissɛ, ububumɛ kinnyi ɔvva.
Balɔɔt balɔk, battɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔngbong iyɛnyɔng vvenɛ Elijah ule ka uffunɛ, ɔkkalamɛ nsan!”
Jesus ɔbbal lɛmmwɔɔl a kullu lɛfaka, lɛfɛkɛlɛ lɛzzamɛ.
Ɔzzánga ubba wa ulenɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfaka bɛfaak bɛffa ka ussinɛ ka libat ɔffɔ ka kuttɔɔk. Ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ, ikpana ibbum.
Lalli lawongolo, balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ggbadam ba baggbanɛ libbe, bafungala bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu.
Bagbata basseke lalli. Jesus ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, bamii ka Jerusalem ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ggbadam bayɛnnɛbɛ.
Uzzilɛttɔ-isodya, la bakat-ɛfɛɛn ba bakatnɛ Jesus, bayɛnnɛ kɛnnyɛkɛ sa ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛnɛ la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛnaangnɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang battɛ, “Uwɔng Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn!”
Bwanavva badɔkɔ baang ggbadam ka babeenɛ fulufulu bappyɛɛk. Abbɛ bassinɛ Galilee bakup Jesus bakɔɔm bayaammɛ.
Badɔkɔ Mary Magdalene, la Mary, abakka James la Joseph, la abakka bwaan a Zebedee.
Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, ɔbbɔssɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ Arimathea uffu, ɔzzànga Joseph. Ammɛ ngbaa ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus.
Ɔzzánga umii ɔbap Pilate ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔmɛ ɔsam Jesus, umii ulli. Keem Pilate unnyi kɔsap ɔttɛ; basam Jesus, bannyi Joseph ulli.
Ɔzzánga Joseph ɔsam Jesus, ɔgbbɔ ka ufaa ubba.
Ɔsam umii uloko ka lilli ammɛ sa ussumanɛ lɛtɔɔk ka lufoom akpana. Ɔssang lɛttaal, ugupu ka kamma lilli, ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ.
Mary Magdalene la Mary wa vvɔn badɔkɔ baang ka bataanɛ bakat lilli.
Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo Livve-kɛfɛkɛlɛ, bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la balɔɔt a Pharisees bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Pilate
battɛ, “Dedde, ikkebong ka ɔkkala lɛlaak ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔknɛ ka utiinɛ ikokolo, ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ nfungala ka lubbe ka bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat!’

Annyi lakke ɔlɔk lilli ’zɔng baang lile la kɛkat doddo tɔttɔt ɔffɔ bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat; tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii bayipmɛ; battɛ ‘Ufungalabong ka lubbe.’ Nzang usseke-isimi lɛlaak ’zɔng mung vvenɛ lɛbbɔl lɛtta ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk.”
Pilate ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Amii akatyɔng lilli tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwoongnɛyɔng!”
Ɔzzánga bagbata bamii basal lilli doddo la lattaal; basanga bakat-ɛfɛɛn, bataa baang ɔkat.
Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kilenɛ lɛsak, uffu ɔffɔ lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a livve luzɔɔm, Mary Magdalene la Mary ɔlɔk, bafeele bamii kikoolo lilli.
Kitipili kitipili, ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ, uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ebinukkpaapi ussi ka libat uffu, utut lɛttaal, uloko kang. Kyɛk ɔtaa-ɔtaa ka libat azzɛ.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ immwalang. Iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ilaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwuu.
Bakat-ɛfɛɛn ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, baffula, basseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babbu.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la bwanavva ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng! Nsan lɔsan nttɛ aleyɔng ka kɛggyan a Jesus wa bawwɔɔlnɛ ka Cross.
Mung ba ule; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ. Affu ayɛnyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a umininɛ.

Azzuma amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ attɛyɔng; ‘Ufungalabong ka lubbe ɔzzànga gedegede mung ule ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ɔssɛ umii Galilee. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang, vvenɛ ayɛnmɛyɔng!’ Akke kwa nlewɔnɛyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ tɛ.”
Ɔzzánga bagbata la lazzuma la lazzuma la bbwɔp la laggele, bamma bamii babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus.
Kitipili kitipili Jesus ududabɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annyɔɔng!” Ɔzzánga baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ bakunmɛ laddu, balɔmmɛ ka bukkpɔ, banaangmɛ latele.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng ikpana anaam attɛyɔng; bamii Galilee, vvenɛ bayɛnnɛ bakang.”

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bwanavva ’bɔng baang bagbatanɛ bamii kufoom kwa abbɛ, bakat-ɛfɛɛn ba bakatnɛ lilli bappyɛlɛ isimisimi, bamii tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, babwɔɔlɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa lilenɛ lɛnaang.
Bazzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm baduda la bagɛlɛnya, banaang likup, bannyi isodya ikkpoko ggbadam.
Battɛ, “Alɔɔk attɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffubong ka kasɛkɛ kɛtɔm, bayipmɛ ka ilenɛ ka bilaa.”
Ɔzzànga Uzzilɛttɔ-lusse uppyeenɛ ’kwɔng vvenɛ ilɔɔk ibutmɛ luttina. Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa kule kɔnaangwɔyɔng, baala kule.”
Abbɛ bakat-ɛfɛɛn basam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang, bamii banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ battɛ banaang. Balɔɔt a Jews batii ka balɔɔknɛ ning baang gbaak ka mmwɔɔn mung.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppavvɔn bamii ka libat ekpok ka Galilee ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ulenɛbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ vvenɛ bamii.
Bayɛnnɛ Jesus bakunmɛ laddu bannyimɛ latele, ɔzzànga balɔk badɔkɔ la ndeeta.
Jesus ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛ ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbong lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi.
Amiiyɔng ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn, anaangyɔngbɛ basseke balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam; anaangyɔngbɛ baptizim ka lɛkɔɔl a Dedde la Waan la Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Akopoloyɔngbɛ, batele bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng. Akkeyɔng nle nle baang la annyɔɔng tɔttɔt ɛkpansi ekpeke.”
Uwɔng ulenɛ Kuttu-budoddo a Jesus Christ, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kussi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔkkpɔknɛ, ɔttɛ: “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ ntɔɔm ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk anaam, wa ule ɔkɔɔm ɔssɛ ɔkɔngɔwɔyɔng ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔbama ɛtɔk ulokowɔ.’
Ɔlɔɔt ule baang ka kɛmat ka ɔgaganɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Alɔngɔlɔyɔng ɛtɔk alokoyɔng Uyini. Anaangyɔng ɛtɔk bit alokomɛyɔng ɔssɛ!’ ”

Ɔzzánga John utuma ka kɛmat ɔnaang balɔɔt baptizim la bannyi. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ɔttɛ, “Afanyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng isimi, banaangwɔyɔng baptizim. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng.”
Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bassinɛ Judea la ubeet a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang za lɛzzanganɛ Jerusalem bamii bagɔpɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk kwa John ɔlɔɔknɛ. Bayila kamma bubbi abbɛ. Ammɛ ɔnaangbɛ baptizim ka lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan.
John ɔdɔkɔ ɔwɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ ya banaangnɛyɛ la issɔp-ɛsɛɛn. Ɔggbɔ ɛkkpa ya banaangnɛyɛ la ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ka kɛsan. Kazzi ammɛ ulenɛ ogelese la itɔngɔtɔngɔ.
Ɔyaam ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ka uffunɛ ukupnɛ ɔttanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge ka itɔk itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Anaam gɔɔ ba nkkɔnɔ nakanaka wa nkkyaamɛnɛ ikkpabukkpɔ.
Anaam nnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la bannyi, ɔzzànga ammɛ ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Usi lɛmmɛ, Jesus ussi Galilee ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Nazareth uffu. John ɔnaangmɛ baptizim baang ka lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan.
Eseese Jesus ɔttanɛ ka bannyi, ɔyɛn libat ka liwongolonɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kusininɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lekkpelekete kuvvoongmɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka libat lɛttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan a luppyam anaam, asaapnɛ gaang gaang.”
Usi lɛmmɛ, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔmanamɛ, umii ka kɛmat.
Ɔtaa bakang ka lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa. Satan ɔllɛmɛ. Isɛɛn a kɛmat idɔkɔ baang mgbaa. Keem bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu battelemɛ.
Bassɛɛnnɛ John mgbakkɔpɔ, Jesus umii Galilee, ɔbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ɛffɔbong! Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ. akkyaa bubbi annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng, appyɛɛ ayilayɔng kwa Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee, ɔyɛn balap a isɛɛnabannyi baffa, Simon la etele ammɛ Andrew, ka balenɛ ka kɛkaa isɛɛnabannyi la kuggbɔ.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛyɔng. Vvenɛ nkopolowɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale akaayɔng balɔɔt afeeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Eseese, bakkyaa liggbɔ abbɛ bafɔngɔ, bakupmɛ.
Umiinɛ ssup ka lusso, ɔyɛn etele la etele, balɔɔt baffa, James la John, bwaan a Zebedee. Badɔkɔ ka kɛbama kuggbɔ kɛkat ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat wa abbɛ biini.
Jesus ɔyɛnbɛ ɛyɛn-ɛyɛn, ɔkkwɔɔbɛ. Bagbata bakɔngɔ abassɛ abbɛ, Zebedee, ka akkpaat la balɔɔt ammɛ, bamii bakup Jesus.
Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Capernaum. Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ sa ibaala, Jesus umii ɔmal ka ggwoon a mitin, ubeebɛ kikopolo eseese.
Balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lukopolo ’gwɔng baang, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka ukopolonɛ gbɔɔ bbwak bbwak. Usi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ likopolo. Lutini ’gwɔng, ɔdɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm lakke kizzi-lɛttɔ ammɛ biini ukopolo.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt ipiliza ɔmal ka ggwoon a mitin ’gwɔng baang. Ɔzzɔɔk kibungu ɔttɛ,
“Jesus, Waan a Nazareth, attina kɛnaangyɛlɛ nang? Mung affuyɛlɛ kɛbɛpɛ ɔɔ? Anaam nsanwɔ lɔsan; Annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ bubbi wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ!”
Jesus ɔkkpa apiliza ’wɔng baang kiwele ɔttɛ, “Ataa zzum, atta asseke ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng!”
Apiliza ɔnaangmɛ uffula ɔkɔɔm ubungu gaang gaang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔttamɛ ka kkwɔɔt.

Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔkɛɛlɛ balɔɔt gaang gaang. Bappyɛɛ basikili balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ’bɔng? Uwɔng ufaa lukopolo ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔyanga lakke za ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyi ipiliza, ipiliza innyimɛ latele!”
Ɔzzánga kuttu a Jesus kɔwaala ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi a Galilee.
Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la James la John, bagbata ka ggwoon a mitin bamii ssɔng ssala Simon la Andrew.
Abakka wanavva Simon ɔdɔkɔ ka kisi-ɛppwa. Jesus ɔffɔnɛ, ɛffɔ ɛffɔ, batɔk ’kwɔng baang babwɔɔlɔmɛ.
Jesus umii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ufeele. Ɔppwamɛ eseese, ɔnaang kazzi unnyibɛ.
Ɔffɔnɛ kulele ka livve lilenɛ lipiti, bakɔɔm balɔɔt iffaak ɔkkpɛlɛ la balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ ipiliza baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
Balɔɔt a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang baffu babbi ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lusso a ggwoon.
Jesus uttula balɔɔt ba ɔffaaknɛbɛ bɛssanga iffaak ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔggba ipiliza ɔfɔngɔ kang. Gɔɔ usi ipiliza lɛfɔngɔ izza lɛmmwɔɔl ka ilemɛnɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ.
Libbessolo, kɛtɔm-a-kɛtɔm, Jesus ufeele ɔtta ka ggwoon. Ɔgbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang umii ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm ka ɛfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt usinɛ lile.
Ɔzzánga Simon la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamiimɛ kɛggyan.
Bayɛnmɛnɛ, battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ulewɔ ka kɛggyan.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ imiiyɔng lusso lusso ka laffɛ lalɔk za ballunɛ bakkpit mung. Nggyan kimii nkopolo ka laffɛ ’zɔng bakang ɔgbaa, mung nffu kwakkwɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssɛ ukkpit ɛkpansi Galilee. Ukopolo ka idda mitin, ɔkɔɔm ɔggba ipiliza ɔfɔngɔ kang.
Ɔlɔɔt wa lassɔp za bbɔl bbɔl lanaangmɛnɛ uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Ukun laddu ukkpenge Jesus ɔttɛ uttelemɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapwɔnɛ, anaangnɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
Bibbe Jesus lɛttɔ, ɔtɔnɔ kɔbɔɔk usingimɛ. Ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapnɛ mung, ɔppwawɔ.”
Ɔffaal ɔsaal ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, ɔppwamɛ eseese.
Jesus ɔttamamɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ uvve tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔttɛmɛ ɔgbata ka ulemɛnɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ,

“Gɔpɔlɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk atum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng tɛ. Ɔzzànga amii ssɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔppyɛɛkwɔ; anaang lɛtɔm za Moses ɔttɛnɛ anaangyɔng nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔppwawɔbong baning.”

Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbatanɛ, ɔkɔɔm kuttu ’kwɔng baang umii ifɛɛn ifɛɛn. Ɔsak lɛbala, Jesus usi lɛbɛlɛ limii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt kkyaakkyaa. Lutini ’gwɔng ɔdɔkɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔggyan ɛfɛɛn a kɛyɔɔng a kɛyɔɔng ɔtaa, balɔɔt bassi ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu bakupmɛ.
Bwaan a bɛtɔm biffu bɛsak, Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ umii Capernaum. Kuttu kwa ulenɛ ka ssala lile kumii eseese.
Balɔɔt baffu babbi baang ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon ɛfɛɛn ɛsɛlɛ, gɔɔ kufuk ka lusso lɛmma ggwoon kusi lɛbɛlɛ lile. Jesus ɔdɔkɔbɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
ka balɔɔt banna ba batɔkɔnɛ ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus baffɔnɛ.

Ka kibbi kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, basi likkwoong basak la ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ’wɔng baang ssɔng baffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Ɔzzánga battɔ lɛmma ka libat a ggwoon bbwak ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ulenɛ. Lɛmma lilenɛ liggbenge, bassɛ baang basinimɛ bawulu ka ewula bbwak ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kiyila kɛttalanɛbɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam, nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ.”
Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba bataanɛ baang battina ka tɔkɔlɔ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔbbɔ lissa ning, ɔlɔɔk bbɔl bbɔl utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?
Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔsɔɔk ɔlɔɔt bubbi ɔgbaa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule.”
Eseese, Jesus ɔsan bwa battinanɛ, ɔlɔɔk unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attinayɔng ning baang?
Mung kɔtta bbwɛt lile kɛttɛ, ‘Ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu, nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ!’ faa kɛttɛ, ‘Afeele, asam ewula annɔ, assɛ!’?
Vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyanga mung lakke ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung za kɛsɔɔk a bubbi.” Usikili ɔlɔɔk la ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ɔttɛ,
“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ, afeele asam ewula annɔ afula!”

Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ basseke ka bappyɛɛkmɛnɛ ggbeggbe, ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ’wɔng baang ufeele ɔsam ewula ammɛ uzzuma ɔgbata. Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ gaang gaang babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng ba itaka iyɛn kkpal!”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee. Balɔɔt ggbadam baffu babbi baang, ammɛ uttebɛ kikopolo.
Ɔssɛnɛ umii ka lusso, ɔyɛn ɔtɔkinnamba, waan Alphaeus wa ɔzzanganɛ Levi, ka ɔtaanɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon a kɛnaang ammɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk unnyimɛ, ɔttɛ, “Afeele akupnɛ!” Ammɛ Levi ufeele ukupmɛ.
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ka kazzi ka ssala Levi. Kɛkaan a batɔkinnamba la babɛpɛ-lafɔɔ kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kikupmɛnɛ. Balɔɔt a kɛkaan ’sɔng baang balɔk bamii batul kazzi la Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, bazzi.

Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk ba bazzanganɛ Pharisees bayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus la babɛpɛ-lafɔɔ la batɔkinnamba batulnɛ kazzi bazzi. Ɔzzánga babap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ uzzi kazzi la kɛssanga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang?”
Ɔzzánga Jesus uppyeenɛ, ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba ɔppwanɛbɛ, uttula-ittula ba baggyan, ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa baggyan mung. Mung balɔɔt a latele ba nffu nkkwɔɔ, nffu kɛkkwɔɔ babɛpɛ-lafɔɔ.”

Ɛkɛtɛ ya nnyɔn ɛdɔkɔ baang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, la balɔɔt a Pharisees bataanɛ buwɔɔng. Balɔɔt balɔk baffu babap Jesus battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, la ba Pharisees bataa buwɔɔng, usseke balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ basi buwɔɔng lɛtaa?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapwɔyɔng mung ka balɔɔt ba baffunɛ libbeel bafulanɛ la buwɔɔng ɔɔ? Maaye! Walam a wanavva ka ulenɛ baang la abbɛ, ning baang baala kule.
Ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ ele ka ɛffɔnɛ ya bale basam walam a wanavva bagbata bassekebɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɛffɔnɛ, vvenɛ bataa buwɔɔng.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsamnɛ kɛfaak ubba sa ufaa ɔsal lɛmma ɔtɔm uwɔkɔlɔ ba ule. Ɔzzànga ɔkaangnɛ ning baang tɔttɔt, ufaa kɛfaak ubba vvenɛ ɔnaang lɛmma za ɔtɔm uwɔkɔlɔ lɛggbam lɛgbaa.

Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔssɛɛnnɛ ufaa batak ka ɔtɔm ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ba ule. Ɔssɛɛnnɛ ning baang, batak vvenɛ bafɔl bayaak ɛssɔ. Batak la ɛssɔ bɛbɛpɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng, ufaa batak bassɛɛn ka ufaa ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn.”
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka kibwoto-isasa ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ badɔkɔ baang ka batɛngɛnɛ lasan-isasa bakkwɔlɔ ifɔɔk bassɛɛn ka eddu bazzi.
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Ppyɛɛk! Baang balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ babɛpɛbong lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt ka banaangnɛ ning baang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ tɛ!”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa David ɔnaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ya buwɔɔng busaapmɛnɛ ɔɔ? David la balɔɔt ammɛ badɔkɔ la kɛmɛɛm,

Ɔzzánga umii ɔmal ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam brɛɛd wa balokonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uzzi. Nkwɔng kɔnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ Abiathar ɔdɔkɔnɛ Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang. Ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lalɔɔknɛ, nzang bassɛɛn a luzɔɔm keem bazzinɛ brɛɛd ’wɔng baang kɔnaang bbwak. Ɔzzànga David uzzimɛ, gɔɔ ɔssɛ ɔbɛkɛ unnyi balɔɔt ammɛ.”
Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kwa budoddo ɔssɛbibit: Ɔssɛbibit kwa Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ba ɔlɔɔm.
Ning ulenɛ kɛttɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ Uyini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ gɔɔ gbaak la Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ umii ka ggwoon a mitin. Ɔlɔɔt a ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ɔdɔkɔ baang.
Balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ baang ba battɛnɛ bannyi Jesus kibbi battɛ ɔnaangbong bbɔlbbɔl. Keem basseke ka bakatnɛ Jesus ggbeggbe battɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ bayɛn vvenɛ uttula ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ nsan.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt wa ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Atta abee kaang ning ka lusso.”

Usikili ɔbap balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lattɛ inaang ’bɔng ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ? Lattɛ ittele balɔɔt faa lattɛ iddopobɛ? Lattɛ ikkala ɔlɔɔt faa lattɛ iwwɔɔlmɛ?” Lɛmmwɔɔl gbɔɔ basi lɛzza.

Keem Jesus ɔppyɛɛkbɛ ssii, kutunmɛ. Ɔzzànga babbemɛ mung lɛttɔ ka basinɛ kɔlɔɔk ka kɔtɔɔk lippyee bale lɛsɛpɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt a ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Atɔnɔ kɔbɔɔk.” Ammɛ ɔtɔnɔkwɛ, ɔppwamɛ eseese.
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees bagbata ka ggwoon a mitin eseese bamii bakup balɔɔt a Herod banaang likup battɛ bawwɔɔl Jesus.
Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata bamii ka libbwe a Galilee. Kɛkaan a balɔɔt kikupmɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk bassi Galilee, balɔk bassi Judea,

balɔk bassi Jerusalem, balɔk bassi ka ɛkpansi Idumea, balɔk bassi kukupa lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan gwa lɔppyɛɛknɛ lusso gwa livve-luwee lɛttanɛ, balɔk bassi ka ɛkpansi a Tyre la Sidon. Balɔɔt ’bɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ka bappyeenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔnaangnɛ.
Kibbi kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ baggyan akkpaat babama balokomɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffu batungalamɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi.
Uttulabong balɔɔt ggbadam ggbadam, keem balɔɔt iffaak ɔkkpɛlɛ batutala ɛtɔk ya kimii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus, ɔkkɔɔnɛ basingimɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ duu ya balɔɔt ipiliza bayɛnmɛnɛ, battɔ ka lisse babungu battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
Jesus ubee bbwak ɔkamala ipiliza ’yɔng baang ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaang basanmɛ.
Jesus ubbwulu libat a lɛttaal, ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ɔggyannɛ bakupmɛ. Baffunɛ bakupmɛ,
ɔsanga balɔɔt zzɔɔppabaffa ba ɔkɔlɔnɛbɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nsangawɔyɔngbong nttɛ, ataayɔng la anaam. Vvenɛ ntɔɔmwɔyɔng amii akopoloyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
ayangayɔng lakke za kɛggba ipiliza afɔngɔyɔng kang ɔgbaa.”
Balɔɔt ba zzɔɔppabaffa ba ɔsanganɛ badɔkɔnɛ: Simon (wa Jesus ɔkɔlɔmɛnɛ Peter);
James la etele ammɛ John, bwaan a Zebedee, (Jesus ɔkɔlɔbɛ Boanerges, ifɛɛt ilenɛ “Bwaan Àkkpála”);
La Andrew, la Philip, la Batholomew, la Matthew, la Thomas, la James waan Alphaeus, la Thaddaeus, la Simon wa lɔkaan ammɛ lɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang,
la Judas Iscariot wa uzzinɛ issɛ a Jesus.
Jesus ufula. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus la ammɛ biini basi kufuk lɛyɛn bazzi kazzi ɔssanga ka kibbi balɔɔt sa kɛbbalnɛ liffu kikkpitbe kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala.
Ikpana ammɛ bappyeenɛ ning baang, bafeele bamiimɛ kɛkat, ka bappyeenɛ balɔɔt balɔk ka battɛnɛ, “Ɔttɔbong bikun!”
Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk ba bassinɛ Jerusalem battɛ, “Ɔyanga Beelzebul ka kkwɔɔt! Gɔɔ baang Beelzebul, ubeet a babbukangmgbe unnyimɛnɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza kɛfɔngɔ kang.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔppyɛɛ utolo ka ifɛɛt ka ifɛɛt unnyibɛ: ɔttɛ, “Satan ule ɔnaang nang usikili ɔggba Satan?
Lɛffɛ za ballunɛ lakup lakup, lakup ’zɔng baang balenɛ ka lɛkɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nzang lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang lile ka libbwumnɛ.
Gɔɔ itutum ya itɔknɛyɛ kɛyɔɔng ibɛngɛlɛ, isseke ka kullu ɛkɛtɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nzang itutum ’yɔng baang ile ka ibbwumnɛ.
Ikɔɔlɔ ittɛ Itutum a Satan issekenɛ lakup lakup nzang baala ittumu, ile ka ibbwumnɛ ittɔ itaak.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔmal ka ggwoon ɔgabwɔ uyipmɛ bɛfɛɛn ba ule. Ɔzzànga ɔkaanɛ ɔgabwɔ ’wɔng baang ɔggbɔ izzi, tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk ukkwoong ɔmal ka ggwoon ɔssangmɛ bɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kkpelegedee nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt bubbi abbɛ la lutini bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ ka kamma.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bubbi utum Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mɛ baala ɔsɔɔk kkpong kkpong, ka ulenɛ bubbi bwa kɛfal a kɛfal lɛnaang.”
(Jesus ɔlɔɔk ning mung ka balɔɔt balɔk battɛnɛ, “Ule la apiliza ka kkwɔɔt.”)
Abakka Jesus la itele ammɛ ya bwaanbwalam batuma. Badɔkɔ bakɔɔng ka vveeng babee batɔɔm battɛ bakkwɔɔ Jesus bannyibɛ.
