Kibbi kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kɛtaanɛ kikkpit Jesus, ɔzzánga babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Yɛn, Ssakawɔ la itele annɔ bakang ka vveeng ka babeenɛ, baggyan battɛ bayɛnwɔ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɔɔng ulenɛ Ɛnɛ? Babang balenɛ itele anaam?”
Uyeek ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt ba bataanɛ baang bakkpitmɛ, ɔttɛ, “Yɛnyɔng Ɛnɛ la itele anaam mung!
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ulenɛ etele anaam, ule Ɛnɛ anaam.

Jesus ɔbbal likopolo ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee. Kibbi sa kɛtaanɛ kikkpitmɛ kɛsaknɛ lɛttala, ukut ufula ka akkpaat ɔppyɛɛ ɔtaa bakang. Akkpaat ɔdɔkɔ ka bannyi, balɔɔt bataa ka likum ka imakkpa bannyi.
Ɔdɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm ifɛɛt ifɛɛt ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ lilɔɔk utum bɛfɛɛn ppwap, ɔttɛ:
“Agɔpɔlɔyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ufeele umii kɛkɔɔn ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn.
Ɔmmyangnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang ka bɔtɔɔm, ifɔɔk ilɔk idɔkɔ ittɔ ka ɛtɔk. Bunɔɔn buttɔng ifɔɔk ’yɔng baang buzzi.
Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka bɛfaak ikpana, ka ɛfɛɛn a lisse lilenɛ gbɔɔ wekeweke. Imeet, ka ɛkpansi esinɛ lɛddɔng,
luwee lɔsanganɛ, lɔfɔɔp lasan ’zɔng baang. Ka iffaat isinɛ likkwoong immala imii ka tɔkɔlɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ, lasan ’zɔng baang za laffɔnɛ lameet, labbe.
Ifɔɔk ilɔk idɔkɔ ittɔ ka lifaat sa bizze-bizze. Bizze bɛmmalanɛ bɛkɔm lasan ’zɔng baang za lalenɛ limeet, lasi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong lawɔm.
Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo. Imeet lasan lammala lanaang bizza. Bizza bɛlɔk lɔlɔp la ifɔɔk zzɔɔp, bɛlɔk lalɔp ifɔɔk lakkyaat, bɛlɔk lalɔp ifɔɔk kubbwɔɔk.”
Ammɛ Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk a kippyee kɔlɔɔk!”
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔdɔkɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng, balɔɔt balɔk ba balenɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ bappyee kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu babapmɛ bwa ifɛɛt ya ɔssanɛ mung itumnɛ.
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong likup Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile bale bakɔɔm ifɛɛt bappyee bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ,

Ɔkkɔɔnɛ, ‘Bappyɛɛk balɔngɔlɔ bappyɛɛk, ɔzzànga tɔttɔt ba bayɛn; Bagɔpɔlɔ balɔngɔlɔ bagɔpɔlɔ, ba bakkwoong bappyee. Bayɛnnɛ, bappyee bagbaa nzang ippyam abbɛ vvenɛ isikili bappyee kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nzang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkbɛ bubbi abbɛ.’ ”
Keem Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung ba appyeeyɔng ɔɔ? Ngkka mung ale anaangyɔng nang vvenɛ appyeeyɔng ifɛɛt nnyɔn gbɔɔ?
Ɔkɔɔn-ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ɔkɔɔn lɛmmwɔɔl-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Balɔɔt balɔk bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya illɔtnɛ ɛtɔk ɛtɔk. Bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, eseese Satan umii ɔsamzɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ abbɛ.
Balɔɔt balɔk bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya illɔtnɛ ka bɛfaak ikpana. Bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batɔkzɛ ka laggele eseese baang,
ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ doddo bɛ ba lɛmal, gɔɔ mmɛmmɛ ba bakkwoong balokozɛ. Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kɔlɔɔk kuffunɛ, ɔlɔk bayɔɔ balɔɔt akama bakɔɔm bawwɔɔlbɛ kwa lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’zɔng baang, bakalaze eseese.
Balɔɔt balɔk bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya ɔkɔɔnnɛ ka lifaat sa bizze bizze. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bappyee mung lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ,
ɔzzànga bakeke kwa lafal abbɛ, la kusapa ikkpoko, la bɛssanga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya baggyannɛ. Mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ biffunɛ bigbepbɛ, basumala kwa lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzánga basibong lakkpo lɛwɔm.

Ɔzzànga balɔɔt balɔk bale bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya ɔkɔɔnnɛ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo. Bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl, bayila kwa azzɛ, bawɔm lakkpo: lɛsan lɛlɔk lɔlɔp la lakkpo zzɔɔp, lɛlɔk lalɔp a lakkpo lakkyaat, lɛlɔk lalɔp a lakkpo kubbwɔɔk.”
Jesus ɔbbalbɛ litolo unnyi ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa uyengenɛ otinika ɔssɛɛn ka bɔfɛɛn bwa ddɔng ɔlɔk ɔsam ulup ka tɔkɔlɔ igolo ɔɔ? Lissi ka ɔsamnɛ ɔkpaka ka lɛkpaka otinika ɔɔ?
Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa balupnɛ, vvenɛ basangabwɛ batta ka vveeng. Gɔɔ bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bavvoongnɛ kpilikpip, vvenɛ bawongolobwɛ.
Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng!”

Ɔssɛ ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung unnyibɛ ɔgbaa, ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk duu kwa appyeenɛyɔng doddo! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkɔɔm Lafɔɔ za akɔɔmnɛyɔng azzayɔng kɛkaal a balɔɔt balɔk, unnyiwɔyɔng kibbi, gɔɔ vvenɛ kule kɔttɔmɛ ammɛ litun.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn, vvenɛ bagbaamɛ, wa usinɛ nakanaka lɛyanga, gɔɔ waan ezuku ya ɔffɔnɛ ɔyanga, vvenɛ bakup baang bannaa.”
Jesus ɔbbalbɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng lɛssa ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng mung. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ufeele umii kɛmmyang ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ka bɔtɔɔm.
Kɛtɔm, ɔlaa; kikoon, ssii ba ɔtaa. Ning baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang ile baang ka immalanɛ. Gɔɔ ammɛ biini ba ɔsan bwa bunaangnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang imeet tɛ́ttɛ́ immala.
Ɛkpansi biini ɛnaangnɛ lasan a bɛfɛɛn lammala, lawɔm lakkpo. Bimeetnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, bɛfɔɔk, bɛwɔm lakkpo bɛnaang ifɔɔk.
Lakkpo lakootnɛ, ka ɛkɛtɛ liyaat uyini umii ɔffazɛ.”
Jesus ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung ile ilɔɔk ittɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile nang? Mung ile issa ifɛɛt ’yɔyɔng ya ile ibwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ilenɛ.
Ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale ka appyeenɛyɔng mung. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔsam ɛfɔɔk a kɛssɛ ya ɛttanɛ lissup ɔkkpɛlɛ a vveengodde ɔkɔɔn ka lisse.
Ɔmmɛnɛ, ɛmmala, ɛppyɛɛ eggbenge ɛtta bɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛbɔɔk bɛtta biggbenge, bunɔɔn buffu bulɔɔk lakɔt baang ka bɔppwa.”
Jesus ɔkɔɔm ifɛɛt ppwap ppwap ukopolo balɔɔt lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ lutini bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bakkwoongɛ bappyee.
Usinɛ ifɛɛt lɛkɔɔm, bɛ ba utolo unnyi, ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ bassekenɛ kɛyɔɔng la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ubee bbwak ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ppwool ppwool bappyee.
Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, kulele ning, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele ikum imiiyɔng kukupa libbwe ’kwɔng kang bɛɛ?”
Ɔzzánga bagbata bakɔngɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang; bamal bafula ka akkpaat wa Jesus ulenɛ lile ka tɔkɔlɔ ka ɔtaanɛ, bawaat bamii. Ikkpaat ilɔk idɔkɔ baang mgbaa.
Eseese, kɛffa sa lɛbaang kiffu. Ɔffa labba bannyi ɔssɛɛn ka akkpaat, gɔɔ usseke ssup nzang bannyi bayipi ka akkpaat.
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ka isimi akkpaat ka umininɛ utele lɛttɔ ka lɛfat ɔlaa. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bafungalamɛ, battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, ba attina ka ile ka itaaknɛ ɔɔ?”
Jesus ufeele ɔkkpa kɛffa kiwele ɔttɛ, “Zzum kwulak!” Usikili uggbe labba-bannyi ɔttɛ, “Beeyɔng ssii.” Kɛffa kɛtɛt, ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ezum kwulak.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔbwɔpɔwɔyɔng kwa ’bɔng? Kiyila ba ayangayɔng ɔɔ?”
Abbɛ kaang ɔbbwɔpɔbongbɛ gaang gaang, basikili babapbɛ kɛyɔɔng battɛ, “Uwɔng bɔka ɔlɔɔt? Gɔɔ kɛffa la labba-bannyi binnyimɛ
Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee kwa kkwɔn, ka ɛkpansi a Gerasa.
Jesus ɔttanɛ ka akkpaat, eseese waanwalam vvɔn ussi ka lalli uffu ukupmɛ. Waanwalam ’wɔng baang ɔyanga apiliza ka kkwɔɔt.
Ullu ka lalli. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbalnɛ likkwoong ɔssɛɛnmɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ba ɔbɛlɛ lile.
Bassɛɛnnɛbong ikpɔkɔlɔ ka bukkpɔ la labɔɔk bikkpit bikkpit; ɔzzànga bassɛɛnmɛnɛ, ɔlɔm ikpɔkɔlɔ ɔbbɔk, ɔsam bɛfɔl using bukkpɔ ɔbɛpɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔbbwɔɔpmɛ uloko ba ɔbɛlɛ lile.
Kikoon la kɛtɔm, ɔssɛ baang ukkpit ka lalli, ubbwulu ikpok la kibungu la kibungu, ɔkɔɔm bɛfaak a lattaal ɔkkwɛɛmɛ kɛyɔɔng.
Ɔdɔkɔ utii fulufulu ka ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus, keem ɔmma umii ɔttɔ ukunmɛ laddu.
Ɔzzɔɔk kibungu la ɔkkpɔlɔngkkpɔ lɛmmwɔɔl ɔttɛ, “Jesus, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! mung aggyan ’bɔng la anaam? Nkkpengewɔ nttɛ attina kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, afɔngɔnɛ akama kɛyɔɔ!”
(Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ka Jesus ulenɛ baang ka ɔttɛnɛ, “Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng, tta asseke waanwalam ’wɔng!”)
Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Azzanga nang?” Waanwalam ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam nzzanga ‘Kɛkaan’, ile ggbadam ning!”
Ubee bbwak ukkpenge Jesus ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔggba banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a liyeeng ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang.
Kɛkaan ikkumma sa lɛbaang kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kazzi kɛtɛkɛtɛ lufoom ekpok.
Ɔzzánga liyeeng ’sɔng baang likkpenge Jesus littɛ, “Aggbayɛlɛ afɔngɔ lusso gwa kɛkaan ikkumma ’sɔng baang nkwaaning ifulayɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ.”

Uyila ɔttɛ limii, ɔzzánga litta lisseke waanwalam ’wɔng baang limii limal ikkumma. Kɛkaan ikkumma ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, iggba-ɔggba innɔ ikkumma kubbwɔɔk, imma imii ka imakkpa libbwe, ifoto ittɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ, itaak kwɛɛnɛkwɛɛnɛ.
Balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ikkumma ’yɔng baang bamma bamii babwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kwa kɔnaangnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala basak batta ka lamma. Balɔɔt bamma bamii kɛyɛn kwa kulenɛ lɛnaang.
Baffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus bayɛn ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔtaanɛ ule la kɛkaan a banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a liyeeng ka kkwɔɔt. Ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ kwetkwet la iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ doddo; kɔbbwɔpɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Balɔɔt ba balenɛ kkyɛk babwɔɔlɔ babbɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ulenɛ la banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a liyeeng ka kkwɔɔt la kwa ikkumma.
Ɔzzánga battɛ Jesus ɔgbata usseke ɛkpansi abbɛ.
Jesus ule ka akkpaat ning mung, waanwalam ’wɔng baang wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ la ipiliza ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔnɛ nkupwɔ bɛɛ!”
Jesus usimɛ lɛfɔngɔ ukupmɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng ɔdɔkɔ ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Appyɛlɛ isimisimi afula, amii abwɔɔlɔ itutum annɔ kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛ lɛnaang, la kibbe-lɛttɔ sa abbemɛnɛ.”
Waanwalam ’wɔng baang ɔgbata tɛ, ɔssɛ utuma ka Laffɛ-Zzɔɔp ɔkɔɔm kuttu kɔlɔɔk kwa Jesus ulemɛnɛ lɛnaang. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bappyeenɛkwɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang.
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi ukum kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn. Kibbi balɔɔt baffu bataa bakkpitmɛ baang ka lufoom a libbwe.
Akkala-mitin wa ɔzzanganɛ Jairus uffu ɔffɔ. Ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus, ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔzzɔɔk-mɛ baang ka lataak,
ukkpengemɛ kɔbɛtɛmɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam wa utiti wa wanavva ɔffaakmɛ gaang gaang. Nkkpee, affu atelemɛ labɔɔk ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔppwamɛ, uddu!”
Jesus ufeele ukupmɛ bamii. Balɔɔt ggbadam bakup Jesus bamii. Basseke ka baggbepmɛnɛ ning lafoom laffa laffa.
Wanavva vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ulenɛ likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa lɛffɔ ka ussinɛ ullut lɔnnyɔ.
Badibbya ggbadam battulamɛbong, ɔzzànga ntɔk a lɛttɔ ba ule. Ɔtakabong ikkobo gaang ka kɛssɛ, ɔzzànga lutini gwa buppwamɛnɛ, ɔppyɛɛ ɔkama-ɔkama ɔffaakmɛ.
Uppyeenɛ utum Jesus, ɔmal ka kibbi balɔɔt sa kikupmɛnɛ baang ɔssɛ ukup Jesus ka isimi.
Ɔkɔɔm utolo kɛyɔɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, “Nkkpa nsingimɛ ka iwɔkɔlɔ baang keem, vvenɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
Usingi Jesus ka uwɔkɔlɔ, linnyi lizzamɛ eseese. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔkɔɔlɔ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ iffaak ammɛ isaalmɛbong.
Jesus ɔkɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ uttulabong ɔlɔɔt. Keem usikili ka tɔkɔlɔ kibbi baang ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nyinɔɔng usinginɛnɛ ka iwɔkɔlɔ?”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Kɔttɛ ayɛnbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt baggbepwɔnɛ baang, mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abbal lɛbap attɛ nnyinɔɔng usingiwɔnɛ?”
Jesus usesele tɔttɔt ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔsan ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang.
Wanavva wɔng baang ɔkɔɔlɔbong bwa bulemɛnɛ lɛnaang; ɔzzánga ɔtta uffu la bbwɔp la bbwɔp, ukun laddu ka lataak a Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ lɔkkwɔɔn.
Jesus utolo unnyimɛ ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam, kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ. Ataa doddo, iffaak annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ isaal.”
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ utii baang ka kɛlɔɔk, ka balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka ssala Jairus baffunɛ babwɔɔlɔ Jairus battɛ, “Waan annɔ ubbebong. Ukopolo-lukopolo akama abbalmɛ ’bɔng lɛyɔɔ?”
Jesus usi kwa balɔɔknɛ baang lɛgɔpɔlɔ, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ, ɔzzànga ayila attɛ nkkwoong mung.”
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usimɛ likup umii lusso lusso ɔgbaa la Peter la John, etele a James, la James biini.
Baffu baffɔ ka ssala Jairus, Jesus ɔyɛn ɛfɛɛn ning baang butubutubutu uppyee lammwɔɔl a kullu baang ka bakkwanɛ, gɔɔ balɔɔt balɔk bakkwabong battɔl layilili.
Ɔmal umii ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Abutubutubutu ’wɔng bɛɛ? akkwayɔng ’bɔng? Waantiti ba ɔtaka ubbe, ule ka bilaa!”
Abbɛ basɛɛkmɛ. Ammɛ ɔttɛbɛ batta ɔkkpɛlɛ. Abassɛ la abakka la balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ bakkyaat bamal bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk za waantiti umininɛ.
Jesus ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ufeele, utolo unnyimɛ, ɔttɛ, “Talitha, koum.” Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ, “Waanawanavva, nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ afeele, abee-lubee!”
Ufeele eseese ɔssɛ baang ukkpit. (Utiimɛ likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa.) Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka ’kwɔng kɔnaangnɛ.
Jesus ɔttamabɛ ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ babwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk, ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Annyimɛyɔng bwakuzzi uzzi.
Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi, ufula ka lɛffɛ ammɛ biini la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka bakupmɛnɛ.

Ɔffɔnɛ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, utte kikopolo balɔɔt ka ggwoon-a-mitin. Balɔɔt ggbadam badɔkɔ baang. Bappyeenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukopolonɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ kɔsak. Babap battɛ, “Mbyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bissimɛ ka yang? Uwɔng bɔka kukele kwa ɔsannɛ ning? Ɔnaang nang ukkwoong ɔnaang bɛmaanga?
Ammɛ lissi ulenɛ kapenta, waan a Mary ɔɔ, James la Joseph, la Judas, la Simon, itele ammɛ lissi ɔɔ? Itele ammɛ ya bwanavva lissi ballunɛ mung ɔɔ?” Ɔzzánga bafimmɛ tɛ.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bannyimɛ latele ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ usseke ka lɛffɛ ammɛ biini ka ɛfɛɛn ikpana ammɛ la itutum ammɛ bale bafimmɛ.”
Bɛmaanga bɛlɔk usi likkwoong ɔnaang baang, ɔzzànga utele bwaan a balɔɔt ssup ning ba balenɛ la iffaak labɔɔk, ɔppwabɛ.
Kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ gaang gaang ka balɔɔt ’bɔng baang basɛlɛnɛ kiyila. Jesus ukopolo balɔɔt ukkpit laffɛ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsangabɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttamabɛ ɔttɛ bassɛ balɔɔt baffa baffa. Unnyibɛ lakke za kɛbɛtɛ banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a liyeeng.
Ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng bulɔk ɔgbaa la lukut ka ɛtɔk. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng brɛɛd, la ɛssɔ lubbwoom, gɔɔ assɛɛnyɔng ikkobo ka issɔ.
Awɔkɔlɔyɔng ikkpabukkpɔ, ɔzzànga afɔngɔyɔng uwɔkɔlɔ wa gbɔɔ kɛkɔɔm.”
Ɔbbalbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɛfɛɛn duu ya batɔkwɔnɛyɔng ka laggele, ataayɔng ka ssala ssɔn ’sɔng baang tɔttɔt agbatayɔng ka killu ’sɔng baang.
Affɔnɛyɔng ka lɛffɛ za basiwɔnɛyɔng ka laggele lɛtɔk, ɔlɔk basi kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng lɛgɔpɔlɔ, akkwɔlɔyɔng ibut ka bukkpɔ annyɔɔng allɔtyɔng, agbatayɔng. Uwɔng ule ɔtaabɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kinnyi ntemele.”
Bamii bakopolo balɔɔt battɛ bakkyaa bubbi abbɛ bafɔngɔ.
Baggba ipiliza bafɔngɔ kang, banaang bannɛ-olive bapwɔɔng balɔɔt iffaak, ɔppwabɛ.

Ubeet Herod uppyee tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kuttu a Jesus kulenɛ lɛwaala ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk banngwa battɛ, “John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ɔppyɛlɛbong utii ka kuddu! Kwakkwɛ baang ɔyanganɛ lakke ’zɔng za ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔnaang bɛmaanga.”
Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Ammɛ ulenɛ Elijah.” Balɔk battɛ, “Baang uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ.”
Herod uppyeenɛ, ɔttɛ, “Baang John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim! Ndɔkɔbong nzzamɛ lɛttɔ, ɔzzànga mung ɔppyɛlɛbong utii ka kuddu!”
Herod biini ɔggbabɛ lɛkamala ɔttɛ bakaa John bannyimɛ ɔssɛɛn ngbakkɔpɔ. Herod ɔnaang ’kwɔng, kɔlɔɔk a Herodias, wa ɔtɔknɛ, mkkpandɔk ɔdɔkɔ ullu la Philip etele ammɛ.
John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ɔbwɔɔlɔ Herod kkpɛtkkpɛt ɔttɛ, “Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka atɔknɛ wanavva etele annɔ!”
Herodias uloko John kisikɔng, ɔggyan ɛtɔk ya kɛwwɔɔlmɛ, ɔzzànga lɛttɔ usi lɛtɔk ka Herod ɔtakanɛ liyila.

John ɔbbwɔpɔ Herod gaang gaang, ka ɔsannɛ kkpelegedee ɔttɛ John ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, gɔɔ bubbi nakanaka usi lɛnaang. Kwakkwɛ baang ulokomɛnɛ ka kuddu. Kutolo a John kuggwoommɛ kɛgɔpɔlɔ kɔsak, nkkpandɔk kutunmɛ gaang gaang ɛkɛtɛ duu ya uppyeenɛ kutolo ammɛ.
Ka lakpeke, Herodias uffu ɔyanga kufuk. Ɔdɔkɔ ka livve ekokomele Herod. Herod ɔbwɔɔlɔ baggboggbo balɔɔt a kɛnaang a Government, la bazzilɛttɔ-isɔgya la bakɔɔm-ɛkpansi a Galilee.

Waan a Herodias wa wanavva ɔtta ɔtɔm, kuffi Herod gaang gaang la bakekeen ammɛ. Ɔzzánga ubeet Herod ɔlɔɔk la waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Mung aggyan attɛ ayanga ’bɔng? Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa aggyannɛ, vvenɛ nnyiwɔ.”
Uyim bikkpit bikkpit ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Nyimbong nttɛ vvenɛ nnyiwɔ bɔfɛɛn duu bwa aggyannɛ, gɔɔ mkkpa ule kufaak ɛkpansi anaam!”
Waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔtta umii ɔbap abakka ɔttɛ, “Mung nle nlɔɔk nttɛ nggyan ’bɔng?” Abakka ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Lɛttɔ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim.”
Waanawanavva ’wɔng ɔkɛnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ ubeet bwa ɔggyannɛ, ɔttɛ, “Assɛɛn lɛttɔ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, mung ka kɛkkpala annyinɛ gedegede mung!”
Ubeet uppyeenɛ ning baang, livve lɛbbɔlmɛ gaang gaang, ɔzzànga usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ule ufim ka ulenɛ liyim ka lusso bakekeen ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ubeet ɔsanga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatmɛnɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ umii ɔzza lɛttɔ a John uffu. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ, ɔzza John lɛttɔ.
Ɔsamzɛ ɔssɛɛn ka kɛkkpala ufee waanawanavva ’wɔng baang. Ammɛ ɔsamzɛ unnyi abakka.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John bappyeenɛ ning baang, baffu basam kakku a John balli.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bappyɛlɛnɛ, baduda la Jesus, babwɔɔlɔmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ likopolo la bɛfɛɛn bya balenɛ lɛnaang.

Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus la Jesus biini basi kufuk kwa kizzi kazzi lɛyɛn ɔssanga ka balɔɔt balenɛ gbɔɔ yɔngɔlɔ-yɔngɔlɔ-yɔngɔlɔ. Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele ibbɛyɔng mung imii iggyanyɔng ɛfɛɛn a kɛyɔɔng a kɛyɔɔng itaayɔng nkwaaning afɛkɛlɛyɔng.”
Ɔzzánga bafeele kɛyɔɔng abbɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ya balɔɔt basinɛ lile.
Balɔɔt bayɛnbɛ ka bagbatanɛ bakɔɔlɔbɛ eseese. Ɔzzánga bagbata laffɛ abbɛ bakɔngɔ, bamma likum a likum bamii batte Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ lɛffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang.
Jesus, ɔttanɛ ka akkpaat, ɔyɛn kibbi balɔɔt ning baang. Babbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang, ka ɔyɛnnɛbɛ ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ya isɛlɛnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛknɛyɛ. Ukopolobɛ bɛfɛɛn ggbadam.
Ɔmmɛnɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ emiibong tɛ, akke attɛ ile kɛyɔɔng a kɛyɔɔng ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng mung tɛ.
Abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bagbata bamii ka itɔɔm la laffɛ za lakkɛtɛnɛ mung nkwaaning bayɛn kazzi balɛɛp bazzi bɛɛ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng aggyanyɔng kazzi annyiyɔngbɛ bazzi.” Babapmɛ battɛ, “Aggyan attɛ isam lalɔp Inaira lakkyaat imii ilɛɛp brɛɛd innyibɛ, bazzi ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kkpɔɔ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd issekewɔyɔng ifang? Amii appyɛɛkyɔng ee?” Balenɛ lɛyɛn, baffu babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Igɔngɔ kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛnabannyi iffa.”
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ balɔɔkbɛ bataa lakup lakup baang ka lifaat.
Bataa ning baang ka likkwɔɔn lakup a lakup. Likup lɛlɔk lalɔp a balɔɔt kubbwɔɔk, lɛlɔk lalɔp a balɔɔt laffa la balɔɔt zzɔɔp.

Jesus ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛnabannyi iffa, uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Ɔlɔm igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang ɔbbɔk, unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ batan balɔɔt ’bɔng baang. Ɔssɛ ɔsam isɛɛnabannyi ya iffa ’yɔng baang ɔbɛngɛlɛbɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt uzzi uwukala.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɔng izuku a brɛɛd la izuku isɛɛnabannyi iyipi isangala zzɔɔppiffa.
Balɔɔt ba bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ innɔ zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak.
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ bamal ka akkpaat eseese bakɔɔm bassɛ bakɔngɔmɛ ammɛ, bamii Bethsaida, ka kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn. Ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ kibbi balɔɔt ’sɔng baang kɛkkyaap.
Uvvenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang liteele, ɔgbata umii ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm ka libat ekpok.
Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, akkpaat ɔffɔbong ka kasɛkɛ libbwe. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus usseke kɛyɔɔng ka likum.

Ɔyɛnnɛ ka balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balenɛ libwum kɛffa kisibɛ lɛfɔngɔ bamii lusso lusso ka badudanɛsɛ laduda, ufeele ka bɛzzɔkɔ ikalangka ikkyaat la bwɔlaaning ya kibbessolo, ɔssɛ ka ɛkkpabannyi umii ka ɛfɛɛn abbɛ. Uffubongbɛ kikopo ning mung.
Ɔzzánga bayɛnmɛ ning baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka ɛkkpabannyi, banngwa bakɔɔm babungu battɛ, “Baang ubbu-kɔwɔkɔlɔ!”
Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bayɛnmɛnɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk eseese unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Kkaamyɔng luppyɔm kkpɔk, anaam. Ɔfɔngɔwɔyɔng kɛbbwɔpɔ.”
Ɔmal umii ɔtaa ka akkpaat la abbɛ, kɛffa kɛtɛt. Kɔkɛɛlɛ balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ gaang gaang,
ka batakanɛ ifɛɛt a kinnyi innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak kazzi lɛsan; basi likkwoong battinakwɛ bakopo.
Bakum libbwe baffu ka ɛkpansi a Genesaret, ka ɛfɛɛn a basikinɛ akkpaat.
Balɔɔt bakɔɔlɔ Jesus eseese ka battanɛ ka akkpaat.
Bamma bakkpit ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang, batɔkɔ balɔɔt iffaak bamii bawulabɛ ka iwula ka ɛfɛɛn a bappyeenɛ battɛ Jesus ule baang.

Ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya Jesus umiinɛ, bakɔɔm balɔɔt iffaak bafeemɛ. Mkkpa umii ka laffɛ balɔɔt, ɔlɔk ɔppyɛɛ umii ka lamma, gɔɔ ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, batɔkɔ balɔɔt iffaak batta ka kappya bakkpengemɛ battɛ ɔfɔngɔ lɛwang-uwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ keem lisingibɛ. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba lisinginɛbɛ, ɔppwabɛ.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba bassinɛ Jerusalem bataa bakkpit Jesus.

Bayɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus balɔk ka bakɔɔmnɛ labɔɔk za lasinɛ lɛkkwɔngɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ bazzi kazzi. Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ basibong labɔɔk liyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Pharisees battɛnɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bayila.
(Balɔɔt a Pharisees la ba Jews bakup gwa bappyeenɛ ka balɔɔt iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ; basinɛ labɔɔk liyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ abbɛ lalɔɔknɛ, kazzi ba bazzi.
Gɔɔ bɔfɛɛn bwa bussinɛ ka kappya ba bazzi batakabong bazzaabwɛ. Bayanga lafɔɔ ggbadam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛzzaa immonggo, la ikkpo, bɛkkpala, la igolo-kimini za bakupnɛ.)

Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ babap Jesus battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ basi lukopolo balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ likup, bappyɛɛ basi labɔɔk liyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bazzi kazzi?”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Biyɛnɛ pya Isaiah ɔyɛnnɛ utumwɔyɔng bile bbwak ka lɔkkwɔɔn! Annyɔɔng bakkala lɛlaak ka lɔkkwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkpɔknɛ ɔttɛ; ’Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, Balɔɔt ’bɔng bannyinɛ latele ka kamma keem. Ɔzzànga ippyam abbɛ baloko fulufulu bassekenɛ.
Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka bazɔɔmnɛ bannyinɛ ka bakopolonɛ lafɔɔ za balɔɔt banaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!’
“Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ateleyɔng; ateleyɔng lafɔɔ za balɔɔt bassɛɛnnɛ.”
Jesus utolo ɔgbaa ɔttɛ, “Asanyɔng lagban za akɔɔmnɛ afimyɔng Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔkkɔɔnɛ lukopolo annyɔɔng lɔtta kuttu.
Kɔttɛ Moses ɔdɔkɔ ɔddawɔyɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Ateleyɔng ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbbaatnɛ abakka ɔlɔk abassɛ ule wa kɛwwɔɔl.’
Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng akopoloyɔng balɔɔt attɛyɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔyaam abassɛ la abakka; ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Corban’ (ning baang ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang busseke bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm);
ukkwoong mung ɔfɔngɔ abakka la abassɛ kɛyaam.
Lukopolo gwa akopolonɛyɔng balɔɔt lɔbɛpɛbong Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bɛfɛɛn bile ppwap bya anaangnɛyɔng ning mung.”
Jesus ɔbbal kibbi ’sɔng baang lɛkkwɔɔ, utolo unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng agɔpɔlɔ appyeeyɔng.
Bɔfɛɛn bwa bussinɛ ka vveeng bumal ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ lissi bule bunaangmɛ ule la bubbi. Bwa bussinɛ ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ bunaangmɛnɛ ɔnaang bubbi.
(Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ latɔɔk za kippyee kɔlɔɔk, uppyee!)”
Ɔgbatanɛ ka kibbi ’sɔng baang umii ka ssala, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu babapmɛ battɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ifɛɛt a kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ baang.

Jesus ɔlɔɔk unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga annyɔɔng kɔlɔɔk ba abɛlɛyɔng lɛsan attayɔng balɔɔt balɔk ɔɔ, faa doddo ba appyeeyɔng? Bɔfɛɛn bwa bumalnɛ ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ bubbal likkwoong bunaang ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bubbi ba bule,
ka busimɛnɛ ka luppyam limii, bufulamɛ ka lɛmmɛ, ulenɛ lɛmmɛ, ɔnnyabwɛ ɔzzɔɔk. (Ning mung, Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ izzi lutini kazzi ɔkkpɛlɛ).
Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Bɔfɛɛn bwa bussinɛ ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ bunaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bubbi.
Babbu ittina ya idɛmnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bubbi, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛssɛ-kɛzak, la ssip, la kɛwwɔɔl a balɔɔt,
la kikup wanavva ɔlɔɔt, la kuwɔnɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, bissi ka tɔkɔlɔ luppyam ɔlɔɔt; gɔɔ lutini bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ, ikkɔlɔ, kɛdɛm, kɔfɔk, lɛgbɛɛk, lɔbba, la bizingizingi.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bissi ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt bɛnaangmɛ ɔnaang bubbi.”
Jesus ufeele umii ka ɛkpansi ɛlɔk bakang kɛtɛkɛtɛ a Tyre. Ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon gɔɔ usi lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsan ɔttɛ ule baang, ɔzzànga usi likkwoong uddumu tɔttɔt.
Wanavva wa waan ammɛ ɔyanganɛ ipiliza uppyeenɛ kwa Jesus, uffu eseese ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Ɔttɔ ukunmɛ laddu baang ka lataak.
Wa wanavva ’wɔng wa akanakana, bamaatmɛ ka ɛkpansi a Phoenicia ka Syria. Ukkpenge Jesus ɔttɛ ɔggba ipiliza ’yɔng baang usseke awaan.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔbong ssii: ittebong bwɔɔntiti kazzi linnyi. Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka isamnɛ kazzi a bwɔɔntiti, izzɔɔk ibbwa!”
Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Dedde, gɔɔ ibbwa ittɔng mung bwaan izuku-kazzi bya bɛttɔnɛ bwɔɔntiti kuttɔɔk okkpokolo izzi!”
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Appyɛlɛ afula, kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ kɛnaangbong ipiliza itta isseke waan annɔ.”
Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi ufula. Ɔyɛn waan ammɛ ka umininɛ. Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ipiliza ɛttabong esseke waan ’wɔng baang.
Jesus ɔgbata ka Tyre ɔzza ka Sidon ɔtta ka libbwe a Galilee, ukup ɛtɔk a Laffɛ-Zzɔɔp.
Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ ka latɔɔk lippyee usi kɛlɔɔk likkwoong, bakkpenge Jesus battɛ, ɔbɛtɛmɛ labɔɔk.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔsammɛ ɔgbata ka kibbi ’sɔng baang. Ɔsam bɛnnɔ ɔssɛɛnmɛ ka latɔɔk, ɔkkɔl libbaak ɔggbɔ ka kɛnnɔ usingimɛ ka lɛlaak.
Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uffimi gaang gaang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔk unnyi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ephphatha,” ning baang ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Wongolo!”
Eseese, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ukkwoong uppyee. Utuulumɛbong lɛlaak, ɔlɔɔk ppwool ppwool ɔkkpɛlɛ, gɔɔ lɛkkɔ mɛ ba lɛbɛlɛ lisik.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ bafɔngɔkwɛ kɛsam babwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk. Ning baang ka bakamanɛ lɔkama bayaam kuttu akkwɛ.
Kɔkɛɛlɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bappyeenɛkwɛ gaang gaang. Babungumɛ battɛ, “Ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛyyɛɛp bɛffata. Ɔnaang bassi-latɔɔk bappyee. Ɔnaang basi-kɛlɔɔk likkwoong, bakkwoong ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Gɔɔ ba ɔtaka ɔmmɛ gbɔɔ, kibbi balɔɔt kɛlɔk kiffu kibbi baang. Kazzi kasaalnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ,
“Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung babbenɛbong lɛttɔ gaang tɛ, bataabong mung la anaam ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, mung kazzi kasaalbongbɛ.
Nttɛnɛbɛ bafula ka batakanɛ kazzi lizzi, vvenɛ balɔɔt balɔk ba bassinɛ fulufulu bannɔk ka ɛtɔk.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Mung ka akpelenene ’wɔng mung, kazzi ile iyɛn yang kwa kale kaddu kibbi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Baang ayangayɔng igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ifang?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Igɔngɔ innamikkyaat.”

Ɔttɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bataa baang ka lisse. Ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang innamikyaat uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔbbɔk, ɔssɛɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, batan kibbi ’sɔng baang. Abbɛ banaang ning baang.
Bwaan isɛɛnabannyi idɔkɔbɛ baang ɔgbaa. Jesus ɔsamyɛ, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ basamyɛ batanbɛ.

Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uzzi, uwukala. Balɔɔt ba bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang baggba-ɔggba innɔ zzɔɔp. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɔng izuku ya issekenɛ, iyipi isangala ning innamikkyaat. Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛkkyaap,
bamal ka akkpaat la balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Dalmanutha.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus babee bbwak bakangalamɛ ikangala. Badɔkɔ baggyanmɛ kɛkaa, ɔzzánga battɛ ɔnaang bɛmaanga ɔyɔɔ ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubeemɛ la isimi.
Jesus usini lifiki tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng balɔɔt a lizan baggyannɛ kɛyɛn a bɛmaanga ning? Maaye, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong! Ning baang baala nnaang nyɔɔ kɛssanga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang!”
Ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ, ɔmal ka akkpaat umii kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basumala kɛkɔɔm a brɛɛd doddo, badɔkɔ bayini ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd vvɔn keem ka akkpaat.
Jesus ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Asan anaangyɔng tɛ, akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng yeast a balɔɔt a Pharisees la yeast a Herod tɛ.”
Batolo abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔk ka isinɛ brɛɛd lɛyanga ka nakanaka tɛ.”
Jesus ɔkɔɔlɔ bwa balɔɔknɛ batum, ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng alɔɔknɛyɔng kwa kɛsɛlɛ a brɛɛd? Ɔzzánga ba ataka asan appyee affatayɔng ɔɔ? Akkpɛlɛyɔng kittina kɔlɔɔk ning ɔɔ?
Ayangayɔng zzeen, mung ba akkwoong ayɛnyɔng ɔɔ? Ayangayɔng latɔɔk, ba akkwoong appyeeyɔng ɔɔ? Ba akkeyɔng
ka nbbɔknɛ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk nnyi innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak ɔɔ? Izuku ya issekenɛ idɔkɔ iyipi isangala ifang?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Zzɔɔppiffa.”
“Ka nbbɔknɛ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd innamikkyaat nnyi innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔp bɛɛ, izuku ya issekenɛ idɔkɔ iyipi isangala ifang?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Innamikkyaat.”
Ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga ning bbɔk ba ataka asanyɔng ɔɔ?”
Baffu baffɔ ka Bethsaida ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt bakɔɔmnɛ ussi-ifim bafee Jesus bakkpengemɛ battɛ usingi ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang.
Jesus ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ɔlɛkɛmɛ ɔgbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Jesus ulemɛnɛ libbaak lɛkkɔl ɔllɔt, ɔbɛtɛmɛ labɔɔk, ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Akkwoongbong ayɛn bulɔk ɔɔ?”
Ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, ɔttɛ, “Iii, nyɛn mung balɔɔt, ɔzzànga bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛssɛ bɛssɛnɛ bikkpit mung.”
Jesus ɔbbal ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang labɔɔk ka zzeen litele. Kikkpit ’sɔng keem ɔppyɛɛk bit, ifim isaalmɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyɛn bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ppwool.
Jesus ɔttɛmɛ ufula, ɔkamalamɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ appyɛlɛ amii ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang tɛ.”
Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata bamii laffɛ za lakkɛtɛnɛ Caesarea Philippi. Baffɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk, Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng, mung balɔɔt battɛ anaam nnyinɔɔng?”
Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ annɔ John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, balɔk battɛ annɔ Elijah, balɔk bappyɛɛ battɛ annɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔbapbɛ abbɛ, ɔttɛ, “Ngkka annyɔɔng bɛɛ, attina attɛyɔng anaam nnyinɔɔng?” Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.”
Keem Jesus ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng ’kwɔng kɛsam abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ.”

Jesus ukopolo balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama ɔttala, gɔɔ bagɛlɛnya la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ vvenɛ bakalamɛ. Vvenɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ; ɔzzànga ɔffɔnɛ bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ppwool ppwool, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bappyee. Ɔzzánga Peter ɔkkwɔɔmɛ uloko kufɛngɛ ɔkangalamɛ.
Ammɛ Jesus usikili ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔkangala Peter kutunmɛ, ɔttɛ la Peter, “Agbata assekenɛ, annɔ baang Satan, luttina annɔ gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi, gwa ɔlɔɔt!”
Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ kibbi balɔɔt la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ukupnɛ, usumalamɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔsam cross ukupnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ukekenɛ kwa lɛfal ammɛ, vvenɛ ɔtakazɛ; Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtakanɛ lɛfal ammɛ kwa anaam ɔlɔk kwa Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔkkalazɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔyanga mung isak ka ɔyanganɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ a vveengodde, ɔppyɛɛ ɔyɛn akama wa kɛfal a kɛfal ɔɔ? Ning ba kule kkpong kkpong!
Bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ukkwoong ɔkkala lɛfal ammɛ ba bule.

Anaam biini la lukopolo anaam bɛnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt izzit ka gedegede mung wa basinɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, basseke ka babbyapnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔnaang Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ izzit ka ɛkɛtɛ ya uffunɛ ka lakke a Dedde la bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, balɔɔt balɔk bale mung ba bale basi libbebong tɛ́ttɛ́ bayɛn Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ile iffu la lakke.”
Ɔggbanɛ ka bɛtɔm ning bwɔlaaning bilenɛ lɛsak, Jesus ɔlɛkɛ Peter la James, la John, ubbwulu libat ekpok bakang ka ɛfɛɛn a bassekenɛ kɛyɔɔng a kɛyɔɔng. Badɔkɔ baang ka kɛppyɛɛk, Jesus ufoolo eseese.
Iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ isseke ka inyanyanɛ ning, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔzzaa iwɔkɔlɔ illaat iffɔ ning baang ka vveeng mung ba ule.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba bakkyaat baang bayɛn Elijah, la Moses ka kutolo la Jesus.
Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk unnyi Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, kɔyyɛɛp gaang gaang ka ilenɛyɔng mung! Vvenɛ inaang bwaan idda bɛkkyaat mung, vvɔn wa annɔ, vvɔn wa Moses, wa vvɔn wa Elijah.”
Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang Peter usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛsan bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Ìkkpála itta ka lukkpaaggbeede ivvoongbɛ kuyeeng. Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛtta ka tɔkɔlɔ ikkpála ’yɔng baang lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Waan-a-luppyam anaam, agɔpɔlɔmɛyɔng!”
Basesele ɔkkpɛlɛ baduda, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk basi lɛyɛn ɔgbaa la Jesus.
Basininɛ ka libat ekpok ’yɔng baang, Jesus ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kɛbwɔɔlɔ kwa ayɛnnɛyɔng tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ufungalanɛ ka lubbe.”
Bappyee lɔkamala ’gwɔng baang, ɔzzánga batolo abbɛ abbɛ batum kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng baang battɛ, “Kifungala ka lubbe ’sɔng mung ɔbbwanɛ ’bɔng lile?”
Babap Jesus battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ battɛ Elijah ule utte liffu?”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Elijah ule utte liffu baning ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔlɔngɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn, uloko ɔkkpɛlɛ bbwak bbwak. Ngkka ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama gaang gaang; balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bafimnɛ.
Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, Elijah ɔggba liffu bakang, balɔɔt bakaamɛ bayɔɔ akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ bakup tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkpɔknɛ ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batummɛ.”
Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba bakkyaat bappyɛlɛnɛ baffu bakup balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng kaang, bayɛn kibbi balɔɔt ka babbinɛ bakkpitbɛ. Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk badɔkɔ baang ka ikangala la abbɛ.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayɛnnɛ Jesus, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang, bamma bamii bawomomɛ.
Jesus ɔbap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Baang akangalayɔng ’bɔng?”
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, nkɔɔm waan anaam nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ ka ɔyanganɛ ipiliza, usi kɛlɔɔk likkwoong.
Ipiliza ’yɔng baang ifeelemɛnɛ, ɔttɔ ka lisse, iffuku ittamɛ ka kamma, ɔtɔɔp lasaal ɔkaka, ɔkkaam kkɔk. Nlɔɔkbong balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ nttɛ baggba ipiliza ’yɔng baang, ɔzzànga basi lizzeme baggbayɛ.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng mung asɛlɛyɔngbong kiyila! Mung nle ntaa ɔmmɛ ɔffɔ nang la annyɔɔng? Mung nle nbbe-luppyam nang la annyɔɔng? Kɔɔm waan ’wɔng baang affu!”
Bakɔɔmmɛ baffu. Ipiliza iyɛnnɛ Jesus eseese, ifeelemɛ ɔttɔ ka lisse ɔssang, iffuku ikɔɔm ittamɛ ka kamma.
Jesus ɔbap abbasɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔmmɛbong ɔffɔ nang ka ussinɛ ɔffaakmɛ?” Abassɛ ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ka bassinɛ bamaatmɛ!
Utii bikkpit bikkpit ka ipiliza ’yɔng baang ibwummɛnɛ kɛwwɔɔl, ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk isammɛ ning itɔɔp ka tɔkɔlɔ lɔkɔɔn ɔlɔk issɛɛnmɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi. Bibbewɔ lɛttɔ baang, ayaamyɛlɛ ulenɛ ka akkwoongnɛ!”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii tɛ, annyɔɔng biini akkwoongnɛyɔng! Ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ kiyila nzang kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ba kukoolo.”
Abassɛ ubungu eseese ɔttɛ, “Nyanga mung kiyila, ɔzzanga kilenɛ ssup. Attelenɛ nyanga kiyila ngbaa!”
Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ ka kibbi kilebɛ ligbep, ɔkkpa ipiliza ’yɔng baang kiwele ɔttɛ, “Ussi-latɔɔk, usi kɛlɔɔk likkwoong ipiliza ’yɔng, nbwɔɔlɔwɔbong tta asseke waan ɔlɔɔt afɔngɔmɛ kɛbɛlɛ lɛmal kkpong kkpong!”
Ipiliza ’yɔng baang ibungu, ifeele waantiti tɛ́ttɛ́ itta issekemɛ. Waanwalam ’wɔng baang usseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubbu mung, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uyila ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔttɛ “Ubbebong!”
Jesus ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ufeele, ubee lubee.
Jesus ussekenɛ kɛyɔɔng la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka ggwoon, abbɛ babapmɛ ka wɛɛk battɛ, “Mbɔng ayyɔɔt isinɛ likkwoong iggba ipiliza ’yɔng baang?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔfɛɛn bulɔk bwa bukkwoongnɛ buggba kussanga ipiliza ’kwɔng ba bule, usinɛ luzɔɔm lile.”
Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang basak ka lɔkaan gwa lɔzzanganɛ Galilee. Jesus usi lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsan ka ɛfɛɛn ulenɛ,
ka ulenɛ ka kikopolo balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ; “Vvenɛ basam Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi balɔɔt bawwɔɔl. Ɔzzànga mkkpa kɔnaang, ɔffɔnɛ bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, ufungala ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
Ifɛɛt a lukopolo ’gwɔng baang basi lɛsan, ɔzzànga basimɛ lɛbbɔ babap ka ɔbbwɔpɔnɛbɛ.
Baffu baffɔ ka Capernaum, balenɛ ka ggwoon lɛmal, Jesus ɔbap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung adɔkɔ akangalayɔng ’bɔng ka ɛtɔk?”
Basi lɛggyan battɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma, ka bakangalanɛ ka ɛtɔk batum ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge.

Jesus ɔtaanɛ lɔtaa, ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa utolo unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ule ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang usseke isimi, ɔppyɛɛ ule bɔɔyi balɔɔt ’bɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Ɔkkwɔɔ waantiti, ɔtta ubeebɛ ka lusso. Utelemɛ labɔɔk, ɔttɛ la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ,
“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛ waantiti ning mung ka lɛkɔɔl anaam, nzang ɔtɔknɛbong anaam. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛnɛ ɔtɔknɛ anaam ka laggele, nzang ɔssɛbong ɔtɔkmɛ Ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.”
John ɔlɔɔk unnyimɛ ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, iyɛn ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ lɛkɔɔl annɔ ɔggba ipiliza. Ibwɔɔlɔmɛ ittɛ ɔfɔngɔ ka usinɛ ka kɛkaan ayyɔɔt lile.”
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔmɛyɔng kitunu, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ lɛkɔɔl anaam ɔnaang bɛmaanga baala ukkwoong ɔlɔɔk bubbi utumnɛ keekeekee.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa isimɛnɛ litun, ule wa ayyɔɔt.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kpelegedee appyeeyɔng, ɔlɔɔt duu wa unnyiwɔnɛyɔng ommonggo bannyi ka alenɛyɔng ba anaam, vvenɛ ɔyanga ikipili ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ waantiti vvɔn gbɔɔ wa uyilanɛ kɔlɔɔk anaam uttunmɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kɔyyɛɛp ka basikinɛ kukook bakɔnmɛ ka lukat, basammɛ bassɛɛn ka ubili lɔyɔngɔ.
Ulenɛ kɔbɔɔk annɔ kɔnaangwɔnɛ asɛlɛ kiyila, azzakwɛ azzɔɔk. Kɔyyɛɛp ka amalnɛ ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal la kɔbɔɔk kkwɔn lutini amiinɛ ka lɔkɔɔn gwa kɛfal a kɛfal la labɔɔk laffa.
[Ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, illɔɔng ya izzinɛbɛ ba ibbe, gɔɔ lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛbɛ ba luzum ka nakanaka.]

Kikkpɔ annɔ kɛnaangwɔnɛ asɛlɛ kiyila, azzasɛ azzɔɔk! Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka amalnɛ ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal la kikkpɔ ssɔn lutini gwa bale basamwɔ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn gwa kɛfal a kɛfal la bukkpɔ annɔ buffa.
[Bakang ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, illɔɔng ya izzinɛbɛ ba ibbe, gɔɔ lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛbɛ ba luzum ka nakanaka.]
Zzeen annɔ lɛppyɛɛnɛ lɛnaangwɔ asɛlɛ kiyila, asangazɛ azzɔɔk! Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka amalnɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la zzeen zzɔn lutini gwa bale basamwɔ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn gwa kɛfal a kɛfal la zzeen laffa.
Bakang wa illɔɔng ya izzinɛbɛ isinɛ libbe, lɔkɔɔn gwa bakkɔmnɛ lusi lizum ka nakanaka.
“Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔkkɔm ka lɔkɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bunɔk bukoolonɛ ka ɛsɛɛn.
Bunɔk buyyɛɛp gaang gaang; ɔzzanga buppyɛɛnɛ busi lɛbɛlɛ liggwoom, bule bunaang nang bubbal bunɔk lɛzzanga? “Annyɔɔng biini, ayangayɔng kɛsaap, ataayɔng ka bɔkaat ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng.
Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang umii ka ɛkpansi a Judea, ukum lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan. Bɛkaan a balɔɔt bɛbbal liffu bikupmɛ, ammɛ ubee bbwak ukopolobɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔm-ɛlɔm.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ babummɛ kɛssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk. Babapmɛ battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt layila mung ɔlɔɔt ɔggba wanavva ammɛ ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma la lɔbap ɔttɛ, “Moses ɔdɔkɔ unnyiwɔyɔng lafɔɔ bɔka azzɛ?”
Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Moses uyila ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɔk luvva ɔbwɔɔlɔ wanavva ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔggbamɛ.”
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Moses ɔkkpɔk lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang unnyiwɔyɔng ka akoolonɛyɔng kippyee kɔlɔɔk.
Ɔzzànga ka lutte bakang, ka ɛkɛtɛ a lɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔmbɛ ning baang walam la wanavva, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.
Kwakkwɛ baang waanwalam ule ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ abassɛ la abakka umii batoolo bataa ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la wanavva ammɛ.
Ɔzzánga abbɛ baffa basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn, buubuu ba bubɛlɛ lile.
Ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbɛngɛlɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛffɔ ɔsam utoolo ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn.”
Bappyɛlɛnɛ bamal ka ggwoon, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus babapmɛ batumkwɛ.
Ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ ɔtɔk ɔlɔk, ɔnaangbong wanavva ammɛ bubbi.
Gɔɔ wanavva wa ɔbbɛnɛ ɔkɔngɔ walam ammɛ umii ullu ɔlɔk ɔnaangbong walam ammɛ bubbi.”
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm bwɔɔntiti bafee Jesus battɛ usingibɛ, keem balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ batunubɛ.
Jesus uppyeenɛ ning baang, kutunmɛ gaang gaang, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng bwɔɔntiti baffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ atunuyɔngbɛ, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya abbɛ baang.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ppwool nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ kɔlɔɔk Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛtɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti utelenɛ zzeen ka abakka la abassɛ baala ukkwoong ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɛ kkpong kkpong.”
Ɔlɔm bwɔɔntiti ka labɔɔk, utelebɛ labɔɔk la vvɔn la vvɔn, ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ.
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbong utte kɔssɛ ammɛ ning mung, ɔlɔɔt ussi bakang ɔmma uffu ukunmɛ laddu, ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo wa doddo, nle nnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ nyanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal?”
Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akkwɔɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔgbaa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule.
Kɔttɛ asan mung Lafɔɔ: ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip ssip, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkala lɛlaak atum ɔlɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abunu ɔlɔɔt azzi, atele ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ.’ ”
Okolobya ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, ka nssinɛ ssup nle baang nlokonɛ lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.”

Ɔzzánga Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛkmɛ la kɛsaap, ɔttɛ, “Ussekewɔ kɔlɔɔk kkwɔn keem. Amii asam bɛfɛɛn annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayanganɛ ataan, asam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang amii asɔɔk balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔyyɛɛpwɔ ka libat; alenɛ ning baang lɛnaang, affu akupnɛ.”
Okolobya ’wɔng baang uppyeenɛ ning baang, lusso lɔbbɔlmɛ eseese, ɔgbata la bukee ka uttinanɛ ka ɔyanganɛ ikkpoko ggbadam.
Jesus ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ududa ɔttɛ, “Kukoolo-lukoolo kɔsak tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ ikkpoko bamal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bappyeenɛ ning baang, ɔzzánga Jesus ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Bwaan anaam, kukoolo lukoolo kɔsak tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Gɔɔ kɔtta uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt likoolo kɛmal ka Itutum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtta kɛsam ɔgɔdɔ kɛwɔkɔlɔ ka lɛmma ɔnnya.”
Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, kɔkama lɔkama kɔkɛɛlɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, bayeek bappyɛɛkbɛ kɛyɔɔng battɛ, “Ngkka nnyinɔɔng ule uddu?”
Jesus ɔppyɛɛkbɛ ssii ɔttɛ, “Nkwɔng baang kukoolo ɔssɛbibit, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mɛ ba kukoolo. Kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ibɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule kkpɛkɛlɛm.”
Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk, ibbɛbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ikɔngɔ iffu ikupwɔ.”

Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Eee, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔgbatanɛ ɔkɔngɔ ssala ammɛ, la itele ammɛ ɔlɔk ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ abassɛ la abakka, ɔlɔk bwɔɔntiti, ɔlɔk bɔtɔɔm ammɛ, kwa anaam la kwa kippyee lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,

vvenɛ ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn ggbadam ka lɛfal ’zɔng mung. Vvenɛ ɔyanga issoon lalɔp lalɔp ɔgbaa, la itele ppwap la ibakka la bwɔɔntiti la itɔɔm. Vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyɛn akama ɔgbaa, ɔzzànga vvenɛ ɔyanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk gedegede mung, vvenɛ bappyɛɛ basseke isimi. Balɔɔt ba ggbadam ba bassekenɛ isimi ka gedegede mung, vvenɛ bappyɛɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk.”

Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ badɔkɔ ka ɛtɔk a kimii a Jerusalem. Jesus ɔkɔɔmbong ɔssɛ ɔkɔngɔbɛ ka lilɔɔk lilenɛbɛ gaang lɛkɛɛlɛ. Balɔɔt ba bakupnɛbɛ ka isimi ɔssɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ. Jesus ɔbbal balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa lɛkkwɔɔ uloko kusɛngɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bile ka bɛnaangmɛnɛ.

Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, mung ile ka imiinɛyɔng Jerusalem ka ɛfɛɛn a bale basam Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ. Vvenɛ bazza kɛkaal ammɛ battɛ ubbe, tɛ́ttɛ́ basammɛ bannyi Ikanakana,
ba bale banaangmɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit, bakkɔl libbaak ballɔtmɛ, batupmɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bawwɔɔlmɛ. Ɔzzànga ɔffɔnɛ bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
Bwaan a Zebedee ba bazzanganɛ James la John baffu bakup Jesus, battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, bɔfɛɛn bule baang bwa iggyannɛ ittɛ anaang annyiyɛlɛ.”
Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔka abbwɛ?”
Keem abbɛ battɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya ale ataa ka ugbaal a kibeet Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, iggyan ittɛ itaa la annɔ, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔtaawɔnɛ ka lufoom ɛlaabɔɔk, wa vvɔn ɔtaawɔ ka kwa ɛbyakɔm.”
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ba asanyɔng bwa alɔɔknɛyɔng. Vvenɛ abbɔ ayɛnyɔng akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam ɔɔ? Vvenɛ banaangwɔyɔng baptizim tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaangnɛ anaam ɔɔ?”
Keem battɛ, “Ibbɔ mung.” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nle ka nyɛnnɛ. Gɔɔ vvenɛ banaangwɔyɔng baptizim tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaangnɛ anaam.
Ɔzzànga lakke ba nyanga za kɛsanga balɔɔt ba bale bataanɛ ka lufoom ɛlaabɔɔk la ɛbyakɔm. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔsam bɛtaa ’byɔng baang unnyi balɔɔt ba ɔbamanɛbyɛ ulokobɛ.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba zzɔɔp bappyeenɛ ning baang, kutunbɛ kɔppyɛɛk James la John.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, uloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Asanyɔng mung attɛyɔng baggboggbo balɔɔt ka Ikanakana bayanga lakke battabɛ, bakɔɔm ɛkpansi biini bayanga lakke baffata.
Ning kkpong kkpong tɛ̀ttɛ́ kule la annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ buggboggbo, ule bɔɔyi ba abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk ule ubili ba abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Gɔɔ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ usi liffu ɔttɛ balɔɔt bataamɛ bubɔɔyi, ɔdɔkɔ uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔɔyi ɔlɔɔt, ubbe ɔttɛ nkwaaning ɔkkala balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bubbi abbɛ.”

Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ la kɛkaan a balɔɔt baffɔnɛ ka Jericho, battɛ basak bamii lusso lusso, ussi-ifim wa ɔzzanganɛ Barthimaeus, waan a Timaeus, wa ubbwoomnɛ lubbwoom, ɔdɔkɔ baang ka lufoom ɛtɔk ka ɔtaanɛ.
Uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ, baang Jesus waan a Nazareth, ammɛ ɔzzɔɔk kibungu eseese, ɔttɛ, “Jesus! Waan a David! Nbbewɔ lɛttɔ!”
Balɔɔt ppwap babummɛ kɛnaang ɔtaa zzum, ɔzzànga ɔdɔkɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔkama-ɔkama ubungu, ɔttɛ, “Waan a David, Nbbewɔ lɛttɔ!”
Jesus ɔkɔɔng baang ubee ɔttɛ, “Akkwɔɔmɛyɔng.” Ɔzzánga bakkwɔɔ ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang tɛ, babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Aggele, afeele amii, ɔkkwɔɔwɔbong.”
Ɔkkyaa ogbogbo ammɛ ɔzzɔɔk, ukut umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung aggyan attɛ nnaangwɔ ’bɔng?” Ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, nggyan nttɛ nppyɛlɛ nyɛn.”
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Amii, kiyila annɔ kɛnaangbong ɔppwawɔ.” Ukkwoong ɔyɛn eseese, ɔmma ukup Jesus ka ɛtɔk.
Baffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ laffɛ za lazzanganɛ Bethphage la Bethany, ka bale ka baffɔnɛ Jerusalem, basak baffɔ ka lɛttaal Olives. Jesus ɔsanga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ bakɔɔm bassɛ,
ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka lɛffɛ za lusso baang. Alenɛyɔng bakang lɛffɔ, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng waan eyim wa batakamɛnɛ kɛtɔm kɛlɔk littele ka basikinɛ baang. Akkyaayɔngyɛ affuyɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbapnɛ ɔttɛ, ning anaangyɔng kwa ’bɔng, bwɔɔlɔmɛyɔng attɛyɔng, ‘Uyini ɔttɛnɛ ikɔɔmyɛ imii, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtɔɔmyɛ eseese.’ ”
Ɔzzánga bamiinɛ bayɛn waan-eyim ka basikinɛ ka lɛmma kikkwu ka lufoom ɛtɔk. Ka balenɛ baang ka kɛkkyaayɛ,
balɔɔt balɔk ba balenɛ baang ka bappyɛɛknɛbɛ babapbɛ battɛ, “Baang anaangyɔng ’bɔng, abumyɔng kɛkkyaa waan-eyim ’wɔng baang ɔɔ?”
Badɔkɔ bappyɛlɛbɛ kamma gbɔɔ bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ulenɛbɛ lɛkamala, abbɛ bafɔngɔbɛ bamii.
Bakɔɔm waan-eyim ’wɔng baang, bafee Jesus. Basam igbogbo abbɛ bavvoongyɛ ka kkwɔɔt, Jesus ukut utteleyɛ ka libat.
Balɔɔt ggbadam bayaala igbogbo abbɛ ballɔt ka ɛtɔk, balɔk babbɔk liteet bavvoong ka ɛtɔk.
Balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk la bakupnɛbɛ ka isimi bazzɔɔk kibungu eseese battɛ, “Ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang Ɔlɔɔt wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini ppyɛɛ!
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang Itutum-a-Dedde ayyɔɔt Ubeet David ppyɛɛ! Ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
Jesus ɔffɔnɛ Jerusalem, umii usesele bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka ɛkɛtɛ elenɛ lɛsak ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, bagbata bamii Bethany la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa.
Ka libbessolo, Jesus buwɔɔng busaapmɛ ka bassinɛ Bethany bappyɛlɛ.
Ɔyɛn kɛssɛ sa bakkwɔɔnɛsɛ ‘Fig’ ka lusso bakang ka la livva ka kɛbbwɔtnɛ. Ammɛ umii ɔttɛ vvenɛ kɛwɔmbong nsan. Umiinɛ ɔdɔkɔ ule livva livva keem, ka ɛkɛtɛ kɛssɛ ’sɔng baang kɛwɔmnɛ ɛtakanɛ lɛffɔ.
Ɔzzànga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbbal lakkpo annɔ lizzi ba ɔbɛlɛ lile!” Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bappyee.
Baffɔnɛ Jerusalem, Jesus umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba balɔɔt ba bataanɛ bɛfɛɛn la ba balɛɛpnɛ lɔlɛɛp. Utut ikkpokolo ya bafoolo-ikkpoko, la igolo ya bataan-idugbɔɔnnyɛ, ɔzzɔɔk.
Gɔɔ usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛfɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔtɔkɔ bɔfɛɛn ɔsak ka isingili ya Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ɔzzánga ukopolo balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Bakkpɔkbong ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ’Ggwoon anaam lulenɛ ggwoon a luzɔɔm gwa balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ’, mung asikiliyɔngbonggwɛ lusseke kiddumu bassip.”
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bappyeenɛ ning baang, batini eseese baggyan ɛtɔk ya bale bawwɔɔl Jesus. Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, ka ulenɛ likopolo ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛ kibbi ’sɔng baang.
Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang.
Ka libbessolo, lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm, ka balenɛ baang ka bassɛnɛ ɛtɔk ɛtɔk, bayɛn lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang za lɛzzanganɛ ‘Fig’. Libbebong ɔkkpɛlɛ gbaak la iffaat.
Peter ukkenɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ, ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk, Ukopolo-lukopolo, kɛssɛ sa azɔɔmnɛ afɔngɔ kibbebong!”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ayilayɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɛnɛ ekpok ’yɔng ɛsamyɛ kɛyɔɔng emii ɛssɛɛn ka lihu, ɔsɛlɛnɛ bɛkangala ka luppyam, uyila ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔttɛ, kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ vvenɛ kɔnaang, vvenɛ kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk baning.
Kwakkwɛ baang nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng nttɛ: ɛkɛtɛ ya azɔɔmnɛyɔng aggyanyɔng bɔfɛɛn, ayila attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔyɔngbongbwɛ, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bɔfɛɛn duu bwa abapmɛnɛyɔng.
Ale ka assɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm, kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa kutunwɔnɛ la ɔlɔɔt kɔsaalwɔ, nkwaaning ssaawɔ wa ulenɛ ka libat ɔsɔɔkwɔ bubbi bwa alenɛ lɛnaang.
[Asinɛ balɔɔt ba banaangwɔnɛ bubbi lɛsɔɔk, ssaawɔ wa ulenɛ ka libat wɔ baala ɔsɔɔk bubbi bwa alenɛ lɛnaang.”]
Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛ baffu baffɔ ka Jerusalem. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bagɛlɛnya baffu babap Jesus ka ulenɛ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ukkpit Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ,
“Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ anaang kwa bɔng? Nnyinɔɔng unnyiwɔnɛ lakke?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam vvenɛ nnyiwɔyɔng lɔbap ggwɔn keem, appyɛlɛnɛnɛyɔng kamma, nzang vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lakke za nyanganɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ nnaang ning mung.
Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng, mung John nnyinɔɔng unnyimɛnɛ lakke za kɛnaang a baptizim; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ faa ɔssɛbibit?”
Bakangala abbɛ abbɛ baang battɛ, “Mung ile ɔlɔɔk nang? Ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ lakke, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbapyɛlɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ngkka ’bɔng isinɛ kwa John liyila?’
Ippyɛɛnɛ ittɛ, ‘Ɔssɛbibit unnyimɛnɛ lakke …’ ” (Kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛbbwɔpɔnɛbɛ, ka ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn la vvɔn ɔttɛnɛ John ɔdɔkɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.)
Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛ Jesus kamma battɛ, “Ayyɔɔt ba isan.” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔɔ anaam baala nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lakke za nkɔɔmnɛ nnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung.

Ɔzzánga Jesus utolo ka ifɛɛt unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Ɔbba kikoom ukkpitbwɛ, ɔkɔɔn bɛssɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ɔtɔɔk lubbe gwa bale bassɛɛn bɔfɛɛn bwa bukaamnɛ lakkpo-bɛssɛ, banaang batak. Ɔnaang kakkpa uloko ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatnɛ bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang. Ɔsam bɔtɔɔm ammɛ unnyi balɔɔt bappyɛɛk. Ammɛ biini ɔbbɛ umii kɔssɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya lakkpo-bɛssɛ lakootnɛ, ammɛ, Uyini-bɔtɔɔm, ɔtɔɔm ubili ammɛ ɔttɛ umii ɔtɔk etini ya ammɛ ka bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
Bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ammɛ bakaa ubili ’wɔng baang batup, baggbamɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ibɔɔk ibɔɔk.
Uyini-bɔtɔɔm ɔbbal ubili ɔlɔk lɛsanga ɔtɔɔm. Bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang batupmɛ bafaka lɛttɔ, bɛnaangmɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit.
Uyini-bɔtɔɔm ɔbbal ubili ɔlɔk lɛtɔɔm. Abbɛ bakaamɛ bapyɛl bawwɔɔl. Banaang babili ggbadam ning baang, batup balɔk, bawwɔɔl bakang.
Ɔdɔkɔ usseke waan a luppyam ammɛ keem ka ule ɔtɔɔm. Ka lakuma, ɔsanga waan ammɛ ɔtɔɔm ka bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm, ɔttɛ, ‘Nsan lɔsan nttɛ vvenɛ bannyi waan anaam latele.’
Ɔzzanga bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ waan Uyini-bɔtɔɔm. Affu iwwɔɔlmɛyɔng nkwaaning isam bɔtɔɔm ilɛkɛ!’
Ɔzzànga bakaa waan ’wɔng baang bawwɔɔl. Basanga ubbu ammɛ bazzɔɔk kukupa kikoom a bɔtɔɔm.”
Keem Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung Uyini-bɔtɔɔm ule ɔnaang nang? Vvenɛ uffu ɔwwɔɔl bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang, ɔsam bɔtɔɔm ammɛ unnyi balɔɔt balɔk bappyɛɛk.
Akkwɔɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng kkpal ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baning? ‘Lɛttaal za babɔɔk-a-ggwoon basamnɛ bazzɔɔk ka lisinɛ ka kukkaam lile, Lɛppyɛlɛbong litii ka kukkaam gaang gaang;
Nkwɔng Uyini ɔnaangnɛ; Bɔka bikɛɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk ning!’ ”
Bakɔɔm-ɛkpansi a Jews babummɛ kɛkaa, ka bakɔɔlɔnɛ battɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng baang Jesus ɔssa utumbɛ abbɛ. Ɔzzánga bamma kɛkaan ’sɔng baang, bagbata bakɔngɔmɛ bamii.
Batɔɔm balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Herod bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus la ibap ppwap battɛ, nzang bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔlɔɔk.

Baffɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, isan lɔsan ittɛ annɔ gbisii alɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn, gɔɔ kwa balɔɔt banngwanɛ ba abap. Ɔlɔɔt mkkpa uggbenge ka zzeen wɔ ba ule, ɔzzànga akopolo lɔkkwɔɔn gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ la ɔssɛbibit. Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, mung ibɛpɛbong Lafɔɔ ka innyinɛ Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome innamba ɔɔ? Ikkpelebɛ faa ifɔngɔ?”
Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ lagban za banaangnɛ baang ɔttɛ, “Abumnɛyɔng kɛssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ’bɔng? Asangayɔng siling affuyɔng nyɛn ee.”
Basanganɛ siling bafeemɛ ɔyɛn ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung lusso a nnyinɔɔng la lɛkɔɔl ammɛ?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Lusso Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome la lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.’
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔyyɛɛp! Annyiyɔng Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome bwa bulenɛ bwa ammɛ, annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Ɔzzánga kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang.
Balɔɔt a Sadducees, ba battɛnɛ balɔɔt ka lubbe baala bafungala, baffu balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ,

“Ukopolo-lukopolo, Moses ɔkkpɔknɛ lifɔɔ ’zɔng mung unnyiyɛlɛ ɔttɛ, ’Walam ubbenɛ ɔkɔngɔ wanavva ammɛ ka batakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛyanga, etele ammɛ ɔtɔk wanavva ubbu ’wɔng baang nkwaaning ɔfɔɔn bwɔɔn unnyi ubbu etele ammɛ.’
Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn, itele la itele balɔɔt bannambakkyaat batɔkbong bataa; Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk ɔtɔk wanavva, ubbe ka ɔtakanɛ waan lɛfɔɔn.
Etele ammɛ wa vvɔn ɔtɔk wanavva ubbu ’wɔng baang. Ammɛ ɔgbaa ɔssɛ ubbe ka ɔtakanɛ waan lɛfɔɔn. Wa vvɔn ɔbbalmɛ lɛtɔk, kɔdɔkɔ kɔnaang ning baang,

tɔttɔt kɔnaangbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ. Itele la itele ’yɔng baang balɔɔt bannambakkyaat batɔk wanavva ’wɔng baang baduda. Babbe ning baang bakɔngɔmɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔfɔɔnnɛ waan usi lile. Ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔssɛ ubbe.
Mung ɛkɛtɛ ya babbu ɔkkpɛlɛ bale bafungala ka kɛtɔm-a-kifungala ka lubbe, wanavva ’wɔng baang ule ule wa nnyinɔɔng ka ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ, balɔɔt bannambakkyaat balemɛnɛ lɛtɔk?
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Asɛpɛyɔngbong gaang gaang! Gɔɔ ba asanyɔng bwa nttɛnɛ asɛpɛyɔngbong ɔɔ? Ka asinɛyɔng Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan ɔlɔk lakke ammɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ya babbu bale bafungala bataa ka kuddu, basseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat, killu ba kɛbɛlɛ lile

Ilɔɔknɛ kwa babbu kifungala ka lubbe; ɔzzánga ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng Luvva Moses ka ɛfɛɛn a bakkpɔknɛ batum waan a kɛssɛ wa ɔkkɔmnɛ ɔɔ? Bakkpɔk baang battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔ Moses ɔttɛ, ‘Anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham, nle Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Isaac, nle Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Jacob.’
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanganɛ bukokolo la babbu. Asɛpɛyɔngbong gaang gaang!”
Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang. Ɔyɛnnɛ ka Jesus ulenɛ balɔɔt a Sadducees kamma bbwak bbwak lɛppyɛlɛ, uffu ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung Lifɔɔ ’zɔzɔng lɛtta liggbenge ɔkkpɛlɛ?”
Keem Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ lifɔɔ za littanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ liggbenge, ‘Balɔɔt a Israel agɔpɔlɔyɔng! Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, ulenɛ Uyini keem.
Annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Uyini ayyɔɔt, latele la luppyam annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la lɛfɛkɛlɛ annɔ, la luttina annɔ, la likke annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ!’
Uwɔng ulenɛ lifɔɔ za likupnɛ ’zɔng baang ka buggbenge; ‘Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ biini asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.’ Lafɔɔ lalɔk za laggbengenɛ latta za laffa ’zɔng mung ba labɛlɛ lile.”
Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Akemebong, Ukopolo-lukopolo! kule bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ attɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk ba ule ɔgbaa la ammɛ.

Kɔyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt utelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la luppyam ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la lɛfɛkɛlɛ ammɛ, la likke ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsaapmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔsaapmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng. Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka atelenɛ lafɔɔ za laffa ’zɔng mung gaang gaang, lutini awwɔɔlnɛ lakɔmɔlɔ ɔlɔk anaang latɔm lalɔk annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”

Jesus uppyeenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛppyɛlɛ kamma ammɛ kilenɛ gbɔɔ bbwak, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Fulufulu ba ale asseke Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Nkwɔng baang kɔsaalnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk wa ɔbbalnɛ lɛbbɔ unnyi Jesus lɔbap usi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
Jesus unnyibɛ lɔbap baang ka ulenɛ ka kikopolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔttɛ, “Anaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ battɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule ule waan a David?
Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaangnɛ David ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔk la Uyini anaam ɔttɛ: Taa mung ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk anaam, ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ nsam balɔɔt a kisikɔng annɔ nlokowɔ asing bukkpɔ.’
David biini ɔkkwɔɔnɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ Uyini, Ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔppyɛɛ ule waan a David?” Balɔɔt bayipi ka bataanɛ la lawaa bagɔpɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ukopolonɛ.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ukopolonɛ baang ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng kwa bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba bataanɛ bassɛ bakkpit la iwuulu abbɛ, baggyan battɛ balɔɔt banaangbɛ ‘Nggbeede’ ka lippya.
Bakkapa bɛtaa bya baggboggbo balɔɔt ka ssoon a mitin la ka ɛfɛɛn a bataanɛ bazzi kazzi bavva batak ka laggele.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baloko bwanavva-babbu baang banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ, batɔkbɛ ssala, ballu ka lagabwɔ. Bayɔɔ buggboggbo ka kɛzɔɔm a luzɔɔm ggbɔlɔng. Akama wa abbɛ ule ɔtta lɛbbɔl!”
Jesus ɔtaa ɔkkɛtɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a bassɛɛnnɛ ikkobo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt bassɛɛnnɛ ikkobo. Baggboggbo balɔɔt ggbadam bassɛɛn ikkobo baang ittala.
Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ukeewaan a wanavva-ubbu uffu ɔssɛɛn idele iffa, ning baang ka lutini a kobbo.

Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔng nttɛ ukeewaan a wanavva-ubbu ’wɔng mung ɔssɛɛnbong ikkpoko ka likulu-kɛssɛɛn-ikkpoko ’zɔng baang ɔtta balɔɔt ba bassinɛ bassɛɛn.

Mbɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bayanganɛ ikkpoko ggbadam, badɔkɔ basanga gbɔɔ ssup baffu bannyi nkwaaning ikkpoko abbɛ itaabɛ ssii. Ɔzzànga wanavva ubbu ’wɔng mung, la bulɔk ffet ba ule. Ɔsambong ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu unnyi. Ɔsambong bwa ɔyanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ uddu, uffu unnyi.
Jesus ɔgbata ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ vvɔn ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, ppyɛɛk bisse lattaal baang la ggwoon la ggwoon.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɔttɛ ayɛn mung ggwoon ’gwɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔttalanɛ? Gɔɔ lɛttaal zzɔn ning baala libee bbwak; vvenɛ babbum ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ baang ballɔt ka lisse.”
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ ka lɛttaal Olives, ɔppyɛɛk ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzánga Peter la James, la John la Andrew baffu bakupmɛ ka wɛɛk.
Battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ a ’kwɔng kule kɔnaang la bwa bule buyɔɔyɛlɛ buttɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛnaang.”
Keem Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔddɛmwɔyɔng agbigbiniyɔng.
Balɔɔt ba bappwanɛ balɔɔk babee la anaam, vvenɛ baffu babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng battɛ, ‘Anaam nlemɛnɛ ammɛ.’ Vvenɛ bakɔɔm ning baang bafɛɛt balɔɔt ggbadam.

Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng ka appyeenɛyɔng ka ballunɛ lɛkɔɔng kɛtɛkɛtɛ ɔlɔk ka appyeenɛyɔng kuttu lɛkɔɔng fulufulu. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛnaang, ɔzzànga ba bɛnaang bɛttɛ baang ulenɛ lakpeke a vveeng.

Lɔkaan lɔlɔk vvenɛ ballu la gwakang. Itutum vvenɛ imii kullu la itutum ilɔk. Ɛkpansi vvenɛ ɛnnyɛkɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Buwɔɔng vvenɛ buttɔ gaang gaang. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp bwa kɛmaat a waan ikeeng.

“Annyɔɔng biini akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Vvenɛ bakaawɔyɔng bamii ka ɔdda kɛkaal. Vvenɛ batupwɔyɔng ka ssoon a mitin; Vvenɛ abeeyɔng ka lusso bazzilɛttɔ la babeet ka kɔlɔɔk anaam nkwaaning abwɔɔlɔyɔngbɛ Kuttu-budoddo.
Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔffɔbong ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ lakpeke ɛffu.

Gɔɔ bakaawɔnɛyɔng bamii ka ɔdda kɛkaal, tɛ̀ttɛ́ luppyam lɔzzawɔyɔng ka asɛlɛnɛyɔng bwa ale atoloyɔng. Ɔffɔnɛ baang, alɔɔkyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl duu duu za liffuwɔnɛyɔng. Lɛmmwɔɔl duu za alɔɔknɛyɔng baang ka annyɔɔng ba lissi, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule kunnyiwɔyɔng.
Balɔɔt vvenɛ bakaa ikpana abbɛ bannyibɛ bawwɔɔl, gɔɔ ibassɛ balɔɔt vvenɛ bakaa bwaan abbɛ bannyibɛ bawwɔɔl. Bwɔɔntiti vvenɛ basikili bakaa ibakka la ibassɛ bannyibɛ bawwɔɔl.
Vvenɛ atunyɔng balɔɔt gaang gaang ka kɔlɔɔk anaam, ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ kiyila ’sɔng baang tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka lakpeke, vvenɛ uddu.
“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng ’Lakkpi za labbɔlnɛ’ ka lanaangnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a businɛ lɛnaang.” (Ɔkkwɔɔ-ɔkkwɔɔ akke tɛ:) “Balɔɔt ba balenɛ Judea vvenɛ bamma babbwulu lɛttaal.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka libat a ggwoon ammɛ ɔfɔngɔ liggbili kɛbɛpɛ za kɛmal ka ggwoon kɛsam bɔfɛɛn.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka lɛmma, ɔfɔngɔ kɛppyɛlɛ umii ɔsam ugbogbo ka ssala.
Vvenɛ bwanavva zzɛɛm la ibakka bwɔɔntiti ba batiinɛ sɛkɛsɛkɛ bayɛn akama ka bɛtɔm a kule kɔnaang!
Azɔɔm annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning lilɔɔk ’sɔng lisi ɛkɛtɛ lukook lɛnaang.

Lilɔɔk sa bɛtɔm a kule kɔnaang vvenɛ libbɔl gaang gaang litta sa lilenɛ lɛnaang ka vveeng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ussinɛ ɔlɔɔm vveengodde tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka gedegede mung. Akama wa ule ɔffɔ ning baang ba ɔbɛlɛ lile tɔttɔt vveeng ukpeke.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzabong bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang ɔzzɔɔk, usinɛ ning lile, ɔlɔɔt wa ule uddu baala ule. Ɔzza bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang ɔzzɔɔk kwa balɔɔt ammɛ ba ɔsanganɛ.
“Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ ɔttɛ, ’Yɛn Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ!’ ɔlɔk, ’Ppyɛɛkmɛ bakang!’ Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayilamɛkwɛ.

Ɔffɔnɛ baang, bakkala lɛlaak vvenɛ batuma battɛ abbɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ɔlɔk abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Vvenɛ banaang bɛmaanga la bikɛɛlɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ bakkwoongnɛ banaang balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ bagbigbini.
Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng! Mbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ya lile linaang ɛffɔ.
“Ɛkɛtɛ ya lilɔɔk ’sɔng lilenɛ lɛsaal, livve-luwee vvenɛ lizum, ekwukwɔɔn vvenɛ ba ɛbɛlɛ lɛllaat.
Bwaannttuma vvenɛ bassi ka libat battɔ ka lisse. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnnyɛkɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ za lalenɛ ka libat.
Ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ utuma ka ikkpálá lukkpaagbeedde la likke la latele za lɛbaang.
Vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bakkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ka ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi baloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
“Afɔngɔyɔng kɛssɛ kikopolowɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk. Kɛbbwɔtnɛ, livva liyaala, asan attɛyɔng eteep effubong.
Ayɛnnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya mbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bɛnaangnɛ, akɔɔlɔ attɛyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ utii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.
Akke attɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bɛnaangbong ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka kuddu gedegede mung babbe.
Libat la ɛkpansi vvenɛ bɛsak; ɔzzanga lɛmmwɔɔl anaam baala lɛsak ka nakanaka.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔsan kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ɔlɔk ɛkɛtɛ, ba ule. Gɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ ka libat la Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basan. Ule Dedde keem ka ɔsannɛ.
Ateleyɔng zzeen akatyɔng, taayɔng kkwetkkwet appyɛɛkyɔng ka asinɛyɔng lɛsan ka ɛkɛtɛ kule kɔnaang.
Kule kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa umiinɛ kɔssɛ ɔkɔngɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ ka ssala ka ulenɛbɛ lɛkamala ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang kɛnaang ammɛ. Ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔkat-a-lɛmma-ggwoon ɔttɛ ɔkat doddo.
Atele zzeen akatyɔng tɛ, ba asanyɔng ɛkɛtɛ Uyini a ssala ule ɔppyɛlɛ tɛ, ule ɔppyɛlɛ kulele oo, ɔlɔk kɛtɔm oo, ɔlɔk ka libbessolo oo! ɔlɔk mung ule ɔppyɛlɛ ka livve lɛttanɛ nsan.
Ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, ɔfɔngɔ wɔyɔng ka bilaa kɛyɛn.
Kwa nlɔɔknɛ mung la annyɔɔng, nlɔɔk ning la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ: ‘Akatyɔng tɛ!’

Usseke bɛtɔm bɛffa banaang Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ. Ka kazzi ’kwɔng baang, banaang brɛɛd wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bakɔɔm lagban baggyan ɛtɔk ya bakaanɛ Jesus ka wɛɛk, bawwɔɔl.
Battɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikaamɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang tɛ, nzang kullu vvenɛ kɔttɔ tɛ.”

Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ssala Simon wa ulenɛ la ɔffaal ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethany. Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka kazzi, wanavva uffu ɔmal la bilim a bannɛ ba bakkaamnɛ kappya gaang, ba banaangnɛbɛ la bɔfɛɛn bwa bakkwɔɔnɛbwɛ ‘Nard’. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔsam bilim ’pyɔng baang ɔbwɔɔt, usikili bannɛ ’bɔng baang, ɔllɔt Jesus ka lɛttɔ.
Kutun balɔɔt balɔk ba badɔkɔnɛ baang balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Kɛbbwak a bannɛ ’sɔng gbɔɔ kilenɛ ’bɔng?
Nzang bataanbong bannɛ ’bɔng baang ka lalɔp inaara zzɔɔp ning, basam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang bannyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.” Banyanga wanavva ’wɔng baang gaang gaang.
Ɔzzanga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Fɔngɔyɔng wanavva ɔlɔɔt! Anyangamɛyɔng kwa ’bɔng? Ɔnaangnɛbong kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo mung fet.
Balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ bale mung la annyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, kɔsaapwɔnɛyɔng akkwoong mung atteleyɔngbɛ. Anaam mung la annyɔɔng baala ntaa ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔnaangbong kwa ukkwoongnɛ; ɔllɔtnɛbong bannɛ ’bɔng baang ka kkwɔɔt, ɔbamanɛsɛ ɔkat kullu anaam ka lusso.
Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveengodde ya babwɔɔlɔnɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ babwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk kwa wanavva ’wɔng mung ɔnaangnɛ nkwaaning bakkemɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Judas wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba zzɔɔppabaffa ufeele umii ukup bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔttɛ ɔfɛɛt Jesus unnyibɛ.
Kɔsaapbɛ gaang gaang ka bappyeenɛ ning baang, bayilamɛ kinnyi ikkpoko. Ɔzzánga utte kɛggyan a kufuk kwa ule ɔfɛɛt Jesus unnyibɛ.

Kɛtɔm ikeeng sa bazzinɛ brɛɛd wa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn, ka kɛtɔm sa bawwɔɔlnɛ bwaan-itɔɔn ba Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus babapmɛ battɛ, “Aggyan attɛ ibama Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kwa annɔ, ilokowɔ ka yang?”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔsanga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa ɔtɔɔm, ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, waanwalam wa ɔtɔkɔnɛ bilim a bannyi vvenɛ ududawɔyɔng.
Kupmɛyɔng amiiyɔng ka ggwoon gwa ɔmalnɛ, abwɔɔlɔyɔng Uyini a ggwoon attɛyɔng; ‘Ukopolo-lukopolo ɔttɛ, lɛnɔk za ile itaa izzi Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ lile?’
Vvenɛ ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng lɛnɔk a ggwoon za lɛbaang ka libat. Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bile baang, abamayɔngbyɛ akatyɔngyɛlɛ.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng baang bagbata bamii ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Bamiinɛ, bayɛn bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ; abbɛ babama Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ baloko.
Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, Jesus baffu la balɔɔt ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa.
Badɔkɔ baang ka okkpokolo ka kazzi, Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ule mung wa ule ka uzzinɛnɛ issɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ile mung ka kazzi la anaam.”
Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ livve lɛbbɔlbɛ, babapmɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn vvɔn battɛ, “Nsan lɔsan nttɛ anaam nɛ ba akkwɔɔ, faa nang?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ule ule ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka kɛkaan annyɔɔng, balɔɔt ba zzɔppabaffa mung, Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔddɔk brɛɛd ka ulɔlɔ vvɔn la anaam.

Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ubbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ ubbe! Ɔzzànga akama vvenɛ ɔttala ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa uzzinɛ issɛ ammɛ. Gɔɔ kɔdɔkɔ kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka batakamɛnɛ nakanaka lɛmaat!”
Ka balenɛ baang ka kazzi, Jesus ɔsam brɛɛd ɔzɔɔm uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔtɔkmɛ ɔfaka unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔttɛ, “Atɔkyɔng, uwɔng ulenɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam.”
Ɔbbal ommonggo lɛsam, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsammɛ unnyibɛ; ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bavva ka ommonggo ’wɔng baang.
“Mung linnyi anaam sa littanɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ggbadam; linnyi anaam sa linaangnɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛkkaam.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ batak ’bɔng ba nbɛlɛ lɛvva ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa nle ka nvvanɛ ufaa batak ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Bazzɔɔk kisoom, bafeele bamii ka Lɛttaal-Olives.
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng mung vvenɛ amma akɔngɔnɛyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔwwɔɔl ɔkat-itɔɔn, itɔɔn vvenɛ ikkyama!’
Ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ lifungala ntaa kuddu, vvenɛ nkɔɔm ɛtɔk nssɛ nmii Galilee ka lusso annyɔɔng.”
Ɔzzánga Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam gɔɔ baala ngbata nkɔngɔwɔ, mkkpa ɔkkpɛlɛ bagbata.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔlnɛ bikkpit bɛffa kɛtɔm mung, akalabong bikkpit bɛkkyaat attɛ nɛ ba asan.”
Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam kkpong kkpong baala nlɔɔk ning baang, mkkpa bale ka bawwɔɔlnɛyɛlɛ la annɔ!” Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a Jesus ’bɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ bassɛ balɔɔk ning baang.
Baffɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛzzanganɛ Gethsemane, Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Taayɔng mung, nmii nssɛɛn luzɔɔm!”
Ɔkkwɔɔ Peter la James, la John bakupmɛ. Akama ɔnaangmɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la bukee.
Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bukee bwa bunaangnɛnɛ gedegede mung buggyannɛ kɛwwɔɔl fet. Ataayɔng mung agepeleyɔng.”
Utut umii ka lusso ssup ukun laddu, ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ nkwaaning usi akama lɛyɛn ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.
Ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Dedde, Dedde anaam! Lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ibɔɔk annɔ lile kkpɛkɛlɛm. Asam ommonggo akama ’wɔng assekenɛ. Ba nggyan nttɛ nnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛnɛ anaam, nggyan nttɛ nnaang kwa kɔsaapwɔnɛ annɔ.”
Ɔppyɛlɛnɛ uffu, ɔyɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba bakkyaat ka bilaa. Ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Simon, alaabong ɔɔ? Asibong likkwoong ataa kkwetkkwet ɛkalangaka nnyɔn gbɔɔ ɛsaal ɔɔ?”
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Agepeleyɔng akɔɔm assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm tɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ asiyɔng ka bubbi lɛttɔ. Luppyam lɔtɔɔmwɔyɔng mung, ɔzzànga ɛkkpakkwɔɔt ba eyila.”
Jesus ɔgbata umii ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm, ɔdɔkɔ ɔbbal ning baang lɛlɔɔk.
Ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔyɛnbɛ ka bilaa. Basi likkwoong bataa kkwetkkwet. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakingimɛnɛ basi lɛsan.
Ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Atiiyɔng baang ka amininɛyɔng alaayɔng ɔɔ? Kuddubong! Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong! Ppyɛɛkyɔng! Basambong Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi lakke banaang-a-bubbi.
Afeele imiiyɔng. Ppyɛɛk ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ issɛ anaam mung!”

Jesus ɔdɔkɔ utii ka kɛlɔɔk, ka Judas, wa ussinɛ ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa uffunɛ. Judas ɔdɔkɔ la kɛkaan a balɔɔt la iggɛ la iggɛ balɔk la ikkpong ka bakupmɛnɛ. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bagɛlɛnya batɔɔmnɛbɛ.
Uzzi-issɛ ɔggba kɛkaan ’sɔng baang lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa mgbugbamɛnɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa aggyannɛyɔng tɛ. Aggbɔmɛ amiiyɔng, isɔgya bakɔɔm bakatmɛ.”
Judas ɔffɔnɛ ɛffɔ-ɛffɔ, umii ssɔng ukup Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-Lukopolo!” ugbugbamɛ eseese.
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakaamɛ, baggbɔ izzi eseese.
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus vvɔn wa ulenɛ baang ka ubeenɛ, uttulu ogge ammɛ ɔsanga ɔkkwɛɛ kɔtɔɔk ubili Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang, ɔzza.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Affunɛyɔng kɛkaa la iggɛ la iggɛ, la ikkpong la ikkpong, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ ɔbɛpɛ-lafɔɔ ning ɔɔ?
Ndɔkɔ baang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka nkopolonɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm gɔɔ asinɛyɔng lɛkaa. Ɔzzànga kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ, vvenɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamma bakɔngɔmɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa uvvoongnɛ ulata-ubba ka kkwɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ukupnɛ Jesus. Babummɛ kɛkaa.
Ɔzzánga ɔmma kɛkɔɔ ɔkɔngɔ ulata ubba ammɛ ka isimi.
Basam Jesus bamii ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang, ka ɛfɛɛn a bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la bagɛlɛnya, la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balenɛ lɛggba.
Peter ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ fulufulu ukupmɛ ka isimi, umii ka isimi a ggwoon-a-kɛkaal ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang. Ɔtaa bakang la bakat-a-balɔɔt uwupa lɔkɔɔn.
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la balɔɔt a lusse baggyan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale balɔɔk babɛtɛ Jesus, nkwaaning bawwɔɔlmɛ. Lɛttɔ basi lɛtɔk tɔttɔt.
Keem ittɛɛsɛ ggbadam baffu bakkala lɛlaak babɛtɛ Jesus, ɔzzànga kutolo abbɛ bbwak bbwak ba kumii.
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt balɔk bafeele bakkala lɛlaak ’zɔng mung babɛtɛ Jesus battɛ,
“Ipyeebong ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ nbɛpɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung gwa balɔɔt banaangnɛ. Ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, vvenɛ nnaang lɔlɔk gwa usinɛ balɔɔt lile banaangnɛ.’ ”
Gɔɔ ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ kamma kutolo abbɛ kkwɔn kasi lile.
Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ufeele ubee ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyi Jesus lɔbap ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga ba akkwoong appyɛlɛ kamma ka balɔɔknɛ ning mung ɔkkpɛlɛ batumwɔ ɔɔ?”

Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ɔtaa zzum. Lɛmmwɔɔl ning usi lɛzza. Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ’wɔng baang ɔbbal lɔbap linnyi, ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ? Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa balɔɔt batelenɛ ɔɔ?”

Jesus ɔttɛ, “Iii tɛ, anaam tɛ. Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ule ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk a Dedde ayyɔɔt, wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge ɔkkpɛlɛ. Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ uffu la ikkpála ya libat.”
Ɔzzánga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔlɔm uwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ɔyaak. Ɔttɛ, “Ittɛɛsɛ ilɔk ba ibɛlɛ lɛggyan!
Appyeeyɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkpɛnnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baang ɔɔ? Annyɔɔng anngwayɔng nang?” Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ balɔɔk bubbi batummɛ, battɛ “Kɔbbɔlmɛbong, ule wa kɛwwɔɔl.”
Balɔɔt balɔk bakkɔl libbaak bavvoongmɛ. Baggbɔmɛ ubba ka lusso. Batupmɛ, battɛmɛ, “Attina, baang nnyinɔɔng utupwɔnɛ?” Isɔgya basammɛ batup labut.
Peter ɔdɔkɔ utii bakang ka isimi a ggwoon a kɛkaal ka ɔtaanɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ubili Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang wa wanavva uffunɛ.
Ɔyɛnnɛ Peter ka uwupanɛ lɔkɔɔn, ɔppyɛɛkmɛ ssii ɔttɛ, “Annɔ mgbaa adɔkɔ la Jesus wa Nazareth.”
Ɔzzánga Peter ɔkala ɔttɛ, “Anaam mɛ ba nsan … Gɔɔ ba nsan bwa atolonɛ atum.” Ulemɛnɛ kamma ning baang lɛppyɛlɛ, ɔgbata umii ka lɛmma kikkwu. Eseese, ulangkɔkɔ ɔkɔɔl.
Ubili ’wɔng baang ɔyɛnmɛnɛ baang, ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ba gbɔɔ ba babeenɛ baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng, ɔlɔɔt ammɛ ɔgbaa!”
Peter ɔbbalkwɛ lɛkangala. Gɔɔ ba ɔtaka ɔmmɛ, balɔɔt ba gbɔɔ ’bɔng baang babbal Peter lɛkaa battɛ, “Ka abɛlɛ lɛkala attɛ annɔ la abbɛ ba assɛ, ka annɔ ɔgbaa alenɛ wa Galilee.”
Ɔzzánga Peter ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Nyimbong nttɛ nlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn! Nkkalanɛ lɛlaak, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛ akama! Ɔlɔɔt wa alɔɔknɛ atumyɔng baang ba nsan.”

Eseese, ulangkɔkɔ ɔbbal lɛkɔɔl ka bikkpit bɛffa, ɔzzánga Peter ukke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ulangkɔkɔ ɔkɔɔlnɛ bikkpit bɛffa, vvenɛ akala bikkpit bɛkkyaat attɛ nɛ ba asan!” Ɔzzánga Peter ɔzzɔɔk kullu eseese.
Ɔffɔnɛ lɔfɔm, bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, bakkwɔɔ bagɛlɛnya la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ, la balɔɔt a lusse ɔkkpɛlɛ baloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn batini. Bakaa Jesus bassɛɛn ikpɔkɔlɔ, balɛkɛmɛ bamii bannyi Pilate.
Pilate ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ ubeet a Jews ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ baang.”
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bakatamɛ lilɔɔk ggbadam.
Keem Pilate ɔbbalmɛ lɛbap ɔttɛ, “Kamma baala appyɛlɛ ɔɔ? Agɔpɔlɔ appyee lilɔɔk sa bakatawɔnɛ baang.”
Jesus lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ usi lɛzza. Kɔkɛɛlɛ Pilate gaang gaang.
Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, Pilate ɔkkyaa ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔsaapnɛ balɔɔt, ka igbakɔpɔ ɔfɔngɔ.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka igbakkɔpɔ wa ɔzzanganɛ Barabbas la baggyan-a-kɔlɔɔk ba bawwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ka kullu.
Balɔɔt babbinɛ, babwɔɔlɔ Pilate battɛ ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔm-ɛlɔm.
Keem Pilate ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyan attɛyɔng nkkyaa ubeet a Jews nfɔngɔ ɔɔ?”
Pilate ɔkɔɔlɔbong kkpelegedee ɔttɛ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bàkàa Jesus bafeemɛ ka banaangmɛnɛ luleep.
Ɔzzánga bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bafeele babwɔɔlɔ Pilate battɛ lutini ’gwɔng ɔkkyaa Barabbas afɔngɔ.
Pilate ɔbbal kibbi ’sɔng baang lɛbap ɔttɛ, “Ngkka ɔlɔɔt wa akkwɔɔnɛyɔng ubeet a Jews nle nnaangmɛ nang?”
Babungu babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Azzengemɛ ka cross!”
Pilate ɔbbalbɛ lɛbap ɔttɛ, “Mung ule ’bɔng lɛnaang kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ?” Babungu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ likke lilenɛbɛ battɛ, “Azzengemɛ ka Cross!”
Pilate ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzánga ɔkkyaa Barabbas ɔfɔngɔ. Ɔddabɛ ɔttɛ batup Jesus, balemɛnɛ livve litup, basammɛ bamii bazzenge ka cross.
Isɔgya basam Jesus bamii ka isimi a ggwoon a kɛkaal ka ssala uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt abbɛ, bakkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ abbɛ baggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
Basam ubili ubba-babeet baggbɔmɛ, banaang kɛttɔpɔ bizebize battɔpɔmɛ ka lɛttɔ.
Bawomomo battɛ: “Lɛttɔ lɛtaawɔ oo, ubeet a Jews!”
Bakɔɔm bisse batupmɛ ka lɛttɔ. Batak libbaak ballɔtmɛ, bakun laddu bawomomɛ.
Balemɛnɛ livve lɛnyɔɔka, bakkyaamɛ ubba-babeet ’wɔng baang, bappyɛlɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya ammɛ biini bawɔkɔlɔmɛ. Basammɛ bamii kizzenge.

Baffɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk, bayɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon, ka ussinɛ ka kɛmat ule ka umiinɛ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Ɔzzánga isɔgya bakaamɛ ka lɛgabwɔ battɛ uttele Jesus ɔtɔkɔ cross. (Simon ussi Cyrene, ammɛ ɔfɔɔnɛ Alexander la Rufus)
Basam Jesus bamii ka ɛfɛɛn ya bakkwɔɔnɛ Golgotha, ning baang bakkwɔɔ “Ɛfɛɛn a ukɔɔk-a-lɛttɔ.”
Baffɔnɛ baang, babum kinnyi a Jesus batak ba banɔknɛ la Myrrh, Jesus ufim kɛvva.
Bazzengemɛ. Basam ibba ammɛ babɛngɛlɛ, batta illɔ basan kɛfaak sa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ule ɔsam.
Ɔdɔkɔ ikangala ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp ya lɔfɔm ka bazzengemɛnɛ ka cross.
Bakkpɔk bɛfɛɛn bya bakatamɛnɛ bamat baang, battɛ “Uwɔng Ubeet a Jews.”
Bassɛ bazzenge babbyap baffa baang babɛtɛ la Jesus, vvɔn ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk, wa vvɔn ka ɛbyakɔm.
[Ning mung ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔlɔɔk kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ kulenɛ lɛnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka lɔttɛnɛ, “Ɔdɔkɔ utul akama la babbyap.”]
Balɔɔt ba basaknɛ ka ɛtɔk, bannyɛkɛ lattɔ, banyɔɔka Jesus battɛ, “Iyyaa! Adɔkɔ attɛ atut Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm azzɔɔk, appyɛlɛgwɛ abɔɔk ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat keem lɔsaal!
Asini ka Cross gedegede mung akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng!”
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bassɛ banyɔɔka Jesus ning baang, balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ukkwoong kɛkkala balɔɔt balɔk, ba ukkwoongmɛ ɔkkalamɛ kɛyɔɔng!
Affu iyɛnyɔng Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ubeet a Israel ka ule ka usininɛ ka libat a cross uffu, nkwaaning iyila kwa ammɛ!” Babbyap ’bɔng baang ba bazzengenɛbɛ baang la Jesus bassɛ banyɔɔkamɛ.
Kikoon ɔggbaggba ning, usul ka ussinɛ ikalangka zzɔɔppiffa tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ikalangka ikkyaat.
Ɔffɔnɛ ikalangka ikkyaat ammɛ ubungu gaang gaang ɔttɛ, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabachthani?” Ning baang ulenɛ “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam, mbɔng ammanɛ akɔngɔnɛ?”
Balɔɔt balɔk bapyeenɛ ka ɔlɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ule ka kɛkkwɔɔ Elijah!”

Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔmma umii ɔsam okokkya ɔyan ka batak ba bangmanganɛ, ɔggbɔ ka lɛttɔ bissɛ. Uyeek okokkya ’wɔng baang umii ɔssɛɛn Jesus ka kamma ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔngbong ssii, itaa mung iyɛn vvenɛ Elijah uffu usinimɛ ka cross nsan!”
Jesus ɔfaka lɛmmwɔɔl a kullu, ubbe eseese.
Ɔzzánga ubba wa battanɛ bazza lɛnɔk ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaak bwalatata bɛfaak bɛffa.
Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt isogya ɔyɛnnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ubbenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn!”
Bwanavva balɔk badɔkɔ baang ka babeenɛ fulufulu bappyɛɛk. Mary Magdalene, la Mary, abakka James wa utiti la Joseph, la Salome badɔkɔ baang.
Bwanavva ’bɔng baang bakup Jesus ka ussinɛ Galilee bakɔɔm battelemɛ. Bwanavva balɔk badɔkɔ baang mgbaa ba bakupmɛnɛ baffu Jerusalem.

Kulele kɔnaangbong ning ka Joseph wa ussinɛ Arimathea uffunɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a latele ka lusse wa ɔkatnɛ ɛkɛtɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile iffu. Ɔdɔkɔ Kɛtɔm-ibama, (kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang kissolobong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔffɔ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ). Ɔzzánga Joseph ɔkkaam luppyam umii ɔbap Pilate ɔttɛ unnyimɛ ubbu a Jesus keem.
Kɔkɛɛlɛ Pilate ka uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ubbebong fet. Ɔkkwɔɔ uzzilɛttɔ-isogya ɔttɛ ɔbapmɛ, ɔmmɛbong ka Jesus ubbenɛ nsan.
Upyyeenɛ ka uzzilɛttɔ-isogya ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, Pilate ɔbwɔɔlɔ Joseph ɔttɛ ɔsam ubbu a Jesus.
Joseph ɔlɛɛp ubba-babbu, usini ubbu, ɔggbɔ ka ubba ’wɔng baang, umii ulli ka lilli za batɔɔknɛ ka lattaal. Uvvenɛ, ɔssang lɛttaal za lɛbaang ugupu ka kamma lilli.
Mary Magdalene la Mary, abakka Joseph, badɔkɔ baang ka bappyɛɛknɛ nkwaaning bayɛn ɛfɛɛn a ballinɛ Jesus.
Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kɛsaknɛ, Mary Magdalene, la Mary wa ɔmaatnɛ James, la Salome balɛɛp bannɛ ba bale ka bamiinɛ bappwɔɔng kkwɔɔt a Jesus.
Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a livve luzɔɔm, bafeele bamii ka lilli.

Baffɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk balɔɔk battɛ, “Nnyinɔɔng ule uttuluyɛlɛ lɛttaal ’zɔng baang usseke kamma lilli. (Lɛttaal liggbenge gaang gaang) Bayeeknɛ bappyɛɛk, bayɛn ka balenɛ lɛttaal ’zɔng baang littulu bappyɛlɛ isimisimi.
Ɔzzánga bamal ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli bayɛn waanwalam bakang ka ɔtaanɛ la balata iwɔkɔlɔ, luppyam lɔzzabɛ gaang gaang.

Ɔzzánga okolobya ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ luppyam lɔbɛlɛwɔyɔng lɛzza. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ aleyɔng ka kɛggyan a Jesus wa bazzengemɛnɛ ka cross. Mung ba ɔbɛlɛ lile, Ufungalabong ka lubbe! Ppyɛɛkyɔng ɛfɛɛn a bawulumɛnɛ mung.
Amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔgbaa la Peter attɛyɔng: ‘Ɔkɔɔmbong ɔssɛ ɔkɔngɔwɔyɔng umii Galilee; vvenɛ ayɛnmɛyɔng bakang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggbawɔnɛyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ.’ ”
Ɔzzánga batta ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli, bassi baang bamma la kiffula ka kɛtɔmnɛbɛ. Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ basi lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔssanga ka ɔbbwɔpɔnɛbɛ. ƆTƆM-ETUMULU LƐMMWƆƆL ƆLƆƆMƆLƆƆM ’ZƆNG
[Jesus ufungalanɛ ka lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a Livve-luzɔɔm ’zɔng baang, ɔdɔkɔ utte Mary Magdalene wa ɔggbanɛ lippyem linnangikkyaat ussekemɛ liduda.
Umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a Jesus ba balenɛ ka kɛtaa lisɛɛm la kullu la kullu.
Bappyeenɛ ning baang ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ufungalabong, gɔɔ ammɛ ɔyɛnmɛbong ka zzeen, bakangalamɛ.
Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Jesus ufoolo kɔlɔk utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka balenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii ka kɛmat.
Abbɛ bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii babwɔɔlɔ ba abbɛ. Basi liyila tɔttɔt.

Kɔsak lɛttala, Jesus utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a ammɛ zzɔɔppavvɔn ka balenɛ ka kazzi. Ɔwɔlɔbɛ ka basɛlɛnɛ kiyila, bakoolo kippyee kɔlɔɔk bagbaa. Akkwɛ baang kɔnaangnɛ bafim kwa balɔɔt ba balemɛnɛ lɛyɛn ikokolo babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ.
Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, akopoloyɔng lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa anaam, anaangmɛyɔng baptizim, vvenɛ uddu; wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila, vvenɛ ubbe.
Vvenɛ nnyi balɔɔt lakke za kɛnaang a bɛmaanga, vvenɛ bakkwoong bakɔɔm lɛkɔɔl anaam baggba lippyem; bakkwoong batolo bafaa likaan ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Mkkpa basam izzɔkɔ ka labɔɔk, ɔlɔk bavva bussi, kɔlɔk ning bɛ baala kɔnaang. Vvenɛ batele balɔɔt iffaak labɔɔk, ɔppwabɛ eseese.”
Jesus, Uyini, ulenɛ ning mung livve lɛlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, basammɛ, umii ka libat, ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a Jesus bafeele bamii bayaam Kuttu-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng. Uyini ayyɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka kɛnaang ’sɔng baang la abbɛ, ɔyɔɔ ɔttɛ lukopolo abbɛ lule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka bɛmaanga bya banaangnɛ.] ETUMULU YA ƆTƆM YA NNYƆN [ (9) Bwanavva ’bɔng baang bamii babwɔɔlɔ Peter la inngwa ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ. (10) Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Jesus biini ɔsanga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔtɔɔm ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ babwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo ’kwɔng kwa kusine likpeke kɛfal a kɛfal. ]
Nwomowɔbong Theophilus: Balɔɔt ppwap babumbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwoongnɛ bakkpɔk lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛyɛlɛ mung ka bɛzzɔkɔ, bassɛɛn ka luvva.
Bakkpɔk kwa balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ka zzeen ka ussinɛ ka lutte assɛ babwɔɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ.
Dedde, ka nlenɛ luppyam libbe nkoop lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ka lutte assɛ, nttina nttɛ kule kɔyyɛɛp ka nkkpɔknɛsɛ silididi, nnyiwɔ.
Nggyan nttɛ nkwaaning asan lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ sa balewɔnɛ likopolo.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Herod ɔdɔkɔnɛ ubeet ka ɛkpansi Israel, ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Zachariah wa ussinɛ ka kɛkaan a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm sa Abijah. Avva ɔdɔkɔ ɔzzanga Elizabeth. Elizabeth ɔgbaa ɔdɔkɔ ussi ka itutum a ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baffa badɔkɔ balɔɔt ba doddo ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Batele lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ.
Bwɔɔn basi lɛfɔɔn ka Elizabeth ɔdɔkɔnɛ ulleep. Ɔgbaa ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bakkpɛɛmbong gaang gaang.
Kɛtɔm ssɔn, Zachariah ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛnaang a kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ kɛbap sa ammɛ.
Ka eleme abbɛ, bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm badɔkɔ bakɔɔm illɔ, basangamɛ battɛ umii ɔfɔɔp bɛfɛɛn ka labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Keem umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Balɔɔt babbi ka vveeng, bazɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ kɛfɔɔp a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a Zachariah. Ɔkɔɔng baang ka kufoom ɛlaabɔɔk a labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za bafɔɔpnɛ bɛfɛɛn, ubee.
Zachariah ɔyɛnmɛnɛ, tɔkɔlɔ ɔbbɔlmɛ, ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ.
Ɔzzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Zachariah, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uppyeewɔbong luzɔɔm. Wanavva annɔ vvenɛ ɔmaatwɔ waanawalam. Akɔlɔmɛ John.
Vvenɛ aggele gaang gaang ka bale bamaatmɛ. Balɔɔt ppwap vvenɛ bassɛ baggele gaang gaang ka bale bamaatmɛ!
Vvenɛ ule ule ɔlɔɔt wa lɛbaang ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔvva batak nakanaka. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ kuvvoongmɛ ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm sa bale bamaatmɛ.
Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm balɔɔt a Israel ppwap, ɔppyɛlɛ ufee Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ.

Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk umii ka lusso la bɔkkaam la buggbenge tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Elijah uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Vvenɛ ɔnaang ibassɛ balɔɔt la bwɔɔn abbɛ bappyɛlɛ bataa ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Vvenɛ ɔnaang banaang-a-bubbi banaang ikɔlɔ, bakup ɛtɔk ya doddo. Vvenɛ ɔbama balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokomɛ.”
