Zachariah ɔlɔɔk la uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Nle nnaang nang nsan nttɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa alɔɔknɛ mung kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn? Anaam ntii ukuku, wanavva anaam ɔgbaa ɔkkpɛɛmbong.”
Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ Gabriel wa ubeenɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ammɛ ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ, ɔttɛ nffu nbwɔɔlɔwɔ kuttu kwa doddo ’kwɔng mung.

Ɔzzànga mung asibong bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ bwa bule bunaang ka ɛkɛtɛ ele ɛffɔ liyila. Ka alenɛ lifim liyila, vvenɛ nlakawɔ lɛkkɔ. Lɛmmwɔɔl vvenɛ ba abɛlɛ likkwoong azza tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa lilɔɔk sa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ mung lile linaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bale baang ka bataanɛ bakat Zachariah. Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka ɔmmɛmɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Zachariah ɔttanɛ ka vveeng, kɛlɔɔk usi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong. Abbɛ bakɔɔlɔ battɛ ɔyɛnbong biyɛnɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Usseke ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ka bɛnnɔ. Lɛmmwɔɔl lisi lɛbɛlɛ lɛtta.
Ɛkɛtɛ kɛnaang ammɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm elenɛ lɛsak, ɔppyɛlɛ ufula ka ssala ammɛ.
Ɔmmɛnɛ ssup wanavva ammɛ Elizabeth ɔyɛɛm. Usi ka ssala lɛgbata ka ittuma kubbwɔɔk. Ɔttɛ,
“Ebinukkpaapi ɛyɛnnɛbong kibbe-lɛttɔ, ɛyaammɛ, ɛsanganɛbong ka izzit ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Elizabeth ulenɛ lɛyɛɛm, ɔffɔmɛ ittuma bwɔlaaning, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔm uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ Gabriel, ɔttɛ, umii ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Nazareth ka ɛkpansi a Galilee.
Ɔttɛ umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ waanawanavva wa ɔtakanɛ walam lɛsan, wa Joseph wa ussinɛ ka kikkwu a David ɔggyannɛ. Waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔzzanga Mary.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Mary ɔttɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annɔ! Ebinukkpaapi ele la annɔ! Ɛnaangwɔbong ppyɛɛ ɔttala!”
Mary luppyam lɔzzamɛ ka uppyeenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ. Kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ utum.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ Mary, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm asaapmɛ gaang.
Vvenɛ ayɛɛm, amaat waanawalam wa ale akɔlɔmɛ Jesus.
Vvenɛ uggbenge bakkwɔɔmɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangmɛ ɔzzanga ubeet tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abassɛ, David, wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ɔdɔkɔnɛ.
Vvenɛ ɔzzanga ubeet ka kikkwu a Jacob. Kibeet ammɛ baala kikpeke yoyyoyyo.”
Mary ɔlɔɔk la uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Anaam kaang ntii waanawanavva wa ɔtakanɛ la walam limini. Nkwɔng kule kɔnaang nang, vvenɛ kule ning baang?”
Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ kuvvoongwɔ; lakke ammɛ vvenɛ lataa la annɔ. Ka kulenɛ ning baang, waan wa doddo ’wɔng baang vvenɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Akke attɛ ɔkpana annɔ Elizabeth wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ulleep, gedegede mung utiimɛ ittuma bwɔlaaning ka ulenɛ la zzɛɛm la lɛkkpɛɛm ’zɔng baang tɛ.
Kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ likkwoong ɔnaang ba kule.”
Mary ɔttɛ, “Anaam ubili a Ebinukkpaapi, kɔtaa ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ.” Ɔzzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔgbata ussekemɛ.
Ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang Mary ufeele la lazzuma la lazzuma, umii ka killu sa kilenɛ ikpok-ikpok ka Judea.
Umii ka ssala Zachariah, uwomo Elizabeth.
Elizabeth uppyeenɛ ka Mary uwomomɛnɛ, ubbu ufeelemɛ ka lɛmmɛ. Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuvvoongmɛ.
Elizabeth ɔlɔɔk ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛ ule wa annɔ ɔtta wa bwanavva ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ppyɛɛ ule wa waan annɔ wa ale amaat.
Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ uggboggbo kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔnaangnɛ ka abakka Uyini anaam uffunɛ ukoolonɛ?
Nppyeenɛ luwomo annɔ, eseese ubbu ufeelenɛ ka lɛmmɛ la laggele.
Ppyɛɛ ule wa annɔ wa ayilanɛ kwa Uyini ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyiwɔ.”
Mary ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Nbungubong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luppyam anaam.
Nggelebong kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Ɔkkala-ikkala anaam,
ka ulenɛnɛ anaam ukee-waan, ubili ammɛ, likke. Ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso, balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bakkwɔɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt a latele,
ka uggboggbo lilɔɔk ’sɔng sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ unnyinɛ, lɛkɔɔl ammɛ, lɛkɔɔl a doddo.
Ɔyɔɔ kibbe-lɛttɔ la balɔɔt ba batelemɛnɛ la kɛkkpa la kɛkkpa.
Utuulu kɔbɔɔk ammɛ; ubbum balɔɔt ba baggbengenɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng la ittina abbɛ.
Ɔggba babeet ka kibeet abbɛ, ɔssanga bakee-bwɔɔn bazzanga babeet.
Unnyibong balɔɔt a buwɔɔng kazzi kwa doddo; ɔggba balɔɔt ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ bamii ibɔɔk ibɔɔk.
Ulokobong nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt iyɛddɛiyɛddɛ, ɔttɛ vvenɛ uffu uttele balɔɔt ammɛ Israel.
Ukkebong Abraham la kikkwu ammɛ, babbemɛ lɛttɔ kɛfal a kɛfal.”
Mary ɔtaa la Elizabeth ka ittuma ikkyaat tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔppyɛlɛ ufula ka ssala ammɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔ Elizabeth ya kɛmaat, ɔzzánga ɔmaat waanawalam.
Bakulufal ammɛ la ikpana ammɛ bappyeenɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baggele ka budoddo bwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ Elizabeth.
Waan ’wɔng baang liwaazɛ liffumɛnɛ, bakɔɔmnɛ baffu kɛzza lɛtaa. Badɔkɔ battɛ bakɔlɔmɛ Zachariah, lɛkɔɔl a abassɛ.
Ɔzzánga Mary, abakka, ɔttɛ “Maaye oo! ɔzzànga John.”
Balɔɔk la abakka battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng ka itutum annɔ ba ule!”
Ɔzzánga balɔɔk ka bɛnnɔ, babap Zachariah, abassɛ waan, lɛkɔɔl za waan ammɛ ule ɔzzànga.
Zachariah ɔggyan luvva gwa kɛkkpɔk. Ɔkkpɔk ɔttɛ, “Lɛkɔɔl ammɛ ule ɔzzanga John.” Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ.
Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Zachariah ɔbbal kɛlɔɔk likkwoong. Ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Bakulufal ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ. Ɔzzánga kuttu kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ ka billu bya ikpok-ikpok ka Judea.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ kuttu ’kwɔng baang uttina utumkwɛ. Ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Waan ’wɔng baang ule ule bɔng?” Baggba lɛsan battɛ likke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile la ammɛ.
Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuvvoong Zechariah, abassɛ a John, Zechariah ɔlɔɔk kwa bɔtɔɔm a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ,
“Affu ibunguyɔng Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Israel, ka ulenɛ liffu ɔkkala balɔɔt ammɛ.
Unnyibongyɛlɛ Ɔkkala-ikkala wa lɛbaang wa ussinɛ ka kikku waan ammɛ David.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk bakɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyila ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ayyɔɔt la balɔɔt ba itunnɛbɛ.
Ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ bagɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ. vvenɛ ɔnaang nsekele ammɛ wa lɔkkwɔɔn.

Ɔnaang nsekele la Abraham, ɔgɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, uyim ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔsangayɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ayyɔɔt, ɔfɔngɔyɛlɛ iyilamɛ bɔtɔɔm ammɛ isɛlɛ bbwɔp ilokoyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng doddo, inaang lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa liyyɛɛpnɛ ka lusso ammɛ tɔttɔt ikkpɛɛm ibbe.
“Annɔ waan anaam, bale bakkwɔɔwɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa libat. Vvenɛ akɔɔm ɛtɔk amii alɔngɔlɔ ɛtɔk Uyini alokomɛ.
Vvenɛ abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ammɛ attɛ vvenɛ ɔkkalabɛ ka ule asɔɔkbɛ bubbi abbɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt ibbemɛ lɛttɔ, ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ doddo. Vvenɛ ɔnaang buppwolo kuddu, buppwolo ka ayyɔɔt.
Vvenɛ buppwolo ’bwɔng baang bussi ka libat buvvoong balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul a ntɛm a lubbe, vvenɛ ɔkat lakaat ayyɔɔt, issɛ ka ɛtɔk a bɔkaat.”
Waantiti ɔmmala uggbenge ka kkwɔɔt la lɔtan, ullu ka kasɛkɛ atingating tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa ule ɔtta ka lusso balɔɔt a Israel.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ubeet Augustus ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɔkaan ammɛ ɔttɛ bassɛɛn lakɔɔl abbɛ ka luvva lukkwoon.
Ka lukkwoon gwa ikeeng, Quirinius ɔdɔkɔnɛ uzzilɛttɔ a Syria.
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt umii ɔssɛɛn lɛkɔɔl ka lɛffɛ ammɛ.
Joseph ufeele ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Nazareth ka Galilee umii Judea ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethlehem ka ɛfɛɛn ya bamaatnɛ ubeet David. Joseph biini umii ka ussimɛ ka kikkwu ubeet David.
Umii ɔssɛɛn lɛkɔɔl ammɛ la za Mary wanavva iggyan ammɛ. Mary ɔdɔkɔ la zzɛɛm.
Baffɔnɛ Bethlehem, Mary ɔppwɔlɔ imala.
Ɔzzánga ɔmaat waan-ikeeng ammɛ, uvvoongmɛ ibba, ɔsammɛ uwula ka okolokpaaka wa bassɛɛnnɛ lakɔmɔlɔ kazzi, ka kufuk kusinɛ lile kwa bataanɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon.
Bakat-itɔɔn badɔkɔ baang ka bakkwununɛ la itɔɔn abbɛ ka kɛmat, ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ebinukkpaapi utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balenɛ. Buppwolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm buppwolo bullɔtbɛ. Ɔzzánga bakat-itɔɔn ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Nkɔɔm kuttu kwa doddo kwa kule kunnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ laggele, nfeewɔyɔng.
Bamaatbong Ɔkkala-ikkala annyɔɔng ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn ka lɛffɛ a David. Ammɛ ulenɛ Christ, Uyini.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kule kɔnaang ayilayɔng: vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng waan-ufaa wa bavvoongmɛnɛ ibba, bawulu ka okolokpaaka.”
Kɛkaan a bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ppwap kissi ka libat kituma, kitipili la kisoom la kisoom kuffu kɛgbaa uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ikeeng, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ babungu battɛ,
“Latele lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat, bɔkaat butaa la balɔɔt ba basaapmɛnɛ ka ɛkpansi.”

Bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bagbatanɛ bassekebɛ bappyɛlɛ bamii ka libat, bakat-itɔɔn balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Feele, immiiyɔng Bethlehem. Imii iyɛnyɔng kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kwa kulenɛ lɛnaang; Ebinukkpaapi eleyɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ.”
Ɔzzánga bazzuma bamii bayɛn Mary la Joseph la waantiti ka bawulunɛ ka okolokpaaka.
Bakat-itɔɔn bayɛnnɛ waantiti, babwɔɔlɔbɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ utum waan ’wɔng mung.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kwa bakat-itɔɔn babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ.
Mary ukke lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, uttina gaang gaang utumsɛ.
Bakat-itɔɔn bappyɛlɛ isimisimi la kisoom la kisoom; babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ sa bappyeenɛ bale ka zzeen lɛyɛn; kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ.
Bɛtɔm bɛnnambɛkkyaat ka bɛnnambɛnna bɛffɔnɛ bya bale ka bazzanɛ waantiti lɛtaa, bakɔlɔmɛ Jesus, lɛkɔɔl za uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔlɔmɛnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya batakamɛnɛ lɛyɛɛm.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya Joseph la Mary bale ka banaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ a Moses lalɔɔknɛ, bamii lɛtɔm a kɛzzaa laggbo. Ɔzzánga basam waantiti, bamii Jerusalem kikkpele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkpɔknɛ ka Luvva-lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Lutini ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a waanawalam wa battenɛ lɛmaat, balokomɛ zzekep, bakɔɔmmɛ bafee Ebinukkpaapi.”
Abbɛ ɔgbaa bamii banaang lɛtɔm la lakkpelekete laffa ɔlɔk bitook idugbɔɔnnyɛ bɛffa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lalɔɔknɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ullunɛ Jerusalem, wa ɔzzanganɛ Simeon. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ bɛnaang, utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛkat ɔttɛ balɔɔt a Israel batta ka kɔlɔɔk. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔdɔkɔ la ammɛ.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔyɔɔmɛbong ɔsan ɔttɛ baala ubbe tɔttɔt ɔyɛn Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaang Simeon umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya abakka la abassɛ Jesus bakɔɔmmɛnɛ bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ.
Simeon ɔsam waantiti ɔkɔɔm ka eddu, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔttɛ,
“Dedde, alokobong nsekele annɔ; afɔngɔ ubili annɔ umii ka bɔkaat.
Nkɔɔmbong zzeen anaam nyɛn kuddu annɔ,
kwa alenɛ lɛnaang ka lusso ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ:
Uwɔng ulenɛ buppwolo bwa buyɔɔnɛ Ikanakana ɛtɔk annɔ, bukɔɔm latele bufee balɔɔt annɔ Israel.”
Abassɛ a Jesus la abakka kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka lilɔɔk sa Simeon ɔlɔɔknɛ utum waantiti.

Simeon ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔlɔɔk la Mary, abakka Jesus ɔttɛ, “Waan ’wɔng mung Ebinukkpaapi ɛsanganɛ ɛttɛ, ɔnaang balɔɔt ggbadam ka Israel battɔ; ɔnaang balɔɔt ggbadam bafeele. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ eleme ya essinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ya balɔɔt ggbadam bale bafimyɛ,
bayɔɔ bwa battinanɛ. Akama vvenɛ ɔkɔmwɔ annɔ ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ogge ɔkɔmwɔnɛ.”
Wanavva vvɔn ule baang wa uppyeenɛ kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Anna, waan a Phanuel wa ussinɛ ka ɛsam a Asher. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔgɛlɛnya wanavva wa ulenɛ walam lillu ka likkpa linnangikkyaat.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔtaabong lisse ulam ka lalɔp a likkpa lanna la likkpa linna. Kikoon gɔɔ kɛtɔm usi lɛgbata usseke Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔtaa baang ɔzɔɔm, ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk ɔzɔɔm buwɔɔng a buwɔɔng, unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak ka uffunɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; uyeek, ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a waantiti ’wɔng baang ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ baang ka kɛtaa kɛkat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ uffu ɔkkala Jerusalem.
Balenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm laggyannɛ livve lɛnaang, bappyɛlɛ bamii ka lɛffɛ abbɛ Nazareth, ka Galilee.
Ɔzzánga waantiti ɔmmala, ɔkkaam la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk, ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ la ammɛ.
Kukkpa la kkwɔn, abassɛ a Jesus la abakka bamii Jerusalem ka Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ.
Ɔffɔnɛ ka Jesus ulenɛ likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa lɛffɔ bamii kazzi ’kwɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bataanɛ bamii.
Bɛtɔm a kazzi ’kwɔng baang bilenɛ lɛsaal, bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii ka ssala, bakɔngɔ Jesus ka Jerusalem. Abassɛ la abakka basi lɛsan battɛ Jesus utii ka isimi.
Badɔkɔ battina battɛ ule ka kɛkaan sa lusso. Batɔk kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ, baggyan Jesus, babap ikpana abbɛ la inngwa abbɛ.
Basimɛ lɛyɛn. Bappyɛlɛ bamii isimisimi, baggyanmɛ ka Jerusalem.
Ɔggba ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat bayɛnmɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔtaanɛ la balɔɔt a Jews ba bakopolonɛ Lafɔɔ.
Ɔgɔpɔlɔ kwa balɔɔknɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka kɛppyɛlɛ kamma sa ɔppyɛlɛnɛbɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa ɔsannɛ.
Abakka la abassɛ bayɛnmɛnɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ. Abakka ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam, mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ anaangyɛlɛ ning ee? Anaam la ssaawɔ iggyanwɔbong likke lɛsaal!”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Aggyannɛyɔng bɔng? Ba asan attɛyɔng ntii wa ntaanɛ ka ggwoon a Dedde anaam ɔɔ?”
Gɔɔ basi lɛsan kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyibɛ.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele ukupbɛ. Bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii Nazareth ka ulenɛ waan wa utelenɛbɛ. Abakka ɔsam lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔssɛɛn ka luppyɔm.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔmmala uggbenge la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk. Ɔyanga latele ka Lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Ɔssɛbibit.

Ɔdɔkɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ubeet Tiberius ɔggbamɛnɛ likkpa zzil ka kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Pontius Pilate ɔdɔkɔ uzzilɛttɔ Judea; Herod ɔdɔkɔ uzzilɛttɔ Galilee; Philip, etele Herod, ɔdɔkɔ uzzilɛttɔ Iturea la Trachonitis; Lysanias ɔdɔkɔ uzzilɛttɔ Abilene.
Annas la Caiaphas badɔkɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba labaang. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang elenɛ ya lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liffunɛ likup John, waan a Zechariah ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.
Ɔzzánga ufeele umii ukopolo ukkpit laffɛ za lakkpitnɛ lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan, ɔttɛ, “Afooloyɔng eleme annyɔɔng, anaangyɔng baptizim; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng.”

Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Isaiah, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛkkpɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luvva ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ule bakang ning ka ɔgaganɛ ka kɛmat ɔttɛ, ‘Alɔngɔlɔyɔng ɛtɔk Uyini alokomɛyɔng. Anaangyɔngyɛ bit alokomɛyɔng, ɔssɛ.
Lutini inɔngɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ilenɛ ka ɛtɔk a Uyini asalyɔngyɛ. Abutyɔng ikpok ɔkkpɛlɛ la lattaal. Itɔk ya ikokonɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, vvenɛ banaangyɛ ituulu. Lafoom za labbɔlnɛ, vvenɛ banaangzɛ lasɔnɔ.
Ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn kɛkkala ikkala sa kissinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm’.”

Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam kiffu ka ɛfɛɛn a John, battɛ ɔnaangbɛ baptizim. John ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng, Izzɔkɔ yɔng. Nyinɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ akkwoong mung amma akɔngɔyɔng binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm pya bile ka biffunɛ?

Anaangyɔng bɛnaang bya ɔlɔɔt ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ afoloyɔngbong ileme annyɔɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ataayɔng baang attɛyɔng, ‘Abraham ulenɛ dedde ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ.’ Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔsam lattaal ’zɔng mung, ɔnaang lasikili bwɔɔn a kikkwu Abraham.
Ɛbwɔt etii ka kɛfɔk a kɛssɛ kɛzzɔɔk. Kɛssɛ duu sa kisinɛ lakkpo za doddo lɛwɔm, vvenɛ bafɔksɛ bazzɔɔk; babbɔksɛ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn kɛkkɔm.”
Balɔɔt babapmɛ battɛ, “Ngkka ile inaang nang?”
Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanga iwɔkɔlɔ iffa, ɔsanga vvɔn, unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lɛyanga. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanganɛ kazzi, ɔbɛngɛlɛkwɛ la ba abbɛ.”
Batɔk-innamba balɔk baffu kɛnaang a baptizim. Ɔzzánga babapmɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung ile inaang nang?”
Ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkyɔng innamba asakyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ battɛnɛ atɔkyɔng.”

Isodya ilɔk ɔgbaa babapmɛ battɛ, “Ngkka kwa ayyɔɔt bɛɛ, ile inaang nang?” Ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkyɔng ikpoko balɔɔt ka lɛgabwɔ, ɔlɔk abbwa attɛyɔng bazzɔɔkbong kɔlɔɔk. Appyɛɛkyɔng kwa ikipili annyɔɔng keem.”
Ippyam balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ifeele, battina kɔlɔɔk a John battɛ, vvenɛ baang Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ tɛ!

Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam nnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la bannyi; ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge ule ka uffunɛ, gɔɔ anaam ba nkkɔnɔ wa nkkyaanɛ ikkpa bukkpɔ ammɛ. Ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lɔkɔɔn.
Ɔyanga uggul-a-bɛfɛɛn baang wa uggulnɛ bippwo, ɔllɔt. Ulenɛ livve liggul, uggumu ifɔɔk umii ubbi ka lɛnɔk, ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ɔttɔng lɔkɔɔn ɔssɛɛn bippwo. bɛkkɔm.”
John utut balɔɔt ka lilɔɔk ggbadam ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛbɛ ka kikopolo Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔk utum uzzilɛttɔ, Herod, ka ɔtɔknɛ Herodias wanavva etele ammɛ. Ɔgbaa, Herod ɔbbal bɛfɛɛn bya bɛbbɔlnɛ ggbadam lɛnaang.
Ɔzzánga Herod ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ kɔsak, ka ɔkaanɛ John ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ.
John ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ baptizim lɛnaang, ɔssɛ ɔnaang Jesus baptizim. Jesus ule baang ka ɔzɔɔmnɛ, libat liwongolo.
Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lekpelekete kuvvoongmɛ. Lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka libat lɛttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan a luppyam anaam, asaapnɛ gaang.”
Jesus ka uttenɛ kɛnaang ammɛ, ɔdɔkɔ lɔlɔp la likkpa zzɔɔp. Balɔɔt battɛ Jesus ɔdɔkɔ waan a Joseph, Joseph wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ waan a Heli.
Heli, waan a Matthat. Matthat, waan a Levi. Levi, waan a Melchi. Melchi, waan a Jannai. Jannai, waan a Joseph.
Joseph, waan a Mattathias. Mattathias, waan a Amos. Amos, waan a Nahum. Nahum, waan a Esli. Esli, waan a Naggai.
Naggai, waan a Maath. Maath, waan a Mattathias. Mattathias, waan a Semein. Semein, waan a Josech. Josech, waan a Joda.
Joda, waan a Joanan. Joanan, waan a Rhesa. Rhesa, waan a Zerubbabel. Zerubbabel, waan a Shealtiel. Shealtiel, waan Neri.
Neri, waan a Melchi. Melchi, waan a Addi. Addi, waan a Cosam. Cosam, waan a Elmadam. Elmadam, waan a Er.
Er, waan a Joshua. Joshua, waan a Eliezer. Eliezer, waan a Jorim. Jorim, waan a Matthat. Matthat, waan a Levi.
Levi, waan a Simeon. Simeon, waan a Judah. Judah, waan a Joseph. Joseph, waan a Jonam. Jonam, waan a Eliakim.
Eliakim, waan a Melea. Melea, waan a Menna. Menna, waan a Mattatha. Mattatha, waan a Nathan. Nathan, waan a David.
David, waan a Jesse. Jesse, waan a Obed. Obed, waan a Boaz. Boaz, waan a Salmon. Salmon, waan a Nahshon.
Nahshon, waan a Amminadab. Amminadab, waan a Admin. Admin, waan a Arni. Arni, waan a Hezron. Hezron, waan a Perez. Perez, waan a Judah.
Judah, waan a Jacob. Jacob, waan a Isaac. Isaac, waan a Abraham. Abraham, waan a Terah. Terah, waan a Nahor.
Nahor, waan a Serug. Serug, waan a Reu. Reu, waan a Peleg. Peleg, waan a Eber. Eber, waan a Shelah.
Shelah, waan a Cainin. Cainin, waan a Arphaxad. Arphaxed, waan a Shem. Shem, waan a Noah. Noah, waan a Lamech.
Lamech, waan a Methuselah. Methuselah, waan a Enoch. Enoch, waan a Jared. Jared, waan a Mahalaleel. Mahalaleel, waan a Cainan.
Cainan, waan a Enos. Enos, waan a Seth. Seth, waan a Adam. Adam, waan a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Jesus ussi Jordan, ɔppyɛlɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luppyam. Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔmanamɛ umii ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.
Baang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ɔllɛmɛnɛ ka lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, kazzi usi lizzi. Ulenɛ lɛsak lɛtaa, buwɔɔng busaapmɛ.
Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, anaang lattaal ’zɔng mung lasikiliwɔ kazzi.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt kwa kazzi kɛyɔɔng ba uddu!’ ”
Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ’wɔng baang ɔsammɛ, umii ɔyɔɔmɛ kibeet a vveengodde ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup.
Ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nsɔɔkwɔ kibeet ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ nnyiwɔ lakke ngbaa. Baggbanɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ linnyi. Nkkwoong mung nsam nsɔɔk ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔsaapnɛnɛ.
Akunnɛnɛ laddu mung ka lusso, vvenɛ nsam bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ nsɔɔkwɔ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛyɔɔng. Ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ulenɛ wa kinnyi latele!’ ”
Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ɔsammɛ umii ka Jerusalem, uttele ka ɛfɛɛn ya eggolonɛ gaang gaang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔttɛ, “Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, akut attɔ ka lisse ee.
Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ baffu bakatwɔ.’
Lɔbbal lɛttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ bakimiwɔ la labɔɔk abbɛ nkwaaning asi lɛttɔ, alip bukkpɔ ka lattaal!’ ”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ allɛ Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ’.”
Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ’wɔng baang uvvenɛ Jesus lɛllɛ, ɔgbata, ussekemɛ ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup.
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ, umii Galilee. Lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ladɔkɔ baang la ammɛ. Kuttu a Jesus kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi a Galilee.
Ukopolo ka idda-mitin abbɛ. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ babungumɛ.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele umii Nazareth, ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɔtaanɛ uggbenge. Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, ufeele umii ka ggwoon a mitin tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔmɛlɔm. Umii ɔkkwɔɔ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Basam luvva gwa Isaiah ɔkkpɔknɛ kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bannyimɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔkkyaa luvva ’gwɔng baang, ɔyɛn ka ɛfɛɛn ya bakkpɔknɛ battɛ,

“Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kutii mung la anaam. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛnɛ lakke, ɔttɛ nyaam Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ, nbwɔɔlɔ bakee-bwɔɔn. Ɔtɔɔmnɛbong ɔttɛ nmii nyaam nbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bakaanɛbɛ nttɛ battabong ka kɔlɔɔk; Nnaang bassi-ifim bayɛn. Nsanga balɔɔt ka akama,
nyaam nbwɔɔlɔ kukkpa kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkkala balɔɔt ammɛ.” Ɔkkwɔɔ kutolo ’kwɔng mung ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ.
Uvvenɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ luvva ɔkkɔt, ɔsam unnyibɛ, ɔtaa-ɔtaa. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ka ɔdda-mitin ’wɔng baang bagbep Jesus lɛppyɛɛk.
Ammɛ ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ kɔnaangbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ appyeenɛyɔng.”
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baggele, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ la bayyoyyo lammwɔɔl za ɔlɔɔknɛ. Babap battɛ, “Ɛtɛ! Mung waan a Joseph lissi ɔɔ?”

Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nsan lɔsan nttɛ, vvenɛ assanɛyɔng ifɛɛt ’yɔng, ‘Uttula-ittula, attulawɔ kɛyɔɔng.’ Vvenɛ assɛ alɔɔkyɔng la anaam attɛyɔng, ‘Anaang kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk sa babwɔɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ ka anaangnɛ ka Capernaum mung ka ɛkpansi annɔ biini.’
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm latele ba ɔyanga ka lɔkaan ammɛ biini.
Gɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng! Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, bwanavva ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ badɔkɔ ggbadam ka ɛkɛtɛ Elijah. Usi lɛbɛlɛ liteep ka likkpa likkyaat la kufaak; buwɔɔng buttɔ ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Gɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Elijah usi lɛtɔɔm umii ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ka Israel. Ɔtɔɔmmɛ umii ka wanavva ubbu vvɔn wa ussinɛ Zarephat ka ɛkpansi Sidon.
Balɔɔt-ɔffaal badɔkɔ baang ggbadam ka Israel ka ɛkɛtɛ Elisha, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ka Israel wa ɔppwamɛnɛ usi lile. Ɔdɔkɔ Naaman keem wa ussinɛ Syria ka ɔppwamɛnɛ.”
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba badɔkɔnɛ ka ɔdda-mitin ’wɔng baang kutunbɛ ka bappyeenɛ ning baang.
Bafeele, battulu Jesus, batta ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Basammɛ bamii ka libat ekpok ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala abbɛ, nkwaaning bassimɛ bassɛɛn ka ebutu, ɔttɔ ubbe.
Jesus ufeele ɔfaka kibbi ’sɔng baang, ɔsak, umii ka ɛfɛɛn a kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Jesus umii ka Capernaum ka Galilee ka ɛfɛɛn a ukopolonɛ balɔɔt ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka itɔk a lilɔɔk sa ukopolonɛbɛ. Lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ lɛyanga lakke.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔdda wa ɔyanganɛ ipiliza. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ubungu ɔgaga.
Ɔttɛ, “Kaang aggyanbɔng la ayyɔɔt, Jesus wa Nazareth, affuyɛlɛ kɛwwɔɔl ɔɔ? Nsan mung ɔlɔɔt wa alenɛ. Annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ.”
Jesus ɔkkpa ipiliza lɛmmwɔɔl ɔttɛ, “Taa zzum. Atta, assekemɛ!” Ipiliza izzɔɔk ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lusso balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ. Eseese igbata issekemɛ, bulɔk isimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛnaang.
Utini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ, balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Kɛssanga lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi yang? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔyanga lakke za ɔggbanɛ ipiliza, itta, isseke balɔɔt.”
Kuttu a Jesus kɔwaala ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Jesus ɔtta ka ɔdda-mitin umii ka ssala Simon. Abakka wanavva Simon ɔdɔkɔ ka iffaak. Buyili bwa lɛbaang bunaangmɛnɛ. Ɔzzánga balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a wanavva ’wɔng baang babwɔɔlɔ Jesus.
Ammɛ Jesus ufeele, umii ubee wanavva ’wɔng baang ka lufoom. Ɔlɔɔk la iffaak ’yɔng baang, ɔttɛ, itta issekemɛ. Buyila busaalmɛ eseese, ufeele unnyibɛ kazzi.
Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayanganɛ inngwa ya ɔffaaknɛbɛ bɛssanga iffaak ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔɔmbɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Jesus utelebɛ labɔɔk ka kkwɔɔt la ɔlɔɔt la ɔlɔɔt, ɔppwabɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bassɛnɛ bayanga ipiliza badɔkɔ baang. Issɛ isaalbɛ la kibungu la kibungu ittɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!” Jesus ɔkkpa ipiliza ’yɔng kiwele ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ izza lɛmmwɔɔl ka isannɛ ittɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
Ussolonɛ, Jesus ɔgbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, umii ɔtaa ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt basinɛ lile. Keem balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bassekemɛ ka kɛggyan. Bayɛnmɛnɛ, babum battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ, ɔtaa ɛfɛɛn abbɛ.
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mkkpa kɔnaang, vvenɛ nkopolo Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛffɛ lɛlɔk ngbaa. Nkwɔng baang kulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang.”
Jesus ukopolo ka tɔkɔlɔ idda-mitin ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ubeenɛ ka lufoom a libbwe Gennesaret. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batutala ɛtɔk bamii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ kɛgɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔyɛn ikkpaat iffa baang ka balokonɛ ka lufoom a libbwe. Balap a kulap a bannyi bagbatanɛ bakɔngɔ bamii kɛzzaa libbgɔ.
Jesus ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ wa Simon. Ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ utut akkpaat usseke lufoom a libbwe. Jesus ɔtaa ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat, ukopolo kɛkaan ’sɔng baang.
Uvvenɛ likopolo, ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Atut akkpaat amii ka ddɔng. Annɔ la balɔɔt annɔ asamyɔng liggbɔ atɔɔpyɔng ka bannyi akaayɔng isɛɛn.”
Simon ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Dedde, ilapbong ka ussinɛ kɛtɔm, bulɔk ba ikaa. Ka alenɛ ning lɛlɔɔk, nle ka npyɛlɛnɛ liggbɔ ntɔɔp.”
Batɔɔpnɛ liggbɔ bakaa isɛɛn ggbadam. Iyipi, iggyan kɛyaak a liggbɔ.
Bakkwɔɔ babbɛ ka ikkpaat ilɔk battɛ baffu battelebɛ. Baffunɛ, bassang isɛɛn, bassɛɛn ikkpaat ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɛ iyipi. Usseke ssup nzang ikkpaat ipiti.
Simon Peter ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, ukun Jesus laddu ɔttɛ, “Uyini! Amii assekenɛ, anaam ɔnaang-a-bubbi.”
Simon la babbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka isɛɛn ya bakaanɛ ilenɛ liyipi isak.

James la John, bwaan a Zebedee, kɔssɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ mgbaa. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balenɛ ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la Simon. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn asseke ka akkwɔɔnɛyɔng balɔɔt.”
Battulu ikkpaat bassik ka lufoom a libbwe. Bagbata bɛfɛɛn abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔngɔ; bakup Jesus.

Lɛffɛ lɛlɔk lɛdɔkɔ baang za Jesus umiinɛ. Ɔlɔɔt-ɔffaal ɔdɔkɔ baang ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt-ɔffaal ’wɔng baang ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus, ukun lusso ka lisse ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, “Mkkpee Dedde, kɔsaapwɔnɛ, attulanɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
Jesus utuulu kɔbɔɔk usingimɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapnɛ mung; nggyan nttɛ ɔppwawɔ.” Eseese ɔppwamɛ. Ɔffaal ɔsaalmɛ.

Jesus ɔkamalamɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ tɛ. Amii ssɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔppyɛɛkwɔ. Anaang lɛtɔm annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ a Moses lalɔɔknɛ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔppwawɔbɔng tɛ.”
Ɔzzánga kuttu ’kwɔng baang kufim kɔwaala ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam biffu, bappyee kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ, ɔlɔk uttulabɛ ɔppwabɛ.
Ɔzzánga umii ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat, ɔtaa bakang ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm.

Kɛtɔm ssɔn, Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ukopolonɛ. Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ badɔkɔ baang ka bataanɛ. Bassi ifɛɛn-ifɛɛn ka ɛkpansi a Galilee la ɛkpansi a Judea. Balɔk bassi Jerusalem. Likke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛdɔkɔ la Jesus za ɔkɔɔmnɛ uttula balɔɔt iffaak.
Balɔɔt balɔk batɔkɔ ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ka iggolo baffu. Babum battɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon, bawulumɛ ka lusso a Jesus,
keem kufuk kusinɛbɛ lile ka kibbi kilenɛ gaang lɛttala. Ɔzzánga battɔ lɛmma ka libat a ggwoon, bassɛ baang bawɔkɔlɔmɛ. Basinimɛ baloko ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ulenɛ.
Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ ka kiyila balɔɔt ’bɔng baang kɛttalanɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɛnngwa anaam nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ.”

Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔbbɔ lissa, ɔlɔɔk ning baang utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔsɔɔk ɔlɔɔt bubbi ba ule. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛyɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ.”
Jesus ɔsanbongbɛ ittina. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attinayɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ning ka ippyam annyɔɔng!
Nkwɔkwɔng kulenɛ bwɛt; kɛlɔɔk kɛttɛ, ‘Nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ!’ faa kɛlɔɔk kɛttɛ, ‘Afeele asam ewula annɔ assɛ!?’
Vvenɛ nnaangwɔyɔng asan attɛyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyanga lakke za ɔsɔɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt bubbi ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung.” Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ɔttɛ, “Afeele, asam ewula annɔ afula!”
Eseese ɔsam ewula ammɛ ya umininɛ, ufula. Uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛtɔk ɛtɔk.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, kɔkkpaakbɛ kamma. Babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Iyɛnbong bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ mmwɔɔn!”
Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Jesus umii ɔyɛn Ɔtɔk-innamba wa ɔzzanganɛ Levi ka ɔtaanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛnaang ammɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele, akupnɛ!”
Levi ufeele, ɔgbata bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkɔngɔ, umii ukup Jesus.
Ɔzzánga Levi ɔnaang kazzi kwa lɛbaang unnyi Jesus. Batɔk-innamba badɔkɔ ggbadam ka bataanɛ baang la ammɛ la balɔɔt balɔk ɔgbaa.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba badɔkɔnɛ baang babap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ atulyɔng kazzi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la batɔk-innamba la babbyap, azziyɔng?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa baggyannɛ uttula-ittula. Balɔɔt ba ɔppwanɛbɛ uttula-ittula ba baggyan.
Mung ba nffu kwa balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ budoddo, nffu kwa babbyap nttɛ bakkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi bafɔngɔ.”

Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Balɔɔt a John la balɔɔt a Pharisees ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bataa buwɔɔng, bazɔɔm; ɔzzánga mung balɔɔt ba annɔ bale baang ka bazzinɛ kazzi, bavva litak ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Attina attɛ vvenɛ akkwoong anaangyɔng balɔɔt ba baffunɛ libbeel bataa buwɔɔng ka uyini-libbeel utiinɛ baang la abbɛ ɔɔ? Gɔɔ ning baang baala kule!
Ɔzzanga ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya bale basam uyini libbeel bagbata bassekebɛ. Ɔffɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ bafula buwɔɔng.”
Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyaaknɛ ufaa uwɔkɔlɔ, ɔkɔɔm ɔsal lɛmma ɔtɔm uwɔkɔlɔ ba ule. Ɔsalnɛ ning baang, vvenɛ ufaa ɔyaak ɔtɔm ɔgbaa, Ɔgbaa ufaa kɛfaak ubba ka ɔtɔm uwɔkɔlɔ ba kɛkɔɔn.
Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsamnɛ ufaa batak ɔssɛɛn ka ɔtɔm ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ba ule.
Ufaa batak bassɛɛn ka ufaa ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔvvanɛ ɔtɔm a batak ɔbbal ufaa batak lɛggyan, ba ule. Vvenɛ ɔttɛ ɔtɔm a batak ɔttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.”
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bibwoto-isasa, ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ batɛngɛ lasan-isasa bakkwɔlɔ ifɔɔk, bassɛɛn ka labɔɔk, bazzi.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk babap battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ anaangyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lattɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga ba ataka appyeeyɔng kwa David ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔmɛɛmnɛ ɔɔ?

Ufeele umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔsam brɛɛd wa basɔɔknɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, uzzi, ɔbɛkɛ ɔssɛ unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bazzi. Ɔzzànga ule kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ka ayyɔɔt; ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang ba ule ɔgbaa la bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.”
Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ Uyini Kɛfɛkɛlɛ!”
Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ sa ssɔn, Jesus umii ukopolo ka ɔdda-mitin. Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk kulemɛnɛ libbe.
Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk la balɔɔt a Pharisees baggyan ɛtɔk ya bale bassɛɛn Jesus ka kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzánga basseke ka bakatmɛnɛ gbegbe, battɛ bayɛn uttula balɔɔt ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
Jesus ɔsanbong ittina abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Afeele affu abee kaang ka lusso!” Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ufeele uffu ubee tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbapwɔyɔng annyɔɔng! Mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lattɛ inaang nang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ? Iyaam faa iddopo? Ikkala lɛfal ɔlɔɔt faa ibɛpɛzɛ?”
Uyeek usesele ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ’wɔng baang, ɔttɛ, “Atuulu kɔbɔɔk!” Ammɛ ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ. Eseese ɔppwamɛ.
Kutunbɛ gaang gaang; battina abbɛ-abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaang la Jesus.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Jesus ufeele umii ɔtaa ka libat ekpok, ɔzɔɔm. Ɔtaa bakang, ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang tɔttɔt ussolo.
Ulenɛ lissolo ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, baffu. Ɔssang balɔɔt zzɔɔppabaffa ba ɔkkwɔɔnɛbɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba ɔssangnɛ bazzanga Simon, wa ɔkɔlɔmɛnɛ Peter, la etele ammɛ Andrew, la James la John la Philip la Bartholomew.
Matthew la Thomas la James, waan a Alphaeus, la Simon wa lɔkaan ammɛ lɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang.
Judas, waan a James, la Judas Iscariot wa uzzinɛ issɛ a Jesus.

Usininɛ ka ekpok la kɛkaan a balɔɔt ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, Jesus ubee ka ebutu la kɛkaan a bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ baang ba bassinɛ ifɛɛnifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Judea la Jerusalem. Balɔk bassi ka billu lufoom a lihu ka Tyre, la Sidon.
Baffu, bagɔpɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ɔlɔk uttulabɛ ɔgbaa. Balɔɔt ba uzuzukunɛbɛ ngbaa baffu, uttulabɛ.
Balɔɔt babum battɛ basingimɛ nkwaaning ɔppwabɛ; ka lakke kittula ittula lalenɛ baang ka lattamɛnɛ ka kkwɔɔt, ɔkɔɔm uttulabɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔppwabɛ.
Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Laggele lale za annyɔɔng bakee-bwɔɔn; Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya annyɔɔng!
Laggele lale za annyɔɔng, balɔɔt ba buwɔɔng busaapwɔnɛyɔng gedegede mung; vvenɛ azzi awukalayɔng! Laggele lale za annyɔɔng ba akkwanɛyɔng gedegede mung; vvenɛ asɛɛkyɔng!
Laggele lale za annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba atunnɛyɔng balɔɔt, bafimwɔyɔng, battɛ annyɔɔng banaang-a-bubbi ka lɛttɔ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ!

Aggeleyɔng ka ’kwɔng kɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng. Atɔmyɔng la bɔwaa ka lɛsɔɔk za lɛbaang lilenɛ bakang ka lɛkatwɔnɛyɔng ka libat. Balɔɔt abbɛ ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ badɔkɔ banaang ning baang bbwak la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
“Akama ule wa annyɔɔng ba ɔyyɛɛpwɔnɛyɔng; azziyɔng vveeng gedegede mung!
“Akama ule wa annyɔɔng ba awukalanɛyɔng gedegede mung; vvenɛ ataayɔng buwɔɔng ka lusso! Akama ule wa annyɔɔng ba asɛɛknɛyɔng gedegede mung!; vvenɛ ataa akkwayɔng bukee ka lusso!
Akama ule wa annyɔɔng ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔknɛ budoddo batumwɔyɔng. Balɔɔt abbɛ ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ badɔkɔ bassɛ balɔɔk ning baang batum balɔɔt ba babbwanɛ battɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
“Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ba appyeenɛyɔng kwa anaam: Balɔɔt ba alenɛyɔng ka kɔfɔk la abbɛ basaapwɔyɔng. Anaangyɔng budoddo la balɔɔt ba atunnɛyɔngbɛ.
Anaangyɔng balɔɔt ba babbaatwɔnɛyɔng ppyɛɛ! Azɔɔm assɛɛnyɔng balɔɔt ba bayapwɔnɛyɔng akama.
Ɔlɔɔt wa utupwɔnɛyɔng kabut ka kugga, asikili kugga kwa kkwɔn alokomɛyɔng, ɔbbal litup ɔgbaa. Ɔlɔɔt ɔsamwɔnɛyɔng uwɔkɔlɔ vvɔn, afɔngɔmɛyɔng ɔbbal wa vvɔn lɛsam ɔgbaa.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔbapwɔnɛyɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa ayanganɛyɔng, annyimɛyɔng. Ɔlɔɔt ɔsamnɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa annyɔɔng biini, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng.
Bwa aggyannɛ attɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangwɔyɔng annyɔɔng, annyɔɔng assɛ anaangmɛyɔngbwɛ.
“Ulenɛ ka balɔɔt ba annɔ asaapnɛbɛ keem, basapwɔnɛ; annɔ ale anaang atɔk ppyɛɛ? Nlɔɔk ka babbyap bassɛnɛ batele balɔɔt ba batelenɛbɛ abbɛ.
Anaangnɛ budoddo annyi balɔɔt ba banaangwɔnɛ annɔ budoddo, ale nang atɔk ppyɛɛ? Nlɔɔk ka babbyap bassɛnɛ banaang ning baang.

Balɔɔt ba attina attɛ bakkwoong mung bappyɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn annɔ bannyiwɔ keem baffuwɔnɛ lufolo ayila, ale anaang nang atɔk ppyɛɛ? Nlɔɔk ka babbyap ɔgbaa bafolonɛ ba abbɛ babbyap bɔfɛɛn ning baang, nkwaaning bappyɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang silididi bannyibɛ.

Ning baang lissi! Balɔɔt a latun annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng, anaangyɔngbɛ budoddo. Annyinɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt bɔfɛɛn, afɔngɔyɔngbwɛ kɛbɛlɛ lɛppyɛlɛ atɔkyɔng. Vvenɛ ayangayɔng lɛsɔɔk agbaayɔng. Vvenɛ azzangayɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ la balɔɔt ba bɔfɛɛn businɛ liffi, gbaak la babbyap.
Ɔlɔɔt ubbewɔyɔng-lɛttɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt ubbemɛnɛ lɛttɔ.

“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ annyi wa annyɔɔng kibbi gbɔɔgbɔɔ, nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiwɔ annɔ kibbi linnyi. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akpɛn wa annyɔɔng. Akpɛnnɛ wa annyɔɔng, vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ ɔkpɛnwɔ annɔ. Asɔɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt bubbi bwa ɔnaangwɔnɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔ annɔ.

Anaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt lɛsɔɔk, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔnaangwɔ annɔ lɛsɔɔk. Vvenɛ atɔk bwa buyipinɛ, buzza, bullɔt. Lɛsɔɔk a kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk za bale bassɛɛnwɔ ka labulakaat, akɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwoongɛ. Bɔfɛɛn a lɔlɔɔm bwa akɔɔmnɛ alɔɔm budoddo ɔlɔk bubbi, annyi wa annyɔɔng; abbwɛ bulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkɔɔm ɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔ annɔ.”
Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ, “Ussi-ifim, wabbɛ ɛtɔk ba ɔkɔɔm. Ɔkɔɔmnɛ wabbɛ ɛtɔk, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ vvenɛ battɔ ka lubbe.
Waan wa ugbengenɛ ɔtta ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ kɔlɔɔk, ba ule. Ɔzzànga ulenɛ livve likkoop vvenɛ ɔssɛ uggbenge tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ.
“Mbɔng appyɛɛknɛ ezuku bɔfɛɛn ya elenɛ ka zzeen etele annɔ, asi lɛffɛ kɛssɛ za lilenɛ ka zzeen annɔ biini lɛyɛn?

Ale anaang nang amii avvoop etele annɔ attɛ, uloko awulmɛ bɔfɛɛn, ka bwa bulenɛ ka zzeen annɔ buttanɛ liggbenge? Annɔ Ɔnaang-a-lagban ’wɔng! asangabong bɔfɛɛn bwa zzeen annɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ ayɛn asanga bwa zzeen etele annɔ!
“Kɛssɛ sa doddo lakkpo za labbɔlnɛ ba kikkwoong kɛwɔm. Kɛssɛ sa kɛbbɔlnɛ lakkpo za doddo ba kɛssɛ kikkwoong kɛwɔm.
Kɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ asansɛ ka lakkpo za kɛwɔmnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt umiinɛ kɛffa lakkpo a manggolo ka kɛsan a lɛlaak-ɛkkpɛ ba ule, ɔlɔk ɔffa lakkpo ogyigyal ka lɛsan ɛsam.

Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ, ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo, uttina bɛfɛɛn bwa bɛyyɛɛpnɛ ka luppyam gwa doddo. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔlnɛ, ɔnaang babbu lilɔɔk. Lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang lissimɛ ka ubbu luppyam. Kamma ɔlɔɔt kalɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔt uttinanɛ ka luppyam.
“Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akkwɔɔnɛyɔng, ‘Uyini, Uyini’, asiyɔng kwa nttɛnɛ anaangyɔng lɛnaang?
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa uffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn anaam ɔgɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl, utelezɛ, vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔyɔng bwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulenɛ.
Ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbɔɔk-a-ggwoon wa ɔtɔɔknɛ ogge a ggwoon ammɛ ka libat akpana. Lɔyɔngɔ lutumanɛ lusi likkwoong lɔzzɔɔk ggwoon ’gwɔng baang, ka balenɛgwɛ lɛbɔɔk lɔkkaam.

Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam, usizɛ latele linnyi; ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔɔknɛ ggwoon gbɔɔ ka libat a kususuk usi ogge lɛfaka. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ɛlɔlɔ effunɛ vvenɛ essi ggwoon ’gwɔng baang ɛzzɔɔk lɔttɔ ɛttɔ ya ɛbbɔlnɛ!”
Jesus ulenɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛlɔɔk uvve, ufeele umii Capernaum.
Akkala wa ussinɛ Rome ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔyanganɛ bɔɔyi wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang gaang. Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔffaakmɛ gaang gaang, ɔggyan lubbe.
Akkala ’wɔng baang uppyeenɛ kuttu a Jesus, ɔtɔɔm bagɛlɛnya Jews ɔttɛ bamii bakkwɔɔ Jesus uffu uttula bɔɔyi ammɛ.
Bagɛlɛnya ’bɔng baang bamii bakkpenge Jesus gaang gaang battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ka lɔkkwɔɔn ule wa buttelemɛnɛ tɛ.
Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt basaapmɛ gaang gaang; Ammɛ biini ɔbɔɔkbong ɔdda-mitin ulokoyɛlɛ.”
Jesus ukupbɛ. Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ a ssala, Jesus ududa inngwa akkala ya baffunɛ babwɔɔlɔmɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa akkala ɔtɔɔmnɛbɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Dedde, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɔɔwɔ akama kɛyɔɔng. Anaam ba nkkɔnɔ wa affunɛ ssala anaam.
Gɔɔ ba nkkɔnɔ wa nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ. Nggyan nttɛ azza lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ azzɛ-azzɛ, usseke bɔɔyi anaam ɔppwamɛ.

Anaam mgbaa ikkala ile baang ya ittanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge. Anaam nyanga isɔdya ya nttanɛyɛ liggbenge. Nlɔɔknɛ la ’wɔng nttɛ umii, umii. Nlɔɔknɛ la ɔlɔk nttɛ uffu, uffu. Nlɔɔknɛ la ubili anaam nttɛ ɔnaang ’bwɔng, ɔnaangbwɛ.”
Jesus kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ ka uppyeenɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang. Usikili ɔlɔɔk la kɛkaan sa kikupmɛnɛ baang ɔttɛ, “Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt wa kiyila ammɛ kɛkkaamnɛ ning ba ntaka nyɛn ka ɛkpansi a Israel.”
Bayilabɔtɔɔm akkala ’wɔng bappyɛlɛ bamii ka ssala-akkala, bayɛn bɔɔyi akkala ka ulemɛnɛ lɛppwa.
Waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ɔsaknɛ, Jesus ufeele umii ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Nain. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ la kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam bakupmɛ.

Jesus ɔffɔnɛ ka lɛttɔ kikkwu, ɔyɛn ulɛng a kɛkaan a balɔɔt ka batɔkɔnɛ ubbu, bamii kɛnaang a kullu. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ulemɛ waan vvɔn kɛyɔɔng ka ɔmaatnɛ. Ammɛ ɔdɔkɔ wanavva ubbu. Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kikupmɛnɛ.
Uyini, ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, bibbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang. Ɔlɔɔk la wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛ lɛkkwa.”
Uzuma umii usingi likulu za bassɛɛnnɛ ubbu. Balɔɔt ba batɔkɔnɛ ubbu bakɔɔng baang, babee. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ubbu ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Okolobya ɔlɔɔt, afeele! Nlɔɔk la annɔ.”
Ubbu ’wɔng baang ufungala, ufeele ɔppyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔk kɛlɔɔk. Jesus ɔtɔkmɛ, ɔssɛɛn abakka.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang. Ɔzzánga babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang battɛ, “Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang ɔttabongyɛlɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffubong ɔkkala balɔɔt ammɛ!”
Kuttu a Jesus ’kwɔng mung kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ a Judea la ikaan ya ballunɛ bakkpit Judea ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ John babwɔɔlɔmɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzánga John ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa, baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ.
Ɔtɔɔmbɛ ka Uyini ɔttɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa John ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ uffu ɔɔ? Faa ikat ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk?”
Baffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn Jesus, balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “John, Ɔnaang-a-Baptizim, ɔtɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ ɔttɛ iffu ibapwɔ, ‘Annɔ alenɛ wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ uffu ɔɔ, faa ikat ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk?’ ”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus uttula balɔɔt ggbadam ka bɛssanga iffaak bya ɔffaaknɛbɛ la balɔɔt ba ɔnaangnɛbɛ zukuzukuzuku. Ɔnaang bassi-ifim ggbadam bayɛn.

Ɔppyɛlɛ balɔɔt a John kamma ɔttɛ, “Appyɛlɛ amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng John kwa alenɛyɔng lɛyɛn, appyeeyɔng ka latɔɔk. Balɔɔt badɔkɔnɛ bassi-ifim, bayɛnbong. Basi kɔssɛ likkwoong, bakkwoongbong bassɛ. Balɔɔt ba bɔssɔngkolo, ɔppwabɛ. Bassi-latɔɔk, bappyee. Babbu bafungala. Bakee-bwɔɔn bappyee Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Laggele za lɛbaang lale za ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ ndeeta ka luppyam utummɛ!”

Bayilabɔtɔɔm a John ’bɔng baang balenɛ lɛgbata, Jesus ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a John; ɔbwɔɔlɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang, ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya attanɛ, amiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a John ka kɛsɛkɛ kɛmat, adɔkɔ attina attɛ ale ayɛnyɔng mbɔng? Attina attɛ ale ayɛnyɔng eggbe lɔfaat ka kɛffa kɛffanɛ kɛbbɛɛt ɔɔ?
Mung bakang amiiyɔng kɛyɛn a bɔng? Attina attɛ amii ayɛnyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kitook ɔɔ? Ka lɔkkwɔɔn balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kitook asaapbɛ kɛyɛn ka igala babeet!
Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng, aggyan attɛ ayɛnyɔng ’bɔng? Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ayɛnyɔngbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!
John ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm anaam wa nle ntɔɔm, ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk uffu ɔlɔngɔlɔ ɛtɔk ulokowɔ!’ ”
Jesus ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “John uggbenge ɔsak lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng, ɔzzànga ammɛ wa ɔttanɛ lissup ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttanɛ John liggbenge.”
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bappyeemɛ. Abbɛ la batɔk-innamba banaangbong kwa ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ; bayilamɛ kwɛ, John ɔnaangbongbɛ baptizim.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bafim kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ utumbɛ. Battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ John ɔnaangbɛ Baptizim.
“Mung balɔɔt a bɛtɔm byɔng nle nlɔɔmbɛ la bɔng? Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔng?

Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ba bataanɛ ka ogyila-kappya. Likup a bwɔɔn nzakang libungu linnyi ba abbɛ battɛ, ‘Ikkpa ibin a libbeel, innyiwɔyɔng, ittɛ atɔmyɔng; afimyɔng kɛtɔm. Ikkwa ittɔl layilili; afimyɔng kɛkkwa.’
John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, uffu ɔtaa buwɔɔng, batak usi lɛvva, ɔzzànga attɛyɔng, ‘Ɔyanga ipiliza.’
Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu, uzzi kazzi, ɔvva batak, ɔzzànga attɛyɔng, ‘Ppyɛɛk ɔwɔnɔwɔnɔ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng, uzzi kazzi, ɔvva batak, ɔssɛ inngwa la batɔk innamba la babbyap!’
Balɔɔt ba batɔknɛ bikɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayɔɔnɛpyɛ battɛ bile ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
Ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ɔkkwɔɔ Jesus kazzi-kikoon ka ssala ammɛ. Jesus ufeele umii uzzi kazzi ka ssala ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ’wɔng baang.
Wanavva àkkpàlà ɔdɔkɔ baang ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ka ullunɛ. Uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ule ka kazzi ka ssala ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees, ɔkɔɔm bilim la bannɛ ba bayyɛɛpnɛ kizzoom ffiit ka tɔkɔlɔ uffu.

Umii ubee Jesus ka isimi, ɔkkwa liyyeen ɔllɔt Jesus ka bukkpɔ. Ɔkpɔkɔ ɔtɛngɛ lɛttɔ ɔkɔɔm bittulu ammɛ ɔkkpɔlɔ Jesus bukkpɔ. Ɔkɔɔm kamma ɔkɔn Jesus ka bukkpɔ. Ɔsam bilim ’pyɔng baang usikili bannɛ ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔllɔt Jesus ka bukkpɔ.

Ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ’wɔng baang wa ɔkkwɔɔnɛ Jesus kazzi ka ssala ammɛ ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, ɔlɔɔk ka luppyam ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang bulenɛ ka ulenɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nzang vvenɛ ɔsan bwa wanavva wa usingimɛnɛ baang ulenɛ. Ule ɔnaang-a-bubbi!”
Jesus ufeele ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Simon, nyanga lɛkkɔ za nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ.” Ammɛ Simon ɔttɛ, “Iyyaa, ukopolo-lukopolo, abwɔɔlɔnɛ.”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt baffa badɔkɔ baang ba bamiinɛ bafolo ikkpoko. Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk, ufolo lalɔp inaara kubbwɔɔk. Wa vvɔn ufolo inaara zzɔɔp.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔtak ippwɔɔt ’yɔng baang usi lile. Ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛbɛ ikkpoko ’yɔng baang lufolo ɔtɔkyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsɔɔkbɛ. Uwɔwɔng ule ɔtta uyini ikkpoko ’yɔng baang litele?”
Ɔzzánga Simon ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nttina nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ikkpoko ammɛ ittanɛ liyipi, ammɛ ule ɔttamɛ litele.” Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ kile bbwak.”

Usikili ɔppyɛɛk wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Ayɛn mung wanavva mung ɔɔ? Ka nffunɛ ka ssala annɔ, bannyi asinɛ linnyi nyila bukkpɔ. Ɔzzànga wanavva ’wɔng mung uyilanɛbong bukkpɔ la liyyeen ammɛ, ɔkɔɔm kittulu ammɛ ɔkkpɔlɔnɛbwɛ.
Ka nffunɛ mung, nbɛɛm asinɛ lɛnaang, gɔɔ asinɛ ligbugba. Ɔzzànga wanavva ’wɔng mung kɛmmal a bukkpɔ nɛ ba ɔtaka ɔkkyaa ɔfɔngɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nssinɛ nffu mung.
Bannɛ balɔk asinɛ linnyi, ɔzzànga wanavva ’wɔng mung ɔllɔtnɛbong bannɛ ka bukkpɔ.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ kɛsaap sa ɔyɔɔnɛ mung, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsanbong ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkmɛbong bubbi ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɔɔkmɛnɛ bubbi ssup ɔyanga kɛsaap ssup la ammɛ.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ.”
Balɔɔt ba bataanɛ ka okkpokkolo battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔka ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt bubbi?”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la wa wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Kiyila annɔ kɛkkalawɔbong, amii ka bɔkaat.”
Ɛkɛtɛ esi lɛmmɛ, Jesus ɔssɛ ka lɛffɛ ka lɛffɛ, ukopolo Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa bakupmɛ.
Bwanavva ba uttulanɛbɛ ipiliza la bɛssanga iffaak bɛlɔk bakupmɛ ɔgbaa la Mary Magdalene wa ɔggbanɛ lippyem linnangikkyaat ussekemɛ.
Joanna, wanavva Shuza wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ akkala ka ɔdda kɛkaal a Herod, la bwanavva balɔk ggbadam bakɔɔm bɛfɛɛn abbɛ battele Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ.
Balɔɔt bassi ka laffɛ ka laffɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Balɔɔt balenɛ ggbadam liffu babbi, Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung ɔttɛ,
“Ɔlɔɔt ufeele umii kɛmmyang a ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn. Ɔmmyangnɛ, ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛtɔk. Balɔɔt basing bukkpɔ. Bunɔɔn buffu buttɔng buzzi.
Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka akpana. Ifɔɔk yɔng baang imeetnɛ, ippyɛlɛ ibbe ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɛsɛlɛnɛ bɔdɔlɔ.
Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka lifaat sa liyanganɛ billeep. Imeetnɛ immala la lifaat ’sɔng baang, billeep bɛnnaayɛ lakke.
Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo imeet immala. Iwɔm ifɔɔk lalɔp kubbwɔɔk ka kizza ssɔn.” Jesus ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng tɛ! Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ latɔɔk za kippyee kɔlɔɔk, uppyee tɛ!”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus babapmɛ bwa ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung itumnɛ.

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong likup a Itutum Ammɛ ppwool ppwool. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt balɔk bagɔpɔlɔzɛ ka ifɛɛt. Kwakkwɛ baang mkkpa bappyɛɛk, baala bayɛn; mkkpa bagɔpɔlɔ, baala bappyee.
“Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ifɛɛt ’yɔng itumnɛ: Ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang ilenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk ilenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzànga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-Kuyeeng uffu ɔsambɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za bappyeenɛ bassɛɛn ka ippyam ɔgbata, ɔnaangbɛ basi kiyila sa kittelenɛbɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛyanga.

Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka akpana, ilenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batɔkzɛ ka laggele. Ɔzzànga ba batɔkzɛ bassɛɛn ka ippyam. Bayanga kiyila ka waan a ɛkɛtɛ ssup. Ba ɔmmɛ bappyɛlɛ banaang bubbi ka ɛkɛtɛ bimana biffunɛ.

Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka lifaat sa liyanganɛ billeep ilenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzánga ittina la kɛggyan iyyɛɛp a vvengodde la laggele a ɛkpansi bɛnaangbɛ lakke kiyila basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyanga.
Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo ilenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batelezɛ la ippyam ya doddo. Balokozɛ banaang budoddo tɔttɔt bakkpɛɛm babbe.

“Ɔlɔɔt wa uyengenɛ otinika ɔsam ɔssɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ ekkpo ɔlɔk ɔsam ulup ka tɔkɔlɔ igolo ba ule. Lutini ’gwɔng utelemɛ ka kkpelegedee, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔmalnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon ɔyɛn buppwolo otinika ’wɔng baang.
Likup za ale abwɔɔp lisi ka vveeng lɛtta ba lile. Bɔfɛɛn bwa bavvoongnɛbɛ busi ka vveeng lɛtta ba bule.
“Zzɔɔkyɔng latɔɔk agɔpɔlɔyɔng doddo tɛ: Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn, vvenɛ ɔyanga ɔgbaa. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛbwɛ ssup, vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukupmɛbwɛ ɔtɔk.”
Abakka Jesus la itele ammɛ baffu kɛyɛn a Jesus. Ka kibbi kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛffɔ; bakɔɔng ka vveeng babee.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ssakawɔ la itele annɔ bale bakang ka babeenɛ ka vveeng, baggyan battɛ bayɛnwɔ tɛ.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɛnɛ anaam la itele anaam balenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batelezɛ.”
Kɛtɔm ssɔn Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele imii imalyɔng ka akkpaat, imiiyɔng kukupa libbwe ’kwɔng kang.” Ɔzzánga bamal ka akkpaat bafeele bamii.
Bale baang ka kɛwaat akkpaat, Jesus ɔlaa ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ɔzzánga ɔffa kɛffa sa lɛbaang ukupa bannyi ɔssɛɛn ka akkpaat ɔggyan kiyipi. Ɔkkpɛlɛ batii ka ntɛm a lubbe.
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bafungalamɛ. Battɛ, “Dedde! Dedde! fungala, ile ka ibbenɛ tɛ!” Jesus ufeele ɔkkpa kɛffa kiwele. Eseese kɛffa kizum zzuum.

Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Kiyila annyɔɔng kilewɔyɔng yang?” Ɔzzánga kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ, balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔka ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ la kɛffa kippyeemɛ kinnyimɛ latele?”
Bawaat akkpaat bakum kukupa libbwe. Baffɔ ka ɛkpansi Gergesenes ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee.
Jesus ɔtta ka akkpaat eseese, ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang wa ɔyanganɛ ipiliza. Ɔmmɛbong ka ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔssɛnɛ kɛkɔɔ. Ka ssala ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛtaa, usseke ka ukkwununɛ ka ilupu.
Ɔ́yɛnnɛ Jesus, ɔttɔ ka lisse, ubungu ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Jesus, Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, aggyan ’bɔng la anaam. Ellee nkkpengewɔ nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɔɔnɛ akama!”

Ning baang ɔlɔɔk ka Jesus ulenɛ lɛttɛ ipiliza itta issekemɛ ka kkwɔɔt. Bikun ’pyɔng baang bizzɔɔkmɛbong bikkpit bikkpit mkkpa bassɛɛnmɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ. Ullunɛ, ibbɔk, isangamɛ ɔtta umii ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.
Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Azzanga nang?” Ammɛ ɔttɛ lɛkɔɔl anaam nzzanga ‘Kɛkaan’, ka bɛssanga ipiliza ggbadam bilemɛnɛ lɛnaang.
Keem ipiliza ikkpenge Jesus ittɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔggbayɛ umii ɔssɛɛn ka lubbe gwa lɔddɔngnɛ gaang gaang.
Ɔzzánga kɛkaan ikkuma kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kizzinɛ kazzi ka lufoom a lɛttaal. Ipiliza ikkpenge Jesus ittɛ ɔfɔngɔyɛ annyɛ imii ikup ikkuma. Jesus ɔfɔngɔyɛ imii.
Ipiliza ikkyaa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ifɔngɔ, imii ikup ikkuma. Kɛkaan ikkumma ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛmma kimii kisini lɛttaal kɛttɔ ka bannyi, ɔkkpɛlɛ assɛ kɛtaak.
Balɔɔt ba bappyɛɛknɛ ikkuma ’yɔng baang, bayɛnnɛ ning baang, bamma bamii ka ssala la itɔɔm babwɔɔlɔ kuttu kwa ikkuma ilenɛ lɛtaak ka bannyi.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bamma bamii bayɛn kwa kɔnaangnɛ. Bamiinɛ, bayɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɔnɛ bikun ka ɔtaanɛ kwetkwet ka lataak a Jesus la iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ.
Balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛyɛn babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt balɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulemɛnɛ lɛppwa.
Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ba ballunɛ bakkpit lɔkaan a Gergesenes babwɔɔlɔ Jesus battɛ ɔgbata usseke lɔkaan abbɛ ka ulenɛbɛ gaang lɛbbwɔpɔ. Jesus ɔmal ka akkpaat ɔwaat ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi.
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔggbanɛ ipiliza itta issekemɛ, ukkpenge Jesus ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔnɛ nffu nkupwɔ bɛɛ.” Jesus ufim ɔttɛ,

“Afula ka ssala annɔ. Vvenɛ abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang unnyiwɔ.” Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbata usseke ka ɔssɛnɛ ukkpit lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, ɔbwɔɔlɔ kuttu kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang.
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, kibbi balɔɔt kiwomomɛ ka baggbanɛ baang lile ka bataanɛ bakatmɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Jairus uffu. Ɔdɔkɔ akkala ka ggwoon a mitin a balɔɔt a ssala. Ɔmɛkɛlɛ ɔttɔ ka lataak a Jesus ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ umii ka ssala ammɛ,
waan ammɛ wa ulenɛ likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa lɛffɔ, ule ka ubbenɛ. Jesus ufeele umii, balɔɔt bagbepmɛ ning lafoom laffa laffa.
Wanavva vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ullutnɛ lɔnnyɔ ka likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ uttulamɛ ɔppwamɛ usi lile.
Ukkpit Jesus ka isimi usingimɛ ka uwɔkɔlɔ, eseese, ɔppwamɛ.
Jesus ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɛ, usinginɛnɛ?” Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bakangala battɛ abbɛ lissi. Ɔzzánga Peter ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Dedde, balɔɔt bayipibong ɔkkpɛlɛ bakkpitwɔ tɛ.”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usinginɛbong. Nsan ka lakke lattanɛnɛ ka kkwɔɔt.”
Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ɔkɔɔlɔbong; ɔtta, uffu ɔttɔ ka lisse ka lataak a Jesus ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔbwɔɔlɔ Jesus bwa bunaangnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ usingimɛ ulemɛ lɛppwa.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ. Amii ka bɔkaat.”
Ka Jesus ulenɛ ka kɛlɔɔk ning baang, ɔlɔɔt ussi ka ssala akkala uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔ Jairus ɔttɛ, “Waan annɔ ubbebong tɛ! Ukopolo-lukopolo abbalmɛ ’bɔng lɛggyan?”
Jesus uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔlɔɔk la Jairus ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ, ayanga kiyila, vvenɛ waan annɔ ɔppwamɛ.”
Ɔffɔnɛ ka ssala, usi liyila balɔɔt ggbadam bamal ka ggwoon. Ule Peter la James la John la abakka la abassɛ a waantiti kɛyɔɔng.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ baang ka bakkwanɛ, battɔl layilili. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛyɔng lɛkkwa; waantiti ba ɔtaka ubbe, ule ka bilaa!”
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ banyɔɔka Jesus ka basannɛ battɛ ubbebong ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Jesus ɔlɔm waantiti ka kɔbɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Waantiti afeele.”
Lɛfɛkɛlɛ a waantiti ’wɔng baang lɛppyɛlɛ, ufungala, ɔtaa ka kuddu. Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ bannyimɛ kazzi uzzi.
Ɔzzánga abakka la abassɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang. Jesus ɔttamabɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt kwa kulenɛ lɛnaang tɛ!”
Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa, uloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, unnyibɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza la za kittula balɔɔt iffaak duu.
Ɔtɔɔmbɛ ɔttɛ bamii bakopolo kuttu Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, battula balɔɔt iffaak ɔgbaa.
Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng bɔfɛɛn bulɔk amiiyɔng kɔssɛ, gɔɔ lukut, gɔɔ ɛssɔ, gɔɔ kazzi. Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng uwɔkɔlɔ ɔlɔk ɔgbaa la wa ayangayɔng ka kkwɔɔt.
Ɛfɛɛn duu ya batɔkwɔnɛyɔng ka latele, ataayɔng baang la abbɛ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ amiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk.
Lɛffɛ za amiinɛyang basiwɔyɔng lɛtɔk ka latele, agbatayɔng ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang; ɔzzànga akkwɔlɔyɔng ibut ka bukkpɔ allɔtyɔng baang, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔttama gwa attamanɛyɔngbɛ.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii ka laffɛ ka laffɛ, bakopolo kuttu a Jesus, battula balɔɔt ka ɛfɛɛn duu ya bamiinɛ.

Herod, uzzilɛttɔ a Galilee, uppyeenɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ sa linaangnɛ, luttina lubutmɛ kibut kɛsak, ka uppyeenɛ ka balɔɔt balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “John, Ɔnaang-a-Baptizim, ɔppyɛlɛbong ufungala ka lubbe!”
Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ Elijah uffubong; balɔk battɛ Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ufungalabong ka lubbe.
Herod ɔttɛ, “Nzzabong John lɛttɔ, baang bɔka ɔlɔɔt wa balɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ batum.” Ɔzzánga Herod ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔyɛn Jesus.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bappyɛlɛ baffu babwɔɔlɔ Jesus bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya balenɛ lɛnaang. Jesus ɔsambɛ bamii ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethsaida. Baffɔnɛ bakang, basseke kɛyɔɔng.
Bɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam bappyeenɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bafeele bakupmɛ, ɔtɔkbɛ ka laggele. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ lilɔɔk utum Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, uttula balɔɔt ba baggyannɛ battɛ uttulabɛ.

Livve likootnɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ulenɛ battɛ, “Alɔɔk balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala la itɔɔm ya bikkpitnɛ mung, nkwaaning baggyan kazzi bazzi bɛɛ! Ɔgbaa ɛfɛɛn a kimini mung ka kasɛkɛ atingating ’kwɔng mung ba ele ya balɔɔt bale bakkwunu.”

Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng annyiyɔngbɛ kazzi bazzi.” Abbɛ battɛ, “Bwa iyanganɛ mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ule igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛn-a-bannyi iffa tɛ. Aggyan attɛ imii ilɛɛp kazzi, iffu innyi kibbi ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔɔ?”
(Badɔkɔ innɔ a bwaanbwalam zzɔɔpiffa la kufaak). Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Alɔɔkyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bataa-ɔtaa. Bataa lalɔp laffa la balɔɔt zzɔɔp ka likup.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ banaang ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ. Balɔɔkbɛ bataa-ɔtaa.

Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛn-a-bannyi iffa, uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Ɔsam, ɔbbɔk, unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ batan balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bazzi kazzi ’kwɔng baang, bamɔk. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus battɔng kazzi kwa kassekenɛ, kayipi isangala zzɔɔppiffa.
Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ya Jesus ulenɛ baang ka kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm kɛyɔɔng, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu bakupmɛ. Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɛkaan balɔɔt ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ battina battɛ anaam nnyinɛ?”

Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ annɔ John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim.” Balɔk battɛ, annɔ Elijah, balɔk babbal lɛttɛ, baang Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ufungalabong ka lubbe.”
Ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ngkka annyɔɔng bɛɛ, attina attɛyɔng anaam nnyinɛ?” Ɔzzánga Peter ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.”
Jesus ɔttamabɛ gaang gaang ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ babwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk.

Ɔbbalbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama gaang gaang. Bagɛlɛnya la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ vvenɛ bafimmɛ. Vvenɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ka kɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat.”
Ɔlɔɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ule ka ukupnɛnɛ usumalamɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔsam Cross ammɛ kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ, ukupnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkala kɛfal ammɛ, vvenɛ ɔtakazɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ lɛfal ammɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam, vvenɛ ulokozɛ ka budoddo.
Isak ɔlɔɔt ilenɛ ’bɔng, ɔyanganɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, ammɛ biini ɔtaak lɛkɔɔl? Isak mɛ ba ile.

Ɔlɔɔt wa nnaangmɛnɛ izzit ɔlɔk izzit inaangmɛ itum lukopolo anaam, Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ izzit issɛ inaangmɛ ippyɛɛk Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ule ɔtaa ka igada kibeet ammɛ la lakke abassɛ la liyeeng sa liyilanɛ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ! Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ balɔɔt bale baang ba bale basi libbe tɔttɔt bayɛn Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Liwaazɛ lɛsaknɛ ka Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung, ɔsam Peter la John la James, ɔbɛtɛmɛ kɛyɔɔng bamii ka libat ekpok bataa bakang bazɔɔm.
Jesus ule baang ka luzɔɔm, eseese lusso lufoolo, iwɔkɔlɔ illaatmɛ inyanya.
Kitipili-kitipili, bayɛn balɔɔt baffa baang ka kutolo la Jesus. Badɔkɔ Elijah la Moses.
Abbɛ baffunɛ la lakke libat, batolo kutolo la Jesus batum ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus ule ubbe ka Jerusalem tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ.
Peter la babbɛ babbɛ badɔkɔ ka bilaa. Keem bafungala, bayɛn lakke a Jesus la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa ba babeenɛ baang la ammɛ.

Peter ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ka bale ka bagbatanɛ, ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Dedde, kɔyyɛɛp gaang ka ilenɛ mung, vvenɛ inaang bwaan-idda bɛkkyaat, vvɔn wa annɔ, vvɔn wa Moses; vvɔn wa Elijah.” (Ka lɔkkwɔɔn Peter ba ɔsan bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ utum).
Utii baang ka kɛlɔɔk, ikkpálá-lukpaagbeede iffu ivvoongbɛ kuyeeng. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang ka ikkpálá iffunɛ ivvoongbɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka ikkpálá ’yɔng baang lɛlɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ waan a luppyan anaam wa nsanganɛ; agɔpɔlɔmɛyɔng.”
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lizumnɛ, Jesus usseke kɛyɔɔng. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basseke zzuum ka bataanɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk basi lɛlɔɔk babwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk batum bwa bayɛnnɛ.
Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo basini kuttɔɔk a lɛttaal. Ulɛng a kɛkaan a balɔɔt ukup Jesus.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ubungu ka kɛkaan ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, nkkpengewɔ ka kɔlɔɔk a waan anaam vvɔn keem!
Ipiliza ifeelemɛnɛ, ubungu kitipili-kitipili, izzɔɔkmɛ ka lisse iffuku itɔmmɛ ka kamma; umini baang inaangmɛ, ba iggyan ittɛ igbata issekemɛ!
Nkkpenge balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ nttɛ baggba waan anaam ipiliza, keem basi likkwoong.”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔng asɛlɛnɛyɔng kiyila, anaangyɔng babbu lilɔɔk ning. Mung nle ntaa la annyɔɔng ɔmmɛ ɔffɔ nang? Nle nppyɛɛkwɔyɔng minak ammɛ ɔffɔ nang?” Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Sam waan annɔ affu kaang.”
Waantiti ule ka kimii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus, ipiliza izzɔɔkmɛ ka lisse ɔfɔksɛ eseese; Jesus ɔkkpayɛ kiwele, waantiti ɔppwamɛ eseese. Jesus ɔsammɛ unnyi abassɛ.
Lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lakɛɛlɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔdɔkɔ kutii ka kɔkɛɛlɛnɛbɛ ka bɛfɛɛn bya Jesus ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ,
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asumalayɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng mung tɛ! Bale ka bakaanɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi lakke balɔɔt.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basi lɛsan bwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ utum. Kuddumu kussekebɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ basikwɛ lɛsan. Basi lɛbbɔ babapmɛ.
Bɛkangala bɛttɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus abbabbɛ batum ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge.
Jesus ɔsanbong bwa battinanɛ baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzánga ɔsam waantiti ubeemɛ ka lufoom.

Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ waan ’wɔng mung ɔssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt ka lɛkɔɔl anaam ɔtɔknɛbong anaam; ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛnɛ anaam ɔtɔkbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ anaam ɔgbaa. Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ wa kɔlɔɔk lile ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge.”
John ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Dedde iyɛnbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ ipiliza ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ, ɔzzánga ibwɔɔlɔmɛ ittɛ ɔfɔngɔ ka usinɛ ka kɛkaan ayyɔɔt lile.”
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛmɛyɔng litunu. Ɔlɔɔt wa asimɛnɛyɔng litun ulenɛ wa annyɔɔng.”
Bɛtɔm bɛkkɛtɛnɛ bya bale ka basamnɛ Jesus bamii ka libat, Jesus ɔnaang luttina gwa kimii a Jerusalem.
Ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt ammɛ ɔttɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bassɛ bamii ka killu a balɔɔt a Samaria, balɔngɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ balokomɛ.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bafim Jesus ka balenɛ lɛsan battɛ ule ka kimii a Jerusalem.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, James la John, bayɛnnɛ ning baang battɛ, “Uyini, aggyan attɛ ikkwɔɔ lɔkɔɔn ka libat luffu lɔwwɔɔlbɛ ɔɔ?”
Ɔzzánga Jesus usikili ufimbɛkwɛ.
Bagbata baang bamii lɛffɛ lɛlɔk.
Ka balenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii, badudda ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka ɛtɔk. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nkupwɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya amiinɛ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Lifat liyanga ibbe ya illunɛ, bunɔɔn buyanga lakɔt za bukkwununɛ, ɔzzànga Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛfɛɛn a umininɛ ɔfɛkɛlɛ ba ɔyanga.”
Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Feele akupnɛ.” Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Dedde, afɔngɔbong ssii; nmii nlli dedde anaam.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔ babbu balli ba abbɛ babbu. Annɔ amii akopolo kuttu Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nkupwɔ, Dedde; ɔzzànga afɔngɔbong nmii nteele itutum anaam.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ɔppyɛɛk ka isimi ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lukkwoon ba ule ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Nkwɔng baang kɔsaknɛ, Uyini ɔssang lalɔp a balɔɔt lakkyaat la balɔɔt zzɔɔppabaffa; ɔbɛlɛngɛlɛbɛ balɔɔt baffa baffa ɔttɛ bakɔɔm bassɛ bamii ka laffɛ la ɛfɛɛn ya ammɛ bumiinɛ.
Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Liyaat littalabong ɔzzànga bayaat-a-liyaat bale ssup. Azɔɔm assɛɛnyɔng uyini liyaat, nkwaaning ɔyanga balɔɔt a liyaat ggbadam bayaat liyaat ’sɔng baang.
Amiiyɔng. Ntɔɔmwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ka bɛzzɔkɔ igɔɔt.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng issɔ, gɔɔ ɛssɔ-lubbwoom. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛɛnyɔng ikkpabukkpɔ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abee awomoyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka ɛtɔk.
Ssala duu sa affɔnɛyɔng akɔɔm ɛtɔk attɛyɔng, ‘Bɔkaat butaa la ssala ’sɔng.’
Ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bɔkaat busaapmɛnɛ ullunɛ baang, bɔkaat ’bwɔng baang vvenɛ butaa la ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa bɔkaat busaapmɛnɛ usinɛ baang lile, appyɛlɛ atɔkyɔng luwomo bɔkaat annyɔɔng.

Ataayɔng ka ssala ’sɔng baang sa ɔggyan-a-bɔkaat ullunɛ. Azziyɔng kazzi duu kwa bannyiwɔnɛyɔng, avvayɔng kɛvva duu sa bannyiwɔnɛyɔng. Ɔnaang-a-kɛnaang ule wa kinnyi ikipili. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛyɔng ka ssala balɔɔt balɔk gbɔɔ gbɔɔ gbɔɔ.
Lɛffɛ duu za amiinɛyɔng batɔkwɔyɔng ka bɔwaa bannyiwɔyɔng kazzi, azziyɔng kazzi ’kwɔng baang kwa bannyiwɔnɛyɔng.
Attulayɔng balɔɔt ba ɔffaaknɛbɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, abwɔɔlɔyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang attɛyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.
Amiinɛyɔng ka lɛffɛ za basiwɔnɛyɔng lɛtɔk, atta assɛyɔng ka ɛtɔk, alɔɔk attɛyɔng;
‘Gɔɔ ibut ya iggbɔnɛyɛlɛ ka bukkpɔ ya issinɛ ka lɛffɛ annyɔɔng, vvenɛ ikkwɔlɔyɛ illɔt ippyɛɛkwɔyɔng. Akkeyɔng tɛ! Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ tɛ!’
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ka kɛtɔm-a-kɛkkaal Sodom vvenɛ ubbe Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ ɔtta lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang!

“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama wa lɛbaang annyɔɔng Chorazin la Bethsaida. Bɛmaanga bya nnaangnɛ ka annyɔɔng bunaangbyɛ ka Tyre la Sidon nzang balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baggba ka lisse lɛtaa, battɔng bissaka-ibba bakkwula, baggumu littɔɔng ballɔtbɛ kɛyɔɔng, bayɔɔ battɛ bakkyaabong kɛnaang a bubbi bafɔngɔ!
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Sidon la balɔɔt a Tyre kibbe-lɛttɔ ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛkaal ɔttawɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
Kwa annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Capernaum! Adɔkɔ aggyan attɛ asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng amiiyɔɔng ka libat ɔɔ? Vvenɛ basamwɔyɔng bassɛɛn ka ɛfɛɛn akama.”

Ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ kwa annyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang agɔpɔlɔnɛbong anaam. Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ kwa annyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ufimbong kwa anaam. Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ kwa anaam, ufimbong kwa ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.”
Lalɔp a balɔɔt ’zɔng baang lakkyaat la balɔɔt zzɔɔppabaffa bappyɛlɛ la laggele za lɛbaang. Balɔɔk battɛ, “Uyini gbaak la ipiliza iteleyɛlɛ lutele ka iggbanɛyɛ ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nyɛnbong Satan ka ussinɛ ka libat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ immwalang uffu ɔttɔ ka lisse.
Agɔpɔlɔyɔng tɛ, nnyiwɔyɔngbong lakke za asingnɛyɔng izzɔkɔ la ilaang isiwɔyɔng bulɔk lɛnaang, la lakke za ale abɛtɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔt-a-Kɔfɔk. Bulɔk bwa bule bunaangwɔyɔng ba bule.
Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ aggeleyɔng ka liyeeng sa linaangnɛ kɛsɛɛm litelewɔnɛyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng aggeleyɔng ka balenɛ lakɔɔl annyɔɔng ka libat lɛssɛɛn.”

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyi Jesus laggele. Jesus ɔttɛ, “O Dedde, Uyini libat la ɛkpansi, nwomowɔbong kɛnaang ka ayɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ba batakanɛ likkoop kɔlɔɔk kwa alupnɛ asseke balɔɔt ba basannɛ kɔlɔɔk, la balɔɔt ba bakkoopnɛ lilɔɔk. Dedde, ’kwɔng mung anaang ka luttina annɔ biini, la bɔwaa.
“Dedde anaam unnyinɛbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ Awaan ba ule, ule Abassɛ keem. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ Abassɛ ba ule, ule Awaan kɛyɔɔng la balɔɔt ba Awaan ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ basan.”
Jesus usikili ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka wɛɛk ɔttɛ, “Ayyɛɛpyɔng lɔfɔm gaang gaang ka ayɛnnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya ayɛnnyɔng mung!
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la babeet ggbadam badɔkɔ baggyan battɛ bayɛn bɛfɛɛn bya ayɛnnɛyɔng, ɔzzànga basi likkwoong bayɛn. Baggyan battɛ bappyee, gɔɔ basi likkwoong bappyee.”
Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ vvɔn uffu ɔssɛlɛ Jesus la ibap ɔttɛ nzang ɔttɔnɛ ɔkaamɛ. Ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung nle nnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ nyanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Mung Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔdɔkɔ lɔlɔɔk nang, adɔkɔ akkwɔɔ nang?”

Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ale atele Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ, la luppyam annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la lɔtan annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la likke annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ la luttina annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Wa annyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ kile bbwak. Anaangnɛ ning vvenɛ ataa ka kuddu.”
Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ nzang ɔssɛ ka ɛtɔk ya bbwak, ɔzzánga ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung nnyinɛ ulenɛ wayyɔɔt?”

Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ussinɛ Jerusalem umii Jericho. Babbyap bakupmɛ umii ɔffɔ ka kasɛkɛ atingating batupmɛ, ɔmɛɛm; bagbata bakɔngɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng; umini baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ libbe.
Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm uffu ɔsak ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang. Ɔyɛnnɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, ɔgbɛɛlɛ ka lufoom a ɛtɔk ɔsak ussekemɛ.
Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang nnyɔn, ɔlɔɔt a itutum a Levi uffu ɔsak; ɔyɛnnɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, ɔgbɛɛlɛ ɔsak ussekemɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa Samaria wa ɔssɛnɛ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang uffunɛ, ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka umininɛ. Ɔzzánga bibbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang.
Ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛmɛ, ɔllɔtmɛ batak la bannɛ ka biddopo. Ɔsam bɛfaak ibba ɔggbɔmɛ ka biddopo. Ɔsam ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, uttele ka libat eyim, umii la ammɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon a kɛfɛkɛlɛ, ɔtaa baang ɔppyɛɛkmɛ.
Ussolonɛ libbessolo, ɔsanga ikkpoko unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ ggwoon, ɔttɛ, ‘Appyɛɛkmɛ, ɛkɛtɛ ya Mppyɛlɛnɛ vvenɛ nnyiwɔ ikkpoko ɔkkpɛlɛ ya atakanɛ ka lɛttɔ ammɛ.’ ”
Ɔzzánga Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Attina attɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bakkyaat nnyinɛ ule wabbɛ?”
Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa bibbemɛnɛ lɛttɔ uttulamɛ, ammɛ ulenɛ wabbɛ.” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ amii assɛ anaang ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔnaangnɛ.”
Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata. Jesus uffu ka lɛffɛ zzɔn za wanavva wa ɔzzanganɛ Martha ɔtɔknɛ Jesus ka latele, ɔssɛɛn ka ssala.
Ɔyanga etele ya ɛzzanganɛ Mary wa ɔtaanɛ Jesus ka lataak, ɔgɔpɔlɔ lukopolo ammɛ.

Martha kutunmɛ ka kɛnaang kilenɛ uggboggbo sa kɔnaang. Ɔzzánga uffu ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uyini, asan attɛ etele anaam ɔgbatabong ɔkɔngɔnɛ kɛnaang ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔɔ? Alɔɔkmɛ uffu uttelenɛ bɛɛ!”
Uyini ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Martha! Martha! Annɔ attina kwa bɛfɛɛn ppwap luttina lɔbbɔlwɔ.
Ɔzzànga kaang ule bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn keem bwa aggyannɛ. Mary ɔsangabong bɔfɛɛn bwa bbwak, ɔlɔɔt mɛ bwɛ ba ɔbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔtɔk.”
Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔzɔɔmnɛ luzɔɔm. Ulenɛ livva lɛzɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini, akopoloyɛlɛ luzɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ John ukopolonɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ.”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ luzɔɔm gwa ale azɔɔmyɔng: ‘Dedde: Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ikɔɔm lɛkɔɔl annɔ ka budoddo itelezɛ; Afɔngɔyɛlɛ ifula ka Itutum annɔ.
Annyiyɛlɛ bwakuzzi bwa iggyannɛ kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Asɔɔkyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt ka ayyɔɔt isɔɔknɛ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt bubbi. Afɔngɔyɛlɛ kɛllɛ gaang gaang!’ ”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt vvɔn bumiinɛ ka ssala ɛnngwa ammɛ kɛtɔm, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛnngwa anaam, afolonɛ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ikkyaat.
Ɛnngwa anaam vvɔn uffunɛbong ka ssala, bwa nnyimɛnɛ uzzi ba nyanga.’

Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a ɛnngwa annɔ ɔppyɛlɛwɔnɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Fɔngɔnɛ la lɔsap, bassɛɛnbong ɔkpaka, ɔgbaa bwaan anaam la anaam biini itii ka kimini ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ba nbɛlɛ likkwoong nfeele nwongolo ggwoon nnyiwɔ bwa aggyannɛ.’
Ale anaang nang? Gɔɔ mkkpa budɔkɔ usi lifeele unnyiwɔ brɛɛd ka alenɛ ɛnngwa ammɛ, vvenɛ ufeele ka abapmɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abapmɛnɛ baang.
Ɔzzànga nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng nttɛ: Abapnɛ, vvenɛ atɔkyɔngbwɛ. Aggyannɛyɔng, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng. Alipnɛyɔng ka lɛmma ggwoon, vvenɛ liwongolo.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbapnɛ vvenɛ ɔtɔkbwɛ. Wa ɔggyannɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛnbwɛ, wa ulipnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon vvenɛ liwongolomɛ.
Waantiti ɔbapnɛ ɛsɛɛnabannyi, attina attɛyɔng abassɛ ’wɔwɔng ule ɔsam ɛzzɔkɔ unnyi awaan lutini ɛsɛɛnabannyi?
Ɔlɔk waantiti ɔbapnɛ lɛssɛlɛ, attina attɛ abassɛ ’wɔwɔng ule ɔsam ɔlaang unnyi awaan?
Annyɔɔng ba abbɔlnɛyɔng asannɛ annyiyɔng bwaan annyɔɔng bɛfɛɛn bya doddo, ba asan attɛyɔng abassɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ unnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔggyannɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ!”
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛggba ipiliza ya isinɛ kɛlɔɔk likkwoong. Ipiliza ’yɔng baang igbatanɛ issekemɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ukkwoong kɛlɔɔk. Kibbi balɔɔt sa kɛdɔkɔnɛ baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ.
Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Beelzebul, ubeet ubbukanggbe, unnyimɛnɛ lakke za ɔggbanɛ ipiliza.”
Balɔɔt balɔk baggyan battɛ bakaamɛ. Ɔzzánga battɛ ɔnaang bɛmaanga ɔyɔɔ nkwaaning basan battɛ ammɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn.

Jesus ɔsanbong ittina abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Lɔkaan gwa lɔbɛngɛlɛnɛgwɛ kɛyɔɔng babbu abbabbɛ, lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang baala luttumu, gɔɔ itutum ya ibɛngɛlɛnɛyɛ kɛyɔɔng, itutum ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ittɔ.
Ulenɛ ka itutum a Satan ibɛngɛlɛnɛyɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lakup ballu abbabbɛ, itutum ’yɔng baang ile inaang nang ittumu. Mung attɛyɔng Beelzebul unnyinɛnɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza.
Anaam nggba ipiliza ka lakke ubeet ubbukanggbe ngkka balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annyɔɔng baggba ipiliza ka lakke nyinɔɔng? Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annyɔɔng bayɔɔwɔyɔngbong battɛ bbwak ba aleyɔng.
Maaye Oo! anaam nggba ipiliza ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kwakkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ asan attɛyɔng likke Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liffubong ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkaamnɛ ɔbamanɛ bɛfɛɛn a kullu uloko ɔkat ssala ammɛ, vvenɛ ɔkkala bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko.
Ɔzzànga ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkaamnɛ ɔttamɛ uffunɛ, vvenɛ utup uyini a ssala ɔnnaa bɛfɛɛn bya ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔkat ssala ammɛ, ɔssang bɛfɛɛn bya bɛsaapmɛnɛ umii.
“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ wa anaam lile, ka lɔkkwɔɔn ntunmɛ lutun. Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛnɛ littele nbama ɛfɛɛn, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔggyanbyɛ kɛbɛpɛ.

“Ubbu kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kɔgbatanɛ usseke ɔlɔɔt ka kkwɔɔt, kɔssɛ ning bang kukkpit ka tɔkɔlɔ kɛmat sa bannyi basinɛ lile kɔggyan ɛfɛɛn ya kɔfɛkɛlɛnɛ. Kusinɛ ɛfɛɛn ya kɔfɛkɛlɛnɛ lɛyɛn, kɔlɔɔk la akkwɛ kɛyɔɔng kɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ nmii ka ɔtɔm a ssala anaam sa mgbatanɛ nkɔngɔ.’
Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang vvenɛ kɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi kumii ka ɔtɔm a ssala akkwɛ, kɔyɛnnɛ ssala yyɛɛpayyɛɛpa ka balenɛ lɛbama baloko.

Vvenɛ kɔtta kumii kɔkkwɔɔ liyeeng linnangikkyaat, sa libbɔlnɛ lisakkwɛ akkwɛ biini liffu litaa baang ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang utii ka akama wa lɛbaang ɔtta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔdɔkɔmɛnɛ ubbu-kuyeeng kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, wanavva vvɔn ubee bakang ka tɔkɔlɔ kibbi, ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Laggele lale za wanavva ’wɔng baang wa ɔmaatkwɔnɛ unnyiwɔ libee.”
Ɔzzánga ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Laggele latta lile za balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balokozɛ.”

Balɔɔt balenɛ liffu ning baang ggbadam bakkpit Jesus, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng babbɔlbong gaang. Babap bɛmaanga battɛ bayɛn, ɔlɔk bayɛn lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga bɛmaanga bya bale bayɛn bile bikpeke bya Jonah kɛyɔɔng.
Kɛssanga ssɔn sa Uppyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Jonah ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔnaang ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Nineveh. Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ mgbaa vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔnaang ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm mbyɔng.

Ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal vvenɛ Ubeet-a-wanavva wa ussinɛ kutɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn ufeele ubee unnyi balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng kibbi ka ulenɛ lɛssɛ kufoom ɛkpansi kkwɔn ududa ɔgɔpɔlɔ lukopolo kukele a Solomon. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, bɔfɛɛn bulɔk butii mung bwa buttanɛ Solomon.
Ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal, balɔɔt a Nineveh vvenɛ bannyiwɔyɔng kibbi ka balenɛ kɛfal abbɛ lifoolo ka bappyeenɛ lukopolo a Jonah. Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk utii mung wa uggbengenɛ ɔsak Jonah.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa uyengenɛ otinika ulup ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛssɔ ɔlɔk ulup ka kuttɔɔk igolo ba ule. Lutini gwɔng, uyengenɛ otinika utele ka kkpelegedee nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔmalnɛ ɔyɛn ppwool.
Zzeen annyɔɔng lataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ otinika ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng. Zzeen annyɔɔng lappwolonɛ, kkwɔɔt ɔgbaa lissɛ lippwolo. Ɔzzànga zzeen annyɔɔng labbɔlnɛ, kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lisseke kisul.
Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng asan attɛyɔng buppwolo annyɔɔng kisul lissi tɛ.
Ulenɛ ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ lippwolonɛ, kufoom kɔlɔk kusi ka kisul lile, ɔkkpɛlɛ assɛ lile lile ka kkpelegede tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abeenɛ ka buppwolo otinika wa uwongolonɛ gaang.”
Jesus ulenɛ livve lɛlɔɔk, ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ɔkkwɔɔmɛ kazzi ka ssala ammɛ. Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele umii kazzi.
Ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ’wɔng baang kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ ka Jesus usinɛ eleme abbɛ ya bayilanɛbong ibɔɔk tɛ́ttɛ́ bazzi bɔfɛɛn liloko.
Uyini ɔlɔɔk la wa Pharisees ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Pharisees azzaayɔng isimi bɛkkpala la immonggo keem usseke ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ kang ulewɔyɔng ibbyap la bubbi.
Bazingizingi bɛfɛɛn! Ebinukkpaapi ya ɛnaangnɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lissi ɛnaangnɛ tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng ɔɔ?
Aggyannɛ attɛ azzaawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng allɔyɔng, asamyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bɛkkpala annyɔɔng la immonggo asɔɔkyɔng balɔɔt a ibbɔl, usseke ayyɛɛpyɔng.

“Vvenɛ kɔbbɔlwɔyɔng gaang gaang annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Pharisees, ka annyinɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kufaak a bɛfɛɛn a liyaat annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ umakkpa la bukalafɔk, ɔzzànga lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk la kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba aggyanyɔng. Akkoopyɔng ’byɔng: Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng bɛlɔk usseke bɛlɔk.

“Kɔbbɔlwɔyɔng gaang gaang kɔsak annyɔɔng, balɔɔt a Pharisees! Akkapayɔng bɛtaa bya bɛsaapwɔnɛyɔng, alokowɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ssoon a mitin, aggyan attɛyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ banaangwɔyɔng mgbeede ka kappya duu kwa amiinɛyɔng.
Vvenɛ kɔbbɔlwɔyɔng gaang gaang! Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalli ukunukunu za balɔɔt bassɛnɛ ka libat basi lɛsan.”
Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ vvɔn ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo lilɔɔk sa alɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt a Pharisees baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, assɛɛnbongyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ngbaa ka bɛnɔk tɛ!”

Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii! Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔgbaa. Asamyɔng latɔkɔ za lɛbaang afeekyɔng balɔɔt ka isimi, annyɔɔng biini gɔɔ kituulu kɛnnɔ kittelebɛ lissi.
Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang! Alɔngɔyɔng lalli Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bawwɔɔlnɛ layyɛɛp.
Annyɔɔng biini ayɔɔyɔngbong attɛyɔng kwa balɔɔt annyɔɔng banaangnɛ kɔsaapwɔyɔng lɔsaap. Abbɛ bawwɔɔlnɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, annyɔɔng abɔɔkyɔng lalli lɔbɔɔk.
Kwakkwɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bikɔɔm ammɛ ɔttɛnɛ, ‘Vvenɛ ntɔɔm bappyee-kutolo anaam la balɔɔt ba bale balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk anaam nfeebɛ; vvenɛ bawwɔɔl balɔk, bayɔɔ balɔk akama.’
Nkwaaning balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm mbyɔng bayɛn akama ka bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balɔɔt abbɛ ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bassinɛ bawwɔɔl ka vveeng ussinɛ utte,

ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ bawwɔɔlnɛ Abel, uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bawwɔɔlnɛ Zachariah ka bɛzzɔkɔ labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng!, balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng vvenɛ bayɛn akama ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt bɔng baang.

Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang, annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ! Alupyɔngbong waan-ɛkpɔkɔlɔ wa kɛkɔɔm kiwongolo lɛmma-ggwoon a kukele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ɔzzànga annyɔɔng biini ka tɔkɔlɔ ba amalyɔng, atunuyɔng balɔɔt ba babumnɛ battɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ!”
Jesus ɔgbatanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn yɔng baang, bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees bakkpaakmɛ ibap batum lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang.
Bakkin innya bakatmɛ battɛ ɔlɔk bakaamɛ ka lilɔɔk sa ule ɔlɔɔk ɔsɛpɛ.

Innɔ balɔɔt balenɛ libbi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔkɔɔm using wabbɛ, Jesus ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng yeast a balɔɔt a Pharisees tɛ: nkkwɔɔ kɛkkala lɛlaak abbɛ.
Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bulenɛ ka lalup; vvenɛ butta ka vveeng. Likup duu za babwɔɔpnɛ, vvenɛ lɛtta ka vveeng.
Kwakkwɛ nttɛnɛ kɔlɔɔk duu kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng kɛtɔm, vvenɛ bappyeekwɛ kikoon. Kɔlɔɔk duu kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng ka buzzaap ka lɛnɔk a ggwoon, vvenɛ bayaamkwɛ ka ogyila.
“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng inngwa anaam! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba bassɛnɛ ggbɔɔ-ggbɔɔ-ggbɔɔ bawwɔɔl balɔɔt babbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ gaang ba bataka bakkwoong banaang.
Vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Ammɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔwwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ ukkwoong ɔsammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka ɛfɛɛn a akama. Iii, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng!
“Buggwele kubbwɔɔk lissi ka bataanɛ ka ikkobo iffa ɔɔ? Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ppyɔn ggbɔɔ ba ɔtaka usumala.
Gɔɔ gbaak la bittulu bya lɛttɔ annyɔɔng baang ukkwoonbongbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, annyɔɔng attanɛyɔng buggwele ggbadam.
“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng: Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ppwool ppwool ka lusso babbɛ ɔttɛ, ammɛ usseke wa anaam, vvenɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔssɛ ɔnaang ning baang la ammɛ ka lusso bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkalanɛnɛ ɔttɛ, ammɛ wa anaam lissi, vvenɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔssɛ ɔkala ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lusso bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bubbi utum Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, bakkwoong mung basɔɔkmɛ bubbi ammɛ. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bubbi utum Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, mɛbwɛ baala basɔɔk.

“Ɛkɛtɛ ya bakɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng, bamii ka kɛkaal ka ssoon a imitin, ɔlɔk ka lusso bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina atumyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale anaang akkalawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale alɔɔkyɔng.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ kukopolowɔyɔng kwa ale alɔɔkyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.”
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, abwɔɔlɔ etele anaam, isam bɛfɛɛn bya dedde ɔgbatanɛ ɔkɔngɔyɛlɛ ibɛngɛlɛ.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Walam, mung nnyinɛ unnyinɛnɛ lakke za kɛkaal a kɛkaal, ɔlɔk za kɛbɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng kinnyiwɔyɔng?”
Ɔbbal litolo, unnyibɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ggbeggbe assekeyɔng bɛssanga liwɔnɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn bya ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ lissi ulenɛ kuddu ɔlɔɔt, gɔɔ mkkpa ɔyyɛɛpmɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt yɔng ɔttɛ, “Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyanga ɛkpansi ya uwoopnɛ bɛfɛɛn bɛyyɛɛpmɛ.
Ɔtaa ssii uttina kɛyɔɔng ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛfɛɛn ya nle nloko bɛfɛɛn byɔng mung ba nyanga. Mung nle nnaang nang?’
Ɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nle nnaang. Vvenɛ nlɔp ukunu anaam nzzɔɔk, nppyɛlɛ ntte wa lɛbaang, ɔlɔk nloko bɛfɛɛn a liyaat anaam la bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk ngbaa.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ nppyɛlɛnɛ kamma kɛyɔɔng nttɛ, ‘Ɔyyɛɛp a lɔfɔm, ayangabong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya doddo bya aggyannɛ ka likkpa ggbadam. Akɔɔm lɛfal annɔ bɛtɛbɛtɛ. Azzi, avva ataa ka laggele.’
Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛmɛ, ‘Ukun ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ assɛɛn lɛttɔ ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn mung. Nnyinɛ ule ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ulokomɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng?’ ”
Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Kule kule ning baang la balɔɔt ba bafaannɛ iyyɛɛp balokobɛ kɛyɔɔng, ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛ ba ɔyyɛɛp.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akekeyɔng kwa kazzi kwa azzinɛ adduyɔng, ɔlɔk attinayɔng kwa ibba ya akwulanɛyɔng ka kkwɔɔt.
Kuddu kuggbenge kɔsak kazzi. Ɛkkpakkwɔɔt annɔ eggbengenɛ ɛsak ibba ya akkwulanɛ ka kkwɔɔt.

Ppyɛɛk bunɔɔn; bɔtɔɔm ba buyanga, ɔlɔk buyaat liyaat, gɔɔ ikwunu gbɔɔ ba buyanga ya bulokonɛ bɛfɛɛn abbwɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbwɛ kazzi. Annyɔɔng lissi attanɛyɔng bunɔɔn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbwɛ kazzi ɔɔ?
Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng baang nyinɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔtaa ukeke, lavve lagbaamɛ ka kɛfal ammɛ?
Asinɛ likkwoong akɔɔm waan a bɔfɛɛn bwa ssup, anaang nang amii akeke kwa bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk?

Ppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo immalanɛ, kɛnaang ba inaang. Ibba ba ikwulu. Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Ubeet Solomon wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔyyɛɛpmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyyɛɛpmɛnɛ lɔyyɛɛp baang, usi likkwoong ɔyanga ibba ya iyyɛɛpnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo yɔng baang.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukwulanɛ lifaat ibba, lifaat sa lilenɛ mung mmwɔɔn vvenɛ likkɔm lufat, attina attɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annyɔɔng ule ɔppyɛɛkwɔyɔng nang? Annyɔɔng bayanga kiyila ssup ’bɔng!
“Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ tɔkɔlɔ ɔbbɔlwɔyɔng kwa kazzi la bwa ale avvayɔng.
(Ɔssɛbibit wa vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔggyannɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung;) Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ aggyanyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Akɔɔm ɛtɔk assɛɛnyɔngbong Itutum ammɛ ka luppyam, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bya aggyannɛyɔng.”
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng kɛkaan a bwaan itɔɔn. Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng kɔsaapmɛ lɔsaap kinnyiwɔyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ataanyɔng bɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayanganɛyɔng asam ikkpoko annyiyɔng balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Annyɔɔng biini anaangyɔng issɔ ya ile isi lillut, usseke abɔngɔlɔyɔng kibeet annyɔɔng ka libat, ka ɛfɛɛn ya kile kisi lɛssɔlɔ. Ussip ba ule wa ule ɔffɔ ka assɛ, ɔsamwɔ sɛ. Bɛfɛɛn baala bikkwoong bizziwɔyɔngsɛ.
Luppyam annyɔɔng lule lule ka ɛfɛɛn iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng ilenɛ.
Aggbɔyɔng innyɔ, lakɔɔmyɔng itinika, akatyɔng kwa kule kuffu.
Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili ba bakatnɛ abassɛ abbɛ battɛ ɔppyɛlɛ libbeel. Ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, ulipnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon, vvenɛ bawongolomɛ lɛmma eseese.

Ppyɛɛ ule wa babili ’bɔng baang ba abassɛ abbɛ ɔppyɛlɛnɛ ukopobɛ kwetkwet ka bataanɛ bakatmɛ. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ abassɛ abbɛ vvenɛ ɔsam ɛkkpa ɔggbɔ ka kɛsan ɔlɔɔkbɛ ɔttɛ bataa-lɔtaa, ammɛ ɔppyɛɛ unnyibɛ kazzi.
