Ppyɛɛ ule wa babili ’bɔng baang ba abassɛ abbɛ ɔppyɛlɛnɛ ukopobɛ kwetkwet ka kɛkat. Gɔɔ mkkpa budɔkɔ ɔppyɛlɛ ka kasɛkɛ kɛtɔm, ɔlɔk ka ule ka ɔggyannɛ kissolo.
Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ! Uyini a ssala ɔsannɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya ussip ule uffu, baala ɔfɔngɔ ussip ’wɔng baang ɔmal ka ggwoon ammɛ.
Annyɔɔng ngbaa akatyɔng! Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya asinɛyɔng littina attɛyɔng vvenɛ uffu.”
Peter ɔttɛ, “Uyini, mung ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng faa alɔɔk abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ?”
Uyini ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɛ ulenɛ bɔɔyi wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ, ɔsan kɔlɔɔk? Ammɛ ulenɛ wa abassɛ ule unnyimɛ kɛppyɛɛk a ggwoon, unnyi ibbɔɔyi bakang etini kazzi kwa abbɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak.
Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang vvenɛ uggele gaang gaang ka abassɛ ule ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyɛnmɛ ka ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, abassɛ ubili ’wɔng baang vvenɛ unnyimɛ kɛkat a bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔzzànga ubili ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔknɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛkɛtɛ etii ka ɛlɔmnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ dedde anaam ɔppyɛlɛ’ utte kitup a ibɔɔyi ’yɔng kang bwanavva la bwaanbwalam, uzzi kazzi ɔvva litak ubimi,
abassɛ vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ kɛtɔm sa ubili ’wɔng baang usinɛ littina ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang abassɛ vvenɛ ɔyɔɔmɛ akama ɔsan kɔlɔɔk a kisi ɔlɔɔt latele linnyi.
“Bɔɔyi wa ɔsannɛ bwa abassɛ ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang usimɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛbama ɔkat, ɔnaang bwa abassɛ ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang; vvenɛ bakɔɔm eloot ya lɛbaang batupmɛ.

Ɔzzànga bɔɔyi wa usinɛ bwa ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang lɛsan, ɔnaang bwa ɔggyannɛ lɔkkpat vvenɛ bakɔɔm epyoko ya ssup batupmɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa bannyimɛnɛ bwa lɛbaang bale bappyɛlɛ baggyan bwa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ka eddu ammɛ.
“Nffubong kɛssɛɛn ɛkpansi lɔkɔɔn. Buggbanɛ ɛkpansi lɔkɔɔn lɛssɛɛn, nzang kɔsaapnɛ kɔsak.
Nyanga baptizim wa bale ka banaangnɛnɛ. Akama vvenɛ ɔttalanɛ tɔttɔt ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɛtakabong ɛsak.
Mung attina attɛyɔng nkɔɔm bɔkaat nffu ka ɛkpansi ɔɔ? Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ bɔkaat lissi ka nkɔɔmnɛ nffu, nkɔɔm lɔnyaata.
Ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso, itutum a balɔɔt kubwɔɔk vvenɛ babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, kufaak kwakang bakkyaat, kwa kkwɔn baffa.

Ibassɛ balɔɔt vvenɛ bafim kwa ibbwɔɔn. Ibbwɔɔn vvenɛ bafim kwa ibbassɛ abbɛ. Ibakka ibbwɔɔn vvenɛ bafim kwa bwaan abbɛ, ibbwɔɔn vvenɛ bassɛ bafim kwa ibakka abbɛ. Bakka la bakka vvenɛ bafim kwa bakka abbɛ.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ayɛnnɛyɔng ka ufinginɛ attɛyɔng, ‘Ule ka uteepnɛ.’ Uteep baning.
Appyeenɛyɔng kɛffa ka kissinɛ ka libat a lɔfɔɔn kɛffa kiffu, attɛyɔng, ‘Usɔngɔ ule ka uffunɛ’. Usɔngɔ uffu baning.
Bakkala lalaak a balɔɔt! Akkwoongnɛ appyɛɛkyɔng ɛkpansi la libat abwɔɔlɔyɔng kwa kulenɛ, anaang nang asinɛyɔng lɛsan kwa kulenɛ gedegede mung?
“Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ asiyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ kɛnaang liffik kɛyɔɔng annyɔɔng?

Ɔlɔɔt ɔttɛnɛ attɔmɛbong ka lafɔɔ, ɔkaawɔ, ule ka umiinɛ la ka ɔdda kɛkaal; abum lakke annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ atoloyɔng kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang annyɔɔng la ammɛ balɔɔt baffa kɔsaalwɔyɔng ka ɛtɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ uffu ɔkɔɔmwɔ ɔffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a bakaal a kɛkaal. Nzang bakaal a kɛkaal vvenɛ, basamwɔ, bannyi ippoloosi, basamwɔ bassɛɛn ka iggbakkɔpɔ.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, wɔ baala bayila atta ning ning annyi ikkpoko ya bazzawɔnɛ isaal.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ baang ka babwɔɔlɔnɛ Jesus tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Pilate ɔwwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt a Galilee ka badɔkɔnɛ ka kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm, kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Jesus ɔbapbɛ lɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung attina attɛyɔng balɔɔt a Galilee ’bɔng baang ba bawwɔɔlnɛ ning baang battanɛ bubbi lɛnaang batta balɔɔt a Galilee balɔk ɔɔ?
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, asinɛyɔng kɛnaang a bubbi lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, vvenɛ abbeyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ babbenɛ.
Attina attɛyɔng balɔɔt ba zzillabakkyaat ba ɛnyɔng ɛttɔnɛ ɛwwɔɔlbɛ ka Siloam battanɛ lɛbbɔl batta balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ ka Jerusalem ɔɔ?
Maaye! Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ asinɛyɔng kɛnaang bubbi a lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ abbeyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang babbenɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔkɔɔnnɛ lɛsan a kɛssɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Umiinɛ ukoolo lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang, lakkpo usi lɛyɛn.
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la ɔkat-a-bɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk utii likkpa likkyaat ka nffunɛ nggyan lakkpo ka kɛssɛ ’sɔng mung likkpo gbɔɔ ba nyɛn. Zzasɛ azzɔɔk, ning baang gbɔɔ kibee kwabɔng?’
Ɔzzánga ɔkat a bɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Afɔngɔsɛ dedde, kibee baang ka kukkpa ’kwɔng mung kkwɔn, vvenɛ nyaat lubbe nkkpitsɛ, nssɛɛn kusuma.
Ulenɛ ka kɛwɔmnɛ lumaalɔk, kɔyyɛɛp kɔsak; kɛppyɛɛnɛ kisi kɛwɔm, vvenɛ nzzasɛ nzzɔɔk.’ ”
Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ssɔn Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ukopolonɛ ka ɔdda mitin.
Wanavva vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔyanganɛ ipiliza. Ipiliza ’yɔng inaangmɛbong iffaak ka likkpa zzil-la-likkyaat. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ usseke kokkop ka ukokonɛ, bitbit ba ɔbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔssɛ.
Jesus ɔyɛnmɛnɛ ɔkkwɔɔmɛ, ɔttɛ, “Wanavva, iffaak annɔ isaalwɔbong.”
Jesus utelemɛ labɔɔk ka kkwɔɔt, eseese ɔppwa wanavva ’wɔng baang utuulu, usseke ka ɔssɛnɛ bitbit. Uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.

Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ka ɔdda mitin ’wɔng baang kutunmɛ ka Jesus uttulanɛ ɔlɔɔt ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ule bɛtɔm bwɔlaaning ka inaangnɛ kɛnaang. Affuyɔng ittula ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang. Afɔngɔyɔng ittula ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ lɛbɛlɛ liffu.”
Uyini ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ɔnaang-a-lagban ’wɔng! Annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ akkyaayɔng lakɔmɔlɔ annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng, akɔɔmyɔngzɛ lamii lavva bannyi ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
Attɛ nfɔngɔ waan itutum a Abraham ’wɔng mung wa Satan ulemɛnɛ ka bubili liloko ka likkpa zzil-la-likkyaat lɛsanga ka bubili ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ɔɔ?”
Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma Jesus kɛnaang balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, izzit inaangbɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ baggele ka kɔlɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ duu kwa Jesus ɔnaangnɛ.
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile nang? Mung nle nlɔɔmyɛ la bɔng?
Ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛfɔɔk a lɛgɔm ya ɔlɔɔt ɔkɔɔnnɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Ɛfɔɔk a lɛgɔm ’yɔng baang emeet ɛmmala ɛzzanga lɛsan a kɛssɛ za lɛbaang, bunɔɔn buffu bulɔɔk lakɔt ka bɛbɔɔk assɛ.”
Jesus ɔbbal lɛbap ɔttɛ, “Mung Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nle nlɔɔmyɛ la ’bɔng?
Ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ yeast wa bakɔɔmnɛ, banaang ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd utum.”
Jesus ɔssɛ baang ukopolo balɔɔt ka laffɛ ka laffɛ, ɛtɔk ɛtɔk umii Jerusalem.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔbapmɛ lɔbap ɔttɛ, “Dedde mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkkala bwaan a balɔɔt ssup ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Abumyɔng la lakke annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ amalyɔng ka lɛmma a ggwoon za ppyep: balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ babum kɛmal ɔzzànga lɛttɔ baala batɔk.
“Uyini a ggwoon vvenɛ ufeele ɔfɛɛn lɛmma ggwoon. Affunɛ abeeyɔng ka vveeng attɛyɔng ‘Dedde awongoloyɛlɛ lɛmma ggwoon,’ vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛwɔyɔng kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ba nsan ɛfɛɛn a assinɛ affuyɔng.’
Vvenɛ appyɛlɛmɛyɔng kamma attɛyɔng, ‘Izzi, ivva la annyɔɔng, akopoloyɛlɛ ka ogyila ayyɔɔt.’
Vvenɛ ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Gɔɔ ba nsan ɛfɛɛn assinɛyɔng, agbata assekenɛyɔng; annyɔɔng baang banaang-a-bubbi balɔɔt.’

Vvenɛ akkwayɔng gaang gaang azziyɔng lasaal ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ale ayɛnyɔng Abraham la Isaac, la Jacob la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ussekewɔyɔng annyɔɔng akɔɔngyɔng ka vveeng.

Vvenɛ balɔɔt balɔk bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm, balɔk bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee kulele, balɔk bassi kutɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn, balɔk bassi libat a lɔfɔɔn baffu bayanga kɛtaa ka ssala Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ka ussinɛ baang balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk vvenɛ basseke isimi, balɔɔt ba bassekenɛ isimi vvenɛ bappyɛɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang nnyɔn, balɔɔt a Pharisees baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus battɛ, “Agbata mung amii ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk, Herod ɔggyanwɔ kɛwwɔɔl.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng ugɛbɛ ’wɔng baang attɛyɔng: ‘Nle ka kɛggba ipiliza nttula balɔɔt mmwɔɔn la lufat ɔgbaa. Ɔffɔnɛ bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat nvve kɛnaang anaam.’
Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nfeele kɔssɛ mmwɔɔn la lufat la ussoonɛ. Ba kɔkkɔnɔ ka bale bawwɔɔl uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk ɔgbaa la Jerusalem.

“Oo Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Annɔ awwɔɔlnɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, atɔɔp balɔɔt ba balɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ufeewɔ lattaal. Nbumbong nttɛ nkkwɔɔ balɔɔt annɔ nssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bikɔkɔ biwupnɛ bwɔɔn appyɛ, ɔzzànga ba ayilanɛ.

“Vvenɛ abbɛ ssala annɔ la Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akɔngɔ lisseke ubbu a ssala. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ nɛ ba abɛlɛ lɛyɛn ɔddɔddɔkɔ ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ ya ale alɔɔk attɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ammɛ wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini Ppyɛɛ.’
Kɛtɔm ssɔn, ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, Jesus umii uzzi kazzi ka ssala uzzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Pharisees. Balɔɔt badɔkɔ baang ka babeenɛ bappyɛɛkmɛ gbegbe.
Ɔlɔɔt wa bukkpɔ la labɔɔk bɛbɔkmɛnɛ uffu ukup Jesus.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele ɔbap bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees ɔttɛ, “Mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt layila mung ittula ittula ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, faa ba layila?”
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang lɛmmwɔɔl basi lɛzza. Jesus ɔsam ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uttula ɔttɛ ufula.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ waan, ɔlɔk lɛkɔmɔlɔ limii lɛttɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ lubbe-bannyi ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, baala ɔsangabwɛ ka ulenɛ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ?”
Basi likkwoong bappyɛlɛ kamma kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung.
Jesus ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ bakekeen bale baang ka basanganɛ bɛtaa bya bɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ,
“Ɔlɔɔt ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ libbeel, amiinɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔm ɛtɔk ataa ka kɛtaa sa doddo. Ɔkkyamnɛ kɛtaa ’sɔng baang Uyini libbeel uloko ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk wa uggbengenɛ ɔttawɔ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm-a-libbeel uffu ufeelewɔ ɔttɛ, ‘Afeele asseke ɔlɔɔt wa uggbengenɛ ɔttawɔ.’ Vvenɛ izzit inaangwɔ la bannyɔɔng ka ale asseke ka ataanɛ ka likkpɔ-igolo.
Lutini ’gwɔng kɔyyɛɛp ka attenɛ ka likkpɔ-ogolo lɛtaa, ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔkɔɔm-a-libbeel uffunɛ ɔyɔɔwɔ kɛtaa sa doddo. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ayanga latele ka lusso bannyɔɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ usikili usook. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ busook, vvenɛ ɔzzánga uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt.”

Jesus ɔlɔɔk la uyini a ssala ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya annyinɛ balɔɔt kazzi, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔ inngwa annɔ, gɔɔ bakpana annɔ gɔɔ itele annɔ, gɔɔ bakulufal annɔ ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ. Akkwɔɔnɛbɛ, vvenɛ bassɛ bakkwɔɔwɔ kazzi ka ssala sa abbɛ. Azzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang kwa bakkwɔɔwɔnɛ ɔtaabong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balewɔnɛ kazzi annɔ lɛtak.
Alenɛ ka annyinɛ balɔɔt kazzi, akkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, la balɔɔt ba labɔɔk labbenɛbɛ, la bannɔk-a-kikkwu, la bassi-ifim.
Vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, ka balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bale basi likkwoong batakwɔ kazzi ’kwɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ukipiliwɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt ba doddo bale bafungala ka lubbe.”
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang ka okkpokolo ka ɔtaanɛ, uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba bale bataa ka okkpoloko ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ baggele gaang gaang.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔnaangnɛ kazzi kwa lɛbaang, unnyi balɔɔt ggbadam ba ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ bikekeen.
Ɛkɛtɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang ɛffɔnɛ, ɔtɔɔm bɔɔyi ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Amii, abumala bakekeen ba nbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ attɛ, ‘Affuyɔng, bavvebong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛbama.’
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ubee kɛbwɔɔlɔ bwa bunaangmɛnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ule ka usinɛ limii. Ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Nlɛɛpbong ɛkpansi nle ka nmiinɛ nkooloyɛ, mkpee tɛ̀ttɛ́ kutunwɔ.’
Ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn ɔbbal lɛttɛ, ‘Nlɛɛpbong igɔdɔ zzɔɔp, mung nle ka nmiinɛ nttuluyɛ, amii abwɔɔlɔmɛ mkkpee tɛ̀ttɛ́ kutunmɛ.’
Ɔlɔɔt wakang ɔbbal lɛttɛ, ‘Nssuma wanavva lɛtɔk, ntii ka ggwoon a libbeel, akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ vvenɛ nsi liffu.’

Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ufula umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ abassɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inngwa ammɛ balɔɔknɛ. Ɔzzánga uyini a ssala kutunmɛ, ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk la bɔɔyi ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Amii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala like-like, akkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, la babbe-labɔɔk, la bassi-ifim, la bannɔk-a-kikkwu.’
Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang umii. ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔ abassɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Bɔtɔɔm annɔ atɔɔmnɛnɛ nbwɔɔlɔbongbɛ tɛ, Dedde. Baffubong ggbadam biini, ɔzzànga kufuk kutii baang.’
Uyini a ssala ɔlɔɔk la bɔɔyi ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Amii itɔk itɔk abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu nkwaaning ggwoon anaam luyipi.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ balɔɔt ba nkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk nkkwɔɔbɛ kazzi, basi liffu, ɔlɔɔt wa ule uzzi kazzi anaam ba ɔbɛlɛ lile!’ ”
Uleng a kɛkaan a balɔɔt badɔkɔ baang ka bakupnɛ Jesus. Ɔzzánga Jesus usikili ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ,
“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam baala ukkwoong usinɛ abassɛ la abakka lisumala, usi wanavva ammɛ la bwɔɔn ammɛ lisumala, usi itele ammɛ la ammɛ biini lisumala.
Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ Cross ammɛ lɛsam ukupnɛ ba ukkwoong ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam.
Ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ ka ule ka ɔbɔɔknɛ ɛnyɔng, ɔtaa-ɔtaa uttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkobo ile ittamɛ, usseke ɔsan ulenɛ ka ikkobo ile iffɔmɛ.
Usinɛ ning lile uttenɛ lutte ɛnyɔng ’yɔng baang baala ukkwoong uvve, ɛkɔɔng lɛffɛ. Balɔɔt ba basaknɛ ka ɛtɔk vvenɛ bakpɛnmɛ
battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng uttebong kɛbɔɔk a ggwoon, usigwɛ likkwoong uvve!’

Ubeet ufeelenɛ la lɔlɔp la innɔ balɔɔt kubbwɔɔk umii kullu la ubeet ɔlɔk, Ubeet ’wɔng bakang ɔkɔɔmnɛ lalɔp laffa la innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔp, vvenɛ ɔtaabong uttina ɔsan ɔttɛ isɔdya ammɛ ikkaamɔkkaam, tɛ́ttɛ́ ulenɛ kullu umii.
Ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ba uzzeme, vvenɛ ɔssang balɔɔt bamii bakkpenge ubeet ’wɔng bakang baggyan bɔkaat ka ɛkɛtɛ ɛtakanɛ lɛffɔ.”
Jesus utele lɛttɔ ka lɛkkɔ ’zɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng baang ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ba ule, usinɛ kwa bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ lisumala.”
“Bunɔk buyyɛɛp lɔyyɛɛp, ɔzzànga businɛ gɛnɛgɛnɛ lɛbɛlɛ liggwoom, ba abɛlɛ likkwoong anaangbwɛ buzzanga bunɔk.
Gɔɔ ba bubɛlɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛnɔk ka lusse bɔtɔɔm, gɔɔ kɛnɔk ka kusuma. Busseke bwa kɛsam kɛzzɔɔk gbɔɔ.” Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk.”
Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ɛdɔkɔ baang ya batɔk-innamba la balɔɔt ba bafɛɛlɛnɛbɛ ssala baffunɛ bagɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl a Jesus.
Balɔɔt a Pharisees la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bazzɔ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔtɔk balɔɔt ba bafɛɛlɛnɛbɛ ssala la batɔk-innamba ɔssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt, uzzi kazzi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la abbɛ ffet.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ɔttɛ,

“Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ lalɔp itɔɔn kubbwɔɔk, nnyɔn ɛfakalanɛ ɛtaak, ule ɔnaang nang? Vvenɛ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ lalɔp itɔɔn lanna la itɔɔn ɔsɛlɛ-lɔlɔp ka kazzi, umii ɔggyan ya ɛtaaknɛ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔyɛnyɛ.
Ukoponɛyɛ ɔkaa, vvenɛ uggele gaang gaang, ɔsamyɛ la bɔwaa, utele ka lukat.
Ɔtɔkɔyɛ ufula. Ɔffɔnɛ ka ssala ɔkkwɔɔ inngwa ammɛ la bakulufal ammɛ uloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Attelenɛyɔng nggele oo! Nyɛnbong ɛtɔɔn anaam ya ɛtaaknɛ.’
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, kule kɛssanga ssɔn, laggele za lalenɛ ka libat, ka ɔnaang-a-bubbi vvɔn ɔnaangnɛ busannɛ ka bubbi ammɛ, latta laggele za kwa lalɔp a balɔɔt lanna la balɔɔt ɔsɛlɛ-lɔlɔp ba doddo.
“Ɔlɔk wanavva wa ɔyanganɛ isiling zzɔɔp, ulenɛ ka siling vvɔn ɔttanɛ ɔttɔ ɔtaak, attina attɛ, ule ɔnaang nang? Vvenɛ uyenge luggo ɔkkyaang kɛsana ggwoon ammɛ, ɔggyan ukkpit ning ning ɔttɔngmɛ.
Ɔttɔngnɛ, ɔkkwɔɔ inngwa ammɛ la bakulufal ammɛ, ubbi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ɔttɛ battelemɛ uggele, ka ulenɛ siling ammɛ lɛttɔng. Nbbalwɔyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ nttɛ
bayilabɔtɔɔm bassɛ baggele ning baang ka bayɛnnɛ ɔnaang-a-bubbi ka ɔnaangnɛ busannɛ ka bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ.”
Jesus ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔfɔɔnnɛ bwɔɔn baffa.
Usseke-isimi ɔlɔɔk la abassɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, annyinɛ kazzi kullu kwa anaam!’ Ɔzzánga ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ammɛ bya ɔyanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔbɛngɛlɛ bwaan ammɛ ’bɔng baang baffa.
Bwaan a bɛtɔm ssup bɛsaknɛ usseke isimi a waan ammɛ ’wɔng baang, ɔttɔng etini kazzi kullu ya ammɛ, ɔtaan; ɔgbata umii ikaan la ikkpoko. Umiinɛ ka ikaan ya fulufulu, ɔsam ikkpoko ammɛ uzzi uvve.
Bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa ɔyanganɛ uzzibong uvve. Uvvenɛ bɛfɛɛn ammɛ lizzi, buwɔɔng buttɔ ka lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang. Bulɔk bwa ɔbbalnɛ lɛyanga gbɔɔ ba bule.
Ɔzzánga ɔgbata umii ɔtaa la ɔlɔɔt a lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt a lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang ɔsangamɛ ɔttɛ umii ɔppyɛɛk ikkumma ka bɔtɔɔm.
Umiinɛ, ɔkkɔlɔ kazzi kwa ikkumma izzinɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔkɔmɛnɛ gbɔɔ ba ule.
Ka lakuma ɔnaangmɛ ggbool, ɔttɛ, ‘Balɔɔt a kɛnaang a dedde ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bazzi kazzi bakɔɔm batutulu, mung anaam nle ka nbbenɛ buwɔɔng.
Vvenɛ nfeele nmii ka ɛfɛɛn a dedde, nbwɔɔlɔmɛ nttɛ, “Dedde nnaangbong bubbi ntum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la annɔ.
Anaam ba nbɛlɛ lɛkkɔnɔ kɛkkwɔɔnɛ waan annɔ. Appyɛɛ akɔɔmnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akɔɔmnɛ illeebila annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.” ’
Ɔzzánga ufeele kɔssɛ kimii ka ɛfɛɛn abassɛ. “Utii ka utumanɛ fulufulu bakang, abassɛ ɔyɛnmɛ, bibbemɛ lɛttɔ, ɔmma umii, ugbugbamɛ.
Waan ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde nnaangbong bubbi ntum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la annɔ. Ba nbɛlɛ lɛkkɔnɔ kɛkkwɔɔnɛ waan annɔ.’
Ɔzzánga abassɛ ɔkkwɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ, ɔttɛ, ‘Azzuma asamyɔng ewuulu ya ɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp, affu awɔkɔlɔmɛyɔng. Assɛɛnmɛyɔng waan-ella ka kɛnnɔ. Assɛɛnmɛyɔng ikkpa-bukkpɔ.
Usseke amii akaayɔng ufala ɔgɔdɔ wa ɔkkaamnɛ kappya, affu awwɔɔlyɔng, banaang kazzi kwa lɛbaang.
Waan anaam ’wɔng mung wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ule libbe, gedegede nyɛnmɛbong ka kuddu. Ɔdɔkɔbong ɔtaak kkpal, mung idunamɛbong!’ Ɔzzánga batte kɛnaang a kazzi kwa lɛbaang eseese.
“Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang waan ammɛ wa ɔgɛlɛnya ule ka bɔtɔɔm. Usi lɛmmɛ waan ammɛ wa ɔgɛlɛnya ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛ. Ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, uffu ɔffɔ kɛtɛkɛtɛ a ssala, uppyee ibin ka bakkpanɛ basoom batɔm.
Ɔkkwɔɔ bɔɔyi-abassɛ vvɔn ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Bakang bale ka ’bɔng?’
Ɔzzánga bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Etele annɔ ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, kwakkwɛ ssaawɔ ɔwwɔɔlmɛnɛ ufala ɔgɔdɔ wa ɔkkaamnɛ kappya.’
Waan ’wɔng baang wa ɔgɛlɛnya kutunmɛ ssassa, gɔɔ kimii ka ssala kisimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛsaap. Ɔzzánga abassɛ umii ukkpengemɛ uffu ka ssala.

Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a waan ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛ abassɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ka ussinɛ ka kukkpa kwa abɛngɛlɛnɛyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔffɔ ka mmwɔɔm, nle baang kkwɔk ka nnaangwɔnɛ kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubili. Kɛtɔm ssɔn gbɔɔ lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ ba ntaka nkangala, ɔdɔkɔ alenɛ bɔng linnyi? Gɔɔ ɛbal mung gbɔɔ nɛ ba ataka annyi, nnaang kazzi, izzi la inngwa anaam.
Mung waan annɔ ɔtaanbong bɛfɛɛn annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ; uzzi uvve la ikkpàlà; ɔppyɛlɛ, annɔ asam ɔgɔdɔ wa ɔkkaamnɛ kappya awwɔɔlmɛ.’
Abassɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Waan anaam, ale mung ka ssala anaam, bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya nyanganɛ bya annɔ.
Kɔyyɛɛp ka inaangnɛ kazzi iggele ka etele annɔ ɔdɔkɔnɛ ule libbe, mung ippyɛlɛ iyɛnmɛ ka kuddu; ɔdɔkɔbong ɔtaak, ɔzzànga mung idunamɛbong.’ ”

Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔyanganɛ akkala wa kɔbɔɔk a kɔbɔɔk ammɛ. Ɔzzánga babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ akkala ’wɔng baang ɔbɛpɛbong ikkpoko ammɛ ka itɔk ya isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkwɔɔ akkala ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Kɔlɔɔk kwa nppyeenɛ ntumwɔ bɛɛ? Asam bɛfɛɛn bya alenɛnɛ la lɛkɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ, annyinɛ. Ba nbɛlɛwɔ lɛggyan ka bukkala.’
Akkala ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde ɔggyannɛ kɛsanga ka kɛnaang anaam, nle nnaang nang? Anaam kaang lakke ba bayanga wa nle ntɔɔk ibbe. Lubbwoom ba nkkwoong ka izzit ile inaangnɛ.
Kɔlɔɔk ba kule. Nttanɛ ka kɛnaang ’sɔng, vvenɛ nyanga inngwa ya bale batɔknɛ ka bukekeen ka ssala abbɛ.’
Ɔzzánga ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba balemɛnɛ la ippwoot. Ɔbap ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ dedde adɔkɔnɛ la ippwoot nang?’
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Lalɔp ikyamkyam a bannɛ kubbwɔɔk’ Akkala ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ lɛkɔɔm annɔ; ataa-ɔtaa akkpɔk lalɔp ikyamkyam laffa la ikyamkyam zzɔɔp.’

Ɔbbal la ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ bɛɛ? Ale dedde la ippwoot nang?’ Ammɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Ulenɛ lalɔp issɔ ilaasi kubbwɔɔk.’ Akkala ’wɔng baang ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ lɛkɔɔm annɔ. Ataa-ɔtaa akkpɔk lalɔp issɔ lanna.’
Abassɛ ɔbbyap akkala ’wɔng baang ubungu akkala ammɛ ka eleme ya ɔnaangnɛ ukuma, ka balɔɔt a vveeng ’wɔng mung banaangnɛ lagban ka kɛnaang abbɛ batta balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka buppwolo.”
Jesus ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzànga mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Anaangyɔng ɛnngwa la iyyɛɛp a vveeng nkwaaning, isaalnɛ batɔkwɔyɔng ka doddo ka ssala sa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka lilɔɔk sa ssup, ule ɔssɛ ɔyyɛɛp ning baang ka lilɔɔk sa lɛbaang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ latele ka lilɔɔk sa ssup ule ɔssɛ ɔsɛlɛ latele ning baang ka lilɔɔk sa lɛbaang.
Asinɛ lɛyyɛɛp wa kɛkɔɔm a iyyɛɛp ɛkpansi, ale anaang nang akkɔnɔ wa kɛkɔɔm iyyɛɛp ya lɔkkwɔɔn?
Asinɛ likkwoong akɔɔm bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt ule ɔnaang nang unnyiwɔ bwa bulenɛ bwa annɔ?

“Bɔɔyi vvɔn ba ukkwoong ɔzzanga ubili ibassɛ ammɛ iffa. Ɔyanganɛ ibassɛ iffa vvenɛ vvɔn utunmɛ wakang ɔttamɛ lɛsaap. Vvenɛ utele ɔlɔɔt vvɔn usseke wa vvɔn. Ba akkwoong atele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ikkpoko ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn.”
Balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyeenɛ ’kwɔng, banɔk Jesus ka balenɛ balɔɔt ba ikkpoko isaapnɛbɛ.

Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba anaangwɔnɛyɔng kitook kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔppyɛɛkwɔyɔng, akkɔnɔyɔng ka lusso balɔɔt. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanwɔyɔng ippyam lɔsan. Bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔlɔɔt uttinanɛ ɔttɛ bule ka kukkam gaang, bule bwa gbɔɔ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

“Lafɔɔ-a-Moses la likkpɔk a Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bittumu ning ning bɛffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ John, Ɔnaang-a-Baptizim. Bassi ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang babwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ututala kɛmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzànga kule kkpɛkɛlɛm ka libat la ɛkpansi bɛkkyaapnɛ, lutini kɛkkyaa waan a Lifɔɔ zzɔn gbɔɔ za utiti kɛzzɔɔk.

“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ ɔfɔngɔ kang, ɔtɔk ɔlɔk; ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbɛpɛbong lafɔɔ kimini la wanavva ɔlɔk. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ wanavva wa ulam ɔggbamɛnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbɛpɛbong lafɔɔ kimini la wanavva ɔlɔk.”
“Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya ikkaamnɛ kappya gaang. Ɔnaang kitook lutini livve la zzɔn.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔdɔkɔ baang ɔgbaa wa ɔzzanganɛ Lazarus wa lassɔp lannaangmɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ a kkwɔɔt. Ɔtaa baang ka lɛmma ggwoon a uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang,
ɔttɛ ɔlɔk ɔttɔng waan ezuku kazzi wa ɔffaatnɛ ɔttɔ ka lisse uzzi. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk ibbwa iffu immalmɛ lassɔp.

Ukee-waan, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ubbe. Ubbenɛ, bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu basammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Abraham ka kɛtɔm sa balenɛ ka kɛnaang a kazzi kwa lɛbaang ka libat. Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔssɛ ubbe, ballimɛ.
Ɔdɔkɔ usseke ka akama wa lɛbaang ka Hades. Uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat ɔyɛn Abraham fulufulu la Lazarus ka lufoom ammɛ.
Ɔzzánga ɔkkwɔɔ ɔgaga ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, Abraham, nbbewɔ lɛttɔ, atɔɔm Lazarus ɔyan kɛnnɔ ka bannyi, ɔppwanɛ lɛlaak, nle ka akama wa usinɛ lɛyyɛɛp ka tɔkɔlɔ lɔkɔɔn ’gwɔng.’

Abraham ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Akke oo! Waan anaam, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya atiinɛ ka kuddu, bɛfɛɛn bya doddo ɔkkpɛlɛ annɔ ayanganɛ, Lazarus bulɔk bwa doddo usi lɛyanga. Gedegede mung utii ka vveeng wa doddo, annɔ baang asseke ka akama.

Gɔɔ nkwɔng baang keem lissi, ogge wa ɔddɔngɔnɛ uleyɛlɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ussi kaang ning ukum uffu bakang, baala ukkwoong. Gɔɔ ka ussinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ abeenɛ baang, ɔlɔɔt ba ukkwoong ussi bakang uffu kaang ning.’
Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔɔ. Dedde, kɔyyɛɛp mung nkkpengewɔ nttɛ atɔɔm Lazarus ka ssala dedde anaam,
ka ɛfɛɛn a nyanganɛ itele kubbwɔɔk, umii ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ, nkwaaning abbabbɛ keem bafɔngɔ kiffu ka akama wa lɛbaang ’wɔng mung.’
Abraham ɔttɛ, ‘Itele annɔ bale bakang la Moses la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ bakopolobɛ. Afɔngɔ itele annɔ bagɔpɔlɔ bappyee kwa bale balɔɔk bannyibɛ.’
Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Nkwɔng baang kɛyɔɔng ba kuffi, Dedde Abraham!, bulenɛ ka ubbu ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, umii ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ nzang vvenɛ bakkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi bafɔngɔ.’
Abraham ɔttɛ, ‘Basinɛ kwa Moses la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, kɛfal abbɛ baala bafoolo mkkpa ɔlɔɔt ufungala ka lubbe umii ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ.’ ”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛ balɔɔt battɔ ka bubbi ule lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛ kpɛtkpɛt. Akama ule wa ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔdɛmnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang linaang.

Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka asamnɛ okkili asiki ka kukkook kwa lɛbaang a lɛbaang, asam asikimɛ ka lukat atutmɛ assɛɛn ka lihu, ɔtaa bakang ɔvva bannyi ubbe, lutini gwa ule ɔnaang bwaan a balɔɔt ’bɔng mung battɔ ka bubbi.
Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng! “Etele annɔ ɔnaangnɛ bubbi attamamɛ, ukkpengewɔnɛ, asɔɔkmɛ.
Ɔnaangnɛ bubbi bikongo bɛnnambɛkkyaat utumwɔ annɔ ka livve zzɔn lutini kikkpkit la ssɔn uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔ ɔttɛ, ‘Mkkpee atɔk asɔɔknɛ,’ asɔɔkmɛ.”
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Anaang kiyila ayyɔɔt kɛkkaam kɛgbaa.”

Uyini ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bulenɛ ka ayanganɛyɔng kiyila kiggbenge kɛffɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛfɔɔk-ɛsasa, nzang akkwoong mung alɔɔkyɔng la lɛsan a kɛssɛ za lɛbaang attɛyɔng, ‘Allɔpwɔ kɛyɔɔng la bɛbɔɔk, amii akɔɔnwɔ kɛyɔɔng ka lihu.’ Vvenɛ kitelewɔ, kimukasɛ kɛyɔɔng kimii.”

“Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng baang ɔyanganɛ bɔɔyi wa uwoopnɛ iwopowopo, ɔlɔk ɔkat itɔɔn, ussinɛ bakang ka bɔtɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛ, vvenɛ alɔɔkmɛ attɛ, ‘Azzuma like-like amii azzi kazzi annɔ’ ɔɔ?
Ning baang baala alɔɔk. Lutini ’gwɔng ule ɔlɔɔkmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Awɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ annɔ annyinɛ kazzi, akatnɛ. Nzzibong nvva tɛ́ttɛ́ assɛ azzi kwa annɔ.’
Bɔɔyi, ɔlɔɔt nzzɔɔn mɛ ba ɔnaang ka uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl abassɛ. Faa nang?
Kule kukku kkwɔn la annyɔɔng. Alenɛyɔng kwa babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng lɛnaang avveyɔng, attɛyɔng, ‘Ayyɔɔt kɔttɛ ibɔɔyi, ivvebong kɛnaang ayyɔɔt.’ ”
Ka Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii a Jerusalem, ɔdɔkɔ ɔssɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ a Samaria la Galilee.
Ɔdɔkɔ ka kimii ka lɛffɛ lɛlɔk baang, ɔzzánga ududa balɔɔt ɔffaal zzɔɔp. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakɔɔng bakang ka lusso babee.
Babungu battɛ, “Jesus, Dedde ayyɔɔt, ibbewɔ lɛttɔ.”
Jesus ɔyɛnnɛbɛ, ɔttɛ, “Amii akupyɔng bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bappyɛɛkwɔyɔng.” Bafeele battɛ bamii, ɔppwabɛ ka ɛtɔk.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyɛnnɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔppwamɛbong, ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔgaga.
Ɔttɔ, ukun Jesus laddu ka lataak; ɔzɔnɔmɛ kɛnaang. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ wa Samaria.
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Badɔkɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔp ka nttulanɛbɛ, ɔppwabɛ. Balɔɔt ba ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp bale?
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bakkwoong baffu bazɔnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔɔ?”
Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Afeele, afula; kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ.”
Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk babap Jesus ɛkɛtɛ ya Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile iffu. Ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala iffu ɔlɔɔt ɔyɛnyɛ kkpelegedee.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔttɛ, ‘Yɛnyɛ mung’; ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Yɛnyɛ kang’ ba ule. Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ka lɔtan.”
Ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya ale àkkɔ́lɔ attɛ ayɛnyɔng bɛtɔm a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga ’yɔng byɛ baala ayɛnyɔng.
Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ba bale balɔɔkwɔyɔng battɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk kang’, ɔlɔk ‘Ppyɛɛk mung’. Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ atta amii appyɛɛkyɔng.
Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ immwalang ya ɔttanɛ ɔfaka libat ka ussinɛ ka lɛttɔ za zzɔn umii ɔffɔ ka za zzɔn ka kɛtɔm ammɛ.
Ɔzzànga ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama; balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm ’byɔng vvenɛ bafimmɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ a Noah, kule kule ning baang ka bɛtɔm a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ ka lizzi, bavva litak, bwaanbwalam batɔk bwanavva, bwaanabwanavva ballu bwaanabwalam tɔttɔ ɔffɔ kɛtɔm sa Noah ɔmalnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat, ɛlɔlɔ etuma ɛwwɔɔlbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Kule kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Lot. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bale gbɔɔ ka bazzinɛ lizzi, bavva litak, bataan lɛtaan, balɛɛp lɛlɛɛp, bawoop iwopowopo, babɔɔk ssoon.
Ka kɛtɔm sa Lot ɔbbɛnɛ ka Sodom, lɔkɔɔn la ittoodele bissi ka libat bitteep, bɛllɔt ka lisse, bɛwwɔɔlbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Kule kule ning baang ka kɛtɔm sa Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔyɔɔ bwa ulenɛ.
“Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka libat a ggwoon ammɛ, ba ɔbɛlɛ lisini umii ɔllak bɛfɛɛn ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka bɔtɔɔm, ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛppyɛlɛ, umii ka ssala.
Akkeyɔng kwa wanavva Lot!
Ɔlɔɔt wa ubumnɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkala kuddu ammɛ biini, vvenɛ ɔtakakwɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ɔtaka kuddu ammɛ, ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ule uddu.
Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, balɔɔt bale bale baffa ka bamininɛ ka igolo nnyɔn, vvenɛ basanga vvɔn bagbata usseke vvɔn.
Bwanavva baffa bale bale ka kikook a bɛfɛɛn, vvenɛ basam vvɔn bagbata usseke vvɔn.
[Balɔɔt baffa bale bale ka bɔtɔɔm, vvenɛ basam vvɔn bagbata usseke vvɔn.]”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Uyini ka yang?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ka ɛfɛɛn a ubbu bɔfɛɛn ubbenɛ, umini; idɛlɛ iggba lattɔ baang.”
Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ ukopolobɛ ɔlɔk nkwaaning bassɛɛn luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, basɛlɛ bbwɔp ka luppyam.
Ɔttɛ, “Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang ka lɛffɛ zzɔn, wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usimɛnɛ lɛbbwɔpɔ, usi balɔɔt litele.

Wanavva wa ulam ubbenɛ ɔkɔngɔmɛ ule baang ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ka ullunɛ. Umii ka ssala ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, uttelemɛ. Ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Akaal kɛkaal ayyɔɔt la ɔlɔɔt wa kɔlɔɔk kɔttɔnɛyɛlɛ, abee la anaam ellee.’
Ɛkɛtɛ ɛmmɛ, ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal usi lɛggyan ɔttɛ, uttelemɛ. Ɔtaa uttina ɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Mkkpa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nsinɛ lɛbbwɔpɔ, nsi ɔlɔɔt litele,
lilɔɔk ’sɔng sa wanavva ’wɔng mung ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ mung, vvenɛ nssɛɛnmɛ kɔbɔɔk nnaang bwa ɔggyannɛ; nzang vvenɛ kiffu ammɛ kɛdɛmnɛ nsɛlɛ.’ ”
Ɔzzánga Uyini ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔbbyap-a-ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Mung attina attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ɔkaal kɛkaal, ubee la balɔɔt ammɛ ba bakkwanɛ kikoon la kɛtɔm, battɛ uttelebɛ ɔɔ? Vvenɛ kɔnaangmɛ bɔkɔɔt a kittelebɛ ɔɔ?
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, vvenɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal like like, ubee la abbɛ. Ɔzzànga attina attɛyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ggbɔɔ wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ule uffu ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung la balɔɔt ba battinanɛ battɛ abbɛ battanɛ budoddo lɛnaang, bafim kwa babbɛ.
Ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt baffa bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bamii kɛzɔɔm kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ wa Pharisees, wa vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ ɔtɔk-innamba.

Ɔlɔɔt-a-Pharisees ufeele ubee ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Nwomowɔbong kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Anaam ɔsaap-a-bɔfɛɛn-ɔlɔɔt lissi, anaam ukup a bwanavva-balɔɔt lissi, ɔlɔɔt ba nsi litele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk, ɔlɔk vvenɛ nbbɔl tɔkɔlɔ la ba ayyɔɔt. Nwomowɔ kɛnaang ka nsinɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtɔk-innamba ’wɔng mung lile.
Ntaa buwɔɔng bɛtɔm bɛffa ka liwaazɛ. Nsam bɛfɛɛn anaam nbɛngɛlɛ lakup zzɔɔp, nsanga kukupa kkwɔn nnyiwɔ.’
Ɔtɔk-innamba ɔkɔɔng ka lɛmma-ggwoon a luzɔɔm ubee, gɔɔ lusso gbɔɔ ka libat usi liyeek ɔppyɛɛk, utup labɔɔk ka luppyam ɔttɛ, ‘Ellee Ebinukkpaapi, nbbewɔ lɛttɔ, anaam ɔnaang-a-bubbi.’

Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ɔlɔɔt wa ukumanɛ mung ɔnaangnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ wa ikeeng lissi. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uggbengemɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng vvenɛ usikili usook ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔkmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka busook ule uggbenge ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Balɔɔt bakɔɔm bwɔɔntiti bafee Jesus battɛ utelebɛ labɔɔk. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bayɛnnɛ ning baang baggba balɔɔt ’bɔng baang battɛ bafete bwɔɔntiti lɛkɔɔm bamii.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ bwɔɔntiti ’bɔng baang ɔssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng bwɔɔntiti battɔnɛ ka kkwɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ aggbayɔngbɛ. Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ mung.
Akke attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa usinɛ kɔlɔɔk Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛtɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti utelenɛ zzeen ka abakka la abassɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang baala ufula ka annyɛ.”
Uzzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews vvɔn ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo wa doddo, mung nnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ vvenɛ nyanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal?”
Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akkwɔɔnɛ Ukopolo-lukopolo wa Doddo? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ba ule ɔgbaa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kɔttɛ asan mung lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm: ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip ssip; tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkala lalaak; atele ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ.’ ”
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ka ussinɛ ka ntiinɛ ssup, nle baang ka nlokonɛ lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.”

Jesus uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Atii ka ale anaang bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn agbaa. Ataan bɛfɛɛn annɔ bya ayanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ; asam ikkpoko, annyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Vvenɛ anaang kibeet ka libat. Alenɛ livve, afeele akupnɛ.”
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uppyeenɛ ning baang, livve lɛbbɔlmɛ ka ulenɛ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt.
Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang ka ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang livve lɛbbɔlmɛnɛ, ɔttɛ, “Kukoolo-ukoolo tɛ́ttɛ́ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔgɔdɔ kɛmal ka lɛmma ɔnnya, mɛ ba kikoolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule kukoolo uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt kɛmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ ka Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang babapmɛ battɛ, “Nkkpa mung, nnyinɛ ule uddu?”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa kukoolonɛ ɔlɔɔt kɛnaang, kule kpɛkɛlɛm ka labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔzzánga Peter ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk, igbatabong ssala ayyɔɔt ikɔngɔ, iffu ikupwɔ tɛ.”
Jesus ɔttɛbɛ, “Iii, Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng oo, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔgbatanɛ ɔkɔngɔ ssala ammɛ, ɔlɔk ɔgbata wanavva ammɛ ɔkɔngɔ, ɔlɔk itele ammɛ, ɔlɔk abassɛ la abakka, ɔlɔk bwaan ammɛ ka lɛttɔ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
vvenɛ ɔyanga bya bɛttɔnɛ ’byɔng baang ɔgbaa la bwa ɔyanganɛ ka lɛfal ’zɔng, ɔbɛtɛmɛ la kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ka vveeng wa ule uffu.”

Jesus ɔsam balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa, ubee ka kusɛngɛ. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Mung ile ka imiinɛyɔng Jerusalem ka ɛfɛɛn ya lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkpɔknɛ batum Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, lile linaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Vvenɛ basammɛ, bassɛɛn ikanakana ka labɔɔk, ba bale banyɔɔkamɛ bassɛɛnmɛ ka izzit. Vvenɛ bakwula libbaak, ballɔtmɛ.
Batupmɛ, bawwɔɔl. Ɔzzànga bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe, ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basi kɔlɔɔk lɛsan ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang sa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ kkwɔn gbɔɔ. Ifɛɛt a lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang iddumubɛ, basi lɛsan bwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ utum.
Jesus uffu ɔffɔ kɛtɛkɛtɛ Jericho. Ussi-ifim vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ ubbwoom lubbwoom.
Uppyeenɛ kɛkaan-a-balɔɔt ka kɛsaknɛ, ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Kule nang?”
Ɔzzánga babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Jesus wa Nazareth ɔsaknɛ.”
Ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang ɔkkwa ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Jesus, Waan-a-David, nbbewɔ lɛttɔ.”
Balɔɔt ba lusso baggbamɛ battɛ, ɔtaa zzum. Ammɛ ɔkama-ɔkama ubungu ɔttɛ, “Waan-a-David, nbbewɔ lɛttɔ.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ubee ɔttɛ bakɔɔm ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang bafeemɛ. Ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ, Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ,
“Aggyan attɛ nnyiwɔ ’bɔng?” Ussi-ifim ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Dedde nggyan nttɛ nppyɛlɛ nyɛn.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ayɛn! Kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ.”
Eseese ɔyɛn. Ɔzzánga ufeele umii ukup Jesus. Ɔzɔnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Kɛkaan ’sɔng baang bayɛnnɛ ning baang, babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Jesus ɔsak umii Jericho, utii ka kimii ka kimii,
Uzzilɛttɔ batɔk-innamba vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Zacchaeus, wa ɔyanganɛ ikkobo.
Zacchaeus uggele ɔttɛ ɔlɔk ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Jesus. Keem usi likkwoong ɔyɛnmɛ ka ɔbbwɛtnɛ, ɔgbaa kɛkaan kile lɛttala.
Ɔzzánga ɔmma ɔsak kibbi ’sɔng baang umii ka lusso. Ubbulu, uttele ka kɛssɛ. Ɔttɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔyɛn Jesus ka ule ka ɔsaknɛ baang.
Jesus ɔffɔnɛ baang, uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, ɔlɔɔk la Zacchaeus ɔttɛ, “Zacchaeus, assuma asini nle nkkwunu ssala annɔ mmwɔɔn.”
Zacchaeus uzzuma usini, uwomo Jesus la laggele za lɛbaang.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bayɛnnɛ ning baang, bazzɔ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt awɔng mung umiibong bukekeen ka ssala ɔnaang-a-bubbi tɛ.”
Zacchaeus ufeele ubee, ɔlɔɔk la Uyini ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔ Dedde! Vvenɛ nfaka kufaak a bɛfɛɛn anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ, nnnyi balɔɔt-ibbɔl. Nlenɛ balɔɔt isak lizzi; vvenɛ ntakbɛ, nssɛɛnbɛ isak bikkpkit bɛnna.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kuffubong ka ssala ’sɔng mmwɔɔn. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ngbaa ussi ka kikkwu Abraham.
Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu ɔggyan balɔɔt ba bataaknɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkalabɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssa ifɛɛt ’yɔng ka balenɛ baang ka kɛgɔpɔlɔ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ. Usseke kɛtɛkɛtɛ ɔffɔ Jerusalem. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ battina battɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ka iffunɛ.
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔgbatanɛ umii kizzi kibeet ka lɔkaan fulufulu tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ka ssala.

Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbata, ɔkkwɔɔ ibbɔɔyi ammɛ, balɔɔt zzɔɔp, unnyibɛ ikkpoko la vvɔn la vvɔn ududa. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Asan bwa ale akɔɔmyɔng ikkpoko ’yɔng baang, anaangyɔng asangayɔng isak ka nle nle lɛgbata.’
Keem balɔɔt ba lɔkaan ammɛ bɛ ba ɔsaap. Ɔzzánga batɔɔm babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ, ‘Ba iggyan ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔzzánga ubeet ka ayyɔɔt.’
Bakaa uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kibeet, ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi uffu ufula. Eseese ɔtɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ ’yɔng baang ɔttɛ baffu usseke ɔsan isak ya balenɛ lɛsanga.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn uffu ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, nkɔɔmbong ikkpoko ’yɔng baang, nyanga naira zzɔɔp tɛ.’
Ammɛ uwomo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kɛnaang ɔttɛ, ‘Anaangbong gaang annɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo. Ka akkwoongnɛ akɔɔm bwaan a lilɔɔk sa utiti doddo, vvenɛ nnaangwɔ azzánga uzzilɛttɔ laffɛ zzɔɔp.’
Bɔɔyi wa vvɔn ɔbbal liffu ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde nkɔɔmbong naira wa anyinɛnɛ, nnaang naira kubbwɔɔk tɛ.’
Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ azzánga uzzilɛttɔ laffɛ kubbwɔɔk.’
Bɔɔyi wakang ɔbbal liffu ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, yɛn ikkpoko annɔ mung, ndɔkɔ nssɛɛnyɛ ka waan-ubbubba nllup.
Adɔkɔ ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ ka alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa akoolonɛ eleme. Atɔk bɔfɛɛn bwa businɛ bwa annɔ lile, ayaat bwa atakanɛ liwoop.’
Ɔlɔɔk la bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ ubbu a bɔɔyi ’wɔng! vvenɛ nkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ nbɛpɛwɔ. Asanbong attɛ anaam nkoolo elemɛ ntɔk bwa businɛ bwa anaam lile, nyaat bwa ntakanɛ liwoop,
ngkka ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ asi ikkpoko anaam ka bank lɛssɛn? Tɛ nzang ka nppyɛlɛnɛ mung nmiibong ntɔk ikkpoko ’yɔng baang la isak.’
Ubeet ’wɔng baang usikili, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba babeenɛ baang ɔttɛ, ‘Tɔkyɔng ikkpoko ’yɔng baang agbaayɔng bɔɔyi wa ɔyanganɛ naira zzɔɔp tɛ.’
Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, ‘Dedde, baang ulemɛ naira zzɔɔp tɛ.’
Ubeet ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔyanganɛ uggboggbo, vvenɛ ɔyanga ɔgbaa; wa ɔyanganɛ ssup, gɔɔ waan-ezuku wa ɔfalanɛ ɔyanga vvenɛ nkup ntɔk.
Kwa balɔɔt a kɔfɔk anaam ’bɔng baang ba battɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ nzzanga ubeet abbɛ, kɔɔmyɔngbɛ, affu awwɔɔlyɔng mung ka lataak anaam.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang uvve, ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk, ɔgbata, umii Jerusalem, ɔkɔngɔbɛ ka isimi.
Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ Bethphage la Bethany ka lɛttaal Olives, ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa, bakɔɔm ɛtɔk.
Ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔm assɛ amiiyɔng ka lɛffɛ za lusso baang. Affɔnɛyɔng bakang, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng kitook eyim sa batakanɛyɛ littele kkpaal ka basikinɛ. Akkyaayɔngyɛ, akɔɔm, affuyɔng mung.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbapwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Bɔng akkyaanɛyɔngyɛ?’ Abɔɔlɔmɛyɔng attɛyɔng, ‘Dedde ɔggyannɛyɛ.’ ”
Bafeele bamii bayɛnyɛ ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Baleyɛ baang ka kɛkkyaa, bayini eyim ’yɔng baang babapbɛ battɛ, “Eyim ’yɔng baang akkyaayɔngyɛ kwa ’bɔng?”
Bappyɛlɛbɛ kamma battɛ, “Uyini ɔttɛnɛ ifeemɛ.”
Bakkyaa kitook eyim ’yɔng baang bafee Jesus. Bakkyaa igbogbo abbɛ bateleyɛ ka libat, battele Jesus ɔyaam uttele ka libat.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ baang ka uttelenɛ, balɔɔt ggbadam bazzɔɔk igbogbo ka ɛtɔk.

Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ a Jerusalem ka lufoom gwa kuttɔɔk a lɛttaal Olives, kɛkaan a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bawomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, babungumɛ kɛnaang ka uggboggbo bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bya balenɛ lɛyɛn, battɛ,
“Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ubeet wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini ppyɛɛ! Bɔkaat ka libat, latele lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees bafeele ka kibbi balɔɔk bannyi Jesus, battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ bataa zzum.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, bataanɛ zzum lattaal vvenɛ labungu lagaga.”
Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ a tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, ɔ́yɛnnɛsɛ, ɔkkwa unnyisɛ,
Ɔttɛ, “Asanbong bwa kɛkɔɔm kɛnaang bɔkaat mmwɔɔn! Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ba akkwoong ayɛnbwɛ!
Bɛtɔm bile ka biffɔnɛ bya balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ bale bakkpitwɔ, bafɛɛnwɔ ka ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Vvenɛ babɛpɛwɔ, bawwɔɔl balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balewɔnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ. Gɔɔ lattaal za lalenɛ baang zzɔn ning baala lisseke ka ɛfɛɛn a libeenɛ, ka asinɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffuwɔnɛ kɛkkala!”
Jesus umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ɔggba bassɛ-kappya.
Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bakkpɔkbong ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Gwoon anaam bale bakkwɔɔgwɛ ggwoon a luzɔɔm’ mung annyɔɔng asikiliyɔngbonggwɛ, lusseke kiddumu bassip!”
Jesus ukopolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bagɛlɛnya abbɛ baggyan Jesus kɛwwɔɔl.
Ɔzzánga basi lɛsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaang, ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔnɛ ka kɛgɔpɔlɔ a Jesus, basi lɛggyan battɛ basi lɛkkɔ zzɔn gbɔɔ lippyee.
Livve zzɔn za Jesus ulenɛ baang ka kikopolo balɔɔt ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔgbaa la bagɛlɛnya baffu.
Balɔɔk Jesus battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ mung akɔɔm bɔka lakke, anaang bɛfɛɛn byɔng? Nnyinɔɔng unnyiwɔnɛ lakke ’zɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Fɔngɔ ssii, nbapwɔyɔng lɔbap. Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng,
mung John lakke kɛnaang a baptizim lassimɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm faa ka ɔlɔɔt?”
Bazzɔɔk bɛkangala abbabbɛ battɛ, “Mung ile ilɔɔk nang? Ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ, ‘Lakke ’zɔng baang lassi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,’ vvenɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ngkka ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ isiyɔng kwa John liyila.’
Ɔzzànga ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ, ‘Lassimɛ ka balɔɔt’, kibbi ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ batɔɔpyɛlɛ lattaal bawwɔɔl ka balenɛ liyila battɛ, John ɔdɔkɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Ba isan ɛfɛɛn a lakke ’zɔng baang lassimɛnɛ.”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Gɔɔ wɔyɔng baala nssɛ nbwɔɔlɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a lakke za nnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng lassinɛnɛ.”

Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung, ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn uwoop kibwoto lakkpo-bɛssɛ, ɔsam bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang unnyi balɔɔt, ɔttɛ, bakat. Ammɛ biini ɔgbata umii ɛfɛɛn ya fulufulu, usi ppwaat ppwaat lɛppyɛlɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya ɔffanɛ lakkpo, ɔtɔɔm ubili ammɛ ɔttɛ umii ka bakat a bɔtɔɔm, ɔtɔk etini lakkpo ya ammɛ, ufeemɛ. Umiinɛ, bakat a bɔtɔɔm bɔng baang batupmɛ, baggbamɛ, ufula; bulɔk bafimmɛ kinnyi.
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔtɔɔm ubili ɔlɔk, ɔttɛ umii ɔtɔk etini lakkpo ya ammɛ ufeemɛ. Bakat a bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang batupmɛ lɔkpat lɔbɛtɛmɛ. Banaangmɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit, baggbamɛ, ufula; bulɔk bafimmɛ kinnyi.
Ɔbbal ubili ɔlɔk lɛtɔɔm, ɔnaang ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat. Bakat a bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang baddopomɛ, battulumɛ bazzɔɔk bakang.
Ɔzzánga uyini bɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Nle nnaang nang? Vvenɛ ntɔɔm waan a luppyam anaam biini, vvenɛ basan batelemɛ.’
Bakat a bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang bayɛnmɛnɛ, balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ waan Uyini bɔtɔɔm. Iwwɔɔlmɛyɔng; usseke bɔtɔɔm busseke bwa ayyɔɔt.’
Ɔzzánga battulumɛ, batta ka bɔtɔɔm, basammɛ bawwɔɔl.” Jesus ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung uyini bɔtɔɔm ule ɔnaang bakat a bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang nang?
Vvenɛ uffu ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ɔsam bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang, unnyi balɔɔt balɔk, bakat.” Balɔɔt bappyeenɛ ning baang battɛ, “Ning lissi ffet.”
Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛkbɛ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk nang ka lɔttɛnɛ; ‘Likkpo lɛttaal za ɔbɔɔk-a-ggwoon ɔttɛnɛ ba lɛyyɛɛp, lɛppyɛɛbong lisikili, lisseke lɛttaal za lɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp!’
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔttɔnɛ ka lɛttaal ’zɔng baang vvenɛ ɔbɔbɔlɔ usseke lakkpɔ lakkpɔ. Lɛttaal ’zɔng baang lɛppyɛɛnɛ lɛttɔ lɛbɛtɛ ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ likookmɛ usikili ubut.”
Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm babum kɛkaa Jesus eseese baang, ka basannɛ battɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng baang Jesus ɔssa utumbɛ abbɛ. Keem basi lɛbbɔ bakaamɛ bamma balɔɔt.

Basseke ka bakatnɛ kufuk kwa bbwak. Balup balɔɔt balɔk labbu battɛ babbwa battɛ abbɛ bale wa ammɛ. Batɔɔmbɛ battɛ bakɔɔm ibap bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔlɔɔk, nkwaaning basammɛ bannyi lakke uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi abbɛ.

Banaang-a-lagban ’bɔng baang balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, isan lɔsan ittɛ kwa alɔɔknɛ la kwa akopolonɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Isan lɔsan ittɛ zzeen ba atele ka kwa ɔlɔɔt uttinanɛ. Ɔzzànga, akopolo lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk atum luttina Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ utum balɔɔt.
Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, mung kule bbwak ka ikkpɛɛnɛ innamba ka Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome ɔɔ? Faa ifɔngɔ?”
Jesus ɔyɛnbongbɛ lagban ’zɔng baang. Ɔzzánga ɔttɛ,
“Ayɔɔnɛyɔng siling ee. Baang lusso ’gwɔng baang la lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng baang ka siling za nnyinɛ?”
Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Bya Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome.” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔyyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp, annyiyɔng Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome bwa bulenɛ bwa ammɛ, annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Basi likkwoong bakaamɛ ka lɛkkɔ zzɔn gbɔɔ ka lusso balɔɔt, ɔzzánga bataa zzum kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka kɛppyɛlɛ kamma sa Jesus ɔppyɛlɛnɛbɛ.
Balɔɔt a Sadducees balɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ balɔɔt baala bafungala ka lubbe. Keem babap Jesus battɛ,

“Ukopolo-lukopolo, Moses ɔkkpɔk Lifɔɔ ’zɔng unnyiyɛlɛ, ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ubbenɛ ɔkɔngɔ wanavva ammɛ, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔtakanɛ waan lɛmaat unnyimɛ, etele ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbbal wanavva ’wɔng baang lɛtɔk, nkwaaning ɔfɔɔn waan ɔkɔɔl ubbu etele ammɛ.’
Ɔzzànga balɔɔt badɔkɔ baang, balɔɔt bannambakkyaat, itele la itele. Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk abbɛ ɔtɔk wanavva. Wanavva ammɛ usi lɛmaat unnyimɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ubbe ɔkɔngɔmɛ ka vveeng.
Ubbenɛ, etele ammɛ wa ukupmɛnɛ, ɔtɔk wanavva ’wɔng baang ullu.
Kɔbbal ning baang lile tɔttɔt batɔkmɛ baduda.
Kumii kuttele lɛttɔ ka wanavva ’wɔng baang ubbenɛ.
Mung ɔffɔnɛ ka babbu bale bafungala ka lubbe, wanavva ’wɔng baang ule ule wa nnyinɛ? Ka itele la itele ’yɔng baang innamikkyaat balemɛnɛ lɛtɔk?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bwaanbwalam la bwanavva ba vveeng ’wɔng mung ballunɛ.
Bwaanbwalam la bwanavva ba bakkɔnɔnɛ kifungala ka lubbe bataa ka kuddu ka vveeng wa ule uffu, killu baala ballu.
Bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba babbe. Abbɛ balenɛ bwaan a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka balenɛ ka lubbe lifungala.

Moses ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ppwool ɔttɛ vvenɛ babbu bafungala ka lubbe. Ka kutolo kwa kutumnɛ kɛzafɔk sa kɛkkɔmnɛ lɔkɔɔn, ɔlɔɔk utum Uyini ɔttɛ, ‘Uyini ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham; ule Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Isaac la Jacob.’
Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a bakokolo la babbu ka ɔkkpɛlɛ batiinɛ ikokolo ka lusso ammɛ.”
Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk balɔɔk battɛ, “Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ kile bbwak, Ukopolo-lukopolo.”
Basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛbbɔ babap Jesus ibap ilɔk.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule ussi ka kikkwu a David ee?
Nlɔɔk ka David biini ɔlɔɔknɛ ka luvva Psalms ɔttɛ, ‘Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔk la Uyini anaam ɛttɛ, Ataa mung ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk anaam,
Ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ nsam balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ nlokowɔ asing bukkpɔ.’
David ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ ‘Uyini!’ Ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule waan a David.”
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ka balenɛ baang ka bagɔpɔlɔnɛ, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ,

“Akatkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ tɛ. Baggyan kɛssɛ gbɔɔ gbɔɔ ning baang la iwuulu nkwaaning bawomobɛ la latele ka ogyila kappya. Baggyan bɛtaa bya balɔɔt a latele balokobɛ kɛyɔɔng ka idda mitin, la bɛtaa bya doddo ka bɛtaa kazzi tɛ.
Bazzi bwanavva babbu isak, bayipbɛ bɛfɛɛn ka ssala babbwa battɛ bamii bassɛɛn luzɔɔm bannyibɛ. Akama wa abbɛ ule ɔtta lɛbbɔl!”
Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ɔyɛn baggboggbo balɔɔt ka bannyinɛ lɛsɔɔk.
Ɔgbaa ɔyɛn ukee-waan a wanavva ubbu ka unnyinɛ ideli iffa.
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Wanavva ’wɔng baang unnyibong lɛsɔɔk za lɛttanɛ lasɔɔk ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ,

ka balɔɔt ’bɔng bakang basanganɛ bwa bannyinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ kibeet abbɛ, ɔzzànga wanavva ’wɔng mung wa ɔbbɔlmɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbbɔlmɛnɛ lɔbbɔl baang, unnyibong bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ uddu ɔkkpɛlɛ abbwɛ, usseke ka ɔtaanɛ ibɔɔk ibɔɔk.”
Balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ ka kɛlɔɔk kitum bɔllɛ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la bɔllɛ lattaal ’zɔng baang, ɔbɛtɛ la lasɔɔk za bassɛɛnnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Jesus ɔttɛ,
“Mbyɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayɛnnɛyɔng baang, ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ effɔ ya ale asiyɔng bulɔk lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn; gɔɔ lɛttaal zzɔn gbɔɔ vvenɛ babɛlɛyɔng lɛyɛn. Ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ baang vvenɛ labɔl lallɔt.”
Ɔzzánga babap Jesus battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung ’kwɔng kule kɔnaang ɛkɛtɛ nang? Ile ikɔɔm ’bɔng isan ɛkɛtɛ kule kɔnaang?”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Akatyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ badɛmwɔyɔng, agbigbiniyɔng tɛ. Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ baffu ka lɛkɔɔl anaam battɛ, ‘Anaam nlemɛnɛ ammɛ, ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong!’ ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ akupyɔngbɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng ka ale appyeeyɔng kwa lɛkɔɔng la lilɔɔk. Bɛfɛɛn bya ning baang vvenɛ bɛnaang. Ɔzzànga ba bɛnaang bɛttɛ lakpeke a vveeng lakkɛtɛbong.”
Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Lɔkaan ggwɔn vvenɛ ballu la gwakang; itutum nnyɔn vvenɛ illu la ilɔk.
Vvenɛ ɛkpansi ɛzza uggboggbo epiti, buwɔɔng la lilɔɔk sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp vvenɛ bɛnaang ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn a lakkpi vvenɛ bɛnaang, bɛmaanga bya lɛbaang vvenɛ bɛyɔɔ ka libat.

Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaang, vvenɛ bakaawɔyɔng, bayɔɔ akama. Vvenɛ bakɔɔmwɔyɔng bamii kɛkaal ka idda mitin, vvenɛ bassɛɛnwɔyɔng igbakkɔpɔ, vvenɛ bakɔɔmwɔyɔng bamii ka lusso babeet la bakɔɔm ɛkpansi ka lɛttɔ anaam.
Uwɔng baang ule ulewɔyɔng kufuk kwa kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Anaangyɔng ittina gedegede mung akatyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu alɛlɛkɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale anaang akkalawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kule kɔnaang.
Vvenɛ nnyiwɔyɔng lammwɔɔl la kukele kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔkangalawɔyɔng ule usi lile.
Vvenɛ issaawɔ annyɔɔng la issakawɔ annyɔɔng la itele annyɔɔng la ikpana annyɔɔng la inngwa annyɔɔng, bassɛ basamwɔyɔng bannyibɛ. Vvenɛ bafakala balɔɔt annyɔɔng balɔk bawwɔɔl.
Vvenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ulokowɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk ka lɛttɔ anaam.
Ɔzzànga eggbe kittulu nnyɔn ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng baala ɛlɔp ɛtaak.
Beeyɔng bbwak, ale anaangyɔng ning mung akkalawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng.”
“Ɛkɛtɛ ayɛnnɛyɔng isɔgya ka ikkpitnɛ Jerusalem baduda, asan attɛyɔng ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛmmɛ Jerusalem ɔbɛpɛ ɔsaal.

Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka Judea vvenɛ bamma bamii ka libat ikpok. Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala vvenɛ bagbata. Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka billu a vveeng vvenɛ ba babɛlɛ tɔkɔlɔ a ssala limii.
Ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang bilenɛ ‘Bɛtɔm-Akama’ ɔkkɔɔnɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.
Bwanavva ba balenɛ la zzɛɛm la ba bwɔɔntiti ka eddu vvenɛ bayɛn akama. Akama wa lɛbaang wa ataanɛ attina kɔkɛɛlɛwɔ, vvenɛ uffu ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng. Binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ bippyɛɛk balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
Vvenɛ bawwɔɔl balɔk la igge, bakaa balɔk, bassɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ ka ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ikanakana vvenɛ basusuku Jerusalem tɔttɔt ɛkɛtɛ abbɛ ɛsak.

“Linaang vvenɛ linaang ka livve luwee, la ettuma la bwaanettuma. Ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi vvenɛ ɛkɔp ɛttɔbɛ bannyi. Vvenɛ ɔbbwɔpɔ balɔɔt ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bale bappyee kɛ́wɔ̀l sa lihu la ɛlɔlɔ bile bɛ́wɔl.
Balɔɔt vvenɛ babbe bafungala ka ule ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ kɛtaa kɛkat kwa kule kɔnaang ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ. Lakke a vveengodde vvenɛ lakyakyama.
Bɔk tɛ́ttɛ́ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ utuma la ikkpálá-lukpaaggbeede la lakke, ɔgbaa la latele.
Lilɔɔk ’sɔng lile ka littenɛ kɛnaang, afeele abeeyɔng lubee appyɛɛkyɔng ka libat, ɔkkala-ikkala annyɔɔng utii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ɔttɛ, “Akkeyɔng kwa lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang la bɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ.
Ayɛnnɛyɔng ka livva abbyɛ lippwɔtnɛ, asanbong attɛyɔng eteep ɛkɛtɛbong.
Kɔssɛ kule ning baang, ayɛnnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bɛnaangnɛ, asan attɛyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ ka ile ka iffunɛ.
Akkeyɔng tɛ, bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bɛnaangbong tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka kuddu gedegede mung babbe.
Libat la ɛkpansi vvenɛ bɛsak bimii, ɔzzànga lɛmmwɔɔl anaam baala lɛsak.”
“Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akeneyɔng kwa kazzi la batak ba bakkaamnɛ, la ittina lɛfal ’zɔng mung, nzang Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang vvenɛ kissolo kitipili.
Kile kɛkaa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kitipili tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔ́nnya.
Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm gaang gaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning ayangayɔng lakke asɛɛmyɔng ɛkɛtɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng lile linaang, ɔlɔk abeeyɔng lusso Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Jesus ukopolobɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔffɔnɛ ka kulele kɔnaangnɛ, umii ukkwunu ka lɛttaal a Olives.
Balɔɔt baggba lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bagɔpɔlɔ lukopolo gwa ukopolonɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kwa bazzinɛ brɛɛd wa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn ɛkkɛtɛnɛ,
bazilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ baggyan ɛtɔk ya bale banaang bawwɔɔl Jesus ka balɔɔt babbwɔpɔnɛbɛ.
Satan ɔmana Judas wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Iscariot. Ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba zzɔɔppabaffa.
Ɔzzánga ufeele umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakat a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ule ɔnaang ɔkaa Jesus ufeebɛ.
Baggele gaang gaang; bayilamɛ kinnyi ikkpoko.
Judas uyila kwa balɔɔknɛ, ɔggyan kufuk kwa bbwak, kwa ule ɔfɛɛt Jesus ufeebɛ bakaa, balɔɔt basi lɛsan.
Kɛtɔm a Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kissolonɛ sa bale ka bawwɔɔlnɛ waan-itɔɔn banaang kazzi,
Jesus ɔtɔɔm Peter la John ɔttɛ, “Amii anaangyɔng Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, alokoyɔng; iffu izziyɔng.”
Babapmɛ battɛ, “Aggyan attɛ ibamakwɛ iloko yang?”
Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Ka ale ka amiinɛyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala vvenɛ adudayɔng ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔtɔkɔnɛ bilim a bannyi. Akupmɛyɔng ka ssala duu sa ule umii.
Alɔɔkyɔng la uyini a ssala ’wɔng baang attɛyɔng, ‘Ukopolo-lukopolo ɔttɛnɛ, Lɛnɔk za balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam la anaam biini ile itaa izzi Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ lile?’
Vvenɛ ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng lɛnɔk za doddo ka libat ɛnyɔng, ɛfɛɛn ale abamayɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ alokoyɔng.”
Bafeelenɛ bamii, bayɛn bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ulenɛbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ. Babama Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ baloko baang.
Ɛkalangka ’yɔng baang ɛffɔnɛ, Jesus umii ɔtaa ka okkpokolo la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbumbong gaang gaang nttɛ nzzi Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ’kwɔng la annyɔɔng bong tɛ́ttɛ́ nyɛn akama!
Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Kwɛ ba nbɛlɛ lizzi tɔttɔt bannyikwɛ ifɛɛt akkwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔsam ommonggo, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔttɛ, “Atɔk batak ’bɔng, abɛngɛlɛwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, batak ’bɔng ba nbɛlɛ lɛvva, ka ussinɛ mung tɔttɔt umii ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile iffu.”
Ɔzzánga ɔsam brɛɛd uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔtɔkmɛ ɔbbɔk ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam [ya nnyiwɔnɛyɔng, anaangyɔng ning mung akkenɛyɔng.”
Uvvenɛ kazzi, ɔbbalbɛ ommonggo lɛsam ning baang unnyi, ɔttɛ, “Ommonggo ’wɔng ulenɛ ufaa kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, sa linnyi anaam sa lissinɛ libɛtɛnɛ linnyiwɔyɔng.]
“Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ issɛ anaam ule mung ka okkpokkolo la anaam.
Ɔzzànga Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ubbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ litini uloko. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa uzzinɛnɛ issɛ, vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama ɔttala.”
Babapbɛ abbabbɛ biini kɛyɔɔng battɛ nnyinɛ ulenɛ baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ, wa ule ka ɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwɛ baang?
Bɛkangala bɛttɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus abbabbɛ batum ɔlɔɔt wa balɔɔt battinanɛ battɛ ammɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Babeet ba ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung bayanga lakke babɛtɛ balɔɔt abbɛ. Bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi bakkwɔɔbɛ kɛyɔɔng ‘Inngwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.’
Ɔzzànga ning ba kule la annyɔɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan wa utiti. Uzzilɛttɔ usseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔɔyi.

Mung nnyinɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge: ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ lɔtaa, uzzi kazzi, faa ɔlɔɔt wa unnyimɛnɛ kazzi? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ lɔtaa uzzi kazzi ɔttanɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzànga anaam nle ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛ kazzi.
“Ataayɔngbong mung la anaam tɔttɔt illɛ ya ballɛnɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ isaal.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Dedde unnyinɛnɛ anaam lakke za kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn, anaam vvenɛ nssɛ nnaang ning baang la annyɔɔng.
Vvenɛ ataayɔng ka okkpokolo anaam azziyɔng kazzi, avvayɔng batak ka Itutum anaam. Vvenɛ ataayɔng ka igbaal a kibeet akaalyɔng kɛkaal ifɔɔn a Israel zzɔɔppiffa.”
“Simon, Simon! Gɔpɔlɔ! Satan ɔtɔkbong lakke za ule ka uffunɛ ɔllɛwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwoop-a-bɔtɔɔm uggwulnɛ bippwo ɔllɔt ussekemɛ ifɔɔk.
Simon! ɔzzànga anaam nssɛɛnbong luzɔɔm nnyiwɔ, kiyila annɔ sa ayanganɛ, baala kittun. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ale abbal lisikili appyɛɛknɛ vvenɛ anaang ikpana annɔ iyanga lakke.”
Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbamabong kimii a ngbakkɔpɔ la annɔ, gɔɔ mkpa ule lubbe vvenɛ nssɛ la annɔ nbbe.”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ, balangkɔkɔ baala bakɔɔl ka kɛtɔm-a-mmwɔɔn tɛ́ttɛ́ akala bikkpit bɛkkyaat attɛ nɛ ba asan.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ka ntɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng ibɔɔk ibɔɔk asiyɔng waanɛssɔ, la ɛssɔ ya lɛbaang, la ikkpa-bukkpɔ lɛkɔɔm, ’bɔng budɔkɔnɛ bubbyawɔyɔng?” Abbɛ bappyɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Bulɔk busiyɛlɛ lɛbbya.”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ waanɛssɔ, ɔlɔk ɔyanga ɛssɔ ya lɛbaang, ɔsamyɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ ogge ɔtaan uwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ɔlɛɛp ogge.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔdɔkɔ baang la bazzɔɔk-a-lilɔɔk’ vvenɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn kutumnɛ. Kwa bakkpɔknɛ batumnɛ kule ka kɔnaangnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔɔk battɛ, “Uyini ppyɛɛk! Yɛn igge iffa mung tɛ.” Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iyɔng baang iyyɛɛpbong.”
Jesus ɔgbata ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, umii ka lɛttaal Olives tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔmɛlɔm. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bakupmɛ.
Baffɔnɛ bakang, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Azɔɔmyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu attɔyɔng ka bubbi.”
Ɔgbata umii ubee fulufulu ukun laddu ɔzɔɔm.
Ɔttɛ, “Dedde, kɔsaapwɔnɛ, asam ommonggo akama ’wɔng, assekenɛ. Ɔzzànga kwa anaam lissi, kussi ka luttina annɔ biini.”
[Uyilabɔtɔɔm ussi ka libat uffu ɔgbaamɛ lakke,
la akama wa lɛbaang ka kkwɔɔt. Ɔzɔɔm kɔbɛtɛmɛ gaang gaang. Layungu ammɛ lattep lallɔt ka lisse tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linnyi.]
Uvvenɛ luzɔɔm, ufeele umii ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ. Ɔyɛnbɛ ka bilaa, baggwɔɔtbong ka kkwɔɔt ɔssanga akama.
Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ alaayɔng? Afeele assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm tɛ́ttɛ́ affu attɔyɔng ka bubbi.”
Jesus ɔdɔkɔ utii ka kɛlɔɔk ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kibbi ’sɔng baang kiffunɛ. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba zzɔɔppabaffa wa ɔzzanganɛ Judas, ɔkɔɔmnɛbɛ ɛtɔk ɔsak ssɔng umii Jesus kigbugba.
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Judas, mung ale akɔɔm kigbugba, azzi issɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔɔ?”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba badɔkɔnɛ baang, la ammɛ, bayɛnnɛ kwa kule ka kɔnaangnɛ, balɔɔk battɛ, “Uyini, isanga igge ayyɔɔt ka kiffɔ ɔɔ?”
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔkkwɛ kɔtɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk kwa ubili Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm-wa-lɛbaang ɔzza.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kuddubong!” Umii ɔsam kɔtɔɔk, ɔppyɛlɛ unengemɛ.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm, la bakat a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya ba baffumɛnɛ kɛkaa, ɔttɛ, “Mung affunɛyɔng kɛkaa la igge la ikkpong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔzzɔɔk-a-kɔlɔɔk ɔɔ?
Ndɔkɔ baang la annyɔɔng kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, gɔɔ nɛyɔng ba akaa. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng mung elebong ya annyɔɔng ka lakke kisul!”
Bakaa Jesus, basammɛ bamii ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm-wa-lɛbaang. Peter ɔssɛ fulufulu ukupmɛ ka isimi.
Lɔkɔɔn lɔdɔkɔ baang ka badodonɛ ka kɛsan a ssala ka lufoom ugala. Peter ɔssɛ umii ɔtaa baang la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang uwupa lɔkɔɔn.
Ubili vvɔn, waanawanavva, ɔyɛnnɛ Peter ka ɔtaanɛ baang ka lufoom a lɔkɔɔn, uyeek ɔppyɛɛkmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔdɔkɔ baang la ammɛ.”
Peter ɔkala ɔttɛ, “Wanavva, anaam mɛba nsan tɛ.”
Waan a ɛkɛtɛ ssup ɔsaknɛ, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔkɔɔlɔ Peter, ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔkmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ assɛ adɔkɔ baang la ammɛ ɔgbaa.” Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Walam, anaam baang nsi lile la ammɛ tɛ.”
Ɛkalangka nnyɔn ɛbbalnɛ lɛsak, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ikangala ilɔk ba ile, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ baang la ammɛ, ammɛ ɔssɛ ule wa Galilee.”
Peter ɔppyɛlɛma kamma ɔttɛ, “Walam, ba nsan bwa alɔɔknɛ atum!” Utii ka kɛlɔɔk, eseese balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl.
Uyini usikili ɔppyɛɛk Peter zzip. Ɔzzánga Peter ukke lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini ɔttɛnɛ, “Tɛ́ttɛ́ balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl mmwɔɔn mung, vvenɛ akalanɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat.”
Peter ɔtta, ubee ka vveeng ɔkkwa kɔssɔpmɛ.
Balɔɔt ba bakatnɛ Jesus banyɔɔkamɛ, bakɔɔm batupmɛ.
Baggbɔmɛ ubba ka lusso, babapmɛ battɛ, “Nnyinɛ utupwɔnɛ? Attina!”
Balɔɔk bɛfɛɛn a izzit ggbadam batummɛ.
Ussolonɛ, bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ, baduda ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn. Bakɔɔm Jesus uffu ubee baang ka lusso ikkansulu abbɛ.
Babapmɛ battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ?” Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng mung kwa anaam, baala ayilayɔng!
Ɔzzànga nbapwɔnɛyɔng lɔbap, nɛyɔng baala ɔppyɛlɛyɔng!
Ka ussinɛ gedegede mung, Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ebinukkpaapi.”
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Oo attɛ annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ?” Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Alɔɔkyɔngbong attɛyɔng, anaam nlenɛ.”
Abbɛ balɔɔk battɛ, “Itɛɛsɛ ilɔk ba ibɛlɛ lɛggyan tɛ, ayyɔɔt biini ippyeebong lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ!”
Kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bafeele basam Jesus bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Pilate.
Babilimɛ lilɔɔk ggbadam battɛ, “Ikaa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ka ɔfɛɛtnɛ balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bakkpɛɛ innamba, bannyi Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome. Ɔgbaa ɔttɛ ammɛ Christ, ubeet.”
Pilate ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung annɔ alenɛ ubeet a Jews ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alɔɔknɛ ning.”
Pilate ɔlɔɔk la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Lɛttɔ za kɛzza kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung nttɛ ubbe, ba nyɛn.”
Balɔɔt balɔɔk kɔssɔpbɛ battɛ, “Uttebong kɛzzɔɔk a lɔnyaata la lukopolo ammɛ ukkpit Judea. Ɔdɔkɔ utte ka Galilee mung uffubong kaang.”
Pilate uppyeenɛ ning ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung ɔlɔɔt wa Galilee ɔɔ?”
Uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ussi ka ɛkpansi ya Herod ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ, ɔtɔɔmmɛ ufee Herod ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka Jerusalem ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.
Herod uggele gaang gaang ka ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus, ka ulenɛ kuttu ammɛ lippyee, ɔgbaa ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔyɛnmɛ. Utele zzeen ɔttɛ nzang ɔyɛn Jesus ka kɛnaang a bɛmaanga.
Herod ɔbap Jesus ibap ggbadam, Jesus usi lɛmmwɔɔl lɛzza.
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ battɔm bakkɛtɛ Jesus, babilimɛ lilɔɔk sa likkaamnɛ lɔkkaam.
Herod la isɔgya ammɛ banyɔɔka Jesus, banaangmɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit. Bassɛɛnmɛ oyyoyyo ewuulu batɔɔmmɛ bappyɛlɛ bafee Pilate.
Ussi ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang Herod la Pilate bassɛ ɛnngwa. Kisimi ka isimi badɔkɔ ka kɔwɔlɔ.
Pilate ɔkkwɔɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bazzilɛttɔ-ɛkpansi la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
Ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔmyɔngbong ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung affu attɛyɔng, ɔfɛɛtbong balɔɔt. Mung nbapmɛbong ka lusso annyɔɔng, kɔlɔk kwa kɔbbɔlmɛnɛ kkwɔn gbɔɔ ba kɔtaka kule ka lilɔɔk sa akaamɛnɛyɔng.
Gɔɔ Herod kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ usi lɛyɛn tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔtɔɔmmɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ufeeyɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung bulɔk ba ɔtaka ɔnaang bwa bubbɔlnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ vvenɛ ubbe ka akkwɛ.
Vvenɛ nsammɛ nnyibɛ, batupmɛ gbɔɔ nkkyaamɛ bafɔngɔ.”
[Lutini Kazzi-Kɛsak-kɛkɔngɔ la kkwɔn, Pilate ɔkkyaa ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka igbakkɔpɔ ɔfɔngɔ.]
Ɔzzánga kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ babungu battɛ, “Awwɔɔlmɛ! Asanga Barabbas annyiyɛlɛ.
(Barabbas ɔdɔkɔ ka mgbakkɔppɔ ka ɔwwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ka kullu kwa ballunɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala.)
Pilate ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan kɛsanga Jesus, ɔzzánga ɔbbal kibbi lɛkkwɔɔ, ɔbap.
Babbal libungu battɛ, “Nsɔɔngyɔng la ammɛ ka cross! Nsɔɔngyɔng la ammɛ ka Cross!”

Pilate ɔbbalbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔk ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat ɔttɛ, “Mung ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔdɔkɔ ule nang lɛnaang kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ? Ba nyɛn kwa ɔnaangnɛ kɔbbɔl ule wa kɛwwɔɔl. Vvenɛ nlɔɔkbɛ batupmɛ, bakkyaamɛ, bafɔngɔ.”
Ning ka bakamanɛ lɔkama babungu bagaga battɛ bakama Jesus ka Cross.
Ɔzzánga Pilate ɔttɛ basam Jesus, bamii bawwɔɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ baggyannɛ.
Ɔsanga ɔlɔɔt wa baggyannɛ battɛ ɔsangamɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ. ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa bassɛɛnmɛnɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ, ka ullunɛ kullu ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ɔgbaa. Ɔsam Jesus unnyibɛ banaangmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ.
Basam Jesus bagbata. Baffɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk baduda ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon wa Cyrene wa ussinɛ killu a vveeng ule ka uffunɛ tɔkɔlɔ a ssala. Bakaamɛ basam Cross bafeekmɛ, ɔtɔkɔ ukup Jesus ka lɔnnyɔ.
Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam bakupmɛ. Bwanavva balɔk badɔkɔ baang ba bakupnɛ Jesus la kullu la kullu. Bakkwa battɔl layilili.
Jesus usikili ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bwanavva Jerusalem, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkwayɔng kwa anaam. Akkwayɔng kwa annyɔɔng biini la bwaan annyɔɔng.
Bɛtɔm bile ka biffunɛ bya balɔɔt bale balɔɔk battɛ, ‘Bwanavva ba batakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛmaat, bataka bwɔɔn lɛkɔɔm bappyɛɛpbong lɔfɔm basak!’
Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang elenɛ ya balɔɔt bale balɔɔk la ikpok battɛ, ‘Ikpok attɔ abɛtɛyɔngyɛlɛ’ Babbal lɛttɛ ‘Lattaal alupyɔngyɛlɛ.’
Bɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbyɛ baang bɛnaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kɛssɛ kɛppwɔtnɛ, kule kɔtaa nang ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kile kibbe?’ ”
Basam balɔɔt baffa bagbaa. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bazzɔɔk-a-lilɔɔk baffa ba bale ka batoolonɛbɛ la Jesus bawwɔɔl.
Baffɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ya bakkwɔɔnɛ “Ukɔɔk-a-lɛttɔ”, bakama Jesus baang ka Cross. Bakama balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa babɛtɛ la Jesus, vvɔn ka kɔbɔɔk a ɛlaabɔɔk wakang ka kɔbɔɔk a ɛbyaakɛm.
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Atɔk asɔɔkbɛ Dedde, ba basan kwa banaangnɛ.” Bakɔɔm iwɔkɔlɔ a Jesus batta illɔ basam babɛngɛlɛ abbabbɛ.

Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang bagbep lɛppyɛɛk ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bazzilɛttɔ-ɛkpansi a Jews banyɔɔkanɛ Jesus. Balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Ɔkkala balɔɔt balɔk, ɔkkalamɛ kɛyɔɔng bɛɛ, ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.”
Isɔgya mgbaa banyɔɔka Jesus, bakɔɔm batak baffu bawɔkɔmɛ
Battɛ “Akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng, attɛnɛ annɔ ubeet a Jews.”
Bakkpɔk lammwɔɔl ’zɔng ka libat a Cross battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Ubeet a Jews.”
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔzzɔɔk kɔlɔɔk wa bakamamɛnɛ bakkɛtɛ Jesus ɔssɛ ɔnyɔɔkamɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ lissi alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ? Akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng agbaa la ayyɔɔt bɛɛ!”
Ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn ɔwɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ba ɔbbwɔpɔ ɔɔ? Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt mung izziyɔng kibbi ssɔn.
Kibbi sa ayyɔɔt kile bbwak ka ilenɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛzzɔɔk ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ammɛ bulɔk bwa bubbɔlnɛ ba ɔtaka ɔnaang.”
Ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Jesus, akkenɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ale affu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ubeet!”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ: Ka ussinɛ mmwɔɔn vvenɛ ataa la anaam ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn a laggele.”
Ɔdɔkɔ ikalangaka zzɔɔppiffa ka livve-luwee lizumnɛ, kisul kivvoong ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka ikalangka ikkyaat.
Ubba wa battanɛ ka ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaak bɛfaak bɛffa.
Jesus ɔfaka lɛmmwɔɔl a kullu ɔttɛ, “Dedde, nsambong kuyeeng anaam nssɛɛnwɔ ka eddu!” Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang uvve ubbe eseese.
Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt isɔgya ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔlɔɔt wa doddo!”
Balɔɔt ba babeenɛ baang, bagbep lɛppyɛɛk bayɛnnɛ kwa kulenɛ lɛnaang; batup labɔɔk ka ikwukwulu bagbata bafula.
Balɔɔt ba balenɛ Jesus kpelegedee lɛsan, ɔbɛtɛ la bwanavva ba badɔkɔnɛ bakupmɛ ka ussinɛ Galilee babee fulufulu bappyɛɛk battɛ bayɛn kwa kɔnaangnɛ.

Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Joseph wa ussinɛ Judea ka lɛffɛ balɔɔt a Jews za lɛzzanganɛ Arimathea. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a latele wa doddo wa ɔkatnɛ kiffu Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ule ka kɛkaan ikkansulu ɔgbaa. Ammɛ usi liyila kwa balɔɔknɛ la kwa banaangnɛ.
Ufeele umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Pilate, ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔmɛ ɔsam Jesus, umii ulli. Pilate uyila.
Ammɛ umii, usini ubbu ka libat. Ɔsammɛ, ɔgbbɔ ka balata ibba. Ɔsammɛ umii ɔssɛɛn ka lilli za batɔɔknɛ ka lɛttaal. Ubbu baang ba bataka balli ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.
Ɔdɔkɔ kɛtɔm-a-Friday ka ule ka ussolonɛ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
Bwanavva ba bakupnɛ Jesus ka ussinɛ Galilee, bakkuma la Joseph bamii bayɛn lilli, bayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bawulunɛ Jesus ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli ɔgbaa.
Bappyɛlɛ isimisimi, bamii balɔngɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn la kɛssɛ sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom bya bale bappwɔɔngmɛ. Bafɛkɛlɛ ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ.
Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a livve luzɔɔm, bwanavva ’bɔng baang basam kɛssɛ sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom sa balenɛ lɛnaang ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔɔm bamii ka lilli.
Baffɔnɛ bakang, bayɛn lɛttaal ka lilenɛ liwongolo lisseke kamma lilli.
Bamal ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli ubbu a kwɔɔt a Jesus, Uyini, ba bayɛn.
Babee baang battina, eseese bayɛn balɔɔt baffa baang ka babeenɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ la balata iwɔkɔlɔ ya ilaatnɛ inyanya.
Bwanavva ’bɔng baang ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, balli lattɔ ka lisse, ka balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balenɛbɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ aggyanyɔng ukokolo ɔlɔɔt ka ɛfɛɛn a babbu?
Mung ba ule, ufungalabong, ɔtta ka lilli. Akkeyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ la annyɔɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya alenɛyɔng ka Galilee ɔttɛ,
‘Vvenɛ basam Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, bannyi banaang-a-bubbi, bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka Cross. Vvenɛ ufungala ka bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat.’ ”
Bwanavva ’bɔng baang bakke lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang.
Bagbata ka lilli, bafula, bamii babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus ba zzɔɔppavvɔn la balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Bwanavva ’bɔng baang bazzanga Mary Magdalene la Joanna la Mary, abakka James. Abbɛ la bwanavva balɔk babwɔɔlɔnɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ’bɔng baang badɔkɔ battina battɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ sa babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ bakkala lalaak. Basibɛ kwɛ liyila.
Peter kpakpalap ufeele umii ka lilli. Umiinɛ, uvvoop ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli kɛyɔɔng. Ɔyɛn balata ibba ya baggbɔmɛnɛ keem. Bɔfɛɛn bulɔk usi lɛyɛn. Ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ; ufeele ufula.
Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ssɔn, abbɛ balɔɔt baffa badɔkɔ ka kimii ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Emmaus, ɔggyan kɛffɔ immaal innamikkyaat ka ussinɛ Jerusalem.
Badɔkɔ ka kutolo abbabbɛ batum lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛ.
Bale baang ka balɔɔknɛ, Jesus ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛbɛ, bakkuma.
Bayɛnmɛ ka bakkumanɛ la abbɛ ɔzzànga basimɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung alɔɔkyɔng ’bɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng, appyɛlɛyɔng isimisimi, amiiyɔng lusso-lusso ka akkumanɛyɔng mung?” Bakɔɔng baang zzuum babee, livve lɛbbɔlbɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Cleopas ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ kɛyɔɔng alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ullunɛ ka Jerusalem wa usinɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ iyaadɛ lɛsan ɔɔ?”

Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔka akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛ Jesus wa Nazareth. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛnɛ uggbenge ɔgbaa la lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma la linaang.
Mung baggboggbo-balɔɔt ayyɔɔt la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bakaamɛbong, bazza kɛkaal, battɛ ubbe. Basammɛbong bakama bɛfɔl bakaka ka Cross.
Idɔkɔ ittina ittɛ nzang ammɛ ule ɔkkala Israel! Kwa kɔnaangnɛ kɔgbaa, mmwɔɔn ɔnaangnɛ ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.
Bwanavva balɔk ba balenɛ ka kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk kɔkɛɛlɛyɛlɛ ka bafeelenɛ bamii ka lilli.
Basi kkwɔɔt ammɛ lɛyɛn. Bappyɛlɛ isimisimi baffu babwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ battɛ bayɛnbong bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ battɛ ufungalabong ka lubbe.
Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt balɔk bafeele bamii bayɛn lilli. Kɔdɔkɔ ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwanavva ’bɔng baang babwɔɔlɔnɛ; basimɛ lɛyɛn.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng azizinginɛyɔng ning. Mbɔng akkpɛlɛnɛyɔng kippyee kɔlɔɔk kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔɔknɛ ning?
Bbwak kusi lile ka Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔyɛnnɛ akama lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ umii ka kibeet ammɛ ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔyaala lilɔɔk sa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lutummɛ, ka ussinɛ ka livva Moses, la likkpɔk a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Baffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ lɛffɛ za balenɛ ka kimii, Jesus ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ utiinɛ ka kimii lusso-lusso.
Balɔɔt ba bakkumanɛ, batunumɛ battɛ, “Akkunu la ayyɔɔt, ule ka usulnɛ.” Ɔzzánga ufeele umii ukkunu la abbɛ.
Ɔtaa ka okkpokolo kazzi, ɔsam brɛɛd, ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔlɔmmɛ ɔbbɔk, unnyibɛ.
Ɔzzánga ɔnaangbɛ gbool baggɔggɔ bakɔɔlɔmɛ. Ammɛ ɔkkyaap, ɔkɔngɔbɛ.
Balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Nttɛ mung ippyam idɔkɔ iggwoomyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bunɔk la ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔlɔɔknɛ la ayyɔɔt ka ɛtɔk, utum kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ?”
Bafeele eseese bappyɛlɛ bamii Jerusalem. Bamiinɛ bayɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus ba zzɔɔppavvɔn ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ka bataanɛ la balɔɔt balɔk.
Babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang battɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn Uyini ufungalabong. Simon ɔyɛnmɛbong!”
Balɔɔt ba baffa babwɔɔlɔbɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛbɛ ka ɛtɔk tɛ́ttɛ́ bakɔɔlɔ Uyini ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔbbɔknɛ brɛɛd ɔbɛngɛlɛbɛ.
Bale baang ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, eseese Uyini biini utuma baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annyɔɔng.”
Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ battɛ bayɛnbong ubbu.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng bɔng? Mbɔng bɛkangala mbyɔng biffuwɔnɛyɔng ka ittina?
Ppyɛɛknɛyɔng ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ, asan attɛyɔng anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Asinginɛyɔng, asan attɛyɔng anaam. Ubbu ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt la bɛkɔp ba ɔyanga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɛnnɛyɔng anaam ka nyanganɛ.”
Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang ɔyɔɔbɛ labɔɔk la bukkpɔ.
Gɔɔ basi liyila tɔttɔt badɔkɔ basseke ka laggele ka kɔnaangnɛbɛ bikɛɛlɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ayangayɔng mung bwakuzzi mung ɔɔ?”
Abbɛ bannyimɛ waan a likkpɔ ɛsɛɛnabannyi ya balenɛ lɛyap.
Ɔtɔk waan a likkpɔ ɛsɛɛnabannyi ’wɔng baang; uzzi ka lusso abbɛ.

Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ lilɔɔk sa mbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ndɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng. Lutini lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa bakkpɔknɛ batumnɛ ka Lafɔɔ a Moses la likkpɔk a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Psalms linaangbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
Ɔzzánga uwongolobɛ ippyam basan Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa bakkpɔknɛ battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama, bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe.
Ɔzzànga bɔtɔɔm bwa butumnɛ kɛkkyaa bubbi kɛfɔngɔ la kɛsɔɔk a bubbi vvenɛ bule la kikopolo kikkpit ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.
Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ittɛɛsɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Anaam biini vvenɛ ntɔɔmwɔyɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa Dedde anaam ulenɛ lɛttɛ vvenɛ ntɔɔm nfeewɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga ataayɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, ning ning lakke lassi ka libat laffu lakupwɔyɔng kuttɔɔk.”
Ɔtɔɔbɛ, ɔtta ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala tɔttɔt umii ɔffɔ Bethany ka ɛfɛɛn a uyeeknɛ labɔɔk ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ.
Ule baang ka kɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ umii ka libat.
Bazɔɔm bannyimɛ, bappyɛlɛ isimisimi, bamii Jerusalem la laggele la laggele.
Bataa baang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, bazɔnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛggba lissi lile ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛdɔkɔ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, azzɛ lilenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛdɔkɔ baang la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ussinɛ ka lutte.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmzɛ azzɛ ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɔfɛɛn bulɔk ka vveengodde ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bule bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛkɔɔm ɔnaangbwɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang biini linnyinɛ kuddu. Kuddu kwa linnyinɛ kɔkɔɔmnɛ buppwolo kufee ɔssɛbitbit.
Buppwolo ’bwɔng baang buppwolo ka kisul, ɔzzànga kisul ba kɛtaka kizumbwɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔm uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ wa ɔzzanganɛ John
uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt kɔlɔɔk a buppwolo ’bwɔng baang ɔkkɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bappyee bayila.
John biini lissi ulenɛ buppwolo ’bwɔng baang, uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt kɔlɔɔk a buppwolo.
Uwɔng ɔdɔkɔnɛ buppwolo biini bwa buffunɛ ka ɛkpansi buppwolo bullɔt ɔssɛbitbit ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛdɔkɔ mung ka ɛkpansi. Uvve Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmzɛ azzɛ ɔnaang ɛkpansi ɔzzànga ɛkpansi esizɛ lɛsan.
Liffu ka lɔkaan azzɛ biini, balɔɔt a lɔkaan azzɛ bafimzɛ.
Balɔɔt a lɔkaan azzɛ balɔk batɔkzɛ linnyibɛ lakke za bassekenɛ bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basi lɛzzanga ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔmaatnɛbɛ, bale bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ulenɛ Abassɛ abbɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lisikili ɔlɔɔt ɔtaa la ayyɔɔt ɔyanga kɛsaap la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka tɔkɔlɔ lɔttala. Iyɛn latele za ɔtɔknɛ ka Abassɛ ka ulenɛ Waan Abassɛ kkeem.

John ɔlɔɔk utummɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ ɔyaam ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ka nttɛnɛ, ‘Ammɛ ule ka uffunɛ ukupnɛ anaam ɔzzànga ammɛ ɔttanɛnɛ anaam ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang ka vveeng ’wɔng mung tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatnɛ anaam.’ ”
Kɛsaap sa ɔyanganɛ ka kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ɔnaangbongyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ ɔbbal lɛnaang.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔtɔɔm Moses Lafɔɔ ufee ɔssɛbitbit, ɔzzànga kɛsaap la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɔtɔɔm Jesus Christ ufee ɔssɛbitbit.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛyɛn ba ule. Awaan wa ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Abassɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ulemɛnɛ lɛyɛn uleyɛlɛ lilɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ, ɔdɛm isanmɛ.
Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews ka Jerusalem batɔɔm bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la balɔɔt a Levi battɛ bamii babap John battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ nnyinɔɔng?”
John usi lifim kɛppyɛlɛbɛ kamma. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ppwool ɔttɛ, “Anaam lissi nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.”
Keem battɛ, “Ngkka annɔ alenɛ nnyinɛ? Annɔ alenɛ Elijah ɔɔ?” John ɔttɛ, “Anaam lissi.” Babal John lɛbap battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aawɔng ɔɔ?” John ɔttɛ, “Maaye.”
Abbɛ battɛ, “Ngkka abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ bwa alenɛ bɛɛ. Iggyan ittɛ ikɔɔm kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ imii ibwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ba batɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ. Alɔɔk nang atumwɔ kɛyɔɔng?”
John ɔkɔɔm kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔlɔɔknɛ, ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ: “ ‘Anaam nlenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt za libungunɛ ka kɛmat: Anaangyɔng ɛtɔk bbit alokoyɔng Uyini,ɔssɛ!’ ”
Balɔɔt ba balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Pharisees batɔɔmnɛ
babap John battɛ, “Asinɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ lile, asi Elijah lile, asi uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aawɔng lile, bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ anaang balɔɔt baptizim?”
John ɔttɛ, “Anaam nkɔɔm bannyi nnaang baptizim. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa asimɛnɛyɔng lɛsan ulewɔyɔng baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ ka ubeenɛ.
Ule ka isimi ka ule ka uffunɛ. Gɔɔ anaam ba nkkɔnɔ kɛkkyaa ikkpabukkpɔ ammɛ ggbɔɔ mung.”
Nkwɔng mung kɔnaang ka Bethany ka kufoom a lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan kwa kɔppyɛɛknɛ livveluwee lɔfɔm, ka ɛfɛɛn a John ulenɛ ka kɛnaang a balɔɔt baptizim.
Ɔffɔnɛ libessolo, John ɔyɛn Jesus ka ulenɛ ka kimii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔttɛ, “Yɛnyɔng Waanɛtɔɔn-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtɔknɛ bubbi a vveengodde uzzenge!
Uwɔng ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nlɔɔknɛ ntum ka nttɛnɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ule ka isimi ka ule ka uffunɛ, ammɛ ɔttanɛnɛ anaam ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang ka vveeng ’wɔng mung tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatnɛ anaam.’
Ndɔkɔ nsi lɛsan ɔlɔɔt wa ule ule. Ɔzzànga anaam nffu nnaang balɔɔt baptizim la bannyi ɔkkɔɔnɛ balɔɔt a Israel basanmɛ.”
John ɔbwɔɔlɔ bwa ɔsannɛ: “Nyɛn Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kussinɛ ka libat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lekkpelekete kuffu kuttelemɛ ka kkwɔɔt.

Gɔɔ tɔttɔt nsi lɛsan nttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt aawɛ. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang baptizim la bannyi ɔggbanɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ ayɛn Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kule kussi ka libat kuffu kuttele ɔlɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule ule ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔkɔɔm Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang balɔɔt baptizim.’
Nyɛnbongkwɛ. Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔffɔnɛ libessolo, John ɔbbal baang lile la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa ka ubeenɛ.
Ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus ɔttɛ, “Yɛnyɔng Waanɛtɔɔn-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakang!”
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John ’bɔng baang baffa bappyee kwa John ɔlɔɔknɛ bamii bakup Jesus.
Jesus usikili ɔyɛnbɛ ka bakupmɛnɛ, ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyanyɔng ’bɔng?” Abbɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, allu yang?”
Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Affu ayɛnyɔng ɛfɛɛn a nllunɛ.” (Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ikalangka inna kulele.) Ɔzzánga bukupmɛ bamii bayɛn ɛfɛɛn a ullunɛ. Baddongo baang la ammɛ usul.
Andrew, etele a Simon Peter, ɔdɔkɔ baang.
Eseese ɔyɛn etele ammɛ Simon. Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Iyɛnbong Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ aawɛ.” (Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ulenɛ Christ.)
Ɔzzánga ufeele la Simon ufee Jesus. Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛk Simon ɔttɛ, “Azzanga Simon, waan a John, ɔzzànga bale bappyɛɛ bakkwɔɔwɔ Cephas” (Lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng lɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Peter. Ifɛɛt azzɛ ilenɛ “Akpana”)
Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, Jesus ɔnaang luttina kimii Galilee. Ɔyɛnnɛ Philip, ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛ imii!” (
Philip ussi Bethsaida ka ɛfɛɛn a Andrew la Peter ballunɛ.)

Philip ɔyɛnnɛ Nathanael, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Iyɛnbong ɔlɔɔt aawɛ wa Moses ɔkkpɔknɛ utummɛ ka luvva Lafɔɔ, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa bassɛ bakpɔk batummɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ Jesus, waan a Joseph, wa Nazareth.”
Nathanael ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ bulɔk bule baang bwa bussinɛ Nazareth ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ Nathanael ka umiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ wa Israel bbwak, ɔyyɛɛpbong ɔffata!”
Nathanael ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Anaang nang asannɛ?” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ndɔkɔ nyɛnwɔ ka alenɛ ka lɛsan a kɛssɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ Philip ɔkkwɔɔwɔ.”
Nathanael ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Annɔ alenɛ Ubeet a Israel!”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ayila ka nlewɔnɛ lɛffɔ nbwɔɔlɔ nttɛ nyɛnwɔ ka adɔkɔnɛ ka lɛsan a kɛssɛ ɔɔ? Vvenɛ ayɛn lilɔɔk sa littanɛ ’kwɔng!”

Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng libat ka liwongolonɛ, la bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bamiinɛ ka libat, basini kuttɔɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Bɛtɔm bɛffa bɛsaknɛ, libbeel lissolo ka Cana ka Galilee. Abakka a Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka libbeel.
Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ badɔkɔ baang ka babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ libbeel.
Batak basɛlɛnɛ ka libbeel, abakka Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Batak basaalbongbɛ tɛ.” Jesus ɔttɛ,
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ addanɛ kwa nle nnaang, ɛkɛtɛ nɛ ba ɛtaka ɛffɔ.”
Abakka Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ ibɔɔyi libbeel ’zɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Anaangyɔng duu kwa ɔttɛnɛ anaangyɔng.”
Balɔɔt a Jews bayanga eleme luzɔɔm ya kiyila bikkeep a kkwɔɔt, kwakkwɛ bulim bwɔlaaning bwa banaangbwɛ la lɛttaal budɔkɔnɛ baang. Bilim la ppyɔn bitɔk ɔlɔp la iggalɔn kubbwɔɔk.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ibɔɔyi ’yɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ayipiyɔng bulim mbwɔng mung la bannyi.” Abbɛ bayipi bulim mbwɔng baang la bannyi batteme.
Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Akapyɔng bannyi baang amii annyiyɔng ɔkɔɔm-a-libbeel.” Abbɛ bakapbɛ bafeemɛ.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bannyi ’bɔng baang basikilibong batak. Ammɛ, ɔkɔɔm-a-libbeel, ɔllɛbɛ. Usi lɛsan ka ɛfɛɛn a batak ’bɔng baang bassinɛ baffu. (Ibɔɔyi ’yɔng baang ya bakapnɛ bannyi bafeemɛ keem basannɛ.) Ɔzzánga ɔkkwɔɔ ɔtɔk-a-wanavva

ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk unnyi batak ba doddo ka libbeel, balɔɔt balenɛ lɛvva bawukala, tɛ́ttɛ́ unnyi batak ba basinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɔzzànga mung annɔ alokobong batak ba bayyɛɛpnɛ baffɔ ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng!”
Uwɔng ulenɛ bɛmaanga ikeeng bya Jesus ɔnaangnɛ ka Cana. Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a ɔyɔɔnɛ lakke ammɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bayila kwa ammɛ.
Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Jesus la abakka la itele ammɛ la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bafeele bamii Capernaum bakkwunu bɛtɔm ssup.
Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ɛkkɛtɛbong, ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele umii Jerusalem.
Ɔmalnɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔyɛn balɔɔt ka kɛtaan a igɔdɔ la itɔɔn la idugbɔnnyɛ. Bafoolo-ikkpoko badɔkɔ baang ka bataanɛ ka ikkpokkolo abbɛ.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɔng bizzi ɔmmwɔɔl ɔkɔɔm ɔggba itɔɔn ’yɔng baang la igɔdɔ itta ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Usikili ikkpokkolo bafoolo-ikkpoko ugupu, ɔkyakyamabɛ ikkobo.
Ɔkkpa balɔɔt ba bataanɛ idugbɔnnyɛ kiwele ɔttɛ, “Samyɔngyɛ attayɔng mung! Ukpekewɔyɔng kɛsam a Ggwoon a Dedde kɛnaang ggwoon-a-kappya!”
Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ bakke kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛnɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɛsaap sa ggwoon annɔ lɔsaapnɛnɛ kikutnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn.”
Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma la lɔbap battɛ, “Ale anaang bɔka imaanga usseke isan ittɛ ayanga lakke za kɛnaang a ’kwɔng?”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapwɔnɛyɔng, atutyɔng Ggwoon ’gwɔng mung azzɔɔkyɔng ɔzzànga vvenɛ nppyɛlɛgwɛ nbɔɔk lɔsaal ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.”
Abbɛ battɛ, “Vvenɛ appyɛlɛ abɔɔkgwɛ lɔsaal ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat ɔɔ? Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung lɔtɔkbong lalɔp a likkpa laffa la likkpa bwɔlaaning tɛ́ttɛ́ lɔsaal!”
Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa Jesus ɔkkwɔɔnɛ, ɔkkwɔɔ kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
Ɔzzánga ɔffɔnɛ ka Jesus ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bakke battɛ Jesus ɔdɔkɔbong ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kkpal. Bayila kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ ɔbɛtɛ la kwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Ka Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka Jerusalem ka ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, balɔɔt ppwap bayila kwa ammɛ ka bayɛnnɛ imaanga ya ɔnaangnɛ.
Ɔzzànga Jesus usimɛ kɛyɔɔng ggbalang lɛkkyaa ɔfɔngɔbɛ ka ɔsannɛbɛ gbaak la ittina.
Kwa kɛttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ lissi, ka ammɛ biini ɔsannɛ kwa kulenɛbɛ ka ippyam.
Uzzilɛttɔ wa Jew ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzànganɛ Nicodemus. Ɔdɔkɔ ka kɔssɛ balɔɔt a Pharisees.

Kɛtɔm ssɔn, ufele kɛtɔm umii ukup Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, isan lɔsan ittɛ annɔ alenɛ Ukopolo-lukopolo wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang imaanga ya annɔ anaangnɛ mung ba ule, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang libee.”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ufula ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule basinɛ lɛppyɛlɛ bamaatmɛ.”
