Isogya Rome la uzzilɛttɔ abbɛ, la isogya Jew bakaa Jesus baggbɔ izzi.
Bakɔɔm ɛtɔk basammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Annas, abassɛ wanavva Caiaphas wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ka kukkpa ’kwɔng baang.
Caiaphas ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔbba bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew bikɔɔm ɔttɛ kɔyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ubbenɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Simon Peter la ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus vvɔn bakup Jesus. Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔsan ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus wa vvɔn ’wɔng baang lɔsan gaang gaang. Ammɛ umii la Jesus ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang.

Peter ɔkɔɔng ka kikkwu ka vveeng ubee. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔsanmɛnɛ gaang ɔppyɛlɛ isimi isimi umii ɔlɔɔk la waanawanavva ka kikkwu. Uvvenɛ ɔkɔɔm Peter uffu ka tɔkɔlɔ.
Waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔbap Peter ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang lissi ɔɔ?” Peter ɔttɛ, “Ihii, anaam lissi.”
Buyili budɔkɔ ka kɛnaang. Keem ibɔɔyi Uzzilɛttɔ la bakat-ɛfɛɛn baddobong lɔkɔɔn la ibili, bale baang ka babeenɛ bakkpitgwɛ bawupa. Peter umii ubee baang la abbɛ uwupa lɔkɔɔn.
Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔbap Jesus ibap utum balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ la lukopolo ammɛ.

Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk anaam nlɔɔk ppwool ppwool ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kikopolo nkopolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ssoon a mitin ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ka lalup ba ntaka nlɔɔk.
Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abapnɛ lɔbap ’gwɔng ning? Abap balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛnɛ ka nlɔɔknɛ. Abapbɛ bwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ. Basan lɔsan.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, ɔkat-ɛfɛɛn vvɔn utupmɛ kabut ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng bukkaamnɛ zzeen a kɛlɔɔk a kɔlɔɔk la Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ning!”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nlenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ lɛlɔɔk, abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ mung bwa nlɔɔknɛ. Ɔzzànga nlenɛ bbwak ka kwa nlɔɔknɛ, atupnɛ kwa ’bɔng?”
Annas ɔtɔɔm Jesus la izzi ning baang ufee Caiaphas Uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm.
Peter ɔdɔkɔ utii baang ka ubeenɛ uwupa lɔkɔɔn. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balɔɔk la Peter battɛ, “Annɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbaa lissi ɔɔ?” Peter ɔkala ɔttɛ, “Ka yang, anaam lissi.”
Ubili Uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm wa vvɔn wa balenɛ ka bukpana la ubili wa Peter ɔkkwɛɛnɛ ɔzza kɔtɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Annɔ lissi alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nyɛnwɔnɛ la ammɛ ka bɛssɛ ɔɔ?”
Peter ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Ka yang, anaam lissi.” Eseese ulangkɔkɔ ɔkɔɔl.

Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm kkpulup, basam Jesus ka ssala Caiaphas bamii ka ugala ubeet ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang. Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew basi ka tɔkɔlɔ ugala limii, ka basinɛ lɛggyan battɛ batɔkɔ làggbò ɔlɔk bale ka Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ.
Ɔzzánga Pilate ɔtta ka vveeng ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔzzɔɔkwɔyɔng mbɔng akaamɛnɛyɔng?”
Battɛ, “Butakanɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛzzɔɔk, nzang ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ mɛ ba ikɔɔm iffu.”
Keem Pilate ɔttɛ, “Kulenɛ ning, annyɔɔng biini asammɛyɔng amii akaalyɔng kɛkaal ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ annyɔɔng lalɔɔknɛ.” Battɛ, “Ayyɔɔt lakke za kɛwwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt ba iyanga.” (
Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning lɛmmwɔɔl a Jesus lile ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Lɛmmwɔɔl za ɔlɔɔknɛ utum kɛssanga lubbe sa ule ubbe.)
Pilate ɔppyɛlɛ ɔmal ka ugala, ɔkkwɔɔ Jesus ɔbap, ɔttɛ “Annɔ alenɛ ubeet a Jews ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Lɔbap ’gwɔng baang lussiwɔ ka luppyam faa balɔɔt babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ kɔlɔɔk anaam.”
Pilate ɔttɛ, “Attina attɛ anaam ɔlɔɔt a Jew ɔɔ? Balɔɔt annɔ la Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang basamwɔnɛ bassɛɛnnɛ ka kɔbɔɔk. Kkpɔɔ azzɔɔk bɔka kɔlɔɔk?”

Jesus ɔttɛ, “Itutum anaam ya vveeng ’wɔng mung lissi. Ilenɛ ya vveeng ’wɔng, nzang balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ballubong kullu bakkalanɛ bafɔngɔ basinɛ lɛsam bannyi bazzilɛttɔ Jews. Itutum anaam ya mung lissi.”

Pilate ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ubeet ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annɔ attɛnɛ anaam ubeet. Bamaatnɛ bazzɔɔk ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung kwa kɛlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ wa lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam.”
Pilate ɔttɛ, “Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ulenɛ ’bɔng?” Pilate ɔtta umii ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang kwa nle nttɛ ubbe ba nsan.
Ka eleme annyɔɔng, nkkyaa ɔlɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ vvɔn nfɔngɔ ufula ka ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ. Ngkka aggyan attɛyɔng nkkyaa Ubeet a balɔɔt a Jew nfɔngɔwɔyɔng ɔɔ?”
Abbɛ babungu battɛ, “Mmaaye, ammɛ lissi! Iggyan Barabbas!” (Barabbas ɔdɔkɔ ɔbbyap.)
Ɔzzánga Pilate ɔsam Jesus unnyi isogya batup.
Isogya balɔɔk kɛttɔpɔ bizze battɔpɔ Jesus, basam ewuulu babeet bawɔkɔlɔmɛ
bakunmɛ laddu battɛ, “Lɛttɔ lɛtaawɔ oo Ubeet a Jews!” Batupmɛ kabut.
Pilate ɔbbal ka vveeng lɛtta ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nle ka nkɔɔmnɛnɛ ntta ka vveeng ɔkkɔɔnɛ asan attɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ba nyɛn kwa nle nttɛ ubbe.”
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔtta ka vveeng la kɛttɔpɔ bizze la ewuulu babeet ka ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ. Pilate ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Yɛnmɛyɔng tɛ!”
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakat-ɛfɛɛn bayɛnmɛnɛ, babungu “Zzengemɛyɔng! Zzengemɛyɔng!” Pilate ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng asamnɛyɔng amii azzengeyɔng. Lɛttɔ za nle nttɛ ubbe kwa akkwɛ ba nsan.”
Kɛkaan ’sɔng baang battɛ, “Iyanga lafɔɔ za lattɛnɛ ule wa kɛwwɔɔl ka ɔtɔkmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ammɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Pilate uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ ɔgbaa.
Ɔppyɛlɛ umii ka tɔkɔlɔ ugala ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung annɔ wa bɔka lɔkaan?” Jesus lɛmmwɔɔl usi lɛzza.
Pilate ɔttɛ, “Lɛmmwɔɔl nɛ baala azza ɔɔ? Asan mung attɛ nyanga lakke za nkkyaawɔnɛ nfɔngɔ la lakke za nzzengewɔnɛ ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ayanga lakke ka kkwɔɔt anaam ka ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛzɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsamnɛnɛ ɔssɛɛnwɔ ka kɔbɔɔk uzzibong kibbi bubbi bwa buttanɛ lɛbbɔl.”

Pilate uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔggyan ɛtɔk ya ule ɔnaang ɔkkyaa Jesus ɔfɔngɔ. Kɛkaan ’sɔng baang kibungu, “Akkyaamɛnɛ afɔngɔ, nzang annɔ ɛnngwa Ubeet Caesar lissi! Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ubeet ka lakke ammɛ biini, nzang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk a Ubeet Caesar!”
Pilate uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔsam Jesus ɔtta ka vveeng. Ammɛ umii ɔtaa ka ogolo kɛkaal. Ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛzzanga “Kɛhanga.” (Ɛzzánga “Gabbatha” ka kukaan a Hebrew)
Usseke ssup livve littele ka kɛtɔm sa kissolonɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛtɔm-a-Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kissolo. Pilate ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Yɛnwɔyɔng ubeet annyɔɔng!”
Babungu battɛ, “Wwɔɔlmɛyɔng! Wwɔɔlmɛyɔng! Zzengemɛyɔng!” Pilate ɔttɛ, “Aggyan attɛyɔng nzzenge ubeet annyɔɔng ɔɔ?” Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm battɛ, “Caesar ulenɛ ubeet ayyɔɔt wa iyanganɛ keem!”
Pilate ɔsam Jesus unnyibɛ ɔttɛ bamii bazzengemɛ. Ɔzzánga Jesus usseke wa labɔɔk abbɛ.
Umii ɔsam cross ɔtɔkɔ. Uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛzzanganɛ ‘Ɛfɛɛn a Ukɔɔk-a-lɛttɔ (Ɛzzanga ‘Golgotha’ ka kukaan a Hebrew.)
Bazzengemɛ baang, la balɔɔt baffa. Vvɔn ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk, vvɔn ka kɔbɔɔk ɛbyakɔm. Bamat Jesus ka kasɛkɛ.
Pilate ɔkkpɔk ka cross ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Jesus wa Nazareth, Ubeet a Jews.”
Balɔɔt ggbadam bakkwɔɔ likkpɔk ’sɔng baang ka ɛfɛɛn a bazzengemɛnɛ esinɛ lifulu esseke killu. Likkpɔk ’sɔng baang badɔkɔ bakkpɔksɛ ka kukaan a Hebrew la kukaan a Latin la kukaan a Greece.
Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm balɔɔk la Pilate battɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkpɔk attɛ ‘Ubeet a Jews’, akkpɔk attɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔttɛ ammɛ Ubeet a Jews.’ ”
Pilate ɔttɛ, “Bwa nlenɛ lɛkkpɔk butaa ning baang.”
Isogya ’yɔng baang balenɛ Jesus livve lɛkama ka cross, basam iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng abbɛ balɔɔt banna. Basam ewuulu ya ɛsɛlɛnɛ likaang bagbaa.

Balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ iyaakyɔngyɛ. Ikɔɔmyɔngyɛ itta illɔ iyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ule uzzi.” Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn: Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Basam iwɔkɔlɔ anaam babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, Batutala ewuulu anaam.” Uwɔng baang bbwak ulenɛ kwa isogya inaangnɛ.
Abakka Jesus la etele abakka la Mary wanavva Clopas la Mary Magdalene badɔkɔ baang ka babeenɛ bakkɛtɛ cross wa bazzengenɛ Jesus.
Jesus ɔyɛn abakka la ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ ka babeenɛ baang, ɔzzánga ɔkkwɔɔ abakka ɔttɛ, “Wanavva, yɛn waan annɔ.”
Ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Yɛn ssakawɔ annɔ baang.” Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’wɔng baang ɔlɛkɛ abakka Jesus umii ɔtaa ka ssala ammɛ.
Jesus ɔsanbong ɔttɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛggbabong ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang. Ka ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔttɛ, “Bannyi basaapnɛbong!”
Kɛfɔɔm kɛdɔkɔ baang la batak ba banngmanganɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ. Basam okkokya bayan ka batak ’bɔng baang basam bakpaka ka bisɛssɛ bayeek bassɛɛnmɛ ka kamma.
Uvvenɛ batak ’bɔng baang lɛvva ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaalbong!” Ɔtɛngɛ lɛttɔ ubbe eseese.

Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews babap Pilate battɛ ɔfɔngɔbɛ bannɔk bukkpɔ balɔɔt ba bazzengenɛbɛ baang, basinibɛ ka cross. Balɔɔk ka ulenɛ kɛtɔm-a-Friday, basi lɛggyan battɛ babbu bakɔɔng baang bataa ka cross ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
Ɔzzánga isogya bamii bannɔk bukkpɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ikeeng la wa ibaala ba bazzengenɛbɛ la Jesus.
Baffɔnɛ ka Jesus bayɛnmɛ ka ulenɛ libbe, ɔzzánga basimɛ bukkpɔ lɛnnɔk.
Wa sogya vvɔn ɔsanga ɔkpankyɔ uttele Jesus baang ka lufoom ɔkɔm, linnyi la bannyi bɛllɔt. (
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyɛnnɛ ’kwɔng ka kɔnaangnɛ, ɔlɔɔknɛ utumkwɛ nkwaaning ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ayilayɔng. Ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.)
Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk a Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn: Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Kɛkɔp ammɛ ssɔn baala kinuka.”
Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛlɔk lile baang za lɛttɛnɛ, “Balɔɔt vvenɛ bappyɛɛk ɔlɔɔt wa bakɔmnɛ.”

Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal, Joseph wa ussinɛ Arimathea, umii ɔbap Pilate ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔmɛ ammɛ ɔsam Jesus. (Joseph ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ɔzzànga Jesus kyaakyaa usi likup ɔmma bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews.) Pilate ɔttɛ ukkwoong mung ɔsam Jesus. Ɔzzánga Joseph umii ɔtɔkɔ Jesus.
Nicodemus wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ umii ukup Jesus kɛtɔm kkpal ukup Joseph bamii batɔkɔ Jesus. Ɔkɔɔm bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk ɔbɛtɛ la myrrh la aloes.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa basam Jesus baggbɔ ka balata ibba ɔbɛtɛ la linnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Jews ballinɛ ubbu.
Ulupu ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɛfɛɛn a bawwɔɔlnɛ Jesus. Ufaa lilli wa batakanɛ ɔlɔɔt lilli ɔdɔkɔ baang.
Ka ussekenɛ ssup Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kɛffɔ, lilli likkɛtɛ ɔgbaa, basam Jesus bawulu baang.
Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a livve luzɔɔm, gɔɔ utii zuulu-zuulu ning, Mary Magdalene ufeele umii ka lilli, ɔyɛn ka lɛttaal lilenɛ lɛttɔm lisseke kamma lilli.
Ɔmma eseese umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ Simon Peter la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus balɔk ba Jesus ɔsaapnɛbɛ gaang gaang ɔttɛ, “Basangabong Uyini ayyɔɔt ka lilli tɛ, mung ba isan ka ɛfɛɛn a balokomɛnɛ tɛ!”
Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, Peter la ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ɔlɔk bamma bamii ka lilli.
Badɔkɔ baffa ning baang ka bammanɛ, ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus wa kang ɔmma ɔkɔngɔ Peter, umii utte ka lilli lɛffɔ.
Ɔkpɔkɔ uvvoop, ɔyɛn ibba baang ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli. Ammɛ biini ka tɔkɔlɔ usi lɛmal.
Simon Peter ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ukupmɛnɛ ka lɔnnyɔ, ɔffɔnɛ, ɔsak ssɔng umii ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli. Ɔyɛn ibba ’yɔng baang
la ubba wa baggbɔnɛ Jesus ka lɛttɔ. Ubba ’wɔng baang ɔkkɔtbong kɛyɔɔng ammɛ ɔtaa zzekep usseke ibba ’yɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus wa uttenɛ ka lilli lɛffɔ, ɔssɛ umii ɔmal; ɔyɛn ka zzeen ammɛ, uyila. (
Gɔɔ tɔttɔt basi lippyee bakpala ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛnɛ, vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe.)
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bappyɛlɛ bafula.
Mary ubee baang ka libat a lilli ɔkkwa. Ɔkkwanɛ, ɔkɔɔm ɔkpɔkɔ uvvoop ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli,
ɔyɛn bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffa baang ka bataanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a bawulunɛ Jesus, vvɔn ka lɛttɔ wa vvɔn ka bukkpɔ.
Babapmɛ battɛ, “Wanavva, akkwa ’bɔng?” Ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Basambong Uyini anaam bagbata, mung ba nsan ka ɛfɛɛn a balokomɛnɛ!”
Ɔssanganɛ usikili ning mung, ɔyɛn Jesus bang ka ubeenɛ, ɔzzànga usimɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ.

Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Wanavva, akkwa ’bɔng? Mung aggyan nnyinɔɔng?” Ammɛ wanavva ’wɔng baang uttina ɔttɛ baang ɔkat ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang, ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Dedde, ulewɔnɛ annɔ asammɛnɛ abbɛ mung, abwɔɔlɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn alokomɛnɛ, nmii nsammɛ.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Mary!” Ammɛ usikili ɔppyɛɛkmɛ ɔlɔɔk ka kukaan a Hebrews ɔttɛ, “Rabboni!” (Ning baang ulenɛ “Ukopolo-lukopolo.”)

Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ alɔmnɛ ka ntakanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde lɛppyɛlɛ nmii. Ɔzzànga amii abwɔɔlɔ ikpana anaam attɛ nle ka nppyɛlɛnɛ nmii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ wa ulenɛ Dedde ayyɔɔt la abbɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt la abbɛ.”
Mary Magdalene umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔyɛnbong Uyini, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ la ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Kulele ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bammabong baddumu ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon bafɛɛn lamma bassɛɛn ikpaka bakakabɛ kɛyɔɔng ka bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews babbwɔpɔnɛbɛ. Jesus uffu ubeebɛ baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ ɔttɛ, “Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat.”
Ulenɛ ning baang livve lɛlɔɔk, ɔyɔɔbɛ labɔɔk la lufoom. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baggele gaang gaang ka bayɛnnɛ Uyini.
Jesus ɔbbal la abbɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Dedde ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ anaam, annyɔɔng nle nssɛ ntɔɔmwɔyɔng ning baang.”
Ulenɛ livve lɛlɔɔk, ɔfɛkɛlɛ uvvoongbɛ, ɔttɛ, “Atɔkyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Asɔɔknɛyɔng balɔɔt bubbi, vvenɛ bubbi abbɛ busaal; asinɛyɔngbɛ lɛsɔɔk, bubbi abbɛ bukɔɔngbɛ baang.”
Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Thomas (Bakkwɔɔmɛ, Waan-ippɛlɛng) usi lile ka ɛkɛtɛ a Jesus uffunɛ.

Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus balɔk babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Iyɛnbong Uyini.” Thomas ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nsinɛ binuku bya bamatmɛnɛ bɛfɔl ka labɔɔk lɛyɛn, nsam kɛnnɔ anaam nwɔkɔlɔ baang, nsam kɔbɔɔk anaam nwɔkɔlɔmɛ ka lufoom ba nyila.”

Liwaazɛ liffunɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus babbal lɛggba ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon. Livve ’zɔng baang Thomas ɔdɔkɔ baang. Bafɛɛnbong lamma bassɛɛn ikpaka ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzánga Jesus ɔmal ubeebɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ baang ɔttɛ, “Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat.”
Keem ɔlɔɔk la Thomas ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk labulakaat anaam mung, awɔkɔlɔ kɛnnɔ annɔ, alenɛ livve atɔnɔ kɔbɔɔk awɔkɔlɔnɛ ka lufoom. Kkyaa ikangala annɔ afɔngɔ, ayila.”
Thomas ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uyini anaam, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung ayila ka alenɛnɛ lɛyɛn ɔɔ? Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba batakanɛnɛ lɛyɛn, ɔzzànga bayila tɔttɔt!”
Jesus ɔnaang bɛmaanga ggbadam ggbadam bya basinɛ lɛkkpɔk bassɛɛn ka luvva ’gwɔng mung ka bassɛnɛ la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ.
Nkkpɔk lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ nkwaaning ayila attɛyɔng Jesus ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ayilanɛyɔng ning baang vvenɛ ayangayɔng kuddu.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal, Jesus utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ammɛ ba bannambakkyaat ka libbwe za lɛzzanganɛ Tiberius. Kɔdɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale ka appyeenɛyɔng mung:
Simon Peter, la Thomas (Waan-ippɛlɛng), Nathanael (wa ussinɛ lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Cana ka Galilee) la bwaan a Zebedee la balɔɔt a Jesus ba baffa badɔkɔ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.

Simon Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk la ba abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nle ka nmiinɛ kulap isɛɛnabannyi.” Babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Vvenɛ iffu ikupwɔ.” Bafeele bamal ka akkpaat bawaat bamii. Ɔzzànga kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bulɔk ning basi lɛkaa.
Ɔffɔnɛ ka livve lɛttanɛ, Jesus ubee akang ka lufoom a bannyi, ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basi lɛkɔɔlɔ battɛ baang Jesus.
Ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bakolobya, bulɔk ba ataka akaayɔng ɔɔ?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Bulɔk ba itaka ikaa tɛ.”
Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Atɔɔpyɔng kuggbɔ ka kufoom akkpaat kwa ɛlaabɔɔk, vvenɛ akaayɔng isɛɛn. Abbɛ basam kuggbɔ batɔɔp. Basi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong battulu kuggbɔ batta ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi ka isɛɛn ilenɛkwɛ liyipi.

Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang gaang ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Baang Uyini tɛ!” Peter uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔttɛ baang Uyini, ɔsam ewuulu ammɛ ɔggbɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng, (ka ulenɛ lɛffɔ uggbolo iwɔkɔlɔ) ukut ɔssɛɛn ka bannyi.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng baang batutulu kuggbɔ la isɛɛn ning baang batta ka likum ɔbɛtɛ la akkpaat. Ɛfɛɛn ya babeenɛ bakaa ifɛɛn ’yɔng baang ele lalɔp a bukkpɔ kubbwɔɔk keem kɛtɛkɛtɛ likum.
Baffɔnɛ ka likum, bayɛn isɛɛnabannyi ka lagyigyaal a lɔkɔɔn la brɛɛd.
Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Asangayɔng isɛɛnabannyi ya assumanɛyɔng lɛkaa mung affuyɔng ee.”

Simon Peter ɔmal ka akkpaat uttulu kuggbɔ ’kwɔng baang la isɛɛnabannyi ya labaang ka tɔkɔlɔ; ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɛ iggba-ɔggba lalɔp isɛɛnabannyi lannangakkyaat la isɛɛn zzɔɔppikkyaat. Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyipinɛ baang, kuggbɔ kɔlɔk kusi lɛnaang nakanaka.
Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Affu azziyɔng kazzi.” Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ vvɔn gbɔɔ wa ɔbbɔnɛ ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ nnyinɔɔng?” usi lile ka balenɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ battɛ Ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini.
Jesus ɔsam brɛɛd ’wɔng baang unnyibɛ, ɔbbal isɛɛnabannyi lɛsam unnyibɛ.
Baang ɔnaang ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat ka Jesus ɔyɔɔmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussinɛ ufungala ka lubbe.

Balenɛ livve lizzi, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Simon Peter ɔttɛ, “Simon, waan a John, mung nsaapwɔ mung ntta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nsaapnɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ’bɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔɔ?” Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Iii, Uyini, asan lɔsan attɛ asaapnɛ gaang gaang.” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Appyɛɛk itɔɔn anaam!”
Ɔbbalmɛ lɛbap ka bikkpit bɛffa ɔttɛ, “Simon, waan a John, nsaapwɔ mung ɔɔ?” Ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii tɛ, Uyini, asan lɔsan attɛ asaapnɛ gaang gaang.” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Apyɛɛk itɔɔn anaam!”

Jesus ɔbbalmɛ lɛbap ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat ɔttɛ, “Simon, waan a John, nsaapwɔ mung ɔɔ?” Ɔzzanga ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uyini, annɔ asan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, asan lɔsan attɛ asaapnɛ gaang gaang!” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Appyɛɛk itɔɔn anaam.

Mbwɔɔlɔwɔ ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ; ɛkɛtɛ atiinɛ okolobya, ataa afeele ning abama amii ɛfɛɛn a kɔsaapwɔnɛ: ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ ya akkpɛɛmnɛ, vvenɛ atɔnɔ labɔɔk aloko baggbɔwɔ basam bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a kusiwɔnɛ lɛsaap.”
(Ning mung Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔyɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Peter ule ubbe ɔkɔɔm latele ufee Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.) Jesus Ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛ!”

Peter usikilinɛ ɔppyɛɛk, ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ’wɔng baang, wa ɔsaapnɛ Jesus gaang gaang, wa ɔffɛlɛnɛ Jesus kɛtɛkɛtɛ ning ɛkɛtɛ kazzi kulele ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini, mung attɛ nnyinɔɔng ule ka uzziwɔnɛ issɛ?”
Peter ɔyɛnmɛnɛ, ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung bɛɛ?”
Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ ɔttɛ, “Nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ uddu tɔttɔt nffu, nkwɔng baang kɔnaangwɔ ’bɔng? Akupnɛ!”

Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bappyee kuttu battɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ’wɔng baang baala ubbe. Jesus usi lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ baala ubbe tɛ, ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ uddu tɔttɔt nffu, nkwɔng baang kɔnaangwɔ ’bɔng?”
Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ’wɔng baang ulenɛ wa ɔlɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung, ammɛ biini ɔkkpɔknɛsɛ ɔssɛɛn ka luvva; ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt isan lɔsan ittɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Jesus ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk ggbadam ɔgbaa. Bakkpɔknɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang la bbwɔn la bbwɔn bassɛɛn ka luvva, nttina nttɛ nzang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi baala bakkwoong bakɔɔm livva sa bale bakkpɔk.
Nwomowɔbong Theophilus: Ka luvva anaam gwa ikeeng, nkkpɔk ntum bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Jesus ɔnaangnɛ la lukopolo ammɛ, ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya uttenɛ kɛnaang ammɛ,
uffu ɔffɔ kɛtɔm sa umiinɛ ka libat. Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ umii ka libat, ɔkɔɔm lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkamala balɔɔt ba ulenɛ lɛssang ɔttɛ bazzanga bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ.

Ufungalanɛ ka lubbe ɔggba ka lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa, ɔyɔɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lusso balɔɔt ammɛ bikongo ggbadam. Ɔyɔɔbɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a basinɛ lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong bakangala. Bayila battɛ utii ka kuddu ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Bayɛnmɛ, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ utum Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Baggbanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ agbatayɔng ka Jerusalem tɛ. Ataa akatyɔng lɛsɔɔk za nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng kkpal nttɛ Dedde ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng tɛ.
John ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la bannyi, ɔzzànga bwaan a bɛtɔm bisseke ssɛk vvenɛ banaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus badudanɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la Jesus, babapmɛ battɛ, “Uyini, mung ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya ale ka asanganɛ Israel ka bubili, annɔ asseke ubeet ayyɔɔt ɔɔ?”
Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa ɛkɛtɛ la kɛtɔm sa bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bile bɛnaang, Dedde anaam ɔsannɛ. Kwa annyɔɔng asannɛyɔng lissi.

Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ayangayɔng lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kule kuffu kuvvoongwɔyɔng. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, vvenɛ abeenɛyɔng ittɛɛsɛ ka Jerusalem la Judea, la Samaria ɔkkpɛlɛ ning ning, uddum ka ɛfɛɛn a ɛkpansi ekpekenɛ.”
Uvvenɛ nkwɔng lɛlɔɔk umii ka libat ka balenɛ baang ka bappyɛɛkmɛnɛ tɔttɔt ikkpálá a lukpaaggbeede ifɛɛnmɛ, basimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn.

Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ batii baang ka bagbepnɛ lɛppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus umiinɛ ka libat. Eseese bayɛn balɔɔt baffa la balata iwɔkɔlɔ kitipili ka babeenɛbɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa battɛ,

“Bwaan a bwalam a Galilee, abee appyɛɛkyɔng ’bɔng ka libat a lukpaagbeede? Jesus ’wɔng baang wa basammɛnɛ bagbata umii ka libat, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ning baang uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɛnmɛnɛyɔng baang ka umiinɛ ka libat.”
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii Jerusalem. Ka ussinɛ ka lɛttaal a Olives ule kufaak mile uddum tɔkɔlɔ a ssala.

Bamal Jerusalem bamii ka libat a ɛnyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk za bataanɛ: Badɔkɔ Peter, John, James, la Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew la Matthew, James waan Alphaeus, Simon wa lɔkaan ammɛ lɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang gaang, la Judas waan a James.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ baggba ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn; bassɛɛn luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la wanavva ’wɔng haang la Mary, abakka Jesus, la itele a Jesus.
Bwaan a bɛtɔm bɛsaknɛ, bɔfɛɛn a lalɔp a balɔɔt ning bwɔlaaning ba bayanganɛ kiyila bataa mitin. Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk lɛkkɔ ɔttɛ,
“Ikpana anaam, lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lilebong ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaangnɛ David ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk utum Judas wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ balɔɔt ba bakaanɛ Jesus ɛtɔk.
Judas ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt ka balemɛnɛ lɛsanga battɛ ɔyanga etini kɛnaang ka kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt.”
(Judas ɔkɔɔm ikkpoko ya ɔyanganɛ ka babbu bɛnaang ammɛ ɔlɛɛp ɛkpansi. Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a ɔttɔnɛ ubbe lɛmmɛ lɛssa, bɛfɛɛn a tɔkɔlɔ bɛtta bɛllɔt.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ Jerusalem bappyeekwɛ, ɔzzánga basseke ka bakkwɔɔnɛ ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ‘Akeldama’, ka kukaan abbɛ ‘Ɛkpansi Linnyi’)
Bakkpɔk ka luvva Psalms battɛ, ‘Numa ggwoon ammɛ lɔtaa kippwo, Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ullu ka tɔkɔlɔ.’ Babbal lɛkkpɔk battɛ, ‘Numa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔtɔk kɛtaa kɛnaang ammɛ.’

“Kwakkwɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule ɔddɔlyɛlɛ, ubee ittɛɛsɛ kifungala sa Jesus, Uyini, ufungalanɛ ka lubbe. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule ule ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt, wa ɔggbanɛ lissi ule baang ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Uyini Jesus ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ ɔssɛ ukkpit, ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ a John ukopolonɛ kɔlɔɔk a kɛnaang a baptizim tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa basamnɛ Jesus bamii ka libat.”
Ɔzzánga baddam bafɔngɔ balɔɔt baffa: Joseph, wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Barsabbas (badɔkɔ bakkwɔɔmɛ Justus bagbaa), ɔbɛtɛ la Mathias.
Bavvenɛ lɛddam, bazɔɔm battɛ, “Uyini, annɔ asannɛ ippyam balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uyini, ayɔɔyɛlɛ ka balɔɔt ba baffa ’bɔng mung, ɔlɔɔt wa alenɛ lɛsanga.
Ɔtɔk kufuk a kɛnaang a ’sɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm annɔ, ussila lɛttɔ a Judas wa ulenɛ lɛgbata umii ka ɛfɛɛn a ussinɛ.”
Bavvenɛ ning baang, bazzɔɔk iggo battɛ basanga lɛkɔɔl zzɔn ka lakɔɔl ’zɔng baang laffa. Keem iggo ittɔ, iffɛlɛ Mathias. Ɔzzánga basam Mathias batoolo la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba zzɔɔppavvɔn.
Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɔm-a-Pentecost, (lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa la bɛtɔm zzɔɔp bɛsaknɛ ka ussinɛ ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ) kwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayanganɛ kiyila baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn.
Eseese, bappyee lɔsap ka libat a lukpaaggbeede ka ludumnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛffa sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang. Lɔsap ’gwɔng baang lɔttala gaang gaang ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon gwa bataanɛ.
Ɔzzánga bayɛn bɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn ka bitumanɛ. Lalaak a lɔkɔɔn ’zɔng baang lasingi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafulabɛ ka kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, basseke ka balɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛbɛ lakke kɔttɛ balɔɔk.
Balɔɔt a Jews badɔkɔ baang ka ballunɛ ka Jerusalem, badɔkɔ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ba bassinɛ la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu.
Bappyeenɛ lɔsap ’gwɔng baang kibbi kɛggba ka ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn. Ɔzzánga kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bappyeenɛ bayanga-kiyila ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ kukaan ammɛ.
Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balɔɔknɛ baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bassi Galilee!
Ɔnaang nang ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ippyeenɛ bwa balɔɔknɛ ka likaan ayyɔɔt?
Uvve ayyɔɔt ba Parthia, la Media, la Elam; balɔk ba Mesopotamia la Judea, la Cappadocia; balɔk ba Pontus la Asia;
balɔk ba Phrygia la Pamphylia, balɔk ba Egypt la ɛkpansi Libya kɛtɛkɛtɛ Cyrene; ayyɔɔt balɔk issi Rome.

Balɔɔt a Jews la ikanakana ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ basikilibɛ ippyam basseke ba luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews. Ayyɔɔt balɔk issi Crete la Arabia ɔzzànga ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ippyeebɛ ka balɔɔknɛ ka likaan ayyɔɔt batum lilɔɔk sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang!”
Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ittina ibubutubɛ; basseke ka babapnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ’bɔng?”
Balɔɔt balɔk banyɔɔka bayanga-kiyila battɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung babimibong tɛ!”

Peter ufeele ubee la babbɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus ba zzɔɔppavvɔn. Ɔlɔɔk ɔgaga, unnyi kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Bayyɔɔt a Jews la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ Jerusalem, agɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng appyeeyɔng kwa nle ka nlɔɔknɛ ntum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ba bataka babimi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ attinanɛyɔng, utii ikalangka ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp ya lɔfɔm keem.
Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa Joel, Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔknɛ utum.

‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa nle nnaang ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke. Vvenɛ nvvoong ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuyeeng anaam. Bwaan annyɔɔng vvenɛ balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk anaam. Bakolobya annyɔɔng vvenɛ bayɛn biyɛnɛ. Bagɛlɛnya annyɔɔng vvenɛ balakala ilakala.
Gɔɔ vvenɛ nvvoong babili anaam bwaanbwalam la bwanavva Kuyeeng anaam ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang. Vvenɛ balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk anaam kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang.
Vvenɛ nnaang bɛmaanga ka lukpaaggbeedde la kɔlɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi. Balɔɔt vvenɛ bayɛn linnyi la lɔkɔɔn la babili-isɔngɔ;
Livve-luwee vvenɛ lizum, ettuma vvenɛ ekoot tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linnyi, tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛtɔm-a-laggele Uyini sa lɛbaang ’sɔng baang kɛffɔ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔkkwɔɔnɛ lɛkɔɔl Uyini vvenɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.’

“Agɔpɔlɔyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng, balɔɔt a Israel! Jesus wa Nazareth ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kkpelegede tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwoongnɛ ayɛnyɔng ka bɛmaanga la bikɛɛlɛ lilɔɔk bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔnaang. Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan ka kɔnaangnɛ ka zzeen annyɔɔng biini.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔtan gwa ammɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk, ɔggba litini ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔsam Jesus unnyiwɔyɔng awwɔɔlyɔng, ka kɛfɔngɔ banaang-a-bubbi bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka Cross.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe. Ɔkkalamɛ ɔfɔngɔ ka bɔssɔp a lubbe. Kukoolo ukoolo tɛ́ttɛ́ lubbe lukopomɛ ka mgbakkɔpɔ.
David ɔlɔɔk utummɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Nyɛn Uyini ka lusso anaam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ulenɛ ka kɔbɔɔk a ɛlaabɔɔk nkwaaning nsinɛ lɛbbwɔpɔ.
Kwakkwɛ nggelenɛ ka luppyam. Lammwɔɔl anaam lale za bɔwaa. Ɔzzànga nkkpa nle wa nle nbbe, vvenɛ nfɛkɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luttina lɔbwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ.
Baala afɔngɔnɛ nkɔɔng ka babbu; Baala ayila ukee waan ubili annɔ ɔyɛn akama, ɔddɔlɔ.
Ayɔɔnɛbong ɛtɔk ya emiinɛ ka kuddu; Kile sa alenɛ la anaam, vvenɛ anaangnɛ ntaa ka laggele.’
“Ikpana anaam, vvenɛ nkpɔkɔlɔ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nyaala ntum uzzilɛttɔ ayyɔɔt David. Ubbe ballimɛ. Lilli ammɛ litii mung la ayyɔɔt pitip pip gbɔng mung.
Ɔdɔkɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsannɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyilanɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang unnyimɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyim ɔttɛ, vvenɛ ɔkaa waan a David vvɔn kibeet tɛ̀ttɛ̀ David biini ɔdɔkɔnɛ.
David ɔyɛnnɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ka ɔnaangɛ, ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk utum kifungala ka lubbe Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Usi lɛkɔɔng ka babbu; kkwɔɔt ammɛ lisi lɛddɔlɔ.’
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungala Jesus ’wɔng mung ka lubbe, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt iyɛnyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ufungalabong umii kufoom a ɛlaabɔɔk a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔtɔk Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abassɛ ulenɛ lisekele. Bwa appyeenɛyɔng, ayɛnyɔng mung ulenɛ lɛsɔɔk ammɛ za usikilinɛ uvvoongyɛlɛ.
Gɔɔ David biini ka libat usi limii, ɔdɔkɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔk la Uyini anaam ɛttɛ, Ataanɛ mung ka lufoom ɛlaabɔɔk,
ning ning nnaang balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ ataa asingbɛ bukkpɔ.’
“Balɔɔt a Israel ɔkkpɛlɛ asanyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn attɛyɔng mung Jesus awɔng tɛ, wa akamamɛnɛyɔng ka Cross. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛbong ɔzzánga Uyini la Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ tɛ!”
Balɔɔt bappyeenɛ ning baang ɔnaangbɛ niit, balɔɔk la Peter la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus battɛ, “Mung ile inaang nang, ikpana ayyɔɔt?”

Peter ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akkyaayɔng kɛnaang a bubbi afɔngɔyɔng. Usseke banaangwɔyɔng baptizim ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus Christ nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng; atɔkyɔng lɛsɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Nlɔɔk nloko wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang kwa annyɔɔng la bwaan annyɔɔng la balɔɔt balɔk ba ballunɛ fulufulu ba Ebinukkpaapi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt ɔkkwɔɔnɛ, unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
Peter ukkpengebɛ, ututbɛ ɔgbaa ɔttɛ, “Akkalawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka akama wa ule ka uffunɛ ukup banaang a bubbi balɔɔt ’bɔng.”
Balɔɔt ggbadam bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ, banaangbɛ baptizim. Bɔfɛɛn innɔ balɔɔt innamikkyaat la kufaak ka bafulanɛ ka kɛkaan ’sɔng baang ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang.
Batɔk ɛkɛtɛ abbɛ; bakkoop lilɔɔk ka bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bakup eleme ya banaangnɛ, bwakuzzi bazzi ning baang, gɔɔ luzɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus; ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ, la bɛfɛɛn a bɛmaanga. Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayanganɛ kiyila bakama ɔkama basseke ka bɔkaat gaang gaang. Bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bayanganɛ batul ning baang bakɔɔm.
Bataan bɛfɛɛn bya bayanganɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ babɛngɛlɛ ikkpoko ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔggyannɛ.
Kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ baduda ka kɛkaan abbɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bwakuzzi ka ssala bazzi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la laggele la luppyam gwa kɛsaap.
Babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, baggele kɛsaap a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ Uyini ɔgbaa balɔɔt ba ulenɛbɛ lɛkkala ka kibbi abbɛ.
Kɛtɔm ssɔn, Peter la John bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ikalangka ikkyaat kikoon, ɛkɛtɛ a luzɔɔm.

Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔnnɔknɛ kikkwu ka ussinɛ ɔfal, ka ɔtaanɛ ka ‘Ubeet a Kikkwu’ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛsɛ. Basammɛ kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bamii baloko ka kikkwu ’sɔng baang. Ubbwoom ikkpoko ka balɔɔt ba basaknɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔyɛnnɛ Peter la John ka bamiinɛ, ukkpengebɛ ɔttɛ bannyimɛ bɔfɛɛn.
Bappyɛɛkmɛ ssii, Peter ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛkyɛlɛ!”
Ɔzzánga ɔppyɛɛkbɛ, uttina ɔttɛ baang bale ka bannyimɛnɛ bɔfɛɛn.
Peter ɔttɛ, “Ikkpoko ba nyanga ya nnyiwɔnɛ, ɔzzànga vvenɛ nnyiwɔ bwa nyanganɛ: Ka lakke Jesus Christ wa ussinɛ Nazareth, nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ afeele, assɛ.”
Ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk a ɛlaabɔɔk uttelemɛ ufeele ubee, eseese laluk lakkaammɛ.
Ukut, ɔppyɛlɛ ubee, ɔssɛ ukkpit, ukupbɛ, bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ɔkɔɔm, ukut ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
Kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bayɛnmɛ ka ɔssɛnɛ, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
Bakɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, ubbwoom a lubbwoom wa ɔtaanɛ ɔtaa ka “Ubeet a Kikkwu” a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangmɛnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ukkwoong ɔssɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ukupnɛ Peter la John ning baang, balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ. Bamma bakupbɛ ka Ikkɔlɔ a Solomon, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛyɛ.

Peter ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, utolo unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a Israel, ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng, bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ appyɛɛkyɔngyɛlɛ? Attina attɛyɔng, mung ikɔɔm likke za ayyɔɔt biini inaang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔssɛ ɔɔ?

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham la Isaac la Jacob la balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, unnyibong bɔɔyi ammɛ Jesus Christ likke ammɛ. Annyɔɔng asammɛnɛyɔng annyiyɔng bayanga-lakke ka ɛkpansi. Afimmɛyɔng ka lusso a Pilate, wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ, nzang vvenɛ ɔkkyaamɛ ɔfɔngɔ.
Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ɔzzànga afimmɛyɔng. Attɛyɔng Pilate ɔkkyaa Barabas wa ɔwwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ɔfɔngɔ.
Ɔzzánga awwɔɔlyɔng Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a kuddu. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛbong ka lubbe. Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ittɛɛsɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng.

Likke ammɛ linaangnɛ ɔnnɔk a kikkwu ’wɔng ɔkkaam. Bwa ayɛnnɛyɔng, aleyɔng lɛsan mung ulenɛ kɛnaang sa kiyila ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus kɛnaangnɛ. Kiyila ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus kɛnaangmɛnɛ ɔppwamɛ ka lusso annyɔɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
“Ikpana anaam, nsan lɔsan nttɛ kwa annyɔɔng la bazzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng anaangnɛyɔng la Jesus, adɔkɔ anaangyɔng ka kisɛsan.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba bappyee-kutolo ammɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔssɛɛn ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa ammɛ ɔsanganɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama. Ɔnaang kwɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Anaangyɔng busannɛ ka bubbi; akkpengeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng.
Nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛffɔnɛ, essi ka lusso Ebinukkpaapi, ɔlɔk ɔtɔɔm Jesus, wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ lɛsanga, unnyiwɔyɔng.
Vvenɛ ɔtaa bakang ka libat tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ ya ule ufoolo bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bappyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ balɔɔknɛ.

Moses ɔttɛ, ‘Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annyɔɔng, vvenɛ ɛtɔɔm uppyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm efeewɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛtɔɔmnɛnɛ anaam mung. Ule ussi ka balɔɔt annyɔɔng. Agɔpɔlɔyɔng lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ule usi kɔlɔɔk kwa uppyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’kwɔng baang lɛgɔpɔlɔ, vvenɛ basangamɛ ka kɔssɛ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bawwɔɔl.’
Bappyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔbɛtɛnɛ la Samuel la ba bakupmɛnɛ ka isimi, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ba bayanganɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɛbwɔɔlɔ, babwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kwa kɔnaangnɛ ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng mung.

Nlɔɔk-nloko Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka labɔɔk a bappyee-kutolo ammɛ, ule wa annyɔɔng. Ayangayɔng etini ka kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛtɛnɛ la balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ la Abraham ɔttɛ, ‘Ka lɛttɔ bwaan annɔ vvenɛ nnaang balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ppyɛɛ ka ɛkpansi.’
Kwakkwɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk, ɔsanga bɔɔyi ammɛ, ɔtɔɔm ufeewɔyɔng ɔttɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ ka ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkyaayɔng bubbi afɔngɔyɔng.”
Peter la John badɔkɔ batii ka kɛlɔɔk ’sɔng baang, ka bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ balɔɔt ba bakatnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la balɔɔt a Sadducees baffunɛ.
Kɔdɔkɔ kutunbɛ ka bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus baffa bakopolonɛ balɔɔt battɛ, ‘Jesus ufungalabong ka lubbe.’ Nkwɔng baang kɔyɔɔbong kɔttɛ babbu vvenɛ bafungala ka lubbe, bataa ka kuddu.
Ɔzzánga bakaabɛ bassɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ tɔttɔt ɔffɔ libbessolo ka ɛkɛtɛ ɛdɔkɔnɛ ele lɛsak.
Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang bayila. Balɔɔt ‘bɔng baang ba bayilanɛ baffɔ innɔ zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak.
Ka libessolo bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews la bagɛlɛnya la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ baggba ka Jerusalem.
Baduda la Annas, Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang, la Caiaphas, la John, la Alexander la balɔɔt balɔk ba bassibɛ ka kikkwu uzzilɛttɔ wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Balɔɔk bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bafeele babeebɛ ka lusso, babapbɛ ibap battɛ, “Anaang nang anaangyɔng ’kwɔng? Ayangayɔng bɔkka lakke? Kɔkɔɔm akɔɔmyɔng lakke a nnyinɛ?”
Peter ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Bakkwu-lusso balɔɔt la bagɛlɛnya:
Mmwɔɔn mung abapyɔngbongyɛlɛ ibap atumyɔng budoddo bwa inaangnɛ innyi ɔnnɔk-kikkwu, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inaangmɛnɛ ɔppwamɛ.

Ɔzzànga ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asanyɔng, balɔɔt a Israel bassɛ basan battɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung wa ubeewɔnɛyɔng ka lusso mung ɔppwamɛbong ɔkkpɛlɛ ka likke Jesus Christ wa Nazareth wa awwɔɔlnɛyɔng; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe.
Jesus ulemɛnɛ ammɛ wa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Lɛttaal za annɔ, ɔbɔɔk-a-ggwoon, alɔɔknɛ attɛ ba lɛyyɛɛp ffet ffet, lɛyyɛɛpbong lisikili lisseke lɛttaal za lɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.’
Kuddu ayɛn ka kɔbɔɔk ammɛ keem. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ule ɔgbaa la ammɛ ka vveengodde wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsamnɛ lɛkɔɔl ammɛ unnyi ɔttɛ balɔɔt bakɔɔmzɛ azzɛ baddu.”
Ikkansulu ’yɔng baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bayɛnnɛ kɛkkaam a zzeen sa Peter la John bakaamnɛ, uvve luvva ba basan. Ɔzzànga bakke basan battɛ badɔkɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus.
Bwa babbalnɛ lɛlɔɔk basi lɛsan ka balenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa battulanɛ lɛyɛn ka ubeenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter la John.
Ɔzzánga babwɔɔlɔ Peter la John battɛ bagbata basseke lɛnɔk a ggwoon a ikkansulu. Bagbatanɛ, ikkansulu basseke ka balɔɔknɛ abbɛ-abbɛ.
Babapbɛ kɛyɔɔng battɛ, “Mung ile inaang nang la balɔɔt ’bɔng? Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ullunɛ ka Jerusalem ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ bɛmaanga bya banaangnɛ mung bile zzekep. Gɔɔ baala ikkwoong ikangalakwɛ.
Iggyannɛ ittɛ kuttu kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔfɔngɔ kɛwaala balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, bappyee, ittamabɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ la balɔɔt balɔk lɛlɔɔk batum lɛkɔɔl a Jesus.”
Babbalbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ, baffu ka tɔkɔlɔ. Battamabɛ battɛ mkkpa kule tɛ́ttɛ́ kule, tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ kpong kpong lɛlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a Jesus ɔlɔk bakopolo batum lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.
Peter la John bappyɛlɛbɛ kamma battɛ, “Annyɔɔng biini akaalyɔngkwɛ kɔyyɛɛp ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ile itelewɔyɔng annyɔɔng faa itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?
Baala ikkwoong ikkyaa kɔlɔɔk kwa ayyɔɔt biini ilenɛ lɛyɛn, ippyee igbaa, ifɔngɔ.”
Ikkansulu ’yɔng baang battamabɛ gaang gaang bagbaa. Bafɔngɔbɛ; bamii. Ɛtɔk basi lɛyɛn ya bale bayɔɔbɛ akama, ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ balenɛ ka kibungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa battulamɛnɛ ka bɛmaanga ɔsakbong lalɔp a likkpa laffa ka ulenɛ lɛtaa ka vveeng ’wɔng.
Ikkansulu bakkyaanɛbɛ bafɔngɔ bagbata, Peter la John bappyɛlɛ bamii bakup inngwa abbɛ. Bamii babwɔɔlɔbɛ kwa bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya balɔɔknɛ.
Bappyeenɛ ning baang, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ batoolo ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Dedde wa Ɔlɔɔmnɛ libat la ɛkpansi la lihu la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya billunɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ,
akɔɔm Kuyeeng annɔ amana David, ɔlɔɔt ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, bɔɔyi annɔ, ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ikanakana kutunbɛ? Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔkka kɛwwɔɔl wa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakkanɛ ɔttɔ gbɔɔ ɔtaak?
Babeet ɛkpansi babamabɛ kɛyɔɔng, Bazzilɛttɔ baduda ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, Bappyɛɛk Ebinukkpaapi la Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.’
Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, Herod la Pontius Pilate baduda ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, ikanakana ilɔk la balɔɔt a Israel balɔɔk batum Jesus, Bɔɔyi annɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa asanganɛ.
Baduda banaang lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa annɔ alenɛ lakke annɔ lɛkɔɔm aggba litini attɛ vvenɛ linaang.
Ɔzzànga gedegede mung, Uyini, akke bubbi bwa balenɛ littina bafɔngɔyɛlɛ, usseke afɔngɔyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ibɔɔyi annɔ ikkaam luppyam ibwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ.
Atuulu kɔbɔɔk annɔ, attula balɔɔt; ayila attɛ inaang lilɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ la bɛmaanga ka lɛkɔɔl a Bɔɔyi annɔ, Jesus.”
Bavvenɛ lɛzɔɔm, ɛfɛɛn ya badudanɛ ka mitin ɛnnyɛkɛ. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuffubɛ ka kkwɔɔt, bakkuma baang babwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛkkaam a luppyam.
Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ɔdɔkɔbɛ luttina ggwɔn la luppyam ggwɔn. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ bɛfɛɛn bile bya anaam kɛyɔɔng, usi lile. Lutini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bayanganɛ babɛngɛlɛ abbɛ abbɛ.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bakɔɔm lakke za lɛbaang babee tɛɛsɛ kifungala ka lubbe Uyini, Jesus. Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ka kibbi ’sɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt wa bɔfɛɛn bubbyamɛnɛ, usi lile. Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ itɔɔm la ssoon, bataanbyɛ; bakɔɔm ikkpoko ya bataannɛ baffu.
Basam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang bannyi bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Basam ikkpoko ’yɔng, babɛngɛlɛ bannyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggyannɛ.
Kwakkwɛ Joseph wa Levi wa bamaatmɛnɛ ka Cyprus, wa bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Barnabas, (ning baang ulenɛ “Ɔbba-bikɔɔm”),
ɔtaannɛ batɔɔm ammɛ ɔkɔɔm ikkpoko ufee bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
Keem ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Ananias. Wanavva ammɛ ɔzzanga Sapphira. Ɔsam ɛkpansi ya elenɛ ya abbɛ, ɔtaan.
Ɔsanga ikkpoko ya ɔtaannɛ baang, ɔfaka kufaak, ulokomɛ kɛyɔɔng, avva ɔsan. Ɔsam kufaak kwa kussekenɛ, unnyi bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
Peter ɔlɔɔkmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ananias ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayila Satan ɔnnaawɔ lɔtan, ɔdɛmwɔ akkala Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛlaak ka afakanɛ kufaak ikkpoko ya ataannɛ ezzi-ɛkpansi annɔ, aloko; asi lɛbwɔɔlɔ.

Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ataan ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɛdɔkɔ ya annɔ, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ataannɛyɛ ikkpoko idɔkɔ ya annɔ. Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attina ka luppyam annɔ anaang kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ning baang? Lalaak ’zɔng baang la balɔɔt ba akkala; akkala la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
Ananias uppyeenɛ ning baang, eseese ɔttɔ ubbe bɛɛm. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ.
Bakolobya bamal bamii basammɛ baggbɔ ibba basangamɛ batta ka vveeng bamii balli.
Ikalangka ikkyaat ilenɛ lɛsak, avva uffu ɔmal. Ɔzzánga kwa kɔnaangnɛ ba ɔtaka uppyee.
Peter ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔnɛ, mung ’wɔng ulenɛ ikkpoko ɔkkpɛlɛ ya annyɔɔng la walam annɔ ataannɛyɔng ɛkpansi ɔɔ?” Ɔppyɛlɛ Peter kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii, Uwɔng baang ulenɛ ikkpoko ɔkkpɛlɛ.”

Ɔzzanga Peter ɔttɛ, “’Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ annyɔɔng la walam annɔ abumyɔng kɛllɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm? Balɔɔt ba ballinɛ walam annɔ bale baang ka babeenɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon gedegede mung, vvenɛ bassɛ batɔkɔwɔ annɔ batta.”
Eseese ɔmɛkɛlɛ ɔttɔ Peter ka lataak baang ubbe. Ɔzzànga bakolobya ’bɔng baang bamalnɛ bayɛnmɛ ka ulenɛ libbe, basammɛ batta. Bamii ballimɛ ka lufoom ulam.
Balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la balɔɔt balɔk ba bappyeenɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus banaang bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ, balɔɔt bayɛn. Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila baggba ka Ikkɔlɔ a Solomon.
Balɔɔt ba gbɔɔ basi lɛddɔl mkkpa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakɔɔmbɛ gaang gaang ka kamma.
Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ggbadam ggbadam bale baang ka bamalnɛ ka kɛkaan ’sɔng baang sa bwaanbwalam la bwanavva ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka Uyini.
Kɛnaang sa bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus banaangnɛ kɛdɛm balɔɔt batɔkɔ balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa bawulu ka iwula la igolo ka lufoom ɛtɔk, nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ ya Peter ɔsaknɛ, kuyeeng ammɛ kuvvoongbɛ ɔppwabɛ.
Bɛkaan a balɔɔt biffu la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn ka billu bya bɛkaangnɛ Jerusalem. Bakɔɔm balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa la balɔɔt ba ipiliza inaangnɛbɛ, baffu battulabɛ ɔppwabɛ.
Uzzilɛttɔ-Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang la balɔɔt ammɛ, la balɔɔt a Sadducees banaang luleep gaang gaang, bappyɛɛk bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Ɔzzánga banaang likup battɛ vvenɛ bakaabɛ.
Bakaa bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bamii bassɛɛn ka ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ gwa izzit.
Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffu uwongolo lɛmma ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ; bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus batta ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ,
“Amii abeeyɔng ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, abwɔɔlɔyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ atumyɔng ufaa kuddu ’wɔng.”

Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus batelemɛ. Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm, batta, bamii bamal ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babee kikopolo. Uzzilɛttɔ-Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bakkwɔɔ bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews battɛ bataa mitin ikkansulu. Ɔzzanga basanga bɔtɔɔm batɔɔm ka ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ battɛ, bakɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus baffu.
Ikkɔɔttuma iffɔnɛ bakang bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus isi lɛyɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ igbakkɔpɔ. Ɔzzánga ippyɛlɛ, imii ibwɔɔlɔ baggboggbo balɔɔt ’bɔng baang battɛ,
“Iffɔnɛ ka ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ iyɛngwɛ la kɛfɛɛn, bakat a lɛmma badɔkɔ baang ka kɛkat. Iwongolonɛ lɛmma, ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ isi lɛyɛn.”
Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ balɔɔt ba bakatnɛ lɛmma la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bappyeenɛ ning baang, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, bwa bunaangnɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔmal ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Balɔɔt ba bakaanɛ, assɛɛnyɔng igbakkɔpɔ bale bakang ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bakopolonɛ balɔɔt tɛ!”
Ɔzzánga uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ufeele la balɔɔt ammɛ, bamii bakaa bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bappyɛlɛ baffu. Lagabbwɔ basi lɛkɔɔm; ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ battina battɛ, vvenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang batɔɔpbɛ lattaal.
Bakɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ’bɔng baang baffu babee ka lusso ikkansulu. Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ,

“Ittamawɔyɔng ittɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛyɔng likopolo ka lɛkɔɔl ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung, uwɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaangnɛyɔng ɔɔ! Lukopolo annyɔɔng lɔwaalabong ɔkkpɛlɛ a Jerusalem. Aggyan attɛyɔng lubbe ammɛ lule ka labɔɔk ayyɔɔt!”
Peter la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus balɔk battɛ, “Mkkpa kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule, balɔɔt baala itele, itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm idedde ayyɔɔt ufungalanɛ Jesus ka lubbe, ka alemɛnɛyɔng bɛfɔl lɛkama, akakayɔng ka Cross awwɔɔlyɔng.
“Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ɔsammɛ, umii ɔtaa ka lufoom a ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ bakang ɔzzanga Uzzilɛttɔ la Ɔkkala-ikkala. Unnyi balɔɔt a Israel kufuk a kɛnaang a busannɛ ka bubbi abbɛ, usseke vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkbɛ.
Ayyɔɔt la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kwa kulenɛ lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ balɔɔt ba batelemɛnɛ, ibeenɛ ittɛɛsɛ bɛfɛɛn byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Ikkansulu bappyeenɛ ning baang, banyanga, battɛ, bawwɔɔl bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
Ɔlɔɔt abbɛ vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Gamaliel, ukopolo-Lafɔɔ wa Pharisees, wa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batelemɛnɛ, ufeele ubee ka kibbi ikkansulu ɔttɛ basanga bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus batta.
Ɔlɔɔk la ikkansulu ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a Israel, asan anaangyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ale ka anaangnɛyɔng la balɔɔt ’bɔng mung.
Ɔmmɛbong ka Theudas utumanɛ, ɔtɔkmɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa lɛbaang. Bɔfɛɛn a nnɔ balɔɔt bakupmɛ. Bawwɔɔlmɛnɛ, balɔɔt ammɛ ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ babbum, kɔssɛ ammɛ kɔtaak sukusuku.
Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Judas wa Galilee utuma ka ɛkɛtɛ a kikkwoon a balɔɔt. Ammɛ ɔgbaa ɔssɛ ɔ̀yánga kɛkaan sa kikupmɛnɛ; bassɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babbum.
Ka ’kwɔng mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ kutunwɔyɔng kɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt ’bɔng mung. Kyaayɔngbɛ afɔngɔyɔng. Luttina la kɛnaang abbɛ ulenɛ a kɛnaang ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ kɛsaal.
Kussinɛbɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala akkwoong abɛtɛyɔngbɛ. Ale appyɛɛ ayɛnwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ebbu la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!” Ikkansulu ’yɔng baang bakup kɛbba-bikɔɔm a Gamaliel.
Bakkwɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bamal ka tɔkɔlɔ. Batupbɛ, battamabɛ battɛ, kɛtɔm kɛlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛlɔɔk ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus. Bakkyaabɛ bafɔngɔ.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus batta basseke Ikkansulu la laggele la laggele, battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinabong ɔttɛ abbɛ bakkɔnɔ mung kɛyɛn akama ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus.
Ɔzzánga ɔkkaambɛ bakopolo lutini livve ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ssala balɔɔt. Babwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo a Jesus wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.

Ɔmmɛnɛ ssup ka bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus balenɛ baang ka bayipinɛ bagbaa, kɔwɔlɔ kɔttɔ ka kasɛkɛ balɔɔt a Jews ba balɔɔknɛ Greek la bwaan ɛkpansi Jews. Balɔɔt a Jews ba balɔɔknɛ Greek battɛ, basumalabong bwanavva abbɛ ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ ka kɛbɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn bya babɛngɛlɛnɛ kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba zzɔɔppabaffa bakkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ, “Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka isinɛ zzeen ka lukopolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛssɛɛn, ɔssanga kwa kɛbɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt, assangyɔng balɔɔt bannambakkyaat ba asannɛ attɛyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule la abbɛ, basan kɔlɔɔk ɔgbaa. Abbɛ bazzanga batan a lɔtan.
Ayyɔɔt ippyɛɛ isseke ba kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm la kikopolo kuttu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ baggele, ɔwaabɛ la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Ɔzzánga basanga Stephen, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila gaang gaang la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, Nicolaus, wa akanakana wa usinɛ wa Jews lile, ussi Antioch uffu ufulanɛ luzɔɔm a Jews.
Kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛsangabɛ, kɛyɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bassɛɛn luzɔɔm, batelebɛ labɔɔk.
Ka ussinɛ baang, lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkama-ɔkama lɛwaala. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ka Jerusalem bayipi ggbadam bagbaa. Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ggbadam bayanga kiyila.
Stephen ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛnɛ ppyɛɛ ɔttala, unnyimɛ lakke bɛmaanga bya lɛbaang bya bɛkɛɛlɛnɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Balɔɔt balɔk batunumɛ. Badɔkɔ balɔɔt a ɔdda mitin wa banaangnɛbɛ bazzanga Bwaan a Lusse (tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛbɛ). Balɔɔt a Jews ba bassinɛ Cyrenia la Alexandria bale ka mitin ’wɔng baang. Balɔɔt balɔk ba bassinɛ Cilicia la Asia, bazzɔɔk bakangala la Stephen.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyi Stephen kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa ɔzzanganɛ ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ ba bakkwoong bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma.
Ɔzzanga balup balɔɔt balɔk libbwu, battɛ balɔɔk battɛ, “Ippyeemɛbong ka ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk bbɔl-bbɔl utum Moses la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kutun balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, bagɛlɛnya la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ. Bamii battulu Stephen, basammɛ bamii ka lusso Ikkansulu.
Bakɔɔm balɔɔt balɔk ba bakkalanɛ lɛlaak batummɛ, baffu babee baang battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka kɛlɔɔk a babbu lilɔɔk utum Ggwoon a latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Lafɔɔ a Moses.
Ippyeemɛ ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, Jesus wa Nazareth vvenɛ ɔkkyama Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ufoolo Lafɔɔ za Moses unnyiyɛlɛ!”
Ikkansulu ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bamat Stephen lɛppyɛɛk. Bayɛnmɛ lusso ka lussekenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ gwa Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Uzzilɛttɔ-Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔbap Stephen ɔttɛ, “Mung ka lɔkkwɔɔn kule ning baang ɔɔ?”

Stephen ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ikpana anaam, la badedde, agɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a latele utuma ka ɛfɛɛn Abraham, ɔlɔɔt ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ullunɛ ka Mesopotamia tɛ́ttɛ́ ufeele ufula Haran.
Ɔlɔɔk la Abraham ɔttɛ, ‘Agbata akɔngɔ itutum annɔ la lɔkaan annɔ, amii, allu ka ɛkpansi ya nle nyɔɔwɔ.’
Ɔzzánga ɔgbata ka ɛkpansi a Chaldea; umii, ullu ka Haran. Ɔffɔnɛ ka abassɛ Abraham ubbenɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ uffu ufula ka lɔkaan ’gwɔng mung gwa allunɛyɔng lullunɛ gedegede mung.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi Abraham kufoom ɛkpansi kɔlɔk linnyi ɔttɛ ɔlɛkɛ. Gɔɔ oboka usimɛ linnyi. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, kɛmɛkɛmɛ vvenɛ ɔtɔkyɛ unnyimɛ esseke ya ammɛ la balɔɔt a kikku ammɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung la Abraham, Abraham waan ba ɔtaka ɔfɔɔn.
Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ la ammɛ, ‘Bwɔɔn ba ale afɔɔn vvenɛ ballu ka lɔkaan lɔlɔk, ka ɛfɛɛn a bale bazzanga babili. Vvenɛ bayɛn akama gaang gaang ka nnɔ kukkpa.
Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bayɔɔbɛ akama kibbi. Ulenɛ lɛnaang, vvenɛ bagbata ka lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang, bazɔɔm bannyinɛ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung.’

Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyi Abraham lakke za kɛbɛkɛ lataa ɔttɛ ɔtaa kɛtaa iyɔɔ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ. Ɔzzanga Abraham ɔbɛkɛ Isaac lɛtaa ka liwaazɛ kɛmaat ammɛ lidudanɛ. Isaac ɔbɛkɛ waan ammɛ Jacob lɛtaa, Jacob ɔbɛkɛ bwaan ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa lataa. Abbɛ bakɔɔmnɛ ifɔɔn a Israel zzɔɔppiffa.
“Bwaan ammɛ ’bɔng baang banaang Joseph kɔfɔk. Bakaamɛ bataan usseke ubili ka Egypt. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ la ammɛ.
Ɔkkalamɛ ka lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Joseph ka ubeenɛ ka lusso a Pharaoh, ubeet a Egypt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛ bɔllɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk. Pharoah ɔnaang Joseph usseke uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi la ssala ammɛ biini.
Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, buwɔɔng buttɔ ka ɛkpansi Egypt la Canaan. Balɔɔt bayɛn akama gaang gaang. Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ basi lɛsan ka ɛfɛɛn a baggyannɛ kazzi bappyɛlɛ.
Jacob uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ kazzi kale baang ka Egypt, ɔtɔɔm bwaan ammɛ, balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, bamii ka ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk a kimii Egypt.
Ɔggbanɛ ka bimii bɛffa, Joseph ɔnaang itele ammɛ bakɔɔlɔmɛ. Pharoah ussi baang ɔsan itutum a Joseph.
Joseph ɔtɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔ abassɛ Jacob ɔttɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ itutum ammɛ baffu ka Egypt. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ badɔkɔ lalɔp a balɔɔt lakkyaat la balɔɔt zzil.
Ɔzzánga Jacob ufeele umii Egypt, ka ɛfɛɛn ya ammɛ biini la bwaan ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ babbenɛ.
Batɔkɔ bɛkɔp abbɛ bamii Schechem. Baang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a ballinɛbɛ, ka lilli sa Abraham ɔlɛɛpnɛ ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt a lɔfɔɔn a Hamor ka ikkpoko.
“Ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ele ka ɛkkɛtɛnɛ, ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ la Abraham, balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ka Egypt bayipibong ggbadam.
Ɔmmɛnɛ, bakaa ufaa ubeet ɔlɔk wa usinɛ Joseph lɛsan; ɔppyɛɛ ɔkɔɔm Egypt.
Ɔnaang balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ lagban. Ɔnaangbɛ bubbi, ututbɛ ɔttɛ basam bwɔɔn bamii bazzɔɔk bataa bakang babbe.
Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɛdɔkɔnɛ ya bamaatnɛ Moses, waan a waantiti ɔyyɛɛp ɔsak. Bakɔɔmmɛ ka ssala ka ittuma ikkyaat.
Ɔffɔnɛ ka basammɛnɛ bagbata basseke ssala, waan a Pharoah wa wanavva ɔttɔngmɛ, ɔkɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan wa ammɛ biini.
Bakopolomɛ kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk a Egypt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzanga uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ka lɛmmwɔɔl, ɔbɛtɛ la linaang.
“Moses ɔffɔnɛ lalɔp a likkpa laffa, ɔnaang luttina kimii kikoolo babbɛ, balɔɔt a Israel ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakɔɔmnɛbɛ.
Ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt a Egypt ka utupnɛ ɔlɔɔt a Israel. Ɔzzánga Moses ufeele umii ɔssɛɛn kɔbɔɔk, ɔwwɔɔl wa Egypt ɔkkala wa Israel.
(Uttina ɔttɛ balɔɔt ammɛ Israel vvenɛ basan battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkɔɔmmɛ ammɛ ɔkkalabɛ. Keem basi lɛsan.)
Kɛtɔm sa ssɔn ɔyɛn balɔɔt a Israel baffa ka babbunɛ. Ubumbɛ kɛkanga; ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Gɔpɔlɔyɔng, annyɔɔng mung etele la etele, ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayapwɔyɔng akama kɛyɔɔng.’
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kɛyɔɔ wa vvɔn akama ussi Moses ɔfɔngɔ kang ɔttɛ, ‘Nnyinɛ unnyiwɔnɛ kizzilɛttɔ, ɔnaangwɔ ɔkaal a kɛkaal ayyɔɔt?
Mung aggyan attɛ awwɔɔlnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ awwɔɔlnɛ wa Egypt lisee ɔɔ?’
Moses uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔmma ka Egypt, ufula ɛkpansi a Midian. Ɔtaa bakang, ɔfɔɔn bwaan a bwaanbwalam baffa.
“Lalɔp a likkpa laffa lasaknɛ, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utuma ka lusso a Moses ka lalaak a lɔkɔɔn gwa waan a kɛssɛ ɔkkɔmnɛ ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat kɛtɛkɛtɛ lɛttaal Sinai.
Moses, ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ. Ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛ waan a kɛssɛ ’wɔng baang, nkwaaning ɔyɛn doddo. Ɔzzánga uppyee lɛmmwɔɔl Ebinukkpaapi.
Lɛttɛ, ‘Anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham, la Isaac, la Jacob.’ Moses ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ gaang gaang uffula, usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛbbɔ ɔppyɛɛk.
Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛ, ‘Aggbolo ikkpa bukkpɔ annɔ, ɛfɛɛn ya abeenɛ baang, ɛfɛɛn a lafɔɔ.
Nppyɛɛkbong nyɛn ɔkpɔlɔngkpɔ akama wa balɔɔt anaam bayɛnnɛ ka Egypt. Mppyeebong laffimi abbɛ, mung nffubong nkkalabɛ. Affu gedegede mung ntɔɔmwɔ Egypt.’

“Moses ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bafimmɛnɛ ka Israel. Ammɛ ulenɛ wa babapmɛnɛ battɛ, ‘Nnyinɛ ɔnaangwɔnɛ uzzilɛttɔ la ɔkaal a kɛkaal ayyɔɔt?’ Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔttɛ, ɔzzanga uzzilɛttɔ abbɛ ɔsanga ka kɔlɔɔk ka lakke Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyɛnnɛ ka waan a kɛssɛ wa ɔkkɔmnɛ lɔkɔɔn.
Ɔkɔɔm balɔɔt ’bɔng, batta ka Egypt. Ɔnaang bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ ka Egypt la Ukolo-lihu la ka kɛmat, ka lalɔp a likkpa laffa.
Moses ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt a Israel ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm uppyee-kutolo ammɛ ufeewɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ anaam mung. Ule ussi ka annyɔɔng.’

Ammɛ ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ la balɔɔt a Israel ka ɛkɛtɛ ya baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka kɛmat. Ɔdɔkɔ baang la balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ la uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyimɛ ka lɛttaal a Sinai. Ɔtɔk bɔtɔɔm a kuddu, uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ.
“Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bafimmɛ kitele, batutmɛ bafɔngɔ kang battɛ, nzang bappyɛlɛ bamii Egypt.
Ɔzzánga balɔɔk la Aaron battɛ, ‘Anaangyɛlɛ ibunukkpaapi ya ile ikkwuyɛlɛ lusso. Ba isan bwa bunaangnɛ Moses ’wɔng mung wa ɔsanganɛyɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi Egypt.’
Uwɔng baang ulenɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya banaangnɛ ɛlɔɔp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔgɔdɔ. Balokoyɛ bazɔɔm. Banaang lizzi bazzi baggele bwa balenɛ lɛnaang.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssang isimi ɔsanbɛ. Ɔssangbɛ ippyam usikili basseke ka bazɔɔmnɛ bwaanettuma lukpaaggbeedde tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, ‘Balɔɔt a Israel! lakɔmɔlɔ za azɔɔmnɛyɔng akkwɛɛyɔng ka lalɔp a likkpa liffa ka kɛmat, anaam lissi ka annyinɛyɔng.

Ɔdɔkɔ ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata ebinukkpaapi ya ɛzzanganɛ Moloch ka asamnɛyɔng. Ɔbɛtɛ la ɛlɔɔp a waanettuma Rephan, ebinukkpaapi annyɔɔng. Bɛdɔkɔ ilɔɔp ya annyɔɔng biini anaangnɛ aloko azɔɔmyɔng. Kwakkwɛ nle ka ntɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng amii ataayɔng lɔkaan lɔlɔk kukupa Babylon.’
“Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, bayanga Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata bbwak la abbɛ ka kɛmat. Banaangmɛbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ Moses ɔttɛ banaang. Banaangmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulɔmɔ wa ɔyɔɔnɛ Moses.

Ɔmmɛnɛ ssup, balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ batɔk ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata ’wɔng baang ka labɔɔk a ibassɛ abbɛ, bakɔɔm bassɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bassɛnɛ la Joshua bamii batɔk ɛkpansi ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggbanɛ ikaan ilɔk ka zzeen abbɛ. Ɔdda ɔtaa baang ning ning ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ a David.
David ɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzánga ɔbap ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔmɛ ɔbɔɔk ggwoon, uloko Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Jacob.
Ɔzzànga ɔdɔkɔ Solomon ɔppyɛɛnɛ ɔbɔɔk ggwoon ’gwɔng baang ulokomɛ.
“Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa libat ka ssoon sa balɔɔt babɔɔknɛ ba ullu, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛ, ‘Libat lilenɛ ugbaal a kibeet anaam. Ɛkpansi ele ɛfɛɛn a ntelenɛ bukkpɔ. Mung ale abɔɔknɛ kɛssanga ggwoon nsɔsɔng? Nle nfɛkɛlɛ yang?
Anaam biini lissi nnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔɔ?’ ”

Stephen ɔttɛ, “Bɔng assinɛyɔng latɔɔk ning? Mbɔng ippyam annyɔɔng isinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm littina. Latɔɔk biini assiyɔng bɔka azzɛ asinɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ lippyee! Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bbwak. Annyɔɔng ngbaa afimyɔng kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ!

Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk ɔdɔkɔ baang wa balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ basinɛ lɛwwɔɔl ɔɔ? Bawwɔɔl bayilabɔtɔɔm Ebinukkpaapi, ba baggbanɛ lɛyaam mmɛmmɛ bakang babwɔɔlɔ kiffu a Bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bbwak. Ɔzzànga mung azzimɛyɔngbong issɛ awwɔɔlmɛyɔng.
Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba atɔknɛyɔng Lafɔɔ-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, za bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakɔɔmnɛ baffu, ɔzzànga ba ateleyɔngzɛ tɔttɔt!”
Ikkansulu bappyeenɛ kwa Stephen ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔssɔpbɛ gaang gaang bazzi lasaal bappyɛɛkmɛ.
Stephen ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulenɛ la ammɛ, uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat ɔyɛn buppwolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Jesus ka ubeenɛ baang ka lufoom ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzanga ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛkyɔng! nyɛnbong libat ka liwongolonɛ la Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ubeenɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔkkpɛlɛ babungu gaang gaang bavvoong labɔɔk ka latɔɔk, bafeele bavvoongmɛ baang basam.
Basangamɛ batta ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, batɔɔpmɛ lattaal. Balɔɔt ba babeenɛ ittɛɛsɛ, basam iwuulu abbɛ bannyi waan a okolobya, wa ɔzzanganɛ Saul, kɛppyɛɛk.
Batɔɔp Stephen lattaal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ batɔɔpnɛ baang. Ammɛ ɔkkwɔɔ lɛkɔɔl Uyini, ɔttɛ, “Uyini, Jesus, atɔknɛ lɛfɛkɛlɛ.”
Ukun laddu ɔkkwa ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Uyini Jesus, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akke bubbi ’bwɔng mung atumbɛ.” Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang lɔttɔmɛ. Saul kɔsaapmɛ kɔsak ka bawwɔɔlmɛnɛ.

Ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka Jerusalem bassi baang, bayɛn akama wa lɛbaang. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayanganɛ kiyila bakyakyama bakkpit Judea, la Samaria, usseke bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus kɛyɔɔng.
Balɔɔt ba bibbenɛbɛ lɛttɔ battɔng Stephen balli bataamɛ lisɛɛm la kullu la kullu.
Ɔzzànga Saul ɔggyan kɛbɛpɛ luzɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔssɛ la ssala la ssala, ɔssang balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila batum Jesus Christ, bwaanbwalam la bwanavva ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ.
Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ba bakyakyamanɛ, bamii la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn, batteet bakang bamii babwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Philip ufeele umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala Samaria. Umii, ukopolo balɔɔt ’bɔng baang kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
Bappyee lilɔɔk sa Philip ɔlɔɔknɛ; bayɛn bɛmaanga bya ɔnaangnɛ.
Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bayanganɛ ipiliza, itta issekebɛ la kibungu la kibungu. Uttula bannɔk-a-kikku ggbadam, la balɔɔt ositta ɔppwabɛ.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ baggele ka Samaria, ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.
Ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala Samaria ’sɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ lakke ubbu, ɔnaang bɛmaanga gaang gaang ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Samaria. Ɔtɔkmɛ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, waan gɔɔ ɔgɛlɛnya, uppyee kwa ammɛ. Battɛ, “Ammɛ baang ulenɛ lakke Ebinukkpaapi ’zɔng baang za lazzanganɛ ‘Likke za lɛbaang’ ”
Ɔnaangbongbɛ bɛmaanga kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔmmɛ. Kwakkwɛ bappyeenɛ kwa ammɛ.
Ɔzzánga bayilanɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa Philip ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ utum Kuttu-budoddo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la lɛkɔɔl a Jesus Christ, banaangbɛ baptizim ɔkkpɛlɛ, bwanavva la bwaanbwalam.
Simon biini ɔgbaa ɔssɛ uyila. Balemɛnɛ baptizim lɛnaang, ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛ Philip, kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ ka ɔyɛnnɛ baggboggbo bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ bya Philip ɔnaangnɛ.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ka Jerusalem bappyeenɛ battɛ balɔɔt a Samaria batɔkbong lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batɔɔm Peter la John bafeebɛ.
Baffɔnɛ, bazɔɔm bassɛɛn balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila, battɛ nkwaaning batɔk Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɔtakanɛ lisini kuffu kuttele ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ, batii ka banaangnɛbɛ baptizim kɛyɔɔng ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini, Jesus.
Peter la John batelebɛ labɔɔk, ɔzzanga batɔk Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Simon ɔyɛn ning baang ɔttɛ Peter la John bannyibongbɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya batelenɛbɛ labɔɔk, uyilabɛ kinnyi ikkpoko,
ɔttɛ, “Assɛ annyiynɛyɔng lakke ’zɔng baang nkwaaning ntelenɛ ɔlɔɔt labɔɔk ɔtɔk Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Peter ɔttɛ, “Annɔ la ikkpoko annɔ amiiyɔng ka lɔkɔɔn, bɔfɛɛn bwa attinanɛ attɛ akkwoong lukkwoong alɛɛp lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ikkpoko!
Kufuk, gɔɔ etini ba ayanga ka kɛnaang ayyɔɔt. Luppyam annɔ bbwak ba lule ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Anaang busannɛ ka bubbi bwa attinanɛ; azɔɔm akkwɔɔ Uyini attɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔ ka ubbu luttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ mung.
Nyɛnbong nttɛ ayanga luleep gaang gaang ka tɔkɔlɔ. Baang asseke ubili bubbi.”
Simon ɔlɔɔk la Peter la John ɔttɛ, “Mkkpee, azɔɔm akkwɔɔyɔng Uyini, annyinɛyɔng nkwaaning lilɔɔk ’sɔng sa alɔɔknɛyɔng mung lisinɛ lɛnaang.”
Balenɛ bwa bazzanganɛ livve lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔbɛtɛ la kɛbwɔɔlɔ kuttu Uyini, Peter la John bappyɛlɛ bamii Jerusalem. Bakopolo Kuttu-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛtɔk-ɛtɔk ka billu balɔɔt a Samaria.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Philip ɔttɛ, “Abamawɔ kɛyɔɔng; usseke amii kuttɔɔk ka ɛtɔk ya essinɛ Jerusalem emii Gaza.” (Ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang yɛ ba babɛlɛ lɛssɛ.)

Ɔzzánga Philip ɔbama umii. Ɔlɔɔt a Ethiopia wa basangamɛnɛ idakɔp, ɔdɔkɔ ka ɛtɔk a kifula. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔkakala wa ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛ libɔngɔlɔ ubeet a Wanavva, ɔlɔk Candance ka Ethiopia. Umiibong Jerusalem kpal, ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ka moto ammɛ wa eyim ettulunɛ. Ule baang ka ɔwaatnɛ, ɔkɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ luvva uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔk la Philip kɔttɛ, “Amii abee akkɛtɛ moto ’wɔng baang.”
Philip ɔmma umii. Uppyeemɛ ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ luvva uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah. ammɛ ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung asan mung bwa akkwɔɔnɛ baang ɔɔ?”
Ammɛ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt, ɔkakala ’wɔng baang, ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nle nnaang nang nsan ɔlɔɔt usinɛnɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔyaala.” Ɔzzànga ɔttɛ Philip ubbulu ɔtaa ka kɛtaa-moto ammɛ.
Uwɔng ulenɛ kutolo kwa ɔkkwɔɔnɛ: “Ɔdɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛtɔɔn ya bakaanɛyɛ bamii bawwɔɔl, ɔdɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛtɔɔn ya esinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl lɛzza ka bakkpaatnɛyɛ issɔp; Lɛmmwɔɔl usi lɛzza.
Uyila busook, ɔzzànga kɛllɛ usi lizzi. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk utum balɔɔt a kikku ammɛ ba ule; ka kɛfal ammɛ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng kilenɛ likpeke.”
Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt, ɔkakala ’wɔng baang, ɔlɔɔk la Philip ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔnɛ, Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng mung ɔlɔɔk utum nnyinɛ? Mung ɔlɔɔk utum kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk faa utummɛ ammɛ biini?”
Philip ubee kɛlɔɔk; ka ussinɛ ka lɛttɔ lɛkkɔ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung, ɔbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo a Jesus.
Ka balenɛ baang ka bamiinɛ ɛtɔk-ɛtɔk, baffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛyanganɛ bannyi. Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔkakala ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Yɛn bannyi mung, ’bɔng bule butununɛ kɛnaang a baptizim?”
Philip ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nnaangwɔ baptizim, ayanganɛ kiyila la luppyam annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.” Ɔppyɛlɛ Philip kamma ɔttɛ, “Nyanga mung kiyila. Nyilabong nttɛ Jesus Christ ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔkakala ’wɔng baang ɔnaang moto ammɛ ubee; ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baffa basini bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi. Philip ɔnaangmɛ baptizim.
Battanɛ ka likum, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuffu kɔsam Philip kumii. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang usi Philip lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn. Ammɛ ɔgbata la lawaa la lawaa umii ka ɛfɛɛn a ule ka umiinɛ.
Philip ɔdɔkɔ usseke ka udunamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka Ashdod. Ɔssɛ la lɛffɛ la lɛffɛ ukkpit, ukopolo Kuttu-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka Caesarea.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Saul utii ka ɔyɔɔnɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus akama, ɔwwɔɔlbɛ. Umii ka Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang
ɔtɔk illɛta lussimi, ɔkɔɔm umii ka idda mitin a balɔɔt a Jews ka Damascus nkwaaning ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt ba bakupmɛ Ɛtɔk-Uyini bakang, ɔkaabɛ, ɔkɔɔm uffu ka Jerusalem mkkpa bale bwaanbwalam gɔɔ bwanavva.
Ka ulenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii Damascus, ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ Damascus, kitipili-kitipili ɔtta immwalang ka lukpaagbeedde uvvoongmɛ.
Ammɛ ɔmɛkɛlɛ ɔttɔ ka lisse. Uppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ lɛttɛ, “Saul, Saul! ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayɔɔnɛ akama?”
Ammɛ ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Uyini, annɔ alenɛ nnyinɛ?” Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ Jesus wa ayɔɔnɛnɛ akama.
Afeele amii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala. Bakang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ale appyee bwa ale anaang.”
Balɔɔt ba bassɛnɛ la Saul bakɔɔng baang babee, gɔɔ lɛmmwɔɔl basi lɛzza. Bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl a lɛmmwɔɔl, ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt basi lɛyɛn.
Saul ufeele ka lisse uwongolo zzeen ɔzzànga usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn. Abbɛ bakɔɔmmɛ ka ka eddu ka eddu bamii Damascus.
Ka zzeen usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat. Ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang bɛkkyaat, bwakuzzi usi lizzi gɔɔ bannyi usi lɛvva.
Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang ka Damascus wa ɔzzanganɛ Ananias. Ɔyɛn biyɛnɛ ka Uyini ɔlɔɔknɛ la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ananias!” Ananias ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Yɛnnɛ mung tɛ, Uyini.”
Uyini ɔttɛ, “Abama amii ka Ɛtɔk-ya-bbit, ka ggwoon a Judas. Affɔnɛ bakang, abap ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ Tarsus wa ɔzzanganɛ Saul. Ule ka luzɔɔm.
Ɔyɛnbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Ananias ka biyɛnɛ ka uffunɛ utelemɛ labɔɔk ɔttɛ ɔlɔk ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyɛn.”
Ananias ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uyini, balɔɔt ggbadam babalanɛbong ibala batum ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, la lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt annɔ ka Jerusalem.
Mung uffubong Damascus la lakke za bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bannyimɛnɛ za kɛkaa balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ.”
Uyini ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Nsɔɔng amii, nsangamɛbong nttɛ uyilanɛ bɔtɔɔm, ɔnaang balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basinɛ ba Jews lile, la babeet, la balɔɔt a Israel basan lɛkɔɔl anaam.
Anaam biini vvenɛ nyɔɔmɛ akama wa ule ɔyɛn ka lɛttɔ anaam.”

Ɔ̀zzánga Ananias umii. Umiinɛ, ɔmal ka ggwoon. Uyeek labɔɔk, utele Saul ɔttɛ, “Ɔkpana anaam Saul, Uyini Jesus wa ayɛnnɛ ka ɛtɔk ka alenɛ ka kiffu mung ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ. Ɔtɔɔmnɛ ɔttɛ nffu nkwaaning abbal lɛyɛn, atɔk Budoddo-Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔzzánga eseese bɔfɛɛn butta Saul ka zzeen tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kiggon ɛsɛɛnabannyi buttɔ, ukkwoong ɔyɛn, ufeele ubee ɔnaangmɛ baptizim.
Uvvenɛ kazzi lizzi, kkwɔɔt lippyɛlɛmɛ. Saul ɔtaa baang ka bɛtɔm ggbadam ka Damascus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus.
Ufeele umii ssɔng ka idda mitin, ukopolo utum Jesus, ɔttɛ, “Jesus ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”

Balɔɔt ba bappyeemɛnɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang babap battɛ, “Mung ’wɔng ɔlɔɔt a Jerusalem wa ɔwwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Jesus lissi ɔɔ? Mung kwakkwɛ lissi ka uffunɛ kɛkaa balɔɔt ufee bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔɔ?”

Lukopolo a Saul lufeele lɔtta kuttu gaang gaang. Lɔnaang ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ, Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ; lɔdɛm balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ Damascus bayila kamma basimɛ lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong bappyɛlɛ lɛmmwɔɔl.
Bɛtɔm ggbadam bilenɛ lɛsak, balɔɔt a Jews baduda banaang likup za kɛwwɔɔl a Saul.
Ɔzzánga uppyee ɔkka wa bakkamɛnɛ kɛwwɔɔl. Kikoon la kɛtɔm bale ka kɛkat a lamma bikku battɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ.
Kɛtɔm ssɔn, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Saul basammɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛsangala la bizzi, basini baloko ka vveeng.
Saul ufeele umii Jerusalem ubum ɔttɛ ɔmal ka kɔssɛ balɔɔt a Jesus. Basi liyila battɛ Saul ufula ka kɔssɛ abbɛ. Ɔkkpɛlɛ bammamɛ lɔmma.

Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Barnabas uffu uttelemɛ. Ɔsammɛ umii ka ɛfɛɛn a bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Saul ɔyɛnnɛ Uyini ka ɛtɔk la kwa Uyini ulemɛnɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔgbaa. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Saul ɔbbɔnɛ ukopolo ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus, ka Damascus.
Ɔzzánga Saul ɔtaa baang la abbɛ ukopolo ɔkkpɛlɛ ukkpit Jerusalem ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini.
Ɔgbaa utolo kutolo, ɔkangala ikangala la balɔɔt a Jews ba balɔɔknɛ Greek. Ɔzzanga babummɛ kɛwwɔɔl.
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus basannɛ ning baang, basam Saul bamii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛzzanganɛ Caesarea, batɔɔmmɛ umii Tarsus.
Kɔdɔkɔ ning luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ a Judea, la Galilee la Samaria lɔyanga bɔkaat ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang. Lɔmat lɛsan, luyipi ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, lɔtaa ka latele Uyini.
Peter ɔssɛ ukkpit ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ɔlap ukoolo balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ballunɛ ka Lydda.
Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a ɔyɛnnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Aeneas wa ositta ulemɛnɛ lɛnaang ka likkpa linnanginna, gɔɔ kifeele gbɔɔ ka igolo ya umininɛ ba ukkwoong.
Peter ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Aeneas, Jesus Christ ɔnaangwɔ ɔppwawɔ. Afeele alɔngɔlɔ igolo annɔ.” Eseese Aeneas ufeele.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ ka Lydda la Sharon bayɛnmɛ. Ɔzzánga bassang basikili bakup kwa Uyini.

Ka Joppa, wanavva ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Tabitha wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔyanga kiyila. Lɛkɔɔl ammɛ ka kukaan a Greek ɔzzanga Dorcas (Ning baang bakkwɔɔ ɛlap). Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛnaang a budoddo la kittele balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔffaakmɛ ubbe, basammɛ bayila bannyi. Bavvenɛ, basammɛ bamii bawulu ka lɛnɔk a ggwoon ka libat ɛnyɔng.
Ka ussinɛ Joppa umii Lydda ba ufulu. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba balenɛ ka Joppa bappyeenɛ battɛ Peter utii ka Lydda, batɔɔm balɔɔt baffa bamii babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Mkkpee, azzuma affu ka ayyɔɔt.”

Ɔzzánga Peter ɔbama ukkuma la abbɛ bamii. Baffɔnɛ bakang, basammɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk ’zɔng baang ka libat ɛnyɔng. Bwanavva ba bataanɛ lisɛɛm a bwalam abbɛ babbibong kkwulum bakkwa bakɔɔm bayɔɔ Peter iwɔkɔlɔ ya Dorcas ɔnaangnɛ ka utiinɛ ikokolo.
Peter ɔsangabɛ batta ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon. Ammɛ biini ukun laddu ɔzɔɔm. Usikili ɔlɔɔk la ubbu ɔttɛ, “Tabitha afeele.” Ammɛ Dorcas uwongolo zzeen. Ɔyɛnnɛ Peter, ufeele ɔtaa-ɔtaa.
Peter uttelemɛ, ufeelemɛ ubee-ubee. Ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila la bwanavva babbu baffu; ɔsam Dorcas unnyibɛ.
Kuttu kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ a Joppa. Balɔɔt ggbadam bayila kwa Uyini.
Peter ɔtaa baang ka Joppa ka bɛtɔm ggbadam la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ikkpa wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka Caesarea wa ɔzzanganɛ Cornelius, uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ka isɔgya Rome. Kɛkaan isɔgya sa ulenɛ ka assɛ bakkwɔɔsɛ “Kɛkaan a balɔɔt Italy.”

Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa kɔlɔɔk a luzɔɔm kɔsaapmɛnɛ. Ammɛ biini la itutum ammɛ bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛ balɔɔt a Jews ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka kɛzɔɔm kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kɛtɔm ssɔn ka ikalangka ikkyaat kikoon ka ɔyɛnnɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm kpelegede wa uffunɛ utolo kutolo la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Cornelius!”
Ɔppyɛɛk uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Kule nang Dedde?” Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uppyeebong luzɔɔm annɔ, ɔyɛnwɔ kɛnaang a kibbe lɛttɔ, ukkewɔbong.
Atɔɔm balɔɔt balɔk gedegede mung bamii Joppa bakkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon Peter.
Ule ka bukekeen ka ssala ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon, ɔnaang-ikkpa, wa ullunɛ ka lufoom a lihu.”
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang umii. Ɔzzánga Cornelius ɔkkwɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ balɔɔt baffa la wa sɔgya wa ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt a luzɔɔm wa ɔtaanɛ la ammɛ biini baffu.
Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ kwa kɔnaangɛ, ɔsangabɛ ɔtɔɔm Joppa.
Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo ka balenɛ Joppa lɛkkɛtɛ, Peter ufeele umii ubbulu libat a ggwoon ɔttɛ umii ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm.
Buwɔɔng busaapmɛ, ɔggyan kazzi. Bale ka kɛnaang a kazzi, Peter ɔyɛn biyɛnɛ.
Ɔyɛn ka libat liwongolonɛ, bɔfɛɛn bussi bakang busini buffu ka ɛkpansi. Bule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛkkpa bɔfɛɛn sa lɛbaang. Buyanga lagook lanna.
Bɛssanga isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka lisse la bunɔɔn bile baang ka tɔkɔlɔ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang.
Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛttɛmɛ, “Peter, afeele awwɔɔl azzi.”
Ɔzzánga Peter ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ning baang baala kule, bɔfɛɛn bwa batakanɛbwɛ laggbo likup bafɔngɔ kang ba ntaka nzzi kɛtɔm kɛlɔk.”
Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛbbal lɛttɛmɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɛn bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbwɛ laggbo likup attɛ butii la laggbo.”
Nkwɔng kɔnaang bikkpit bɛkkyaat tɛ́ttɛ́ buppyɛlɛ isimisimi bumii ka libat.
Peter kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ kutum ifɛɛt a biyɛnɛ ’pyɔng baang pya ɔyɛnnɛ. Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, balɔɔt ba Cornelius ɔtɔɔmnɛ basanbong ssala Simon batii baang ka lusso kikku ka babeenɛ.
Bakkwɔɔ babap battɛ, “Ukekeen ɔlɔk ule mung wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon Peter ɔɔ?”
Peter ɔdɔkɔ ka kiffik a ifɛɛt a biyɛnɛ pyɔng baang. Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔ! balɔɔt bakkyaat bale mung ka baggyanwɔnɛ.
Abamawɔ kɛyɔɔng amiiyɔng eseese; anaam ntɔɔmnɛbɛ.”
Peter ufeele umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa aggyannɛyɔng, kulewɔyɔng nang?”

Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ayyɔɔt, Cornelius, ɔtɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ tɛ. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ka ɔzɔɔmnɛ unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, balɔɔt a Jews ɔkkpɛlɛ batelemɛ lutele. Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkwɔɔwɔ amii ka ssala ammɛ nkwaaning uppyee kɔlɔɔk kwa ale alɔɔk.”
Peter ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bamii ka ssala Simon, ɔdɛmbɛ bakkwunu baang ka kɛtɔm ssɔn. Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, ɔlɔngɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn; bafeele bamii. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔk ba bassinɛ Joppa bakupmɛ bamii.
Ka libbessolo ɔffɔ Caesarea, ka ɛfɛɛn ya Cornelius ɔtaanɛ ɔkatmɛ la ikpana ammɛ la inngwa ammɛ ya ɔkkwɔɔnɛbɛ.
Peter ɔttɛ ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ, Cornelius ududamɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon; ɔttɔ ukunmɛ laddu ka lataak.
Ɔzzánga Peter ɔttɛ, “Afeele, anaam mung ɔlɔɔt a gbɔɔ.”
Peter utolo unnyi Cornelius ning baang tɔttɔt ɔmal ka ggwoon. Ɔyɛn balɔɔt ggbadam ka babbinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon.

Utolo unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔngbong attɛyɔng luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews ba luyila ɔlɔɔt a Jews ɔlap ukoolo wa akanakana, ɔlɔk ɔssɛmɛ ɛnngwa. Ɔzzànga Ebinukkpaapi ɛyɔɔnɛbong ɛttɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ nppyɛɛk ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk nttɛ baang ɔlɔɔt a laggbo ka kkwɔɔt.
Kwakkwɛ nsinɛ lifim ka atɔɔmnɛ attɛ nffu. Kkpɔɔ kule nang atɔɔmnɛ attɛ nffu?”

Cornelius ɔttɛ, “Ɔdɔkɔ liyaadɛ ussolo lisee ɛkɛtɛ ning bbwak ka nlenɛ ka kɛzɔɔm a luzɔɔm ka ggwoon anaam, ka ikalangka ikkyaat kikoon. Eseese nyɛn ɔlɔɔt la iwɔkɔlɔ ya illaatnɛ nyanya ka ubeenɛnɛ ka lusso.
Ɔttɛ, ‘Cornelius! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uppyeewɔbong luzɔɔm ukke kɛnaang a budoddo annɔ.
Atɔɔm ɔlɔɔt umii Joppa, ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon Peter, wa ulenɛ ka bikekeen ka ssala Simon, ɔnaang-ikkpa wa ullunɛ ɔkkɛtɛ lihu.’
Ɔzzánga ntɔɔm eseese nkkwɔɔwɔ; alenɛ litele affu. Mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ile mung ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka itaanɛ ikatwɔ ittɛ ippyee bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔddawɔnɛ ɔttɛ alɔɔk.”
Peter ɔttɛ, “Gedegede mung nsanbong nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛssanga ssɔn.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔmɛnɛ, ɔnaang kwa bbwak vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ, mkkpa ussi ɛfɛɛn duu.
Asanyɔngbong bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛ Jesus, Uyini balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ufee balɔɔt a Israel, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ Kuttu-bɔkaat.
Appyeeyɔngbong kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛ ka ɛkpansi Israel, kwa kuttenɛ ka Galilee ka ɛkɛtɛ a John uvvenɛ lukopolo a baptizim.

Appyeeyɔngbong kwa kutumnɛ Jesus wa Nazareth, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ la lakke ufeemɛ, ufeele umii ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔnaang budoddo. Uttula balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba badɔkɔnɛ ka labɔɔk a Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng, ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ la ammɛ.
Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ittɛɛsɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ɔnaangnɛ ka lɔkaan a Jews, la Jerusalem. Bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka cross, ubbe.
Ɔzzànga bɛtɔm bɛffa bɛsaknɛ ka bɛkkyaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe; ɔnaangmɛ ɔttɛ balɔɔt bayɛnmɛ.
Ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi ka utumanɛ, utuma ka lusso balɔɔt ba balenɛ ittɛɛsɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga. Izzi ivva la ammɛ ka ulenɛ ka lubbe lifungala.
Ɔddayɛlɛ ɔttɛ ikopolo kuttu budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ibwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ittɛ, uwɔng ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔttɛ ɔzzánga ɔkaal a kɛkaal a bakokolo la babbu.
Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔk batummɛ battɛ ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa ammɛ vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkmɛ bubbi ammɛ ka lakke lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.”
Peter ɔdɔkɔ baang ka kɛlɔɔk, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusini kuffu kuvvoong balɔɔt ba badɔkɔnɛ baang ka bagɔpɔlɔnɛ.
Balɔɔt a Jews ba bayanganɛ kiyila ba bassinɛ Joppa la Peter baffu, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛnɛ ɔsɔɔk ikanakana Kuyeeng ammɛ
ka bappyeenɛbɛ ka balɔɔknɛ likaan lilɔk, bakɔɔm babungu lɛbaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Peter ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ,
“Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung batɔkbong Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt itɔknɛ, ɔlɔɔt ule mung wa ule utunu balɔɔt ’bɔng mung kɛnaang a baptizim la bannyi ɔɔ?”
Ɔzzánga ɔddabɛ ɔttɛ, banaang baptizim ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus Christ. Balɔɔkmɛ battɛ ukkunu la abbɛ ka bwaan a bɛtɔm ssup.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus la bayanga kiyila ka Judea ɔkkpɛlɛ bappyee battɛ ikanakana ɔgbaa batɔkbong lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Peter umiinɛ Jerusalem, balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ bazza ikanakana lataa banyɔɔkamɛ Peter battɛ,
“Adɔkɔ ka bikekeen ka ssala wa akanakana wa ɔtakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza, atulyɔng kazzi azziyɔng la ammɛ. Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ anaang ning baang?”
Ɔzzánga Peter ussi ka lutte ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ la ɛtɔk la ɛtɔk utum kwa kɔnaangnɛ, ɔttɛ;
“Ndɔkɔ ka kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm ka ogyila Joppa, ɔzzánga nyɛn biyɛnɛ. Nyɛn kɛfaak a bɔfɛɛn uggboggbo ning la lagook lanna ka bussinɛ ka libat buffu bukɔɔng kɛtɛkɛtɛ anaam bubee.
Nvvoop doddo ka tɔkɔlɔ, nyɛn isɛɛn a bukkpɔ bunna la isɛɛn ya ikkwukunɛ lukkwuku, la bunɔɔn ka kɛmat.
Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛttɛnɛ, ‘Peter afeele awwɔɔl azzi.’
Ɔzzanga nttɛ, ‘Ning baang baala kule, Uyini, kazzi kwa batakanɛkwɛ laggbo likup bafɔngɔ kang kɛtɔm kɛlɔk ka kamma anaam ba kataka kaffu.’
Mbbal lɛmmwɔɔl lippyee ka lissinɛ ka libat lɛttɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɛn bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbwɛ laggbo likup, ɔfɔngɔ kang; attɛ butii la laggbo ka kkwɔɔt.’
Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔnaang ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat, ka lakpeke, buppyɛlɛ isimisimi bumii ka libat.
Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak elenɛ ya balɔɔt ba batɔɔmnɛbɛ ka anaam ba bassinɛ Caesare baffɔnɛ ka ssala sa ndɔkɔnɛ ntaa.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ kɔttɛ nkupbɛ nmii eseese, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ngɔp. Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba bwɔlaaning ba bassinɛ Joppa bakupnɛ imii Caesarea ka ssala Cornelius.
Cornelius ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyɛnnɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ ka ggwoon ammɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Atɔɔm ɔlɔɔt umii Joppa ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon Peter.
Vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk lɛmmwɔɔl unnyiwɔ za annɔ la itutum annɔ, ale ataayɔng ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.’
Ka nlenɛ ka kutolo ka ssala Cornelius, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusini kuvoongbɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔnaangnɛ la ayyɔɔt ka lutte.
Ɔzzánga nkke kɔlɔɔk kwa Uyini ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ; ‘John ɔnaang baptizim la bannyi ɔzzànga annyɔɔng bale banaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!’
Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyi ikanakana lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ unnyiyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ka ɛkɛtɛ ya iyilanɛ kɔlɔɔk a Jesus Christ. Anaam nlenɛ nnyinɛ wa nbumnɛ ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kitunu.”
Bappyeenɛ ning baang, bakkyaa kɛkpɛn a babbɛ bafɔngɔ babbungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛbong unnyi ikanakana kufuk kwa kɛnaang a busannɛ ka bubbi abbɛ bataa ka kuddu.”

Kɛyɔɔ akama sa bayɔɔnɛ luzɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bawwɔɔlnɛ Stephen, kɛkkyama bayanga-kiyila. Balɔɔt balɔk bamii fulufulu baffɔ Phoenicia la Cyprus la Antioch babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a Jews keem Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt balɔk ba bayanganɛ kiyila ba bassinɛ Cyprus la Cyrene bassɛ bamii Antioch babwɔɔlɔ ikanakana kuttu lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bakopolobɛ Kuttu-budoddo Uyini, Jesus.
Lakke Ebinukkpaapi ladɔkɔ la abbɛ. Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ppwap kiyila bakup Uyini.
Kuttu ’kwɔng baang kɔwaala tɔttɔt kɔffɔ luzɔɔm ka Jerusalem. Ɔzzánga batɔɔm Barnabas umii Antioch.
Ɔffɔnɛ bakang, ɔyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ balɔɔt ppyɛɛ, ɔyanga laggele gaang gaang, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ bayanga kiyila sa lɔkkwɔɔn batum Uyini la ippyam abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Barnabas ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo. Ɔyanga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kiyila ka luppyam. Banaang balɔɔt ggbadam bayila kwa Uyini.
Ɔzzánga Barnabas umii Tarsus kɛggyan a Saul.
Ɔyɛnmɛnɛ, ɔkɔɔmmɛ uffu ka Antioch. Ka kukkpa ’kwɔng baang, abbɛ baffa la balɔɔt a luzɔɔm, bakopolo balɔɔt ggbadam. Ɔdɔkɔ ka Antioch ka battenɛ kɛkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ‘Bakup-a-Christ!’
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔk bafeele ka Jerusalem bamii Antioch.
Wa vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Agabus, ufeele ubee ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ buwɔɔng bwa lɛbaang bule ka buttɔnɛ ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ. (Buttɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Claudius ɔdɔkɔnɛ uzzilɛttɔ a Rome.)
Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus batini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ule unnyi bɛfɛɛn batɔɔm bafee ikpana abbɛ ba ballunɛ ka Judea.
Banaang ning baang ɔkkpɛlɛ basam ikkpoko, bannyi Barnabas la Saul battɛ bafee bagɛlɛnya luzɔɔm ka Judea.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ubeet Herod utte kɛyɔɔ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm akama.
Ɔkɔɔm ɔwwɔɔl James etele a John.
Ɔyɛnnɛ ka kɔsaapnɛ balɔɔt a Jews, ɔkama ɔkama. Ɔkaa Peter, ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ. (Nkwɔng kɔnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ kazzi brɛɛd wa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn.)
Ulenɛ Peter lɛkaa ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ, lakup isɔgya lanna, za balɔɔt banna banna ka likup bakatmɛ. Herod ɔnngwa ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔsangamɛ unnyi balɔɔt a Jews balenɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ livve.
Ɔzzánga Peter ɔtaa baang ka igbakkɔpɔ. Balɔɔt a luzɔɔm bazɔɔm gaang gaang bannyimɛ battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaamɛ.

Usseke kɛtɔm ssɔn sa nzang Herod busangamɛnɛ ufee balɔɔt a Jews. Peter ɔdɔkɔ ka bilaa ka bɛzzɔkɔ bakat-ikata baffa. Badɔkɔ bassɛɛnmɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ. Bakat-ikata badɔkɔ baang ka kikkwu a ssala igbakkɔpɔ ka kɛkat.

Eseese ɔyɛn Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ baang kitipili. Buppwolo bullɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ ggwoon a igbakkɔpɔ. Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnnyɛkɛ Peter ka kɛ̀kɔ̀pɔ́kɔpɔ ɔttɛ, “Afeele, zzuma!” Eseese ikpɔkɔlɔ ikkyaa Peter ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ ittɔ ka lisse.
Ɔzzánga Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Aggbɔ ɛkkpa annɔ, asam ikkpa-bukkpɔ annɔ awɔkɔlɔ.” Ammɛ Peter ɔnaang ning baang, Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Asam ewuulu annɔ awɔkɔlɔ, afeele akupnɛ.”
Peter ukupmɛ batta ka tɔkɔlɔ igbakkɔpɔ. Peter biini gɔɔ ba ɔsan kwa Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔnngwa ɔttɛ kɔlɔɔk a lɔlakala.

Basak ɛfɛɛn a kɛkat ya ikeeng tɔttɔt basak kibee sa ibaala, tɔttɔt baffɔ ka lukuma kikkwu sa bakɔɔmnɛ bɛfɔl a bɛfɔl banaang. Assɛ kilenɛ sa awongolonɛ affɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala. Baffɔnɛ baang, kikkwu kiwongolosɛ kɛyɔɔng bassɛ baang basak batta. Bassɛ bamii ɛtɔk ɛtɔk ɔzzánga Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ Peter kitipili.
Ɔzzánga Peter bɔk ɔsan kwa kɔnaangmɛnɛ, ukkuma baang ɔttɛ, “Nsanbong, Uyini ɔtɔɔmnɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔttɛ uffu ɔkkalanɛ. Ɔsanganɛ ka lakke a Herod la ɔkka wa balɔɔt a Jews bakkanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Ɔyɛnnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng ning baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ufeele umii ka ssala Mary, abakka John Mark. Balɔɔt ggbadam badɔkɔ baang ka babbinɛ bazɔɔm luzɔɔm.
Peter ubee ka vveeng; ulip ka lɛmma ggwoon. Ɔzzánga waanawanavva wa ulenɛ ka bubɔɔyi, wa ɔzzanganɛ Rhoda, uffu ɔppyɛɛk bwa bulipnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon.
Ɔkɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a Peter uggele gaang gaang, usumala kiwongolo lɛmma ggwoon. Ɔmma umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ babbɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Peter ule bakang ka vveeng ka ubeenɛ.”
Balɔɔk la waan ’wɔng baang battɛ, “Attɔbong bikun.” Ɔzzánga Rhoda ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔk ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ. Abbɛ battɛ, “Baang ɔyɛnbong kuyeeng ammɛ tɛ.” Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ,
Peter ule baang ka ulipnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulipnɛ baang. Abbɛ bamii bawongolo lɛmma. Bayɛnnɛ Peter, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang.
Ɔkkpabɛ labɔɔk, ɔttɛ bataa zzum. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini, Ebinukkpaapi, ɔsangamɛnɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɔng James la ikpana ammɛ ning baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.” Ɔgbata umii ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk.
Ussolonɛ lɔfɔm lububutu lɔttɔ bakat-ɔkat ka bɛzzɔkɔ. Peter ule?

Herod unnyibɛ lakke ɔttɛ, baggyanmɛ. Ɔzzánga baggyanmɛ basimɛ lɛyɛn. Herod unnyi bakat-ikata ’bɔng baang ibap. Ɔdda isɔgya ilɔk ɔttɛ bawwɔɔlbɛ. Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Herod ussi Judea, umii ɔtaa ka Caesarea ka bwaan a bɛtɔm ssup.

Herod kutunmɛ gaang gaang la balɔɔt a Tyre la Sidon. Ɔzzánga bafeele ka kɛkaan, bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Herod. Bakɔɔm ɛtɔk banaang Blastus uyila kwa abbɛ. Blastus ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatnɛ ssala ubeet. Bamii bakup Herod bakkpengemɛ battɛ bappyɛlɛ bataa ka bɔkaat. Bàyila lakkpenge ka Tyre la Sidon balɛɛpnɛ kazzi abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɔkaan ubeet ’wɔng baang.
Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang sa bassɛɛnnɛ baloko, Herod ɔwɔkɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn a kibeet ɔtaa ka ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔk lɛmmwɔɔl, unnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang. Babungu battɛ,
“Ɔlɔɔt lissi ɔlɔɔknɛ, Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔknɛ.”
Eseese Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulip Herod ggwɔk ɔzzɔɔk ka usinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele. Illɔɔng izzimɛ iwwɔɔl.
Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkama ɔkama lɛwaala.
Barnabas la Saul bavve kɛnaang abbɛ. Basam John Mark ka Jerusalem bakɔɔm bappyɛlɛ.
