Badɔkɔ bakat battɛ bayɛn ka kɔbɔɔk kule kɔbɔkmɛ, ɔlɔk ɔttɔ ubbe kitipili. Bakat ɔmmɛ, kɔlɔk basi lɛyɛn ka kɔnaangmɛnɛ. Bafoolo ittina abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ebinukkpaapi!”
Ule kɛtɛkɛtɛ bɔtɔɔm a Publius, ubeet a likkpɔ ɛkpansi ’zɔng baang ɔtɔkyɛlɛ ɔssɛɛn ka ssala ka laggele. Izzanga bakekeen ammɛ ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.
Abassɛ Publius ɔdɔkɔ ka igolo ka umininɛ ka usimɛnɛ lɛppwa. Ɔfaakmɛ buyili la kɛtak. Paul ufeele umii ukupmɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a gwoon utelemɛ labɔɔk, ɔzɔɔm unnyimɛ ɔppwamɛ.
Nkwɔng kɔnaangnɛ, balɔɔt iffaak ɔkkpɛlɛ ka likkpɔ ɛkpansi ’zɔng baang baffu, Paul uttulabɛ ɔppwabɛ.
Basɔɔkyɛlɛ lasɔɔk ppwap. Ɔffɔnɛ ka ile ka igbatanɛ, bannyiyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn ggbadam ikɔɔm imii kɔssɛ.
Ittuma ikkyaat isaknɛ, imal ka akkpaat wa bakɔlɔmɛnɛ, “Ibinukkpaapi ippɛlɛng” ka Alexandria. Akkpaat ’wɔng baang ɔggba baang lile ka uffunɛ ɔtaa ka ɛkɛtɛ lukook.
Iffɔnɛ Syracuse, itaa baang ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.
Itteet baang iwaat imii iffɔ ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Rhegium. Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, kɛffa kissi kuttɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn kɛffa. Ɔggbanɛ bɛtɔm bɛffa, iffɔ ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Puteoli.
Iyɛn balɔɔt balɔk ba bayilanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baang. Bakkpengeyɛlɛ battɛ itaa la abbɛ ka liwaazɛ. Ɔzzánga iffu iffɔ Rome.

Balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt bappyeenɛ ning baang, baffu baffɔ ka kappya Appius, la ɛfɛɛn ya bakkwɔɔnɛyɛ Ssoon-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ-Likkyaat battɛ bassɛ badudayɛlɛ. Paul ɔyɛnnɛbɛ, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, luppyam lɔppyɛlɛmɛ.
Iffɔnɛ Rome, bafɔngɔ Paul ɔtaa kɛyɔɔng la wa sɔgya ɔkatmɛ.

Bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat bɛsaknɛ, Paul ɔkkwɔɔ baggboggbo balɔɔt a Jews mitin. Baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ikpana anaam! Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt bulɔk bɛ ba ntaka nnaang ɔlɔk vvenɛ nyaa lafɔɔ za lassinɛyɛlɛ ka balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Bakaanɛ bassɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ ka Jerusalem, basikilinɛ bannyi balɔɔt a Rome.
Balɔɔt a Rome babapnɛ ibap baggyannɛ kɛsanga ka igbakkɔpɔ, ka basinɛ bulɔk bwa nnaangnɛ bubbɔl lɛsan.
Keem balɔɔt a Jews bafim ’kwɔng baang. Akkwɛ baang kɔnaangnɛnɛ nmii mkkpenge Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome nttɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal anaam, mkkpa nsɛlɛ bwa nkkwɔɔnɛ balɔɔt anaam kɛkaal ntum lɛttɔ.
Kwakkwɛ nggyannɛ nttɛ nyɛnwɔyɔng usseke nlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk la annyɔɔng. Ikpɔkɔlɔ ’yɔng mung bassɛɛnnɛ ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt wa balɔɔt a Israel bakatnɛ battɛ vvenɛ uffu.”

Balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Luvva lɔlɔk gwa lussinɛ Judea lutumwɔ ba itaka iyɛn. Gɔɔ balɔɔt a lɔkaan ayyɔɔt ba bassinɛ bakang baffu kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk yɛlɛ ba bataka babwɔɔlɔ batumwɔ, ɔlɔk balɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ batumwɔ.
Ɔzzànga iggyan ittɛ ippyee luttina annɔ. Isan lɔsan ittɛ lutini bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔk batum kɛkaan ’sɔng mung sa annɔ alenɛ ka assɛ.”

Ɔzzánga bassɛɛn livve la Paul baloko. Balɔɔt ggbadam baffu ka livve ’zɔng baang ka ɛfɛɛn a Paul ɔtaanɛ. Ussi lɔfɔm ukopolobɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɔttɔt usul. Ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔkkwɔɔ Lafɔɔ a Moses la likkpɔk a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning bayila kwa Jesus.
Balɔɔt balɔk bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang, balɔk bafim kiyila.
a Ɔzzánga Paul ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtɔɔmnɛ Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Isaiah ɔttɛ, ‘Amii alɔɔk la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang attɛ: Vvenɛ agɔpɔlɔyɔng alɔngɔlɔ agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ɔzzànga baala appyeeyɔng; Vvenɛ appyɛɛkyɔng alɔngɔlɔ appyɛɛkyɔng, ɔzzanga baala ayɛnyɔng.

Lɔtan a balɔɔt ’bɔng mung lubutbongbɛ, balakabong latɔɔk bavvoong zzeen ɔgbaa. Usinɛ ning lile nzang zzeen abbɛ layɛn mung, Latɔɔk abbɛ lappyee lagbaa. Vvenɛ ippyam abbɛ isan, bayila kwa anaam, nttulabɛ. Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔknɛ ning.’
Ɔzzánga Paul utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Asan attɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm a kuddu bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ buffɔbong ikanakana. Vvenɛ bagɔpɔlɔ!” [
Paul ulenɛ ’kwɔng livve lɛlɔɔk, balɔɔt a Jews bagbata la kɔwɔlɔ la kɔwɔlɔ bamii.]
Paul ullu baang ka likkpa liffa ka ggwoon gwa ɔtɔknɛ umini ukkpele ikkpoko. Ɔtɔk balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba baffunɛ bayɛnmɛ ka laggele.
Ukopolo utum Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lakke ammɛ. Ukopolo utum Uyini, Jesus Christ ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk ppwool ppwool ɔkkyaamɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul, bɔɔyi a Christ Jesus, Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔnɛnɛ ɔsanganɛ ɔttɛ nbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuttu-Budoddo ’kwɔng mung lisekele ɔttɛ bappyee-kutolo ammɛ bakkpɔk kwɛ ka Luvva ammɛ.
Kuttu ’kwɔng mung kutum Waan ammɛ, Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ: ka kɛfal ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt, badɔkɔ bamaatmɛ ka kikkwu a David.
Ka ulenɛ Ebinukkpaapi ɔsɛlɛ bubbi, ɔtta la lakke za lɛbaang ɔzzánga Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kifungala sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe.
Kussi ka lɛttɔ a Christ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ lakke za kɛzzanga uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ, nkwaaning nnaang Ikanakana ɔkkpɛlɛ bayila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batelemɛ.
Nkwɔng mung ɔgbaa kɔssɛ kule kwa annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba alenɛyɔng ka Rome, ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛssang ɔttɛ aleyɔng balɔɔt a Jesus Christ.

Kwakkwɛ mung nkkpɔknɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng ka Rome ba asaapnɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔyɔng lɛkkwɔɔ ɔttɛ annyɔɔng balɔɔt ammɛ: Numa Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ebinukkpaapi, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, banaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ; bannyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat.
Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, nssɛbong ka labɔɔk a Jesus Christ nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang nnyiwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ elenɛ kiyila annyɔɔng lippyee.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng asan attɛyɔng kwa nlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ntelenɛ la luppyam anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ nbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo Waan Ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ nkkewɔyɔng mung ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya nssɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm.
Nbap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ, ɔnaangnɛ vvenɛ nffu nkoolowɔyɔng gedegede mung.
Nggyan nttɛ nyɛnwɔyɔng nkwaaning nnaangwɔyɔng assɛ ayangayɔng ppyɛɛ wa ussinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng.
Nlɔɔk nttɛ anaam la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ itteleyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn, kiyila annyɔɔng vvenɛ kittelenɛ anaam, sa anaam kittelewɔyɔng annyɔɔng.

Ikpana anaam nggyan nttɛ akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ: Bikkpit biyipibong bya nnaangnɛ luttina nttɛ nffu nkoolowɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga bɔfɛɛn bule baang bwa butununɛ kiffu. Nggyan nttɛ nyanga balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ggbadam ka annyɔɔng ɔgbaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nyanganɛ ka Ikanakana.
Kɔbɛtɛnɛ kwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kwa balɔɔt ba bawongolonɛ zzeen la balɔɔt ba basinɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛsan. Kɔbɛtɛnɛ kwa balɔɔt ba basannɛ luvva la ba basinɛ luvva lɛsan.
Kwakkwɛ kɔbɛtɛnɛnɛ nttɛ nssɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng balɔɔt ba alenɛyɔng ka Rome Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Nyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam sa lɛbaang ntum Kuttu-Budoddo a Jesus Christ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lakkalanɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayanganɛ kiyila. Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, lakkala balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana ɔgbaa.

Kuttu-Budoddo kɔbwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔngɔlɔnɛ balɔɔt bataa bbwak la ammɛ. Ule kɛkɔɔm a kiyila keem ka ussinɛ ka lutte umii ɔffɔ ka lakpeke. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ bbwak la ammɛ, vvenɛ uddu.”
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbong binyanga ammɛ. Bissi ka libat biffu bivvoong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba banaangnɛ bubbi, ba babbu linaang abbɛ livvoongnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, balɔɔt basikwɛ lɛyɛn.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbongbɛ akama ka kɔlɔɔk ammɛ kwa balɔɔt busannɛ kulebɛ kpelegedee. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔnaangnɛkwɛ ɔyɔɔbɛ kkpelegedee.

Ka ussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ ɛkpansi, iggba ilemɛ ammɛ kkpelegedee lɛyɛn ya nzang businɛ likkwoong iyɛn, la lakke ammɛ za kɛfal a kɛfal ka ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔt bakkwoong mung bakɔɔlɔyɛ ka bɛfɛɛn bya ulenɛ lɛnaang. Lakkpenge lalɔk ba bayanga ffet a ffet.
Basan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔsan, ɔzzànga latele za bulenɛ za ammɛ, mɛ ba bannyi, gɔɔ vvenɛ bawomomɛ kɛnaang. Lutini ’gwɔng ittina abbɛ isseke bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, kifoloko ippyam abbɛ isseke kisul a kisul.
Battɛ abbɛ basan kɔlɔɔk, nsakalakang bazingizingi.
Lutini gwa bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa usinɛ libbe, bappyɛɛ bazɔɔm bwaan ilɔɔp bya banaangnɛbyɛ bɛbal ɔlɔɔt wa ule ubbe, ɔlɔk bunɔɔn, ɔlɔk isɛɛn a kɛmat ɔlɔk izzɔkɔ.
Balɔɔt ka balenɛ bazingizingi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyibongbɛ babbu bɛfɛɛn bya ippyam abbɛ iggyannɛ ittɛ inaang. Basseke ka banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit abbɛ abbɛ.
Bafoolobong lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusseke lɛlaak. Bappyɛɛ bazɔɔm bɛfɛɛn bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ lutini buzɔɔmnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini wa ulenɛ wa kibungu kɛfal a kɛfal! Kulening.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsambong balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ ’kwɔng mung ɔssɛɛn ka akama wa izzit. Gɔɔ bwanavva basikilibong eleme kimini la bwalam, bappyɛɛ bamini abbɛ abbɛ.

Kule kɛssanga ssɔn. Bwaanbwalam bakkyaa kikup a bwanavva bafɔngɔ, bappyɛɛ bakup abbɛ abbɛ. Balɔɔt basseke ka banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit la ba abbɛ. Vvenɛ bayɛn akama wa baggyannɛ ka babbu linaang sa banaangnɛ baang.
Balɔɔt ka balenɛ lifim kɛssɛɛn a kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa bbwak ka luppyam, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsambong babbu ittina ɔssɛɛnbɛ ka ippyam nkwaaning banaang bɛfɛɛn bya businɛ lɛnaang.
Ussekebɛ ibbyap ibbyap ka ippyam ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɛnaang a bubbi, kuwɔnɔk, izzit, basseke luleep a luleep. Bawwɔɔl balɔɔt, ballu kullu, bafɛɛt ifɛtɛ la latun, balɔɔk babbɛ ka isimi.
Balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a bubbi batum balɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛ ba ɔsaap. Bassɛɛn balɔɔt ka izzit, ɔkkyaabɛ banaang kamma. Battina itɔk ggbadam ya kɛnaang a bubbi. Ibassɛ abbɛ ba batele.
Luppyam lɔbbɔlbɛ, nsekele ba baloko. Kɔlɔɔk ba baggwoom la babbɛ. Ɔlɔɔt lɛttɔ bɛ ba ubbe.
Basan lɔsan battɛ Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lattɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng vvenɛ ubbe. Ɔzzànga basi lɛttɛ ɔkɔɔngbɛ kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang, babbal balɔɔt balɔk ba banaangnɛbyɛ libungu.

Inngwa anaam, annyɔɔng annyiyɔng mung balɔɔt balɔk kibbi ɔɔ? Lakkpenge ba ayangayɔng ffet a ffet mkkpa ale ɔlɔɔt wa ale wa ale. Bɔfɛɛn bwa annyinɛyɔng balɔɔt balɔk kibbi, annyɔɔng assɛ anaangyɔng kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn ka abbɛ banaangnɛ, awwɔɔlwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng.
Isan lɔsan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule bbwak ka unnyinɛ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kɛssanga lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung kibbi.
Inngwa anaam, annyɔɔng biini anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bya annyinɛyɔng balɔɔt kibbi ka abbyɛ. Attina attɛ vvenɛ attayɔng ka kɛkaal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ?

Vvenɛ baang afimyɔng kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ la kɛbbwa ifim sa ɔbbwanɛ ɔppyɛɛkwɔyɔng ka kibbe luppyam nsan. Asanyɔng lɔsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uggwoom kɔlɔɔk ka ubumnɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng anaangyɔng busannɛ ka bubbi bwa anaangnɛyɔng.
Keem ayangayɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam sa asinɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk lippyee. Anaangyɔngbong akama wa annyɔɔng vvenɛ ɔtta liggbenge ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang sa binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛkaal ammɛ sa bbwak kile kissolo.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule unnyi lutini ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn lɛsɔɔk ɔssanga bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ lɛnaang.
Balɔɔt balɔk banaang budoddo ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ baggyan budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la latele la kuddu kwa kusinɛ likpeke. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule unnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Balɔɔt balɔk bassɔp bɔfɛɛn. Bafim kwa kulenɛ bbwak, bakup kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ. Kwa abbɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnyanga gaang gaang la abbɛ.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba banaangnɛ bubbi, vvenɛ bayɛn akama bappyee bɔssɔp. Balɔɔt a Jews vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bayɛn akama ’wɔng baang tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛbap kɛffɛlɛ Ikanakana.
Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba banaangnɛ lilɔɔk sa liyyɛɛpnɛ budoddo ammɛ, la latele la bɔkaat. Ule ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk unnyi balɔɔt a Jews tɛ́ttɛ́ unnyi Ikanakana.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bbwak bbwak. Kilup a libbu ba kile.

Ikanakana Lafɔɔ a Moses ba bayanga, banaang bubbi bassɛ la abbwɛ, ɔzzànga kwa basinɛ Lafɔɔ a Moses liloko lissi. Balɔɔt a Jews bayanga Lafɔɔ a Moses, ka banaangnɛ bubbi bakɔɔm Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang bakaal kɛkaal abbɛ.
Kippyee Lafɔɔ lissi kɛnaangnɛ balɔɔt bataa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule kɛnaang kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ.
Ikanakana Lafɔɔ ba bayanga, ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ ya kɔsaapnɛ luppyam abbɛ, banaang kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ. Abbɛ biini balenɛ lifɔɔ abbɛ mkkpa basi Lafɔɔ lɛyanga.

Linaang abbɛ liyɔɔnɛ isan ittɛ bakkpɔkbong bwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ bassɛnbɛ ka ippyam. Ippyam abbɛ ɔgbaa iyɔɔyɛlɛ isan ittɛ nkwɔng kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ittina abbɛ innyinɛbɛ kibbi ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk, ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk ibee la abbɛ.
Ka kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuttu-Budoddo kwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛ, kùlé kúlè ning baang ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkɔɔm Jesus Christ ɔkaal kɛkaal ittina lalup a balɔɔt.
Annɔ bɛɛ? Akkwɔɔwɔ kɛyɔɔng attɛ annɔ ɔlɔɔt a Jew; kɔbɛtɛwɔ kwa Lafɔɔ, anaang kamma kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm;
asan lɔsan bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ anaang. Ɔgbaa, akkoopbong Lafɔɔ asan kwa kulenɛ bbwak.
Asan lɔsan kkpelegedee attɛ annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ bassi-ifim ɛtɔk. Annɔ alenɛ buppwolo balɔɔt ba batiinɛ ka kisul.
Annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbanɛ bazingizingi bikɔɔm, ale ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolonɛ bwɔɔntiti kɔlɔɔk. Ka ɛtɔk ya Lafɔɔ, luttina lulewɔ bɛlɛng attɛ asanbong ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ affata ɔbɛtɛ la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
Akopolo balɔɔt balɔk, bɔng asiwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng likopolo? Ka akopolonɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm attɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip.” Annɔ biini ayip mung ɔɔ?
Attɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt.” Annɔ akup mung wanavva ɔlɔɔt ɔɔ? Attɛ bwaan-ilɔɔp ɛlat ba bayɛɛp, ngkka alup bɔng alɛɛpbyɛ.
Anaang kamma ka ayanganɛ Lafɔɔ-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ngkka assɛɛn mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka izzit ka abɛpɛnɛ Lafɔɔ ammɛ ɔɔ?
Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Kussi ka annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Jews, Ikanakana balɔɔk bubbi batum lɛkɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Alokonɛ Lafɔɔ, kɛzza lɛtaa annɔ kɛyanga isak. Asinɛ Lafɔɔ liloko mkkpa ale lɛtaa lɛzza, atii tɛ̀ttɛ̀ atakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn Ikanakana ba basinɛ lɛtaa lɛzza batelenɛ kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ, attina attɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ɔtɔkbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ɔɔ?
Ikanakana bassɛɛnwɔyɔngbong annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Jews ka kɔlɔɔk ka balokonɛ Lafɔɔ mkkpa basi lataa lɛzza; annyɔɔng abɛpɛnɛyɔng Lafɔɔ mkkpa ndɔk aleyɔngzɛ lɛkkpɔk, aleyɔng lataa lɛzza.
Kkpɔɔ wa Jew ’wɔwɔng ulenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ka lɔkkwɔɔn? Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ wa Jew ka zzeen lɛtaa ammɛ kile linaang a balɔɔt lissi ulenɛ wa Jew bbwak.

Ɔlɔɔt wa Jew bbwak ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ wa Jew ka luppyam. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa luppyam ammɛ lulenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza. Uwɔng kɛnaang a Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kɛnaang a lafɔɔ za balenɛ lɛkkpɔk lissi. Ammɛ ’wɔng baang ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ ppyɛɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka balɔɔt lissi.
Ɛtɔk ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya balɔɔt a Jews battanɛ Ikanakana? Kkpɔɔ isak a kɛzza lɛtaa ilenɛ ka ’bɔng?
Ile gaang gaang ka itɔk itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ! Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ usekele balɔɔt a Jews lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a balɔɔt balɔk basinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, babɛpɛ nsekele wa banaangnɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛɛ? Attina attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔbɛpɛ nsekele kwakkwɛ baang ɔɔ?

Ning ba kule! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gbisii mkkpa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔkkala-lɛlaak. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Bale bayɔɔwɔ asan attɛ kulewɔ bbwak ka ɛkɛtɛ ale alɔɔk; Ale asan attɛ kɛkaal vvenɛ kɛyyɛɛpwɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya alenɛ ka kɛkaal assɛ.”

Mung kule kɔtaa nang, ulenɛ ka babbu linaang ayyɔɔt lippyɛɛnɛ liyɔɔyɛlɛ kkpelegedee littɛ linaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile bbwak? Ile ilɔɔk nang? Ile ittɛ Ebinukkpaapi bbwak ba ɛnaang ka ɛyɔɔyɛlɛ akama ka lɛttɔ bubbi ayyɔɔt ɔɔ? (Gedegede mung nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔɔknɛ).
Ning baang kpong-kpong ba kule! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ɔnaang nang ukkwoong ɔkaal kɛkaal a vveengodde?
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kɛkkala lalaak anaam kɛnaangnɛ lɔkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔtta kkpelegedee lɔgbaa bɛɛ? Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbalnɛ akama lɛyɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaang-a-bubbi?

Kulenɛ ning, mbɔng isinɛ lɛlɔɔk ittɛ, “Inaang bubbi nkwaaning budoddo buffu?” Balɔɔt balɔk bassɛɛnnɛbong ka izzit ka bannyinɛnɛ kibbi ka nlɔɔknɛ kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng! Vvenɛ battɔ ka kɔlɔɔk ka kulebɛ bbwak a kɛttɔ ka akkwɛ.
Mung kwa ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a Jews kɔttanɛ kwa Ikanakana lɛyyɛɛp ɔɔ? Ning baang ba kule. Nggba lɛyɔɔ nttɛ lutini Ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ bale banaang-a-bubbi; mkkpa ule wa Jews ɔlɔk wa Ikanakana.
Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak ba ule,
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔsannɛ ba ule, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bammabong basseke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bassɛɛpbong; Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ba ule, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ.
Imma abbɛ itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lilli za lilenɛ ppwool. Ibbyap a lɛlaak isseke ka ittanɛbɛ ka kamma lusso ggwɔn. Babbu lammwɔɔl lasseke ka lattanɛbɛ ka bɛkkpa-kamma tɛ̀ttɛ̀ okke ɛzzɔkɔ.
Imma abbɛ isseke lifɔk a lifɔk sa libbɔlnɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ba batɔk, baddopo balɔɔt bawwɔɔlbɛ.
Ɛfɛɛn duu ya bamiinɛ bànàang kɔlɔɔk a kɛnnyama la akama.
Ɛtɔk a bɔkaat ba bataka basan.
Gɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka zzeen bɛ ba ule.”
Gedegede mung isan lɔsan ittɛ, bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ Lafɔɔ bile bya balɔɔt ba Lafɔɔ lakɔɔmnɛbɛ, nkwaaning batunu luteele ɔssɛbibit, bakɔɔm ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu kɛkaal ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔnaangnɛ bwa lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ ba ule. Bwa Lafɔɔ lanaangnɛ ule kwa lanaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔnaangbong bubbi.
Gedegede mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbongyɛlɛ ɛtɔk ya ile ikup itaa bbwak la ammɛ. Kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang ba kule. Lafɔɔ la Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bibee ittɛɛsɛ ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang balɔɔt bataa bbwak la ammɛ ka bayilanɛ kwa Jesus Christ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbong ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uyilanɛ kwa Christ, ɔtaa bbwak la ammɛ ka bubuubuu bulɔk businɛ lile kpong-kpong.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ banaangbong bubbi; basɛlɛ ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzànga ka lɛsɔɔk a ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bassɛbong ka labɔɔk a Christ Jesus wa ɔkkalanɛbɛ, bappyɛlɛ bataa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ bawwɔɔl nkwaaning lubbe ammɛ lule ɛtɔk ya bubbi balɔɔt bùlé búlè la kɛsɔɔk, ulenɛ ka bayilanɛ kwa Jesus. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning ɔyɔɔ budoddo ammɛ. Ka isimi, ubbebong luppyam ɔfɔngɔ balɔɔt banaang bubbi.

Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ule ka ɔttɔngnɛ kɔlɔɔk a banaang-a-bubbi ɔssɛɛl usseke ɔyɔɔ bɔllɛ ammɛ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng mung. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak. Ɔgbaa ɔnaang nkwaaning isan ittɛ ɔnaang ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uyilanɛ kwa Jesus ɔtaa bbwak la ammɛ.
Ngkka mung kamma ile inaang itum ’bɔng? Bulɔk ba bule. Ifɛɛt a ’kwɔng ilenɛ ’bɔng? Mung ka itelenɛ Lafɔɔ ɔɔ? Maaye. Ule ka ile iyanga kiyila.
Itele lɛttɔ ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔ̀táà bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛyanga kiyila, ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ lissi.
Faa mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule wa balɔɔt a Jews keem ɔɔ? Ammɛ lissi ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Ikanakana ɔɔ? Kwaabong, Ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn. Vvenɛ uloko balɔɔt a Jews bbwak la ammɛ ka kiyila abbɛ. Vvenɛ ɔssɛ uloko Ikanakana bbwak la ammɛ biini ka kiyila abbɛ.
Mung ittina ittɛ ifimbong Lafɔɔ kwa kiyila ’sɔng ɔɔ? Maaye. Ning baang ba kule ffet a ffet. Lutini ’gwɔng iloko Lafɔɔ igbaa.
Ile ilɔɔkyɔng nang kwa Abraham, dedde lɔkaan ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a Jews, wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ? Bɔkka kɔlɔɔk kɔnaangmɛnɛ?
Abraham butaanɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bɛfɛɛn bya ɔnaangnɛ, nzang ɔyanga bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔnaangnɛ kamma utum. Ɔzzànga ba ukkwoong ɔnaang kamma ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Abraham uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kussi ka kiyila ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.”
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang, ɔyanga ikipili. Ikipili ammɛ baala batɔkyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛsɔɔk, batɔkyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔnaangnɛ.

Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa kɔbɛtɛmɛnɛ kwa kiyila ammɛ usseke kwa linaang, ɔzzánga uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔttɛnɛ battɔ-ka-kɔlɔɔk battabong ka akkwɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttina kwa kiyila sa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔyanganɛ ɔnaangmɛ ɔtaa bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔggyannɛ.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa David ɔlɔɔknɛ ka kɔlɔɔk a laggele ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔknɛ ɔttɛ ule bbwak, usinɛ kwa bɛnaang bɛlɔk lile. Ɔttɛ,
“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ babbu linaang abbɛ lisumala, ule bubbi abbɛ livvoong!
Laggele lale za ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule usi bubbi ammɛ liffik!”

Laggele za David, ɔlɔɔknɛ ’zɔng mung lale za balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza keem ɔɔ? Maaye. Lale za balɔɔt ba batakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ɔgbaa. Ka bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Abraham uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kussi ka kiyila ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.”
Nkwɔng mung kɔdɔkɔ kɔnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ Abraham ɔzzanɛ lɛtaa ɔɔ? Faa ka ɔtakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza? Kɔnaang ka ɔtakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza, ka ulenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza lissi.

Abraham ɔdɔkɔ ɔzza lɛtaa ka ’kwɔng kulenɛ lɛnaang. Kɛzza lɛtaa ammɛ ulenɛ kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ, ka Abraham ɔyanganɛ kiyila, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛbong ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔzza lɛtaa. Abraham ulenɛ abassɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayilanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kwakkwɛ baang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔknɛbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bbwak la ammɛ mkkpa bataka lataa lɛzza.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa ɔssɛ ule abassɛ balɔɔt ba balenɛ lataa lɛzza, ka kwa balenɛ lataa lɛzza keem lissi, bayanga kɛssanga lɛfal zzɔn ka kiyila sa dedde ayyɔɔt Abraham ɔyanganɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔzza lɛtaa.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang nsekele la Abraham la balɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ ɔttɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung ule wa ammɛ. Nsekele ’wɔng mung kwa Abraham utelenɛ Lafɔɔ, ba ɔnaang; ɔnaang ka ɔyanganɛ kiyila keem, ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a basamnɛ nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bannyi balɔɔt ba balokonɛ Lafɔɔ, ɔzzánga nzang kiyila bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ.
Lafɔɔ lanaangnɛ kɛkaal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiffu. Ɔzzànga ka ɛfɛɛn a Lafɔɔ lasinɛ lile, kɛbɛpɛ Lafɔɔ baala kile.

Nsekele ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ule ka kiyila, nkwaaning nlɔɔk-nloko ’wɔng baang ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ ka lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham. Ba unnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang keem ba batelenɛ Lafɔɔ, unnyinɛzɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayilanɛ kwa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Abraham uyilanɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka Abraham ulenɛ abassɛ balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayilanɛ.

Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Nnaangwɔbong abassɛ ifɔɔn ggbadam.” Ɔzzánga nsekele ’wɔng baang ɔyyɛɛp ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Abraham ɔyanganɛ kiyila utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalanɛ balɔɔt ka lubbe, bataa ka kuddu. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ lɛfal liffu biffu lɛfal.

Abraham ɔyanga kiyila, ɔtaa ɔkat ka ɛkɛtɛ ya usinɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile wa kɛfɔɔn a waan, ɔzzànga ɔppyɛɛ usseke “Abassɛ ifɔɔn ggbadam.” Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a kikkwu annɔ bale bayipi ning mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaanittuma ka libat.”
Ɔdɔkɔ kɛtɛkɛtɛ lalɔp a likkpa kubbwɔɔk, ɔzzànga kiyila ammɛ kisi lɛmɛɛm ka uttinanɛ ka ulenɛ lɛkkpɛɛm, kkwɔɔt ammɛ lile lɛkpɛlɛ, avva Sarah ule ulleep.
Usi kiyila ammɛ lɛkkyaa ɔfɔngɔ. Ndeeta ka luppyam usi lɛyanga utum nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kiyila ammɛ kinnyimɛ lakke ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔsan bbwak ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ukkwoong ɔnaang kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Kwakkwɛ baang kussinɛ ka kiyila sa Abraham ɔyanganɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.”
Lɛmmwɔɔl za lɛttɛnɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak” basi lɛkkpɔk kwa ammɛ keem.
Badɔkɔ bakkpɔk kwa ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa ba ule ɔtɔkyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bbwak ba iyilanɛ kwa ammɛ wa ufungalanɛ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, ka lubbe.
Basammɛ bannyi battɛ ubbe ka bubbi ayyɔɔt, ufungalamɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu; nkwaaning kɛtaa kɛyyɛɛpyɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Mung ka ilenɛ lɛssɛ ka Jesus Christ, itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiyila ayyɔɔt issɛbong issɛ ka ammɛ, Uyini ayyɔɔt, iyanga bɔkaat.
Kɔssɛ ka kiyila sa iyanganɛ, ɔnaangyɛlɛ isan kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa iddunɛ kwa assɛ. Issɛ iggele ka luttina gwa iyanganɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ iyanga lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa issɛ iggele ka lilɔɔk ayyɔɔt ka isannɛ ittɛ assɛ linaangnɛyɛlɛ ibbɔ akama.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ ka kɛbbɔ akama ayyɔɔt. Ppyɛɛ wa ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ unnyiyɛlɛ luttina.
Luttina ’gwɔng yɛlɛ ba lɔdɛm gbɔɔ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ lɛkɔɔm ɔssɛɛnyɛlɛ kɛsaap ammɛ ka ippyam ka lɛsɔɔk.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya isinɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inaangnɛ lɛsan, Christ ubbe ka bubbi ayyɔɔt ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ uloko.
Ɔlɔɔt kibbe ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kukoolo-ukoolo. Usinɛkkyam ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbbɔ mung ubbe ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ budoddo.
Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbongyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isaapmɛnɛ iffɔ. Christ ɔdɔkɔ ubbe ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka itiinɛ ka bubbi!
Lubbe ammɛ lɔdɛmbongyɛlɛ itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule usseke ikkala ya ɔkkalanɛyɛlɛ ɔfɔngɔ ka kitun a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ?
Idɔkɔ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzànga mung lubbe Waan ammɛ lɔnaangbongyɛlɛ isseke inngwa ammɛ. Anngwa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ile isaapmɛ gedegede mung wa ilenɛ inngwa ammɛ!
Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng baang keem lissi. Issɛbong ka Jesus Christ wa ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ inngwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iggele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Bubbi bwa buffunɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng mung, bussi ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn. Bubbi ammɛ bakɔɔmnɛ lubbe buffu. Kwakkwɛ baang lubbe lɔwaalanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔssɛbibit, ka ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ bubbi lɛnaang.
Bubbi budɔkɔ baang ka ɛkpansi tɛ́ttɛ́ bannyi balɔɔt Lafɔɔ; ɔzzànga ka ɛfɛɛn ya lafɔɔ lasinɛ lile, bubbi ba bakɔɔlɔ.

Lubbe lɔdɔkɔ lɔyanga likke ka ɛkpansi mung ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Uyya umii ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ a Moses. Ɔgbaa lɔyanga lakke la balɔɔt ba basinɛ bubbi lɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyya ɔnaangnɛ ka ufimnɛ Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kitele. Úyyá ɔdɔkɔ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kiffu.

Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bɛffa ba bɛbal, ka lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lisinɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwa Uyya ɔnaangnɛ lile. Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, balɔɔt ppwap babbe ka lɛttɔ bubbi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvɔn. Ɔ̀zzànga kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛttanɛ. Kibbe-lɛttɔ sa unnyinɛ ɔssɛbibit ka ibɔɔk a Jesus kɛssɛ kɛttala ning baang.

Lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bubbi ɔlɔɔt vvɔn bile buubuu. Bubbi ɔlɔɔt vvɔn budɛmnɛ “Kizzi Kibbi” kiffu. Ɔppyɛɛnɛ uffu ɔffɔ ka bubbi buttalanɛ, lɛsɔɔk za lisinɛyɛlɛ lɛkkɔnɔ liffu. Azzɛ lilenɛ “Kibbi ba Azzi!”

Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Kussi ka bubbi ɔlɔɔt vvɔn, lubbe lusseke ka lɔkɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvɔn. Kwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvɔn Jesus Christ, ulenɛ lɛnaang unnyiyɛlɛ kɔttanɛ! Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbɛ lɛsɔɔk za kɛtaa la ammɛ bbwak, vvenɛ bassɛ ka Christ bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn kɛfal a kɛfal.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bubbi ’bwɔng baang bbwɔn bulenɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛwwɔɔl; linaang ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa doddo lisangabong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk linnyibɛ kuddu.

Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ggbadam battɔnɛ ka bubbi ka kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt vvɔn usinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele, vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ ɔnaang balɔɔt ggbadam bataa la ammɛ bbwak ɔssanga latele za ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ’wɔng baang utelemɛnɛ.
Banaang Lafɔɔ nkwaaning itɔk a kɛssɛɛp iyipi. Ɔzzànga ka ɛfɛɛn a bubbi buttalanɛ, lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ lɛssɛ lɛttala baang lɛsak.

Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bubbi budɔkɔnɛ bukɔɔm lubbe, bukɔɔm ɛkpansi; lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛssɛbong lɛkɔɔm kɛsɛlɛ bubbi, lɛkɔɔm ɛkpansi, lɛsamyɛlɛ imii ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kwa itɔknɛ ka labɔɔk a Jesus Christ Uyini ayyɔɔt.
Ile ilɔɔk nang? La ilɔɔk ittɛ ikama-ɔkama inaang bubbi nkwaaning kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiggbenge kɛgbaa ɔɔ?
Ning baang ba kule. Ibbebong kwa bubbi; ile inaang nang ibbal lɛppyɛlɛ imii inaangbwɛ?
Asanyɔng mung ’kwɔng ittɛ: Ka inaangnɛ baptizim itaa ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, itulbong lubbe ggwɔn ibbe la ammɛ.
Ka banaangnɛyɛlɛ baptizim itúl lubbe ggwɔn la ammɛ ibbe, bassɛbong balliyɛlɛ la ammɛ. Ka ufungalanɛ ka lubbe ka lakke abassɛ, ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa vvenɛ issɛ iyanga ufaa kɛfal.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ayyɔɔt la ammɛ ilenɛ bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn ka lubbe ammɛ, vvenɛ issɛ ile bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn la ammɛ ka kifungala ka lubbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ufungalanɛ.
Isan mung ’kwɔng: ittɛ bawwɔɔlbong ɔtɔm a lɛfal ayyɔɔt la Christ ka Cross, nkwaaning lakke bubbi lafal ayyɔɔt labɛpɛ, ɔlɔk ifɔngɔ babili bubbi kɛbɛlɛ lile.
Ɔlɔɔt ubbenɛ ɔttabong ka lakke bubbi.
Ilenɛ libbe la Christ, iyilabong ittɛ vvenɛ issɛ itaa la ammɛ ka kuddu.
Isanbong ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalabong Christ ka lubbe, ba ɔbɛlɛ libbe. Lubbe lakke ba lɔbɛlɛ lɛyanga ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
Lubbe gwa ubbenɛ ɔdɔkɔ ubbe kwa bubbi. Ɔzzànga kuddu kwa uddunɛ gedegede mung uddu kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Issɛ ittinayɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ittɛ ibbebong kwa bubbi. Ɔzzànga iddubong kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bubbi bubɛlɛ kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lɛkɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu anaangyɔng kwa luttina lafal annyɔɔng lɔlɔɔknɛ.

Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkyaayɔng kikeep annyɔɔng kɛlɔk afɔngɔyɔng bubbi bukɔɔm bunaang ibbyap. Lutini ’gwɔng asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba balenɛbɛ ka lubbe lifungala bataa ka kuddu. Asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyimɛyɔng, ɔkɔɔmwɔyɔng ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa bbwak.
Bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ́ bubɛlɛwɔyɔng lɛkɔɔm. Kwa Lafɔɔ ba adduyɔng; adduyɔng kwa kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ile inaang nang? Inaang bubbi ka isinɛ ka Lafɔɔ lile, ile ka kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ning lissi!

Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng asamwɔnɛyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ assekeyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili ka kitele ɔlɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa atelenɛyɔng ussekenɛ ssaawɔ annyɔɔng. Mkkpa ule wa bubbi, wa kitele lɛttɔ kilé kilè lubbe. Ɔlɔk wa latele, wa kitele lɛttɔ kile kile kɛtaa bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
Ɔzzànga luwomo lule gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn adɔkɔyɔng babili bubbi, ɔzzànga ateleyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa lulenɛ ka lukopolo gwa appyeenɛyɔng la ippyam annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Basangawɔyɔng ka bubbi, assekɛyɔng babili kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.

(Nlɔɔk nnyiwɔyɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl za ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uppyeenɛ ka akoolonɛyɔng kippyee kɔlɔɔk.) Asamwɔyɔngbong kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ kkpal annyiyɔng ka bubili babbu lilɔɔk la ibbyap ka ɛtɔk a bubbi. Assɛ asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng gedegede mung annyiyɔng ka bubili kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ka ɛtɔk a budoddo.
Ka adɔkɔnɛyɔng babili bubbi, luttina gwa kɛnaang kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ asiyɔng lɛyanga.
Isak annyɔɔng ɔdɔkɔnɛ bɔng, ka anaangnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bɛnaangwɔnɛyɔng izzit gedegede mung? Kitele lɛttɔ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ulenɛ lubbe!
Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔsangawɔyɔngbong ka bubbi, assekeyɔng babili Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Isak annyɔɔng ulenɛ lɛfal za asamnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ikipili a ’kwɔng ulenɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Ikipili bubbi ulenɛ lubbe, ɔzzànga lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt.
Ikpana anaam asanyɔng lɔsan bwa nle ka nlɔɔknɛ ntum, ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asannɛyɔng lafɔɔ. Lafɔɔ lakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt ka ɛkɛtɛ ulenɛ ka kuddu.
Lafɔɔ lalokonɛ wanavva ullu walam ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ulam ubbe. Ulam ubbenɛ, wanavva ɔttabong ka lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang, za lakɔɔmnɛ killu abbɛ la ammɛ.
Ɔzzànga ullunɛ walam ɔlɔk ka walam ammɛ utiinɛ ikokolo, vvenɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ, Umini-la-walam-ɔlɔk. Ɔzzànga walam ubbenɛ, usseke wanavva wa gbɔɔ ka lakke lafɔɔ. Ullunɛ walam ɔlɔk la bubbi ba ule.

Ikpana anaam, kule ning baang la annyɔɔng. Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa assɛbong abbeyɔng, ikupnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ, ka alenɛyɔng kikkeep a kkwɔɔt a Christ. Gedegede mung aleyɔng ba ammɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, ɔttɛ nkwaaning ile balɔɔt ba doddo ka kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Itaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal ayyɔɔt lalɔɔknɛ, Lafɔɔ lafeele babbu ittina ya ilenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt isseke ba doddo ka kɛnaang a lubbe.

Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ittabong ka Lafɔɔ ka ibbenɛ innyizɛ azzɛ za ladɔkɔnɛ lakɔɔmyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ. Gedegede mung ba ibɛlɛ lɛnaang ikup kwa Lafɔɔ za bakkpɔknɛ, isseke ka inaangnɛ ikup kwa ufaa ɛtɔk wa Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Mung ile ilɔɔk nang? Ile ilɔɔk ittɛ Lafɔɔ biini lanaang bubbi ɔɔ? Ning baang lissi! ɔzzànga Lafɔɔ lanaangnɛnɛ nsan bwa bubbi bulenɛ. Lafɔɔ businɛ lɛttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkɔlɔ ikkɔlɔ” nzang nsi lɛsan bwa ikkɔlɔ ilenɛ ka luppyam.
Bubbi bussɛ la Lafɔɔ buyɛn kufuk bufeelenɛ bɛssanga ikkɔlɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka luppyam. Bubbi bule bɔfɛɛn bwa nzang bulenɛ libbe, Lafɔɔ lasinɛ lile.
Anaam biini ntaabong ikokolo kkpal ka Lafɔɔ lasinɛ lile. Lafɔɔ laffunɛ, bubbi butum bufeele buffu lɛfal.
Anaam nbbe. Lafɔɔ za ladɔkɔnɛ za kɛkɔɔm a kuddu kiffu, ka kwa anaam ladɔkɔ lappyɛɛ lakɔɔm lubbe lafeenɛ.
Bubbi bussɛ la Lafɔɔ buyanga kufuk bufɛɛtnɛ, bukɔɔm Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang buwwɔɔlnɛ.
Ka kulenɛ ning, Lafɔɔ biini bubbi ba layanga. Lafɔɔ layyɛɛp lɔyyɛɛp lale bbwak ɔgbaa.

Ngkka mung ulenɛ kɛttɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ bunaangnɛnɛ nbbe ɔɔ? Ning lissi ffet. Bubbi bunaangnɛ ning. Bukɔɔm bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ bufɛɛtnɛ. Bubbi bukɔɔm lubbe bufeenɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ basan lɛfal abbwɛ ka bulenɛ bubbi. Kwakkwɛ ikɔɔmnɛ Lafɔɔ isan ittɛ bubbi bule bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbɔlnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Isan lɔsan ittɛ Lafɔɔ layyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp. Ɔzzànga anaam ɔlɔɔt wa basammɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubili bataan bubbi.
Ba nsan bwa nnaangnɛ, ka nsinɛ lɛnaang bwa nggyannɛ nttɛ nnaang, nppyɛɛ nnaang kwa kusinɛnɛ lɛsaap.
Nnaangnɛ kwa nsinɛ lɛggyan nttɛ nnaang, ning baang nyilabong nttɛ Lafɔɔ lale bbwak.
Anaam biini lissi nnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung, bubbi bwa bullunɛ ka kkwɔɔt anaam bunaangnɛ.
Nsan lɔsan nttɛ budoddo ka tɔkɔlɔ nɛ ba bukkwoong butaa ka lɛfal anaam ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt. Mkkpa luttina gwa kɛnaang a budoddo lulenɛ baang ka tɔkɔlɔ, ba nkkwoong nnaangbwɛ.
Budoddo bwa bunaangnɛ, ba nnaang, nppyɛɛ nnaang bubbi bwa nsinɛ lɛggyan nttɛ nnaang.
Nnaagnɛ bwa nsinɛ lɛggyan nttɛ nnaang, ning baang anaam lissi nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛbwɛ, bubbi bwa bulenɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ka butaanɛ bunaangnɛ.
Ɔzzánga nkɔɔlɔ nttɛ lafɔɔ lale ka kɛnaang: Ɛkɛtɛ ya nttɛnɛ nnaang kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ, kɛnaang a bubbi kɛppyɛɛnɛ kɛttanɛ lɛsaap.
Luttina anaam luggele kwa Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzanga nppyɛɛ nyɛn kɛssanga lafɔɔ lalɔk ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt anaam. Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang lallu kullu la lafɔɔ za lasaapnɛ luppyam anaam. Lanaangnɛ nsseke ubili azzɛ za lalenɛ lafɔɔ bubbi.
Nsibong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkyaamɛnɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile! Nyinɔɔng ule ɔkkalanɛ ka kkwɔɔt ’sɔng mung lile ka lisammɛnɛ linnyi lubbe?

Nssɛbong ka Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ɔkkala-ikkala, nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang! Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛfal anaam: Anaam biini nkkwoong mung ntele Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luttina anaam keem, lɛfal anaam, ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt, litele lafɔɔ bubbi.
Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus gedegede mung ba kɔwwɔɔl ba babɛlɛ lile.
Lafɔɔ za Kuyeeng za lannyinɛyɛlɛ kuddu ka Christ Jesus lasanganɛbong ka lafɔɔ bubbi la lubbe.
Bwa Lafɔɔ lasinɛ likkwoong lanaang ka lɛfal ɔlɔɔt lɛkkpɛlɛnɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang, Ɔwwɔɔl bubbi ka lɛfal ɔlɔɔt ka ɔtɔɔmnɛ Waan ammɛ wa uffunɛ la lɛfal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ za ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi, ɔbɛtɛ bubbi.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang nkwɔng nkwaaning ayyɔɔt ba lafal ayyɔɔt lalenɛ za Kuyeeng, lasi za ɔssɛbibit lile ikkwoong inaang bwa Lafɔɔ za bbwak lalɔɔknɛ iffata.

Balɔɔt ba bataanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛfal abbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ, basambong ippyam abbɛ bannyi kwa lɛfal lɛggyannɛ. Balɔɔt ba bataanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ, basambong ippyam abbɛ bannyi kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔggyannɛ.
Asamnɛ luttina annɔ annyi kɛfal annɔ, kitele lɛttɔ akkwɛ ulenɛ lubbe. Asamnɛ luttina annɔ annyi Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kitele lɛttɔ akkwɛ ulenɛ kɛyanga kuddu la bɔkaat.
Ɔlɔɔt ule ka kɔfɔk la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔsamnɛ luttina ammɛ unnyi kɛfal ammɛ. Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba utele, gɔɔ usi likkwoong uteleze.
Balɔɔt ba batelenɛ lafal abbɛ ba bakkwoong banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng ba ataanɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal annyɔɔng lattɛnɛ ataayɔng, ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng, ulenɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulenɛ la annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ Kuyeeng a Christ lɛyanga, wa ammɛ ba ule.
Ɔzzanga Christ ɔtaanɛ la annyɔɔng, mkkpa kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng libbe ka bubbi annyɔɔng, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulenɛ kuddu annyɔɔng ka ataanɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.

Ulenɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kufungalanɛ Jesus Christ ka lubbe kɔtaanɛ la annyɔɔng, nzang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalanɛ Christ ka lubbe, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng kuddu kwa kkwɔɔt ka Kuyeeng ammɛ kulenɛ la annyɔɔng.
Ikpana anaam, iyangayɔng lafɔɔ, ɔzzanga tɛ̀ttɛ́ itaayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal ayyɔɔt laggyannɛ lattɛ itaa.
Ataanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛfal annɔ lɛggyannɛ vvenɛ abbe. Ɔzzánga akɔɔmnɛ Kuyeeng awwɔɔl babbu linaang annɔ vvenɛ addu.
Balɔɔt ba bataanɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balenɛ bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛyɔng linnyi ba kɔnaangwɔyɔng azzangayɔng babili, ɔlɔk ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng, kɔnaangwɔyɔng azzangayɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ikkwa ikkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lakke Kuyeeng ittɛ, “Dedde! Dedde anaam!”
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kutoolonɛ, la kwa ayyɔɔt, kɔyɔɔyɛlɛ kɔttɛ ayyɔɔt bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ayyɔɔt ka ilenɛ bwaan ammɛ, vvenɛ itɔk ppyɛɛ wa ulokonɛ balɔɔt ammɛ. Vvenɛ itul bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ la Christ. Iyɛnnɛ akama la Christ vvenɛ issɛ iggele la ammɛ.
Nttinanɛ akama wa iyɛnnɛ gedegede mung baala akkwoong asam akakala la laggele za ile iyɛn ka ussoonɛ.
Ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛtaabong ɛkat ɛttɛ ɛyɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ule ɛyɔɔyɛ bwaan ammɛ.
Ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛbɛpɛ esseke bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, ka kɔsaapnɛ ɛkpansi lissi, ɔzzanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ kɔtaa ning baang. Ɔzzanga luttina lutii baang
kɔttɛ kɛtɔm ssɔn vvenɛ ɔsanga ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bubili lubbe batul laggele kɛtta ka bubili za bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Isan lɔsan ittɛ ka ussinɛ bakang uffu ɔffɔ ka gedegede mung, ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ effimibong ka eppyeenɛ bɔssɔp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp a lɛmaat.

Ɛkpansi keem lissi elenɛ ka kiffimi. Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba iyanganɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛsɔɔk ammɛ za kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, issɛ iffimi ning baang ittɛ ɔnaangyɛlɛ izzanga bwaan ammɛ; ɔsangayɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bubili.
Kɛkkala ayyɔɔt kissi ka kwa ikkɔlɔnɛ. Iyɛnnɛ bwa ikkɔlɔnɛ, nzang baang ikkɔlɔ ssɔng lissi. Nyinɔɔng ɔkkɔlɔnɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ulenɛ lɛyanga?
Ikkɔlɔ bwa itakanɛ lɛyanga, ibbe luppyam itaa ikatbwɛ.

Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔssɛ kuffu kutteleyɛlɛ ning baang ka ilenɛ lɛkkpɛlɛ mung. Ba isan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bussɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kukkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiyɛlɛ, kukkpenge la akama wa asinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl likkwoong azza.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyɛnnɛ ippyam a balɔɔt ɔsan mung luttina Kuyeeng ka kukkpengenɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggyannɛ.
Isan lɔsan ittɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔnaang budoddo la balɔɔt ba batelemɛnɛ. Abbɛ balenɛ ba ammɛ biini ulenɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ka luttina ammɛ.
Balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛggba lɛsanga, ɔsangabongbɛ uloko zzekep basseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Waan ammɛ, nkwaaning ule ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a ikpana ammɛ ggbadam.
Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ulenɛ lɛsanga uloko zzekep. Balɔɔt ba ulenɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ɔssɛ ulokobɛ bbwak la ammɛ biini. Ba ulokonɛbɛ la ammɛ biini bassɛ batul kibeet ammɛ.
Nkwɔng ka kulenɛ ning mung, ile ilɔɔk nang? Ulenɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ la ayyɔɔt, nnyinɔɔng ule ukkwoong ulokoyɛlɛ kɔfɔk?
Waan ammɛ ka isimi usi lɛsam uloko. Ɔsammɛ unnyi ka lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka unnyinɛyɛlɛ Waan ammɛ, vvenɛ ɔssɛ unnyiyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛsɔɔk ɔɔ?
Nyinɛ ule unnyi balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ kibbi? Ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔttɛnɛ kibbi ba bataka bazzi!
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa ule ukkwoong ɔwwɔɔlbɛ ɔɔ? Christ Jesus ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ubbenɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe, ɔtaa ka kuddu ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ. Ammɛ ukkpengenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiyɛlɛ!
Mung nnyinɛ ule ukkwoong utunu kɛsaap a Christ ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt? Kɛggyan a kɔlɔɔk kikkwoong mung ɔɔ? Faa akama? Faa buwɔɔng? Faa ibbɔl? Faa lubbe?
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ile ka akama lubbe ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ annɔ; Bayɔɔyɛlɛ akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ya bale ka bawwɔɔlnɛ.”
Ɔzzanga ning baang ba kule. Lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ibɛtɛsɛ lɔbɛtɛ ka lakke Ammɛ wa isaapmɛnɛ.

Nsanbong nttɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa bukkwoongnɛ buggbayɛlɛ ka kɛsaap ammɛ ba bule; mkkpa ule lubbe gɔɔ kuddu; gɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; gɔɔ bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn ka libat; gɔɔ lakke gɔɔ kɛkkpa kɛssɛ; mkkpa ule gedegede mung gɔɔ ussoonɛ;
Mkkpa ule vveeng wa libat gɔɔ wa kuttɔɔk. Bulɔk ba bule bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ bwa bule bukkwoong butunuyɛlɛ ka kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, unnyinɛyɛlɛ.
Kwa nlɔɔknɛ kulɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn, anaam wa Christ, lɛlaak ba nkkala. Luttina anaam ka lulenɛ ka kɛkɔɔm a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔnaangnɛnɛ nsan nttɛ lɛlaak ba nkkala.
Akama ɔttalanɛbong. Akama wa ule usinɛ lɛsaal ka luppyam
utum balɔɔt anaam. Abbɛ balenɛ ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt la linnyi anaam! Ka lɛttɔ abbɛ, kɔsaapnɛ mung ka nzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaanɛnɛ nsi wa Christ lɛbɛlɛ lile.

Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ. Ammɛ ɔnaangnɛbɛ basseke bwaan ammɛ batul laggele la kibeet ammɛ bazzi. Ɔbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ la abbɛ, unnyibɛ Lafɔɔ. Abbɛ bazɔɔmnɛ luzɔɔm gwa lɔkkwɔɔn. Batɔkbong bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ.
Bassi ka kikkwu ɔlɔɔt a latele. Christ ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔssɛ ussi ka kikkwu abbɛ. Numa kibungu sa kɛfal a kɛfal kile sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ! Kulening.
Ba nlɔɔk nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usibong nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ liloko; ka usinɛ balɔɔt a Israel ɔkkpɛlɛ lile balenɛ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
Gɔɔ balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi balenɛ bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Abraham ɔttɛ, “Bwaan a kikkwu Isaac bale bakkwɔɔbɛ ba annɔ.”
Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛttɛ bwɔɔntiti ba bamaatnɛbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bamaatnɛ bwɔɔntiti ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi balenɛ bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ba bamaatnɛbɛ ka nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balenɛ balɔɔt a kikkwu sa bbwak.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nsekele ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang la lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng ɔttɛ, “Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ya nle nppyɛlɛ nffu, Sarah vvenɛ ɔmaat waanawalam.”
Ɔzzànga nkwɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ akkwɛ lissi. Bwaan a Rebecca baffa bayanga abassɛ vvɔn wa ulenɛ Isaac, ɔgɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ.

Ka kulenɛ kɛttɛ nkwaaning kɛsanga waan vvɔn kile kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Rebecca ɔttɛ, “Utumalɔɔt vvenɛ ɔtaa bubɔɔyi ɔlɔɔt wa utiinɛ waan.” Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔkbong nkwɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatbɛ. Gɔɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ banaang ubbu-kɔlɔɔk la bɛllɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangabɛ ka kɔsaapmɛnɛ usibɛ lɛsanga ɔssanga kwa abbɛ biini banaangnɛ.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Jacob ɔsaapnɛnɛ, Esau utunnɛ.”
Ngkka mung ile ilɔɔk nang? Ile ilɔɔk ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔyyɛɛp ɔɔ? Ning lissi.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Moses ɔttɛ, “Nle nsɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaapnɛnɛ la ɔlɔɔt wa ule ubbenɛ lɛttɔ.”
Kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba kɛssanga ka bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔggyannɛ ɔlɔk ɔnaang, kule ka kɛsaap sa isaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk la Pharaoh lɔttɛ, “Nnaangwɔ ubeet ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung. Nttɛ nkɔɔmwɔ nyɔɔ lakke anaam. Nnaang basannɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ a vveengodde.”
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanga kibbe-lɛttɔ la balɔɔt ba basaapmɛnɛ. Ɔnaang balɔɔt balɔk kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ basi kɔlɔɔk lɛbɛlɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ.
Ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Nkwɔng kulenɛ ning mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang nang unnyi balɔɔt kibbi? Nyinɛ ule ukkwoong utunu luttina Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?”
Ɛnngwa anaam, annɔ alenɛ nnyinɛ wa ale appyɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kamma. Ekpekele-kɛbat baala ekkwoong ɛbap ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaaknɛyɛ ɛttɛ, “Anaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ asaaknɛ ning mung?”

Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ ekkpo ukkwoong mung ɔkɔɔm kɛbat-igbele ’sɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapmɛnɛ. Ukkwoong mung ɔkɔɔm likkpɔ-kɛbat zzɔn ɔnaang ikkpo iffa. Nnyɔn ka kɛtɔm lɛkkɔ za ning, ya nnyɔn bakɔɔmyɛ a gbɔɔ.
Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn ka lɔkkwɔɔn la kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔyɔɔ kitun a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ, ɔnaang basan lakke ammɛ. Ubbe luppyam la balɔɔt ba kɔlɔɔk kutunmɛnɛ la abbɛ, ule ka ɔwwɔɔlnɛbɛ.
Ɔggyan ɔttɛ iyɛn latele ammɛ za lɛbaang za ɔllɔtnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba ibbemɛnɛ lɛttɔ, ile lɛbama.
Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba ɔkkwɔɔnɛ, ka balɔɔt a Jews keem lissi ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ, ɔssɛ ɔkkwɔɔ ka Ikanakana ɔgbaa.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ ka luvva Hosea ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba badɔkɔnɛ basi ba anaam lile, vvenɛ nkkwɔɔbɛ ‘Balɔɔt-anaam.’ Lɔkaan gwa lɔdɔkɔnɛ lusi lɛsaap, vvenɛ nkkwɔɔgwɛ ‘Bɛsaap-anaam.’
Ka ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ’yɔng baang ya babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ battɛ, ‘Annyɔɔng balɔɔt anaam lissi.’ Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a bale bakkwɔɔbɛ bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm-a-kuddu.”
Isaiah ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a Israel ppwool ɔttɛ, “Mkkpa balɔɔt a Israel bayipi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kususuk ka lɔyɔngɔ, bwaan a balɔɔt ssup bale baddu.
Uyini ule ɔkka kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ litini la vveengodde.”
Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Isaiah ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ulenɛ ka Uyini wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ usinɛyɛlɛ balɔɔt a kikkwu balɔk liloko, nzang ile itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Sodom la Gomorrah.”
Ile ilɔɔk ittɛ nang? Ile ilɔɔk ittɛ: balɔɔt ba basinɛ libum battɛ bataa ka budoddo la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔdɔkɔ ussi ka kiyila bataa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Balɔɔt ba basanganɛbɛ ba balenɛ ka kɛggyan a lafɔɔ za lale lalokobɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, basizɛ lɛyɛn.

Mbɔng bunaangnɛ basizɛ lɛyɛn? Basizɛ lɛyɛn ka kwa banaangnɛ kutumnɛ linaang kusi kiyila litum. Basilibong ka lɛttaal za luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Pyɛɛk nlokobong lɛttaal ka Zion za lile lɛnaang balɔɔt basili, lɛttaal za lile lɛnaang balɔɔt battɔ. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa anaam baala nfimmɛ.”
Ikpana anaam nkkɔlɔ ka luppyam gaang gaang nttɛ, balɔɔt anaam baddu. Nzɔɔm nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛttɔ abbɛ.
Nkkwoong mung nbeebɛ ttɛɛsɛ ka batelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gaang gaang, ɔzzànga ba basan ɛtɔk ya ssɔng ya batelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ba bataka basan ɛtɔk ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ balɔɔt bbwak la ammɛ biini. Babumbong kɛyanga ɛtɔk ya abbɛ, kwakkwɛ bafimnɛ ɛtɔk ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ balɔɔt bbwak la ammɛ.
Christ ɔkkpabong lattɔ Lafɔɔ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa ammɛ ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa Moses ɔkkpɔknɛ utum, kɛtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiloko Lafɔɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ vvenɛ uddu kwa azzɛ.”
Ɔzzànga nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ utum kɛtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛyanga kiyila. “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ alɔɔk attɛ ‘Nyinɛ ule umii ka libat?’ (NIng baang ulenɛ kisini Christ kiffu kuttɔɔk.)
Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ alɔɔk attɛ, ‘Nyinɛ ule umii ka vveeng wa kuttɔɔk?’ ” (Ning baang ulenɛ kifungala Christ ka lubbe.)
Kwa kɔlɔɔknɛ ulenɛ, “Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litiiwɔ kɛtɛkɛtɛ ka bɛkkpa kamma la luppyam.” Uwɔng baang ulenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a kiyila za ikopolonɛ.
Alɔɔknɛ ppwool ka kamma annɔ attɛ, “Jesus ulenɛ Uyini,” ayila ka luppyam annɔ attɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe, vvenɛ addu.
Iyanganɛ kiyila ka ippyam ayyɔɔt, itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ilɔɔk pwool ka kamma ayyɔɔt, ile ba kɛkkala.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa ammɛ, mɛ baala ufim.”
Nkwɔng mung kule kwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka balɔɔt a Jews basinɛ buu lile la Ikanakana. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule Uyini wa ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔnaang balɔɔt ba bakupmɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkkwɔɔnɛ lɛkɔɔl Uyini vvenɛ ule la kɛkkala.”
Ngkka mung bale banaang nang bakkwɔɔmɛ ka batakanɛ kiyila lɛyanga? Bale banaang nang bayanga kiyila ka batakanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl lippyee? Bale banaang nang bappyee basinɛbɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛbwɔɔlɔ?

Mung bale banaang nang babwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang basinɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm lɛtɔɔm bamii ka vveeng babwɔɔlɔ? Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Kiffu balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bakɔɔmnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu kɛyyɛɛp gaang.”
Ɔzzànga kwa Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ba bataka bayila. Isaiah biini ɔttɛ, “Uyini, Nyinɔɔng uyilanɛ kwa lɛmmwɔɔl ayyɔɔt?”
Kiyila kissi ka kippyee lɛmmwɔɔl za ɔtɔɔmnɛ. Ɔzzànga lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka lukopolo gwa bakopolonɛ batum Christ.

Ɔzzànga mbap nttɛ, “Mung kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang ba bataka bappyee ɔɔ?” Bappyeebong. Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Lɛmmwɔɔl abbɛ lɛwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi, Lammwɔɔl abbɛ lamii laddum ka lakpeke ɛkpansi.”

Nbbal lɛbap nttɛ, Balɔɔt a Israel basi lɛsan ɔɔ? Moses biini uttenɛ kamma lɛppyɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nnaangwɔyɔng anaangyɔng luleep la balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba lɔkaan ’gwɔng lile. Vvenɛ nnaangwɔyɔng kutunwɔyɔng la lɔkaan a bazingizingi.”
Isaiah ɔttanɛ luppyam lɛkkaam, ka ɔttɛnɛ, “Balɔɔt ba basinɛnɛ lɛggyan battɔngnɛnɛ Ntuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ba batakanɛnɛ lɛggyan.”
Ɔlɔɔk kwa kutumnɛ Israel ɔttɛ, “Ntɔnɔ labɔɔk anaam kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ nkkwɔɔ, basi-kɔlɔɔk-lippyee la baggyan-a-kɔlɔɔk a balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.”
Nbap nttɛ: Mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufim mung balɔɔt ammɛ ɔɔ? Usibɛ lifim! Anaam biini mung wa Israel, wa kikkwu Abraham, wa nssinɛ ka ɛsam a Benjamin.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtaka usumala balɔɔt ammɛ ba ɔggbanɛ lɛsanga ka lutte. Asanyɔng lɔsan bwa luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Elijah ukkpengenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɔlɔɔk a Israel.
Ɔttɛ, “Uyini, bawwɔɔlbong bappyee-kutolo annɔ, basam labun annɔ babɛpɛ. Ussekenɛ anaam kɛyɔɔng ka nssekenɛ, ɔzzànga mung babumnɛ kɛwwɔɔl.”
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kamma ɔdɔkɔ ɔppyɛlɛmɛ nang? “Nsangabong innɔ balɔɔt zzilliffa la kufaak ba batakanɛ lɛzɔɔm bannyi Baal nloko.”
Kɔssɛ kule ning baang gedegede mung: Bwaan a balɔɔt bale ssup ning ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga ka kibbe-lɛttɔ ammɛ.
Kɛsanga sa ɔsanganɛ kɔssɛ ka kibbe-lɛttɔ sa balɔɔt babbemɛnɛ, ka kwa balɔɔt banaangnɛ lissi. Ulenɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ balɔɔt ɔssanga ka kwa banaangnɛ, nzang kibbe-lɛttɔ ammɛ sa lɔkkwɔɔn lissi.

Bɔng bunaangnɛ? Balɔɔt a Israel basi lɛyɛn bwa baggyannɛ. Ɔdɔkɔ ule bwaan a balɔɔt ning ssup ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga ka bayɛnnɛ bwa baggyannɛ. Ba bassekenɛ bassi latɔɔk za kisi kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛbɛlɛ lippyee.
Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbɛ bazɔɔlɔ ka ippyam la ittina tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn mung. Ka zzeen ba babɛlɛ lɛyɛn, gɔɔ kippyee ka latɔɔk.”
David ɔttɛ, “Numa bakaabɛ ka laggele abbɛ, numa battɔ, numa bayɔɔbɛ akama!
Numa zzeen abbɛ lavvoong nkwaaning basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn. Ɔnaangbɛ bassɛɛl lilɔɔk abbɛ ka ippyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Nbap nttɛ: Ka ɛkɛtɛ balɔɔt a Jews battɔnɛ, battɔ bataak lɛkɔɔl ɔɔ? Ning kusi lile ffet a ffet! Kɛnaang a bubbi sa banaangnɛ kɛdɛmnɛ kuddu kuffu kukup Ikanakana nkwaaning luleep lɔnaang balɔɔt a Jews.

Bubbi balɔɔt a Jews bukɔɔmbong ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang buffu ka vveeng. Ɔzzànga kɛttɔ sa battɔnɛ ka lakke kuyeeng kɛkɔɔmbong ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang kifee ikaan ilɔk. Ppyɛɛ ’wɔng mung vvenɛ uggbenge ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt a Jews ɔkkpɛlɛ bale bassɛ bale ka akkwɛ.
Gedegede mung nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng Ikanakana nttɛ: Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ anaam lɛtɔɔm ɔttɛ nffu nkopolowɔyɔng, vvenɛ ɔkkyaanɛ ka kɛnaang anaam.
Usinɛkkyam vvenɛ nnaang balɔɔt a lɔkaan anaam biini banaang luleep, nkwaaning nkkwoong nkkala balɔk.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufimnɛ balɔɔt a Israel, ɔtɔk balɔɔt Ikanakana bazzanga inngwa ammɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt a Israel bale bappyɛlɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, ɔtɔkbɛ; vvenɛ bayanga kuddu lutini lubbe.
Ulenɛ ka ezuku a brɛɛd ya ikeeng elenɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ugɔngɔ uwɔlɔlɔ ɔssɛ ule wa ammɛ ɔgbaa; ulenɛ ka basamnɛ bɛbɔɔk a bɛssɛ bya lisse bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bɛbɔɔk bya libat bɛssɛ bile ammɛ ɔgbaa.

Bɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ Olive wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ bɛlɔk bya libat bɛyaakbong bɛttɔ. Basambong kɛbɔɔk Olive sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp basingili baang. Annyɔɔng Ikanakana assɛ aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛssɛ Olive ’sɔng baang sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung atulyɔngbong lakke, la iyyɛɛp a kuddu balɔɔt a Jews ayangayɔng.

Ka kulenɛ ning, tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛyɔng annyɔɔng attanɛyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba battɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ. Ule ɔkkyaawɔyɔng kwa bɔng? Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ sa libat. Ba akkwoong alɔmyɔng iffaat alokoyɔng. Ule iffaat keem ka ikkwoongnɛ ilɔmwɔyɔng annyɔɔng iloko.
Ɔzzànga vvenɛ alɔɔk attɛyɔng, “Iii bɛbɔɔk Olive ’byɔng baang bɛyaak bɛttɔ nkwaaning iyanga kufuk.”
Nkwɔng kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Bayaakbyɛ ballɔt ka basɛlɛnɛ kiyila. Bafɔngɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ataayɔng ka ayanganɛyɔng kiyila. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkyaawɔyɔng kwakkwɛ, lutini ’gwɔng ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi balɔɔt a Jews ba balenɛ bɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ bya lɔkkwɔɔn lɛfakala ɔfɔngɔ, attina attɛyɔng vvenɛ ɔfakalawɔyɔng annyɔɔng ɔfɔngɔ ɔɔ?

Uwɔng ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn isannɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk ɔssɔp kɔlɔɔk. Ɔssɔp kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛttɔ, uggwoom kɔlɔɔk la annyɔɔng; alenɛ ka anaangnɛyɔng kwa uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk la annyɔɔng tɔttɔt. Ɔzzànga asinɛyɔng lɛnaang kwa ule uggwoom kɔlɔɔk la annyɔɔng tɔttɔt, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyaakwɔyɔng ɔzzɔɔk.
Balɔɔt a Jews bakkyaanɛ kɛsɛlɛ kiyila abbɛ bafɔngɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ulokobɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a badɔkɔnɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanga lakke za kɛppyɛlɛbɛ kiloko ka ɛfɛɛn a badɔkɔnɛ.

Annyɔɔng Ikanakana aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ Olive sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp basamsɛ basingili la sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ ka lagabwɔ. Balɔɔt a Jews bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mɛ ba kukoolo kɛppyɛlɛ kisingili bɛbɔɔk bya bɛyaaknɛ bɛttɔ ka lasan abbyɛ.

Ikpana anaam, likup lile baang za lɔkkwɔɔn za nggyannɛ nttɛ asanyɔng. Vvenɛ lɛnaangwɔyɔng asiyɔng lɛbɛlɛ littina attɛ asanyɔng kɔlɔɔk. Uwɔng ulenɛzɛ azzɛ: Kissi latɔɔk a balɔɔt a Israel baala kittumu. Ɔzzanga vvenɛ kile kittumu baang tɔttɔt Ikanakana baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baggba ka lukkwoon.

Ɔzzànga uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale bakkala balɔɔt a Israel ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔkkala ikkala ule ussi ka Zion uffu, vvenɛ utunu bɛssanga ibbyap ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kikkwu a Jacob.
Vvenɛ ibɛtɛ kɛnnɔ la abbɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nkkyaa bubbi abbɛ nfɔngɔ.”

Balɔɔt a Jews ka balenɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lifim, basseke ka kɔfɔk la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng Ikanakana. Ɔzzànga ka kulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛffɔ kɔsaap, basseke inngwa ammɛ ka lɛttɔ ibassɛ abbɛ ya iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm luttina ammɛ ba lufoolo ka balɔɔt ba ulenɛbɛ lɛsanga ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ.
Kwa annyɔɔng Ikanakana, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm asiyɔng litele ka isimi ka isimi, ɔzzànga gedegede mung atɔkyɔngbong kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka balɔɔt a Jews bafimnɛnɛ kitele.
Ka kulenɛ ning mung, kibbe-lɛttɔ sa annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng lɛyanga kɛnaangbong balɔɔt a Jews bafim kitele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ ɔlɔk bassɛ bayanga kibbɛ-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnbong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basimɛnɛ litele igbakkɔpɔ nkwaaning ɔyɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyyɛɛp bɛnaang la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan a kɔlɔɔk wa lɔkkwɔɔn. Nyinɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɔnngwa ammɛ! Nyinɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔsan itɔk ammɛ!
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Nyinɛ ɔsannɛ luppyam Uyini? Nyinɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔbbamɛ bikɔɔm?
Nyinɔɔng ulemɛnɛ bɔfɛɛn linnyi kkpal bwa ammɛ ule ɔppyɛlɛ unnyi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang?”
Ammɛ ɔlɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛyanga kuddu, ka lakke ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bya ammɛ. Latele lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛfal a kɛfal! Kulening.

Ikpana anaam, nkkpengewɔyɔng ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛttalanɛ nttɛ: Asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng anaangyɔng bigwugwulu annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ataanɛyɔng ning baang kɔsaapmɛ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ ɛtɔk ya bbwak ya kitele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akupyɔng ileme la linaang a vveengodde. Afɔngɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufoolowɔyɔng ippyam ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning akkwoong asanyɔng luttina ammɛ, gwa lɔyyɛɛpnɛ, lɔsaapmɛ, lule bbwak ɔgbaa.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulenɛnɛ oyyoyyo lɛsɔɔk linnyi, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ; Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka buggboggbo asakyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng attinayɔng kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ, ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uffikmɛ kɛyɔɔng ukup kiyila sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ linnyi.
Iyangayɔng bikkeep ggbadam ka kkwɔɔt ssɔn, ɔzzanga bikkeep ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛyanga bɛnaang buubuu.
Ka kulenɛ ning mung, mkkpa iyipiyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyipinɛ mung, iyangayɔng kkwɔɔt ssɔn la Christ. Ɔzzànga itoolobongyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛssanga bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ssɔn.
Ikɔɔmyɔng bɛssanga ikkɔ́ ayyɔɔt buubuu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi. Íkkɔ́ ayyɔɔt ulenɛyɛlɛ ya kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl, ibwɔɔlɔzɛ ka kiyila sa iyanganɛ.
Íkkɔ́ ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ya kittele balɔɔt, ittelebɛ. Ilenɛyɛlɛ ya lukopolo, ikopolobɛ.

Ilenɛ ya kɛbba balɔɔt bikɔɔm, ibbabɛ bikɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu ɔbɛngɛlɛ bwa ɔyanganɛ la wabbɛ. Ɔbɛngɛlɛbwɛ ka kɛsaap la laggele. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uzzinɛlɛttɔ, ɔnaang kɛnaang kɛbɛtɛmɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk, uggwoom ning baang la laggele. Ɔyanga lakke ɔnaang kɛnaang ammɛ bbwak. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ, ɔyangasɛ bbwak.
Kɛsaap kɛfɔngɔ sa ɛdda kile. Fim kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ. Anaang kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsaapwɔyɔng ka alenɛyɔng ka bukpana ka Christ. Kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng ka kitele waanyɔɔng.
Anaangyɔng kɛnaang kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkpɛlɛyɔng. Assɛɛnyɔng luttina ka kɛnaang Uyini.
Ittina annyɔɔng ilokowɔyɔng ka laggele. Abbeyɔng luppyam ka lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Azɔɔmyɔng luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Abɛngɛlɛ bwa ayanganɛyɔng la ikpana annyɔɔng ya businɛbɛ lile. Atɔkyɔng ukekeen ɔlɔɔt assɛɛnyɔng ka ssala.
Akkpengeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang balɔɔt ba bayɔɔwɔnɛyɔng akama ppyɛɛ; iii, akkpengemɛyɔng ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔfɔngɔbɛ nkpat kɛnaang.
Aggeleyɔng la balɔɔt ba baggelenɛ, akkwayɔng la balɔɔt ba bakkwanɛ.
Ayɔɔyɔng kɛssanga eleme ssɔn la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɛnwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Ayilayɔng bukee. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basan a kɔlɔɔk.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng bubbi, tɛ̀ttɛ́ apipilimɛyɔng. Abum anaangyɔng kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uttinanɛ ɔttɛ kule bbwak.
Annyɔɔng abum anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ale ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Inngwa anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ apipiliyɔng ipipili, lutini ’gwɔng afɔngɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm upipili ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛnɛ, “Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛ, ‘Anaam vvenɛ npipili, vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ nnyi.’ ”
Anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ. Lɔttɛ: “Buwɔɔng busaapnɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ, annyimɛ kazzi uzzi. Bannyi basaapmɛnɛ, annyimɛ ɔvva. Ka anaangnɛ ning baang addomɛ a lɔkɔɔn ka lɛttɔ.”
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng bubbi bubɛtɛwɔyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng annyɔɔng abɛtɛyɔng bubbi ka kɛnaang a budoddo.
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn utele bazzi-lɛttɔ ɛkpansi. Lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ lassi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ bazzi-lɛttɔ ɛkpansi ba iyɛnnɛ mung.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ kwa bazzilɛttɔ, ufimbong kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ litini. Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ ɔggyanbong kɛkaal unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng.

Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ budoddo, bazzi-lɛttɔ ɛkpansi bɛ ba babbwɔpɔ. Bazzi-lɛttɔ babbwɔpɔ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi. Kɔsaapwɔyɔng mung ka uzzilɛttɔ ɔbbwɔpɔnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Kusiwɔnɛyɔng lɛsaap, anaangyɔng budoddo usseke ubunguwɔyɔng.

Ammɛ ulenɛ bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ka budoddo annyɔɔng. Ɔzzànga anaangnɛyɔng bubbi, ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, lakke ammɛ za kɛyɔɔ ɔlɔɔt akama lale ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ammɛ ulenɛ bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsamnɛ kitun a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufee balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba banaangnɛ bubbi.
Kwakkwɛ ale ateleyɔng bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi, ka kwa kitun kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi, ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔtan annyɔɔng lɔttɛnɛ ateleyɔngbɛ.
Bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi banaang kɛnaang bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kwakkwɛ baang annyinɛyɔng innamba.
Atakbɛ bwa alenɛbɛ la ippwoot. Akkpɛɛyɔng innamba ya annyɔɔng la ya bɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng. Ɔzzànga annyiyɔngbɛ latele ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ azziyɔng wannyɔɔng ippwoot. Ippwoot ya ayanganɛyɔng ulenɛ kɛyanga kɛsaap la wannyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa wabbɛ ɔsaapmɛnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulokobong Lafɔɔ.

Lafɔɔ za lattɛnɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl balɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip ssip; tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkɔlɔ bɔfɛɛn a wannyɔɔng.” Ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ mung la lalɔk za latiinɛ bakang, lale ka lifɔɔ zzɔn za lɛttɛnɛ, “Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
Ɔlɔɔt duu wabbɛ ɔsaapmɛnɛ, bubbi mɛ baala ɔnaang. Kɛyanga kɛsaap la wannyɔɔng ulenɛ kiloko Lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Anaangyɔng ’kwɔng mung ka asannɛyɔng liggbili. Liggbili lɛffɔbong za afungalanɛyɔng ka bulaa. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bale ka bakkalanɛyɛlɛ elenɛ lɛtta lɛkkɛtɛ ɛtta ɛkɛtɛ ya iggɔnɔggɔ iyanga kiyila.
Kisul kile ka kɛsaalnɛ. Kikoon kitii kɛtɛkɛtɛ mung. Ikkyaayɔng kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn a kisul ifɔngɔyɔng, isam bɛfɛɛn a kullu illu ka buppwolo.
Ikɔɔmyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng bbwak. Kikup a bwanavva kɛfɔngɔ kile, ɔlɔk kibimi. Ibbyap ifɔngɔ kile la kɛnaang a kɔlɔɔk kitum ɔlɔɔt. Kullu kɔfɔngɔ kile, gɔɔ luleep.
Akkimyɔng bɛfɛɛn a lɛkɔɔng a Uyini Jesus Christ afɔngɔyɔng kɛnaang a bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal annyɔɔng laggyannɛ.
Atɔkyɔng ɔlɔɔt duu assɛɛnyɔng ka bɛzzɔkɔ mkkpa kiyila ammɛ kisi lɛkkaam. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akangalayɔng ikangala la ammɛ atumyɔng kwa uttinanɛ.
Kiyila ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kɛfɔngɔmɛ mung uzzi bɛfɛɛn duu, ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa kiyila ammɛ kisinɛ lɛkkaam, uzzi livva keem.
Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkpɛn ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lizzi. Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ livva keem, tɛ̀ttɛ́ unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ bɔfɛɛn duu kibbi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛbong.
Annɔ alenɛ nyinɔɔng wa annyinɛ bɔɔyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kibbi? Ule abassɛ ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ule utini ɔttɛ, ukumbong, ɔlɔk ɔttɔbong ka kɛkaal. Ɔzzánga vvenɛ ukum ka kɛkaal ka Uyini ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaangmɛ ukum.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn uttina ɔttɛ kɛtɔm kɛlɔk kile baang sa kɛttanɛ bɛtɔm bɛlɔk liggbenge. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uttina ɔttɛ bɛtɔm bile kɛssanga ssɔn. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔnaang luttina gwa lɔkkaamnɛ.

Ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ gaang gaang kwa kɛtɔm ssɔn, ɔnaang ning baang ka latele Uyini. Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ bɔfɛɛn duu, uzzibwɛ ka latele Uyini, ka uwomonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka kazzi kwa uzzinɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang kizzi, ufim ka latele Uyini, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔgbaa.
Ɔlɔɔt wa uddunɛ unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng ba ule, ɔlɔɔt wa ubbenɛ kɛyɔɔng ba ule.
Iddunɛ, iddu kwa Christ. Ibbenɛ, ibbe kwa Christ. Mkkpa itaa ka kuddu ɔlɔk ibbe, ile ba Christ.
Christ ubbe, ufungala ka lubbe, ɔtaa ka kuddu, nkwaaning ule Uyini bakokolo la babbu.

Annyɔɔng wa azzinɛyɔng livva keem, mbɔng annyɔɔng annyinɛyɔng wannyɔɔng kibbi? Annyɔɔng wa azzinɛyɔng bɔfɛɛn duu, mbɔng attinanɛ attɛyɔng wannyɔɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ? Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt vvenɛ ibee ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaalyɛlɛ kɛkaal.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Uyini ɔttɛ, ‘Ka nlenɛ lule mung, ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn vvenɛ ukunnɛ laddu ka lusso, ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.’ ”
Kwakkwɛ ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ule ɔbwɔɔlɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔk a lɛfal ammɛ biini.
Ka kulenɛ ning, ikkyaayɔng kinnyi balɔɔt kibbi ifɔngɔ. Lutini ’gwɔng inaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kule kusi waanyɔɔng lɛdɛm ɔnaang bubbi.

Bɔkaat anaam la Uyini Jesus bunaangnɛnɛ nsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, bɔfɛɛn a kazzi bwa businɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛyɔɔng abbwɛ ba bule. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang ba buyyɛɛp, mɛ baala buyyɛɛp.
Adɛmnɛ wannyɔɔng uddopo ɔssanga kwa bɛfɛɛn bwa azzinɛ, asibongkwɛ ka kɛsaap lɛnaang. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayila kazzi kwa azzinɛ kɛnaang ɔlɔɔt wa Christ ubbenɛ ka lɛttɔ ammɛ ɔyɛn akama.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔ bwa attinanɛ attɛ buyyɛɛp mung buyanga ubbu lɛkɔɔl.
Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kazzi la kɛvva lissi. Ile ka kɛsɛlɛ bubbi la kɛyanga bɔkaat, la laggele. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uttelenɛ Christ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng, ɔtɔk laggele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la budoddo balɔɔt.
Ɔzzánga inaang luttina itum bɛfɛɛn bya bile bɛkɔɔm bɔkaat biffu bittele ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔyanga lakke.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛpɛyɔng bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang kwa kazzi. Akkwoong mung azziyɔng lizzi ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga ba kɔyyɛɛp ka ale azziyɔng kazzi kwa kale kanaang wannyɔɔng ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
Kwa kule kɔyyɛɛp ule ka ale asiyɔng ɛsɛɛn lɛbɛlɛ lizzi, asiyɔng batak lɛbɛlɛ lɛvva, asiyɔng kɔlɔɔk duu lɛnaang, ulenɛ ka bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bile bɛnaang wannyɔɔng ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
Alokoyɔng kwa ayanganɛ kiyila atumyɔng kɔlɔɔk nkwɔng mung ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Laggele lale za ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ littina ɔttɛ ammɛ ubbu ɔlɔɔt ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ kɔyyɛɛpmɛ mung!
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa udeetanɛ kwa bwa uzzinɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔwwɔɔlmɛ uzzinɛbwɛ ka ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ka linaang ammɛ. Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa anaangnɛ ka asɛlɛ kiyila, nzang baang bubbi.
Ayyɔɔt ba kiyila ayyɔɔt kɛkkaamnɛ ilenɛ ba buttelenɛ balɔɔt ba kiyila abbɛ kisinɛ lɛkkaam batɔkɔ latɔkɔ abbɛ. Ifɔngɔyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt biini kɛnaang ɔwaayɛlɛ.
Lutini ’gwɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔnaang wabbɛ ɔwaamɛ ka budoddo ammɛ biini nkwaaning ɔnaangmɛ ɔkkaam ka kiyila.
Christ usi lɛnaang ɔwaamɛ ammɛ biini. Lutini ’gwɔng ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Bɛnɔk bya balɔɔt banɔkwɔnɛyɔng bivvoongnɛbong anaam.”
Kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm badɔkɔ bakkpɔk battɛ bakopoloyɛlɛ, nkwaaning kussi ka kibbe-luppyam la bikɔɔm pya luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lunnyinɛyɛlɛ, iyanga luttina.
Numa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛ kibbe-luppyam la kɛbba-bikɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng ayangayɔng luttina ggwɔn ka kikup a linaang a Jesus Christ,
nkwaaning ayangayɔng lɛmmwɔɔl zzɔn, abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
Atɔkyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔtɔkwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ Christ ɔdɔkɔ bɔɔyi balɔɔt a Jews nkwaaning basan battɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi ba ɔnaang, ɔlɔk ɔnaang nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.

Ɔgbaa nkwaaning ɔnaang balɔɔt Ikanakana bakkwoong babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kibbe lɛttɔ ammɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔzzanga vvenɛ nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn a Ikanakana ilɔk, Vvenɛ nsoom kisoom nbungu lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.”
Lɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Ikanakana aggeleyɔng la balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ!”
Lɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Ikanakana ɔkkpɛlɛ abunguyɔng Ebinukkpaapi; Balɔɔt ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ abungumɛyɔng!”
Isaiah ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu a Jesse vvenɛ uffu; vvenɛ banaangmɛ uzzilɛttɔ Ikanakana, vvenɛ baloko ittina abbɛ ka ammɛ.”
Numa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔnngwa lussinɛ ka ammɛ unnyiwɔyɔng laggele la bɔkaat ka kiyila sa ayanganɛ atummɛyɔng, nkwaaning ittina annyɔɔng immala ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ikpana anaam, anaam biini nttina nttɛ luttina kɛnaang a budoddo lɔttalawɔyɔng lɔttala ka tɔkɔlɔ. Nttina nttɛ asanyɔngbong lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ale akɔɔm akopoloyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn.
Ɔzzànga ka lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung, nkkaambong luppyam nkkpɔk ntum lilɔɔk sa nttinanɛ. Nkkaam luppyam ka budoddo bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ linnyi,

ka nlenɛ bɔɔyi a Jesus Christ ka nnaangnɛ kɛnaang ka Ikanakana. Nnaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ka nkopolonɛ Kuttu-Budoddo kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nkwaaning Ikanakana bale lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔknɛ, za Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaangnɛ kunnyimɛ.
Ka ntaanɛ ka bɔkaat la Jesus Christ, nkkwoong mung nyanga bɔwaa ka kkwɔɔt ka nlenɛ ka kɛnaang a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Vvenɛ nkkaam luppyam nlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk kwa Christ ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang Ikanakana batele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Christ ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma la linaang,
ka lakke kɛyɔɔ linaang la bɛmaanga, ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzánga ka kɔssɛ kwa nssɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ussinɛ Jerusalem umii Illyrium, nbwɔɔlɔ ufaa Kuttu-Budoddo kwa Christ pwool pwool.
Luttina anaam lulenɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo a Christ ka ifɛɛn ya batakanɛkwɛ lippyee, tɛ̀ttɛ́ nffu nkeele bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ulenɛ litte.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba batakanɛbɛ kɔlɔɔk ammɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ, vvenɛ bayɛn ka zzeen. Balɔɔt ba batakanɛkwɛ lippyee, vvenɛ basankwɛ.”
Kwakkwɛ mung kiffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng kilenɛnɛ littun bikkpit ggbadam.
Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nvvebong kɛnaang anaam ka ifɛɛn ’yɔng mung, nle libum ka likkpa ggbadam nttɛ nffu nyɛnwɔyɔng,
nttinabong kiffu gedegede mung. Vvenɛ nbɛnɛ nnyɛnwɔyɔng ka nle ka nmiinɛ Spain, ɔlɔk ayaammɛyɔng nmii nlewɔnɛyɔng livve likoolo.
Gedegede mung nle ka nmiinɛ Jerusalem nnaang kɛnaang a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakang.
Izɔɔm ya Macedonia la Greece inaangbong luttina gwa kittele balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ ka Jerusalem.

Abbɛ biini banaangnɛ luttina gwa kɛnaangkwɛ ka ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa lɔkkwɔɔn, kule bbwak ka battelenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Balɔɔt a Jews batul ppyɛɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ la Ikanakana. Ikanakana bassɛ battele balɔɔt a Jews la bɛfɛɛn bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ ppyɛɛ ka abbyɛ lɛnaang.
Nlenɛ kɛnaang ’sɔng livve, nnyibɛ ikkpoko ’yɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ya bannyinɛbɛ, vvenɛ ngbata nmii Spain. Vvenɛ nkoolowɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii bakang.
Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng, nsan lɔsan nttɛ vvenɛ nffu la ppyɛɛ a Christ wa lɛbaang.
Ikpana anaam, nkɔɔmbong Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, la kɛsaap sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛnɛ nkkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ affu itoolo izɔɔmyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ innyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛttɔ anaam.
Azɔɔmyɔng nkwaaning bulɔk businɛ lɛnaang ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila ka Judea, nkwaaning balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayila kɔlɔɔk a kɛnaang anaam bakang ka Jerusalem.
Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng nkoolowɔyɔng la laggele, kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Numa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bɔkaat bussinɛ ka ammɛ, ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kule ning.
Nsan mung Phoebe, akpana ayyɔɔt, la annyɔɔng. Ɔnaang kɛnaang a luzɔɔm ka Cenchreae.

Uffunɛ, atɔkmɛyɔng ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini assɛɛnyɔng ka kkwɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm banaangnɛ. Attelemɛyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk duu kwa ɔbapwɔnɛyɔng. Ammɛ biini ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ bɛnaang la balɔɔt ggbadam ɔbɛtɛ la anaam.
Nwomobong Priscilla la Aquila bayyɔɔt a kɛnaang ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang a Christ Jesus.
Basam lafal abbɛ basɔɔk lubbe ka lɛttɔ anaam. Nzɔnɔbongbɛ kɛnaang gaang gaang. Anaam keem kɛyɔɔng lissi ka kuffinɛnɛ, kuffi izɔɔm ya ilenɛ ka ikaan ilɔk ɔgbaa.
Nwomobong luzɔɔm gwa lɔtaanɛ ka ssala abbɛ ɔgbaa. Nwomobong ɛnngwa anaam Epaenetus wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ɔyanga kiyila utum Christ Jesus ka ɛkpansi Asia.
Nwomobong Mary wa ulenɛ kɛnaang gaang gaang lɛnaang unnyiwɔyɔng.
Nwomobong Andronicus la Junias bayyɔɔt a Jews ba badɔkɔnɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ la anaam. Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus basanbɛ gaang gaang. Abbɛ battenɛ Christ likup tɛ́ttɛ́ anaam nkupmɛ.
Nwomobong Ampliatus, ɛnngwa anaam, ya elenɛ ka kɛnaang a bɔkaat Uyini.
Nwomobong Urbanus wayyɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt a kɛnaang a Christ. Nwomobong ɛnngwa anaam Stachys.
Nwomobong Appelles wa ilenɛ latele ammɛ za utelenɛ Christ liyila. Nwomobong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ka kɛkɔɔm a Aristobulus.
Nwomobong Herodion, wayyɔɔt a Jews ɔbɛtɛ la ikpana ayyɔɔt ba bakupnɛ Christ bale ka kɛkɔɔm a Narcissus.
Nwomobong Tryphaena la Tryphosa, ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang a Christ la ɛnngwa anaam Persis, wa ulenɛ kɛnaang gaang gaang lɛnaang unnyi Uyini.
Nwomobong Rufus, wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang Uyini ɔtta balɔɔt balɔk, la abakka wa ɔtɔknɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan ammɛ.
Nwomobong Asyncritus la Phlegon la Hermes la Patrobas la Hermas, la ikpana anaam balɔɔt a Christ ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ la abbɛ.
Nwomobong Philologus la Julia, la Nereus la etele ammɛ la Olympus la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ la abbɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uwomo wabbɛ, ugbugbamɛ kigbugba bukpana. Izɔɔm a Christ ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.

Ikpana anaam, nkkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng balɔɔt ba bassɛɛnnɛ balɔɔt lilɔɔk, banaangbɛ basi kiyila lɛbɛlɛ lɛyanga. Bafimnɛ lukopolo gwa alenɛyɔngbɛ likopolo, agbata assekeyɔngbɛ.

Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bɛssanga lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang, ba banaang bannyi Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt. Banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ luppyam abbɛ. Bakɔɔm babeet a lammwɔɔl la lɔggɔ basikili ippyam a balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwɛ lɛsan.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uppyeebong kɔlɔɔk a latele za atelenɛyɔng Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ nggele gaang gaang ntumwɔyɔng. Nggyan nttɛ asanyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ afɔngɔyɔng babbu lilɔɔk.
Usseke ssup, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bɔkaat bussinɛ ka ammɛ ususuku Satan ulokowɔyɔng asingyɔng bukkpɔ. Kɛsaap Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus kɛtaa la annyɔɔng.
Timothy wa inaangnɛ kɛnaang la ammɛ ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Lucius la Jason, Sosipater, bayyɔɔt a Jews battɛ nwomowɔyɔng ɔgbaa.
Anaam Tertius ɔkkpɔk-a-lɛta a Paul ’wɔng mung, nwomowɔyɔngbong luwomo gwa lussinɛ ka Christ.
Uyini a ssala Gaius, wa luzɔɔm lududanɛ ka ssala ammɛ ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Erastus, wa ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛ ikkpoko lɛffɛ, la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Quartus battɛ nwomowɔyɔng. [
Ppyɛɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kulening.]

Innyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm latele. Ukkwoong mung ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng kkɔk ka kiyila annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa nkopolonɛ ntum lɛmmwɔɔl a Jesus Christ, ɔgbaa la kuttu kwa lalup kwa kuddumunɛ kusseke bɛkkpa bya isimi bya isimi.

Ɔzzànga gedegede mung likkpɔk a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lisangabong lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ’gwɔng baang litta ka pwool ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Banaangbong ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsankwɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bayanga kiyila batelekwɛ.
Nssɛbong ka Jesus Christ nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulemɛnɛ ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔsannɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ latele kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.
Anaam Paul wa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔttɛ nle Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ la ɔkpana anaam Sosthenes, ikkpɔknɛ.

Ikkpɔk lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung ifee balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Corinth. Balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔnɛbɛ balɔɔt ammɛ ba bbwak, ba balenɛ ba ammɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, ɔgbaa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn, ba bazɔɔmnɛ bakkwɔɔ lɛkɔɔl Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt la abbɛ.
Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, bannyiwɔyɔng lakke la bɔkaat.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng ka ppyɛɛ wa Christ Jesus ulewɔnɛyɔng lɛnaang.
Ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔngbong ka lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ la bikɔɔm la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk ka alenɛyɔng ka bɔkaat la Christ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl a Christ lɛkkaambong gaang ka ippyam annyɔɔng.
Gɔɔ ppyɛɛ ɔlɔk gbɔɔ ba ɔtaka ɔsɛlɛwɔyɔng ka alenɛyɔng ka kɛkat attɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, uffu ɔkkpɛlɛ bayɛnmɛ.
Ammɛ vvenɛ ulokowɔyɔng bbwak asiyɔng kibbi lizzi tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka Kɛtɔm-Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
Ebinukkpaapi elenɛ ya kitele. Ebinukkpaapi ’yɔng baang ya ɛkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɛssɛɛn ka kɔssɛ Waan Annyɛ Jesus Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt.

Ikpana anaam nkkpengewɔyɔng ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, nttɛ ayilayɔng kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng nkwaaning asiyɔng lɛwɔlɔ. Ikpana anaam, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ataayɔng ka bɔkaat ka luttina ggwɔn, la eleme nnyɔn.
Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka itutum Chloe babwɔɔlɔnɛ Paul battɛ kɔwɔlɔ kulewɔyɔng baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ.

Fɔngɔ ssii nlɔɔk kwɛ ning mung. Lutini ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔlɔɔk buu buu. Vvɔn ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Paul”, ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Apollos.” Wa vvɔn ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Peter,” ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Christ.”
Babɛngɛlɛbong Christ baloko lakup lakup! Paul ubbenɛ ka Cross ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng ɔɔ? Adɔkɔ anaangyɔng baptizim ka lakke a Paul ɔɔ?
Nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka nsinɛ ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔlɔk baptizim lɛnaang ukpeke Crispus la Gaius.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ badɔkɔ banaangmɛ baptizim ka lakke anaam ba ule.
(Kule baning, anaam nnaangnɛ Stephanas la itutum ammɛ baptizim. Ɔzzànga ba nbɛlɛ likke nnaang ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk baptizim ngbaa nsan.)

Christ usinɛ lɛtɔɔm ɔttɛ nffu nnaang balɔɔt baptizim. Ɔtɔɔmnɛ ɔttɛ nffu nbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ. Ɔzzànga nfɔngɔ kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk a balɔɔt kɛkɔɔm nbwɔɔlɔ, nkwaaning Christ usi ka Cross ka lɛsɔɔk libbe.
Bɔtɔɔm bwa butumnɛ lubbe a Christ ka Cross bule bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ ka balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛtaak. Ɔzzànga kwa ayyɔɔt ba ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛkkala, bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nbɛpɛ bikɔɔm a bisana kɔlɔɔk, nloko kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa bakkoop a lukkoop zzekep.”
Mung nkwɔng kɔdɔkɔ kɔgbata kɔkɔngɔ basan a bisana la bakkoop a lukkoop, la bakkwoong ikangala vveeng ’wɔng mung ka yang? Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbong ɔttɛ bisana pya vveeng ’wɔng mung bizingizingi.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ɔnaang kwa kukoolonɛ balɔɔt kɛkɔɔm kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk abbɛ basanmɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttina kɛkkala balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka lukopolo gwa balɔɔt balɔk battɛnɛ ba lɔyyɛɛp.
Balɔɔt a Jew baggyan bɛmaanga battɛ basan lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt a Greek baggyan bisana.
Kwa ayyɔɔt kaang, ibwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a lubbe a Christ ka Cross. Bɔtɔɔm bwa butunnɛ balɔɔt a Jew, bule bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ ka Ikanakana.
Ɔzzànga kwa balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ, la balɔɔt a Jew la Ikanakana, bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng mung ulenɛ Christ, wa ulenɛ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bisana Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kwa kɔbalnɛ bizingizingi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɔyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp kɔsak kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa ɔssɛbibit. Kwa kkpɛkɛlɛm ka labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔkkaam kɔsak lakke za ɔssɛbibit.

Ikpana anaam akkeyɔng bwa adɔkɔnɛ aleyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng tɛ. Annyɔɔng basan a kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔk ba bayanganɛyɔng lakke adɔkɔyɔng ssup, balɔɔt a latele ɔgbaa gɔɔ ba bayipi ka luttina ɔssɛbibit.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukongo-ukongo ɔsanga kwa vveengodde battinanɛ battɛ ba kɔyyɛɛp, nkwaaning ɔssɛɛn basan-kɔlɔɔk ka izzit; la vveengodde uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ba bukkaam nkwaaning ɔssɛɛn bayanga lakke ka izzit.
Ɔsanga bɔfɛɛn bwa bulenɛ bwa ikpɛnnɛ busi bwa kɔlɔɔk lile ka vveengodde, appyɛɛkbwɛ attina attɛ baang bɔfɛɛn lissi, nkwaaning ɔbɛpɛ bwa vveeng uttinanɛ ɔttɛ buyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp.
Nkwɔng mung ulenɛ kɛttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoong ɔnaang kamma ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule.

Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔngbong akaatyɔng la Christ Jesus. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbongyɛlɛ itaa ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, ɔnaangmɛ ule bikɔɔm ayyɔɔt. Kussi ka ammɛ itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm isseke balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba doddo, uleyɛlɛ lɛkkala ka bubbi.
Kwakkwɛ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ule ka ɔnaangnɛ kamma, ɔnaangkwɛ utum bwa Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔnaangnɛ.”
Ikpana anaam, ka nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng nkopolowɔyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lɔkkwɔɔn za lalup, baggboggbo lammwɔɔl la kukele nsi lɛkɔɔm.
Nnaangnɛ luttina gwa kisumala bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ la annyɔɔng, usseke Jesus Christ kɛyɔɔng ka nsinɛ lisumala, gaang gaang lubbe gwa ubbenɛ ka Cross.
Ka nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng, la lakke nsi liffu. Ndɔkɔ ukeewaan, nffula ɔkkpɛlɛ a kkwɔɔt la bbwɔp.
Ɔgbaa nsi kukele ɔssɛbibit lɛkɔɔm ka lukopolo anaam la bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ. Ɔzzànga kɔdɔkɔ ka iyɔɔ lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za ladɛmnɛbɛ bayila.
Kiyila annyɔɔng ba kɛtaa la annyɔɔng kwa kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk ɔssɛbibit; kɛtaa ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ɔzzànga nlɔɔk mung kɔlɔɔk a bisana la balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛkkpɛɛm ka kɛsan a lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa kissinɛ ka vveeng mung lissi, ɔlɔk ka lakke za lakɔɔmnɛ vveeng ’wɔng lissi; ɔlɔk ka lakke za lalenɛ ka kɛtaka lakke azzɛ biini.

Bisana pya nlɔɔknɛ mung nlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a bisana lalup Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm pya ulupnɛ usseke balɔɔt. Appyɛ bilenɛ bisana bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ ɛtɔk lɛkɔɔm ɔsanga ka kibbe lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt, bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔnaang ɛkpansi.
Ɔssɛbibit vvɔn gbɔɔ wa ɔsannɛ bisana ’pyɔng mung usi lile. Balenɛ ka basannɛpyɛ, nzang basi Uyini-lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛkama ka Cross.

Mkkpa kɔnaang, kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lulenɛ lɛttɛ, “Kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔtakanɛ lɛyɛn, ɔlɔk ɔtaka lippyee, ɔlɔk uttina utum, kukkwoong mung kɔnaang. Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ uloko balɔɔt ba batelemɛnɛ.”
Ɔzzànga kɔdɔkɔ kule kwa ayyɔɔt ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lanaangnɛyɛlɛ isan kɔlɔɔk a lalup ammɛ. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuggbung kɔggyan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔgbaa la kɔlɔɔk a lalup Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa ddɔng.
Ɔzzànga kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔt, kuyeeng ammɛ biini kɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kutummɛnɛ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kule kɛssanga ssɔn, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem kɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ayyɔɔt eleme a vveengodde ’wɔng ba itaka itɔk. Ule Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ufeeyɛlɛ keem ka itɔknɛ, nkwaaning isan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi.

Ɔzzànga ba ilɔɔk ka lammwɔɔl za bisana ɔssɛbibit bakopolonɛ, ilɔɔk ka lammwɔɔl za Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kukopolonɛ ka ibwɔɔlɔnɛ balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛyanga, ba ukkwoong ɔtɔk lɛsɔɔk za lissinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liffu ka usinɛzɛ lɛsan; ule bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ ka ammɛ. Akɔɔm Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem akkwoong abwɔɔlɔ linaang abbɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔkaal kɛkaal a bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔkaalmɛ ammɛ ba ule.
Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lulenɛ lɛlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Nyinɔɔng ɔsannɛ luppyam Uyini? Nyinɔɔng ule ukkwoong ɔbbamɛ bikɔɔm?” Mkkpa kɔnaang ayyɔɔt iyanga luppyam a Christ.

Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ikpana anaam, ba nkwoong nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Nle nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ɛkpansi, ɔgbaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ba bassumanɛ lɛfal liffu ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a Christ.
Ndɔkɔ nnyiwɔyɔng libee, kilaam lissi ka asinɛyɔng lɛbama akatyɔngsɛ. Gɔɔ gedegede mung ba ataka abamayɔng,
ka atiinɛ ka anaangnɛyɔng linaang a balɔɔt ɛkpansi. Ayangayɔng luleep la bannyɔɔng, awɔlɔyɔng, ning baang ba asan attɛ atiiyɔng balɔɔt ɛkpansi ba bakupnɛ eleme ɛkpansi ɔɔ?
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Paul.” Ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Apollos.” Baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ɛkpansi lissi ka anaangnɛyɔng ɔɔ?
Kkpɔɔ nyinɛ ulenɛ Apollos? Kkpɔɔ nyinɛ ulenɛ Paul? Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt-a-baffa ibɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ilewɔnɛyɔng lɛnaang ayangayɔng kiyila. Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang kɛnaang sa Uyini unnyimɛnɛ.
Anaam nkɔɔnnɛ ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn, Apollos ɔllɔtyɛ bannyi ɔttɛ ɛmmala. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛssɛ ’sɔng baang kiddu.
Ɔkɔɔnɔkɔɔn la ɔllɔt-a-bannyi ka bulɔk ba bale. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ ka kukkam kwa lɛbaang ka ɔnaangnɛ bɛssɛ biddu.
Ɔkɔɔnɔkɔɔn la ɔllɔt-a-bannyi buubuu ba bale. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule unnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛsɔɔk ɔssanga ka kɛnaang sa ɔnaangnɛ.
Ayyɔɔt itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba inaangnɛ kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn innyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa assɛnɛ aleyɔng ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Nkɔɔm lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛnɛ ntte lutte tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɛtɛnɛ ka kɛbɔɔk a ssoon. Mung ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang ka ɔbɔɔknɛ ka lutte ’gwɔng baang. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbɔɔknɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsambong Jesus uloko ka lutte. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbbal lutte lɔlɔk litte ba ɔbɛlɛ lile.
Balɔɔt balɔk bale bakɔɔm silver ɔlɔk gold ɔlɔk ifɔɔk ikpana batte lutte. Balɔk bakɔɔm bɛssɛ ɔlɔk lifɔɔk.

Bubbi la bɔllɛ kɛnaang ɔlɔɔt la duu vvenɛ butta ka vveeng ka ɛkɛtɛ Jesus ule uffu. Lɔkɔɔn a kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang vvenɛ lɔssanga innyɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Vvenɛ lɔllɛ linaang abbɛ lɔyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ liyyɛɛpnɛ liffɔ.
Ulenɛ ka linaang ɔlɔɔt lisinɛ lɔkɔɔn lippyee, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk.
Ɔzzànga ɔppyɛɛnɛ ule bɔfɛɛn a linaang ɔlɔɔt likkɔmnɛ lɔkɔɔn, vvenɛ ɔsɛlɛsɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkkala ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔfɔngɔ, ɔzzànga ule ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔttanɛ ka lalaak a lɔkɔɔn.
Asan lɔsan attɛ annɔ alenɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule baang la annɔ ka kɔtaanɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɛpɛnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔbɛpɛmɛ. Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lule gwa doddo, annyɔɔng biini alenɛyɔng ggwoon ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔdɛmmɛ kɛyɔɔng ugbigbini. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng uttinamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ɔsan kɔlɔɔk a vveeng ’wɔng, kkwɔɔmɛyɔng ukun ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔsan kɔlɔɔk.

Bɔfɛɛn bwa ɛkpansi ’yɔng ettinanɛ ɛttɛ baang kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk, bule bwa ggbɔɔ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkaa balɔɔt ba battinanɛ battɛ abbɛ basan a kɔlɔɔk ka lagban abbɛ.”
Lɔbbal lɛlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ ittina basan-a-kɔlɔɔk ile ya ggbɔɔ, ka bulɔk ba iffɔ.”
Ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔnaang kamma utum bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔssɛbibit ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang. Uvve bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bya annyɔɔng.
Paul, Apollos la Peter, vveengodde, kuddu la lubbe, kɔlɔɔk kwa gedegede mung la kwa lusso, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bile bya annyɔɔng.
Annyɔɔng ba Christ, Christ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Atɔkyɔngyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibɔɔyi ya Christ. Ulenɛ lilɔɔk a lalup Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa lɔkkwɔɔn lɛsam ɔssɛɛnyɛlɛ ka labɔɔk.
Bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔggyannɛ ka ibɔɔk a bɔɔyi ammɛ ulenɛ kitele lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ, ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang.
Ba nffik nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt unnyinɛ kibbi, gɔɔ ka ɛtɔk duu. Anaam kibbi kɛyɔɔng nɛ ba nnyi.
Luttina anaam lule ppwool. Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng ba kukkwoong kɔyɔɔ kɔttɛ bubbi ba ntaka nnaang. Uyini ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal anaam.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ annyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kibbi bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ kɛkaal ammɛ ɛffɔ. Uyini uffubong tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛkaal sa lakpeke lɛffɔ. Uffunɛ, vvenɛ ɔsanga lilɔɔk sa balɔɔt balɔɔknɛ ka lalup ɔtta ka vveeng. Vvenɛ ɔsanga kwa ɔlɔɔt ulupnɛ ka luppyam ɔtta ka vveeng. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubungu ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaangnɛ ɔffɔ.
