Ikpana anaam, ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng, nkɔɔmbongyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt la Apollos nyɔɔwɔyɔng ɛtɔk ya ale akupyɔng ɔlɔk akkoopyɔng bwa bassanɛ ifɛɛt battɛ, “Atele Lafɔɔ za doddo.” Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔsaapwɔ usseke wa vvɔn.

Nyinɛ ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng ɔyɛnwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng attayɔng balɔɔt balɔk? Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi unnyiwɔnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayanganɛyɔng ɔɔ? Ammɛ lissi unnyiwɔnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔkkyaawɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bisinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi?

Gedegede mung ayangayɔngbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya aggyannɛyɔng ɔɔ? Atiiyɔng babeet, mkkpa ayyɔɔt isi babeet lile ɔɔ? Kɔyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp. Nggele gaang gaang bulenɛyɔng babeet ka lɔkkwɔɔn nkwaaning ayyɔɔt issɛ ile babeet la annyɔɔng.
Kɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, usseke isimi kɛtaa linnyi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bazzanɛ kɛkaal abbɛ battɛ babbe bayɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔm la ɔssɛbibit.

Bakkwɔɔbongyɛlɛ bazingizingi ka lɛttɔ a Christ. Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng asannɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk ka akupnɛyɔng Christ. Ayyɔɔt ba ikkaam ɔzzànga annyɔɔng akkaamyɔng lɔkkaam. Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt yɛlɛ ba batele; ɔzzànga annyɔɔng batelewɔyɔng lutele.
Ka lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma mung ile ka buwɔɔng a bannyi la buwɔɔng a kazzi. Iwɔkɔlɔ babbu bɛssaka ibba. Lɔkkpat batupyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt. Issɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ ikpikpiti.
Inaang kɛnaang imɛɛm issuma tɛ́ttɛ́ iyɛn bwa izzinɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ya babbaatnɛyɛlɛ elenɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya inaangnɛbɛ ppyɛɛ. Bayɔɔnɛyɛlɛ akama, ning baang ulenɛ ka ikamanɛ lɔkama ibbɔmɛ.
Babbaatnɛyɛlɛ, ippyɛlɛbɛ kamma la lammwɔɔl za doddo. Ippyɛlɛ ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn bya kɛsam kɛzzɔɔk. Isseke ititiban ka ɛkpansi ka lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma mung.
Nkkpɔk ’kwɔng gbɔɔ nnyiwɔyɔng ka alenɛyɔng bwaan a luppyam anaam. Nsi lɛggyan nttɛ izzit inaangwɔyɔng.

Mkkpa ayangayɔng balɔɔt baffɔwɔyɔng innɔ innɔ ba bakopolowɔnɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk ka lɛfal annyɔɔng ka Christ, ssaawɔ ulewɔyɔng vvɔn keem. Ka lɛfal annyɔɔng ka Christ anaam nsseke dedde annyɔɔng ka nkɔɔmnɛ Kuttu kwa Doddo nfeewɔyɔng.
Nkkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ akupyɔng eleme anaam.

Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ nle ka ntɔɔmnɛ Timothy nfeewɔyɔng. Ammɛ, ulenɛ waan a luppyam anaam ka kkwɔɔt Uyini. Vvenɛ ukkewɔyɔng itɔk a lilɔɔk ya bbwak ya nkupnɛ ka ufaa lɛfal wa nkupnɛ Jesus Christ, la kwa nkopolonɛ ka idda izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkyaawɔyɔngbong ɔsak. Ba abɛlɛ littina attɛyɔng ntii ka nffunɛ nkoolowɔyɔng.
Kɔsaapnɛ Uyini, nle nkka liffu ka annyɔɔng. Anaam biini vvenɛ nyɛn bwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba ɔkkyaanɛbɛ banaangnɛ. Bwa bakkwoongnɛ balɔɔk ka kamma keem lissi.
Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl keem ba ile, ile ka lakke ɔgbaa.
Mung ɔllɛwɔyɔng ’bɔng? Ɔllɛ ka nffunɛ la bipyoko faa la luppyam gwa bɛtɛbɛtɛ?

Nppyeebong ka battɛnɛ asseke ka akupnɛyɔng bwanavva gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ. Gɔɔ balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ assɛ baang ba banaang. Nppyeebong ka babwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ battɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔtɔkbong wanavva abassɛ ammɛ.
Ngkka mung ɔkkyaawɔyɔng ’bɔng? Kɔyyɛɛp ka ataanɛyɔng bukee bunaangwɔyɔng. Aggbayɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng baang ka kɛkaan annyɔɔng.

Mkkpa nle fulufulu nssekewɔyɔng ka ɛkkpakkwɔɔt, luppyam anaam lule baang la annyɔɔng. Nnyibong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng baang kibbi eseese ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bulenɛ baang la annyɔɔng. Aggbanɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, anaam nle baang la annyɔɔng ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus, za lalenɛ mung la ayyɔɔt.
Asamyɔng ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang annyiyɔng Satan umii ɔbɛpɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ nkwaaning ɔkkala lɛfɛkɛlɛ ammɛ ka Kɛtɔm-Uyini.
Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka anaangnɛyɔng bizzeen. Asanyɔng lɔsan ifɛɛt ya battɛnɛ, “Bwaan izuku a yeast ssup ning bɛnaangnɛ ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ utum.”

Vvenɛ asangayɔng ɔtɔm a yeast a bubbi ’bwɔng mung ɔkkɔɔnɛ ayyɛɛp affatayɔng. Assekeyɔng ufaa ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ yeast. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ aleyɔng ning baang ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ayyɔɔt ɛbbalbong lɛffɔ ka balenɛ Christ wa ulenɛ Waan-ɛtɔɔn a Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ lɛsam bawwɔɔl.
Ka kulenɛ ning lile, izziyɔng kazzi ayyɔɔt la brɛɛd wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ yeast wa ulenɛ brɛɛd a bɔllɛ-luppyam la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Ifɔngɔyɔng brɛɛd wa ɔyanganɛ ɔtɔm a yeast a bubbi la ibbyap lizzi.
Ka lɛmmwɔɔl za nkkpɔknɛ, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛyɔng la balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ bwanavva balɔɔt.
Mung ba nlɔɔk ntum basɛlɛ kiyila ba balenɛ balɔɔt ba bbɔlbbɔl ɔlɔk ba bawɔnɔnɛ, ɔlɔk la bassip, gɔɔ la bazɔɔm ilat tɛ. Asinɛ la balɔɔt ’bɔng mung lɛssɛ ɔllɛwɔ ka asinɛ wa ɛkpansi lɛbɛlɛ lile.

Bwa nlɔɔknɛ mung nlɔɔk nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛyɔng la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbwanɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔkpana annɔ ka Christ ɔppyɛɛ ule ukup a bwanavva gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ, ɔlɔk ule ɔwɔnɔwɔnɔ, ɔlɔk ɔzɔɔm-ilat ɔlɔk ɔbbɔl a bɛlɔɔk la balɔɔt, ɔlɔk ɔvva-batak, ɔlɔk uyip ssip. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ataa ɔtaa gbɔɔ azziyɔng kazzi la kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt ’sɔng baang.

Uvve kaang ’wɔng baang kɛnaang anaam lissi wa nle nkaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ba basinɛ ka kɛkaan ayyɔɔt lile. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkaal kɛkaal abbɛ. Ɔzzànga mung annyɔɔng kɛkaal a bannyɔɔng a kɔssɛ baala akaalyɔng ɔɔ?
Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Aggbayɔng ɔnaang-a-bubbi ka kɛkaan annyɔɔng.”
Ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ kɔwɔlɔ la wabbɛ, ɔyanga-kiyila ule ɔnaang nang umii ubee ka lusso balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila, ɔkaal kɛkaal usi lɛfɔngɔ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakaal kɛkaal ’sɔng baang?
Ba asan attɛyɔng balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ bakaal vveeng ’wɔng ɔɔ? Akkwoongnɛ akaalyɔng kɛkaal a vveeng ’wɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, ule usseke lilɔɔk sa sɛkɛsɛkɛ asiyɔng likkwoong akaalyɔng ɔɔ?
Ba asan attɛyɔng vvenɛ ikaal kɛkaal a bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ikaalnɛ kɛkaal a bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ule usseke bɛfɛɛn a vveeng ’wɔng mung isi kɛkaal abbyɛ lɛkaal ɔɔ?
Lilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ assɛ baang littɔnɛ, vvenɛ asamyɔng kwɛ afeeyɔng balɔɔt ba basinɛ ka luzɔɔm lile bakaalwɔyɔng kwɛ ɔɔ?
Nlɔɔk ’kwɔng nttɛ nkwaaning izzit inaangwɔyɔng. Ɔlɔɔt ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ba ɔsɛlɛ wa ɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk, ukkwoong ɔkaal kɛkaal Ɔyanga-kiyila la wabbɛ ɔɔ?
Lutini gwa ɔyanga-kiyila ɔkkwɔɔnɛ wabbɛ kɛkaal ka lusso basɛlɛ-kiyila.

Kɛkkwɔɔ bɛkaal bya akkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng kɛyɔɔbong kɛttɛ asiyɔngbong lizzeme ka kikup a Christ ka naka-naka. Ba kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng bubbi ɔɔ? Ba kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka bayipwɔnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔɔ?
Annyɔɔng appyɛɛ anaangwɔyɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng bubbi, ayipwɔyɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng!

Kule kule asanyɔng mung attɛyɔng banaang-a-bubbi Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala bayɛn ɔɔ? Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɛɛtwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ linaang sa bbɔlbbɔl bazɔɔm ilat, bakup bwanavva balɔɔt, basam bɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt, bazak babbɛ bwaanbwalam
ɔlɔk bannaa bɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ka lakke, ɔlɔk bayip, bavva batak; gɔɔ ɔgbɛɛk a lɔgbɛɛk; ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ ’byɔng, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka zzeen baala ɔyɛn.

Annyɔɔng balɔɔt balɔk adɔkɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ baang. Ɔzzànga attayɔngbong ka bubbi, basamwɔyɔngbong bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulokowɔyɔngbong bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lakke a Jesus Christ Uyini.

Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔttɛ, “Bayila mung battɛ nnaang bɔfɛɛn la duu.” Kule baning, ɔzzànga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi bɛyyɛɛpwɔnɛ. Anaam nkkwoong mung nttɛ bayilabong battɛ nnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga baala nfɔngɔ bɔfɛɛn bulɔk butɔknɛ ka bubili.

Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔttɛ, “Kazzi kale kwa lɛmmɛ, lɛmmɛ lile za kazzi.” Kule baning, ɔ̀zzàngà Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bɛffa bikpeke. Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka akɔɔmnɛ kkwɔɔt annɔ ka ɛtɔk a kɛssɛ-kɛzak. Kkwɔɔt lile sa Uyini, Uyini unnyinɛsɛ kuddu.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalanɛ Uyini ka lubbe, Vvenɛ ɔssɛ ufungalyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ning baang ka lakke ammɛ.
Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lilenɛ bikkeep a Christ. Nsam kikkeep a Christ nnaang kikkeep a kkwɔɔt a wa àkkpàlà ɔɔ? Ba kɔyyɛɛp.
Faa ba asan attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsamnɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ utoolo la sa wa àkkpàlà usseke bɔfɛɛn bwɔn la ammɛ ɔɔ? Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk ppwool ppwool lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa basseke kkwɔɔt ssɔn.”
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsammɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng utoolo la Uyini usseke bɔfɛɛn bwɔn la ammɛ ka Lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Akkyaayɔng kɛssɛ-kɛzak afɔngɔyɔng. Bubbi bulɔk bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bubɛpɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ ɔgbaa la kɛssɛ-kɛsak ba bule. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ka ɔbɛpɛnɛ lafɔɔ, ka umininɛ la wanavva, ɔnaangbong bubbi utum kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini.
Ba asan attɛyɔng kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lile ggwoon a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ullunɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng ɔɔ? Kɛyɔɔng wɔyɔng ba ayangayɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyangawɔnɛyɔng.
Ɔlɛɛpwɔyɔngbong ukkpele kappya. Ɔzzànga akɔɔmyɔng kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Gedegede mung ile ka inngwanɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa akkpɔknɛ atumyɔng. Ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bbwak ka usinɛ wanavva lɛtɔk.
Kɛssɛ-kɛzak ka kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔtɔk wanavva wa ammɛ. Wanavva la vvɔn ɔyanga walam wa ammɛ biini.
Waanwalam ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtɔk-a-wanavva, wanavva ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ullu-walam. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔnaang kwa wabbɛ ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang.
Wanavva lissi ulenɛ uyini a kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini. Kkwɔɔt ammɛ lile sa walam ammɛ. Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn: waanwalam lissi ulenɛ uyini a kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini. Kkwɔɔt ammɛ lile sa wanavva ammɛ.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Akkwoong mung anaangyɔng likup, anaangyɔng ning baang ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup nkwaaning ayangayɔng liggbili za kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm. Ɔzzànga appyɛlɛ ataayɔng ka bɔkaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ walam la wanavva. Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat ɔkkɔɔnɛ Satan usi likkwoong ɔllɛwɔyɔng, ka ale asi likkwoong akɔɔmwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng mung, ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ lissi, kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbba bikɔɔm.
Kkpɔɔ ndɔkɔ nngwa nttɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ataayɔng buyya tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyanganɛ lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng; wa vvɔn ɔyanga lɛlɔk.
Gedegede mung nlɔɔk ’kwɔng la balɔɔt ba batakanɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk la ba batakanɛ bwalam lillu, la ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ. Nzang kule kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka ataanɛyɔng kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam mung.
Ɔzzànga asinɛyɔng likkwoong akkaamyɔng ippyam, atɔkyɔng bwanavva. Bwanavva bamii ballu bwalam. Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka atɔknɛyɔng bwanavva; bwanavva ballu bwalam; lutini ataanɛyɔng la ikama ka ippyam.
Kwa balɔɔt ba balenɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk la ba balenɛ bwalam lillu, nyanga lɔttama. Gwa anaam biini lissi, ɔzzànga gwa Uyini. Wanavva tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ walam ammɛ.
Ɔnaangnɛ ning baang ule ɔppyɛɛ ɔtaa kɛyɔɔng ɔlɔk nzang ɔppyɛlɛ umii bataa ka bɔkaat la walam ammɛ. Waanwalam ɔgbaa tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔggba wanavva ammɛ.
Nlɔɔk kwa balɔɔt balɔk. Anaam nlɔɔknɛ, Uyini lissi. Ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa luzɔɔm ɔtɔknɛ wanavva wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila, wanavva uyilanɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ullumɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔggbamɛ.
Wanavva wa uyilanɛ kwa luzɔɔm ullunɛ walam wa usinɛ kiyila lɛyanga, waanwalam uyilanɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wanavva ammɛ, wanavva tɛ̀ttɛ́ ufim walam ’wɔng baang.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk mung waanwalam wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ulenɛ ka ɔtɔknɛ wanavva wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk mung wanavva wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ulenɛ ka ullunɛ la walam wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila ka Christ. Kusinɛ ning lile, bwɔɔn abbɛ bale bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ba balɔɔt ba batakanɛ baptizim lɛnaang. Ɔzzànga ka kulenɛ ning mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk mung bɛ.

Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa luzɔɔm, ɔfɔngɔmɛ ɔgbata. Kulenɛ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa luzɔɔm, ule wanavva ɔlɔk waanwalam ukkwoong mung ɔnaang kwa uttinanɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔyɔngbong ɔttɛ ataayɔng ka bɔkaat.
Wanavva wa ukupnɛ kwa Jesus! Ale anaang nang asan bentee attɛ baala akkwoong akkala walam annɔ? Waanwalam wa uyilanɛ kwa Jesus ale anaang nang asan attɛ baala akkwoong akkala wanavva annɔ?
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔnaang kwa lɛsɔɔk za Uyini unnyimɛnɛ. Ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggbanɛ lissi ule ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ ɛtɔk ya nkopolonɛ ka izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ulenɛ kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ubum ɔttɛ ammɛ lɛtaa ba ɔtaka ɔzza. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ulenɛ kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔzza lɛtaa.
Kɛzza lɛtaa la kisi lɛtaa lɛzza kɔlɔɔk gaang lissi. Kwa kɔttanɛ ulenɛ kitele Lafɔɔ-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggbanɛ lissi ule ka ɛkɛtɛ ya uyilanɛ kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Adɔkɔ ubili ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛ ɔɔ? Kɔyyɛɛp mung. Ɔzzànga akkwoongnɛ ayanga kufuk kwa ale anaang atta ka bubili, akɔɔmkwɛ doddo.

Ubili wa Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usimɛnɛ ubili lɛbɛlɛ lɛkkwɔɔ. Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ ka bubili lile, Christ ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang usseke ubili a Christ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɛɛpwɔyɔngbong, Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abbalyɔng ka bubili balɔɔt balɔk lile.
Ikpana anaam, ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔtaa ka bɔkaat la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ.

Nkwɔng kutum kɔlɔɔk kwa akkpɔknɛ atumyɔng bwanavva ba batakanɛ bwalam lillu la bwaanbwalam ba batakanɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk: Nsi lɔdda ka Uyini lɛtɔk. Ɔzzànga nlɔɔk kwa luttina anaam biini ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ libbe ulenɛ lakke linnyi.
Ittinanɛ kwa akama wa gedegede mung, nttina nttɛ kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt ɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ.
Ayangabong wanavva ɔɔ? Ulewɔnɛ baang, tɛ̀ttɛ́ asimɛ doddo lɛkɔɔm. Wanavva ba ayanga ɔɔ? Asinɛ lɛyanga tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔk wanavva.

Ɔzzànga atɔknɛ wanavva, bubbi ba ataka anaang. Wanavva wa ɔtakanɛ walam lillu, ullunɛ walam, bubbi ba ɔtaka ɔnaang. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nkkalawayɔng ka lilɔɔk sa kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ sa balɔɔt ba batɔknɛ bwanavva bale bayanga.
Ikpana anaam, nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nttinanɛ; ɛkɛtɛ gaang ba ɛbɛlɛ lɛlɔm. Ɔzzànga ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso, batɔk-a-bwanavva bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ batakanɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk.
Balɔɔt ba bakkwanɛ, bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ ka laggele. Ba basɛɛknɛ bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ ka lakpimili. Balɔɔt ba balɛɛpnɛ lɛlɛɛp bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba basinɛbɛ bwa balɛɛpnɛ linnyi.
Balɔɔt ba battinanɛ kwa iyyɛɛp a vveengodde, batɔk iyyɛɛp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubbu kɔlɔɔk. Ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ elenɛ lule gedegede mung baala ettumu mmɛmmɛ.
Nggyan nttɛ luppyam lɔfɔngɔwɔyɔng kɛbɛlɛ lɛzza. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ wanavva lɛtɔk, ubee bbwak ka kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ wanavva lɛtɔk, ubee bbwak ka bɛfɛɛn a vveengodde, ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ wanavva ammɛ.

Ɔzzànga ning baang lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang littuluwɔbong lafoom laffa-laffa. Wanavva wa ɔtakanɛ walam lillu ɔlɔk wanavva wa ɔtakanɛ la walam limini ɔsam kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini unnyi ka kɛnaang Uyini, ɔggyannɛ ppyɛɛ a kkwɔɔt ammɛ la kuyeeng ammɛ. Ɔzzànga wanavva wa ulenɛ walam lillu usseke ka uttinanɛ kwa iyyɛɛp a vveengodde ka ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ ulam.

Nlɔɔk ’kwɔng ka nggyannɛ nttɛ nttelewɔyɔng. Ba nggyan nttɛ ntunuwɔyɔng ka lilɔɔk annyɔɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng, nggyan nttɛ anaangyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ kule bbwak. Asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyiyɔng ka kɛnaang Uyini tɛ̀ttɛ́ kufoom kɔlɔk kusseke.
Ulenɛ iggyan ya wanavva la walam balenɛ litini battɛ baala ballu, waanwalam ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ɔfafakabong avva ɔzzànga utii ka ɔsaapmɛnɛ kɛtɔk, bakkwoong mung ballu, bubbi ka ’kwɔng baang ba bule.
Ɔzzànga ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt wa basimɛnɛ kutut litut, ule littina kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ wanavva baala ɔtɔk, ulenɛ likkwoong ɔkɔɔm luttina ammɛ kkpɔk, ɔnaang bbwak ka usinɛ wanavva lɛtɔk.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ wanavva ɔnaang doddo. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ wanavva lɛtɔk ɔttanɛ bbwak lɛnaang.
Wanavva wa ullunɛ walam, gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ baala ɔssɛ ka utiinɛ ka ssala walam. Ɔzzànga walam ammɛ ubbenɛ, ukkwoong mung umii ullu walam ɔlɔk wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ. Ɔzzànga ullu ɔlɔɔt wa ukupnɛ kwa Jesus keem.
Wanavva ’wɔng baang mkkpa kɔnaang vvenɛ uggele ulenɛ ka ɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔm-ɛlɔm. Uwɔng mung ulenɛ luttina anaam. Ɔzzànga nttina nttɛ anaam ɔgbaa nyanga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Nle ka nlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk a kazzi kwa bannyinɛ ilɔɔp. Ka lɔkkwɔɔn kule bbwak, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt iyanga kukele.”; tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwoongnɛ balɔɔk. Ɔzzànga kɛssanga kukele ’sɔng baang kɛnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkkyaamɛ. Mɛ ba kɛnaang ule ɔlɔɔt wa doddo. Kɛ́saap kɛlɔngɔlɔmɛnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ɔsan kɔlɔɔk, ba ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ɔsan mung ɔffɔ.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa utelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanmɛ lɔsan.
Kɔlɔɔk a kizzi kazzi kwa bannyinɛ ilɔɔp. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ɛlɔɔp ɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa busɛlɛnɛ kuddu ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ule Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang vvɔn keem.
Gɔɔ mkkpa bakkwɔɔyɛ “ibunukkpaapi” ka libat ɔlɔk ka ɛkpansi, gɔɔ mkkpa “ibinukkpaapi” ’yɔng mung iyipi, “bayini” bayipi bagbaa,

ulenɛyɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvɔn keem wa ulenɛ Dedde ayyɔɔt, wa ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa iddunɛ kwa ammɛ. Ɔzzànga ule Uyini vvɔn keem, Jesus Christ, wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔlɔɔm bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ la wa iddunɛ kwa ammɛ.

Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi ɔsannɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng. Balɔɔt balɔk kwa ilɔɔp kɔgbɔnɔbongbɛ. Gɔɔ ka mmwɔɔn mung bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang batii ka battinanɛ battɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang kwa ilɔɔp. Ittina abbɛ ba ikkaam. Battina battɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang vvenɛ kadɛmbɛ babbɔl ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kazzi gɔɔ ba kakkwoong kakɔɔmyɛlɛ kamii ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Mkkpa isi lizzi ɔlɔk izzi.
Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng linaang annyɔɔng linaang balɔɔt ba basinɛ kiyila sa kɛkkaamnɛ lɛyanga battɔ ka bubbi.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a ɔlɔɔt wa luttina ammɛ lusinɛ lɛkkaam ka kɔlɔɔk ɔyɛnwɔnɛ annɔ wa “asannɛ kɔlɔɔk” ka azzinɛ kazzi ka labun ilat; Nkwɔng baang mɛ baala kɔnaang uzzi kazzi kwa bannyinɛ ilɔɔp ɔɔ?
Ɔzzánga ɔttɛ ɔkpana annɔ ’wɔng mung wa luttina ammɛ lusinɛ lɛkkaam, wa Christ ubbenɛ ka lɛttɔ ammɛ vvenɛ ɔtaak ka “kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk annɔ”!
Ning baang anaangbong bubbi atum Christ ka anaangnɛ bubbi la ikpana annɔ, bayanga-kiyila. Abɛpɛbong ittina abbɛ ya isinɛ lɛkkaam.
Kazzi kanaangnɛ ɔkpana anaam ɔttɔ ka bubbi, ɛsɛɛn ba nbɛlɛ lizzi kɛfal a kɛfal, tɛ̀ttɛ́ nffu nnaang ɔkpana anaam ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
Anaam wa nlenɛ ka bubili lɛtta lissi ɔɔ? Anaam uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus lissi ɔɔ? Anaam Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, ba ntaka nyɛn ɔɔ? Annyɔɔng lissi alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba nkkwɔɔnɛ nnyi Uyini ɔɔ?
Mkkpa balɔɔt balɔk basinɛ lɛtɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, annyɔɔng atɔknɛyɔng lɔtɔk! Kuddu annyɔɔng, ka kulenɛ ka bɔkaat la Uyini, kɔyɔɔbong kɔttɛ anaam uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
Balɔɔt bakpɛnnɛnɛ, uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkkalanɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng.
Bbwak nɛ ba kule ka bannyinɛnɛ kazzi la batak ka kɛnaang anaam ɔɔ?
Mung lakke ba nyanga za ntɔknɛ wanavva-luzɔɔm nsam nmii kɔssɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus balɔk la ikpana Uyini la Peter banaangnɛ ɔɔ?
Barnabas la anaam keem ilenɛ balɔɔt ba inaangnɛ kɛnaang iggyan kuddu ayyɔɔt keem ɔɔ?
Bɔka wa sɔgya ukkpelemɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka busɔgya? Bɔka uwoop-a-bɔtɔɔm usinɛ bwa uwoopnɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ lizzi? Bɔka ɔkɔɔm-igɔdɔ usinɛ libee za lissinɛ ka igɔdɔ ammɛ lɛvva?
Baala nkɔɔng ka kɛkɔɔm a bɛfɛɛn bya ippyeenɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm ntolo kutolo ka Lafɔɔ lassɛnɛ lalɔɔk ning baang.
Ikkwɔɔ la Lafɔɔ a Moses za lattɛnɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ aggbɔ ɔgɔdɔ kamma ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔssalwɔnɛ bɛfɛɛn.” Ngkka mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbɛtɛmɛ kwa igɔdɔ ɔɔ?

Anngwa attɛyɔng ayyɔɔt lissi ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ ɔɔ? Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nkwɔng badɔkɔ bakkpɔk kwa ayyɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt wa uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyaatnɛ liyaat banaang kɛnaang battina kwa bale bassɛ bayanga etini ka kɛnaang sa banaangnɛ.
Ikɔɔmbong lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ifeewɔyɔng. Ɔzzánga ba kɔyyɛɛp ka iyanganɛ lɛsɔɔk ɔɔ?

Balɔɔt balɔk bayanganɛ lakke za kɛggyan a bɔfɛɛn ka labɔɔk annyɔɔng, ba anngwa attɛyɔng lakke za ayyɔɔt laggbenge latta za abbɛ ɔɔ? Ɔzzànga lakke ’zɔng mung ba itaka iyɔɔ. Lutini ’gwɔng, inaangbong lutini kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning bɔfɛɛn bulɔk busi lile bwa butununɛ Kuttu-Budoddo a Christ.

Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kazzi abbɛ kassi baang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ lɛtɔm ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayanga etini abbɛ ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn. Uyini ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ balɔɔt ba bakopolonɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bale bayanga kazzi abbɛ baang.

Ɔzzànga ba ntaka nbap kwa etini anaam, ɔlɔk vvenɛ nkkpɔk lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung nggyan etini anaam biini. Lutini ’gwɔng nkɔɔm ɛtɔk nbbe. Ɔlɔɔt ba ule wa ule ukkwoong usikili lɔbba anaam gwa bbwak usseke babbu lammwɔɔl.

Lakke ba nyanga za kɛnaang a libba ka nlenɛ lɛffɔ nkopolo Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kkpɔɔ Uyini ɔttɛnɛ nkopolo Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Nzang vvenɛ nyɛn akama nsak businɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm likopolo.
Nlenɛ ka nnaangnɛ kɛnaang anaam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛnaang sa nsanganɛ gbɔɔ, nzang vvenɛ nggyan ikipili. Ɔzzànga ntɔkbongsɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛnaang anaam ka ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ lɛkpaka ɔttɛ nnaang.
Ikipili anaam ulenɛ ’bɔng? Ikipili ya nyanganɛ ulenɛ kikopolo kuttu budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, sa nkopolonɛ nsi kappya lɛbɛkɛ. Kikkpele ba ntɔk ka nkopolonɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Anaam ubili lissi. Ka bubili kɔbɔɔk ɔlɔɔt ba nle. Nllɔllɔ nsammɛ kɛyɔɔng nsseke ubili ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ nkwaaning nyanga balɔɔt ggbadam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkkwoongnɛ.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nnaangnɛ kɛnaang la balɔɔt a Jews, nkup eleme balɔɔt a Jews nkwaaning bayila kwa anaam. Anaam ɔlɔɔt a Lafɔɔ a Moses lissi, ɔzzànga nnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Jews nkwaaning bayila kwa anaam.

Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ la Ikanakana nnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wakanakana wa usinɛ ka Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews lile nkwaaning Ikanakana bayila kwa anaam. Nkwɔng baang lissi kule kɔnaang nsi Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele. Anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn nle ka tɔkɔlɔ lafɔɔ a Christ.

Nffɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila sa kɛkkaamnɛ, nsikili tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt abbɛ vvɔn nkwaaning bayila kwa anaam. Nsikili bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning nkkala balɔɔt balɔk ka ɛtɔk duu ya nkkwoongnɛ.
Nkwɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ nnaang ka lɛttɔ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning nyanga etini ka ppyɛɛ ’wɔng baang.
Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng balɔɔt ggbadam bammanɛ lɔfat, ule ɔlɔɔt vvɔn keem ka ule ɔbɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ammayɔng ning baang nkwaaning abɛtɛyɔng ayangayɔng lɛsɔɔk.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ukkoopnɛ kɛmma lɔfat utele lafɔɔ lɔfat. Ɔnaang ning baang nkwaaning ɔttɔpɔ ododo wa ule usi lɛbbɔ. Ɔzzánga ayyɔɔt inaang kwa ododo wa ule ɔbbɔ kɛfal a kɛfal.
Kwakkwɛ baang nmmanɛ ssɔng nmii ka lɔkkwɔɔn gwa lulenɛ ka lakpeke. Kwakkwɛ baang nlenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtɔɔp-iddu wa usinɛ iddu ammɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔ lɛtɔɔp.
Nkkaam ka iddu ya batɔɔpnɛnɛ. Nkat kkwɔɔt anaam doddo, tɛ̀ttɛ́ baffu babɛtɛnɛ ka nlenɛ balɔɔt balɔk lɛkkwɔɔ nttɛ baffu ikanga.
Ikpana anaam, nggyan nttɛ asanyɔng kwa kɔnaangnɛ bagɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ba bakupnɛ Moses. Ìkkpálá-lukpaaggbeede ikatnɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bakum Ukolo-lɔyɔngɔ, bulɔk busibɛ lɛnaang.
Banaangbɛ baptizim ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ikkpálá-lukpaaggbeede la lɔyɔngɔ basseke bakup-a-Moses.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bazzi kazzi kwa kassinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bavva bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’bɔng baang bbɔn. Bavva bannyi ka akpana wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbɛ. Akpana ’wɔng baang wa umiinɛ la abbɛ, ɔdɔkɔnɛ Christ biini.
Gɔɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang balɔɔt ggbadam basi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsaap. Ɔzzánga babbe bammin gbɔ́ɔgbɔ̀ɔgbɔ́ɔ ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaang bɛyɔɔyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt. Bɛttamayɛlɛ bɛttɛ ifɔngɔ kɔlɔɔk a bubbi kɛbɛlɛ lɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ banaangnɛ.
Ɔlɔk izɔɔm innyi ilɔɔp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk banaangnɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt badɔkɔ bataa-ɔtaa bazzi kazzi bavva batak, bafeele batɔm.”
Ifɔngɔyɔng kikup a bwanavva tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk banaangnɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk banaangbong ning baang lalɔp innɔ balɔɔt laffa la innɔ zzilliffa battɔ babbe basaal ka kɛtɔm ssɔn.
Ifɔngɔ Uyini kɛllɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk banaangnɛ, izzɔkɔ iwwɔɔlbɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikkwoongyɔng ibwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk babwɔɔlɔnɛ, Uyilabɔtɔɔm-a-Lubbe ɔwwɔɔlbɛ.
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaangbɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt balɔk bayɛn bakkpɔkbyɛ ka luvva, bɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔttama gwa bɛttamanɛyɛlɛ ka ilenɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya lakpeke lale ka laffɔnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ule ka kibee, ɔsan ɔnaang nkwaaning usi lɛttɔ.

Lutini illɛ duu ya iffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ ule kɛssanga illɛ sa kɛtaanɛ kiffu ka balɔɔt. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uloko nsekele ammɛ. Baala ɔfɔngɔ ballɛwɔyɔng basak lakke annyɔɔng. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɛwɔnɛyɔng, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng lakke za ale abɛtɛyɔng ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng ɛtɔk assɛ attayɔng.
Inngwa anaam ya lɔkkwɔɔn, akkyaayɔng kɛzɔɔm ilɔɔp afɔngɔyɔng.
Nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng ka alenɛyɔng basan-a-kɔlɔɔk. Attinayɔng kɛyɔɔng kwa nlɔɔknɛ.
Ivvanɛ ka ommonggo wa ikɔɔmnɛ ka kazzi Uyini iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, itulbong linnyi a Christ ivva. Izzinɛ kazzi kwa ibbɔknɛ mung iyangabong etini ka ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt a Christ.
Ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ka ulenɛ vvɔn, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt mkkpa iyipi, ile kkwɔɔt ssɔn ka ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt itulnɛ ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’wɔng baang vvɔn.
Attinayɔng kwa balɔɔt a Israel ba bazzinɛ kazzi kwa bakɔɔmnɛ bazɔɔm ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batulbong bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Mung nle nlɔɔk nang? Ilɔɔp la kazzi kwa banaangnɛ bannyi ilɔɔp kaffɔ mung ka kɔlɔɔk ɔɔ?
Maaye. Kwa nlɔɔknɛ nlɔɔk nttɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi ilat bule bwa ilat bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi. Ba nggyan nttɛ aleyɔng balɔɔt ilat.
Ba akkwoong avvayɔng ka ommonggo Uyini abbalyɔng ka ommonggo ilat lɛvva. Ba akkwoong azziyɔng kazzi Uyini abbalyɔng kwa ilat lizzi.
Mung iggyan ittɛ inaang Uyini luleep ɔɔ? Faa ittina ittɛ ayyɔɔt ittamɛnɛ lɛkkaam?
Ɔzzànga kaang battɛ, “Bayila mungyɛlɛ inaang bɔfɛɛn duu.” Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔzzànga kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi kɔyyɛɛpnɛ. “Bayila mungyɛlɛ inaang bɔfɛɛn duu.” Ɔzzànga kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi kuttelenɛ ɔlɔɔt.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔppyɛɛk kwa isak ya ammɛ biini. Ɔzzànga ɔppyɛɛk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔnaang la balɔɔt balɔk.
Akkwoong mung azzi bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bataanɛ ka kappya-isɛɛn. Mkkpa asi lɛbap, ɔssanga luttina annɔ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɛkpansi la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka annyɛ bile bya Uyini.”
Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ wa luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛ kazzi, alenɛ luttina lɛnaang gwa kimii, azzi bwa ɔtɔkɔwɔnɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayanga lɔbap kwa lɔngwa annɔ.
Wannyɔɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ ɔttɛ, “Bakɔɔmbong kazzi ’kwɔng bazɔɔm bannyi ilɔɔp.” Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛkwɛ lizzi azzenge luzzi ammɛ ka ulenɛ lɛffɔ ɔlɔɔk ning baang, ɔlɔk ɔwaamɛ.
Kwa luttina gwa annɔ lissi. Kule kwa luttina gwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Kulenɛ ning, mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ luttina ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk lɔzzanɛ lakke za kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ?
Nwomonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka kazzi anaam, ɔlɔɔt ɔkpɛnnɛ kwa ’bɔng la kazzi ’kwɔng baang.”
Kɔyyɛɛp mung. Duu bwa anaangnɛ, ule kazzi kwa azzinɛ ɔlɔk kɛvva sa avvanɛ, anaangbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ataa kɛtaa sa ale asi kɔlɔɔk lɛggyan la balɔɔt a Jews ɔlɔk la Ikanakana, ɔlɔk la balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzànga anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nnaangnɛ, nbum ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔwaamɛ ka linaang sa nnaangnɛ. Nsi budoddo bwa anaam biini lɛggyan, nggyan budoddo bwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning baddu.
Akeetnɛyɔng anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nkeetnɛ Christ.
Nbunguwɔyɔngbong ka akkenɛnɛyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la kikup a lukopolo anaam gwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng.
Ɔzzànga nggyan nttɛ asan attɛyɔng Christ ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Waanwalam ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ wanavva ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule uzzilɛttɔ a Christ.
Waanwalam wa ɔssɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm, ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kibbi balɔɔt la bɔfɛɛn ka uvvoongnɛ ka lɛttɔ, waanwalam ’wɔng baang ɔssɛɛn Christ ka izzit.

Wanavva duu wa ɔssɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm, ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kibbi ɔsɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn ka lɛttɔ ka uvvoongnɛ, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔssɛɛn ulam ka izzit. Ning baang buu ba ule la wanavva wa balemɛnɛ kittulu lɛkkpaat.
Wanavva usinɛ lɛttɔ livvoong ɔllɛ ka ɔkkpaatnɛ kittulu ɔllɔt. Kɛkkpaat a kittulu la kɛzza kittulu ka bilenɛ kɔlɔɔk izzit ka kkwɔɔt a wanavva, kɔyyɛɛp ka uvvoongnɛ lɛttɔ.
Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka waanwalam uvvoongnɛ lɛttɔ. Waanwalam ɔbal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wanavva ɔbal ɔlɔɔt.
Waanwalam ka wanavva ba ussi, wanavva ussinɛ ka waanwalam.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔnaang waanwalam kwa wanavva, ɔnaang wanavva kwa waanwalam.
Ulenɛ kwa bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, battɛ kɔyyɛɛp ka wanavva uvvoongnɛ lɛttɔ ammɛ ɔyɔɔ basan battɛ ule ka kɛkɔɔm a walam ammɛ.
Ka lɛfal ayyɔɔt la Uyini, mkkpa kɔnaang, wanavva tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ waanwalam lissi ɔyangamɛnɛ, ɔlɔk waanwalam ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ wanavva lissi ɔyangamɛnɛ ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ waanwalam ɔnaang wanavva, kule kɛssanga ssɔn, waanwalam, wanavva ɔmaatnɛ. Ɔzzànga ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bissi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biffu.
Attinayɔng ’kwɔng kɛyɔɔng. Mung kɔyyɛɛp mung ka wanavva ɔssɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm ka kibbi balɔɔt usi bɔfɛɛn ka lɛttɔ livvoong ɔɔ?
Lɛfal annɔ biini likopolowɔ lɛttɛ waanwalam kiloko kittulu ka lɛttɔ kɛlɔm, kɔlɔɔk izzit.
Kittulu sa kɛlɔmnɛ ka lɛttɔ a wanavva, bɔfɛɛn a bɔllɛ. Kittulu ka kɛlɔmmɛnɛ ning baang bannyimɛ battɛ kɛtaamɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubba wa uvvoongnɛ ka lɛttɔ.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ubumnɛ kɛkangala utumkwɛ, kwa nle nlɔɔk kule kɔttɛ ayyɔɔt, ɔlɔk izɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm eleme ɛlɔk ba iyanga ya kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm.
Ka lɔkamala gwa lule ka luffunɛ mung, annyɔɔng lissi ka nbungunɛ. Mitin a luzɔɔm annyɔɔng ɔnaang lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ litta sa liyyɛɛpnɛ.
Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, babwɔɔlɔnɛbong battɛ, ka mitin a luzɔɔm annyɔɔng lakup a balɔɔt lalɔk lale baang ba lalenɛ ka bɛkangala. Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn nsan.
(Kule bbwak ka akangalanɛyɔng nkwaaning balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka lufoom gwa bbwak bayɛnbɛ kkpelegedee.)
Ka adudanɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, kazzi Uyini lissi ka azzinɛyɔng.
Ka azzinɛyɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ututala ɔsam kwa ammɛ ɔmma umii, ɔlɔk balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔng buwɔɔng, balɔk bazzi, bavva babimi.

Ssala sa annyɔɔng biini ba ayangayɔng sa azzinɛyɔng kazzi avvayɔng batak ɔɔ? Vvenɛ afimyɔng luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm asamyɔng balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ appyɛɛ assɛɛnyɔng ka izzit ɔɔ? Attina attɛyɔng nle nlɔɔk nang la annyɔɔng ntum ’kwɔng? Nbunguwɔyɔng ɔɔ? Maaye, baala nbunguwɔyɔng.
Lukopolo gwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng mung lussinɛ ka Uyini. Nttɛ Uyini, Jesus, ka kɛtɔm sa bazzimɛnɛ issɛ ɔsam brɛɛd,
uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔsamnɛ ɔbɛkɛ unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam ya elenɛ ya annyɔɔng. Anaangyɔng ning nkwaaning akkenɛyɔng.”

Balenɛ kazzi livve, ɔbbal ommonggo lɛsam, ɔttɛ, “Ommonggo ’wɔng mung ulenɛ ufaa kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ussinɛ ka linnyi anaam. Ɛkɛtɛ duu ya avvanɛyɔng ka ammɛ, anaangyang ning baang nkwaaning akkenɛyɔng.”
Ɛkɛtɛ duu ya azzinɛyɔng brɛɛd ’wɔng mung, avvayɔng ka ommonggo ’wɔng, abwɔɔlɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk a lubbe ammɛ tɔttɔt Uyini ɔppyɛlɛ uffu.
Nkwɔng kɔbbal likup: ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ kazzi Uyini, ɔlɔk ɔvva ka ommonggo ammɛ ka ɛtɔk ya kusinɛ Uyini lɛsaap, ɔnaangbong bubbi utum kkwɔɔt Uyini la linnyi ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uttinamɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, tɛ́ttɛ́ uzzi kazzi ’kwɔng mung ɔvva ka ommonggo ’wɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ ifɛɛt a kkwɔɔt Uyini lɛsan, ɛkɛtɛ ya uzzinɛ kazzi Uyini ɔvva ka ommonggo ammɛ ɔwwɔɔlmɛbong kɛyɔɔng.
Kwakkwɛ baang annyɔɔng balɔk ɔffaakwɔnɛyɔng, akkpɛlɛyɔng, balɔk bassɛ la babbe.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ikɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ittinayɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng, nzang ka kɛkaal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ittɔ.
Ɔzzànga Uyini ka ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal ayyɔɔt ɔbbayɛlɛ bikɔɔm, nkwaaning basiyɛlɛ lɛwwɔɔl batoolo la ’vveeng wɔng.
Ikpana anaam, ɛkɛtɛ duu ya aggbanɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn attɛ azziyɔng kazzi Uyini, ataa akatyɔng bannyɔɔng azziyɔng kɛttɛlɛ kɛttɛlɛ.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa buwɔɔng bulemɛnɛ lɛsaap, uzzi kazzi ka ssala nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiwɔ kibbi linnyi ka alenɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn liduda. Lilɔɔk sa lissekenɛ, vvenɛ nkaalsɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nffu.
Gedegede mung nle ka nlɔɔknɛ kwa lasɔɔk za lassinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Nggyan nttɛ asanyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn atumyɔngzɛ, ikpana anaam.
Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya atiinɛyɔng ba ilat, atiiyɔng ka eddu ilɔɔp, ya itaanɛ ikɔɔmwɔyɔng amiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛbbɔlnɛ.
Asan attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule wa ule ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Jesus, ubbu ɔlɔɔt.” Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ba ule wa ule ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Jesus ulenɛ Uyini” Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusinɛ la ammɛ lile.
Lasɔɔk za Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔsɔɔknɛ lale bɛssanga bɛssanga. Ɔzzànga Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn kɔsɔɔknɛ.
Itɔk ile ggbadam ya atelenɛ Uyini, ɔzzànga itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ itele Uyini ’wɔng baang vvɔn keem.
Bɛssanga lakke bile ggbadam bya anaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn, ɔzzànga Ebinukkpaapi ’yɔng baang nnyɔn ennyinɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lakke za kɛnaangbyɛ.
Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kɔkɔɔm itɔk buubuu kɔyɔɔwɔyɔng kɔttɛ kule baang la annyɔɔng kwa budoddo ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’kwɔng baang kunnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt kukele. Akkwɛ kkwɔn baang kunnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk bikɔɔm.
Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn kunnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kiyila. Akkwɛ kkwɔn baang kunnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk lakke za kittula ittula.

Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk lakke za kɛnaang a bɛmaanga. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kunnyimɛ lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ebinukkpaapi. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kunnyimɛ lakke za kɛsan a lɛsɔɔk za lissinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lɛsɔɔk za lisinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kunnyimɛ lakke za kikkwoong a kitolo likaan. Ɔlɔk kunnyimɛ lakke ukkwoong ɔbwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ.
Ɔzzànga Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn kɔnaangnɛ bɛssanga lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kunnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt kɛssanga lɛsɔɔk za ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛkwɛ.
Christ ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn la bikkeep ggbadam. Ɔzzànga ule kkwɔɔt ssɔn mkkpa ndɔk bikkeep bile buubuu.

Ka ɛtɔk nnyɔn, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana, babili la balɔɔt ba basinɛ babili lile, Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kɔnaangbonyɛlɛ baptizim isseke ba kkwɔɔt ssɔn. Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt bannyibongyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn battɛ ivva.
Kkwɔɔt biini kikkeep ssɔn ba liyanga. Bikkeep bilesɛ ggbadam.
Ulenɛ ka kikkpɔ kɛlɔɔknɛ kɛttɛ, “Anaam ka nsinɛ kɔbɔɔk lile, anaam wa kkwɔɔt lissi.” Nkwɔng baang lissi kule kɔnaang kikkpɔ kisi kikkeep a kkwɔɔt lile.
Ulenɛ ka kɔtɔɔk kɔlɔɔknɛ kɔttɛ, “Anaam ka nsinɛ zzeen lile, anaam wa kkwɔɔt lissi.” Nkwɔng baang lissi kule kɔnaang kɔtɔɔk kusi kikkeep a kkwɔɔt lile.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lisikilinɛ zzeen, lile linaang nang lippyee? Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lilenɛ kɔtɔɔk keem, lile linaang nang lippyee kizzoom?
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛn ɔlɔɔt bikkeep ka kkwɔɔt buubuu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
Kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lilenɛ kikkeep ssɔn, nzang kkwɔɔt lisibong lile.
Ka kulenɛ ning, bikkeep a kkwɔɔt bile ggbadam, ɔzzànga kkwɔɔt lile ssɔn.
Kwakkwɛ zzeen lisinɛ likkwoong lɛlɔɔk la kɔbɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Annɔ wɔ ba ngyan.” Gɔɔ lɛttɔ ba likkwoong lɛlɔɔk la bukkpɔ lɛttɛ, “Anaam wɔ ba nggyan.”
Ɔzzànga kaang ning kɔlɔk ba ikkwoong inaang bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ’byɔng baang bya bɛkpɛlɛnɛ bisinɛyɛlɛ lile.
Ɔzzànga bikkeep ’byɔng baang bya ittinanɛ ittɛ abbyɛ bya kɔlɔɔk gaang ba bile, abbyɛ bilenɛ bya ikɔɔmnɛ byɛ doddo. Bikkeep a kkwɔɔt bya bisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, bɛppyɛɛnɛ bile bya latele.
Ɔzzanga bikkeep ’byɔng baang bilenɛ bya bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt bya bɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp bisinɛ lɛggyan. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔlɔɔmbong kkwɔɔt kɛlɔɔm sa utelenɛ bikkeep a kkwɔɔt bya bɛsɛlɛnɛ latele.
Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ kkwɔɔt lile ssɔn. Bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bɛyanga kɛssanga kɛnaang ssɔn la ba abbɛ.
Kikkeep a kkwɔɔt ssɔn kɛyɛnnɛ akama, bikkeep ’byɔng bakang ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛssɛ bɛyɛn akama. Babungunɛ kikkeep ssɔn, bikkeep ’byɔng kaang ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛssɛ bɛyanga laggele.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng kkwɔɔt a Christ. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ulenɛ kikkeep a kkwɔɔt ammɛ.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsambongyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka luzɔɔm. Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, uloko bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, ka ɔssɛ-ɔttɛlɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka bikpit bɛkkyaat, uloko bakopolo-ukopolo ɔbɛtɛ la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bɛmaanga la balɔɔt ba unnyinɛbɛ lakke za kittula ittula, ɔlɔk battele ba abbɛ ɔlɔk bakɔɔmbɛ, ɔlɔk batolo bafaa likaan.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ lissi balenɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk bakopolo lukopolo. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ lissi bayanganɛ lakke za kɛnaang a bɛmaanga,
ɔlɔk kittula ittula, ɔlɔk kitolo ufaa kukaan, ɔlɔk kɛbwɔɔlɔ kwa balɔɔknɛ.
Asam ippyam annyɔɔng alokoyɔng ka lasɔɔk ’zɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, za lattanɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɔzzanga nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng lɛsɔɔk za lattanɛ lasɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Nkkwoongnɛ nlɔɔk likaan ɔkkpɛlɛ la sa bayilabɔtɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɛsaap kisinɛnɛ lile ka luppyam, lɛmmwɔɔl anaam lɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔsap a kippwo ɔkyamkyam, ɔlɔk okeleng.
Nyanganɛ lakke za kɛyɛn a biyɛnɛ, nsannɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ngbaa la kɔlɔɔk a lalup Ebinukkpaapi, nyanganɛ kiyila sa nkkwoongnɛ nlɔɔk ikpok immɔk, ɔzzanga nsɛlɛnɛ kɛsaap, nle bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ.
Mkkpa nsam bɛfɛɛn anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ nnyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, ɔlɔk nsam kkwɔɔt anaam nnyibɛ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn, likkɔm nsɛlɛnɛ kɛsaap isak nɛ ba ile.
Kɛsaap ulenɛ kibbe luppyam la kɛyyɛɛp a bɛnaang, kɛsaap kɔfɔk lissi, gɔɔ ikkɔlɔ iyyɛɛp a wa annyɔɔng lissi. Kɛsaap bisese lissi.
Kɛsaap kɛbbɔl eleme lissi, Kɛsaap kitun a kɔlɔɔk la wa annyɔɔng ba kɛyanga.
Kɛsaap bubbi ba kɛggyan, kɛggyan lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
Kɛsaap ba kɛsaal. Kiyila la luttina la kibbe-luppyam-assɛ ba bɛsaal.
Kɛsaap ba kikpeke. Buyɛnɛ bule baang, ɔzzànga vvenɛ bukpeke. Lasɔɔk za kitolo likaan lale baang, ɔzzànga vvenɛ lasaal. Kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk kile baang, ɔzzànga vvenɛ kɛsaal.
Kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ba itaka isan. Biyɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ba itaka iyɛn.
Ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ vveeng ule ukpeke kufaak a kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk la biyɛnɛ vvenɛ baala kule. Ule usseke uwɔlɔlɔ.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ntiinɛ waantiti, nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti. Nsan kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti. Nttina luttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ka nlenɛ utumalɔɔt lile, nzzɔɔkbong biwaan ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Bwa nyɛnnɛ gedegede mung butaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa nyɛnnɛ ka kiyenge ka kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɛkɛtɛ lakpeke ɛffɔnɛ, vvenɛ ibee ippyɛɛk ka isso. Bwa nsannɛ gedegede mung, doddo bwɛ ba nsan. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nsanbyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ebinukkpaapi ɛsanɛnɛ anaam.
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛkkyaat bilenɛ kɔlɔɔk: kiyila, luttina, la kɛsaap. Ɔzzánga kɛsaap kɛttanɛbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ liggbenge.
Kɛsaap ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa abumnɛ gaang gaang attɛ ayanga. Asam ippyam annyɔɔng alokoyɔng ka lɛsɔɔk za Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiwɔnɛyɔng, gaang gaang lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan, ba ɔlɔɔk unnyi balɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔk la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk a lalup a lɔkkwɔɔn ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, balɔɔt baala bappyee.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt, uttelebɛ, ɔnaangbɛ bakkaam luppyam, ɔnaangbɛ ɔwaabɛ ɔgbaa.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan uttelemɛ kɛyɔɔng keem. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttele luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Kɔsaapnɛ mung ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alɔɔknɛ yɔng bafaa likaan, ɔzzànga kɔttanɛ lɛsaap ka ayanganɛyɔng lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa lɛbaang ɔtta ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan. Kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ baala kɔyaam, ɔlɔɔt usinɛ baang lile ɔbwɔɔlɔ bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ.

Ikpana anaam, ka nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng mung, nlɔɔknɛ ufaa kukaan kwa asinɛyɔng lippyee, attina attɛyɔng baang nle ntaawɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔng? Bulɔk ba bule ntakabong nkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl za lissinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk kukele, ɔlɔk bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛ, ɔlɔk lukopolo lɔlɔk nfeewɔyɔng.
Gɔɔ ibin ya isɛlɛnɛ kuddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luppet la biggɔ, ɔlɔɔt ule ɔnaang nang uppyee doddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛkkpanɛ, usinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl zzɔn zzɔn lɛgɔpɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛttanɛ?
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔlnɛ luffi lɛkɔɔng usinɛ doddo lɛwɔl, nnyinɔɔng ule uppyee ɔnaang ibama lɛkɔɔng?
Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn. Ɔlɔɔt ule ɔnaang nang uppyee kwa alɔɔknɛ atum, abwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ ka ufaa kukaan kwa ɔlɔɔt ule usi lippyee? Kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ annyi kɛffa.
Likaan lile ggbadam buubuu ka vveeng ’wɔng mung, ɔzzánga kukaan kkwɔn gbɔɔ kwa kɔsɛlɛnɛ ifɛɛt ba kule.
Ɔzzànga nsinɛ kukaan kwa balɔɔknɛ lippyee, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛkwɛ ulenɛ anaam wa akanakana. Anaam nssɛ nlemɛ ammɛ wa Akanakana.
Ka alenɛyɔng baang ka abumnɛ attɛ ayangayɔng lɛsɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm attayɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, abumyɔng gaang gaang anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bya bile bɛyaam luzɔɔm lɔmmala.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan, ubum ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm unnyi Uyini ɔgbaamɛ lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Ulenɛ ka nzɔɔmnɛ ka kukaan kwa nsinɛ lippyee, kuyeeng anaam vvenɛ kɔssɛ kɔzɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzanga luttina anaam baang baala lule.
Nle nnaang nang? Nle nzɔɔm la kuyeeng anaam, nzɔɔm la luttina anaam ɔgbaa. Nsoom la kuyeeng anaam, nsoom ka luttina anaam ɔgbaa.

Awomonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka kukaan kwa balɔɔt ba basinɛ lippyee, ɔlɔɔt wa gbɔɔ wa ulenɛ baang ka mitin ule ɔnaang nang ɔsan ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Kule baning,” ka luzɔɔm annɔ gwa azɔɔmnɛ? Baala ɔsan bwa alɔɔknɛ.
Mkkpa luzɔɔm a kiwomo kɛnaang annɔ gwa azɔɔmnɛ annyi Ebinukkpaapi lɔyyɛɛp, ɔlɔɔt wakang baala lɔyaam.
Nwomobong Ebinukkpaapi kɛnaang ka nlɔɔknɛ bafaa lammwɔɔl ba atakanɛyɔng kɛtɔm kɛlɔk lippyee nttawɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔzzànga ka kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm, ntolo lakkɔ kubbwɔɔk kkeem za ɔlɔɔt ule uppyee, nkwaaning nkopolo balɔɔt balɔk kɔlɔɔk, lutini nle nlɔɔk innɔ-innɔ lammwɔɔl ka likaan sa basinɛ lippyee.
Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ka ittina. Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ka ɛtɔk a kɛnaang a bubbi. Ɔzzànga assɛɛnyɔng bugɛlɛnya ka ittina.
Ka luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkpɔk battɛ; “Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛ, vvenɛ nssɛ la balɔɔt ba balɔɔknɛ likaan ntolo kutolo nnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng. Vvenɛ ntolo ka kamma balɔɔt ikaan ilɔk, ɔzzanga nɛ baala bagɔpɔlɔ!”

Lɛsɔɔk za kitolo ufaa kukaan ulenɛ iyɔɔ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ kiyila lɛyanga. Lɛsɔɔk za bayanga kiyila lissi. Ule lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem ka ulenɛ iyɔɔ ya bayanga-kiyila.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ lubbinɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ utolo ufaa kukaan, balɔɔt balɔk, ɔlɔk ɔsɛlɛ-kiyila uffunɛ, vvenɛ balɔɔk battɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng attɔyɔngbong bikun.
Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, balɔɔt balɔk, ɔlɔk ɔsɛlɛ-kiyila uffunɛ vvenɛ ɔkkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi ɔfɔngɔ ka ule uppyee kwa alɔɔknɛ. Vvenɛ uttina utum kwa uppyeenɛ.
Ittina ammɛ ya ulupnɛ vvenɛ itta ka vveeng. Vvenɛ ukun laddu ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule mung la annyɔɔng!”

Ikpana anaam, nlɔɔk nttɛ ka adudanɛyɔng ka luzɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyanga kisoom, wa vvɔn ɔyanga lukopolo. Ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyɛn biyɛnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ kwa ɔyɛn-a-biyɛnɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ. Lutini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ búlé bwa buyaamnɛ luzɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔknɛ ka ufaa kukaan, balɔɔt baffa ɔlɔk bakkyaat balɔɔk, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn vvɔn. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ bwa balɔɔknɛ.
Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usinɛ baang lile wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ kwa likaan ’sɔng baang lilɔɔknɛ, ɔlɔɔknɛ-a-likaan ’sɔng baang ɔtaa zzum ka ɔdda mitin. Ɔppyɛɛ ɔlɔɔk unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Balɔɔt baffa ɔlɔk bakkyaat ba bayanganɛ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔɔk. Balɔk bataa battina bwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balɔɔknɛ.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ulenɛ baang ka ɔdda mitin wa ɔyanganɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka kɛlɔɔk uzum.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt vvɔn vvɔn ukkwoong mung ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning ɔkkpɛlɛ bakkoop bayanga kɛkkaam a luppyam.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔkɔɔmzɛ doddo ka kamma ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔggyan ɔttɛ inaang tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ, ɔggyan ɔttɛ itaa ka bɔkaat. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ ka izɔɔm a balɔɔt ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ,
bwanavva bataa zzum ka mitin a luzɔɔm. Kufuk ba bayanga kwa kɛlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews lalɔɔknɛ lattɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bale ka kizzi lɛttɔ.
Bayanganɛ lɔbap, babap bwalam abbɛ ka bale baffɔ ka ssala. Ule kɔlɔɔk izzit ka wanavva ɔzzanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ka mitin a luzɔɔm.
Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi ka annyɔɔng liffu ɔɔ? Faa annyɔɔng keem alenɛyɔng ba liffunɛ kwa annyɔɔng?
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ulenɛ baang wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk ammɛ ɔyanganɛ lɛsɔɔk za lissinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔkɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ bwa nkkpɔknɛ nnyiwɔyɔng mung bussi ka lakke Uyini.
Ɔzzanga usinɛ ’kwɔng doddo lɛgɔpɔlɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ agɔpɔlɔmɛyɔng ammɛ.
Ikpana anaam, alokoyɔng ippyam annyɔɔng ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ kitolo likaan kittunwɔyɔng.
Anaangyɔng lutini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ doddo.
Ikpana anaam, nggyan nttɛ nkkewɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk a Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng, kwa atɔknɛyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng kɛkkaam.
Uwɔng baang ule lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bɔtɔɔm bwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng. Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile lɛkkalawɔyɔng, akɔɔmnɛyɔngzɛ kkpɔk. Asinɛyɔngzɛ kkpɔk lɛkɔɔm, nzang kiyila asiyɔngbong lɛyanga.
Anaam nnyiwɔyɔng bwa ntɔknɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Abbwɛ bulenɛ bwa buttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Bule buttɛ: Christ ubbe ka bubbi ayyɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkpɔknɛ ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ballimɛ. Bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe ɔtaa ka kuddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.
Ufungalanɛ, ɔyɔɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter. Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ɔbbalmɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛyɔɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa.
Ɔttɛ ɔbbal lɛnaang, ɔbbalmɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛyɔɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a kibbi balɔɔt ammɛ sa kɛsaknɛ nnɔ la lalɔp kubbwɔɔk ka balenɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ. Balɔk babbebong ɔzzànga balɔk badɔkɔ batii ikokolo.
Utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a James, ɔbbal lituma ka ɛfɛɛn a bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ka lakuma, utuma ka ɛfɛɛn anaam, mkkpandɔk nle ɔlɔɔt wa basimɛnɛ ka bbwak lɛmaat.
Anaam nttanɛ lɛbbɔl ntta bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ba nkkɔnɔ kɛkkwɔɔnɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ka nyɔɔnɛ luzɔɔm akama gaang gaang.

Latele za unnyinɛnɛ lanaangnɛ nle wa nlenɛ gedegede mung. Nnaangbong kɛnaang gaang gaang ntta bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka lakke anaam biini lissi ka nnaangnɛ, nnaang ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛnɛ ppyɛɛ.
Ɔzzànga mkkpa kussi ka anaam kuffu ɔlɔk ka abbɛ, nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ikopolonɛ, annyɔɔng ayilayɔng.
Gedegede mung ka bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ bulenɛ buttɛ Christ ufungalabong ka lubbe, ’bɔng tɛ́ttƐ́ annyɔɔng balɔɔt balɔk attɛyɔng babbu baala bafungala ka lubbe bataa ka kuddu?
Kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng baang kulenɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔzzànga ɔ̀ttɛ́ Christ usi lifungala ka lubbe.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm butakanɛ Christ lifungala ka lubbe, nzang bulɔk ba iyanga bwa ikopolonɛ. Gɔɔ annyɔɔng bulɔk ba bule bwa ale ayilayɔng.
Gɔɔ nzang bayɔɔbongyɛlɛ battɛ ikkala lɛlaak itum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ ufungalabong Christ ka lubbe; nzang kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn babbu ka lubbe baala bafungala bataa ka kuddu.
Babbu batakanɛ lifungala, nzang Christ ba ɔtaka ufungala.
Christ ɔtakanɛ lifungala nzang kiyila annyɔɔng kile bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ. Atiiyɔng ka bubbi.
Ɔgbaa nzang balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Christ bale libbe, bataakbong.
Ulenɛ ka kiyila ayyɔɔt ka Christ kɛyyɛɛpnɛ ka lɛfal ’zɔng keem ka ɛkpansi, kɔlɔk kusi lɛbɛlɛ lile, nzang nzɔɔn ɔtta wa ayyɔɔt lile ɔtta wa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng.
Ka lɔkkwɔɔn Christ ufungalabong ka lubbe. Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ balɔɔt ba babbenɛ vvenɛ bafungala ka lubbe ɔgbaa.
Lubbe ka lussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn luffu ka ɛkpansi, kifungala ka lubbe kɛssɛ kissi ning baang ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn kiffu ka ɛkpansi.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka babbenɛ ka bɔkaat abbɛ la Adam (Uyya), bɔkaat abbɛ la Christ vvenɛ bussɛ bufungalabɛ ka lubbe bataa ka kuddu.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ule ule ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ya bbwak: Christ ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk, balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba Christ bakupmɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ kiffu ammɛ.
Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, lakpeke laffu. Christ vvenɛ ɔbɛpɛ liyeeng ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔgbaa la lakke la lagabwɔ, tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsam vveengodde unnyi abassɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Christ vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm vveengodde tɔttɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛtɛ lifɔk ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔsambɛ uloko using bukkpɔ.
Kɔfɔk ammɛ kwa ule ɔbɛtɛ ka lakpeke ulenɛ lubbe.

Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko using bukkpɔ.” Kule ppwool ka lɔkkwɔɔn, lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng za “Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ” ba liffik Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsamnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyi Christ lɛssɛɛn.
Ka bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bìlénɛ bya Christ lile, ammɛ biini, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng la bɛfɛɛn unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔppyɛɛ ɔkɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ baptizim lɛnaang kwa babbu bɛɛ? Badɔkɔ battɛ isak abbɛ ulenɛ ’bɔng? Kulenɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ battɛ babbu ba babɛlɛ lifungala bataa ka kuddu; ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ballɔt bannyi kwa babbu?
Mbɔng ayyɔɔt isinɛ lubbe lɛmma?
Ikpana anaam nyɛn lubbe ka zzeen ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɔwaa bwa nyanganɛ ka lafal ayyɔɔt la annyɔɔng ka Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, bunaangnɛnɛ nlɔɔk ’kwɔng:

Kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ ka nllunɛ kullu la isɛɛn-a-kɛmat ka Ephesus ka lagabwɔ, mung isak ilenɛnɛ ka ’bɔng? Ulenɛ ka babbu basinɛ lifungala bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu, afɔngɔ izziyɔng, ivva iggeleyɔng ka lufat ile ibbe; ikupnɛ imma balɔɔt.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayila ɔlɔɔt ɔdɛmwɔyɔng, ɛnngwa ya ɛbbɔlnɛ ɛbɛpɛ eleme ɔlɔɔt.
Appyɛlɛ anaangyɔng ittina ya bbwak. Akkyaayɔng kɛnaang a bubbi afɔngɔyɔng. Izzit inaangwɔyɔng ka annyɔɔng balɔk asinɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung ɔnaang nang vvenɛ babbu bafungala ka lubbe. Bale bayanga bɔkka kɛssanga kkwɔɔt?”
Ukun! akɔɔnnɛ ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ka lisse, ebbebong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ emeet.
Ka akɔɔnnɛyɛ ka lisse, ele ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn keem, ɔlɔk ɛfɔɔk a alaasi, ɔlɔk ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk. Lɛsan biini lissi ka limeetnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang kkwɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uttinanɛ. Unnyi ɛfɔɔk la nnyɔn kkwɔɔt sa likkɔnɔnɛyɛ.

Ekkpakkwɔɔt a bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyanganɛ kuddu kɛssanga ssɔn ba ele. Ɔlɔɔt ule ka kkwɔɔt sa ammɛ zzekep. Isɛɛn a kɛmat ile ka kkwɔɔt sa annyɛ zzekep. Bunɔɔn bule ka kkwɔɔt sa abbwɛ zzekep. Isɛɛnabannyi ile ka kkwɔɔt sa annyɛ zzekep.
Bɛfɛɛn bya libat bile bakang ka libat. Bya ɛkpansi bile mung ka ɛkpansi. Bɔllɛ bwa bɛfɛɛn bya libat bule buu la bɔllɛ bwa bɛfɛɛn bya ɛkpansi.
Livve luwee lɛyanga bɔllɛ bwa azzɛ. Ettuma ɛyanga kɛssanga bɔllɛ bulɔk. Bwaanttuma bayanga bɔllɛ bwa abbɛ zzekep. Bwaanttuma balɔk bale baang ba bɔllɛ bwa abbɛ bubbalnɛ zzekep lile.
Kule kule ning mung ka ɛkɛtɛ ya babbu bale bafungala ka lubbe bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu. Basamnɛ ɔlɔɔt balli, ubbebong. Ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe, ba ɔbɛlɛ libbe kɛfal a kɛfal.
Ka lilli, ale ubbu bɔfɛɛn wa wikiwiki. Ɔzzanga ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalawɔnɛ vvenɛ ayanga bɔllɛ bwa lɔkkwɔɔn la bɔkkaam.

Ka lilli ale la kkwɔɔt ’sɔng kaang. Ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalawɔnɛ, asseke la kkwɔɔt sa kuyeeng ammɛ. Kule baning, kkwɔɔt sa iyɛnnɛ mung lile baang, Kwakkwɛ baang kkwɔɔt a kuyeeng lissɛnɛ lile baang.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang Adam, ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk ɔlɔɔt, ɔttɛ ɔyanga kuddu.” Ɔzzanga usseke-isimi-Adam ulenɛ Kuyeeng kwa kunnyinɛ kuddu.
Lɛfal za kuyeeng lissi littenɛ liffu. Lɛfal za gbɔɔ littenɛ liffu tɛ́ttɛ́ za kuyeeng liffu.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔbɛkɛ kɛbat ɛkpansi ɔnaang Adam wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk. Adam wa ɔbbalnɛ liffu mung ussi ka libat uffu.
Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba ɛkpansi bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bakɔɔmnɛ kɛbat banaangmɛ. Ba balenɛ ba libat, bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt ibalnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ ile issɛ ibal Ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu ning baang.
Ikpana anaam, kwa nlɔɔknɛ, nlɔɔk nttɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa banaangnɛbwɛ la ɛkkpakkwɔɔt la linnyi ba bukkwoong bumii ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbenɛ ba bukkwoong buyanga etini businɛ libbe.

Agɔpɔlɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng: Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt baala ibbe. Ɔzzanga ɔffɔnɛ ka luffi gwa lakuma lɔttanɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt vvenɛ ifoolo eseese. Ka ɛkɛtɛ lɛmmwɔɔl usseke-isimi luffi lile lɛtta, babbu vvenɛ bafungala ka lubbe baddu kuddu, tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ifoolo.
Bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbenɛ vvenɛ busam bwa businɛ libbe buvvoongbwɛ kɛyɔɔng. Bɔfɛɛn bwa buddɔlɔnɛ, vvenɛ busam bɔfɛɛn bwa businɛ lɛddɔlɔ buvvoongbwɛ kɛyɔɔng.

Bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbenɛ bulenɛ bwa businɛ libbe lɛsam buvvoongbwɛ kɛyɔɔng, bwa buddɔlɔnɛ bule bwa businɛ lɛddɔlɔ lɛsam buvvoongbwɛ kɛyɔɔng, lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ luffu bɔk ka lɔttɛnɛ, “Vvenɛ ɔbɛpɛ lubbe, ɔbɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
“Lubbe, annɔ abɛtɛ nang? Lakke za kɛwwɔɔl lalewɔ yang?”
Lubbe lɔtɔk lakke kɛwwɔɔl ka bubbi. Bubbi butɔk lakke ka Lafɔɔ.
Nzɔɔn kɛnaang ule wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛyɛlɛ Jesus Christ wa ulenɛ lakke kɛbɛtɛ lubbe.
Ikpana anaam, abeeyɔng kibee annyɔɔng kɛkkaamwɔyɔng. Anaangyɔng kɛnaang a Uyini ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Duu bwa anaangnɛ annyiyɔng Uyini busɛlɛ isak ba bule.
Kwa akkpɔknɛ atumyɔng kissi ikkpoko ya kɛyaam a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Judea, anaangyɔng kwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛ balɔɔt a izɔɔm ka Galatia nttɛ banaang.
Kɛtɔm-a-luzɔɔm la ssɔn, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt unnyi ikkpoko tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyanganɛ nkwaaning kussi kɔlɔk kusi lile ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nffu.
Nlenɛ liffu vvenɛ ntɔɔm balɔɔt ba asanganɛyɔng la ileta ibwɔɔlɔ, basam lasɔɔk annyɔɔng bamii Jerusalem.
Kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka anaam nssɛnɛ nmii, vvenɛ ikkuma la abbɛ imii.
Vvenɛ nsak ka Macedonia nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
Usinɛ lɛkkyam vvenɛ ntaa ka waan ɛkɛtɛ la annyɔɔng, ɔlɔk ntaa la annyɔɔng lukook lɔsaal. Ɔlɔk attelenɛyɔng ka kɔssɛ anaam, ɛfɛɛn duu ya nle nbbal limii.
Ba nggyan nttɛ nyɛnwɔyɔng la lazzuma. Nttina kɛtaa la annyɔɔng mmɛmmɛ ulenɛ ka Uyini ule ɔfɔngɔnɛ.
Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ntaa mung ka Ephesus tɔttɔt ɔffɔ kɛtɔm-a-Pentecost.
Kufuk a kɛnaang a kɛnaang sa bbwak sa doddo kule baang, mkkpa kusi balɔɔt balɔk lɛsaap.
Timothy uffunɛ ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng, atɔkmɛyɔng ka latele tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ, ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang Uyini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nnaangnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkpɛnmɛ. Attelemɛyɔng ka kɔssɛ ammɛ ka bɔkaat nkwaaning ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam; ka nlenɛ baang ka nkatnɛ kɛppyɛlɛ ammɛ la ikpana ammɛ.
Kwa Apollos, ɔkpana ayyɔɔt: nle baang nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ ukoolowɔyɔng la ikpana ayyɔɔt ilɔk, ɔzzànga ba ɔtaka uyila gedegede mung ɔttɛ vvenɛ umii. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔyanganɛ kufuk mkkpa kɔnaang vvenɛ umii.
Akatyɔng, abeeyɔng kkpɔk ka kiyila annyɔɔng. Akwulayɔng, akkaamyɔng.
Anaangyɔng kɛnaang annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɛsaap.
Asanyɔng mung kwa Stephanas la itutum ammɛ ɔɔ? Abbɛ balenɛ bakɔɔm-ɛtɔk a balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka Greece. Basambongbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi ka kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ikpana anaam, nkkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge,
nttɛ akupyɔng linaang a kizzilɛttɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa balɔɔt ’bɔng mung, la ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang la abbɛ ɔlɔk ɔtaa la abbɛ.
Nggelebong ka kiffu sa Stephanas la Fortunatus, la Achaicus baffunɛ. Baffubong batɔk kɛtaa annɔ ka asinɛ lile.
Banaangnɛbong nggele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangwɔnɛ annɔ. Kɛssanga balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ’sɔng bale ba kɛssɛɛn ka luppyam.
Izɔɔm ya ilenɛ ka ɛkpansi a Asia battɛ nwomowɔyɔng: Aquila la Priscilla la balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ba bataanɛ ka ssala abbɛ batɔɔmnɛ luwomo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt ya ilenɛ mung ɔkkpɛlɛ itɔɔm luwomo ifeewɔyɔng. Awomoyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn la kigbugba tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkpana annyɔɔng.
Anaam Paul nkɔɔmnɛ kɔbɔɔk anaam nkkpɔk ’kwɔng: “Nwomowɔyɔngbong ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ Uyini litele nzɔɔm ɔkaamɛ ammɛ! Marana tha— ning baang ulenɛ Uyini, affu.
Lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, lataa annyɔɔng.
Kɛsaap anaam kɛtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Christ Jesus.
Paul, uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ Jesus, wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangamɛnɛ la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Timothy, bakkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng bafee balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Corinth; la Greece ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, unnyiwɔyɔng lakke la bɔkaat.
Iwomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, uggwoom a kɔlɔɔk a Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa kɛyaam ɔkkpɛlɛ kissinɛ ka ammɛ kiffu.
Ɔyaamyɛlɛ ka lilɔɔk ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning ikkwoong iyaam balɔɔt balɔk ba bayanganɛ bɛssanga lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Iyaambɛ ka kɛssanga kɛyaam ’sɔng baang ssɔn sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaamnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyanganɛ etini ka akama wa Christ ɔyɛnnɛ, ile issɛ ka Christ iyanga etini ka kɛyaam ammɛ sa lɛbaang ɔgbaa.

Iyɛnnɛ akama, iyɛn kwa kɛyaamwɔyɔng la kwa kuddu annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaamnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyaamwɔyɔng annyɔɔng. Ɔgbaa, unnyiwɔyɔng lakke za kɛbbɔ akama la kibbe luppyam ɔgbaa la kɛssanga kɛbbɔ akama sa ayyɔɔt ibbɔnɛ.
Luttina ayyɔɔt ka annyɔɔng ba lɔgbata. Isan lɔsan ittɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayanganɛyɔng etini ka akama ayyɔɔt, assɛ ayangayɔng etini ning baang ka kɛyaam sa ayaamnɛyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt, iggyan ittɛ ikkewɔyɔng lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛyɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi a Asia. Lilɔɔk sa babɛtɛnɛyɛlɛ lisak lɛttala isam zzeen a kuddu.
Ittina ittɛ baang bazzabong kɛkaal ayyɔɔt battɛ ibbe. Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning ɔkkaamyɛlɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem wa ufungalanɛ babbu, kwa ayyɔɔt biini lissi.
Ka ussinɛ ka akama lubbe ɔkkalayɛlɛ, vvenɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ. Isambong ittina ayyɔɔt iloko ka ammɛ ittɛ vvenɛ abbalyɛlɛ lɛkkala,

tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng attelenɛyɔngyɛlɛ ka luzɔɔm gwa azɔɔmnɛ assɛɛnyɔngyɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uppyee luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ gwa bazɔɔmnɛ bassɛɛnyɛlɛ. Vvenɛ ɔnaangyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ. Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bayeek lɛmmwɔɔl abbɛ bawomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang bannyiyɛlɛ.

Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔkkyaanɛyɛlɛ. Luttina ayyɔɔt lɔbwɔɔlɔbongyɛlɛ lɔttɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛsaap sa ɔyɔɔnɛyɛlɛ bɛkɔɔmnɛ lafal ayyɔɔt ka vveeng ’wɔng. Gaang gaang lassi ayyɔɔt la annyɔɔng. Kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bisana a vveengodde lissi.
Ikkpɔk bwa ale akkwoong akkwɔɔyɔng ifeewɔyɔng. Nttina nttɛ vvenɛ asanyɔngkwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lakpeke.

Kippyee kɔlɔɔk ayyɔɔt sa appyeenɛyɔng gedegede mung kile ssup, nttina nttɛ vvenɛ appyeeyɔng doddo affatayɔng nkwaaning ɔkkyaawɔyɔng ka Kɛtɔm-Uyini Jesus kwa ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt ule ɔkkyaayɛlɛ kwa annyɔɔng.
Ndɔkɔ nggba ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛsan, kwakkwɛ nnaangnɛ luttina ka ikeeng gwa kikoolowɔyɔng nkwaaning ayangayɔng ppyɛɛ ka bikkpit bɛffa.
Nnaang luttina gwa kikoolowɔyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ nle ka nmiinɛ Macedonia la ɛkɛtɛ nle nppyɛlɛ, nkwaaning attelenɛyɔng ka nle ka nmiinɛ Judea.
Ka nttinanɛ ’kwɔng ndɔkɔ nfoolo luttina ɔɔ? Ka nnaangnɛ ’gwɔng, nnaang gwɛ la kɛssɔp a bɔfɛɛn ɔɔ? Mbama nlɔɔk nttɛ, “Iii, Iii,” la “Maaye, Maaye” ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ɔɔ?
Ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, nlɔɔk-nloko anaam la annyɔɔng usi lile wa “Iii” la “Maaye”.
Jesus Christ, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa Silas la Timothy la anaam, Paul, biini ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk ammɛ lissi ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa “Iii” la “Maaye”. Ka kkpɔɔ ammɛ ulenɛ “Iii” Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa “Iii” ka nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ ifɛɛt ya issɛnɛ ka Jesus Christ inaang “Kule ning” ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt la annyɔɔng isan ka lɔkkwɔɔn ittɛ iddubong ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔsanganɛyɛlɛ uloko zzekep.

Ammɛ ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ eleme ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt. Ammɛ ɔssɛɛnnɛyɛlɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ippyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlɔɔk-nloko wa ɔnaangnɛ la ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyiyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ.
Nkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ttɛɛsɛ anaam, Ammɛ ɔsannɛ luppyam anaam. Ndɔkɔ nttina kɛkkalawɔyɔng kwakkwɛ baang nnaangnɛ luttina nsi Corinth limii.
Mung ba ibum ittɛ ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng bwa ale ayilayɔng. Isan lɔsan ittɛ aleyɔng kkpɔk ka kiyila ka abeenɛyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng mung inaang kɛnaang la annyɔɔng la annyɔɔng iggyan budoddo annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔzzánga nnaangbong luttina ka kwɔng nttɛ ba nbɛlɛ liffu naangwɔyɔng ataayɔng bukee.
Ulenɛ ka nnaangnɛ bukee bunaangwɔyɔng, nnyinɛ ule usseke, wa ule ɔnaangnɛ anaam ɔwaanɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ule ɔgbaa la annyɔɔng ba nnaangwɔnɛyɔng bukee bunaangwɔyɔng.

Kwakkwɛ nkkpɔknɛ leta ’wɔng mung nfeewɔyɔng. Nsi lɛggyan nttɛ nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng bukee bunaangnɛ ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba bunaangnɛnɛ nggele. Nsanbong nttɛ nggelenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ assɛ aggeleyɔng.

Nkkpɔkwɔyɔng leta ’wɔng mung la lilɔɔk sa lɛbaang la akama ka luppyam ɔbɛtɛ la liyeen ka zzeen. Ɔzzanga nsi lɛttɛ bukee bunaangwɔyɔng. Nnaang nttɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asan attɛyɔng asaapnɛyɔng gaang gaang.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk úlenɛ wabbɛ lɛnaang tɔkɔlɔ ɔbbɔlmɛ, la anaam lissi ka ɔnaangnɛ, ɔnaang la annyɔɔng, ɔlɔk la balɔɔt balɔk. (Nsi lɛggyan nttɛ nnaang lilɔɔk likoolomɛ kɛnaang.)
Kwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, kɔyyɛɛpbong ka akama wa alemɛnɛyɔng lɛyɔɔ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng.
Mkkpa kɔnaang, asɔɔkmɛyɔng ka kwa ɔnaangnɛ. Anaangmɛyɔng bukee bufɔngɔmɛ kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ́ uffu ɔkkyaa kiyila kwa lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfɔngɔ.
Mkkpee! Anaangmɛyɔng ning baang ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔsaapwɔyɔng gaang gaang.
Nkkpɔkwɔyɔng leta ’wɔng kwakkwɛ mung. Nggyan nttɛ nsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɔnɛyɔng illɛ, ɔlɔk ayilanɛyɔng lɔttama anaam nsan.
Asɔɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang, anaam ɔgbaa nssɛbong nsɔɔkmɛ. Nsɔɔknɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn nle nsɔɔk lutini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, nttina kwa annyɔɔng ka lusso a Christ,
nkwaaning Satan usiyɛlɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛbɛtɛ ka ilenɛ luttina ammɛ lɛsan.
Nffɔnɛ Troas kikopolo Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kutumnɛ Christ, nsan nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uwongolobong ɛtɔk a kɛnaang baang.
Ɔzzànga akama ɔnaangnɛ gaang gaang ka nsinɛ ɔkpana ayyɔɔt, Titus, lɛyɛn. Nteele balɔɔt ba balenɛ baang ngbata nmii Macedonia.

Ɔzzànga nzɔɔn-kɛnaang ule wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ka kɔssɛ kwa issɛnɛ ka Christ ulenɛ lɛbɛtɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔnaang ibwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a Christ iwaala ka ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kizzoom sa kiggwoomnɛ.
Ayyɔɔt itaayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizzoom, bya Christ ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛwaala bivvoong balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba Christ, ulebɛ lɛkkala ɔfɔngɔ, la balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛtaak.

Lakkwɛɛnga kizzoom ’sɔng mung kɛtaa balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛtaak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bussi. Balɔɔt ba Christ ulenɛbɛ lɛkkala kɛtaabɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kizzoom sa kɛkɔɔmnɛ kuddu kifee balɔɔt. Nyinɛ ule ɔkkɔnɔ kɛnaang a kɛnaang ’sɔng.

Ayyɔɔt ba ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ebinukkpaapi kpɛɛlɛ-kpɛɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa businɛ kappya lɛkkaam. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛtɔɔm, vvenɛ ilɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka lusso ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibɔɔyi a Christ.
Nkwɔng mung kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibbalnɛ kamma lɛnaang itumyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔɔ? Kukkwoong mung kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk, kɛttɛ itɔk lakke ifeewɔyɔng, ɔlɔk itɔkzɛ ka annyɔɔng ɔɔ?
Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng leta wa ilenɛ lɛkkpɔk ka ippyam ayyɔɔt ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan, ukkwoong ɔkkwɔɔ.
Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Christ biini ɔkkpɔknɛ leta ’wɔng mung ɔtɔɔmyɛlɛ. Ɛbbanga lissi ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔkkpɔk ka lɛttaal, ɔzzanga ɔkkpɔk ka ippyam ɔssɛbibit la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ kuddu.
Ilɔɔk ka iyanganɛ lakke za kɛnaang a ’kwɔng mung ka Christ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Bulɔk ka tɔkɔlɔ yɛlɛ ba bule bwa bufɔngɔyɛlɛ ittina ittɛ ikkwoong mung inaang kɛnaang ’sɔng. Bwa ikkwoongnɛ inaang ɔkkpɛlɛ bussi ka labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ammɛ ɔnaangyɛlɛ ikkwoong inaang kɛnaang ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ. Kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ ’sɔng kwa Lafɔɔ a Moses lissi; kile sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Lafɔɔ za bakkpɔknɛ lannyiyɛlɛ lubbe, ɔzzànga Kuyeeng kunnyiyɛlɛ kuddu.

Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang badɔkɔ bakkpɔkzɛ ka lɛttaal. Ɔzzánga lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm latuma baang ka ɛkɛtɛ Moses ɔtɔknɛzɛ. Mkkpa buppwolo bwa lusso a Moses buppwolonɛ budɔkɔ buzum, budɔkɔ bukkaam gaang gaang. Balɔɔt a Israel basi zzeen lɛbbɔ bayeek bappyɛɛkmɛ. Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a Lafɔɔ za bukɔɔmnɛ lubbe laffu lappyɛɛnɛ laffu la buppwolo ’bwɔng baang,
attina attɛ latele za lassinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm laffu lale laggbenge nang?
Kɛssanga linaang sa kɛkɔɔmnɛ lubbe kifee balɔɔt kɛyanganɛ latele, attina attɛ linaang sa likɔɔmnɛ kuddu lifee balɔɔt lile liyanga latele nang?
Ikkwoong mung ilɔɔk ittɛ buppwolo bwa buppwolonɛ gedegede mung ka bulenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ɔbal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ buppwolo bwa buppwolonɛ ka isimi ka isimi bulenɛ lizum.
Bɔfɛɛn bwa bummɛnɛ ssup buyanganɛ buppwolo, bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbɔnɛ kɛfal a kɛfal bule buyanga nang?
Ikkaam luppyam ka iyanganɛ luttina ’gwɔng mung ggwɔn.
Ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Moses ba ile, wa ɔsamnɛ ubba uvvoongmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lusso ɔttɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt a Israel basi buppwolo ’bwɔng baang lɛyɛn ka buvvoongnɛ, bukkyaap.

Ippyam abbɛ ivvoongbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Gɔɔ ka bɛtɔm bya mmwɔɔn mung bavvoongbong ippyam abbɛ la ubba tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛ ka luvva ɔtɔm a lafɔɔ. Ubba ’wɔng baang uweele ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsammɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng utoolo la Christ.
Gɔɔ ka mmwɔɔn mung, ɛkɛtɛ duu ya balɔɔt bakkwɔɔnɛ Lafɔɔ a Moses, ubba utii baang ka uvvoongnɛbɛ ka ippyam.
Ɔzzanga vvenɛ ubba ’wɔng baang uweele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ, “Ubba Moses ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ uweelemɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔppyɛlɛnɛ uyila kwa Uyini.”
“Uyini”, Ka tɔkɔlɔ ’kwɔng mung ulenɛ Kuyeeng. Ka ɛfɛɛn a Kuyeeng-Uyini kulenɛ, kuddu kule baang.
Isso ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ iwongolonɛ, balɔɔt bayɛn buppwolo Uyini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayɛnnɛ kiyenge. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufoolonɛyɛlɛ isseke bwa bayɛnnɛ baang, ikama-lɔkama iwongolo. Uwɔng kɛnaang Uyini wa ulenɛ Kuyeeng.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kibbe lɛttɔ ammɛ, unnyibongyɛlɛ kɛnaang ’sɔng, tɔkɔlɔ ɔfɔngɔyɛlɛ kɛbɛpɛ.

Ikkyaa kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn a lalup la bɛfɛɛn izzit ifɔngɔ. Kɔdɛm ba idɛm, ɔlɔk vvenɛ ikkala lɛlaak ka lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Itaa ka buppwolo lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Inaang kɔlɔɔk la duu iyɔɔ ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luttina ayyɔɔt lɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ulenɛ ka Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa ikopolonɛ kusinɛ balɔɔt ka latɔɔk lɛmal, kusi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛtaak keem lɛmal.

Kiyila ba bayanga ka Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng a vveeng ’wɔng mung ulenɛ ippyam abbɛ lɛsam uloko ka kisul. Ulokobɛ ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ buppwolo lɛyɛn ka buppwolonɛ bullɔtbɛ. Abbwɛ bulenɛ buppwolo bwa bussinɛ ka Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm buffu ka lakke a Christ, wa ulenɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kwa ayyɔɔt biini lissi ka ikopolonɛ. Ikopolo kwa Jesus Christ ka ulenɛ Uyini. La kwa ayyɔɔt ibɔɔyi annyɔɔng ka lɛttɔ a Christ.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔttɛnɛ, “Vvenɛ buppwolo butta ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul.” Ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang vvɔn wa ɔnaangnɛ buppwolo, buppwolo bullɔtyɛlɛ ka ippyam. Ɔkɔɔm buppwolo kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk a lakke ammɛ bwa buppwolonɛ ka lusso a Christ ufeeleyɛlɛ.
Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt, balɔɔt ba libɔngɔlɔ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’zɔng bayanganɛ, ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkpo ya banaangnɛyɛ ka kɛbat. Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ lakke za lɛbaang lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem, za ayyɔɔt lissi.
Luppyam lɔbbɔl mung yɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk, ɔzzànga akama lissi. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk ittɔ mung bɛkangala, ɔzzànga ittina ayyɔɔt ba ibut.
Balɔɔt a kɔfɔk bale ggbadam, ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt ɛnngwa ba isɛlɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk baddopoyɛlɛ, ɔzzànga yɛlɛ ba bawwɔɔl.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ isam lubbe a Christ issɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt sa ayyɔɔt sa lile libbe, nkwaaning bassɛ bayɛn kuddu ammɛ ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛfal ayyɔɔt ile ka ntɛm a lubbe ka lɛttɔ a Jesus, nkwaaning bayɛn kuddu ammɛ ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt ’sɔng mung sa lile libbe.
Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ lubbe lule ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt, kuddu kule ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng.
Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Nlɔɔk ka nyanganɛ kiyila.” Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt issɛ ilɔɔk ning baang ka kɛssanga luppyam a kiyila ssɔn.
Isan lɔsan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalanɛ Jesus, Uyini ’wɔng baang ɔtaa ka kuddu, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ufungalayɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa la Jesus. Ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ umii uloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la ammɛ.
Mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bile kwa lɛttɔ annyɔɔng. Latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lalenɛ baang ka laffunɛ balɔɔt, balɔɔt ggbadam ggbadam, vvenɛ bawomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang gaang gaang la luzɔɔm ka lɛsɔɔk za ɔsɔɔknɛbɛ.
Kwakkwɛ baang itakanɛ ntɛtɛ lɛkkyaa ifɔngɔ mkkpa kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt likpɛlɛ, kuyeeng ayyɔɔt kule baang ka kufoolonɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm.
Waan akama ’wɔng mung wa iyɛnnɛ ka liggbili ssup vvenɛ unnyiyɛlɛ uggboggbo latele la lakke ning za kɛfal a kɛfal. Latele la lakke vvenɛ bɛtta akama gaang gaang.
Ayyɔɔt zzeen ka bɛfɛɛn bya iyɛnnɛ ba itele. Itele zzeen ka bɛfɛɛn bya isinɛ lɛyɛn. Bwa iyɛnnɛ bútaa ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ba iggyan. Iggyan bwa isinɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn buttumu kɛfal a kɛfal.

Isan lɔsan ittɛ ggwoon gwa illunɛ mung, (kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung) lulenɛ lɛttɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyanga ggwoon ka libat unnyiyɛlɛ illu. Ssala sa ammɛ biini ɔnaangnɛ, sa lile littumu kɛfal a kɛfal.
Isinibong lifiki ka luttina gwa kɛyanga ssala ka libat sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ulokoyɛlɛ luggbengenɛyɛlɛ gaang gaang.
Ka uvvoongnɛyɛlɛ la assɛ, vvenɛ iyanga ufaa kkwɔɔt.

Ka illunɛ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung, iffimi la luttina akama. Ɔzzanga isi lɛttɛ ile ka isamnɛ kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt sa ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung izzɔɔk. Iggyan ittɛ ssala sa lissinɛ ka libat livvoongyɛlɛ, nkwaaning kuddu kɔmɛɛl bwa bule bubbe.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ wa ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛbama ɔkat kifoolo ’sɔng mung. Unnyiyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlɔɔk-nloko wa ulenɛ lɛnaang la ayyɔɔt ɔttɛ vvenɛ iyanga lɛsɔɔk.
ƐKɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ka itaanɛ ka ssala kkwɔɔt ’sɔng mung, ning baang igbatabong ikɔngɔ ssala Uyini.
Kuddu ayyɔɔt kule ka kiyila. Ka kɛyɛn ka zzeen lissi.
Iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam gaang gaang. Kule kɔttayɛlɛ lɛsaap ka ile igbata ssala ayyɔɔt ikɔngɔ ka kkwɔɔt ’sɔng mung imii itaa ka ssala Uyini.
Kwa kɔttanɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, iggyan ittɛ inaang kwa kule kɔsaap Uyini, mkkpa ile ka ssala ayyɔɔt mung ɔlɔk ka ssala Uyini.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt vvenɛ ibee ka lusso a Christ, ɔkaal kɛkaal ayyɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn vvenɛ ɔtɔk bwa bulemɛnɛ bbwak ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang ka kɛfal ammɛ mkkpa kɔyyɛɛp, kɔbbɔl.

Isan mung bwa ’kwɔng kulenɛ. Kule kɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔyɛlɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ. Kwakkwɛ baang ibumnɛ ittɛ balɔɔt bayanga kiyila. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bbwak. Nttina nttɛ ka ippyam annyɔɔng assɛ mung asannɛyɔng anaam ɔgbaa.

Ba ibɛlɛ libum ittɛ isamyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ibbalwɔyɔng linnyi. Isseke ka ibumnɛ ittɛ ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ifɛɛt ya ule ɔkkyaawɔyɔng kwa ayyɔɔt. Nkwaaning balɔɔt ba babungunɛ ɔlɔɔt lɛfal basimɛ eleme libungu balɔɔknɛ, akkwoong appyɛlɛyɔngbɛ kamma.
Mung ittɔbong bikun ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔɔ? Ittɔnɛ bikun ittɔ ka lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Faa bikun ba itaka ittɔ. Itakanɛ lɛttɔ, itaka lɛttɔ kwa lɛttɔ annyɔɔng.
Kɛsaap sa isaapnɛ Christ kɛkɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ. Gedegede mung isanbong ittɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ubbenɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ, balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bayanga etini ka lubbe ammɛ.

Ubbe ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ ka kuddu, basi kwa abbɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛbɛlɛ liddu. Bappyɛɛ baddu kwa ammɛ keem wa ubbenɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu ka lɛttɔ abbɛ.
Lɔnngwa ɔssɛbibit ba ibɛlɛ lɛkɔɔm ikaal kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk, mkkpa ndɔk ile kɛkaal a Christ lɛkaal la lɔnngwa ɔssɛbibit kpal. Ning baang ba ibɛlɛ lɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utoolomɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng la Christ utii ka ufaa kɛfal. Ɔtɔm a kɛfal umiibong, usseke ufaa kɛfal uffu.
Mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔkɔɔm Christ usikiliyɛlɛ isseke inngwa ammɛ, isi balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ammɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile. Unnyiyɛlɛ kɛnaang sa inaangnɛ balɔɔt balɔk bazzanga inngwa ammɛ ɔgbaa.

Bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ, ibwɔɔlɔ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛkɔɔm a Christ kɛnaang ɛnngwa la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi bubbi abbɛ lɛbɛlɛ liffik. Ɔtɔɔmbongyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ibwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛnɛ ɛnngwa la abbɛ.

Mung ilɔɔk ikkala Christ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ulenɛ mung ka ɔssɛnɛ la ayyɔɔt ɔlɔɔk unnyiwɔyɔng. Ka lɛttɔ a Christ, ikkpengewɔyɔngbong ittɛ afɔngɔyɔng Ebinukkpaapi esikiliwɔyɔng ippyam afɔngɔyɔng balɔɔt a kɔfɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛbɛlɛ lile, assekeyɔng inngwa ammɛ.
Christ usi bubbi lɛnaang. Ɔzzanga kɛ lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ utul bubbi ayyɔɔt nkwaaning ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la ammɛ, itul budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itaa bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
Ka ilenɛyɔng ka kɛnaang la Ebinukkpaapi, ikkpengewɔyɔng ittɛ ka alenɛyɔng lɛsɔɔk Ebinukkpaapi lɛtɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ asamyɔngzɛ abɛpɛyɔng.

Appyeeyɔng kwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔknɛ ɛttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya nle ka nyɔɔwɔnɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ nppyee nzɔɔm annɔ; Kɛtɔm sa nle nkkwɔɔwɔ kissolonɛ, vvenɛ nttelewɔ.” Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Uwɔng ulenɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Mmwɔɔn ulenɛ kɛtɔm sa ule ɔkkalawɔyɔng.
Ba iggyan ittɛ inaang kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔttɛ ba kɔyyɛɛp. Ɔgbaa, ayyɔɔt ɔgbangala ka ɛtɔk ɔlɔɔt baala iloko.
Lutini ’gwɔng iyɔɔ ittɛ ayyɔɔt bwɔɔn Ebinukkpaapi. Ibbe luppyam ka kɛyɛn akama ka kippyee bukoolo, la bɛssanga lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Batupbongyɛlɛ, bassɛɛnyɛlɛ igbakkɔpɔ. Banaangyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit. Inaang kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ gbaak kɛtɔm. Ɛkɛtɛ ba iyanga ya ilaanɛ bilaa ɔlɔk izzi kazzi.

Luppyam ayyɔɔt ka lulenɛ ppwool la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk, la kibbe luppyam la kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk, iyɔɔwɔyɔngbong ittɛ ayyɔɔt bwɔɔn Ebinukkpaapi ka likke kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔbɛtɛ la kɛsaap ayyɔɔt sa lɔkkwɔɔn,
la lakke ibwɔɔlɔ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ya ibwɔɔlɔnɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la lakke Ebinukkpaapi. Kisi bubbi lɛyanga kilenɛ bɛfɛɛn a lɛkɔɔng ayyɔɔt bya ikɔɔmnɛ illu kullu ikatyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng.
Bateleyɛlɛ, banaangyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit bagbaa. Babbaatyɛlɛ, babunguyɛlɛ bagbaa. Batɔkyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkaal-a-lalaak ɔzzànga ile baang ka ilɔɔknɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
Battɛ yɛlɛ ba basan, ɔzzànga basanbongyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Battɛ ibbebong, ɔzzànga mung ile baang ka kuddu. Bayɔɔyɛlɛ akama, ɔzzànga yɛlɛ ba bawwɔɔl.
Mkkpa banaangyɛlɛ kwa livve lɛbbɔlnɛyɛlɛ, iggele tɔttɔt. Ippyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, ɔzzànga inaang balɔɔt ppwap ɔyyɛɛpbɛ. Ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isɛlɛnɛ bulɔk, ɔzzànga ippyɛɛ iyanga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Inngwa anaam ya luppyam ka Corinth. Ilɔɔkbong ppwool ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng. Iwongolobong ippyam ayyɔɔt ppwool, innyiwɔyɔng.
Ittina ayyɔɔt ba itaka isam issekewɔyɔng. Annyɔɔng asamnɛyɔng ittina annyɔɔng assekeyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
Gedegede mung, nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng bwaan anaam. Ayɔɔyɔngyɛlɛ kɛssanga luttina ’sɔng baang sa ayyɔɔt ittinanɛ itumwɔyɔng annyɔɔng. Awongoloyɔng ippyam annyɔɔng ppwool annyiyɔngyɛlɛ.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abum attɛ atul anaangyɔng kɛnaang la balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng ikɛlɛlɛ. Ning baang ba kule. Budoddo la bubbi bile bɛnaang nang bɛtaa ka bɔkaat? Buppwolo la kisul bile bɛnaang nang bɛtaa ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn?
Christ la Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng bale banaang nang bakaat? Mung ɔsɛlɛ-kiyila la ɔyanga-kiyila bale kɛssanga ssɔn ɔɔ?

Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lule lɔnaang nang lɔtaa ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la ilɔɔp-ilat? Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa lɔyanganɛ kuddu, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔlɔɔknɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nnaang ssala anaam ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt anaam, nllu baang la abbɛ. Anaam vvenɛ nle Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ, abbɛ bale balɔɔt anaam.”
Ɔzzanga Ebinukkpaapi ya ɛyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛttɛ, “Akkyaayɔngbɛ afɔngɔyɔng. Agbata assekeyɔngbɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkɛtɛyɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbɔlnɛ. Anaam vvenɛ ntɔkwɔyɔng.
Anaam vvenɛ nle ssaawɔ annyɔɔng; annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng bwɔɔn anaam.”

Inngwa anaam, nsekele ’wɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaang ennyiyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt. Ikkyaa bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛnaangnɛ kkwɔɔt ɔlɔɔt la lɛfal ammɛ bɛbbɔl ifɔngɔ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ikkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi ifɔngɔ.
Assɛɛnyɔngyɛlɛ ka ippyam annyɔɔng. Kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ la ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba itaka inaang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba itaka ittina kɛwwɔɔl gɔɔ vvenɛ inaang ɔlɔɔt bɛbɛtɛ.
Nsi lɛlɔɔk ’kwɔng nttɛ nkkpɛnwɔyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ lɛlɔɔk kkpal, aleyɔngyɛlɛ ka luppyam gaang gaang ka ilenɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, mkkpa iddu-uddu ɔlɔk ibbe-ubbe.
Luppyam kwa annyɔɔng nɛ ba lɔzza. Ɔwaanɛ kwa annyɔɔng ka lilɔɔk ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ntii baang ka nkkaamnɛ luppyam. Nggele gaang gaang.
Gɔɔ ka iffɔnɛ Macedonia isi lɛfɛkɛlɛ. Ɔdɔkɔ lilɔɔk a lilɔɔk ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm bawɔlɔ. Ɔbbwɔpɔyɛlɛ.
Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ balɔɔt bakkaam luppyam, ɔnaangyɛlɛ ikkaam luppyam la kiffu a Titus.

Kiffu ammɛ keem lissi. Ibwɔɔlɔ ya attelemɛnɛyɔng inaangnɛyɛlɛ ikkaam luppyam igbaa. Ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggyannɛ attɛ ayɛnyɔngyɛlɛ gaang gaang, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akama ɔnaangwɔyɔng ka isinɛ liffu, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng libum attɛ akkalanɛyɔng, nggelebong gaang gaang.
Gɔɔ mkkpa leta anaam ɔnaangwɔyɔng bukee, akama nɛ ba ɔnaang, anaam nkkpɔknɛ. Nzang bukee bunaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nyɛnnɛ ka leta anaam ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng bukee ka ɛkɛtɛ ssup.

Gedegede mung nggelebong. Ba nggele ka nnaangnɛ bukee bunaangwɔyɔng. Nggele ka bukee annyɔɔng bunaangwɔnɛyɔng afooloyɔng linaang. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ bukee ’bwɔng baang uffu. Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa bbɔlbbɔl isiwɔyɔng lɛnaang.
Bukee bwa bussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bufoolo luppyam ɔlɔɔt, bunaangwɔ assɛ ka ɛtɔk a kuddu. Busannɛ baang ba bule. Bukee a vveengodde bunnyinɛ lubbe.

Ayɛnyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ la bukee annyɔɔng. Bunaangwɔyɔngbong kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng. Bunaangwɔyɔngbong ayɔɔyɔng kisi-lɛsan annyɔɔng. Akama ’wɔng baang, ittina ’yɔng baang, luzɔɔm ’gwɔng baang, la ibama ’yɔng baang ya kɛyɔɔ banaang a bubbi akama. Ayɔɔyɔngbongyɛlɛ attɛyɔng kibbi ba ataka azziyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ka nkkpɔknɛ leta ’wɔng, nsi lɛkkpɔk kwa ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ doddo lɛnaang, ɔlɔk ka kwa ɔlɔɔt wa banaangmɛnɛ bbɔlbbɔl. Nkkpɔk nttɛ kɔnaangwɔyɔng ppwool ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔbɛtɛwɔnɛyɔng kwa ayyɔɔt.
Kwakkwɛ baang iyanganɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam. Kwa kɛkaam a luppyam keem lissi. Ɔgbaa Titus ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ iggele la ammɛ ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng aggelemɛnɛyɔng.
Nbbabong lɔbba ntumwɔyɔng nbwɔɔlɔmɛ. Ɔzzánga nɛ ba ataka afɛɛtyɔng. Ilɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la annyɔɔng. Kule kɛssanga ssɔn, lɔbba gwa nbbanɛ la Titus lulebong ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Kɛsaap sa asaapmɛnɛyɔng kɛmmala gaang gaang la bɔkkaam ɛkɛtɛ duu ya ukkenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng lɛbama kitelemɛ. Atɔkmɛyɔng assɛɛnyɔng ka kkwɔɔt la kiffula.
Nggele gaang gaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Luppyam lɔkkaamnɛ kwa annyɔɔng.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt, iggyan ittɛ asanyɔng bwa lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lalenɛ lɛnaang ka izɔɔm ya ilenɛ ka Macedonia.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔllɛbongbɛ gaang gaang la akama wa balenɛ lɛyɛn. Ɔzzànga mkkpa ndɔk ɔbbɔlbɛ, bayanga laggele gaang gaag, baggwoom kɔlɔɔk basak.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ bànnyi bɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwoongnɛ. Gɔɔ bannyi basak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bukkwoongnɛ.
Bakkpengeyɛlɛ bapiiti battɛ bassɛ bayanga kufuk kwa kittele balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ ka Judea.
Banaang batta kwa ayyɔɔt buttinanɛ. Ka ikeeng, basambɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi Uyini. Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ka kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, basambɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyiyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa.
Ɔzzánga issɛɛn Titus wa uttenɛ kɛnaang ’sɔng ittɛ ɔkkaammɛ la assɛ usseke uttelewɔyɔng avveyɔng kɛnaang a kɛsaap ’sɔng.

Ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng gaang gaang ka bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayanganɛyɔng ka kiyila: kɔlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl, la bisana, ka luttina kɛyaam a balɔɔt, la kɛsaap sa isaapwɔnɛyɔng. Ɔzzànga iggyan ittɛ aggwoomyɔng kɔlɔɔk agbaayɔng la kɛsaap ’sɔng.
Lafɔɔ lissi ka innyiwɔnɛyɔng. Ɔzzànga iyɔɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk baggyannɛ kɛyaam a ba abbɛ. Nggyan nttɛ nsan, kɛsaap annyɔɔng kilenɛ sa bbwak ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Asanyɔng lɔsan kɛsaap sa Jesus Christ ɔyanganɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔdɔkɔnɛ uggbenge baang, ɔnaangmɛ kɛyɔɔng usseke ukee-waan ka lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt. Ɔggyan ɔttɛ akɔɔmyɔng ibbɔl ammɛ ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng.

Uwɔng ulenɛ luttina gwa anaam nttinanɛ ntum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung: Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka avvenɛyɔng gedegede mung bwa atteneyɔng lummwemmwem. Annyɔɔng akɔɔmnɛyɔng ɛtɔk, ka linaang keem lissi, ɔgbaa la luttina kɛnaang a kɛnaang gwa attinanɛyɔng.
Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng la assɛ. Avveyɔngsɛ. Assɛɛnyɔng luttina kivvesɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ attinanɛyɔng kɛnaangsɛ. Anaangyɔngsɛ la bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ayanganɛyɔng.
Asɔɔknɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayanganɛyɔng, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔtɔk lɛsɔɔk annyɔɔng. Bwa asinɛyɔng lɛyanga ba ɔggyan.

Ba nggyan nttɛ ayɛnyɔng akama ka kɛyaam a balɔɔt balɔk. Ɔzzànga ka ayanganɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ggbadam, kɔyyɛɛp ka attelenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba basinɛ lɛyanga. Ɛkɛtɛ busɛlɛwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng, abbɛ bayanganɛ vvenɛ bassɛ bayaamwɔyɔng. Anaangnɛyɔng ning baang, ɔlɔɔt wa ule ubunu wabbɛ uzzi baala ule.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ ggbadam baala ɔyanga ɔsak. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ ssup baala ɔyanga bussup busak.
Iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ka ɔnaangnɛ Titus ubum tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt ibumnɛ ittɛ iyaamwɔyɔng!
Kwa ayyɔɔt ibapnɛ keem lissi ka ɔtɔknɛ, ɔdɔkɔ ubum gaang gaang ɔttɛ ɔyaam balɔɔt ka luttina gwa ammɛ biini, kwakkwɛ ɔnaangnɛ littina gwa kiffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
Ile ka itɔɔmnɛ ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ latele gaang gaang ka kɛnaang a kikopolo kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkuma la Titus baffu.
Ɔgbaa basangamɛbong ka izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ ɔssɛ la ayyɔɔt ka ilenɛ baang ka inaangnɛ kɛnaang a kɛsaap ka latele Uyini iyɔɔ ittɛ iggyan kittele balɔɔt.
Itɔɔmbong ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung uffu nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usi lɔzzɔ lɛssɛ ka kɛkɔɔm sa ile ka ikɔɔmnɛ lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng mung.
Bwa ittinanɛ kɛnaang ka ippyam ayyɔɔt ittina kɛnaang kwa bbwak. Ka lusso Uyini keem lissi ka iggyannɛ kɛnaang kwa bbwak, iggyan kɛnaang kwa bbwak ka lusso ɔssɛbibit ɔgbaa.
Ile ka itɔɔmnɛ ɔkpana ayyɔɔt ɔssɛ la abbɛ uffu. Illɛmɛbong bikkpit ggbadam, iyɛn ka kɛyaam a balɔɔt kɛsaapmɛnɛ. Ɔyanga luttina gaang gaang ka annyɔɔng, ule ka ubumnɛ kɛyaamwɔyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ulenɛ kwa Titus, ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam. Ɔnaang kɛnaang la anaam ɔttɛ uttelewɔyɔng. Kwa ikpana ayyɔɔt ilɔk ba bassɛnɛ la ammɛ, abbɛ batɔknɛ lɛttɔ izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔɔm latele bafee Christ.
Ayɔɔyɔngbɛ kɛsaap annyɔɔng, nkwaaning izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ isan ittɛ ile bbwak ka inaangnɛ kamma itumwɔyɔng.
Gɔɔ ba nbɛlɛ lɛggyan nttɛ nkkpɔk ntum kɛyaam sa bayaamnɛ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka Judaea.

Nsan lɔsan nttɛ annyɔɔng attinanɛyɔng kɛyaam a balɔɔt. Nnaangbong kamma la balɔɔt a Macedonia ntumwɔyɔng. Nttɛ “Ikpana ayyɔɔt ya ilenɛ ka Greece, baggba luttina lɛnaang lummwemmwem gwa kɛyaam a balɔɔt” Lubum annyɔɔng lufungalabong balɔɔt ggbadam.

Nle ka ntɔɔmnɛ ikpana ayyɔɔt ’yɔng mung baffa nkwaaning kamma kwa inaangnɛ itumwɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung kasi gbɔɔ lɛttɔ kataak. Ɔzzánga kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlɔɔknɛ, vvenɛ abamayɔng bwa ale akɔɔm ayaamyɔngbɛ akatyɔng.
Nzang balɔɔt a Macedonia baffunɛ la anaam basan battɛ ba ataka abamayɔng, vvenɛ izzit inaangyɔngyɛlɛ gaang gaang, ka balenɛ littina gaang gaang kwa annyɔɔng.

Nttina nttɛ kɔyyɛɛp ka nddanɛ ikpana ayyɔɔt bakɔɔm bassɛ bakɔngɔnɛ bamii babama lɛsɔɔk za attɛnɛ vvenɛ annyiyɔngbɛ baloko eseese. Ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ nkyaalanɛ, abamayɔngbong ɔkkpɛlɛ alokoyɔng. Ning baang vvenɛ ikɔɔlɔ ittɛ annyiyɔng ka kussiwɔnɛyɔng ka luppyam, kɛttɛ annyiyɔng ka battɛnɛ annyiyɔng lissi.
Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Ɔlɔɔt wa uwoopnɛ waan a bɔtɔɔm ssup, ule ɔyaat ssup. Ɔlɔɔt wa uwoopnɛ uggboggbo ule ɔyaat uggboggbo.
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn unnyi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luttina lɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ. Ɔfɔngɔ la akama kinnyi, uttina ɔttɛ baang kɛnaang ammɛ lissi. Ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛ bɔfɛɛn ka bɔwaa ɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung unnyiwɔ ɔsak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggyannɛ, nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayanga bwa aggyannɛ kɛyɔɔng, gɔɔ ayanga asak ka kɔlɔɔk duu kwa anaangnɛ kɔyyɛɛp.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Uggwoom a kɔlɔɔk unnyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ bɛfɛɛn ka luppyam gwa doddo. Kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ kittumu kɛfal a kɛfal.”

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛ ɔkɔɔn ikɔnɔ-kɔnɔ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn la kazzi, vvenɛ ɔssɛ unnyiwɔyɔng ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya aggyannɛyɔng, ɔnaangyɛ immala, usseke ayaatyɔng liyaat littala ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng.
Vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɛyyɛɛp a kɛnaang annyɔɔng nkwaaning balɔɔt ggbadam bawomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka lɛsɔɔk annyɔɔng za batɔknɛ ka ayyɔɔt.
Kɛnaang sa anaangnɛyɔng mung, ba kinnyi bwa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baggyannɛ keem, ɔgbaa kɛdɛmbong nzɔɔn-kɛnaang ule wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ka iyɔɔ ya kɛnaang annyɔɔng mung, balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ batele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kikopolo kuttu budoddo Christ kwa akopolonɛyɔng la kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng la balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Vvenɛ bazɔɔm bannyiwɔyɔng ka kɛsaap ka lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔwɔnɛyɔng.
Iwomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka lɛsɔɔk za ɔsɔɔknɛyɛlɛ.

Anaam Paul nkkpengewɔnɛyɔng. Anaam wa balɔɔknɛ battɛ nle ɔlɔɔt a latele la kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ la annyɔɔng. Nnyanga ka ɛkɛtɛ ngbatanɛ nkɔngɔwɔyɔng. Nkkpengewɔyɔng ka budoddo ka kɛyyɛɛp a kɛnaang a Christ,
