nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ atutnɛyɔng nnyanga ka ɛkɛtɛ nle nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng. Nsan lɔsan bɛlɛng nttɛ nkkwoong mung nnyanga la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balɔɔknɛ battɛ ayyɔɔt inaang kwa vveeng ’wɔng ɔddanɛyɛlɛ.
Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ayyɔɔt illu ka vveeng ’wɔng mung. Ɔzzànga kullu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ vveeng ’wɔng mung ullunɛ ba illu.
Bɛfɛɛn a kullu bya ikɔɔmnɛ illu kullu bya vveeng ’wɔng lissi. Bile bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bɛkkaam lɔkkaam bɛsak. Ikɔɔmbyɛ abbyɛ ibɛpɛ lakke la babbu ikangala ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Vvenɛ ibɛpɛ bisese ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bisinɛ kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛggyan. Vvenɛ inaang ittina ya ile innaa ippyam ɔkkpɛlɛ itele Christ.
Alenɛyɔng latele annyɔɔng linnyi laggba, vvenɛ iyɔɔ balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ latele akama.

Appyɛɛkyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung gbɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɛnnɛyɔngbyɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ule wa Christ ɔɔ? Kɔyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp! Ɔbbalmɛ kɛyɔɔng liffik ɔgbaa ɔsan ɔttɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa issɛ ile ba Christ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ.
Gɔɔ izzit nɛ ba inaang mkkpa nle kamma lɛnaang ntum lakke za Uyini unnyinɛyɛlɛ. Lakke za lanaangwɔnɛyɔng aggbengeyɔng, za latutwɔnɛyɔng lazzɔɔk lissi.
Ba nggyan nttɛ kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nbumwɔnɛyɔng kɛdal la illeta ya nkkpɔknɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Illeta Paul ɔkkpɔknɛ ile ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ikkaam lɔkkaam. Ɔzzànga ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛ la ayyɔɔt ba ɔkkaam, lammwɔɔl ammɛ ba lassɔp.”
Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt ’sɔng baang kɔsan kɛttɛ duu bwa ilenɛ ka lammwɔɔl illeta ayyɔɔt ka isinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng lile, ile ile ning baang ka linaang ayyɔɔt, ka ɛkɛtɛ ile ile baang la annyɔɔng.

Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, baala ibbɔ ibunguyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔk issayɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng la balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ abbɛ baggboggbo balɔɔt. Abbɛ baang bazingizingi. Battina kwa abbɛ bazza kɛkaal abbɛ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛfal abbɛ laggyannɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa ayyɔɔt mung, mkkpa kɔnaang, kɛnaang a kamma ayyɔɔt baala kɛsak kimeen. Kile kɛtaa baang ka kimeen sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi utoolo la kɛnaang ayyɔɔt ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng ka alenɛyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ kimeen ’sɔng baang, isi lɛnaang isak ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ikɔɔmnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo kwa kutumnɛ Christ ifeewɔyɔng.

Kamma ba itaka inaang itum kɛnaang sa balɔɔt balɔk banaangnɛ basak kimeen sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛyɛlɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng ittina ittɛ kiyila annyɔɔng kɛmmala nkwaaning ikkwoong inaang kɛnaang kiggbenge kɛgbaa ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ kimeen sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ liloko.
Nkwaaning ikkwoong ikopolo Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ikaan ilɔk ɔgbaa. Gɔɔ baala inaang kwa kɛnaang sa balɔɔt balɔk balenɛ lɛggba lɛnaang ka ɛkpansi abbɛ.
Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang kamma, ɔnaang kamma kwa bwa Uyini ulenɛ lɛnaang.”
Ɔlɔɔt ɔyɛn budoddo ka Uyini, ka ɛkɛtɛ Uyini biini uttinanɛ budoddo utum ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, kwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uttinanɛ utummɛ kɛyɔɔng lissi.
Nngwa nttɛ vvenɛ afɔngɔnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nnaangnɛ kikun. Nkkpeeyɔng.

Anaam la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa iggyan ittɛ ataayɔng bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waanawanavva wa ɔtakanɛ la walam limini, wa nlenɛ lɛlɔɔk nttɛ vvenɛ nsammɛ nnyi ɔlɔɔt vvɔn killu keem. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulenɛ Christ.
Ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ nttina nttɛ vvenɛ ippyam annyɔɔng isikili, asamyɔng luttina annyɔɔng assekeyɔng Christ; tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛzzɔkɔ ɛdɔkɔnɛ ɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛt Eve (Uzoo).

Atɔkyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk la laggele uffu ukopolowɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk a Jesus ɔlɔk, usi kwa Jesus wa ayyɔɔt ikopolonɛ lile. Atɔkyɔng kuyeeng la kuttu budoddo kwa kusinɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa ayyɔɔt kwa kussinɛyɛlɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile.
Ba nttina nttɛ “bayilabɔtɔɔm” annyɔɔng battanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge.
Vvenɛ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ntiinɛ ka kikkoop a kutolo. Ɔzzànga ka kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk lissi. Ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ’kwɔng mung ppwool bikkpit bikkpit ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Nsiwɔyɔng kappya lɛbɛkɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ nkopolowɔnɛyɔng Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ntɔknɛ anaam biini ka bikee waan nttɛ nkwaaning àzzángayɔng balɔɔt. Nkwɔng baang bbwak kusi lile ɔɔ?
Ka ɛkɛtɛ inaangnɛ kɛnaang la annyɔɔng, izɔɔm ilɔk ikkpelenɛnɛ. Ntɔkbɛ kussi nttɛ nyaamwɔyɔng annyɔɔng.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ndɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng, lɔsap nsiwɔyɔng lɛkkpa nttɛ attelenɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nggyannɛ ikkpoko. Ikpana ayyɔɔt ya issinɛ Macedonia iffu, bakɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya nggyannɛ bafeenɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ ka isimi, kule kule ning baang ka ussoonɛ. Lɔsap wɔyɔng baala nkkpa.
Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a Christ ka lulenɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ, nlɔɔkbong nsekele nttɛ kɛnaang a kamma anaam ’sɔng baala kizum ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Greece.
Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ nlɔɔk ning? Nlɔɔk ka asinɛnɛyɔng lɛsaap ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ asaapnɛyɔng lɛsaap!
Nle ntii baang ka nnaangnɛ kwa nggbanɛ lissi nnaang, nkwaaning nsi balɔɔt balɔk kufuk linnyi kwa kɛnaang a kamma kɛttɛ abbɛ banaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt inaangnɛ.

Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba lɔkkwɔɔn lissi. Abbɛ balenɛ bakkala-lalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Bakkala lalaak batum kɛnaang abbɛ, babbwa bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba lɔkkwɔɔn.
Kwakkwɛ baang Satan ukkwoongnɛ usikilimɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔbal uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kwakkwɛ kusinɛ gaang lɛttala, ibɔɔyi a Satan basikilinɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng babal ibɔɔyi ya doddo. Ka lakkpeke, vvenɛ babwɔɔlɔ bwa bukkɔnɔnɛbɛ ka kɛnaang sa banaangnɛ.
Nbbal lɛlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uttinanɛ ɔttɛ anaam uzingizingi. Ɔzzànga kulenɛ ning, atɔknɛnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzingizingi gwaat gwaat, nkwaaning nyanga bwa nle nnaang kamma ntum ssup.
Kwa nlɔɔknɛ mung ba kule kwa Uyini ule ɔttɛ nlɔɔk. Ka lɔbba ’gwɔng mung, nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzingizingi ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ɔzzànga ka balɔɔt balɔk balenɛ baang ggbadam ba babbanɛ lɔbba gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ batum lilɔɔk a balɔɔt, vvenɛ nssɛ nbba ning baang.
Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng kɔlɔɔk gaang gaang ayilayɔng bazingizingi banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛbɛ.
Ayilayɔng balɔɔt banaangwɔyɔng lilɔɔk akama. Batɔkwɔyɔng iyyɛɛp, ɔlɔk bassɛɛnwɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk. Bappyɛɛkwɔyɔng bbɔl-bbɔl, batupwɔyɔng labut ka lusso.
Kɔnaang izzit kiyila kɛttɛ bbwɔp linaangnɛyɛlɛ inaang lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbbɔnɛ ɔnaang kamma utum bɔfɛɛn, anaam vvenɛ nnaang nsakmɛ. Ɔzzànga mung nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzingizingi.
Abbɛ balɔɔt a Hebrew ɔɔ? Anaam wa Hebrew. Abbɛ balɔɔt a Israel ɔɔ? Anaam nssɛ nle wa Israel ɔgbaa. Abbɛ balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham ɔɔ? Anaam wa kikkwu ammɛ ɔgbaa.

Mung abbɛ ibɔɔyi a Christ ɔɔ? Appyeenɛ attɛ anaam ukun, nsakalakang anaam nlenɛ bɔɔyi wa doddo nttabɛ abbɛ. Nnaangbong kɛnaang nttabɛ abbɛ. Ntaabong ka ngbakkɔpɔ nttabɛ abbɛ. Batupnɛbong battabɛ abbɛ. Nkkɛtɛ lubbe ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nttabɛ abbɛ.
Utii bikkpit ning kubbwɔɔk ka balɔɔt a Jews batupnɛnɛ lɔlɔp la bupyoko ɔsɛlɔlɔp.
Balɔɔt a Rome batupnɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat. Batɔɔpnɛ lattaal kikkpit ssɔn. Ikkpaat ikkyaat issɛɛnbong la anaam ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ka kikkpit sa ssɔn ntaa kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi.

Ka kɔssɛ anaam naanga ntaak ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛlɔlɔ. Bassip baggyannɛ kɛwwɔɔl. Balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana baggyannɛ kɛwwɔɔl. Nyɛn lubbe ka zzeen ka laffɛ, ka laffɛ. Nyɛngwɛ ka bannyi. Nyɛngwɛ ka kɛmat. Nyɛngwɛ ka bakkala-lalaak inngwa anaam ɔgbaa.

Nnaangbong kɛnaang la akama. Ntaa kwet-kwet nsi bilaa lɛlaa ka bɛtɔm ppwap. Ntaabong buwwɔɔng a bannyi la kazzi likke lɛsaal. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk bwakuzzi bwa doddo ba nyɛn nzzi. Ɛfɛɛn a kilup a lɛttɔ ba nyɛn, gɔɔ uwɔkɔlɔ wa kɛwɔkɔlɔ ka kkwɔɔt.
Ba kule kwa kɛttaal bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk kɛgbaa. Kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ nle baang ka nnaangnɛ kɛnaang izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ɔlɔɔt usinɛnɛ kɔdda lɛdda ɔttɛ nnaang.
Ɛkɔp ɛmɛɛmnɛ ɔlɔɔt, ɛssɛ ɛmɛɛmnɛ anaam. Ɔlɔɔt ɔttɔnɛ ka bubbi, anaam ntaanɛ la akama.
Nlenɛ ka nnaangnɛ kamma, nle nnaang kamma la bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyɔɔnɛnɛ bɛttɛ nkkpɛlɛ lɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ppyɛɛ ule wa lɛkɔɔl ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ abassɛ Jesus Uyini, kɛfal a kɛfal. Ammɛ ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ anaam lɛlaak ba nnaang.
Ɛkɛtɛ ndɔkɔnɛ Damascus, uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi wa ɔtaanɛ ubeet Aretas ka kɔtaak, uloko balɔɔt ka lamma bikkwu lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ɔttɛ bakaanɛ.
Ɔzzánga badɔkɔ basammɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛsangala la kizzi, bassɛ ka lɛmma za lilenɛ ka kɛbat basininɛ baloko ka lissɛ, nmma nsɛɛm.
Vvenɛ nnaang kamma mkkpa kasi likkwoong kanaang kɔlɔk. Ɔzzànga nle nlɔɔk kwa biyɛnɛ la kɛyaala lilɔɔk sa Uyini ulenɛnɛ linnyi.

Ntii ka nkkenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus Christ vvɔn ɔkaanɛ gbɔɔ gbɔɔ ɔkkyaap umii ka libat. Utii likkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil ka kɔnaangnɛ. (Ba nsan bbwak ntumkwɛ. Kɔnaang oo! kusi lɛnaang oo! Ɔdɔkɔ biyɛnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm oo! ba nsan. Ebinukkpaapi keem ɛsannɛ).
Nbbal lɛlɔɔk. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ɔkkyaap umii Paradise. (Ɔzzànga ba nsan bbwak. Kɔnaangbong oo, faa biyɛnɛ Ebinukkpaapi oo, ba nsan. Annyɛ keem ɛsannɛ.)
Uppyee Lɛmmwɔɔl bakang za basinɛzɛ likkwoong bakkpɔk. Uppyee lilɔɔk sa ɔssɛbibit usinɛ likkwoong utolo.
Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulenɛ wa nle nnaang kamma ntum. Baala nnaang kamma ntumnɛ anaam biini. Nle nnaang kamma ntum bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyɔɔnɛnɛ bɛttɛ nkkpɛlɛbong.

Nnaangnɛ kamma, anaam uzingizingi lissi, ka nle nbwɔɔlɔ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzànga kamma baala nnaang ka nsinɛ lɛggyan nttɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ɔyanga luttina ɔttɛ nyyɛɛp linaang, ka likkpɔk ntta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyɛnnɛnɛ ka zzeen uppyeenɛ ka latɔɔk.

Ebinukkpaapi ka ettinanɛ ɛttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ nffu nnaang bisese ka bɛfɛɛn bya nlenɛ lɛyɛn, ematnɛbong kizze ka kkwɔɔt kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm a Satan. Kizze ’sɔng baang kimmeepnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nɛ ba kɛfɔngɔ ɔkkyaanɛ.
Nzɔɔm bikkpit bɛkkyaat nnyi Uyini ntum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng. Nbwɔɔlɔmɛ nttɛ ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛgbata bissekenɛ.

Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma ammɛ kɛdɔkɔ kile kɛttɛ, “Ppyɛɛ anaam ulenɛ bwa aggyannɛ. Lakke anaam lattanɛ lɛkkaam ka ɛkɛtɛ ya likke lɛsaalwɔnɛ.” Nggele gaang gaang ka nkpɛlɛnɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ nsan ikkala a Christ ka kkwɔɔt anaam.
Luppyam lulenɛ bɛɛm la izzit anaam, la kɛkpɛlɛ sa nkpɛlɛnɛ la lifɔk, akama, lubbe, la bɔfɔɔp a kkwɔɔt ka lɛttɔ a Jesus. Ɛkɛtɛ ya nkpɛlɛnɛ baang ulenɛ ya nkkaamnɛ.
Nsseke ka nlɔɔknɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukun ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ba bubungunɛnɛyɔng kɛnaang. Gɔɔ mkkpa nsi bulɔk lile, bulɔk ba nsi lile ka lusso “bayilabɔtɔɔm” annyɔɔng ’bɔng baang.
Bɛmaanga bya bɛnaangnɛ bɛyɔɔ bɛttɛ anaam uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bɛdɔkɔ bɛnaang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng la kibbe luppyam.
Bɛnaang babbɔlwɔyɔng nang bɛtta izɔɔm ilɔk? Ka nsiwɔnɛyɔng lɛbap nttɛ ayaamnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Ellee, asɔɔknɛyɔng ka babbu linaang ’sɔng.

Uwɔng ɔnaangnɛ ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat ka nbamanɛ kiffu kikoolowɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga bulɔk wɔyɔng baala nggyan nbap. Bwɔɔntiti lissi bale bannyi ibassɛ la ibakka bwa baggyannɛ: Ibasse la ibakka bannyinɛ bwɔɔntiti bɔfɛɛn duu bwa baggyannɛ.
Vvenɛ nggele gaang gaang ntakanɛ bwa nyanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔgbaa la anaam biini, nkwaaning nttelewɔyɔng. Vvenɛ anaam baala nsaapwɔyɔng ka annyɔɔng asaapnɛnɛyɔng anaam gaang ɔɔ?
Vvenɛ ayila attɛyɔng akama lissi ka nyɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔttɛ nkɔɔm lagban la lalaak nfɛɛtwɔyɔng.
Nfɛɛtwɔyɔng nang? Attina attɛyɔng nlɔɔk ’kwɔng ɔkkaamnɛnɛ kwa bayilabɔtɔɔm ba ntɔɔmnɛ ɔɔ?

Nkkpenge Titus nttɛ umii. Ntɔɔmmɛ la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa ulenɛ bannyi lɛllɔt nttɛ bamii la ammɛ. Mung alɔɔk attɛyɔng Titus ɔkkaamnɛ kwa annyɔɔng ɔɔ? Anaam la ammɛ eleme nnyɔn la lɔtan ggwɔn lissi ka iyanganɛ ɔɔ?

Vvenɛ ale attina attɛyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ileyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kɛkkala ka lusso annyɔɔng. Ning lissi, ilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ulenɛyɛlɛ likke lɛssɛɛn ɔttɛ ilɔɔk ka lusso Ebinukkpaapi. Kɔlɔɔk duu kwa inaangnɛ iggyan ittɛ budoddo butaa la annyɔɔng inngwa ayyɔɔt.

Ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ nttɛ nffunɛ bakang vvenɛ nyɛnwɔyɔng ka babbu linaang ba nsinɛ lɛggyan. Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa vvenɛ ayɛnnɛyɔng la linaang sa asinɛyɔng lɛggyan. Ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ nttɛ vvenɛ nyɛn balɔɔt a kɔfɔk la banaang a luleep, la bassɔp-a-luppyam, la bassɔp a bɔfɛɛn, la babbaat a lifɔk, bassɛ lɔzzɔ, lɔbba la babbu linaang ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ nttina nttɛ nffunɛ Ebinukkpaapi vvenɛ ɛnaang izzit inaangnɛ ka lusso annyɔɔng. Vvenɛ nkkwa nnyi banaang-a-bubbi ba baggbanɛ bubbi lɛnaang, bale kikup a bwanavva la babbu ikkɔlɔ lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ.
Mung ɔnaangnɛnɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat ka nlenɛ liffu nkoolowɔyɔng. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Kɛkaal duu kɛzza kwa kamma kɛkaal ittɛɛsɛ iffa ɔlɔk ikkyaat”.

Nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng bubbi lɛnaang ka isimi ka isimi la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nlɔɔk kkpal ntumkwɛ ka nffunɛ nkoolowɔyɔng ka ɔssɛ-ɔttɛlɛ kiffu. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nbbalkwɛ lɛlɔɔk ka nle nffu. Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nppyɛlɛ nffu ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔsɛɛm ka akama wa nle nkɔɔm nffu baala ule.

Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng iyɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya aggyannɛyɔng ɔlɔk balɔɔt basan battɛ Christ ɔkɔɔmnɛ anaam ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk. Kwa ɔnaangnɛ la annyɔɔng kɔkkpɛlɛ lissi ka ɔkkpɛlɛnɛ, ɔyɔɔ lakke ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng.

Gɔɔ mkkpa ɔdɔkɔ ule kiyila kɛbɛtɛ kɛnaangmɛnɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ ka Cross, uddubong ka lakke Ebinukkpaapi. Ayɔɔt ɔgbaa issɛ iyila kɛbɛtɛ ning baang ka ilenɛ la ammɛ. Ka ilenɛ bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn la annyɔɔng, vvenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ issɛ iyanga kuddu ka lakke Ebinukkpaapi.

Allɛwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, annyiwɔyɔng kibbi kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔk asanyɔng ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn alenɛyɔng la kiyila. Asanyɔng mung attɛyɔng Christ Jesus ule baang ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng ɔɔ? Asanyɔng mung, atakanɛyɔng ka nakanaka lisi lizzeme.
Nttina nttɛ asanyɔng mung attɛyɔng ayyɔɔt ikumbong ka illɛ ’yɔng baang.
Izɔɔm innyi Ebinukkpaapi ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɔngɔ bubbi kɛnaang, nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɛn battɛ ikemebong. Kɔyyɛɛp ka anaangnɛyɔng kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ mkkpa balɔɔt battina battɛ ittɔbong ka illɛ.
Baala ikkwoong itunu lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Ile inaang kwa kɔyaamnɛgwɛ keem.
Iggele uggele ka ikpɛlɛnɛ, annyɔɔng akkaamyɔng. Issɛ ɔssɛ izɔɔm ittɛ ɔlɔk labɔɔk annyɔɔng lataa kpaladadaa.

Kwakkwɛ nlewɔnɛ luvva ’gwɔng lɛkkpɔk tɛ́ttɛ́ nffu ntaa la annyɔɔng nkwaaning ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng, baala nyɔɔwɔyɔng akama. Uyini unnyinɛbong lakke za nnaangwɔnɛyɔng akkaamyɔng ɔlɔk nnyiwɔyɔng kibbi.
Ikpana anaam ataayɔng doddo. Agɔpɔlɔyɔng lakkpenge anaam ataayɔng bbwak. Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la ba annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛ bɔkaat la kɛsaap vvenɛ ɔtaa la annyɔɔng.
Awomowɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng la kigbugba bukpana. Balɔɔt Ebinukkpaapi ɔkkpɛlɛ bawomowɔyɔngbong.
Kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk a Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, la kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bɔkaat a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ammɛ bibee la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Paul wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ ɔttɛ ɔ̀zzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ. Kɛkkwɔɔ ammɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ba kissi, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt lissi ɔnaangnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔkkwɔɔmɛ. Ɔzzànga kissi ka Jesus Christ la abassɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ilenɛ mung la anaam batoolobong la anaam itɔɔm luwomo ifee izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ilenɛ ka Galatia.
Numa Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Jesus Christ, Uyini, bannyiwɔyɔng lakke la bɔkaat.
Christ ɔsammɛbong kɛyɔɔng unnyi ka bubbi ayyɔɔt, ka latele a Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ebinukkpaapi, ɔttɛ nkwaaning itta ka bubbi bɛtɔm ’byɔng mung.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ wa latele kɛfal a kɛfal. Kule ning.
Akɛɛlɛnɛ yɔng gaang gaang! Appyɛɛ agbatayɔng like like ning assekemɛyɔng ammɛ wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ka likke a Christ appyɛɛ amii akupyɔng kuttu budoddo kɔlɔk.
Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kuttu budoddo kɔlɔk ba kule. Ɔzzànga nlɔɔk ’kwɔng ka balɔɔt balɔk balenɛ baang ba babumnɛ kisikiliwɔyɔng ippyam, babum kifoolo kuttu budoddo a Christ bagbaa.

Gɔɔ mkkpa uleyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt mung, ɔ̀ppyɛ́ɛ ule uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ussinɛ ka libat, ukopolowɔnɛyɔng kuttu budoddo kwa kulenɛ zzekep la kwa ayyɔɔt ikopolowɔnɛyɔng, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule wa kɛfɔɔp ka lɔkɔɔn.

Ilɔɔkbongkwɛ kkpal tɛ, ɔzzanga gedegede mung nle ka nbbalnɛkwɛ lɛlɔɔk. Ɔlɔt ɔlɔk ukopolowɔnɛyɔng kuttu budoddo kwa kulenɛ zzekep la kwa ayyɔɔt ilewɔnɛyɔng likopolo, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule wa kɛfɔɔp ka lɔkɔɔn.

Mung nkwɔng kɔbal mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ ka lubum nttɛ kɔsaap balɔɔt ɔɔ? Maaye kpongkpong! Nggyan nttɛ kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Mung nle ka kibum nttɛ balɔɔt basannɛ ɔɔ? Butiinɛ ka nbumnɛ nttɛ balɔɔt basannɛ nzang bɔɔyi a Christ ba nle.
Fɔngɔyɔngbong ssii nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ikpana anaam; Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng mung ka ɔlɔɔt ba kussi.
Nsikwɛ lɛtɔk ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk. Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usinɛ kwɛ likopolo. Jesus Christ biini uwongolonɛkwɛ pwool ɔyɔɔnɛ.
Babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nyɔɔnɛ luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akama lusinɛ lɛttɔ libbe. Nbum gaang gaang nttɛ ntakagwɛ.
Ndɔkɔ nyanga kiyila gaang gaang ka eleme balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ntta bayyɔɔt-uggba.
Ɔzzànga ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ la lakke, ɔsanganɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang kɛnaang ammɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔnaangnɛ luttina
ɔttɛ ɔnaangnɛ nsan waan ammɛ nkwaaning nkopolo Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ nbwɔɔlɔ Ikanakana, nsi ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk limii ɔbbanɛ bikɔɔm.
Gɔɔ Jerusalem nsi limii kɛyɛn a balɔɔt ba baggbanɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus lile tɛ́ttɛ́ anaam nle. Lutini ’gwɔng nfeele eseese nmii Arabia, nppyɛlɛnɛ nmii Damascus.
Likkpa likkyaat lisaknɛ nmii Jerusalem kippyee kɔlɔɔk ka kamma Peter. Ntaa la ammɛ ka bɛtɔm ɔsɛlɛzzil.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ɔlɔk nsi lɛyɛn ɔgbaa la James, ɔkpana Uyini.
Kwa nkkpɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ lɛlaak ba nkkala.
Ɔttɛ ɔnaang nmii ka ifɛɛn ya ilenɛ ka Syria la Cilicia.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ba balenɛ ka izɔɔm ka Judaea basinɛ anaam biini lɛsan.
Basan kwa balɔɔt balɔk balɔɔknɛ keem battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ɔyɔɔyɛlɛ akama, gedegede mung ammɛ ussekenɛ ka ukopolonɛyɛlɛ utum kiyila sa ubumnɛ kɛbɛpɛ!”
Keem babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa anaam.
Likkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil lisaknɛ, nppyɛlɛ nmii Jerusalem la Barnabas, Titus ɔssɛ umii la anaam ɔgbaa.

Nmii ka Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛnɛ nmii. Nbwɔɔlɔbɛ ka likup la bazzilɛttɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkopolonɛ Ikanakana kuttu-budoddo. Nsi lɛggyan nttɛ kɛnaang anaam ka kissinɛ ka isimi ka isimi la gedegede mung kɛttɔ gbɔɔ kɛtaak.
Ɛnngwa anaam ya ɛzzanganɛ Titus nkkpa ndɔk ule wa Greek, basimɛ litut kɛzza lɛtaa.

Balɔɔt Balɔk badɔkɔ baggyan battɛ ɔzzazɛ. Abbɛ balenɛ ba babɔɔlnɛ bafula ka kɛkaan ayyɔɔt basseke bagbɛɛk-a-lɔgbɛɛk babbwa battɛ abbɛ bassɛ bayanga kiyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt. Ning banaang nkwaaning bakɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkyaanɛyɛlɛ ɔffɔ ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus. Badɔkɔ baggyan battɛ bakɔɔmyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili.
Isibɛ lɛfɔngɔ babɛtɛyɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn gbɔɔ ffet. Inaang ning baang ɔkkɔɔnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a kuttu-budoddo a Jesus Christ lɔtaawɔyɔng.
Ɔzzànga kwa balɔɔt ba bappyɛɛknɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazzilɛttɔ—Nlɔɔk ka nsinɛ kifoolo linaang kɛlɔk lɛyɛn. Ebinukkpaapi linaang ɔlɔɔt ba effik. — Bazzilɛttɔ ’bɔng baang luttina lɔlɔk basimɛ linnyi.
Ɔzzànga kɔyɛn bayɛnbong basan battɛ Ebinukkpaapi ennyinɛbong kikopolo Ikanakana kuttu-budoddo a Christ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛnnyinɛ Peter lakke za kikopolo balɔɔt a Jews lɛmmwɔɔl annyɛ.
Kussi ka lakke Ebinukkpaapi tɛ́ttɛ́ nzzanga Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa Jesus ɔtɔɔmnɛ ufee Ikanakana tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Peter ɔdɔkɔnɛ wa balɔɔt a Jews.

James, Peter la John ba badɔkɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazzilɛttɔ, basan lɔsan battɛ Ebinukkpaapi ennyinɛbong likke ’zɔng baan zzekep. Ɔzzángá batɔkyɛlɛ labɔɔk la Barnabas ka ilenɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ kkwɔn. Ayyɔɔt iyila kamma kɛnaang a kɛnaang ka Ikanakana. Abbɛ bayila kamma kɛnaang a kɛnaang ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a Jews.
Bwa babapnɛ ɔdɔkɔ kɛttɛ ikke balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ ka kɛkaan abbɛ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa nggbanɛ lissi nbum kɛnaang ka isimi ka isimi.
Ɔzzánga Peter uffunɛ ka Antioch, nfim kwa utolonɛ ka lusso balɔɔt ka usinɛ bbwak lile.

Peter ɔdɔkɔ ka kazzi la ikpana ayyɔɔt Ikanakana, ka balɔɔt ba James ɔtɔɔmnɛ baffɔnɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffɔnɛ, ammɛ Peter kazzi kattunmɛ la Ikanakana. Ɔttɔm ɔppyɛlɛ isimi-simi. Ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ ka ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ battɛ Ikanakana babɛkɛ lɛtaa.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt balɔk ba Jews basseke ka banaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babbwɔp gbaak la Peter. Gɔɔ Barnabas ɔssɛ ukupbɛ ka linaang a bbwɔp abbɛ.

Nyɛnnɛ nttɛ bbwak ba bassɛ bakup lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a lukopolo kuttu budoddo, nlɔɔk la Peter ka lusso abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ, “Annɔ wa Jews, ɔzzànga anaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wa akanakana, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wa Jews ba anaang. Mung ale anaang nang vvenɛ anaang Ikanakana bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Jews?”
Kule kule ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a Jews pputup, ayyɔɔt “Ikanakana banaang a bubbi” tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛbɛ lissi.

Ɔzzànga isan mung ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiyila kwa Awaan, Jesus Christ, kɛnaang a kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ lissi. Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa iyangabong kiyila itum Christ Jesus nkwaaning itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kwa kɛnaang kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ lissi. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ ba ule.

Bayɛnnɛ battɛ ayyɔɔt issɛ ile banaang-a-bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ikanakana ka ilenɛ ka kɛggyan a ɛtɔk a kɛtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiyila kwa Awaan Jesus Christ, vvenɛ kule kɔttɛ Christ uyilabɔtɔɔm a bubbi ɔɔ? Ning lissi kpong kpong!
Nppyɛlɛnɛ nlɔngɔlɔ kɛssanga lafɔɔ za nlenɛ lɛbɛpɛ, nzang nyɔɔnɛbong kɛyɔɔng nttɛ anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɛpɛnɛzɛ.
Ka ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ, nbbebong. Lafɔɔ biini lawwɔɔlnɛnɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ nnaang kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ. Bawwɔɔlnɛbong batoolo la Christ ka Cross,
ɔkkɔɔnɛ usinɛ anaam lile nddunɛ mung. Usseke Christ ka ulenɛ ka kuddu ka tɔkɔlɔ anaam. Kuddu kwa nddunɛ mung, nddu ka nyilanɛ kwa Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa nsaapmɛnɛ ɔsam lɛfal ammɛ unnyi kwa anaam.
Lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba nfim. Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kussinɛ ka Lafɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga nzang lubbe a Christ ubbebong gbɔɔ.
Annyɔɔng bazingizingi balɔɔt a Galatia ’bɔng! Nyinɛ ɔmanawɔnɛyɔng? Ayɛnyɔngbong Jesus Christ kkpelegedee ka zzeen annyɔɔng ka ubbenɛ ka Cross!
Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung kkwɔn. Adɔkɔ atɔkyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka anaangnɛyɔng bwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ faa ka appyeenɛyɔng, ayilayɔng kwa kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ?
Anaang nang anaangnɛyɔng kizingizingi ning! Adɔkɔ atteyɔng la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, mung aggyan attɛ appyɛɛ akɔɔmyɔng lakke za annyɔɔng akeeleyɔng ɔɔ?
Kwa alenɛyɔng lɛsan ɔkkpɛlɛ mung ka bulɔk ba kɔffɔ ɔɔ? Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kɔffɔ mung.
Mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔyɔng Kuyeeng ammɛ, ɔnaang bɛmaanga ka annyɔɔng ka anaangnɛyɔng kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ faa ka appyeenɛyɔng, ayilayɔng kuttu-budoddo ammɛ?
Attinayɔng kwa luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lutum Abraham. Lɔttɛ, “Uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kussi kwakkwɛ baang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.”
Asan attɛyɔng balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila balenɛ balɔɔt ba kikkwu Abraham ba lɔkkwɔɔn.

Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔggba lɛyɛn lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uloko Ikanakana bbwak la ammɛ biini ka kiyila. Kwakkwɛ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔggbanɛ Abraham Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛbwɔɔlɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔ. Lɔttɛ, “Kule kussi ka lɛttɔ annɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang Ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ ppyɛɛ.”
Abraham uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bayilanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Abraham.
Balɔɔt ba kɔbɛtɛnɛbɛ ka kitele lafɔɔ bale ka akama. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ kwa bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama.”
Kutii ppwool, Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulokonɛ Lafɔɔ ba ule. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔkbong lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtaanɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔyanganɛ kiyila vvenɛ uddu.”
Ɔzzànga Lafɔɔ ka kiyila ba lale. Lutini ’gwɔng lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ duu bwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ ule uddu kwa azzɛ.”
Ɔzzànga Christ ɔsangabongyɛlɛ ka nzɔɔm wa Lafɔɔ lafeenɛyɛlɛ (ka ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt) tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa bazzengemɛnɛ ka kɛssɛ ɔttɔbong ka nzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Christ ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning ppyɛɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang Abraham, ɔssɛ ɔnaang Ikanakana ka lɛttɔ a Jesus Christ, nkwaaning ikɔɔm kiyila iyanga Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ.

Ikpana anaam nle ka nkɔɔmnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng. Balɔɔt baffa bayilanɛ ka kɔlɔɔk, babɛtɛ kɛnnɔ, ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔbɛpɛ kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ ’sɔng baang ba ɔbɛlɛ lile, gɔɔ kɛgbaa bɔfɛɛn ka assɛ.

Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaang nsekele la Abraham la ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a kikkwu annɔ.” Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ la balɔɔt ggbadam. Lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “La ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu annɔ” ning baang ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn keem; ammɛ ulenɛ Christ.

Kwa nlɔɔknɛ ulenɛ ’kwɔng: Ebinukkpaapi ɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ la Abraham ɛttɛ vvenɛ ɛnaang kwa ɛlɔɔknɛ. Lafɔɔ za lassinɛ ka nnɔ la lɔlɔp la likkpa zzɔɔp baala lakkwong labɛpɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ebinukkpaapi elenɛ lɛbɛtɛ.
Bɔfɛɛn bwa Ebinukkpaapi ennyinɛ bussinɛ ka Lafɔɔ, busibong ka nsekele Ebinukkpaapi lɛbɛlɛ lissi. Kɔdɔkɔ ning baang Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaang nsekele ’wɔng baang ɛtɔk ennyi Abraham.

Lafɔɔ ladɔkɔ laggyan ’bɔng? Bassɛɛn Lafɔɔ nkwaaning basan kɔlɔɔk kwa kulenɛ ubbu kɔlɔɔk. Bassɛɛn battɛ lataa Lafɔɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham wa Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ nsekele kwa ammɛ ule uffu. Ebinukkpaapi ɛsam Lafɔɔ ennyi bayilabɔtɔɔm annyɛ. Bayilabɔtɔɔm Ebinukkpaapi basamzɛ bafee Moses kuttɔɔk. Ammɛ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛ-bukkpɔ.
Ɔzzànga ɔssɛ-bukkpɔ baala ka kinnyi nsekele ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn, Ebinukkpaapi ele nnyɔn keem.

Baang attina attɛ Lafɔɔ kutunzɛ lutun ka nsekele wa Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ ɔɔ? Maaye! Ning baang lissi. Ɔssɛbibit butɔknɛ lifɔɔ za likɔɔmnɛ kuddu liffu nzang ɔlɔɔt ukkwoong mung ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka utelenɛ Lafɔɔ.

Ɔzzàngà luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔkbong lɔttɛ ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ esseke ya lakke bubbi, nkwaaning lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ kinnyi balɔɔt kwa Jesus Christ, basam bannyi balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Jesus Christ.
Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ kiyila effu, idɔkɔ itii ka Lafɔɔ lasamnɛyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ lassɛɛn ka ggwoon tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a igbakkɔpɔ tɔttɔt kɔlɔɔk a kiyila sa kile ka kiffunɛ kutuma.
Ɔzzánga idɔkɔ ile ba Lafɔɔ lakɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ tɔttɔt Christ uffu nkwaaning itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛyanga kiyila.
Gedegede mung ɛkɛtɛ kiyila etii mung. Lafɔɔ lakke ba labɛlɛ lɛyanga la ayyɔɔt.
Kussi ka kiyila ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng azzangayɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bɔkaat annyɔɔng la Christ Jesus.
Adɔkɔ anaangyɔng baptizim ka bɔkaat la Christ. Mung atɔkyɔngbong ileme ammɛ ayangayɔng.

Ɔzzànga balɔɔt a Jews buubuu ba babɛlɛ lile la Ikanakana. Babili buu ba babɛlɛ lile la balɔɔt ba basinɛ babili lile. Bwaanbwalam buu ba babɛlɛ lile la bwanavva. Ɔkkpɛlɛ assekeyɔng ikɛlɛlɛ ka bɔkaat la Jesus.
Alenɛyɔng ba Christ, ɔzzànga nzang aleyɔng balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham. Vvenɛ ayangayɔng etini ka bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lisekele.
Nttɛ waanawalam duu wa ule uzzi kazzi kullu bɛfɛɛn abassɛ, bale bakɔɔmmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubili ka utiinɛ waan, mkkpa bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bya ammɛ.
Ka utiinɛ waan, balɔɔt bale baang ba bappyɛɛkmɛnɛ, banaang bɛfɛɛn bakkalamɛ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya abassɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ uloko.
Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa idɔkɔ ile babili ilat ikɔɔmnɛ ka vveengodde, tɛ́ttɛ́ uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ isannɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bbwak.
Ɔzzánga ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ɛffɔnɛ, Ebinukkpaapi ɛtɔɔm Waan annyɛ uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan wa ɔlɔɔt ɔmaatnɛ, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews lalɔɔknɛ.
Lattɛ uffu ɔttɛ ɔkkala balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka Lafɔɔ lɛttɔ, nkwaaning ɔkkpɛlɛ izzangayɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ka ɛggyannɛ ɛttɛ isan ittɛ annyɔɔng bwaan annyɛ, Ebinukkpaapi ɛtɔɔm Kuyeeng a Waan annyɛ gwa lɔkkwanɛ lɔttɛ, “Dedde, Dedde anaam” luffu ka ippyam ayyɔɔt.
Kwakkwɛ baang asinɛyɔng babili lɛbɛlɛ lile, assekeyɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka alenɛyɔng bwaan annyɛ, Ebinukkpaapi vvenɛ ennyiwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɛyanganɛ eloko bwɔɔn annyɛ.
Ka isimi ka isimi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba asanyɔng. Kwakkwɛ adɔkɔnɛyɔng ka bubili bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile.

Ngkka gedegede mung ka alenɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan (Nlɔɔk nttɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛyɔng lɛsan) mbɔng ale ka appyɛɛnɛ anaangwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng babili a iwikiwiki liyeeng ’sɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ adɔkɔnɛ aleyɔng? Bubili assɛ abbalyɔng mbɔng lɛggyan?
Ateleyɔng zzeen ka bɛtɔm la ittina la laggbeel a kukkpa la likkpa biini.
Luppyam lɔzzanɛ lɔzza lɔsak kwa annyɔɔng. Ɔzzánga kɛnaang anaam nnaangnɛ kɛttɔbong gbɔɔ kɛtaak ɔɔ?
Nkkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge, ikpana anaam, anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nnaangnɛ. Uvve kaang anaam nle tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng. Bulɔk bwa bubbɔlnɛ ba ataka anaangyɔng.
Akke asan attɛyɔng ɔdɔkɔ iffaak inaangnɛnɛ nkopolowɔyɔng kuttu-budoddo ka ikeeng ikeeng tɛ!

Ɔzzànga asinɛyɔng lɛggba, gɔɔ kɛwɔlɔnɛ gbɔɔ mkkpa iffaak anaam idɔkɔ ile ya ballɛwɔnɛyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng atɔknɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ butɔknɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Atɔknɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ butɔknɛyɔng Christ Jesus.
Adɔkɔ aleyɔng ka laggele gaang gaang, ’bɔng bunaangnɛ? Nkkwoong mung nlɔɔk nttɛ bukkwoongnɛ asangayɔng zzeen annyɔɔng nzang asangayɔngbong annyinɛyɔng.
Ngkka mung ba ntaka nsseke ɔlɔɔt kɔfɔk annyɔɔng ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɔɔ?

Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayɔɔ kɛsaap gaang gaang ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng. Ɔzzànga ittina abbɛ ba iyyɛɛp. Baggyan battɛ basamwɔyɔng bagbata bassekenɛ, ɔkkɔɔnɛ kɔssɛ kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng kwa abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ kɔbɛtɛnɛbɛ kwa annyɔɔng.
Kɔyyɛɛp mung ka ayanganɛyɔng ittina ya doddo atumyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ. Nkwɔng mung kulenɛ bbwak kɔ̀yyɛ́ɛ̀p ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ la annyɔɔng keem lissi.

Bwaan anaam! Assɔpnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɔpnɛ wanavva wa ulenɛ ka kɛppwɔlɔ imala. Gedegede mung nttina uttina ntumwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abakka ɔlɔɔt uttinanɛ utum waan ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ lɛmaat. Akama ɔnaangnɛ gaang ntumwɔyɔng tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ atɔknɛyɔng lɛfal a Christ assɛɛnyɔng ka luppyam.
Bɔng baang nsinɛ la annyɔɔng lile gedegede mung ɔlɔk nfoolo eleme ɛlɔk nppyɛɛkwɔyɔng. Nttina kwa annyɔɔng gaang gaang.
Fɔngɔbong nbapwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ba attɛnɛ aleyɔng ba Lafɔɔ: Ba ataka appyeeyɔng bwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ ɔɔ?
Lafɔɔ lalɔɔk lattɛ Abraham ɔyanga bwɔɔn baffa. Vvɔn ubili ammɛ wa wanavva ɔmaatnɛ. Wa vvɔn wanavva ammɛ wa usinɛ ubili lile ɔmaatnɛ.
Waan ammɛ wa ubili ɔmaatnɛ bamaatmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bamaatnɛ bwɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga waan ammɛ wa wanavva ammɛ wa usinɛ ubili lile ɔmaatnɛ, bamaatmɛ ka nsekele wa Ebinukkpaapi elene lɛnaang.
Nkwɔng mung kulenɛ ifɛɛt: Bwanavva ’bɔng baang baffa balenɛ isekele iffa. Wanavva wa ulenɛ ubili ɔmaat bwɔɔn ulenɛ Hagar. Ammɛ ɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛtɛnɛ ka lɛttaal a Sinai.
Hagar, wa ɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛttaal a Sinai za ka Arabia, ulenɛ lɛffɛ a Jerusalem gedegede mung. Kwakkwɛ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ balenɛ babili.
Ɔzzànga Jerusalem wa ulenɛ ka libat ka bubili ba ule. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɛnɛ ayyɔɔt.

Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Wanavva wa ɔtakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛmaat uggele. Abungu la laggele ka atakanɛ bɔssɔp a lɛmaat lippyee. Wanavva wa ulenɛ buyya vvenɛ ɔmaat bwɔɔn ɔgbaa ɔtta wanavva wa ulenɛ ka ssala walam ka ullenɛ.”
Gedegede mung, ikpana anaam, assekeyɔng bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Isaac ɔdɔkɔnɛ, ɔssanga ka nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, waan wa badɔkɔnɛ bamaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bamaatnɛ bwɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyɔɔ wa bamaatnɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akama. Kule kɛssanga ssɔn gedegede mung.

Mung luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk nang? Lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Asamyɔng ubili wa wanavva la waan ammɛ azzɔɔkyɔng. Waan wa ubili wa ulenɛ wanavva ɔmaatnɛ, bɛfɛɛn abassɛ baala utul uzzi la waan wa abakka ammɛ usinɛ ubili lile.”
Ikpana anaam, ayyɔɔt bwɔɔn a wanavva ubili ba ile. Wanavva wa usinɛ ubili lile ɔmaatnɛyɛlɛ.
Kɛtta ka kɔlɔɔk ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa iyanganɛ. Christ ɔsangabongyɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Abeeyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛtta, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng lɛfɔngɔ abbalyɔng babili lile.
Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Anaam Paul nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ’kwɔng: Afɔngɔnɛ babɛkɛwɔyɔng lataa, nzang Christ ka bulɔk mɛyɔng ba atɔkyɔng kpong-kpong.
Nbbalwɔyɔng lɛttama! Ɔlɔɔt duu wa batutmɛnɛ uyila ɔzza lɛtaa usseke wa utelenɛ Lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Annyɔɔng balɔɔt balɔk ba abumnɛ attɛ ataayɔng bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka atelenɛyɔng Lafɔɔ, azzawɔyɔngbong kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng Christ, attayɔng ka ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ka kwa ayyɔɔt, luttina ayyɔɔt lule lɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ulokoyɛlɛ bbwak la ammɛ. Uwɔng mung ulenɛ bwa ikatnɛ ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lalenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kiyila ayyɔɔt.
Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, kɛbɛkɛ lɛtaa la kisi lɛtaa lɛbɛkɛ buubuu ba bile. Kwa kɔttanɛ ulenɛ kiyila sa kɛssɛnɛ la kɛsaap.
Adɔkɔ anaangyɔng doddo. Nnyinɔɔng ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng asiyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɛbɛlɛ litele? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng nang?
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng lissi ɔnaangnɛ kwɛ.
Kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Bwaan-izuku a yeast ssup ning bɛnaangnɛ ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ utum.”

Ɔzzànga ntii baang ka nttinanɛ ntumwɔyɔng. Bɔkaat ayyɔɔt la Christ bunaangnɛnɛ nyanga kiyila nttɛ baala asikiliyɔng luttina. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔggyanwɔnɛyɔng kisikili luttina, mkkpa ule ɔlɔɔt wa ule, wa ule vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔmɛ akama.

Ikpana anaam, ka kwa anaam, ntiinɛ baang ka nbwɔɔlɔnɛ nttɛ kɛzza lɛtaa kɛyyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp, akama bayɔɔnɛ kwa ’bɔng? Nkwɔng baang budɔkɔnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nzang lukopolo anaam gwa lutumnɛ Cross a Christ kɔlɔɔk baala lɔggyan.
Nggyan nttɛ balɔɔt ba baggyanwɔnɛyɔng kɛbɛpɛ ippyam baang ɔkkaambɛ. Battɛnɛ bale ka bafaatnɛ idakɔp ya abbɛ kɛyɔɔng, bafaat.

Ikpana anaam ka kwa annyɔɔng, badɔkɔ bakkwɔɔwɔyɔng battɛ attayɔng ka kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng kɛtta ka kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng mung kile bɔfɛɛn a luteele gwa afɔngɔnɛyɔng iyyɛɛp a vveeng ikkwɔɔwɔyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng afɔngɔyɔng kɛsaap kɛnaangwɔyɔng ateleyɔng wannyɔɔng.
Lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ lale ka tɔkɔlɔ lifɔɔ zzɔn za lɛttɛnɛ, “Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
Ɔzzànga anaangnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isɛɛn ka kɛmat, addopoyɔng bannyɔɔng, akatyɔng nzang vvenɛ awwɔɔlyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ afɔngɔyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔkɔɔm lafal annyɔɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya lafal annyɔɔng laggyannɛ.

Kwa lɛfal ɔlɔɔt lɛggyannɛ, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba kɔggyan. Kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔggyannɛ, lɛfal ɔlɔɔt ba lɛggyan. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bɛffa bile ka kɔfɔk. Ning ulenɛ kɛttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng bwa lɛfal annyɔɔng laggyannɛ lɛttɛ anaangyɔng.
Ulenɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔkɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng, nzang annyɔɔng babili Lafɔɔ lissi.
Kɔlɔɔk kwa lɛfal ɔlɔɔt lɛnaangnɛ kule kkpelegedee, lɛyɔɔzɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ɛtɔk a kɛssɛ-kɛzak la linaang a isɛɛn a kɛmat.

Lɛyɔɔzɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ɛtɔk a kɛzɔɔm kinnyi ilat la litaan. Balɔɔt basseke lifɔk a lifɔk. Bakɔɔm ballu, banaang babbɛ ileep, kɔkɔɔm kutunbɛ la kɛnaang a lilɔɔk ka lakke. Babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng basseke lakup lakup.

Bale banaang-a-luleep. bavva batak babimi. Bamini la bwanavva kyaakyaa. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbbalwɔyɔngbong lɛttama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ndɔkɔnɛ nttamawɔyɔng. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ba Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basibong lile.
Ɔzzànga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiyɛlɛ kɛsaap la laggele la bɔkaat, la kibbe luppyam, la kibbe lɛttɔ, la budoddo kɛyyɛɛp a bɛnaang.
La bukee-waan ɔbɛtɛ la kɛkɔɔm a kɛyɔɔng. Lafɔɔ za lattɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bya Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛ ba lale.
Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba Christ Jesus basambong lafal abbɛ la ittina abbɛ ya ibbɔlnɛ bannyi lubbe.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyibongyɛlɛ lafal. Mkkpa kɔnaang vvenɛ kɔkɔɔm lafal ayyɔɔt.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaang bisese ka nakanaka, ɔlɔk vvenɛ inaang kwa kɔssɔpnɛ wayyɔɔt, ɔlɔk vvenɛ inaang wayyɔɔt luleep.

Ikpana anaam, bakaanɛ ɔlɔɔt ka ɔnaangnɛ kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, annyɔɔng ’bɔng baang ba alenɛyɔng ba Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ale abbamɛyɔng bikɔɔm ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang. Ɔzzànga anaangyɔngkwɛ ka latele. Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu assɛ attɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk ɔgbaa.
Attele wannyɔɔng ɔtɔkɔ lɛtɔkɔ ammɛ. Anaangnɛ ning baang ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng, atelebong lafɔɔ a Christ.
Ɔlɔɔt uttinamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔt ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka usinɛ bulɔk lile, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkpɛnmɛ kɛyɔɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uffik linaang ammɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ulenɛ ka linaang ammɛ liyyɛɛpnɛ ɔkkyaamɛ ka kwa ammɛ biini. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔsam ɔkakala la linaang sa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔnaangnɛ, vvenɛ ɔttɛ sa ammɛ biini littanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔtɔkɔ lɛtɔkɔ za lilenɛ za ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa balemɛnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm likopolo uzzi bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ɔyanganɛ ɔbɛkɛ unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɛɛtwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔlɔk vvenɛ atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka kikun. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ule ɔyaat bwa uwoopnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt uwoopnɛ bɔfɛɛn ka ikkɔlɔ a vveengodde, bwa ule ɔyaat ulenɛ lubbe. Ɔlɔɔt wa uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm ammɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔyaat kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Ɔfɔngɔyɛlɛ kikoolo ka kɛnaang a budoddo. Inaang budoddo tɔttɔt, ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ effu ya ile iyaat budoddo.
Inaang budoddo la lutini ɔlɔɔt ɛkɛtɛ duu ya ikkwoongnɛ. Gaang gaang la balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka itutum ayyɔɔt ka kiyila.
Yɛnyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nnaangnɛ illeta iggbenge ka nkɔɔmnɛ kɔbɔɔk anaam biini nkkpɔk nnyiwɔyɔng.

Balɔɔt ba babumwɔnɛyɔng kitut battɛ azzayɔng lataa, balenɛ balɔɔt ba baggyannɛ kɛnaang a bisese la kamma kitum lilɔɔk a vveengodde. Banaang ’kwɔng baang nkwaaning basibɛ akama lɛyɔɔ kwa Cross a Jesus.
Gɔɔ lɔkaan gwa bazzanɛ lataa, Lafɔɔ ba batele. Baggyan battɛ annyɔɔng azzayang lataa nkwaaning banaang kamma la annyɔɔng battɛ àyilayɔng kwa kɛnaang a latɔm a vveengodde.
Ulenɛ la anaam, mkkpa kɔnaang nle nnaang kamma ntum Cross a Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, keem wa kussinɛ kwa ammɛ vveeng ubbe kwa anaam, anaam nbbe kwa vveeng.
Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ba kule mkkpa azza lɛtaa appyɛɛ asi lɛtaa lɛzza. Kwa kulenɛ kɔlɔɔk ulenɛ kisseke ufaa bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ.
Bɔkaat la kibbe lɛttɔ bɛtaa la balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ itɔk ’yɔng mung ka kɛfal abbɛ, bɛtaa la abbɛ ɔbɛtɛ la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Kitele lɛttɔ! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbbalnɛ kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk lɛkpaka. Binuku bya nyanganɛ ka kkwɔɔt bɛyɔɔbong bɛttɛ anaam ubili a Jesus.
Ikpana anaam, ppyɛɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kulening.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng Paul wa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ɔ̀zzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ, ɔkkpɔknɛ ufee balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ ka Ephesus; ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka bɔkaat abbɛ la Christ Jesus.
Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, banaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ bannyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat.

Affu iwomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, kɛnaang ka ulenɛyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ lɛnaang ka bɔkaat ayyɔɔt la Christ. Ka ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi lutini lɛsɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ za vveeng wa libat.
Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkpansi ele la kɔnaang, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggbayɛlɛ lɛsanga ɔttɛ ile ba ammɛ ka Christ nkwaaning ile ba doddo isɛlɛ bubbi ka lusso Ammɛ. Kɛsaap sa isaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm
kɛnaangbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba luttina lɛnaang ɔttɛ vvenɛ issɛ la Jesus Christ ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ umii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ isseke bwaan ammɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ laggele ammɛ la luttina ammɛ.
Ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ sa lɛbaang ka lɛsɔɔk za ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi ka Waan ammɛ wa luppyam.
Lubbe gwa Christ ubbenɛ ɔnaangbonyɛlɛ itta ka kɔlɔɔk. Kwakkwɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt bulenɛ la kɛsɔɔk lile. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛyɛlɛ kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ.
Unnyibongyɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa lɛbaang ka bisana ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la kwa uttinanɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang kwa uttinanɛ. Ɔnaangyɛlɛ isan kɔlɔɔk a lalup kwa ɔggbanɛ littina ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaangkwɛ kɔsaal ka ɛkɛtɛ ule ɔtɔɔm Christ uffu.

Lutini gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ litini ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaanggwɛ lɔsaal ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak, ule kɛttɛ vvenɛ ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ulenɛ lɛlɔɔm uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Christ ule uzzilɛttɔ lutini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bulenɛ ka libat la bwa bulenɛ ka ɛkpansi.
Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangayɛlɛ ɔttɛ ile balɔɔt ammɛ biini ka bɔkaat ayyɔɔt la Christ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa uttinanɛ kɛnaang ka ussinɛ ka lutte.
Ɔzzànga, ayyɔɔt ba ikɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ittina kwa Christ, ibunguyɔng lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Kɔssɛ kule ning baang la annyɔɔng ɔgbaa: Ka ɛkɛtɛ appyeenɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm bwa lɔkkwɔɔn, bwa bulenɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kɔkɔɔmnɛ ikkala kufeewɔyɔng, ayilayɔng kwa Christ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng eleme ka kkwɔɔt ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ uyini annyɔɔng ka kinnyiwɔyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa ulenɛ lisekele.
Kuyeeng kulenɛ iyɔɔ kɛttɛ vvenɛ itɔk bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ liloko ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ammɛ. Kɔnaangyɛlɛ isan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ammɛ lakke bassɛ ɔkkyaabɛ. Ibunguyɔng lakke ammɛ.
Ka ’kwɔng mung, nggba lippyee kiyila sa ayanganɛyɔng ka Uyini, Jesus, la kɛsaap sa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basaapwɔnɛyɔng.
Kiwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkkalawɔyɔng ba ntaka nkkyaa nfɔngɔ. Nle baang ka nkkewɔnɛyɔng ka luzɔɔm anaam.
Nbap Ebinukkpaapi ya ɛyanganɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, Dedde lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, nttɛ unnyiwɔyɔng Kuyeeng ammɛ, kwa kule kɔnaangwɔyɔng asanmɛyɔng.

Nkkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ zzeen annyɔɔng lawongolo ayɛnyɔng buppwolo ammɛ nkwaaning asanyɔng bwa luttina ammɛ gwa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng kwakkwɛ lulenɛ. Nkwaaning asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ppyɛɛ ammɛ wa bikɛɛlɛ, wa ulenɛ balɔɔt ammɛ lisekele uggbengenɛ.
Nkwaaning asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakke ammɛ za lalenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba iyanganɛ kiyila laggbengenɛ laffɔ. Lakke za lalenɛ ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt mung lale ikɛlɛlɛ la lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Uwɔng ulenɛ lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ufungalanɛ Jesus Christ ka lubbe, ɔnaangmɛ ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ ka libat.
Christ ɔkɔɔmnɛ bazzilɛttɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ba libat la ɛkpansi, la lakke bayini. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛbong lɛkɔɔl za lɛttanɛ lakɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng mung la vveeng wa ule uffu.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko Christ using bukkpɔ, ɔsammɛ unnyi luzɔɔm ɔttɛ ule uzzilɛttɔ la Uyini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Luzɔɔm lulenɛ kkwɔɔt a Christ. Aggwɛ lulenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ wa ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ifɛɛn ka ifɛɛn.
Ka isimi ka isimi, adɔkɔyɔng babbu ka kɛnaang a bubbi la kɛsɛlɛ latele.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, akupyɔng babbu linaang a vveengodde. Ateleyɔng balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ lakke ilat. Azzɛ lakke ’zɔng baang lakɔɔmnɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele gedegede mung.

Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt idɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ. Itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal ayyɔɔt laggyannɛ. Inaang bwa busaapnɛ kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt la ittina ayyɔɔt. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa idɔkɔ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bussɛnɛ ɔnyanga la ayyɔɔt.
Ɔzzànga kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiggbengebong gaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt, ɔgbaa kɛsaap ammɛ la ayyɔɔt kɛttalabong kɛsak.
Kwakkwɛ ɛkɛtɛ idɔkɔnɛ babbu ka bubbi ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangayɛlɛ a kɔlɔɔk Ammɛ.
Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalayɛlɛ la Christ ikɔɔm vveeng wa libat la ammɛ.
Ɔnaang ’kwɔng ɔyɔɔyɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔttɛ nkwaaning iyɛn kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk sa lɛbaang sa kilenɛ ka Christ Jesus.
Kule ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwakkwɛ addunɛyɔng ka kɛyanga kiyila, kwa linaang annyɔɔng lissi, ule lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Bulɔk ba bule bwa ale anaangyɔng kamma atumyɔng ka asinɛyɔng lakke annyɔɔng lɛkɔɔm anaangyɔng kwɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ wa ɔlɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ilenɛ mung. Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, ɔlɔɔmbongyɛlɛ kwa kuddu kwa kɛnaang a budoddo bwa ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛggba likoko ɔttɛ inaang.

Annyɔɔng Ikanakana ka lɛfal ba balɔɔt a Jews bakkwɔɔwɔyɔng “Basi lɛtaa lɛzza” bakkwɔɔbɛ abbɛ kɛyɔɔng “Bazza lɛtaa” (Kɛzza lɛtaa ule iyɔɔ ya balɔɔt banaangnɛ ka kkwɔɔt abbɛ biini.) Akkeyɔng bwa ɔdɔkɔnɛ aleyɔng tɛ.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya atakanɛyɔng Christ lɛkkɛtɛ, adɔkɔyɔng Ikanakana. Asiyɔng balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ lile. Etini asiyɔng lɛyanga ka kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛtɛnɛ ka nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt ammɛ. Ataayɔng ka vveeng ’wɔng mung gbɔɔ, luttina asiyɔng lɛyanga, gɔɔ Ebinukkpaapi asiyɔng lɛyanga.
Ɔzzànga gedegede mung, ka bɔkaat annyɔɔng la Christ Jesus, annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng fulufulu assekeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, akkɛtɛmɛyɔng ka lubbe a Christ.
Christ biini ɔkɔɔmbong bɔkaat ufeeyɛlɛ ka utoolonɛ balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn. Ɔkɔɔm kkwɔɔt ammɛ ɔbɔl kɛbat sa kɛbɛngɛlɛnɛbɛ bataa zzekep basi ka bɔkaat lile.
Utunu Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews la nsekele azzɛ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔm kɛssanga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa basseke ufaa ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka bɔkaat la ammɛ biini. Ɔnaang bɔkaat ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng.
Christ ɔbɛpɛbong kɔfɔk ka lubbe ammɛ ka cross. Ɔkɔɔm cross utoolo balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa basseke kkwɔɔt ssɔn, ɔkɔɔmbɛ uffu ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzánga Christ uffu ukopolo ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuttu-Budoddo bɔkaat. Ukopolowɔyɔng annyɔɔng Ikanakana ba adɔkɔnɛyɔng fulufulu assekeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la balɔɔt a Jews ba balenɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ ammɛ.
Kussi ka Christ tɛ́ttɛ́ ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana, ikkwoong iffu ka Kuyeeng kkwɔn ka lusso Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Annyɔɔng Ikanakana bakekeen ba abɛlɛyɔng lile. Assekeyɔng bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Atiiyɔng ka itutum nnyɔn la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa babɔɔkwɔyɔng ka libat a lutte gwa bayilabɔtɔɔm la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battenɛ. Lutte biini lulenɛ Christ Jesus.
Ammɛ ulenɛ wa ɔkɔɔmmɛ ggwoon ɔkkpɛlɛ aggwɛ kkɔk. Ɔnaang gwɛ lɔmmala lule Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ka alenɛyɔng ka bɔkaat la ammɛ, annyɔɔng ɔgbaa batoolowɔyɔngbong la balɔɔt balɔk babɔɔk ɛfɛɛn ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaanɛ ka Kuyeeng ammɛ.
Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng, anaam Paul, ɔlɔɔt a ngbakkɔpɔ a Christ Jesus ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng Ikanakana, nzɔɔm nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn appyeeyɔngbong attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ, unnyinɛbong kɛnaang ’sɔng ɔttɛ nnaang kwa budoddo annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔ ittina ammɛ ya lalup, ɔnaangnɛ nsanyɛ. (Nkkpɔkbong ’kwɔng mung bwɛt.
Ɔzzànga akkwɔɔnɛyɔng bwa nlenɛ lɛkkpɔk vvenɛ asanyɔng bwa anaam nsannɛ ntum kɔlɔɔk a lalup a Christ.)
Ka isimi ka isimi, ɔssɛbibit usi kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng mung lippyee. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmbong Kuyeeng ammɛ ɔyɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba doddo la bappyee-kutolo ammɛ kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng mung.

Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kule kɔttɛ; Ka kɔlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ikanakana bayangabong etini a ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Jews. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ basseke bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ssɔn. Batulbong nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ka labɔɔk a Christ Jesus.
Ndɔkɔ nzzanga bɔɔyi kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔknɛnɛ ka lakke kɛnaang ammɛ.
Nssup lussup ntta balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ lakke za kɛkɔɔm a Kuttu-Budoddo budoddo a Christ bwa businɛ lɛsaal, nfee Ikanakana
nkwaaning nnaang balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ basan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ile ikɔɔm kɔlɔɔk a lalup Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm doddo. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔm-a-bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ulup kɔlɔɔk a lalup ammɛ usseke bɛkkpa bya isimi bya isimi.
Nkwaaning gedegede mung, ka kɔlɔɔk a luzɔɔm, liyeeng sa likɔɔmnɛ libat la lakke a vveeng lisan kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛssanga la kɛssanga.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ukup tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ Jesus Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt, lɛkɔɔm ɔnaang kwa ɔggbanɛ lissi uttina.
Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ ka kiyila sa iyanganɛ itummɛ, iyangabong lakke za kɛtaa ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiyɛlɛ lɛllɛk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Elleeyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkyaayɔng ntɛtɛ afɔngɔyɔng ka nlenɛ mung ka nyɛnnɛ akama ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng. Akama anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ nyɛn kwa budoddo annyɔɔng.
Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng mung, nkunbong Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, laddu.
Ammɛ wa unnyinɛ itutum ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi lɛkɔɔl annyɛ za bbwak.
Nkkpenge Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nttɛ lakke ammɛ lassɛ la Kuyeeng ufeewɔyɔng usseke ayangayɔng lakke ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng.
Ɔkkɔɔnɛ Christ ɔnaang ssala ammmɛ ka ippyam annyɔɔng ka kɛyanga kiyila. Nzɔɔm nttɛ ayangayɔng lutte la iffaat ka kɛsaap,
nkwaaning annyɔɔng la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ayangayɔng lakke za kɛsan a bɔggbam la bɔlɔm, la buggolo, la bɔddɔng a kɛsaap Christ.
Iii, butɔk asanyɔng kɛsaap ammɛ. Baala akkwoong asanyɔngsɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubee la annyɔɔng gaang gaang. Vvenɛ lɔtan ammɛ luyipi tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng.
Ammɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang ɔsak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibapmɛnɛ, gɔɔ bwa ittinanɛ, ka lakke za lalenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ wa latele ka luzɔɔm la Christ Jesus ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka kɛfal a kɛfal; Kulening.
Anaam wa nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt a ngbakkɔpɔ ka nnaangnɛ kɛnaang Uyini nttɛnɛ: Anaanyɔng linaang liyyɛɛp liffɔ la sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ anaangyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng.
Anaangyɔng linaang a bukee, la linaang sa bɛtɛbɛtɛ la kibbe luppyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ayɔɔyɔng kɛsaap annyɔɔng ka kittele ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn.
Abumyɔng gaang gaang alokoyɔng bɔkaat bwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiwɔnɛyɔng, ka kilokowɔyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn doddo.
Kkwɔɔt lile ssɔn, Kuyeeng kule kkwɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng kwa kɔlɔɔk kkwɔn keem.
Uyini ule vvɔn, kiyila kile ssɔn, baptizim ule vvɔn.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn, Dedde balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ule ka tɔkɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔssɛ la abbyɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang.
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk za ammɛ ikɛlɛlɛ la kɛssanga sa Christ ulenɛ linnyi.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ, lɔttɛ, “Ka umiinɛ ka ggologgolo, Ɔkɔɔm balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ggbadam ɔbɛtɛ la ammɛ umii. Ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt lasɔɔk.”
Mung “ùmii ka libat” ulenɛ ’bɔng? Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ ka ikeeng ikeeng uffu ka kuttɔɔk ɛkpansi.
Ammɛ wa uffunɛ ka ɛkpansi ulemɛnɛ ammɛ vvɔn baang wa umiinɛ ka libat. Ɔsak umii fulu fulu ka libat, nkwaaning uyipi ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveengodde.
Ɔdɔkɔmɛ ammɛ wa “unnyinɛ ɔssɛbibit lɛsɔɔk”. Ɔssang balɔɔt balɔk bale bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ, balɔk bappyee-kutolo ammɛ, balɔk bakopolo-luzɔɔm, balɔk bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-lukopolo.
Jesus ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning ɔbama balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa kɛnaang a luzɔɔm, nkwaaning kkwɔɔt a Christ limmala.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt vvenɛ iggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn isseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka kiyila ayyɔɔt la bisana pya bitumnɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Vvenɛ ile balɔɔt ba balenɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛsan baffɔ ka ennenggele kɛfal a Christ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ’kwɔng baang, bwɔɔn ba ibɛlɛ lile; ba babɛlɛyɛlɛ lɛkɔɔm bawuwungu tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛffa kɛffanɛ bɛfɛɛn kɛssanga bakkala lalaak ba bakɔɔmnɛ lagban banaang babbɛ battɔ ka bubbi.
Ɔzzànga ilɔɔknɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka kɛsaap, vvenɛ immala ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ innyi Christ wa ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ.

Ka ilenɛ ka kɛkɔɔm ammɛ, bikkeep a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bitoolobong ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Bikkeep bɛbwɔɔpnɛ kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ biloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Nkwaaning kikkeep la ssɔn kɛnaangnɛ kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ, kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ limmala ka kɛsaap.
Ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini, nttamawɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛyɔng lɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ɛkpansi ba basinɛ kwa doddo littina.
Ittina abbɛ ile ka kisul. Etini ba bayanga ka lɛfal za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ, ka basinɛ kwɛ lɛsan basi kɔlɔɔk lippyee.
Luttina gwa izzit bɛ ba lɔbɛlɛ lile. Basambongbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi kɛssɛ-kɛzak. Banaang bɛssanga bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, bafim kɛkkyaa kɛfɔngɔ.
Nkwɔng baang lissi ulenɛ kwa akkoopnɛ atumyɔng Christ.
Ka lɔkkwɔɔn appyeeyɔng kɔlɔɔk ammɛ. Ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, bakopolowɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a Jesus.
Akkyaayɔng linaang annyɔɔng sa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ sa linaangwɔnɛyɔng ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggbanɛ lissi aleyɔng afɔngɔyɔng, linaang sa babbu ikkɔlɔ annyɔɔng lilenɛ lɛtɔk libɛpɛ.
Ippyam la itan annyɔɔng ippyɛlɛ ka bufaa ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɛ.
Vvenɛ ayangayɔng ufaa luttina gwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ tɛttɛ gwa annyɛ. Ufaa luttina ’gwɔng baang ɛyɔɔgwɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kɛfal sa lɔkkwɔɔn, sa kilenɛ bbwak, kɛyyɛɛp.
Kɛkkala lɛlaak kɛlɔk kɛfɔngɔ lile. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk la wabbɛ wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila: ka ilenɛyɔng bikkeep a Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Gɔɔ mkkpa kɔlɔɔk kutunwɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔdɛmwɔ anaang bubbi. Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ kutunwɔ kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ annyi Satan kufuk.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ uyip, ɔkkyaa ssip ɔfɔngɔ. Ɔnaang kɛnaang ɔkkɔɔnɛ ukkwoong ɔtaa ka kuddu kwa latele, usseke uttele balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔm babbu lammwɔɔl ka kutolo. Akɔɔm lammwɔɔl za layaamnɛ keem. Lammwɔɔl za labɔɔknɛ, lakkwoong mung lanaang ayanga bwa aggyannɛ, nkwaaning kwa alɔɔknɛ kɔyaam balɔɔt ba bagɔpɔlɔwɔnɛkwɛ.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaang kwa kule kɔnaang Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bukee. Kuyeeng kulenɛ lɛmwang za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔnɛ ɔyɔɔ ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔyangawɔnɛ. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔsangawɔyɔng ka bubili.
Akkyaayɔng kɛbbɔl ippyam la ibbyap la kitun a kɔlɔɔk afɔngɔyɔng. Kivvoko la kɛnaang a kɔfɔk kɛfɔngɔ lɛbɛlɛ lile. Latun ɔkkpɛlɛ lasaal.
Lutini ’gwɔng, aggwoomyɔng kɔlɔɔk la luppyam gwa kɛyaam a bannyɔɔng. Asɔɔkyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng lɛsɔɔk ka Christ.
Ka alenɛyɔng bwaan a luppyam Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, abum anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ biini.
Kɛsaap kɛkɔɔm lɛfal annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt isaapnɛ Christ ɔsam kɛfal ammɛ unnyi kwa ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa buggwoomnɛ kizzoom bakɔɔm banaang lɛtɔm za lɛsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba kɔyyɛɛp kɛtala lilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛssɛ-kɛzak, ɔlɔk kisi luppyam kkpaladada liloko, ɔlɔk kɛsaap a bɔfɛɛn ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng.
Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka anaangnɛyɔng ibbyap, ɔlɔk anaangyɔng kikun, alɔɔkyɔng babbu lammwɔɔl. Lutini ’gwɔng, awomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ka bwa unnyiwɔnɛyɔng.

Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Itutum a Christ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ya ɔlɔɔt wa ɔssɛnɛ kɛzak, ɔlɔk ɔsaap bɔfɛɛn ba ile ka lɔkkwɔɔn. (Ɔsaap-a-bɔfɛɛn ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ ilat, ɔyanga kɛsaap ɔzɔɔm unnyi iyyɛɛp a kɛfal ka vveengodde ɔtta Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.)
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔkɔɔm babbu lammwɔɔl uffu ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng; kussi ka bɛfɛɛn bya ning mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt ba basimɛnɛ litele akama.
Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ aleyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk la kɛssanga balɔɔt ’sɔng baang.
Annyɔɔng biini adɔkɔ aleyɔng ka kisul, ɔzzànga ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt Uyini lile assekeyɔng balɔɔt a buppwolo. Ka assekenɛyɔng balɔɔt a buppwolo, abum anaangyɔng linaang a balɔɔt a buppwolo.
Buppwolo bukɔɔmnɛ bɛssanga iyyɛɛp a liyaat ɔkkpɛlɛ buffu la budoddo linaang sa bbwak, la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
Abum akkoopyɔng kwa kɔsaapnɛ Uyini.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayangayɔng luttina ka babbu bɛfɛɛn bya balɔɔt banaangnɛ bya bilenɛ ka kisul. Lutini ’gwɔng asamyɔng byɛ attayɔng ka buppwolo.
(Kɔnaang izzit ffet kɛlɔɔk kitum bɛfɛɛn bya banaangnɛ ka lalup).
Ɔ̀zzànga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛ́ttanɛ́ ka ppwool, vvenɛ bɛyɔɔ lafal abbyɛ za lɔkkwɔɔn kkpelegedee.
Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa buyɔɔnɛbwɛ kɛyɔɔng ppwool busseke buppwolo. Kwakkwɛ baang balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Fungala, Ɔlaa-bilaa. Afungala ka lubbe! Buppwolo a Christ vvenɛ buppwolo bullɔtwɔ.”
Ɔzzànga asan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ataanɛyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazingizingi. Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basan a kɔlɔɔk.
Asan akɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ annɔ doddo, vveeng ɔbbɔlbong.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ azizingiyɔng, ɔzzànga abum asanyɔng bwa Uyini ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ anaangyɔng.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ avvayɔng batak ba babɛpɛwɔnɛyɔng abimiyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng afɔngɔyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtɔkwɔyɔng kɔyanga.
Akɔɔmyɔng lammwɔɔl a Psalm la bisoom bya bɛllɔtnɛ buyila atoloyɔng kutolo la bannyɔɔng. Asoomyɔng bisoom atoloyɔng lammwɔɔl annyiyɔng Uyini, akɔɔm abungumɛyɔng ka ippyam.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ awomoyɔng Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɛnaang ka bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
Asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Anaangyɔng ning baang ka latele a Christ.
Bwanavva, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng bwalam annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyinɛyɔng Uyini.
Waanwalam ɔyanga lakke ɔtta wanavva ammɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔyanganɛ lakke ka luzɔɔm. Christ biini ulenɛ ɔkkala-ikkala luzɔɔm gwa lulenɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
Bwanavva, assɛ asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyiyɔng bwalam annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luzɔɔm lɔsamnɛ gwɛ kɛyɔɔng lunnyi Christ.
Bwalam, bwanavva annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ luzɔɔm lɔsaapmɛnɛ, ɔsam kɛfal ammɛ unnyigwɛ.
Ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning ɔkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ za ulenɛzɛ lɛzzaa ka bannyi lɛllaat, ɔzɔɔm luzɔɔm unnyi Ebinukkpaapi,
ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔsam luzɔɔm ka bɔllɛ aggwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyimɛ ammɛ biini kɛyɔɔng, lule kkpaladada, lɔsɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk a lɛlaak, lɔsɛlɛ lɛggba la lilɔɔk lilɔk sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
Bwaanbwalam nzang bwanavva abbɛ basaapbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basaapnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, batele kkwɔɔt abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng, wanavva ammɛ ɔssɛ ɔsaapmɛ ning baang.
(Ɔlɔɔt wa kkwɔɔt ammɛ litunmɛnɛ ba ule. Lutini ’gwɔng uzzi kazzi ɔssɛɛnsɛ ɔkɔɔm kkwɔɔt ammɛ doddo, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔnaangnɛ la luzɔɔm bbwak,
ka ayyɔɔt ilenɛ bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ammɛ.)
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ka ’kwɔng mung, waanwalam vvenɛ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ abassɛ la abakka bataa la wanavva ammɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn.”
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung lɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa ddɔng, anaam nsangwɛ nttɛ lutum Christ la luzɔɔm.
Ɔzzànga lutumwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ɔgbaa. Waanwalam ɔkkpɛlɛ utele wanavva ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulemɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng. Wanavva ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyi walam ammɛ latele.
Bwɔɔntiti, kɛnaang annyɔɔng, bakup-a-Christ, ulenɛ kitele ssakawɔ la ssaawɔ annyɔɔng. Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kulenɛ bbwak a kɛnaang.
“Atele ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ.” Ulenɛ lifɔɔ za kɛkɔɔm a ɛtɔk za lɛyanganɛ nsekele lɛgbaa lɛttɛ,
“nkwaaning ataa ka budoddo ka ɛkpansi.”

Ibassɛ la ibakka bwɔɔntiti, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng bwɔɔn annyɔɔng ka ɛtɔk ya kule kutunbɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng akɔɔmyɔngbɛ la linaang a bakup-a-Christ, akatyɔngbɛ, ayɔɔyɔngbɛ ɛtɔk ya doddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ɔnaangnɛ.
Babili, ateleyɔng issaawɔ annyɔɔng ya vveeng ’wɔng gaang gaang. Anaangyɔng ning baang la luppyam gwa doddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛ ka atelenɛyɔng Christ.
Afɔngɔyɔng ɛdda kɛnaang ɔlɔk nkwaaning babunguwɔyɔng. Anaangyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ la luppyam annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili a Christ.
Anaangyɔng kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili la laggele, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng ka kɛnaang Uyini, usi kɛnaang a balɔɔt ba gbɔɔ lile.
Akke attɛyɔng Uyini vvenɛ ukipili ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ale ubili, appyɛɛ asi ubili lile, ka kɛnaang duu sa anaangnɛ kɛyyɛɛp tɛ!

Bayini babili, akɔɔmyɔng babili annyɔɔng kɛssanga ssɔn. Afɔngɔyɔng ibbyap kɛkɔɔm. Akke attɛyɔng annyɔɔng la babili annyɔɔng aleyɔng ba Uyini vvɔn ka libat wa ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn kɛssanga ssɔn.
Ka lakpeke, akɔɔmyɔng lakke Uyini akɔɔmwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng kpɔk ka bɔkaat annyɔɔng la ammɛ.
Assɛɛnyɔng uwɔkɔlɔ-lɛkɔɔng annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛyɔng linnyi nkwaaning abeeyɔng kkpɔk alluyɔng ubbu kullu la lagban Ɔnaang-a-Kɛsɛɛm a Kuyeeng.
Mung kullu la balɔɔt ba illu. Illu la babbu liyeeng sa lilenɛ ka vveengodde, la bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn, la lakke la babbyap a bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi ’yɔng.

Awɔkɔlɔyɔng iwɔkɔlɔ lɛkɔɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gedegede mung nkwaaning kɛtɔm sa kɛbbɔlnɛ kiffunɛ akkwoong abeeyɔng bbwak alluyɔng kɔfɔk annyɔɔng kullu. Alenɛyɔng lillu affɔyɔng ka lakpeke, ale atiiyɔng baang ka abeenɛyɔng kkpɔk.
Abeeyɔng kkpɔk akatyɔng. Akɔɔmyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛkkpa ya aggbɔnɛyɔng ka kɛsan. Akɔɔmyɔng budoddo akupuwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ikukulu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛfaak a kɛkkpala.
Bukkpakkpa bwa kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo bɔkaat butaawɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkpa-bukkpɔ ya assɛɛnnɛyɔng ka bukkpɔ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ akɔɔmyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbba sa ale akɔɔm afɛɛnyɔng bɛfɛɛn-ibɔk bya Satan ule ɔtta,
Atɔkyɔng ikkala ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalawɔnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔpɔ sa avvoongnɛyɔng ka lɛttɔ. Atɔkyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ogge wa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiwɔnɛyɔng.

Anaangyɔng ’kwɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la luzɔɔm. Abapyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm attɛ ɔkkalawɔyɔng. Ɔzɔɔmyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk duu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng. Ka ’kwɔng mung, abeeyɔng kkpɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayilayɔng kɛbɛtɛ, azɔɔmyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, annyiyɔng balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Azɔɔm annyinɛyɔng anaam ɔgbaa, attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmmɛ bɔtɔɔm, ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nbwɔɔlɔ bwa ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ, nbwɔɔlɔ la kɛkkaam a luppyam, nnaang balɔɔt basan kɔlɔɔk a lalup a lɛmmwɔɔl-Ammɛ.
Anaam nlenɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm ka kɔlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’zɔng mung. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nle ka igbakkɔpɔ. Azɔɔm attɛyɔng nkkaam luppyam ntolo kutolo ntumzɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nggyannɛ.
Ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Tychicus, bɔɔyi a Christ wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila ka kɛnaang Uyini vvenɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ; nkwaaning asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ baang ka nnaangnɛ.
Kwakkwɛ baang ntɔɔmmɛnɛ nfeewɔyɔng nkwaaning ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ilenɛ baang ka inaangnɛ ɔlɔk ɔssɛɛnwɔyɔng bittele.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, unnyiwɔyɔng annyɔɔng la ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kiyila, bɔkaat la kɛsaap.
Numa ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa la balɔɔt ba batelenɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, la kɛsaap sa kisinɛ lɛsaal.
Paul la Timothy, babili a Christ Jesus, bakkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng bafee balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ballunɛ ka Philippi, ba balenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, la bazzilɛttɔ luzɔɔm, la balɔɔt ba battelenɛbɛ.
Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Jesus Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt, bannyiwɔyɔng lakke la bɔkaat.
Nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam kɛnaang kwa annyɔɔng, ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya nttinanɛ ntumwɔyɔng.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya nzɔɔmnɛ nnyiwɔyɔng, nzɔɔm la laggele,
ka attelenɛnɛyɔng ka kɛnaang a kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ussinɛ kɛtɔm ikeeng uffu ɔffɔ gedegede mung.
Nsanbong nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa uttenɛ oyyoyyo kɛnaang ’sɔng la annyɔɔng vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm ning baang tɔttɔt kɛsaal ka Kɛtɔm-a-Christ Jesus.

Alenɛyɔng ka luppyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kule bbwak ka nttinanɛ ntumwɔyɔng, ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng etini la anaam lɛyanga ka kufuk ’kwɔng mung kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ linnyi. Attelenɛyɔngbong gbaak ka gedegede mung ka nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ, la ɛkɛtɛ ya ntakanɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ lile nkkala Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nmatkwɛ lɛsan kɔkkaam.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ nlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka nttɛnɛ luttina anaam gwa nttinanɛ ntumwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ lussinɛ ka luppyam a Christ Jesus biini.
Nzɔɔm nttɛ kɛsaap annyɔɔng kɛmmala kɛgbaa ɔbɛtɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn,
nkwaaning asanyɔng bwa bulenɛ bwa bbwak. Ɔlɔk attayɔng ka babbu lilɔɔk asiyɔng kibbi lizzi ka kɛtɔm-a-Christ.
Lafal annyɔɔng vvenɛ layanga kuddu kwa doddo kwa Jesus Christ kɛyɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɔɔ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, babungumɛ ɔgbaa.
Ikpana anaam, nggyan nttɛ asan attɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛnɛ lɛnaang bittelebong kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔmmala.
Bakat-a-ssala Ubeet la balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ mung basan lɔsan battɛ nle ka igbakkɔpɔ ka nlenɛ bɔɔyi a Christ.
Ɔzzànga kile sa nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ kinnyibong ikpana ayyɔɔt ilɔk kɛkkaam a luppyam ka Uyini. Bammala la kɛkkaam a luppyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, bakopolonɛ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basɛlɛ bbwɔp ka luppyam.
Kule baning, balɔɔt balɔk bakopolo kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bayanganɛ luleep, bakkwoong kɔwɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt balɔk bakopolo lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ la luppyam gwa doddo.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang banaang ning baang ka kɛsaap ka basannɛ battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbɛ kɛnaang sa kɛkkala kuttu-budoddo ammɛ.
Balɔɔt balɔk ba bakopolonɛ kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔyyɛɛp ɔssanga luleep battina, battɛ bagbaanɛ akama ka igbakkɔpɔ.
Ɔzzànga kɔlɔɔk duu kwa babbu ittina abbɛ inaangnɛbɛ banaangkwɛ, mkkpa kɔyyɛɛp kɔbbɔl, nggele ka balenɛ kuttu-budoddo a Christ likopolo.
Nsan lɔsan nttɛ luzɔɔm annyɔɔng la kittele sa kissinɛ ka Kuyeeng a Jesus Christ kiffu vvenɛ kɛsanganɛ ka kɔlɔɔk.

Ka luttina anaam, nttina nttɛ kɛnaang anaam baala nfɔngɔ kɛbɛpɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, gɔɔ gaang gaang gedegede mung, vvenɛ nyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam, nkwaaning nkɔɔm latele nfee Christ ka lɛfal anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ mkkpa nbbe ɔlɔk nppyɛɛ ntaa ka kuddu.
Kuddu kulenɛ ’bɔng? Anaam kuddu kulenɛnɛ Christ, lubbe lulenɛ isak.
Ɔzzànga ulenɛ ka nkkwoongnɛ nnang kɛnaang sa doddo ngbaa ka ntiinɛ ka kuddu, ba nsan bwa nle nsanga.
Ɔlɛlɛkɛnɛbong: nbum gaang gaang nttɛ ngbata nsseke vveeng ’wɔng mung, nmii ntaa la Christ ka akkwɛ kɔttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɔsak.
Ɔzzànga kaang ning, kɔbbal lɔbbal lɛyyɛɛp ka ntaanɛ ka kuddu nzzenge luzzi annyɔɔng.
Nsan lɔsan nttɛ vvenɛ ntaa ka kuddu, ntaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ nttelewɔyɔng ka lubum annyɔɔng ngbaawɔyɔng laggele ka kiyila.
Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nbbal la annyɔɔng lɛtaa, vvenɛ ayangayɔng ifɛɛt ya ule ɔkkyaawɔyɔng ɔgbaa kwa anaam ka lɛfal annyɔɔng ka Christ Jesus.

Gedegede mung kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔttanɛ liggbenge ulenɛ eleme. Eleme annyɔɔng ele ya Kuttu-Budoddo a Christ kɔggyannɛ nkwaaning mkkpa usinɛ anaam lile nle nffu nyɛnwɔyɔng, vvenɛ nppyee ka battɛnɛ abeeyɔng kkpɔk la luttina ggwɔn, alluyɔng kullu ka kɔlɔɔk a kiyila kwa Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annyɔɔng babbwɔpɔwɔyng. Akkaamyɔng luppyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nkwɔng kule kɔyɔɔbɛ basan battɛ baala babɛtɛwɔyɔng. Annyɔɔng ale abɛtɛyɔngbɛ abbɛ ka ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛyɔng lakke za kɛbɛtɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔyɔngbong kufuk kwa kɛnaang a kɛnaang a Christ. Ka kiyila kwa ammɛ ka kamma keem lissi, kule ka kɛyɛn akama ka lɛttɔ ammɛ agbaa.
Gedegede mung akkwoong mung affu attelenɛyɔng nllu kullu. Utii kullu ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn kwa ayɛnnɛnɛyɔng ka nllunɛ, utii kwɛ akkwɛ ’kwɔng baang ka ntiinɛ ka nllunɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ appyeenɛyɔng.

Mung kuddu annyɔɔng ka Christ kɔnaangwɔyɔng mung akkaamyɔng ɔɔ? Kɛsaap ammɛ kɛyaamwɔyɔng mung ɔɔ? Atulyɔng mung kɔssɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Attinayɔng mung kwa kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk la kibbe lɛttɔ la wannyɔɔng ɔɔ?
Ɔzzànga ntutwɔyɔng nttɛ anaangnɛyɔng nggele gaang gaang ka ale ayangayɔng luttina ’ggwɔn, ayangayɔng kɛsaap ssɔn, aleyɔng bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn ka luppyam la lɔnngwa.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng bɔfɛɛn bulɔk ka kɛssɔp-a-bɔfɛɛn, ɔlɔk anaangyɔng kwa kusinɛ likoolo kwa kɛnaang a kamma; ɔzzànga ayangayɔng kibbe lɛttɔ la wannyɔɔng, afɔngɔ kittina attɛyɔng annyɔɔng attanɛyɔng bannyɔɔng balɔk.
Attinayɔng kwa bannyɔɔng ɔgbaa. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akekeyɔng kwa annyɔɔng biini keem.
Eleme annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ya Christ ɔyanganɛ.
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, Christ ɔyanga eleme Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga usi littina ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm lagabwɔ bataa ikɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Lutini ’gwɔng ɔkkyaa bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ ɔfɔngɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔsam eleme ubili usseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt, uffu ka vveeng ’wɔng.
Ɔdɔkɔ ɔtɔkmɛ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukee-waan. Ɔssɛ ka ɛtɔk a latele tɔttɔt ubbe ka Cross.
Kwakkwɛ baang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ latele gaang gaang. Ɔkɔlɔmɛ lɛkɔɔl za lɛttanɛ lakɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi la bya bilenɛ ka vveng wa kuttɔɔk, vvenɛ bikun Jesus laddu.
Lɛlaak la zzɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ lɛlɔɔk ppwool ppwool lɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛttɛ Jesus Christ ulenɛ Uyini ka latele Abassɛ, Ebinukkpaapi.

Inngwa anaam, kɔyyɛɛp mung ka assɛnɛ atelenɛyɔng gedede mung ka nsinɛ la annyɔɔng lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ atelenɛnɛyɔng ka ndɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng. Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng anaangyɔng kɛnaang ikkala annyɔɔng gaang gaang la kiffula la bwɔp.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule baang ka ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayilayɔng ɔgbaa akkwoong ateleyɔng bwa ɔggyannɛ.
Anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, afɔngɔyɔng lɔzzɔ la ikangala,

nkwaaning asiyɔngkwɛ lɛsan aleyɔng kpaladada tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba doddo ba balenɛ ka ɛkpansi ibbyap la balɔɔt a bubbi. Appwoloyɔng ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan-ettuma bappwolonɛ ka lukpaaggbeede,

ka abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔngbɛ bɔtɔɔm a kuddu. Anaangnɛyɔng ning baang vvenɛ iyanga kitele lɛttɔ ka nle nggele kwa annyɔɔng ka Kɛtɔm-a-Christ kile kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ lubum anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ la kɛnaang anaam kisibong lɛttɔ kɛtaak.
Usinɛkkyam linnyi kuddu anaam lilenɛ luzzi gwa kiyila annyɔɔng kɛsanganɛ ka lɛtɔm za anaangnɛ annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kulenɛ ning, anaam nggele uggele ntul laggele anaam la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa vvenɛ assɛ atul aggeleyɔng la anaam.
Nttina nttɛ ka lakke Jesus Uyini, vvenɛ nkkwoong ntɔɔm Timothy like-like nfeewɔyɔng nkwaaning nkama luppyam ka nle nppyee kuttu annyɔɔng.
Ammɛ keem ulenɛ la luttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ gwa anaam, kɔbɛtɛmɛ kwa annyɔɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn kɔppyɛɛ kɔbɛtɛmɛ kwa kɔlɔɔk ammɛ biini, kwa kɛnaang a Jesus Christ lissi.
Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ lɛyɔɔ budoddo ammɛ. Ayyɔɔt la ammɛ inaangbong kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan la abassɛ ka kɔlɔɔk a Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Vvenɛ ntɔɔmmɛ nfeewɔyɔng nlenɛ lɛsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lilɔɔk lilé lile.
Ka lakke Uyini nttina nttɛ vvenɛ nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ssuma ssuma mung.

Nttinabong nttɛ kɔyyɛɛp mung kɛtɔɔm ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Epaphroditus kɛppyɛlɛ kifeewɔyɔng. Ɔnaang kɛnaang, ullu kullu ka kufoom kwa anaam. Uttelenɛbong nnaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm annyɔɔng wa annyinɛnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ nggyannɛ kɛyaam.
Uggele gaang gaang ɔttɛ ɔyɛnwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔgbaa luppyam lusimɛ lɛyyɛɛp ka uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ appyeeyɔngbong iffaak ammɛ.
Ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔffaakmɛ naanga ubbe. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔmɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ. Kibbe-lɛttɔ la ammɛ keem lissi ka ɔyɔɔnɛ, ɔyɔɔ gbaak la anaam ka ɔsanganɛnɛ ka kɛbbɔl a lavve sa nzang bulenɛ.
Nyanga luttina gaang gaang nttɛ ntɔɔmmɛ nfeewɔyɔng, nkwaaning aggeleyɔng ka ale abalmɛyɔng lɛyɛn, ɔlɔk kɛbbɔl a lavve sa anaam kɛsaal.
Atɔkmɛyɔng ka laggele, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkpana annyɔɔng ka itutum Uyini. Annyiyɔng kɛssanga balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ baang latele.
Ɔsam kuddu ammɛ unnyi lubbe, usseke ssup nzang ubbe ka lɛttɔ kɛnaang a Christ ɔttɛ nkwaaning ɔyaamnɛ kɛyaam sa annyɔɔng ale asinɛyɔng likkwoong ayaamyɔng.
Ikpana anaam, ntele lɛttɔ nttɛ Uyini unnyiwɔyɔng laggele za lɛbaang. Gɔɔ nɛ ba kukoolo kɛppyɛlɛ kɛlɔɔk kwa nlenɛ lɛkkpɔk kkpal ka kule kɔgbaawɔyɔng kɛkat a kɛyɔɔng.
Akatyɔng kwa ibbwa ’yɔng baang ya banaangnɛ babbu bɛfɛɛn kɔbɛtɛbɛ kwa kɛmmwang a bilee ka kkwɔɔt tɛ.

Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ balɔɔt ba batɔknɛ kɛzza lɛtaa sa lɔkkwɔɔn. Kɛzza lɛtaa sa ayyɔɔt ulenɛ kɛzɔɔm kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Kuyeeng Ammɛ. Ayyɔɔt ɔwaayɛlɛ kwa lafal ayyɔɔt ka Christ Jesus, abbɛ lissi. Ayyɔɔt kwa lɛtɔm a kɛzza lataa ba ittina itum. Isan kwa kuddu ayyɔɔt ka kiyila kwa Christ Jesus.
Kukkwoong mung kɔbɛtɛnɛ kwa bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uttina ɔttɛ kukkwoong mung kɔbɛtɛmɛ ammɛ kwa kɛzza lɛtaa, anaam nttanɛ ifɛɛt lɛyanga ya kɔbɛtɛnɛnɛ kwa kɛzza lɛtaa.
Badɔkɔ bamaatnɛ ka Israel ka kikkwu a Bɛnjamin. Wa Hebrew ɔmaatnɛnɛ unnyi wa Hebrew ɔfɔɔn. Ɔggbanɛnɛ liwaazɛ, babɛkɛnɛ lɛtaa. Ka liloko Lafɔɔ a balɔɔt Jews, ndɔkɔ wa Pharisees.
Nsaknɛ lafɔɔ Balɔɔt a Jews litele nsseke ka nyɔɔnɛ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akama. Ka kulenɛ kɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔyyɛɛp ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ, kibbi nsi lizzi.
Ɔzzànga bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ndɔkɔnɛ nttɛ isak anaam ka iyaadɛ, gedegede mung nsanbong ka lɛttɔ a Christ nttɛ isak lissi.

Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng keem lissi. Nsumalabong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛsaal ka kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔttanɛ kwa doddo lile. Ka kɔlɔɔk a Jesus, Uyini, anaam nsambong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ nzzɔɔk kang. Nfimbong babbu bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning nyanga Christ.

Nnaang ’kwɔng nttɛ nkwaaning ntaa ka bɔkaat la ammɛ. Kɛtaa bbwak sa anaam biini sa kilenɛnɛ isak ka kitele Lafɔɔ ba nbɛlɛ lɛyanga. Gedegede mung nyanga kɛtaa bbwak sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛnɛ ka kɛyanga kiyila ka Christ. Kɛtaa bbwak ’sɔng kissi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiffu. Ɔzzànga kile ka kiyila.
Kwa nggyannɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ule kɛsan a Christ, la lakke kifungala ammɛ ka lubbe, ɔkkɔɔnɛ nssɛ nyɛn akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ usseke nbbe lubbe ammɛ.
Uwɔng ulenɛ ɛtɔk ya nttinanɛ nttɛ vvenɛ nkkwoong nfungala ka lubbe nppyɛlɛ ntaa ka kuddu.
Ba ntaka nttina nttɛ anaam nbɛtɛbong ɔlɔk nttina nttɛ anaam nttabong doddo lɛnaang. Nle baang ka nbumnɛ nttɛ nzang anaam nbɛtɛ nyanga lɛsɔɔk ka kɛbɛtɛ sa Christ Jesus ulenɛ lɛggba lɛbɛtɛ ɔyanganɛ.

Ikpana anaam, kule kule ba ntaka nttina ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, nbɛtɛbong. Ɔzzànga bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn bwa nnaangnɛ, ule kisumala bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛnɛ ka isimi. Nbum gaang gaang nttɛ nffɔ ka bya bilenɛ ka lusso.
Kwakkwɛ baang nmmanɛ ssɔng nmii ka lakpeke nkwaaning ntɔk lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lilenɛ kɛkkwɔɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ Jesus ɔkkwɔɔnɛ unnyinɛ lɛfal za libat.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ba ilenɛ bagɛlɛnya ka kɛyanga kiyila, lile iyangayɔng kɛssanga linaang ssɔn. Annyɔɔng balɔk ayanganɛyɔng linaang buu buu, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng asanyɔng ’kwɔng ppwool.
Mkkpa kɔnaang, kule kule ning baang. Afɔngɔ ikupyɔng ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang ya iggbanɛ lissi ikupyɔng tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka mmwɔɔn mung.
Akeetnɛyɔng anaam tɔttɔt, ikpana anaam. Ɔzzànga appyeeyɔng kwa balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ eleme ’yɔng baang ya iyɔɔnɛbɛ.

Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng kkpal bikkpit ggbadam, ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbbalwɔyɔngbong lɛbwɔɔlɔ la liyyeen ka zzeen nttɛ: Balɔɔt bale ggbadam ba linaang abbɛ linaangnɛbɛ bale balɔɔt a kɔfɔk a lubbe a Christ.
Lafal abbɛ lale lakpeke ka lɔkɔɔn, ka ebinukkpaapi abbɛ elenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛsaapnɛbɛ. Bakɔɔm babbu linaang battele kippe. Battina kwa bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng keem.
Ayyɔɔt ilenɛyɔng balɔɔt Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Mung itaa ikatyɔng kiffu ɔkkala-ikkala wa ussinɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
Vvenɛ ufooloyɛlɛ kkwɔɔt sa lilenɛ libbe ɔnaangyɛlɛsɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa ammɛ. Ule ɔkɔɔm likke ’zɔng baang za ɔbɛtɛnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔ̀zzánga uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi.

Ikpana anaam, alenɛyɔng ka luppyam gaang gaang. Nɛ ba kɔsaap ka ngbatanɛ nssekewɔyɔng. Anaangnɛyɔng nggele gaang gaang, ɔkkyaanɛ kwa annyɔɔng. Ikpana anaam ka luppyam. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale abeeyɔng kkpɔk ka lafal annyɔɔng ka Uyini.
Nkkpenge Euodia la Syntyche nttɛ, ellee, babum bataa ka bɔkaat ka balenɛ ba Uyini.

Annɔ ɔgbaa, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam, nggyan nttɛ ayaamyɔng bwanavva ’bɔng baang. Banaangbong kɛnaang gaang gaang la anaam battɛ bakɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bawaala ɔbɛtɛ la Clement la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ba lakɔɔl abbɛ lalenɛ ka luvva kuddu lile.
Aggeleyɔng ka alenɛyɔng ka bɔkaat la Jesus. Nbbal lɛlɔɔk: aggeleyɔng!
Aggeleyɔng! Ayyɛɛpyɔng linaang la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, Uyini ule ɔkka liffu.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attinayɔng kwa bɔfɛɛn bulɔk, ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ duu ya azɔɔmnɛ abapyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa aggyannɛyɔng, abapmɛyɔng la luppyam gwa doddo ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Bɔkaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa buttanɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔssɛbibit usibwɛ lɛsan, bulokowɔyɔng ippyam la ittina bbɛɛm ka Christ Jesus.
Ka kitele lɛttɔ, ikpana anaam, assɛɛnyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ bya balɔɔt bale babunguwɔyɔng ka ittina. Abbyɛ bilenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya lɔkkwɔɔn, bɛyyɛɛp bile bbwak, bɛyyɛɛp lɛppyɛɛk bɛyanga latele.
Anaangyɔng kwa alenɛyɔng lippyee ka nlɔɔknɛ, alenɛyɔng lɛyɛn ka zzeen kwa nnaangnɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛyɛlɛ bɔkaat vvenɛ ubee la annyɔɔng.

Nggele gaang gaang ka kuddu kwa nyanganɛ ka Uyini. Ɔmmɛbong ka appyɛɛknɛnɛyɔng. Mung abbalyɔngbong kufuk lɛyanga kwa kɛppyɛɛknɛ. Ba nlɔɔk nttɛ nɛ yɔng ba abɛlɛyɔng lɛppyɛɛk, ɔ̀zzànga adɔkɔ asiyɔng kufuk lɛyanga kwa kɛppyɛɛknɛ.
Ning ba nlɔɔk ka nttinanɛ nttɛ asumalanɛyɔngbong. Anaam ɔgbɔnɔnɛbong. Bwa nyanganɛ, abbwɛ baang buyyɛɛpnɛbong.

Nsan mung kwa kulenɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ aggyannɛ bɔfɛɛn, la kwa kulenɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ayanganɛ bɔfɛɛn asak. Nkkoopbong kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng nkwaaning nle la liwukala ɛfɛɛn duu, ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔk nppyɛɛ nle la buwɔɔng, ɔlɔk nyanga bɛfɛɛn ggbadam ɔlɔk nsi bulɔk lɛyanga, kulenɛ ppyɔk.
Nyanga lakke za Christ unnyinɛnɛ, za kibee kkpɔk ka lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔzzànga ayyɛɛpyɔng bɛnaang asakyɔng ka atelenɛnɛyɔng ka lilɔɔk.

Annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Philippi biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng ka ngbatanɛ ka Macedonia, ka ɛkɛtɛ nttenɛ kikopolo Kuttu-Budoddo, annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng luzɔɔm gwa attelenɛnɛyɔng. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba itulnɛ isak anaam la ibbɔl anaam izziyɔng.
Bikkpit ning bɛffa ka nggyannɛ kɛyaam ka Thessalonica, ayaamnɛyɔng.
Kɛttɛ nggyan kɛtɔk a lɛsɔɔk gbɔɔ lissi, lutini ’gwɔng, iggyan ittɛ iyɛn isak ka igbaanɛ ka luffik a lɛfal annyɔɔng.

Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛbwɔɔlɔ kɛttɛ nyɛnbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya annyinɛnɛyɔng ka Epaphroditus ulenɛ lɛtɔɔm ufeenɛ bɛttalabong bɛsak. Nyangabong bwa nggyannɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom bya bannyinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk ka lɛtɔm za lɛsaapmɛnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam la iyyɛɛp ammɛ ya lɛbaang ka Christ Jesus, vvenɛ ɔssɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bwa aggyannɛyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Latele lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, ka kɛfal a kɛfal kulening.
Nwomobong balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ba Christ Jesus. Ikpana ayyɔɔt ya balenɛ mung la anaam battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
Balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, gaang gaang balɔɔt ba balenɛ ssala Ubeet battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
Numa Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Paul, wa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ɔttɛ ɔ̀zzánga Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ Jesus, ɔkkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Timothy
ifee balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ ka Colossae bale ikpana ayyɔɔt ka kiyila ka Christ Jesus. Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat.
Iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya izɔɔmnɛ issɛɛnwɔyɔng.
Ippyeebong kwa kiyila annyɔɔng ka Christ Jesus la kɛsaap sa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ basaapwɔnɛyɔng.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya lɛmwɔɔl za lɔkkwɔɔn za lilenɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm littenɛ liffu, appyeeyɔng luttina gwa lɛssɛɛnnɛ. Kwakkwɛ kiyila annyɔɔng la kɛsaap bilenɛ ka kwa attinanɛ atumyɔng. Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa bale babɔngɔlɔwɔyɔng kwɛ ka budoddo ka libat.
Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔkɔɔm ppyɛɛ kufeewɔyɔng. Kule baang ka kɔwaalanɛ ɛkpansi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔnaangnɛ la annyɔɔng ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm sa appyeenɛyɔng kwɛ asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Akkoopyɔngbong kɔlɔɔk a ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Epaphras wayyɔɔt a bɔɔyi wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang doddo unnyi Christ ka lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt.
Ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk a kɛsaap sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulewɔnɛyɔng linnyi.
Kwakkwɛ baang izɔɔmnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ issɛɛnwɔyɔng ka issinɛ ippyee kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng. Ibap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ittɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bikɔɔm la kɛsan a kɛnaang ammɛ, la bɛfɛɛn bya Kuyeeng kunnyinɛ.
Ning vvenɛ ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ɔggyannɛ, anaangyɔng kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Lafal annyɔɔng vvenɛ layyɛɛp ka utini linaang sa doddo ɔkkpɛlɛ. Vvenɛ ammalayɔng ka kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng akkaamyɔng, la lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ za lassinɛ ka ammɛ, nkwaaning akkwoong abbɔyɔng akama la kibbe luppyam.
Awomoyɔng Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang la laggele. Ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkɔnɔyɔng kitul a bɛfɛɛn bya ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛ balɔɔt ammɛ ka ɛsam a buppwolo.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalabongyɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a lakke bubbi, ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ la bɔppwa kkwɔɔt uffu ka ɛsam a Waan ammɛ wa luppyam wa ɔsanganɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Kɛsanga ka kɔlɔɔk ulenɛ kɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkbongyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt.
Christ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa iyɛnnɛ isan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa isinɛ lɛyɛn. Ammɛ ulenɛ Waan wa battenɛ lɛmaat. Ammɛ ɔttanɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmmɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔm bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi, bya iyɛnnɛ la bya isinɛ lɛyɛn, liyeeng, bakɔɔm-ɛfɛɛn la bazzilɛttɔ.
Ammɛ uttenɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛfal liffu. Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛtaanɛ ka bɔkaat la ammɛ, bɛyanga kɛtaa abbyɛ sa bbwak.
Ammɛ ulenɛ lɛttɔ a kkwɔɔt ammɛ, sa lilenɛ luzɔɔm. Kuddu a kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kussi ka ammɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk, Awaan wa ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, nkwaaning ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Kɔdɔkɔ ka luttina Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini tɛ́ttɛ́ Awaan ɔyanga lɛfal za lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ za ammɛ biini.
Kussi ka lubbe Awaan, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang weengodde la balɔɔt ka ussinɛ ka lubbe Awaan ka Cross, ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtɔk bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi ɔbɛtɛ la libat ɔyanga.
Ka iyaadɛ, adɔkɔyɔng fulufulu assekeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Adɔkɔyɔng balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ammɛ ka babbu bɛfɛɛn bya anaangnɛyɔng la bya attinanɛyɔng.
Ɔzzànga mung, ka ussinɛ ka lubbe gwa kkwɔɔt Awaan ammɛ libbenɛ ka lagabwɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔngbong ɛnngwa, nkwaaning ɔsamwɔyɔng bbwak, kpaladada, la kɛsɛlɛ bubbi umii ka lusso ammɛ.

Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, akɔɔmyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng bbwak, ka lutte gwa lɔkkaamnɛ. Afɔngɔyɔng kɛnnyɛkɛ ka kiyila sa alenɛyɔng lɛyanga ka appyeenɛyɔng kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kussi ka kuttu-budoddo ’kwɔng mung anaam Paul nzzanga bɔɔyi. Kuttu-budoddo ’kwɔng mung kulenɛ kwa balenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ka ɛkpansi.
Ɔzzánga gedegede mung, nggele uggele nsak ka akama wa nyɛnnɛ nnyiwɔyɔng. Ka kɛyɛn akama anaam, nvvebong akama wa bussekenɛ wa Christ buyɛnnɛ ka lɛttɔ a kkwɔɔt ammɛ sa lilenɛ luzɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛbong ɔttɛ nsseke bɔɔyi luzɔɔm. Ammɛ unnyinɛnɛ ’kwɔng ɔttɛ nnaang ka budoddo annyɔɔng. Nkwɔng kulenɛ bɔtɔɔm ammɛ bwa ɔttɛnɛ nbwɔɔlɔ ppwool.
Akkwɛ kulenɛ kɔlɔɔk a lalup kwa ulupnɛ usseke ɔssɛbibit iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔbwɔɔlɔbong balɔɔt ammɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang.

Kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ ulenɛ ’kwɔng: Ɔttɛ ɔnaang balɔɔt basan kɔlɔɔk a lalup ammɛ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ iyyɛɛp ’yɔng ya lɛbaang la latele za ɔyanganɛ la ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng baang ulenɛ ’kwɔng: Christ ule la annyɔɔng. Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ vvenɛ ayangayɔng etini ka laggele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ibwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk a Christ. Ittamabɛ, ikopolobɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la bisana pya iyanganɛ nkwaaning ikɔɔm ɔlɔɔt la duu imii ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛsan ka bɔkaat ammɛ la Christ.
Ka nggyannɛ nttɛ nnaang ’kwɔng, nkɔɔm lakke za Christ unnyinɛnɛ za lalenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt anaam nbum nnaang kɛnaang.
Ssiibong nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ kɛnaang lɛnaang ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt a Laodicea ɔbɛtɛ la balɔɔt ba batakanɛnɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn.

Nkwɔng mung nnaang nkwaaning bakkaam luppyam, ɔlɔk baffu bataa ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka kɛsaap, bayanga iyyɛɛp ya lɔkkwɔɔn ya kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa bbwak kile kɛkɔɔm kiffu. Vvenɛ basan Christ biini, wa ulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulupnɛ.
Ammɛ ulenɛ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya ewongolonɛ libɔngɔ iyyɛɛp la bisana, la kukele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔkɔɔmwɔyɔng ugbigbini ka kɛyyɛɛp a kamma.
Mkkpa nsi lile la annyɔɔng ka ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt nle baang la annyɔɔng ka kuyeeng. Nggele ngbaa ka nyɛnwɔnɛyɔng kkpɔk ka abeenɛyɔng ka kiyila annyɔɔng ka Christ.
Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus ka alemɛnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini annyɔɔng lɛtɔk.

Iffaat annyɔɔng imal ddɔng ka kkwɔɔt a Christ. Abɔɔkyɔng lɛfal annyɔɔng ka libat ammɛ. Assekeyɔng kkɔk ka akkaamnɛyɔng ka kɛnaang ammɛ la kiyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakopolowɔnɛyɔng. Kiwomo kɛnaang kɛttalawɔyɔng ka ippyam.
Asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt uffu ɔkɔɔm kɛsan a kukele sa vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔdɛmwɔyɔng. Kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng kissi ka lukopolo gwa ɔssɛbibit la liyeeng ɛkpansi likopolonɛ, ka Christ ba kissi.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ ullu ka Christ ka lɛfal ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔyɔngbong kuddu kwa bbwak ka bɔkaat annyɔɔng la Christ. Ammɛ ɔttanɛ lutini lakke ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng mung.
Ussi ka bɔkaat bwa ayanganɛyɔng la Christ tɛ́ttɛ́ bazzawɔyɔng lataa. Kɛzza lɛtaa sa balɔɔt bazzanɛ lissi, sa Christ biini ɔzzanɛ. Assɛ kilenɛ, kɛ̀ttá ka lakke bubbi a kkwɔɔt ’sɔng.

Ka banaangwɔnɛyɔng baptizim, balliwɔyɔngbong la Christ. Ka baptizim ’wɔng baang ɔgbaa, assɛbong afungalayɔng ka lubbe la Christ ka kiyila sa ayanganɛ atumyɔng lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalanɛ Christ ka lubbe.

Ɛkɛtɛ ɛdɔkɔ baang ya abbenɛyɔng ka ittina annyɔɔng ɔssanga bubbi bwa anaangnɛyɔng. Ɔgbaa ka alenɛyɔng Ikanakana asɛlɛyɔng Lifɔɔ. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalawɔyɔngbong ka lubbe assekeyɔng ka kuddu la Christ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkbongyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔmbong luffik a bubbi annyɔɔng ubbum la lafɔɔ abbwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ususukubong ippwoot a bubbi ayyɔɔt ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɔsamnɛyɛ ɔkama bɛfɔl ɔkaka ka Cross.

Christ ɔssɛ la Cross ’wɔng baang ɔtta ka labɔɔk a bakɔɔm-a-liyeeng, la bayanga-lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔnaangbɛ basseke bɔfɛɛn a lɛppyɛɛk ka battulunɛ bɛkaan bakupmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ battɔ-ka-kɔlɔɔk ɛkɛtɛ ɔbɛtɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk unnyiwɔyɔng lafɔɔ utum kazzi ɔlɔk kɛvva. Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔssɛɛnzɛ utum lavve za kiloko ɔlɔk lɛtɔm Ufaa Ettuma, ɔlɔk Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bilenɛ kuyeeng a bɛfɛɛn bya bile bɛnaang ka lusso; Christ ulenɛkwɛ akkwɛ ssɔng.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa uffikmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ammɛ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt utum biyɛnɛ bya ɔyɛnnɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng attɔyɔng ka ubbu kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzanga ɔttɛ bukkengga ammɛ butum ka kɛnaang ɛnngwa la Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt sa ning baang kile ukun wa gbɔɔ ka babbu ittina ammɛ la linaang.
