Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkyaabong kiloko luttina ka Christ wa ulenɛ lɛttɔ a kkwɔɔt ɔfɔngɔ. Ka ilenɛ ka kɛkɔɔm a Christ kkwɔɔt lileyɛlɛ fulɛfulɛ. Lagbeel la bɛffaat bɛnaangsɛ likkaam, limmala tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.

Abbeyɔngbong la Christ, bakkyaawɔyɔngbong ka lilɔɔk a vveeng ’wɔng bafɔngɔ. Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ atiiyɔng baang ka anaangnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng ba vveeng ’wɔng? Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ateleyɔng lafɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ’zɔng:
“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asingiyɔng mbwɔng”, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ allɛyɔng mbwɔng kang,” “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asingiyɔng mbbwakang.”?
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ balenɛ lɛffɔ bakɔɔmbyɛ, bisseke bya kɛzzɔɔk. Uwɔng baang lafɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ, ɔkɔɔm ukopolo.

Ɔzzánga ka ayɛnnɛbɛ bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basannɛ kɔlɔɔk ka kɛzɔɔm kinnyi bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛbbwa bukee-waan, la kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn a bɔssɔp ka kkwɔɔt ɔlɔɔt; kwa kɛkat a kkwɔɔt abbɛ ba battina. Ɔzzànga isak ya lɔkkwɔɔn ba bayanga ka bayɛnnɛ akama kkwɔɔt ’wɔng.
Afungalayɔngbong ka lubbe la Christ. Appyɛɛ asam ippyam annyɔɔng annyiyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka libat, ka ɛfɛɛn a Christ ɔtaanɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Abassɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Asam ittina annyɔɔng alokoyɔng ka bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bakang, tɛ̀ttɛ́ alokoyɔngyɛ ka bɛfɛɛn bya ɛkpansi mung.
Abbeyɔngbong, ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkbong kuddu annyɔɔng la kwa Christ ulup ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
Kuddu annyɔɔng biini ulenɛ Christ. Ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔnaang Christ wa ulenɛ kuddu annyɔɔng ɔtta ka vveeng, annyɔɔng ɔgbaa vvenɛ assɛ attayɔng ayangayɔng etini ka lakke la latele ammɛ.
Awwɔɔlyɔng kɛsaap a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilewɔnɛyɔng ka kkwɔɔt. Abbyɛ bilenɛ kɛssɛ-kɛzak, kɛbbɔl a tɔkɔlɔ, babbu linaang, ikkɔlɔ, ubbu luttina. (Kuwɔnɔk kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛzɔɔm ɛlat)
Ka bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnyanga la balɔɔt ba bafimmɛnɛ kitele.
Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa ɛkɛtɛ ɛdɔkɔ baang ya akupnɛyɔng babbu linaang ’sɔng baang ka ɛkɛtɛ lafal annyɔɔng latiinɛ ka kɔkɔɔm a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang.
Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔllɛ ka akkyaanɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ afɔngɔyɔng: Kitun a kɔlɔɔk, kɛssɔp a luppyam la luttina kɛnaang a kɔfɔk. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ babbu lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ libɛlɛwɔyɔng ka kamma lɛtta.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkala wannyɔɔng lɛlaak ka alenɛyɔng ɔtɔm a lafal lɛkkyaa azzɔɔkyɔng la babbu linaang assɛ,
aleyɔng ufaa lɛyanga. Uwɔng ulenɛ ufaa ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔm assɛ, ulenɛ baang ka ɔnaangnɛsɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ liyyɛɛp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ. Ɔnaang ning mung nkwaaning asanmɛyɔng gaang gaang.

Kwakkwɛ baang Wakanakana usinɛ lile, wa Jews usi lile, bazza lataa la basi lataa lɛzza basi lile. Batolo babbu likaan ba babɛlɛ lile. Babbyap ba bale. Babili ba babɛlɛ lile. Basi babili lile ba babɛlɛ lile. Christ ulenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ. Ulebɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Annyɔɔng, balɔɔt-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asaapmɛyɔng lɔsaap tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsangawɔyɔng ɔttɛ aleyɔng ba ammɛ. Ka kulenɛ ning lile, ɔllɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ubbewɔnɛyɔng lɛttɔ. Aggwoomyɔng kɔlɔɔk, ateleyɔng ɔlɔɔt, abbeyɔng luppyam ka kɔlɔɔk, akɔɔmwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔgbaa.
Ayaamyɔng wannyɔɔng. Asɔɔkyɔng wannyɔɔng bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ la annyɔɔng. Ule ɔllɛ ka asɔɔknɛyɔng wannyɔɔng bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ulewɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng lɛsɔɔk.
Asamyɔng kɛsaap anɔkyɔng baang la abbyɛ, usseke kɛggbɔbyɛ kiloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka bɔkaat bwa lɔkkwɔɔn.
Bɔkaat bwa Christ unnyinɛ butaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikata ka ippyam annyɔɔng. Kussi ka bɔkaat ’bwɔng mung Christ ulokowɔyng ka kkwɔɔt ssɔn. Aggeleyɔng gaang gaang ka akkwɛ mung.

Lɛmmwɔɔl a Christ ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ lɛtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ippyam. Akopolowɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka itɔk a lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ya bisana. Asoomyɔng kisoom a kutolo a David, la bisoom bya bɛllɔtnɛ buyili annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kiwomo kɛnaang ka ippyam.
Kɔlɔɔk duu kwa anaangnɛyɔng, ɔlɔk alɔɔkyɔng kɔ̀ppyɛ́ɛ̀ kutum Jesus Uyini, ka assɛnɛyɔng ka ammɛ awomoyɔng abassɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
Bwanavva ssala bwalam, ateleyɔng bwalam annyɔɔng, ka ulenɛ kukkam a kɔlɔɔk kwa kɛnaang ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Uyini.
Batɔk a bwanavva, bwanavva annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anyangayɔngbɛ.
Bwɔɔntiti ateleyɔng issakawɔ la issaawɔ annyɔɔng. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ kɛnaang annyɔɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Uyini. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ibassɛ a bwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng bwaan annyɔɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kutunnɛbɛ, vvenɛ bási kwa ssɔng lɛbɛlɛ lɛnaang.
Annyɔɔng babili ateleyɔng issaawɔ annyɔɔng ya ɛkpansi ka itɔk a lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng kwa ɛdda ɔlɔk babunguwɔyɔng. Ɔllɛ ka anaangnɛyɔng kwa ka kɛyyɛɛp a luppyam ka alenɛyɔng ba Uyini.
Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa anaangnɛyɔng, anaangyɔngbwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaangnɛ annyiyɔng Uyini. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaangnɛ annyiyɔng balɔɔt ɛkpansi.
Akke asan attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng bwa ulenɛ balɔɔt ammɛ liloko. Christ ulenɛ ssaawɔ annyɔɔng wa anaangnɛyɔng kɛnaang ammɛ.
Ɔnaang-a-bubbi duu vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyanga ikipili ɔssanga kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaal kɛkaal ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ la kamma kɛkaal kkwɔn.
Ibassɛ babili, akɔɔmyɔng babili annyɔɔng doddo. Akke attɛyɔng annyɔɔng assɛ ayangayɔng ssaawɔ wa annyɔɔng ka libat.
Assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Agepeleyɔng ka azɔɔmnɛ annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kiwomo kɛnaang.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ’yɔng baang assɛ azɔɔm annyiyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiyɛlɛ kufuk kwa kikopolo lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ la kɛbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a lalup a Christ. Akkwɛ baang kulenɛ kwa nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ.
Azɔɔmyɔng nkwaaning nlɔɔk ppwool ppwool tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ bbwak.
Akɔɔmyɔng kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk ataayɔng la balɔɔt ba basinɛ kiyila lɛyanga. Waan a kufuk duu kwa ayanganɛyɔng, akɔɔmnɛyɔng doddo.
Kutolo annyɔɔng kɔyyɛɛp, kuggwoom ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ duu. Asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ appyɛlɛnɛyɔng kamma kayyɛɛp ka lɔbap gwa ɔlɔɔt ɔbapnɛ.
Tichycus, ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa luppyam, wayyɔɔt a bɔɔyi, wa ulokonɛ luttina ka kɛnaang Uyini, vvenɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Kwakkwɛ nle ka ntɔɔmmɛnɛ uffu ɔnaangwɔyɔng aggeleyɔng, ka ule ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ilenɛ baang ka inaangnɛ.
Ammɛ la Onesimus, ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa luppyam wa ulenɛ ka likup annyɔɔng ɔssɛ ule utele a zzeen ka kɛnaang Uyini vvenɛ baffu. Baffunɛ, vvenɛ babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kwa kɔnaangnɛ kaang ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Aristarchus wa ulenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ mung la anaam ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Mark, waan etele a abassɛ a Barnabas ɔgbaa ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. (Aggbayɔng lippyee bwa ale anaangyɔng ɛkɛtɛ duu ya ule uffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.)

Joshua, wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Justus, ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Balɔɔt ba bakkyaat ’bɔng mung balenɛ balɔɔt a Jews ba ittina ilenɛbɛ lisikili bakupnɛ, banaang kɛnaang la anaam ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba battelenɛnɛ gaang gaang.

Epaphras, bɔɔyi a Christ, wa ɔssɛnɛ ule ka likup annyɔɔng ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Ɔzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyiwɔyɔng ɔbap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ayangayɔng kiyila sa kɛkkaamnɛ, kiggbenge. Asikiliyɔng ippyam annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ atelemɛyɔng ka kɛnaang ammɛ.
Anaam biini nkkwoong mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang gaang gaang unnyiwɔyɔng, annyɔɔng la balɔɔt a Laodicea la balɔɔt a Hierapolis.
Luke, dongkitta ayyɔɔt wa luppyam, la Demas battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
Awomoyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt ba balenɛ ka Laodicea, la Nympha la luzɔɔm gwa lɔtaanɛ ka ssala ammɛ.
Alenɛyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung livve lɛkkwɔɔ, assɛ akkwɔɔyɔngzɛ abwɔɔlɔyɔng luzɔɔm gwa Laodicea. Assɛ akkwɔɔyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl za balɔɔt a Laodicea bale bannyiwɔyɔng.
Abwɔɔlɔyɔng Archippus attɛyɔng, “Asan attɛ vvenɛ avve kɛnaang sa bannyiwɔnɛ battɛ anaang annyi Uyini tɛ.”
Anaam nkɔɔmnɛ kɔbɔɔk anaam nkkpɔk ’kwɔng: Anaam Paul nwomowɔyɔngbong. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asumalayɔng ikpɔkɔlɔ ya ilenɛnɛ ka labɔɔk. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ.

Anaam Paul, la Silas, la Timothy ikkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung ifeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka Thessalonica ba balenɛ ba Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Jesus Christ, Uyini. Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bɔkaat ammɛ butaa la annyɔɔng.
Iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ duu innyiwɔyɔng. Italawɔyɔng ɛkɛtɛ duu ya issɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt.

Ikkebong ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɔɔnɛyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng ka linaang, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛsaap annyɔɔng kɛnaangwɔnɛyɔng anaangyɔng kɛnaang gaang gaang. Ibbalwɔyɔng likke ka luttina annyɔɔng lɔkkaamnɛ lutum Jesus.
Ikpana anaam, isan lɔsan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm asaapmɛyɔng lɔsaap, kwakkwɛ ɔsangawɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ aleyɔng ba ammɛ.

Ka ikɔɔmnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ifeewɔyɔng, ka lɛmmwɔɔl keem lissi ka ikɔɔmnɛ iffu. Idɔkɔ ikɔɔmkwɛ la lakke ɔbɛtɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Akkeyɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idɔkɔnɛ itaa la annyɔɔng, ɔdɔkɔ kwa budoddo annyɔɔng.
Akeetyɔngbongyɛlɛ la Uyini, ɔzzànga mkkpa ayɛnyɔng akama, atɔkyɔngbong lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung za lissinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka laggele.
Ataayɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt iyɔɔ ka lusso balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka Macedonia la Greece.
Kuttu kwa kussinɛ ka annyɔɔng kumii Macedonia la Greece baang keem kusi likpeke. Kumiibong ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bulɔk ba bubɛlɛ lile bwa ibbalnɛ lɛlɔɔk.

Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akɔɔmnɛyɔngyɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya iffunɛ ikoolowɔyɔng. Balɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng ilat annyɔɔng lɛsam azzɔɔkyɔng asseke ka akupnɛyɔng ɛtɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, atelenɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu wa lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ataa akatyɔng Waan ammɛ ka ule ussi ka libat uffu. Waan ammɛ, Jesus, wa ufungalanɛ ka lubbe ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm pya bile biffu.
Ikpana anaam, annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng kikoolo sa iffunɛ ikoolowɔyɔng, ggbɔɔ kisi lɛttɔ kɛtaak.

Aggbayɔng lippyee tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛyɛlɛ babbu bɛfɛɛn, banyɔɔkayɛlɛ ka Philippi, tɛ́ttɛ́ iffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng mung ka Thessalonica. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiyɛlɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam ɔttɛ ibwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ mkkpa ndɔk ikàngálá ittala.
Kɛkkwɔɔ sa ikkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng kisi sa kɛbbɔlnɛ lile ɔlɔk ittina kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ippyɛɛkwɔyɔng, tɛ́ttɛ́ vvenɛ iyanga luttina gwa kɛfɛɛt ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk.

Lutini ’gwɔng, ilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛyɛlɛ ilɔɔk ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ, ɔsam Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ unnyiyɛlɛ. Ba ibum ittɛ inaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ balɔɔt, ibum ittɛ inaang kwa kule kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔllɛnɛ ileme ayyɔɔt.
Asanyɔng lɔsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn attɛyɔng kutolo kwa kɛkkala lɛlaak isi lɛkɔɔm iffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ɔlɔk vvenɛ ikɔɔm kɛyyɛɛp a kamma ivvoong kuwɔnɔk. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ tɛɛsɛ ayyɔɔt.
Isi lɛnaang ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ubunguyɛlɛ, gɔɔ annyɔɔng ɔlɔk balɔɔt balɔk.
Nzang ikkwoong mung ibapwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ka ilenɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Christ. Ɔzzànga idɔkɔ ikɔɔmwɔyɔng doddo ka idɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔmaat-a-bwɔɔn ɔkɔɔmnɛ bwaan ammɛ.
Kɛsaap sa asaapnɛyɔngyɛlɛ kɛnaangbong iyila kinnyiwɔyɔng lafal ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa la Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Aleyɔngyɛlɛ ka ippyam gaang gaang.

Ikpana anaam, kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, akkeyɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inaangnɛ kɛnaang la annyɔɔng ka latele. Inaang kɛnaang kikoon la kɛtɔm nkwaaning isi kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ lɛnaang ka ikopolowɔnɛyɔng Kuttu-Budoddo kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ittɛɛsɛ ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ. Linaang ayyɔɔt ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba ayilayɔng kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lidɔkɔ lile sa bbwak. La kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lisi lile.
Asan lɔsan attɛyɔng idɔkɔ ikɔɔm ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔfɔɔn-a-bwɔɔn ɔkɔɔmnɛ bwɔɔn ammɛ.
Issɛɛnwɔyɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam, inaangwɔyɔng ɔwaawɔyɔng. Iddawɔyɔng ittɛ ataayɔng kɛtaa sa kɛsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ affu ayangayɔng etini ka Itutum ammɛ ɔbɛtɛ la ppyɛɛ ammɛ.

Ifɛɛt ilɔk ile baang ya iwomonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka kuttu budoddo kwa ikɔɔmnɛ ifeewɔyɔng. Appyeeyɔngkwɛ atɔkyɔngkwɛ. Ɔzzànga asiyɔngkwɛ lɛtɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔtɔɔmnɛ, adɔkɔ atɔkyɔngkwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛmmwɔɔl za lɔkkwɔɔn za lissinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; kɔdɔkɔ ning ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng, balɔɔt ba ayilanɛyɔng kwa ammɛ.

Ikpana anaam, kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɛnaangwɔyɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛnaangnɛ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Judaea la balɔɔt a Christ Jesus ba balenɛ baang. Ayɛnyɔngbong kɛssanga akama ssɔn la abbɛ ka kɔlɔɔk a balɔɔt a lɔkaan annyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ bayɛnnɛ ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt a Jews.
Kɛssanga balɔɔt ’sɔng baang kɛwwɔɔlnɛ Jesus, Uyini, la Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bayɔɔyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt akama. Batun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lutun basak. Bàbbyap la ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Gɔɔ babumyɛlɛ kitunu battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikopolo Ikanakana bɔtɔɔm bwa bule bukɔɔmbɛ bumii ka buppwolo. Uwɔng ulenɛ lakuma bubbi bwa banaangnɛ. Gedegede mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kutunmɛbong la abbɛ kukuma.

Ikpana anaam, ka ɛkɛtɛ igbatanɛ ikɔngɔwɔyɔng ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup, ittina ayyɔɔt lissi igbatanɛ ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng. Kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt keem ligbatanɛ. Ittina gaang gaang itumwɔyɔng. Ibum ittɛ ibbalwɔyɔng liffu iyɛn.
Iggyan ittɛ nzang ippyɛlɛ isimisimi iffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng. Anaam Paul nbum kɛppyɛlɛ kiffu bikkpit bikkpit, ɔzzànga Satan usiyɛlɛ lɛfɔngɔ iffu.

Mkkpa kɔnaang luppyam luleyɛlɛ bbɛɛm ka ulewɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng ba asinɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk lɛbɛlɛ lile. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng luppyam ayyɔɔt la laggele ayyɔɔt. Ka inaangnɛ kamma ittɛ vvenɛ ibɛtɛ ka lusso Uyini, ka ule ɔppyɛlɛ uffu, ittinawɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba inaangnɛ kamma itum. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng laggele ayyɔɔt za lɔkkwɔɔn.
Kɔsak lɛttala isikwɛ ka luppyam lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong ibwɔɔp. Ɔzzànga ippyɛɛ iyanga luttina gwa kiffu kɛtaa kɛyɔɔng mung ka Athens.
Ippyɛɛ itɔɔm Timothy, ɔkpana ayyɔɔt, wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo a Christ la Ayyɔɔt. Ittɛ uffu ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng ka kiyila

nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng usi isimisimi lɛppyɛlɛ ka ale ayɛnyɔng kɛyɔɔ akama sa bayɔɔnɛ balɔɔt mung. Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng kɛwwɔɔl a balɔɔt ’sɔng ule kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔttɛnɛ kɔnaang.
Ka idɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng, ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ittɛ ggboo ka lusso vvenɛ iyɛnyɔng akama ’wɔng mung tɛ. Ka asanɛyɔngkwɛ lɔsan, mung akkwɛ kulenɛ lɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ilɔɔknɛ tɛ.

Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ ntɔɔm Timothy. Nsikwɛ lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong nbwɔɔp ka luppyam. Ntɔɔmmɛ nttɛ ɔlɔk ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ippyam annyɔɔng ilenɛ. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ baala kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔzzanganɛ ɔttɛ Satan ɔllɛwɔnɛyɔngbong ɔ̀zzánga ɔttɛ kɛnaang ayyɔɔt kɛttɔbong gbɔɔ kɛtaak.

Mung Timothy ussibong bakang ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ɔppyɛlɛ. Ɔkɔɔmbong kuttu kwa iggelenɛ ufeeyɛlɛ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa kutumnɛ kiyila la kɛsaap. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbongyɛlɛ ɔttɛ annyɔɔng attinayɔng mung kwa ayyɔɔt ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk. Ɔttɛ aggyanyɔngyɛlɛ kɛyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt issɛnɛ iggyanwɔyɔng annyɔɔng kɛyɛn.
Ka lilɔɔk ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la akama, ile baang la luttina ggwɔn keem itumwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt. Kiyila annyɔɔng kɛnaangnɛyɛlɛ ikkaam luppyam.
Isanbong ittɛ vvenɛ iddu, ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn abeenɛyɔng kkpɔk ka kɔlɔɔk Uyini.
Gedegede mung ikkwoong mung iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang innyiwɔyɔng. Iwomomɛ la laggele za iyanganɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt kwa annyɔɔng.
Kikoon la kɛtɔm, ile baang ka ittinanɛ ittɛ iyɛnwɔyɔng ka zzeen ɔlɔk isan bwa ile inaang kiyila annyɔɔng kɛkkaam.
Dedde ayyɔɔt la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Christ, biini ɔbama ɛtɔk bbwak ulokoyɛlɛ issɛ iffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
Numa Uyini ɔnaang kɛsaap sa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsaapwɔnɛyɔng kɛmmala, kiggbenge tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛsaap sa annyɔɔng asaapnɛyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
Anaangnɛyɔng ning mung vvenɛ ippyam annyɔɔng ikkaam, ataayɔng bbwak ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, ka ɛkɛtɛ Jesus Christ ule ɔppyɛlɛ uffu la balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba ammɛ.

Ikpana anaam, akkoopyɔngbong ka ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale akɔɔmyɔng lafal annyɔɔng kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ’wɔng ulenɛ ɛtɔk ya aggbanɛ lissi anaangyɔng. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ikkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge ka lakke Jesus Uyini, itutwɔyɔng ɔgbaa ittɛ anaangyɔng gaang gaang agbaayɔng.
Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng lukopolo gwa ikopolowɔnɛyɔng idɔkɔ ikopolowɔyɔng ka lakke Jesus, Uyini.
Nkwɔng mung kulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ utumwɔyɔng annyɔɔng. Ɔggyan ɔttɛ ataayɔng ka budoddo ɔkkpɛlɛ, afɔngɔyɔng kikup a bwanavva balɔɔt gbɔɔ-gbɔɔ-gbɔɔ.
Annyɔɔng bwaanbwalam, asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akɔɔmnɛyɔng bwanavva annyɔɔng doddo atɔkyɔngbɛ ka latele.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ateleyɔng zzeen ka bwanavva balɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bazɔɔmnɛ ilat basi kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan, banaangnɛ.

Ka kulenɛ ning, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ la wabbɛ, ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔnaangmɛ kɛbɛtɛ. Ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong kkpal, ittamawɔyɔng ittɛ Uyini vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ babbu lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang akama.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiyɛlɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ɔttɛ ifal lɛfal a kɛssɛ?-?kɛzak. Ɔkkwɔɔyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ifal lɛfal za doddo.
Kwakkwɛ ɔlɔɔt duu wa ufimnɛ lukopolo ’gwɔng mung, ukopolo?-?lukopolo lissi ka ufimnɛ, ufim Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyiwɔnɛyɔng Kuyeeng ammɛ.
Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ba kɔbɛlɛ lile kwa nle nbbal lɛkkpɔk ntum, ɔgbaa la kɛttɛ annyɔɔng bayanga-kiyila ka Uyini asaapwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukopolowɔyɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wannyɔɔng ule ɔsaapwɔyɔng.
Akɔɔmyɔngbong eleme ’yɔng mung ka lɔkkwɔɔn la ikpana annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Macedonia. Ikpana ayyɔɔt, ikkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge ittɛ anaangyɔng gaang gaang agbaayɔng.
Kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng kwa buzum. Appyɛɛkyɔng ɛtɔk ya annyɔɔng ssɔng, akɔɔmwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔlɔk ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iggbawɔnɛyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ.
Anaangnɛyɔng ning, vvenɛ balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila batelewɔyɔng. Baala aggyanyɔng bɔfɛɛn bulɔk abapyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt, iggyan ittɛ asanyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk atumyɔng balɔɔt ba balenɛ libbe nkwaaning tɔkɔlɔ usiwɔyɔng lɛbbɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbbɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa lufat littina.
Ìyila ittɛ Jesus ubbe, ɔppyɛlɛ ufungala ka lubbe. Kwakkwɛ iyilanɛ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ufungala balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila batum Jesus bale libbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus.
Uwɔng mung ulenɛ lukopolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng. Ayyɔɔt ba ilenɛ ikokolo mung baala ikɔngɔ balɔɔt ba balenɛ libbe ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang sa Uyini ule uffu.

Vvenɛ ippyee lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔkɔɔm-a-lakke, lɛmmwɔɔl Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, lɛmmwɔɔl a luffi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, tɛ́ttɛ́ Uyini ussi ka libat uffu kuttɔɔk. Balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Christ bale libbe, vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bafungala ka lubbe,
tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk ayyɔɔt ba ile itii ka kuddu, ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang babbiyɛlɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ifeele ka kɛkaan, ka ikkpala imii ikup Uyini ka libat. Itaa bakang la ammɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ka alenɛyɔng ning lippyee, akɔɔmyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng anaangyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔwaamɛ.
Ikpana anaam, kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa nle nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng ntum kɔlɔɔk a kiffu Christ la ɛkɛtɛ ya bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bile bɛnaang ba kule.
Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Kɛtɔm-Uyini kile kiffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip uffunɛ kɛtɔm.

Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang éle èle ya balɔɔt battɛnɛ, “Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bile zzum ka kuddu.” Eseese vvenɛ kɛbɛpɛ kɛffɔbɛ ka kkwɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔsɛɛm baala ule. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ uppyee bɔssɔp bwa wanavva uppyeenɛ ka ɔppwɔlɔnɛ imala.
Annyɔɔng ka kisul ba aleyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kissolo kikopowɔyɔng kitipili, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip ukoponɛ ɔlɔɔt.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng aleyɔng balɔɔt ba buppwolo, aleyɔng ba kikoon. Ayyɔɔt ba kɛtɔm ba ile, gɔɔ vvenɛ ba ile ba kisul.
Kwakkwɛ nttɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ilaa isumalayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk. Itaayɔng kwetkwet ikatyɔng.
Ule ule kɛtɔm sa balɔɔt balenɛ ka bulaa, ɔlɔk bale ka kibimi.
Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt ka ilenɛ ba kikoon, itaayɔng kwetkwet ikatyɔng. Iwɔkɔlɔyɔng kiyila la kɛsaap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iwɔkɔlɔnɛ kɛfaak a kɛkkpala ivvoongyɔng ukukulu. Ittɔpɔ luttina ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔpɔ ka lɛttɔ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiyɛlɛ lɛsanga ɔttɛ iyɛn akama binyanga ammɛ. Ɔsangayɛlɛ ɔttɛ iyanga kuddu ka labɔɔk Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ,
wa ubbenɛ kwa ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning iddu la ammɛ mkkpa ile ka kuddu ɔlɔk ile libbe, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ule uffu.
Ka ’kwɔng kulenɛ ning, anaangyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔkkaam luppyam: Atteleyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaangnɛyɔng gedegede mung.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt, ikkpengewɔyɔng ittɛ ateleyɔng balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang la annyɔɔng gaang gaang. Uyini ɔsangabongbɛ ɔttɛ bakatwɔyɔng, bakɔɔm bakopolowɔyɔng.
Akɔɔmyɔngbɛ ka latele la kɛsaap sa lɛbaang ka kɛnaang sa banaangnɛ. Annyɔɔng biini átaayɔng ka bɔkaat.

Ikpana ayyɔɔt, ibbawɔyɔng bikɔɔm ittɛ attamayɔng balɔɔt ba bataanɛ gbɔɔ yɔɔbuu basi bulɔk lɛnaang. Anaangyɔng balɔɔt ba babbwɔpɔnɛ bakkaam luppyam. Atteleyɔng balɔɔt ba bakkpɛlɛ. Abbeyɔng luppyam ka kɔlɔɔk duu la ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Akatyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk upipili ipipili. Ayyɛɛpyɔng eleme la bannyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɛkɛtɛ duu.
Ataayɔng ka laggele ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Azɔɔmyɔng luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Awomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bɛssanga lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ka kuddu annyɔɔng ka Christ Jesus.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini.
Allɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, alokoyɔng bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ.
Afimyɔng kɛnaang a babbu lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Numa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛyɛlɛ bɔkaat ubee la annyɔɔng ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, ulokowɔyɔng kkwɔɔt la luppyam la kuyeeng ka budoddo ɔlɔk afɔngɔyɔng ka kɛkaal lɛttɔ ka Kɛtɔm Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ule uffu.
Ammɛ wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng vvenɛ ɔnaangkwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lɛlaak lɛkkala.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt, azɔɔm assɛɛnyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa.
Awomoyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la kigbugba bukpana.
Nbbawɔyɔng bikɔɔm ka lakke Uyini nttɛ akkwɔɔyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung abwɔɔlɔyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ppyɛɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Anaam Paul La Silas la Timothy ikkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung ifeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Thessalonica ba alenɛyɔng ba Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Jesus Christ, Uyini.
Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, banaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ, bannyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat.

Ikpana ayyɔɔt, iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng. Kuleyɛlɛ bbwak ka inaangnɛ ning baang ka kiyila annyɔɔng kilenɛ baang ka kɛmmalanɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm. Ɔgbaa kɛsaap sa ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyanganɛ la wabbɛ kile baang ka kiggbengenɛ kiffu.

Kwakkwɛ baang inaangnɛ kamma kwa annyɔɔng ba izɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Inaang kamma ka atiinɛyɔng baang ka ataanɛyɔng la kiyila la akama ɔkkpɛlɛ wa alenɛyɔng lɛyɛn, la kɛwwɔɔl sa bawwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Uyini.
Mung ulenɛ iyɔɔ bɔllɛ kɛkaal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kule kussi ka akkwɛ mung ale yɔng ba bbwak ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya ayɛnnɛyɔng akama kwa annyɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaang kwa bbwak. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm akama ufee balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba banaangwɔnɛyɔng ayɛnyɔng akama,
Ɔzzánga vvenɛ ɔkkalawɔyɔng annyɔɔng ba ayɛnnɛyɔng akama. Vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa. Ule ɔnaang ’kwɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus Christ ule ussi ka libat uffu la Bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba lɛbaang.
Vvenɛ uffu la lalaak-a-lɔkɔɔn ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt ba basinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan akama la balɔɔt ba basinɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Jesus, Uyini, litele.
Vvenɛ bayɛn akama kɛbɛpɛ sa kɛfal a kɛfal. Vvenɛ bagbata ka ɛfɛɛn Uyini la lakke ammɛ.
Ka ule uffu ka Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, vvenɛ ɔtɔk latele ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa ammɛ. Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa ale assɛ aleyɔng baang la abbɛ, ka alenɛyɔng liyila kwa bɔtɔɔm bwa ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng.

Kwakkwɛ izɔɔmnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ innyiwɔyɔng, ibap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt ittɛ unnyiwɔyɔng kuddu kwa doddo kwa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ ataayɔng la ammɛ. Numa ɔkɔɔm lakke ammɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ayɛnyɔng budoddo duu bwa akkɔlɔnɛyɔng usseke avveyɔng kɛnaang a kiyila annyɔɔng.
Nkwaaning lɛkɔɔl Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus lɛtɔk latele ka annyɔɔng. Annyɔɔng assɛ atɔkyɔng latele ka lakke a ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt la Jesus Christ, Uyini.
Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kutum kiffu Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus, la kiduda ayyɔɔt ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la ammɛ.

Nkkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge, ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng ɔlɔk banaang ippyam izzawɔyɔng ka bale bakkala lalaak battɛ Kɛtɔm-Uyini kiffubong. Usinɛkkyam ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔyɛn ka biyɛnɛ ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔk ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk vvenɛ bale battɛ ayyɔɔt ikkpɔknɛ ka lɛmmwɔɔl za itɔɔmnɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng ka ɛtɔk ɛlɔk. Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang baala kiffu ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ kullu kwa lakpeke kɔttɔ. Ɔbbyap vvenɛ ɔtta ka vveeng ufula ka lɔkɔɔn.

Ɔbbyap ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ufim bɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bya balɔɔt batelenɛ la bya battinanɛ battɛ bɛyyɛɛpɔyyɛɛp. Vvenɛ ɔtɔkmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka buzzilɛttɔ abbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Gɔɔ vvenɛ umii ɔtaa ka Labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala lalaak ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ba abɛlɛyɔng likke ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ndɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng ɔɔ?
Ɔzzànga bɔfɛɛn bule baang bwa businɛ liyila ’kwɔng kɔnaang ka gedegede mung. Asanyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bulenɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya bbwak, Ɔbbyap vvenɛ ɔtta ka vveeng.
Ibbyap ukunukunu itii baang ka kɛnaang. Ɔzzànga kwa kule ka kɔnaangnɛ baala kɔnaang ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ basam ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔpnɛkwɛ uloko ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔnaang bagbata ka ɛtɔk.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔk Ɔbbyap ɔtta ka vveeng, Jesus, Uyini vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm lɛfɛkɛlɛ kamma ammɛ ɔwwɔɔlmɛ. Kiffu Uyini vvenɛ kisusukumɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔbbyap vvenɛ ɔtta ka vveeng uffu ɔnaang bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ ka lakke a Satan ka kɛkkaala lɛlaak.
Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm lutini ibbyap ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔfɛɛt balɔɔt bɔng baang ba bale bataak. Bale bataak ka basinɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɛtɔk ka kɛsaap, nkwaaning baddu.
Ka ’kwɔng mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔm lakke za kisi kɔlɔɔk lɛsan ufeebɛ nkwaaning batɔk kwa kulenɛ lɛlaak gbisii.
Kitele lɛttɔ kile kɛttɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basinɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk liyila, bale ibbyap lɛkɔɔm battele kippe, vvenɛ babbe.

Iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ innyiwɔyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt, ba asaapnɛyɔng Uyini. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangawɔyɔnbong annyɔɔng aleyɔng ba ule utte lɛkkala. Ɔnaangwɔyɔngbong balɔɔt ka lakke Kuyeeng ammɛ ɔbɛtɛ la kiyila sa ayanganɛyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔyɔng la Kuttu-Budoddo kwa ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng. Ɔkkwɔɔwɔyɔng ɔttɛ affu atɔkyɔng etini lakke annyɔɔng ka Uyini, Jesus Christ.
Ikpana anaam abeeyɔng kkpɔk. Akɔɔmyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa ikopolowɔnɛyɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kamma. Akɔɔmyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl za ikkpɔknɛ ifeewɔyɔng kkpɔk.
Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, la Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, biini wa isaapmɛnɛ bibbemɛ-lɛttɔ unnyiyɛlɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam la luttina gwa doddo gwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Ɔssɛɛnwɔyɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam ka ippyam kɛttala ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng anaangyɔng kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ, alɔɔkyɔng kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔgbaa.
Ka kitele lɛttɔ, ikpana anaam, iggyan ittɛ azɔɔm assɛɛnyɔngyɛlɛ nkwaaning lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini lɛkama-ɔkama lɛwaala likelike lɛtɔk lakke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng atɔknɛyɔng.
Assɛ azɔɔm attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a babbyap. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi bayilanɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa ibwɔɔlɔnɛ.
Uyini, ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng, ɔkkalawɔyɔng ka labɔɔk a Ɔnaang-a-bubbi.
Uyini unnyibongyɛlɛ kibbe luppyam ka annyɔɔng. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ale baang ka anaangnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikopolowɔnɛyɔng.
Uyini usikiliwɔyɔng ippyam ɔfɔngɔ ka kusapa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛbbɔ akama sa Christ unnyinɛ.
Ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ittɛ agbata assekeyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ya inaangnɛ bɔkɔɔt isi lɔttama ayyɔɔt lippyee.
Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng kɔyyɛɛp ka anaangnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt inaangnɛ. Bɔkɔɔt ffet ka kɔlɔɔk isi lɛnaang ka idɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng.
Isi ɔlɔɔt lɛfɔngɔ ɔyaamyɛlɛ ggbɔɔ isimɛ lɛssɛ iyaam. Lutini ’gwɔng inaang kɛnaang kikoon la kɛtɔm ittɛ nkwaaning asiyɔng akama lɛyɛn, wa kikkpeleyɛlɛ.
Ning isi lɛnaang ka ɔ̀zzánganɛ ɔttɛ lakke ba iyanga za kɛbap a kɛyaam ka labɔɔk annyɔɔng. Inaang ittɛ iyɔɔwɔyɔng usseke akeetyɔngyɛlɛ.
Ka idɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng, ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ittɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang, tɛ̀ttɛ́ uzzi kazzi.”

Ilɔɔk ’kwɔng ka ippyeenɛ battɛ balɔɔt balɔk bale baang la annyɔɔng ba bakongonɛ lukongo bakkpɛlɛ basi lɛggyan battɛ banaang kɛnaang. Bulɔk ba banaang basan kɛbbaka ka kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt baggyan bwa bassɔpnɛ bassɛɛn ka kamma.
Ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ittɛ attamayɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang. Bakɔɔm lafal abbɛ doddo banaang kɛnaang bakɔɔmbɛ kɛyɔɔng.
Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bɔkɔɔt bunaangwɔyɔng ka kɛnaang a budoddo.

Ɔlɔɔt úle ulè baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng wa usinɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa itɔɔmnɛ ifeewɔyɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung litele. Ulenɛ baang, azzɔɔkmɛyɔng zzeen. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ aleyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ izzit inaangmɛ.
Ɔzzanga tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangmɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk annyɔɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng, attamamɛyɔng lɔttama ka ulenɛ ɔkpana annyɔɔng.
Numa Uyini, wa bɔkaat bussinɛ ka ammɛ, unnyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uyini ubee la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Anaam Paul nkɔɔmnɛ kɔbɔɔk anaam nkkpɔk ’kwɔng: Nwomowɔyɔngbong ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nbɛtɛnɛ kɛnnɔ ka lammwɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ za ntɔɔmnɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkkpɔknɛ.
Numa ppyɛɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ule la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul, uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ Jesus. Nkkpɔk ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt, la Christ Jesus wa ulenɛ luttina ayyɔɔt,
nfee Timothy, waan anaam wa lɔkkwɔɔn ka kiyila. Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, banaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, abbebɛ lɛttɔ, bannyiwɔ bɔkaat.
Nggyan nttɛ ataa ka Ephesus tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nddawɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ nlenɛ ka kimii Macedonia. Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ka bakopolonɛ lukopolo gwa lusinɛ bbwak lile. Abwɔɔlɔbɛ bakkyaa lukopolo ’gwɔng baang bafɔngɔ.

Abwɔɔlɔbɛ bakkyaa lilɔɔk sa lisinɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn lile bafɔngɔ la uggbɔng a lakɔɔl a balɔɔt iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Lilɔɔk ’sɔng liggyan ikangala keem. Ba banaang kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ. Akkwɛ asankwɛ ka kiyila.
Lɔdda ’gwɔng mung lɔggyan lɔttɛ kɛsaap kissiwɔ ka luppyam gwa doddo, la luttina gwa ppwool la kiyila sa kissiwɔnɛ ka luppyam.
Balɔɔt balɔk bafimbong ’kwɔng mung bassɛɛp ɛtɔk ka kikun a kutolo.
Baggyan battɛ bale bakopolo lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga ba basan bwa abbɛ biini balɔɔknɛ ɔlɔk vvenɛ basan lɛkkɔ za batolonɛ. Ɔzzànga batolo la kibbe luppyam ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Isan lɔsan ittɛ Lafɔɔ layyɛɛpɔyyɛɛp ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a akɔɔmnɛzɛ bbwak.

Ikke isan ittɛyɔng lafɔɔ ba bassɛɛn kwa banaang a budoddo. Bassɛɛn lafɔɔ kwa balɔɔt ba babɛpɛnɛ lafɔɔ la bazzɔɔk a kɔlɔɔk, la balɔɔt ba basinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan, la banaang a bubbi, la balɔɔt ba basinɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile, la balɔɔt ba bawwɔɔlnɛ ibakka la ibassɛ, la bawwɔɔl a balɔɔt,
la bassɛ kɛzak, la bwaanbwalam ba bazaknɛ abbɛ abbɛ, la balɔɔt ba bakaanɛ balɔɔt ka itɔk, la bakkala-lalaak, la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa kusinɛ bbwak la lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn lile.
Lukopolo ’gwɔng mung gwa lulenɛ gwa lɔkkwɔɔn lule ka Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛnɛ ɔttɛ nbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt. Akkwɛ kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a lakke la latele.
Nwomo Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, wa ulenɛnɛ lakke linnyi ka kɛnaang anaam. Nzɔnɔmɛ kɛnaang ka uttinanɛ ɔttɛ nle wa bbwak tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsanganɛ ɔttɛ nnaang kɛnaang ammɛ.
Mkkpa ndɔk nsi budoddo lɛlɔɔk ntummɛ ka iyaadɛ. Nyɔɔ balɔɔt ammɛ akama. Nyɔɔkamɛ ammɛ biini. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nbbemɛbong lɛttɔ ka nsinɛ kiyila lɛyanga ndɔkɔ nsi lɛsan bwa nnaangnɛ.
Ɔzzànga Uyini ayyɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ bong ppyɛɛ ɔttala. Unnyinɛ kiyila la kɛsaap. Abbyɛ bilenɛ bya ayyɔɔt la Christ Jesus ka bɔkaat.
Uwɔng kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn kwa atɔknɛkwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ akkwɛ ayila kwa akkwɛ. Christ Jesus uffu ka vveeng ’wɔng kɛkkala banaang a bubbi. Anaam nttanɛ banaang a bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛbbɔl.
Keem nbbe Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ nkwaaning Christ Jesus ɔyɔɔ kibbe luppyam ammɛ la anaam wa nttanɛ bubbi lɛnaang. Kɔtaa kɛtaa iyɔɔ ya ɔyɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ba bale bayila kwa ammɛ baddu kuddu kɛfal a kɛfal.
Lakke la latele lale za Ubeet a Kɛfal a kɛfal, wa usinɛ libbe, isimɛ lɛyɛn, ule Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa kɛfal a kɛfal! Kulening.
Timothy, waan anaam, nsekelewɔbong lakke ’zɔng. Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛmmwɔɔl a biyɛnɛ za baggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk batumwɔ. Akɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn a kullu ɔkkɔɔnɛ allu kullu kɔyyɛɛp.
Akɔɔm kiyila annɔ kkpɔk la luttina gwa doddo. Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ba batakanɛ kwa luttina abbɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ, kiyila abbɛ kile lɛbɛpɛ.
Abbɛ balenɛ Hymenaeus la Alexander la balɔɔt balɔk ba nlenɛbɛ lɛtɔk nssɛɛn Satan ka kɔbɔɔk, nkwaaning oggbe ukpekebɛ kɛlɔɔk a babbu lilɔɔk kitum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk a kɔlɔɔk, nggyan nttɛ lakkpenge la luzɔɔm la kɛbap a bɛfɛɛn la kiwomo kɛnaang ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bya ibapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm innyi
babeet la bayanga lakke la ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning itaa kɛtaa sa bbɛɛm ka bɔkaat, inaang linaang sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ inaang.
Nkwɔng kɔyyɛɛpnɛ kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt.
Ammɛ wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ baddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ɔkkɔɔnɛ basan lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn keem, ɔlɔɔt ule vvɔn keem wa ulokonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la balɔɔt ka bɔkaat. Ammɛ ulenɛ Christ Jesus,
wa ɔsammɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyi nkwaaning ɔsanga balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Uwɔng baang ɔ̀dɔkɔ̀nɛ́ iyɔɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔkkala ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Kwakkwɛ baang batɔɔmmɛnɛ battɛ nzzanga Uyilabɔtɔɔm Jesus wa Ikanakana la ukopolo-lukopolo abbɛ. Nbwɔɔlɔbɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a kiyila la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Lɛlaak ba nkkala, nlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.

Nggyan nttɛ bwaanbwalam ka ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ keem bazɔɔm ka luzɔɔm la ggwɔn. Abbɛ ba balenɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛsam bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkwoong bayeek labɔɔk abbɛ ka libat bassɛɛn luzɔɔm, kutun a kɔlɔɔk la ikangala bisi lile.

Ɔgbaa nggyan nttɛ bwanavva basan kɛssanga iwɔkɔlɔ ya bawɔkɔlɔnɛ. Bawɔkɔlɔyɛ doddo. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ banaang kittulu kitook basak. Tɛ̀ttƐ́ bawɔkɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn bya banaanɛbyɛ la gold, ɔlɔk ifɔɔk akpana. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bawɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ ya iyyɛɛpnɛ isak ɔlɔk ikkaam kappya,
banaang linaang sa doddo sa bbwak sa wanavva wa uttinamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ule wa luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ.
Bwanavva bakkoop kɔlɔɔk zzum zzum ka luzɔɔm la luppyam gwa latele.
Ba nyila bwanavva bakopolo ɔlɔk bayanga lakke basak bwaanbwalam. Bataa zzum kulak.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ uteem Uyya (Adam) lɛlɔɔm tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔm Uzoo (Eve).
Uyya lissi ɔdɔkɔnɛ wa Satan ɔfɛɛtmɛnɛ. Ɔdɔkɔ Uzoo ka Satan ɔfɛɛtnɛ ɔbɛpɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ule wa kɛkkala ɔyanganɛ bbwɔɔn, ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm kiyila ammɛ kkpɔk, ɔyanga kɛsaap ka luppyam la bɔllɛ lɛfal ɔbɛtɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk.
Mung kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn: Ɔlɔɔt kɔbɛtɛmɛnɛ ɔttɛ ule ɔgga ka luzɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkɔlɔbong kɛnaang sa kɛttanɛ bɛnaang ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛyyɛɛp.

Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ bugga luzɔɔm, ule ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ lɛnaang. Ɔtɔk wanavva vvɔn keem. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ uttina kɔlɔɔk. Ukkwoong ɔbwɔɔp luppyam ammɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ukekeen ɔsaapmɛ, ukkwoong lukopolo.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔvva batak ubimi. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔnyanga-binyanga. Ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk bɛtɛbɛtɛ, bɔkaat busaapmɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaapnɛ ikkpoko.
Ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm wanavva ammɛ la bwɔɔntiti doddo. Ɔnaang bwɔɔn ammɛ batelemɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt usinɛ likkwoong ɔkɔɔm kɛsana-ssala ammɛ, ule ɔnaang nang ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?
Ɔfɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ussumanɛ ka luzɔɔm lɛmal lile. Nzang vvenɛ ɔkkyaamɛ ɔttɔ ka kɔlɔɔk a Satan.
Ule ɔlɔɔt wa balɔɔt ba basinɛ ka luzɔɔm lile batelemɛnɛ bagbaa, nkwaaning basimɛ kɔlɔɔk izzit lɛnaang badɛmmɛ umii ɔttɔ ka ɔnnya Satan.
Balɔɔt ba bayaamnɛ ka kɛnaang a luzɔɔm bassɛ bale balɔɔt ba bayyɛɛpnɛ eleme. Kɔlɔɔk a luzɔɔm kulebɛ ka luppyam. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bavva batak basak. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikkpoko isaapmɛ gaang isak.
Bakɔɔm iyɔɔ kiyila kkpɔk ka luppyam gwa doddo.
Eleme balɔɔt ’bɔng baang èlébong la kɛllɛ. Bàsákbong illɛ ’yɔng baang tɛ́ttɛ́ banaang kɛnaang.
Bwanavva abbɛ bale la ileme ya doddo. Bafɔngɔ kɛlɔɔk a balɔɔt ka isimi. Bakkwoong battina kɔlɔɔk bafɔngɔ kɛkkaala lɛlaak.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyaamnɛ ka kɛnaang a luzɔɔm ɔtɔk wanavva vvɔn keem. Ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm kɛsana-ssala ammɛ doddo.
Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ doddo bayanga kibee sa bbwak sa babbɔnɛ balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk batum kiyila abbɛ ka Jesus Christ.
Nkkpɔk lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung nfeewɔyɔng, nttina nttɛ baala ɔmmɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ nffu nkoolowɔyɔng.

Ɔzzànga nsinɛ lɛkka liffu, asanyɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ile ikɔɔmyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Abbɛ balenɛ luzɔɔm a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu gwa lulenɛ likoop la ufik-a-lɔkkwɔɔn-a-kɔlɔɔk.

Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔkala bɔttala kɔlɔɔk a lalup a luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt ba ule: Ɔtta ka vveeng la Ɛkkpakkwɔɔt ɔlɔɔt, Kuyeeng kɔyɔɔ ɛkpansi kɔttɛ ule bbwak. Bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayɛnmɛ. Bakopolo kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ka ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ, bayila kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ, Basammɛ umii ka libat.
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔkbong ppwool kɔttɛ ulenɛ lɛnaang, balɔɔt balɔk vvenɛ bakkyaa kiyila bazzɔɔk. Vvenɛ bappyɛɛ bayila kwa bakkala lɛlaak a liyeeng, bakup lukopolo ubbu.
Lukopolo ’gwɔng mung lussi ka bakkala lalaak a balɔɔt. Abbɛ balenɛ ba ittina abbɛ ilenɛ libbe, ayɛnnɛ attɛ bakkɔm ka ukolo kɛfɔl a lɔkɔɔn.

Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba bakopolonɛ battɛ bbwak ba kule ka ɔlɔɔt ɔtɔknɛ wanavva, ɔlɔk azzi kɛssanga kazzi ’sɔng ɔlɔk ’sɔng kang. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ bile bya kuzzi, ka àlenɛ́ lɛzɔɔm awomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka unnyiwɔnɛbyɛ. Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila bale lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɛsan banaang ning.
Bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛlɔɔm buyyɛɛpɔyyɛɛp. Bwa kifim ba bule. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bile bya kɛtɔk la kiwomo kɛnaang.
Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la nzɔɔm bɛnaangnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk bɔfɛɛn.
Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung nzang vvenɛ aleyɔng ibɔɔyi a Christ Jesus ya doddo ka annyiwɔnɛyɔng kɛyɔɔng kazzi Kuyeeng la lɛmmwɔɔl a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa alenɛyɔng likup.

Agbata assekeyɔng kɛkkala lɛlaak ibala ’sɔng baang sa kisinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan. Ibala ’yɔng baang ba ile ya kɛzza lɛmmwɔɔl kitum ka nakanaka. Alokoyɔng lafal annyɔɔng ka lukkoop a kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kɛggwɔkɔ a kkwɔɔt kɛyanga isak ka ɛtɔk ya assɛ. Ɔzzànga kɛnaang kwa Kuyeeng kɔggyannɛ kɛyanga isak ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka kinnyinɛyɛlɛ kuddu kwa gedegede mung la kwa lusso.
Mung kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn kwa Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔtɔk kwɛ.
Kwakkwɛ baang ibumnɛ inaang kɛnaang gaang gaang ka ilenɛ ittina ayyɔɔt lɛsam iloko ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu wa ulenɛ Ɔkkala-ikkala balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Gaang gaang balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bayilanɛ kwa ammɛ.
Akopolo, abwɔɔlɔbɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔtɔkwɔ ka ikpɛnɛ ka alenɛ lɛffɔ ale waan. Ataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyɔɔ bayanga-kiyila ka bikingi annɔ, la linaang, la kɛsaap sa ayanganɛ, la kiyila sa ayanganɛ la bɔllɛ eleme.
Asam ɛkɛtɛ annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ la lakke za ayanganɛ annyi ka kɛkkwɔɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl, la lukopolo ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ nffu.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkyaa lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang za Kuyeeng kulewɔnɛ linnyi azzɔɔk. Azzɛ lilenɛ za Kuyeeng kunnyiwɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya batolonɛ basam labɔɔk batelewɔ.
Akkoop bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung asamwɔ kɛyɔɔng annyibyɛ, ɔkkɔɔnɛ balɔɔt bayɛn lɛmmala kɛnaang annɔ.
Akatwɔ kɛyɔɔng. Asan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akopolonɛ. Ɔkkaamwɔ ning baang. Anaang ning, vvenɛ akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng ɔgbaa la balɔɔt ba bagɔpɔlɔwɔnɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awɔlɔ ɔgɛlɛnya ɔlɔɔt, ɔzzànga abapmɛ kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ ssaawɔ. Akɔɔm bakolobya ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikpana annɔ.
Akɔɔm bagɛlɛnya bwanavva tɛ̀ttɛ̀ issakawɔ annɔ. Akɔɔm bazozo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itele annɔ la luppyam gwa doddo.
Atele bwanavva ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ basɛlɛ uttele-uttele.

Ɔzzànga wanavva ubbu ɔyanganɛ bwɔɔn balenɛ bagɛlɛnya lɛnaang, bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bakkoopbong kɔlɔɔk a luzɔɔm basan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale bakkwoong bakɔɔm abakka abbɛ. Banaang ning mung batak ippwoot a kɛkɔɔm sa ibakka la ibassɛ la bagɛlɛnya bakɔɔmnɛbɛ abbɛ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gaang gaang.
Wanavva wa ulenɛ wanavva-ubbu ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔsɛlɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ, ɔsam luttina ammɛ uloko ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ uttelemɛ kikoon la kɛtɔm.
Ɔzzànga wanavva-ubbu wa ɔsamnɛ luttina ammɛ unnyi kizzi kuddu la bwaanbwalam, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔggba libbe mkkpa ndɔk utii ka kuddu.
Attamabɛ nkwaaning basi kibbi lizzi, balɔɔt balɔɔkbɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt usinɛ inaaka likkwoon ɔppyɛɛk doddo, gaang gaang balɔɔt a kɛsana ssala ammɛ biini, usibong kiyila lɛyanga. Ammɛ ɔppyɛɛbong ɔtta lɛbbɔl ɔsak ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asam lɛkɔɔl a wanavva ubbu ɔlɔk agbaa la lakɔɔl a bwanavva babbu balɔk, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔtakabong ɔkkpɛɛm, ɔggbamɛ lalɔp a likkpa lakkyaat la kitele. Ɔgbaa utiimɛ walam vvɔn keem ka ullunɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubbe ɔkɔngɔmɛ.

Ule wanavva wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ eleme, ɔkɔɔm bwaan ammɛ doddo. Ukkwoong ukeke ukekeen. Ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn a latele unnyi babbɛ bayanga kiyila. Uttele balɔɔt ba battɔnɛ ka kɔlɔɔk, kɔbɛtɛmɛ ka kɛnaang a budoddo ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛɛn lakɔɔl a bwanavva babbu ba batiinɛ bazozo. Ba ippyam abbɛ ile idɛmbɛ baggyan killu bwalam balɔk, bakkyaa kwa Christ bafɔngɔ.
Balɔɔt vvenɛ bakpɛnbɛ ka balenɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛttɔ ka babɛpɛnɛ nsekele abbɛ wa battenɛ lɛnaang la luzɔɔm ka ikeeng.

Ɔgbaa vvenɛ babɛpɛ ɛkɛtɛ ka kɛssɛ kikkpit kɛmal ka ggwoon ’gwɔng kɛtta ka gwakang. Vvenɛ bakama-ɔkama babbɔl ka bale bakkoop kɛlɔɔk a balɔɔt ka isimi kɔbɛtɛbɛ ka kɛnaang a balɔɔt balɔk. Bassɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ balɔɔk lilɔɔk sa businɛ lɛlɔɔk.

Kwakkwɛ nttinanɛ nttɛ kule kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka bazozo ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ ballunɛ bwalam balɔk ɔlɔk bamaat bwɔɔn, bakkwoong bakɔɔm ssala abbɛ doddo nkwaaning basi balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ayyɔɔt kufuk linnyi kwa kɛlɔɔk a bubbi kitumyɛlɛ.
Bwanavva babbu balɔk bassangbong basikili basseke ka bakupnɛ Satan.

Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ukupnɛ Jesus ɔyanganɛ bwanavva ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ ka itutum ammɛ, ɔkɔɔmbɛ doddo. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔsam lɛtɔkɔ ’zɔng baang ufeek luzɔɔm, nkwaaning luzɔɔm lukkwoong lɔkɔɔm bwanavva babbu ba basɛlɛnɛ ɔkɔɔm-ɔkɔɔm.

Bagɛlɛnya ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang sa doddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazzilɛttɔ bale ba batɔknɛ ikipili ya lɛbaang a lɛbaang, gaang gaang bagɛlɛnya ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang kɔbɛtɛbɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la lukopolo.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛnɛ, “Tɛttɛ aggbɔ ɔgɔdɔ kamma ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛ ka kitup alaasi.” “Uyilabɔtɔɔm uzzi labɔɔk isapala.”
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ agɔpɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ utum ɔgɛlɛnya atakabong appyeekwɛ ka kamma ittɛɛsɛ iffa ɔlɔk ikkyaat.
Awɔlɔ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi ppwool ppwool ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning ba bassekenɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ.
Ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Christ Jesus, la bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nkkwɔɔwɔ ka luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ atele lɔttama ’gwɔng, afɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaapwɔnɛ keem kitele ka kɔlɔɔk duu kwa anaangnɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ azzuma asam labɔɔk annɔ atele ɔlɔɔt, anaangmɛ ppyɛɛ attɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang Uyini. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔk bubbi balɔɔt balɔk azzenge; ataa zzekep assekebɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ avva bannyi keem. Avva waan a batak ssup agbaa wa ule uttelewɔ lɛmmɛ lɛnaangwɔ ppwool; ka alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔffaakwɔnɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔ.
Bubbi balɔɔt balɔk kɛyɛn ba bukoolo. Bubbi abbɛ bukɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk bumii kɛkaal bukɔngɔbɛ abbɛ biini. Ɔzzànga bubbi bwa balɔɔt balɔk bummɛbong tɛ́ttɛ́ ayɛnbwɛ.
Kule kɛssanga ssɔn, linaang sa doddo ayɛnsɛ kkpelegedee, gɔɔ linaang sa lisinɛ sa doddo lile ba likkwoong liddumu.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng babili, atɔkyɔng issaawɔ annyɔɔng ka latele, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usi lɛlɔɔk bubbi utum lɛkɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lukopolo ayyɔɔt.

Babili ba ibassɛ abbɛ ikupnɛ Jesus, tɛ̀ttɛ́ batɔk ibassɛ abbɛ ka isɛɛkɛ. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bale ikpana la ikpana. Lutini ’gwɔng batelebɛ gaang gaang bagbaa, ka balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bayanganɛ isak ka kɛnaang abbɛ balenɛ bayanga kiyila ba basaapnɛbɛ. Akopolo balɔɔt bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng:
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ukopolonɛ luzɔɔm gwa lulenɛ zzekep usi lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, za lilenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk la lukopolo luzɔɔm ammɛ liyila, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang
ɔyɛnmɛbong kɛyɔɔng ɔsak usseke uzingizingi. Ɔkɔɔm tɔkɔlɔ wa bbɔlbbɔl, ɔkangala ikangala la kɔwɔlɔ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng binnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt luleep, kɔwɔlɔ, izzit, la lɛppyɛɛk za lɛbbɔlnɛ,

la kɛkangala ikangala ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bissi ka balɔɔt ba ippyam abbɛ isini bbwak lile, basi lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛyanga. Battina battɛ luzɔɔm lulenɛ ɛtɔk ya ɔlɔɔt ɔssɛnɛ ɔyyɛɛpmɛ.
Kule kule luzɔɔm lɔnaang mung ɔlɔɔt ɔyyɛɛpmɛ, ulenɛ ka bwa ɔyanganɛ bufimmɛnɛ.
Idɔkɔ ikɔɔm ’bɔng iffu ka vveeng ’wɔng? Bulɔk ba bule! Ngkka ile isam ’bɔng igbata ka vveeng ’wɔng?
Ka kulenɛ ning, ilenɛ ibba la kazzi lɛyanga, ifɔngɔ bulɔk lɛbɛlɛ lɛggyan.
Balɔɔt ba baggyannɛ iyyɛɛp battɔ ka bubbi bakaabɛ ka ɔnnya bizingizingi ikkɔlɔ. Ɔnnya ’wɔng baang uttulunɛbɛ ɔzzɔɔk bataak lɛkɔɔl.
Bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ bussi ka kusapa ikkpoko. Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔngbong ka kɛggyan ikkpoko basɛlɛ kiyila, bakɔɔng ka kɛbbɔl livve.
Ɔzzànga annɔ, ɔlɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bitunwɔ. Lutini ’gwɔng, abum kɔbɛtɛwɔ aggyan kuddu: Atele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ayanga kiyila. Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ. Abbɔ akama. Akɔɔm bɛtɛbɛtɛ.
Kɔbɛtɛwɔ gaang gaang ka ɛtɔk a kiyila ɔlɔk ayanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔ ɔttɛ afal ning mung ka abwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ bwa ayilanɛ ka lusso ittɛɛsɛ ggbadam.
Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ kuddu, la ka lusso a Christ Jesus, wa ubeenɛ ittɛɛsɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka lusso a Pontius Pilate nttɛ,
atele lafɔɔ alokozɛ doddo afɔngɔ kɛttɔ ka azzɛ, ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔffɔ Kɛtɔm sa Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ ule uffu.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a latele, Ɔkɔɔm-ɛfɛɛn keem, Ubeet a babeet ɔkkpɛlɛ, Uyini bayini ɔkkpɛlɛ, ule ɔkɔɔm Jesus uffu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛyɔɔng usinɛ libbe. Ullu ka buppwolo bwa ɔlɔɔt usinɛ likkwoong ɔwɔkɔ lusso. Ɔlɔɔt wa ulemɛnɛ lɛyɛn ba ule. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔyɛnmɛ baala ule. Latele la lakke lale za ammɛ kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.

Abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ la bɛfɛɛn a vveeng ’wɔng mung attɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkyaabɛ battɛ iyyɛɛp vvenɛ innyibɛ duu bwa baggyannɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng baloko ittina abbɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ammɛ wa uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk, unnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔggyannɛ.
Abwɔɔlɔbɛ banaang budoddo. Banaang budoddo gaang gaang, baggwoom kɔlɔɔk. Bazzi bɛfɛɛn bya bayanganɛ babɛkɛ bannyi balɔɔt balɔk ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Banaangnɛ ning vvenɛ baloko libɔngɔlɔ iyyɛɛp ya ile isi lɛbɛpɛ ka ussoonɛ. Tɛttɛ bɔk bakkwoong bayanga kuddu kwa kulenɛ kwa bbwak.
Timothy, aloko bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛ linnyi kɛppyɛɛk doddo. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ alɔɔk kɛlɔɔk sa kɛbbɔlnɛ, ɔlɔk vvenɛ akangala ikangala ya isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp ya bazingizingi bakkwɔɔnɛyɛ “Bisana.”
Balɔɔt balɔk battina battɛ basan kɔlɔɔk, kwakkwɛ balenɛ ɛtɔk a kiyila lɛssɛɛp. Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubee la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul wa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔ́naangnɛ ɔttɛ nzzanga Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ Jesus, ɔ̀tɔ́ɔmmɛ ɔttɛ nffu nbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a kuddu kwa ɔggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk usekele ɔttɛ iyangakwɛ ka itaanɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus.
Timothy, waan anaam ka luppyam, Dedde Ebinukkpaapi la Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, banaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, abbebɛ lɛttɔ, bannyiwɔ bɔkaat.
Nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa nzɔɔmnɛ nnyimɛ la luppyam gwa doddo kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt anaam ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ banaangnɛ. Nwomomɛ kɛnaang ka nzɔɔmnɛ nssɛɛnwɔ ka luzɔɔm anaam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, kikoon gɔɔ kɛtɔm.
Nkkebong liyeen annɔ, nggyan nttɛ nyɛnwɔ gaang gaang nkwaaning nyanga laggele ka luppyam.
Nkke kwa kiyila annɔ sa lɔkkwɔɔn, ka ayanganɛ kɛssanga kiyila sa Lois, ssakawɔ wa ɔgɛlɛnya, la Eunice, ssakawɔ wa ɔmaatwɔnɛ, bayanganɛ. Nsan lɔsan annɔ assɛ mung ayangasɛ ɔgbaa.
Ka ’kwɔng mung nkkewɔ nttɛ aloko lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ntelewɔnɛ labɔɔk anaam ka kkwɔɔt doddo.
Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛyɛlɛ ba kɔnaangyɛlɛ ibbwɔpɔ, lutini ’gwɔng kunnyiyɛlɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam la kɛsaap, la kɛyyɛɛp a luppyam.

Izzit tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaangwɔ kibee attɛɛsɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, ɔlɔk vvenɛ izzit inaangwɔ kwa anaam, ɔlɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ammɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng ayɛn akama ggwaat-ggwaat ka kufoom kwa annɔ ka kɔlɔɔk a Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulewɔnɛ lakke linnyi kwa akkwɛ.

Ɔkkalayɛlɛ, ɔkkwɔɔyɛlɛ ɔttɛ izzanga balɔɔt ammɛ biini, ka kwa ilenɛ lɛnaang lissi, ɔzzanga ka kwa luttina ammɛ biini gwa ɔyanganɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaangyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ. Ɔ̀tɔɔm Christ Jesus ppyɛɛ ’wɔng mung bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔm ɛkpansi.
Ɔzzanga gedegede mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbongyɛlɛkwɛ ka kiffu sa Jesus, ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt, uffunɛ. Ɔwwɔɔlbong lubbe, iyɛn kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ka kuttu budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛbong ɔttɛ nbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm la ukopolo-lukopolo.

Kwakkwɛ mung nyɛnnɛ akama ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung. Ɔzzanga ntii baang la luttina anaam bbwak, ka nsannɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nlokonɛ luttina anaam ka ammɛ. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ vvenɛ uloko bwa ulenɛnɛ linnyi ka budoddo tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang.
Akɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl za nkopolowɔnɛ kkpɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyɔɔ ya ale akup. Ataa ka kiyila la kɛsaap. Abbyɛ bilenɛ bɛfɛɛn ayyɔɔt ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus.
Aloko bɛfɛɛn bya lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lalenɛyɛlɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lannyiwɔnɛ doddo.
Asan lɔsan attɛ ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ka ɛkpansi Asia bammabong bakɔngɔnɛ gbaak la Phygelus la Hermogenes.
Nkkpenge Uyini nttɛ ɔyɔɔ itutum a Onesiphorus kibbe-lɛttɔ ka ɔnaangnɛnɛ nggele bikkpit ggbadam, izzit isimɛ lɛnaang ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ.
Ɔ́ffɔ́nɛ̀ Rome ɛffɔ ɛffɔ uttenɛ kɛggyan eseese ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔyɛnnɛ.
Numa ubbe Uyini lɛttɔ ka Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang. Asan lɔsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkɔɔmnɛnɛ ka Ephesus.
Ka kwa annɔ, waan anaam, akɔɔm ppyɛɛ wa ulenɛ wa ayyɔɔt ka bɔkaat ayyɔɔt la Christ Jesus akkaam.
Atɔk lɛmmwɔɔl za appyeenɛnɛ ka nkopolonɛ ka lusso ittɛɛsɛ ggbadam annyi balɔɔt ba basaapwɔnɛ ba bale bakkwoong bakopolo balɔɔt balɔk.
Assɛ ayɛn akama, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wa sɔgya Christ Jesus wa lɔkkwɔɔn.
Wa sɔgya wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang, ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang kɛsaap uzzilɛttɔ ammɛ. Ba utotolo linaang ammɛ la balɔɔt a ssala.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔmmanɛ lɔfat ka ikanga, ba ukkwoong ɔbɛtɛ usinɛ lafɔɔ lɔfat liloko.
Uwoop-a-bɔtɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang gaang gaang kɔbɛtɛmɛ, ɔkɔɔmbong ɛtɔk ɔsanga lutini isak a kɛnaang ’sɔng baang.
Affik kɔlɔɔk kwa nlɔɔknɛ mung asan attɛ Uyini vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔ appyeekwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Akke Jesus Christ wa ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, ule ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu a David, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ ka Kuttu-Budoddo kwa nkopolonɛ.
Nyɛn akama bassɛɛnnɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ka labɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔzzɔɔk-a-kɔlɔɔk ka nbwɔɔlɔnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzánga lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ikpɔkɔlɔ ba lile.
Kwakkwɛ baang nbbɔnɛ akama ɔkkpɛlɛ nzzenge-luzzi balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning abbɛ ɔgbaa bayanga kuddu kwa kussinɛ ka labɔɔk a Christ Jesus, la iyyɛɛp ya kɛfal a kɛfal.
Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn: “Ilenɛ libbe la ammɛ, nzang vvenɛ issɛ iddu la ammɛ ɔgbaa.
Ibbɔnɛ akama tɔttɔt, vvenɛ issɛ iyanga lakke ikɔɔm ɛfɛɛn la ammɛ. Ikalamɛnɛ, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔkalayɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
Ayyɔɔt isinɛ balɔɔt ba doddo lile, Ammɛ ule ɔlɔɔt wa doddo gbisii, ka ule usi likkwoong ɔkalamɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
Akke balɔɔt annɔ ’kwɔng, attamabɛ doddo ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm attɛ bafɔngɔ babbu ikangala. Ikangala budoddo bulɔk ba inaang ɔgbaa la kɛbɛpɛ balɔɔt ba bagɔpɔlɔnɛyɛ.
Kɔbɛtɛwɔ ayanga budoddo ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaang-a-kɛnaang wa izzit isimɛnɛ lɛnaang ka kɛnaang ammɛ, ukopolo bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa lɔkkwɔɔn.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ale ka kutolo kwa kusinɛ kwa latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile. Kɔggba balɔɔt kusseke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kɛssanga kikopolo ’sɔng baang kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp bwa budɔlɔnɛ busseke ppwool. Balɔɔt ba bálenɛ kɛssanga bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng likopolo balenɛ Hymenaeus la Philetus.
Bakkyaabong kɛ́ssɛ ka ɛtɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk bafɔngɔ basseke ka banaangnɛ ittina balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ibbɔl, ka battɛnɛ kifungala ayyɔɔt ka lubbe kɛggba lɛsak.

Ɔzzànga akkɔkɔlɔm a lutte gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ litte ba bakkwoong bannyɛkɛgwɛ. Bakkpɔkbong lammwɔɔl ka libat a lutte ’gwɔng baang battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan mung balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ wa Uyini, ɔkkyaa babbu linaang ɔfɔngɔ.”

Bɛssanga bɛkkpala la ilɔlɔ bile ggbadam ka ggwoon gwa lɛbaang. Bɛlɔk banaangbyɛ la silver, bɛlɔk la gold, bɛlɔk banaangbyɛ la kɛssɛ. Bɛlɔk la kɛbat igbele. Bɛlɔk bakɔɔmbyɛ ka kɛtɔm-a-lɛtɔm, bɛlɔk bakɔɔmbyɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ.

Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng usseke bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmmɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang sa lɔkkwɔɔn ka ulemɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛsam unnyi abassɛ ammɛ. Ɔbamamɛbong kɛyɔɔng ɔkat kɛnaang a kɛnaang sa doddo.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup ikkɔlɔ kɛkkpa annyɔɔng. Kɔbɛtɛwɔ ka kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔbɛtɛ la kiyila, la kɛsaap. Ataa ka bɔkaat la balɔɔt ba balenɛ la ippyam ya doddo, bale Uyini lɛkkwɔɔ battɛ ɔkkalabɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup babbu ikangala ya bizingizingi. Asan lɔsan attɛ bile bikpeke ka kɔwɔlɔ.
Bɔɔyi Uyini, kɔwɔlɔ ba ɔwɔlɔ. Uggwoom kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ule ukopolo-lukopolo wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ, ɔppwa luppyam.
Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ luppyam gwa doddo ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk, ɛtɔk ya bbwak. Usinɛkkyam Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ unnyibɛ kufuk kwa kɛkkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi kɛfɔngɔ, bappyɛlɛ baffu bakup lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
vvenɛ bappyɛlɛ basan kɔlɔɔk batta ka ɔnnya Ubbu, wa ulenɛbɛ lɛkaa ɔnaangbɛ bayila kummɛ.
Akke asan attɛ vvenɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɛkɔɔt balɔɔt ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke.
Balɔɔt vvenɛ bassɔp bɔfɛɛn, vvenɛ bawɔlɔ, banaang kamma, baggbengebɛ kɛyɔɔng, banaang bɛfɛɛn izzit. Ibassɛ abbɛ baala batele. Kɔlɔɔk vvenɛ baala kuffibɛ. Vvenɛ bafim kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Vvenɛ babbɔl eleme. Ɔlɔɔt lɛttɔ bɛ baala ubbe. Vvenɛ bakkala lalaak babɛtɛ balɔɔt, vvenɛ baggyan kɔlɔɔk, vvenɛ babbyap gaang gaang. Balɔɔt bakɔɔm ifɛtɛ banaang balɔɔt bubbi.
Balɔɔt vvenɛ bassi latɔɔk, vvenɛ bagɔgɔlɔ basak, vvenɛ iyyɛɛp a vveengodde isaapbɛ itta Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang batɔk luzɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayɛnnɛgwɛ. Kwa lakke aggwɛ ba bayila. Ataa zzekep asseke kɛssanga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
Balɔɔt balɔk bamal ka ggwoon a balɔɔt balɔk bakup bwanavva ba bubbi abbɛ bulenɛ lɛsak lɛttala basseke ka bakkɔlɔnɛ ikkɔlɔ tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ.
Abbɛ balenɛ bwanavva ba babumnɛ kikkoop a kɔlɔɔk, ɔzzànga baala basan lɔkkwɔɔn akkwɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jannes la Jambres bafimnɛ kwa Moses, balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ɔgbaa bassɛ bafim kwa lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ning baang. Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba ippyam abbɛ isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp bale kiyila lisi lɛyanga.
Ɔzzànga fulufulu baala baffɔ, ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bale bayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazizinginɛ. Vvenɛ kɔnaangbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔnaangnɛ Jannes la Jambres.
Ɔ̀zzànga annɔ akupbong lukopolo anaam, la linaang anaam, la luttina anaam, la kɛyyɛɛp a luppyam anaam, la kɛsaap anaam, la kɛbbɔ akama anaam,
la kɛyɛn sa nyɛnnɛ. Asan lɔsan bɛfɛɛn bya bɛnaangnɛnɛ ka Antioch la Iconium, la Lystra. Uggboggbo akama wa nbbɔnɛ baang. Ɔzzanga Uyini ɔkkalanɛ ka abbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔfɔngɔ.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggyannɛ kɛtaa ka kuddu kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama.
Ɔzzànga banaang-a-bubbi la bakkala-lɛlaak vvenɛ bakam-ɔkama banaang bubbi, bakkala lɛlaak. Vvenɛ bafɛɛt balɔɔt ɔgbaa, la kɛfɛɛt sa bafɛɛtnɛbɛ abbɛ biini.
Ɔzzànga annɔ akup kɔlɔɔk kwa bakopolowɔnɛ, ayanga kiyila kɛkkaam lɔkkaam. Asan lɔsan balɔɔt ba badɔkɔnɛ ittikya annɔ.
Ɔgbaa akke attɛ assi ssup ka buwaan asan kɔlɔɔk a livva lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka kukkwoongnɛ kunnyiwɔ bisana pya bile bikɔɔmwɔ bimii ka kuddu kwa kɛyanga kiyila kitum Christ Jesus.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛ balɔɔt ba bakkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ luttina bakkpɔk kɔlɔɔk ammɛ. Kɔlɔɔk ammɛ kɔyyɛɛp gaang gaang ka kɛkɔɔm kikopolo lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, la kifim a kɔlɔɔk kwa kusinɛ bbwak lile, la kɛlɔngɔlɔ kwa kusinɛ bbwak lile, la kikopolo lukopolo gwa linaang sa bbwak,
nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkɔnɔ, ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔggyannɛ, ɔkɔɔm ɔnaang lutini kɛnaang duu sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ.
Nttamawɔ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Christ Jesus wa ule ɔkaal kɛkaal ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ, bakokolo la babbu, ammɛ wa ule ka uffunɛ ɔkɔɔm vveengodde. Nttɛ,
akopolo lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ kɔbɛtɛwɔ, mkkpa ɛkɛtɛ ele bbwak, ɔlɔk esi bbwak lile. Asikili balɔɔt ippyam, akamabɛ ippyam, abbabɛ bikɔɔm, akopolobɛ la kibbe-luppyam.

Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ effu ya balɔɔt bale basi lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn lɛbɛlɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ. Vvenɛ bappyɛɛ banaang kwa battinanɛ ka ippyam abbɛ biini. Vvenɛ bassɛ bakkpit baggyan bakopolo-lukopolo ggbadam ba bale bakopolobɛ bwa abbɛ biini baggyannɛ battɛ bappyee.
Vvenɛ bafim lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk bappyɛɛ basam ittina abbɛ baloko ka lissa.
Ɔzzànga annɔ akɔɔmwɔ kɛyɔɔng ka utini lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Abbɔ akama, anaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolonɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Anaang kɛnaang annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa anaam mung, ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya bale ka bawwɔɔlnɛnɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya nle ka ngbatanɛ nssekewɔyɔng ka vveeng ’wɔng mung.
Nllubong kullu kɔyyɛɛp. Numa nffɔ ka lakuma. Nkɔɔmbong kiyila anaam kkpɔk.

Ɔzzànga gedegede mung lɛsɔɔk za nyanganɛ ka nlenɛ lɛbɛtɛ lilenɛ bakang ka lɛkatnɛnɛ. Azzɛ lilenɛ kɛ̀ttɔ̀pɔ́ ododo kɛtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa Uyini, Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal wa bbwak, ule unnyinɛ ka Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang. Ɔzzànga anaam keem lissi ka ule unnyinɛ, ule unnyi ɔtta la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bale bataa la kɛsaap bakatmɛ ɛkɛtɛ uffunɛ.
Abum gaang gaang akka liffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam gedegede mung.
Demas vveeng wa gedegede mung ɔsaapmɛbong ɔsak. Ɔgbatabong ɔkɔngɔnɛ umii Thessalonica. Crescens umiibong Galatia, Titus umiibong Dalmatia.
Usseke Luke kɛyɔɔng ka ulenɛ mung la anaam. Akɔɔm Mark affuyɔng la ammɛ la ammɛ. Ammɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔyaamnɛ ka kɛnaang anaam.
Ntɔɔmbong Tychicus umii Ephesus.
Ɛkɛtɛ ya ale ka affunɛ, asam uwɔkɔlɔ wa ngbatanɛ nkɔngɔ ka Troas ka ssala Carpus akɔɔm affu. Asam livva ɔgbaa akɔɔm affu, gaang gaang livva sa banaangnɛsɛ la ɛkkpa ɛsɛɛn.
Alexander, ɔsal-a-bɛkkpala ɔnaangnɛ ubbu kɔlɔɔk kɔttala. Uyini vvenɛ ukipilimɛ ka kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang.
Akatwɔ kɛyɔɔng assekemɛ. Ɔkɔɔm lɛgabwɔ ufim lɛmmwɔɔl za ibwɔɔlɔnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ wa ubeenɛ la anaam ka kɛkaal usi lile. Nbeenɛ lafeet kɛyɔɔng; Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bamma bakɔngɔnɛ. Nkkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ kɔfɔngɔmɛ kitun kɔppyɛɛkbɛ.
Ɔzzanga Uyini ubee la anaam unnyinɛ lakke nkkwoong nbwɔɔlɔ Ikanakana bɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ busaal bappyee. Ɔkkalanɛ ka kamma ugɛpɛ ɔfɔngɔ.
Uyini vvenɛ ɔkkalanɛ ka bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔsamnɛ ka budoddo umii ka Itutum ammɛ ka libat. Kibungu kile sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛfal a kɛfal! Kulening.
Awomo Priscilla la Aquila la balɔɔt a ssala Onesiphorus.
Erastus ule ka Corinth ka ɔtaanɛ. Ngbata Trophimus nkɔngɔ ka Miletus ka usimɛnɛ lɛppwa.
Abum affu tɛ́ttɛ́ lukook lɔffa. Eubulus la Prudens la Linus, ɔbɛtɛ la Claudia la ikpana ayyɔɔt ilɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ nwomowɔ.
Uyini ubee la kuyeeng annɔ. Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul, bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ. Ɔsanganɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ nffu nnaang kiyila balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ kɛkkaam. Ɔttɛ nyɔɔbɛ ɛtɔk a lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn ka luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt.
Akkwɛ kulenɛ ka ikkala kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa usinɛ lɛlaak lɛlɔɔk ɔdɔkɔ usekeleyɛlɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ’kwɔng mung, tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔlɔɔmnɛ ɛkpansi ɛffɔ.
Ɔyɔɔ nsekele ammɛ ka bbwak ka bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛ. Nkwɔng ɔdɔkɔ ɔssɛɛnnɛ anaam ka kɔbɔɔk, nbwɔɔlɔkwɛ ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt.

Nkkpɔk nfeewɔ annɔ Titus, waan anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka kiyila sa iyanganɛ la annɔ. Numa Dedde Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, la Christ Jesus, ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt banaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, bassɛɛnwɔ bɔkaat ka luppyam.
Ngbata nkɔngɔwɔ ka Crete nttɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ alɔngɔlɔ lilɔɔk sa litiinɛ sa kɛlɔngɔlɔ. Assang balɔɔt ba balenɛ bagɛlɛnya luzɔɔm ka lɛffɛ la zzɔn. Akke lɔttama anaam.

Ɔgɛlɛnya luzɔɔm úle ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ kibbi ka kɔlɔɔk lizzi. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ wanavva vvɔn keem. Bwaan ammɛ bale bwɔɔn ba bayanganɛ kiyila. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbyapnɛ. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa babbɛ batelemɛnɛ.

Ka ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ luzɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ lɛlaak. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkyaamɛnɛ ɔsak ɔnaang kamma la balɔɔt. Ɔfɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ ubbu luppyam kile, ɔlɔk ɔvva-batak, ɔlɔk ɔggyan-a-kɔlɔɔk, ɔlɔk ɔwɔnɔ.
Ulé ɔlɔɔt wa uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk, kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ kɔsaapmɛ. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak. Utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk.

Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ubeenɛ bbwak ka bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bulenɛ kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn, bule bbwak la lukopolo luzɔɔm ’gwɔng baang. Ning vvenɛ ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔbba balɔɔt bikɔɔm, ɔgbaa ɔyɔɔ kɛsɛpɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bafimnɛkwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basɛpɛnɛ.
Balɔɔt bakɔɔng lɔkɔɔng, gaang gaang balɔɔt ba badɔkɔnɛ bakup luzɔɔm gwa balɔɔt a Jews kkpal, mung basseke ka bakupnɛ Christ. Abbɛ bafimnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bafɛɛt balɔɔt la babbu ittina abbɛ.
Kɔyyɛɛp ka atununɛbɛ. Asinɛbɛ litunu, vvenɛ babbum itutum ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kikopolo lukopolo gwa búsinɛ̀ likopolo. ɔssanga ubbu luttina kɛnaang ikkpoko.

Ɔdɔkɔ ule ɔlɔɔt a Crete biini wa uppyeenɛ kutolo ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a Crete bakkala lɛlaak ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babbyap isɛɛn ka kɛmat. Bakpɛkkpɛlɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ kɔlɔk lɛsan ɔgbaa la kizzi kazzi.”
Kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ, kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Kwakkwɛ baang ale attamabɛ gaang gaang nkwaaning bayanga kiyila sa doddo,
ɔlɔk kusibɛ lɛbɛtɛ ka lissa balɔɔt a Jews la lafɔɔ za lassinɛ ka balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lifim.

Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt ba tɔkɔlɔ abbɛ ulenɛ kpaladada. Ɔzzànga bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ba babbɔlnɛ tɔkɔlɔ basɛlɛ kiyila ba bule, ka ippyam abbɛ la ittina abbɛ isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp.

Babbwa battɛ abbɛ basan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔsan, ɔzzànga linaang abbɛ ba liyɔɔ littɛ basan mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bayanga latun ka ippyam. Ɔlɔɔt ba batele. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bakkɔnɔ kɛnaang a budoddo kinnyibɛ.
Ɔzzànga annɔ akopolo kɛssanga ssɔn la lukopolo gwa lulenɛ bbwak.
Abwɔɔlɔ bagɛlɛnya bakɔɔmbɛ kɛyɔɔng, basan kɔlɔɔk, bakatbɛ kɛyɔɔng, bayanga kiyila sa bbwak, la kɛsaap la kɛbbɔ akama.
Assɛ abwɔɔlɔ bagelenya bwanavva attɛ banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwanavva ba bafalnɛ lafal a kitele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm banaangnɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bale babwɔɔlɔ-ibwɔɔlɔ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bale babili-batak. Bakopolo kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ,
nkwaaning bakopolo bwaanabwanavva tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale batele bwalam abbɛ la bwaan abbɛ.
Bakɔɔmbɛ kɛyɔɔng, basɛlɛ bubbi ka kkwɔɔt. Bale bwanavva ba badoddo ka ssala bwalam abbɛ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usi bubbi lɛlɔɔk utum lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Assɛ abwɔɔlɔ bakolobbya attɛ bakɔɔmbɛ kɛyɔɔng.
Annɔ biini anaang budoddo ka itɔk-itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ayɔɔ balɔɔt. Alɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, kɔbɛtɛwɔ ka lukopolo annɔ.
Atolo kutolo kwa bale basiwɔ lɛkpɛn, nkwaaning izzit inaang balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ ka bale basɛlɛ ubbu kɔlɔɔk wa bale balɔɔk batumyɛlɛ.
Babili batele ibassɛ abbɛ. Banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛbɛ itɔk itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka lilɔɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bappyɛlɛbɛ kamma kwa kusinɛ lɛyyɛɛp,

ɔlɔk vvenɛ la bàzzi ikkpoko gɔɔ bɛfɛɛn ibassɛ abbɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng bayɔɔbɛ kɛyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ abbɛ bale balɔɔt ba doddo, nkwaaning bagbaa kuttu lukopolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt ka bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya banaangnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbong ppyɛɛ ammɛ wa kuddu ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang ukopoloyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ikkyaa lɛfal za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ lɛggyan la kusapa bɛfɛɛn a vveengodde ifɔngɔ. Iddu kuddu kwa kɛkɔɔmyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng la kɛtaa bbwak, iddu kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka vveeng ’wɔng.
Ka ilenɛ ka kɛtaa kɛkat Kɛtɔm-a-ppyɛɛ sa ilenɛ baang ka ittinanɛ ifɔngɔsɛ. Assɛ kilenɛ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt la ɔkkala-ikkala ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ bale baffu.
Ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyiyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka lilɔɔk ibbyap ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔnaangyɛlɛ izzanga balɔɔt ba doddo. Ile balɔɔt ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ba baggyannɛ kɛnaang a budoddo.
Akopolo bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung. Akɔɔm lakke annɔ ka ale assɛɛn balɔɔt ba ba gɔpɔlɔwɔnɛ luttina la ɛkɛtɛ ale attamabɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayila ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ɔtɔkwɔ ka biwaan.
Akke balɔɔt annɔ batele bakɔɔm-ɛfɛɛn la bazzilɛttɔ, babama banaang kɔlɔɔk duu kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ.
Abwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔk bubbi batum ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk. Bataa ka bɔkaat la bunngwa. Bakɔɔm luppyam gwa doddo battele balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ayyɔɔt biini idɔkɔ bazingizingi kpal. Ɔlɔɔt ba itele. Inaang lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ. Idɔkɔ babili a kkwɔɔt la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛsaapnɛyɛlɛ. Ibɛpɛ kuddu ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ibbyap la kɛnaang a luleep. Itun balɔɔt balɔk, abbɛ bassɛ batunyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
Ɔzzánga kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛsaap ammɛ kiffunɛ,
ɔkkalayɛlɛ. Kwa bɔllɛ kɛnaang ayyɔɔt sa inaangnɛ lissi, ɔzzànga kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ kɛnaangnɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka kɛzzaa sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ, kɔppyɛlɛ kɔmaatyɛlɛ ka ufaa lɛfal.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uvvoongyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ kɔttala. Kussiyɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a Christ wa ɔkkalanɛyɛlɛ
nkwaaning ka lakke ammɛ, ippyɛlɛ itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, itul kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kwa iggyannɛ ittɛ iddu.

Uwɔng kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn. Nggyan nttɛ ateleyɔng zzeen ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung nkwaaning balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basan bakɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ abbɛ ka kɛnaang sa doddo. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp. Bɛyaam balɔɔt ɔgbaa.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ agɔpɔlɔ ikangala bazingizingi, la kɛttaal a lakɔɔl a balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ agɔpɔlɔ liwɔlɔ la lillu kitum Lafɔɔ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bɛyyɛɛp, ka bulɔk ba bɛffɔ.
Attama ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ kɛbɛngɛlɛ kibbi bikkpit ning bɛffa. Alenɛ ning baang lɛnaang, bulɔk kabɛlɛ lɛnaang la ammɛ.
Asan lɔsan attɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ning baang ɔ́naang-a-bubbi. Bubbi ammɛ buyɔɔbong buttɛ bbwak mɛ ba kule.
Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle ntɔɔm Artemas ɔlɔk Tychicus nfeewɔ, abum kɔbɛtɛwɔ affu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam ka Nicopolis. Nngwabong nttɛ nle ntaa bakang ka ɛkɛtɛ lukook.
Abum kɔbɛtɛwɔ attele lɔya Zenas la Apollos bamii kɔssɛ abbɛ. Abum bayanga bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa baggyannɛ.
Anaang balɔɔt ayyɔɔt bakkoop kɛkɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ abbɛ ka kɛnaang a budoddo, nkwaaning bayanga bwa balɔɔt baggyannɛ bbwak. Bafɔngɔ kɛtaa la babbu linaang ka lafal ’zɔng baang.
Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ mung la anaam battɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Awomo inngwa ayyɔɔt ka kiyila annyiyɛlɛ. Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul, ɔlɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ka lɛttɔ a Christ Jesus la za lissinɛ ka Timothy ɔkpana ayyɔɔt, nkkpɔk nfee Philemon, ɔlɔɔt a kɛnaang ayyɔɔt, ɛnngwa ayyɔɔt wa luppyam ɔgbaa,
la luzɔɔm gwa idudanɛ ka ssala annɔ, la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa wanavva wa ɔzzanganɛ Apphia la wa ayyɔɔt a sɔgya Archippus;
Numa Dedde Ebinukkpaapi ayyɔɔt la Christ Jesus, banaangwɔ ppyɛɛ bannyiwɔ bɔkaat.
Ɔkpana anaam Philemon, ɛkɛtɛ duu ya nzɔɔmnɛ ntalawɔ annɔ, nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
Nppyeebong kɛsaap sa ayanganɛ la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la kiyila sa ayanganɛ ka Christ Jesus.
Luzɔɔm anaam lùlè lɔttɛ ɛnngwa ayyɔɔt la annɔ ka ilenɛ balɔɔt a kiyila, vvenɛ ɛkɔɔmyɛlɛ emii ka bɔddɔng a kɛsan kɔlɔɔk a ppyɛɛ wa iyanganɛ ka kuddu ayyɔɔt ka bɔkaat la Christ.
Ɔkpana anaam wa luppyam, kɛsaap annɔ kɛkɔɔmbong laggele za lɛbaang kifeenɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la kɛkkaam a luppyam sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang! Afeelebong ippyam a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ itaa ka lawaa.
Ka kulenɛ ning, vvenɛ nkkaam luppyam kkpɔk nlɔɔk kɔkkɔlɔm ka bukpana ayyɔɔt la annɔ ka Christ Jesus nttɛ, anaang duu kwa kulenɛ bbwak a kɛnaang.
Ɔzzànga ka asaapnɛnɛ gaang vvenɛ nppyɛɛ nbapwɔ kɔlɔɔk, nkkpa ulenɛ anaam Paul nlenɛ Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ, gedegede mung nbbal lile ka igbakkɔpɔ ka lɛttɔ ammɛ.
Nbapwɔ kɔlɔɔk nnyi Onesimus, wa ulenɛ waan anaam biini ka Christ; ka ɛkɛtɛ nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ nsikili dedde ammɛ ka kuyeeng.
Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ɔdɔkɔ usiwɔ ka kukkam lile. Ɔzzanga gedegede mung utiiyɛlɛ ka kukkam.
Nle ka ntɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi uffu ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ. Luppyam anaam lule lumii la ammɛ la ammɛ.
Kɔdɔkɔ kɔsaapnɛ ka ɔtaanɛ mung la anaam ka nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ ka kɔlɔɔk a kuttu budoddo a Christ, nkwaaning uttelenɛ ɔkkalawɔ.
Ɔzzànga nkkpa kɔnaang, ba nggyan nttɛ ntutwɔ attelenɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng kule kɔsaapnɛ ka anaangnɛ kwɛ ka kɔsaapwɔnɛ. Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk baala nnaang kusiwɔnɛ lɛsaap.
Baang kɛgbata sa Onesimus ɔgbatanɛ ussekewɔ ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup kɛdɔkɔ ning baang nkwaaning ɔppyɛlɛ atɔkmɛ ɔtaa la annɔ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Gedegede mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubili keem ba ɔbɛlɛ lile. Ɔttanɛbong ubili liggbenge! Ule ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa lɔkkwɔɔn ka Christ. Ɔsaapnɛ gaang gaang. Ule ɔttawɔ annɔ ka luppyam lile ɔgbaa ka ulenɛ ubili, ibbal ka bukpana lile ka Uyini.
Attinanɛ kwa anaam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ, atɔkmɛ assɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale atɔknɛ anaam.
Ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk lɛnaang kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ, ɔlɔk ulewɔ la ippwoot, affikbyɛ assɛɛn kwa ippwoot ya anaam.
Vvenɛ nkkpɔk ’kwɔng ka kɔbɔɔk kwa anaam biini. Anaam Paul vvenɛ ntakwɔ ippwoot ’yɔng baang. (Ba nggyan nttɛ nkkewɔ asan attɛ kuddu annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ kulenɛ ippwoot anaam.)
Mkkpee ɔkpana anaam, anaangnɛ budoddo ’bwɔng ka lɛttɔ Uyini. Anaangnɛ nggele ka nlenɛ ɔkpana annɔ ka Christ.
Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ka nkkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung vvenɛ anaang bwa nbapwɔnɛ nttɛ anaang. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ gɔɔ vvenɛ anaang asak ning baang.
Ɔgbaa, aggyan lɛnɔk a ggwoon abamazɛ alokonɛ. Nttina nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uppyee luzɔɔm annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsamnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ unnyiwɔyɔng.
Epaphras, wa ulenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ mung la anaam ka lɛttɔ a Christ ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
Mark, Aristarcus, la Demas la Luke ba inaangnɛ kɛnaang la abbɛ, battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
Ppyɛɛ Uyini, Jesus Christ, ubee la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ka isimi ka isimi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ la bappyee-kutolo ammɛ utolo kutolo unnyi idedde ayyɔɔt ya iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bikkpit ggbadam ka itɔk ppwap.

Ɔzzanga ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke ’byɔng mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛbong la Awaan ɔlɔɔk unnyiyɛlɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔlɔɔm vveengodde. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga ɔttɛ ɔtɔk bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyanga ka lakpeke.

Uwongolo la buppwolo lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini bbwak. Lakke lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ labwɔɔpnɛ vveengodde laloko. Ulenɛ balɔɔt bubbi abbɛ lɛkkpɔlɔ, umii ɔtaa ka libat ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔttanɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ Awaan ɔttɛ ɔtta Bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ liggbenge, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛkɔɔl sa unnyimɛnɛ lɛttanɛ za abbɛ.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtaka ɔlɔɔk la uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Annɔ Waan anaam, mmwɔɔn anaam nssekenɛ Ssaawɔ.” Gɔɔ vvenɛ ule la uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔlɔk lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nle Abassɛ ammɛ, ammɛ ule Waan anaam.”
Ka ɛkɛtɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ kɛtɔɔm Awaan uffu ka vveengodde, ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ɔgbaa, ɔttɛ, “Bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bazɔɔm bannyi Awaan ’wɔng baang.”
Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ utum bayilabɔtɔɔm Ammɛ, ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang bayilabɔtɔɔm Ammɛ bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛffa, Ɔnaang ibɔɔyi Ammɛ itaa tɛ́ttɛ́ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn.”
Ka kwa kutumnɛ Awaan, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ; “Mkkpa kɔnaang, Oo Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kibeet annɔ vvenɛ kittumu ka kɛfal a kɛfal. Akɔɔmbong itutum annɔ doddo.
Kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo kɔsaapwɔnɛ, kwa bbɔl bbɔl wɔba kɔsaap. Kwakkwɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ ɔsangawɔnɛ unnyi laggele za latele ɔtta bannyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Uyini, annɔ alɔɔmnɛ ɛkpansi ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Akɔɔm labɔɔk annɔ anaang libat.
Vvenɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛtaak ussekewɔ annɔ ataa. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ vvenɛ bɛkkpɛɛm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iwɔkɔlɔ.
Vvenɛ akkɔtbyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwɔkɔlɔ. Vvenɛ bifoolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iwɔkɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga annɔ keem baala afoolo. Baala akkpɛɛm.”
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtaka ɔlɔɔk la Uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Taa mung ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk anaam, ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ nloko balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ bassekewɔ utele-bukkpɔ.”
Babang balenɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm? Abbɛ balenɛ liyeeng sa litelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔtɔɔmsɛ ɔttɛ liffu littele balɔɔt ba bale ka batɔknɛ kuddu ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kwakkwɛ ile ilɔm lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa ilenɛ lippyee kkpɔk, nkwaaning basiyɛlɛ lɛfɛɛt bassɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk.
Bɔtɔɔm bwa bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babwɔɔlɔnɛ idedde ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛbwɛ likup ɔlɔk utelebwɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama wa ɔggyannɛ.

Ngkka mung ile inaang nang isɛɛm akama ’wɔng, isinɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ kwa kuddu kwa lɛbaang ’kwɔng. Uyini biini ɔkɔɔmbong ɛtɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ kwa kuddu ’kwɔng baang. Balɔɔt ba bappyeemɛnɛ babwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ battɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang nnyɔn, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaabɛ buttɛɛsɛ ammɛ la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ la bɛmaanga lakke ammɛ ggbadam. Ɔgbaa unnyiyɛlɛ lasɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ lɛsanga ɔttɛ bale bazzilɛttɔ a vveeng ’wɔng wa ɔttɛnɛ ule ka ɔnaangnɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ vveeng wa ilɔɔknɛ itum mung.
Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ ’bɔng wa attinanɛ kwa ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt gbɔɔ mung ulenɛ wa appyɛɛkmɛnɛ ɔɔ?
Anaangmɛ ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ussup ɔtta bayilabɔtɔɔm annɔ; Ɔzzanga attɔpɔmɛ ododo lakke la latele,

Anaangmɛ uzzilɛttɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.” Luvva ’gwɔng lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ɔlɔɔt “Uzzilɛttɔ Bɛfɛɛn Ɔkkpɛlɛ.” Nkwɔng kugupu bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔlɔɔt ba iyɛn ka uzzinɛ lɛttɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ɔzzànga iyɛn mung Jesus wa ɔnaangmɛnɛ ussup ɔtta bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ka waan a liggbili ssup. Kussi ka kibbelɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubbe ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Gedegede mung iyɛnmɛ ka battɔpɔmɛnɛ ododo la lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la latele ka kɔlɔɔk a lubbe la akama wa ɔyɛnnɛ.

Kɔdɔkɔ kule bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem wa ɔlɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ulokobyɛ ule ɔnaang Jesus ɔtaa ka budoddo ka ussinɛ ka akama wa ɔyɛnnɛ nkwaaning ɔkɔɔm balɔɔt bamii batul laggele ka Jesus ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛbɛ uffu ka kuddu.
Ɔzzaa balɔɔt bubbi abbɛ busaal. Ammɛ la balɔɔt ba ɔzzaanɛ bubbi abbɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bayanga Abassɛ vvɔn. Kwakkwɛ baang Jesus izzit isimɛnɛ lɛnaang kɛkkwɔɔbɛ ikpana ammɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nlɔɔk ntum bwa alenɛ lɛnaang nbwɔɔlɔ ikpana anaam, Vvenɛ nbunguwɔ ka lusso kibbi ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nsam luppyam anaam nloko ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Yɛnnɛ mung la bwɔɔntiti ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ linnyi.”

Bwɔɔntiti, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ukkwoongnɛ ɔkkwɔɔbɛ, ka bayanganɛ ɛkkpa kkwɔɔt la linnyi, Jesus biini ɔssɛ ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ, ɔyanga kuddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ. Ɔnaang ning baang nkwaaning ɔkɔɔm lubbe ammɛ ɔbɛpɛ likke Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng, wa ɔyanganɛ lakke lubbe,
ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔkkyaa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba badɔkɔnɛ babili ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lafal abbɛ bafɔngɔ ka lubbe lɔbbwɔpɔnɛbɛ.
Kule kpelegedee, bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi ka uttelenɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng “Uttele balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham.” tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.

Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛttɛ ule ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikpana ammɛ ka linaang ɔkkpɛlɛ la itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning ule Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ bɛnaang, ɔlɔɔt ubbemɛ lɛttɔ ka kɛnaang ammɛ sa ɔnaangnɛ unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk bubbi balɔɔt bule la kɛsɔɔk.
Gedegede mung, ukkwoong mung uttele balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba ballɛnɛbɛ, ka ammɛ biini balemɛnɛ lɛssɛ ballɛ ɔyɛn akama.

Ikpana anaam, annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba ayilanɛyɔng kwa Jesus, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔyɔng lɛssɛ ɔkkwɔɔ, attinayɔng kwa Jesus wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔttɛ uffu ɔzzánga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka kiyila sa ibwɔɔlɔnɛ.
Utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsangamɛnɛ ɔttɛ uffu ɔnaang kɛnaang ’sɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Moses utelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛnaang ammɛ ka ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔɔknɛ ggwoon ɔyanga latele ɔtta ggwoon biini. Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn, Jesus ɔttanɛ wa latele lile ɔtta Moses.
Ggwoon duu ɔlɔɔt ɔbɔɔknɛ; ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Moses ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ bɔɔyi ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔlɔɔk ka ussoonɛ.
Ɔzzànga Christ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ka ulenɛ Waan wa uzzinɛ lɛttɔ ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ssala ammɛ, ulenɛ ka ilokonɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam ayyɔɔt la kiyila ka bɛfɛɛn bya iggyannɛ.
Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ kɔttɛ, “Appyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mmwɔɔn,
tɛ̀ttɛ́ afim kɛgɔpɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ banaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bafimnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ adɔkɔnɛyɔng ka kɛtɔm sa allɛmɛnɛyɔng ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.”
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ballɛnɛnɛ, gɔɔ mkkpa bale lɛyɛn bwa nnaangnɛ, ka lalɔp a likkpa laffa.
Akkwɛ baang kɔnaangnɛ kutunnɛ la balɔɔt ¿(tm)bɔng baang ning nttɛ, ‘Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ nɛ ba batele. Ba bakup kwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ.’
Kutunnɛ nyim nttɛ, ‘Baala baffu bafɛkɛlɛ la anaam.’ ”
Ikpana anaam, akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka kɛkaan annyɔɔng uffu ɔyanga ubbu luppyam wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila usi lɛsan ɔttɛ baang ɔgbatabong ɔkɔngɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu.
Aggyannɛ attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɔngɔ ka ifɛtɛ bubbi kɛttɔ usi kɔlɔɔk lɛbɛlɛ lippyee, atteleyɔng waanyɔɔng kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ka “Kɛtɔm-a-mmwɔɔn” ka luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lutumyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ile bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn la Christ, ulenɛ ka ikɔɔmnɛ kiyila sa iyanganɛ ka ikeeng kkpɔk ɔffɔ ka lakpeke.
Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ: “Appyeenɛyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mmwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ́ asiyɔngzɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya anaangnɛyɔng bubbi atumyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Babang bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basizɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ? Balɔɔt ba Moses ɔsanganɛbɛ ka Egypt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔdɔkɔ kutunmɛ la babang ka lalɔp a likkpa laffa? Kɔdɔkɔ kutunmɛ la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi, battɔ ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat babbe.
Ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ nsekele ammɛ wa ɔkkaamnɛ ɔttɛ, “Baala baffu bafɛkɛlɛ la anaam.” Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔk unnyi babang? Unnyi balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa ammɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ.
Iyɛnbong ittɛ baala bakkwoong bamal ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ka basɛlɛnɛ kiyila.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbong nsekele la ayyɔɔt. Ammɛ ulenɛ wa ile imii ifɛkɛlɛ bakang la ammɛ. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔngyɛlɛ nkwaaning ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ usi lisseke ka kimii kɛfɛkɛlɛ ’sɔng baang.
Ayyɔɔt ippyeebong Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ bappyeenɛ. Bappyee bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang ɔzzànga budoddo bulɔk busibɛ linnyi ka bappyeenɛbwɛ basibwɛ lɛtɔk bassɛɛn ka luppyam.

Ayyɔɔt ba iyilanɛ imiinɛ ifɛkɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kule gbɔɔ bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔdɔkɔ kutunnɛ nyim ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, ‘Baala baffu bafɛkɛlɛ la anaam.’ ” Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung tɔttɔt mkkpa kɛnaang ammɛ kile lɛsaal ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔnaangnɛ vveeng.
Ɛfɛɛn ele baang ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya ɛlɔɔknɛ ’kwɔng etum kɛtɔm sa bɛnnambɛkkyaat, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang kɛnaang ammɛ uvve ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔfɛkɛlɛ ka kɛtɔm sa bɛnnambɛkkyaat.”
Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung kɛbbal baang lile ka ɔlɔɔknɛ, “Baala baffu bafɛkɛlɛ la anaam.”

Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk bappyee Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basi ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛmal bamii bataa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bafɛkɛlɛ ka basinɛ kwa bappyeenɛ liyila. Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ba bale bafɔngɔbɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ bataa bafɛkɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Nkwɔng mung kɔyɔɔkwɛ kɛyɔɔng ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ kɛtɔm kɛlɔk sa kɛzzanganɛ “Mmwɔɔn” lɛsanga. Ɔmmɛbong ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛnɛ la David ɔlɔɔk lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ za baggbanɛ lɛkkpɔk battɛ, “Appyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mmwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ́ asizɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ.”
Joshua bukɔɔmnɛ balɔɔt umii ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛfɛkɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nzang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi lissum ɔppyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔk kwa kɛtɔm kɛlɔk.
Ka kulenɛ ning, mkkpa kɔnaang, kɛfɛkɛlɛ kitii baang sa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bale bafɛkɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfɛkɛlɛnɛ ka kɛtɔm sa bɛnnambɛkkyaat.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa umiinɛ ɔfɛkɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔfɛkɛlɛ kɛ kɛnaang ammɛ biini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfɛkɛlɛnɛ ka sa ammɛ.
Ɔzzànga ibum kɔbɛtɛyɔngyɛlɛ imii ifɛkɛlɛyɔng ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ifɔngɔyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ inaang kifim tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang banaangnɛ basi kɛfɛkɛlɛ ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm limii.

Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile ikokolo ka kɛnaang. Ogge lafoom laffa wa ɔlamnɛ ɔffɔ la azzɛ ba ule. Lɛzza dduk lɛffɔ ka laduda lɛfɛkɛlɛ la kuyeeng la ka laduda ulɔl a kɛkɔp la bɛkɔp. Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang liffiknɛ ikkɔlɔ balɔɔt la ittina abbɛ.
Bwa ale akkwoong alup assekeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba bule. Bɛfɛɛn bya ɔlɔɔmnɛ bile kkpelegedee ka bɛtaanɛ ka lusso ammɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ile ibwɔɔlɔ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa inaangnɛ.
Ibwɔɔpyɔng kiyila sa ibwɔɔlɔnɛ kkpɔk. Iyangabong Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang, wa ulenɛ ka lataak Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini lɛffɔ. Ammɛ ulenɛ Jesus, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt wa lɛbaang, ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛyɛlɛ nzɔɔn lɛnaang ka likke lɛsaalnɛyɛlɛ lissi. Ka isimi kukele, iyanga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang wa balemɛnɛ lɛllɛ ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ka annyɛ, ɔzzanga bubbi usi lɛnaang.
Ikkaamyɔng luppyam iffuyɔng ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛfɛɛn a kiggwoon a kɔlɔɔk kilenɛ, vvenɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ sa iggyannɛ bakang la kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk kitteleyɔngyɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya iggyannɛsɛ.

Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang la vvɔn basangamɛ ka kɛkaan a babbɛ battɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalabɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔk lasɔɔk ɔnaang latɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa bubbi.
Ammɛ biini ka ɔkkpɛlɛnɛ ka itɔk gbadam, ukkwoong mung ɔkɔɔmmɛ kɛyɔɔng la ba abbɛ ba basinɛ kwɛ lɛsan banaang basɛpɛ.
Ammɛ biini ka ulenɛ lakkpɛlɛ liyila, baala ɔzɔɔm ɔssɛɛn balɔɔt ka bubbi abbɛ keem, vvenɛ ɔzɔɔm ɔssɛɛnmɛ ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ka bubbi bwa ammɛ ɔgbaa.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsangamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ɔzzanga uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm ba ule. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utininɛ unnyiwɔ ɔttɛ azzanga uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ utininɛ unnyi Aaron.

Kɔssɛ kule ning baang la Christ. Christ usi lɛsam latele za kile uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan anaam, mmwɔɔn anaam nssekenɛ Ssaawɔ.”
Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ ale ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ka kɛfal a kɛfal, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Melchizedek ɔdɔkɔnɛ.”

Jesus ka kɛfal ammɛ ka ɛkpansi ɔdɔkɔ ɔzɔɔm luzɔɔm ammɛ ɔkɔɔm ɔkkwa la liyeen ɔgaga ɔbap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa ɔggyannɛ ka ulemɛnɛ ammɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔkkalamɛ ka lubbe. Ɔdɔkɔ Ukee-waan, utele zzeen ka kɛnaang ammɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uppyeemɛ luzɔɔm.
Ɔdɔkɔ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ffet, ɔzzanga ubum utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛyɛn akama sa ɔyɛnnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔn ɔnaangmɛnɛ ɔyyɛɛp ɔffata usikili ɔppyɛɛ ɔzzánga ɛtɔk a kuddu balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba batelemɛnɛ.
Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ ɔzzánga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka kikkwu Melchizedek, ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
Kɔlɔɔk kɔttala lɔttala kwa ile ilɔɔk itum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung. Ɔzzanga kukoolo kɛbwɔɔlɔ kkpelegedee ka annyɔɔng akoolonɛyɔng kippyee kɔlɔɔk.

Ɛkɛtɛ ɛmmɛbong gaang gaang wa bulenɛyɔng bakopolo-lukopolo lɛzzanga, ɔzzanga atiiyɔng baang ka akatnɛ attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt ukopolowɔyɔng lakkɔ za ikeeng ka bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ. Lutini gwa bulenɛyɔng kazzi kwa kɔkɔlɔm lizzi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bagɛlɛnya, atiiyɔng baang ka kɛvva libee.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utiinɛ ka ɔvvanɛ libee, utii waan. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ba ɔtaka ɔsan kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ la kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ.
Kazzi kwa kakkaamnɛ kale kwa bagɛlɛnya, ba balenɛ likkoop basan kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ la kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ.
Imiiyɔng lusso lusso la lukopolo bigɛlɛnya, kɔfɔngɔyɛlɛ kɛbɛtɛ kwa lakkɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za ikeeng. Ifɔngɔyɔng kɛppyɛlɛ itteyɔng lutte kɛkkyaa babbu linaang kɛfɔngɔ kikup kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
la lukopolo gwa lutumnɛ kɛzzaa bɛfɛɛn la kitele labɔɔk, la kifungala babbu ka lubbe la kɛkaal sa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Imiiyɔng lusso lusso, ɔzzanga ’kwɔng kulenɛ kwa ile inaang, ulenɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfɔngɔnɛyɛlɛ:
Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛttɔ bale banaang nang akama ɔnaangbɛ ka bubbi abbɛ? Badɔkɔ bale ka buppwolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ballɛ lɛsɔɔk za lissinɛ ka libat. Batɔk etini abbɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Basanbong ka ippyam abbɛ battɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ, battina batum lakke za lale ka laffunɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Christ ule uffu.

Ɔzzànga balɔngɔlɔbong bakkyaa kiyila bafɔngɔ! Ba babɛlɛ likkwoong bappyɛlɛ isimisimi babbal akama lɛkkwa ka balenɛ ka kɛkama Christ bakaka ka Cross ka kikkpit sa ibaala, bassɛɛnmɛ ka izzit ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
