Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ɛkpansi ya ɛmɛɛlnɛ bannyi ba uteepnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔnaangyɛ ppyɛɛ ɔttɛ iwopowopo immala iyyɛɛp innyi balɔɔt ba bawoopnɛyɛ.
Ɔzzànga ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɛppyɛɛnɛ emeet isam la iboong-a-laddi, nzang elebong bwa gbɔɔ, ele ka akama wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔbbaatyɛ ɛkkɔm lɔkɔɔn.
Inngwa anaam, gɔɔ mkkpa ilɔɔk kwɛ ning mung, ɔnaangyɛlɛ ssik kwa annyɔɔng. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ayangayɔng ppyɛɛ wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ule kuddu annyɔɔng.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔbbɔl. Baala usumala kɛnaang sa anaangnɛyɔng. Ɔlɔk kɛsaap sa ayɔɔnɛyɔng ka kittele sa attelenɛyɔng ikpana annyɔɔng ka Christ.
Bwa iggyannɛ gaang gaang ulenɛ kɛttɛ, ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔkɔɔm laggele za ɔyanganɛ ka luppyam ɔffɔ ka lakpeke, nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa attinanɛyɔng kɛnaang, kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.

Ba iggyan ittɛ akkpɛlɛyɔng, ɔzzànga ayilayɔng kɛbɛtɛ, abbeyɔng luppyam ka kɔlɔɔk ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka Christ, nkwaaning atɔkyɔng bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ liloko ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ nsekele la Abraham, uyim ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang kwa ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka usinɛ lile wa uggbengenɛ ɔttamɛ ammɛ, ɔdɔkɔ uyimmɛ ammɛ biini kɛyɔɔng.
Ɔttɛ, “Nyilabong nttɛ vvenɛ nnaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, nnyiwɔ bikkwu itutum ggbadam.”
Abraham ubbe luppyam, ɔtɔk bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ liloko.
Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ ka kɔlɔɔk, ɔkɔɔm lɛkɔɔl ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttamɛnɛ ammɛ biini liggbenge uyim, kiyim ’sɔng baang kɛzza ikangala ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwɛ kkpelegedee usseke balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba butɔknɛ bwa ulenɛbɛ liloko basan battɛ baala ufoolo luttina. Kwakkwɛ uyimnɛ ɔgbaa ka nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ.

Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bɛffa bile bisi lifoolo. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛlaak ba ɔnaang. Ɔzzanga ayyɔɔt ba ilenɛ kuddu ka ammɛ lɛyɛn, iyangabong kɛkkaam a luppyam sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ibwɔɔp kkpɔk ka luttina gwa balenɛyɛlɛ lɛssɛɛn mung.

Luttina ’gwɔng lulenɛ kiddumu ippyam ayyɔɔt. Aggwɛ lule ka budoddo, lule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Aggwɛ baang lukkwoongnɛ lɔsak ubba wa bafɛɛnnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat lumii ka tɔkɔlɔ labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bbwak.
Jesus uttebongyɛlɛ limii ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔkkalayɛlɛ. Mung ammɛ ussekenɛ Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang kɛfal a kɛfal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Melchizedek.
Melchizedek ’wɔng mung ɔdɔkɔnɛ ubeet a Salem. Ɔdɔkɔ Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔttanɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka Abraham ussinɛ lɛkɔɔng za ɔwwɔɔlnɛ babeet banna ɔppyɛlɛ, Melchizedek ududamɛ ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ.

Abraham ɔbɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔyanganɛ uloko lakup zzɔɔp, ɔsanga likup zzɔn unnyimɛ. (Ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk a ifɛɛt a lɛkɔɔl a Melchizedek ulenɛ “Ubeet wa Bbwak.” Ka ulenɛ ubeet wa Salem, ifɛɛt a lakɔɔl ammɛ ilɔk ilenɛ “Ubeet a Bɔkaat.”)

Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ lussimi abassɛ ɔlɔk abakka Melchizedek ba ule, ɔlɔk balɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ ba ule. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ ɛkɛtɛ bamaatmɛnɛ la ɛkɛtɛ ubbenɛ ba ule. Ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ule Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛfal a kɛfal.
Ayɛnyɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyanganɛ lakke baang ɔɔ? Abraham, Uyini itutum, ɔsanga likup a bɛfɛɛn zzɔn ka lakup a bɛfɛɛn za zzɔɔp za ɔkɔɔmnɛ ka lɛkɔɔng ɔppyɛlɛ unnyimɛ.

Balɔɔt a kikkwu a Levi ba balenɛ bassɛɛn-a-luzzɔm bassɛɛnbong Lafɔɔ battɛ balɔɔt a Israel babɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn abbɛ ka lakup zzɔɔp, basanga likup zzɔn bannyi. Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ itɔk ka balɔɔt a lɔkaan abbɛ, mkkpa abbɛ ɔgbaa bale balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham.
Melchizedek ka kikkwu a Levi ba ussi. Ɔzzanga ɔtɔk likup zzɔn ka Abraham, ɔnaangmɛ ammɛ wa ɔtɔknɛ nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ppyɛɛ.
Bɛkangala bɛlɔk ba bile, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ ppyɛɛ ɔttanɛ libbgenge ɔtta ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ ppyɛɛ.
Ka kɔlɔɔk kwa bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, likup za zzɔɔp balɔɔt ba bale babbe batɔknɛ, ɔzzànga ka kwa Melchizedek, likup za zzɔɔp ɔlɔɔt wa ikokolo ɔtɔknɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.
Ɔzzànga kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka Abraham unnyinɛ likup za zzɔɔp, Ɔlɔɔt a Levi (wa balɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ batɔknɛ likup za zzɔɔp) ɔssɛ unnyi.
Levi mɛ ba bataka bamaat, ɔzzanga ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔdɔkɔ ka kkwɔɔt Abraham uyini kikkwu ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Melchizedek ududanɛ Abraham.

Ɔdɔkɔ eleme balɔɔt a Levi, bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, kwakkwɛ bannyinɛ balɔɔt a Israel Lafɔɔ. Bulenɛ ka kɛnaang a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm a itutum a Levi kɛyyɛɛpnɛ, nzang ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔlɔk usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛggyan, wa ussinɛ ka bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba itutum a Melchizedek, usi ka Aeron lissi.
Bafoolonɛ itutum a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, vvenɛ bassɛ bafoolo lafɔɔ.
Ɔzzànga Uyini ayyɔɔt wa balɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng batum, ussi ka kikkwu kɛlɔk. Ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ ɔlɔk ba ɔtaka ɔzzánga ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
Basanbong ppwool battɛ bamaatmɛ ka kikkwu a Judah. Ɔzzanga Moses usi kikkwu ’sɔng baang lɛtala ka ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔdɔkɔ ppwool; Ɔzsɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔlɔk ɔttabong, wa ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Melchizedek.
Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm usi lɛzzanga kwa lafɔɔ za balɔɔt banaangnɛ, ɔzzanga ka lakke kuddu kwa kɔsɛlɛnɛ lakpeke.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ ale ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ka kɛfal a kɛfal, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Melchizedek ɔdɔkɔnɛ.”
Basambong batɔm a lafɔɔ baloko ka lasinɛ lɛkkaam, lale bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ.
Lafɔɔ a Moses bulɔk ba lakkwoong lanaang buyyɛɛp. Ɔzzanga gedegede mung luttina gwa doddo, gwa ile issɛ ka aggwɛ ikkɛtɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, luffubong.
Ka kɔgbaanɛ la ’kwɔng, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyim. Kɛssanga kiyim ’sɔng kisi lile ka banaangnɛ balɔɔt balɔk bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
Ɔzzanga Jesus ɔzzanga Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ka kiyim sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyimnɛ la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ebinukkpaapi eyimbong, luttina ba ɛbɛlɛ lifoolo. Vvenɛ azzánga Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm kɛfal a kɛfal.’ ”
Bubuubuu ’bwɔng buyɔɔnɛ Jesus budoddo a nlɔɔk-nloko a nsekele wa ɔttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
Bubuubuu bulɔk bule baang. Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ’bɔng bakang badɔkɔ bayipi uyipi ɔzzanga babbe, basi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong banaang kɛnaang abbɛ.
Ɔzzanga Jesus uddu kɛfal a kɛfal, ɔnaang kɛnaang ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm. Basimɛsɛ lɛsam bannyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk.
Ukkwoong mung gedegede mung gɔɔ ɛkɛtɛ duu ɔkkala balɔɔt ba bassɛnɛ ka ammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ule uddu kɛfal a kɛfal, ukkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyibɛ.
Jesus ulenɛ Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang wa iggyannɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo. Kɔlɔɔk ba ɔggyan, ammɛ ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔffata. Basammɛbong baloko zzekep ka libat basseke banaang a bubbi.

Ammɛ ba ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba labaang balɔk, lɛtɔm ba utte lɛnaang kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa bubbi ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔnaang kwa bubbi balɔɔt balɔk. Ɔnaang lɛtɔm zzɔn kɔsaal ka ɔsammɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyi ɔttɛ banaang bigwugwulu.

Lafɔɔ a Moses lassang balɔɔt ba basinɛ badoddo lile, bazzanga Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba labaang. Ɔzzànga nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kiyim sa uyimnɛ ka lafɔɔ lalenɛ liffu kɛsanganɛ Awaan, wa ulenɛ lɛnaang ɔyyɛɛp ɔffata kɛfal a kɛfal.
Mung ulenɛ ɛtɔk a kɔlɔɔk ya ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ iyanga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ’wɔng mung, wa ɔtaanɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat.
Ɔnaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak ka tɔkɔlɔ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa usinɛ balɔɔt lile banaangnɛ, ule Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ.

Lutini Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang la vvɔn basangamɛ battɛ ɔkɔɔm lɛkɔmɔlɔ ɔnaang lɛsɔɔk unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzànga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ayyɔɔt vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyanga bɔfɛɛn bwa ule ɔkɔɔm ɔnaang lɛsɔɔk unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ulenɛ ka ulenɛ ka ɛkpansi nzang ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm baala ɔzzanga ffet a ffet, ka bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm balɔk balenɛ baang ka banaangnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lasɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ a balɔɔt Jews lalɔɔknɛ.

Kɛnaang sa banaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm kile ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Kule ikete la kuyeeng a kɔlɔɔk kwa kulenɛ ka libat. Kule kɛssanga ssɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ la Moses. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔttɛ ɔbɔɔk Ggwoon, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Asan anaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛssanga ssɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bya nyɔɔwɔnɛ ka libat a lɛttaal.”

Ɔzzanga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ mung, Jesus bannyimɛbong kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm sa kɛttanɛ sa abbɛ liggbenge, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ɔbɛtɛnɛ ka kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt la Ebinukkpaapi sa kilenɛ sa doddo kitum nsekele wa bɛfɛɛn bya doddo.
Bulɔk búsinɛ̀ lɛnaang la kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng ikeeng nzang kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ kɛlɔk isi lɛbɛlɛ lɛggyan.
Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɛn kwa balɔɔt ammɛ banaangnɛ kɔbbɔl ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɛtɔm bile ka biffunɛ, vvenɛ nnaang ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ la balɔɔt a Israel la kikkwu Judah.

Vvenɛ baala kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa nnaangnɛ la balɔɔt abbɛ ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ka kɛtɔm sa nsanganɛbɛ bagbata ka ɛkpansi Egypt. Basi lɛnaang kwa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa nnaangnɛ la abbɛ kɛlɔɔknɛ. Ɔzzánga Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔk ɛttɛ, Kwa abbɛ nsi lɛgɔpɔlɔ.”

Uyini ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Gedegede mung uwɔng ulenɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa nle ka nbɛtɛnɛ la balɔɔt Israel, Ka ussoonɛ vvenɛ nnaang Lafɔɔ nssɛɛnbɛ ka ittina, nkkpɔkzɛ ka ippyam abbɛ, Vvenɛ nzzanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ. Abbɛ bazzanga balɔɔt anaam.
Ɔlɔɔt ba ule wa ule ukopolo ɔlɔɔt a lɛffɛ ammɛ, ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt a lɔkaan ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Asan Uyini.’ Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ vvenɛ basannɛ ka ussinɛ ka bwɔɔn ba sɛkɛsɛkɛ umii ɔffɔ ka ba labaang.
Vvenɛ babbenɛ-lɛttɔ ka akama abbɛ. Bubbi abbɛ vvenɛ ba nbɛlɛ likke ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.”
Ilɔɔknɛ kwa ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbong kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng kisseke ɔtɔm a bɔfɛɛn. Bɔfɛɛn la bbwɔn bwa bukkpɛɛmnɛ busi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyyɛɛp, vvenɛ butaak lɛkɔɔl.
Kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng-ikeeng kɛyanga eleme ya kɛzɔɔm a luzɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ ɛfɛɛn a kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm ɔgbaa.
Banaang Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Tɔkɔlɔ ammɛ, otinika ule baang la okkpokolo la kazzi kwa bannyinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ka tɔkɔlɔ Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata ’wɔng baang, ubba ule baang ka battanɛ bazza. Ka isimi ubba ’wɔng baang, Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata ɔlɔk ule baang wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak.

Ka tɔkɔlɔ azzɛ, okkpokolo wa banaagnmɛnɛ la gold ule baang wa kɛfɔɔp a bɛfɛɛn. Likulu kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ lile gold a gold ka bavvoongnɛzɛ. Ka likulu ’zɔng baang bilim a gold bile baang ka tɔkɔlɔ azzɛ la Manna ka tɔkɔlɔ, la lukut Aaron gwa lulenɛ lɛppwɔɔt, la lattaal laffa la Lafɔɔ ka bakkpɔknɛ ka kkwɔɔt azzɛ.

Ka libat a likulu ’zɔng baang, ilɔɔp iffa ile baang ka banaangnɛyɛ la biyekele iyaala ivvoong ka ɛfɛɛn a bataanɛ basɔɔk balɔɔt bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ebinukkpaapi abbɛ. Gedegede mung ɛkɛtɛ bbwak ba ele ya kɛbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk la kkwɔn kɔsaal.
Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung. Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm batta ka ssala kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bamii banaang kɛnaang abbɛ ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ɔzzànga ule Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang keem ka umiinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon a luzɔɔm ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm. Ɔzzànga umii kimii ssɔn ka kukkpa. Ɔsam linnyi ɔkɔɔm ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bbwak ka lutini bubbi ammɛ biini la bubbi bwa balɔɔt banaangnɛ basi lɛsan.

Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kukopolo ppwool ppwool kutum lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ za balenɛ litini, kɔttɛ ɛtɔk ya emiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bbwak ba ɛtaka ewongolo ka labun za vveeng latiinɛ baang ka labeenɛ.

Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa butaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔlɔɔk kwa gedegede mung. Kule kɔttɛ lasɔɔk za bakɔɔmnɛ lakɔmɔlɔ banaang latɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba lakkwoong lanaang ippyam a balɔɔt ba bazɔɔmnɛ luzɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iyyɛɛp.
Lasɔɔk ’zɔng baang la kɛkɔɔm a lakɔmɔlɔ kɛnaang latɔm kɔbɛtɛbyɛ kwa kazzi, la kɛvva la kikup-a-laggbo. Uwɔng lafɔɔ a vveeng. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛtaa bɛkat ɛkɛtɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔlɔngɔlɔbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ɔzzànga Christ uffubong ɔ̀zzángá Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka bɛfɛɛn bya doddo bya bɛggbanɛ mung lissi bile. Ggwoon gwa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang lule gwa lɛbaang, lɔyyɛɛp lɔsak, ɔlɔɔt lissi ɔnaangnɛ gwɛ; gɔɔ ka vveeng ’wɔng mung lissi.

Christ ka ɔmalnɛ Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak ka kikkpit ssɔn kɔsaal. Linnyi ɛbal ɔlɔk linnyi ɔgɔdɔ usi lɛkɔɔm umii ɔnaang lɛtɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm linnyi ammɛ biini ɔtɔk kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal unnyiyɛlɛ.
Ballɔtnɛ balɔɔt a laggbo ka kkwɔɔt linnyi ɛbal la linnyi ulam ɔgɔdɔ la littɔɔng a bitook ɔgɔdɔ, laggbo lakkpɔlɔbɛ ka kkwɔɔt, bappyɛlɛ bayyɛɛp.

Nkwɔng ka kɔggbanɛ lissi kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, linnyi a Christ vvenɛ likkaam lisak ning baang. Ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛtɔm za bbwak. Linnyi ammɛ vvenɛ linaang ippyam ayyɔɔt igbata isseke babbu linaang, ippyɛɛ innyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu latele.

Kwakkwɛ Christ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa utininɛ kwa Ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ, nkwaaning balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ batɔk ppyɛɛ wa kɛfal a kɛfal wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lisekele. Nkwɔng kule kɔnaang ka lubbe lulenɛ baang lile gwa lɔkkalanɛ balɔɔt ka babbu lilɔɔk sa banaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya batiinɛ ka kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɔknɛ lɛkɔɔl ɔlɔɔt wa ule uzzi bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ka ule ubbe, babɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ batakabong basan battɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkpɔknɛ ubbebong, bɛfɛɛn ba basam bannyi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang.
Luvva ’gwɔng baag ka kukkaam ba lule ɔtakabong ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkpɔknɛgwɛ ubbenɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya utiinɛ ikokolo ɔlɔɔt ba ule wa ule ukkwoong ɔkɔɔmgwɛ ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn bya ulenɛ lisekele.
Kwakkwɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng kɛyyɛɛpnɛ ka bakɔɔmnɛ linnyi babɛtɛsɛ.
Ka ikeeng, Moses ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt Lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalenɛ. Ɔsam linnyi kitook-ɔgɔdɔ utoolo la bannyi ɔsam kɛzafɔk a kɛssɛ la kɛfaak ubba ɔyan ka linnyi ’sɔng baang ɔmmyang balɔɔt.
Ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ linnyi sa linaangnɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ ateleyɔng kɛyyɛɛp.”
Kɔssɛ kule ning baang. Moses ɔgbaa ɔssɛ ɔnaang linnyi ɔllɔt ka ggwoon la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bakɔɔmnɛ bassɛɛn luzɔɔm.
Kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ, utini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔɔm linnyi banaangbwɛ buyyɛɛp; bubbi bule ka kɛsɔɔk ka linnyi lillɔtnɛ.
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bya bilenɛ ikete bɛfɛɛn bya libat bale banaang byɛ bɛyyɛɛp ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng. Ɔzzànga bɛfɛɛn bya libat biini bɛggyan lɛtɔm za lɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
Christ usi limii ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za balɔɔt banaangnɛ. Za balɔɔt banaangnɛ lalenɛ ikete Labun za bbwak. Umii ka libat biini ka ɛfɛɛn a ubeenɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalayɛlɛ.
Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews wa lɛbaang umii ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kikkpit ssɔn ka kukkpa la linnyi ɛsɛɛn. Ɔzzànga Christ usi limii ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyi ka kikkpit ggbadam.

Nzang vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama bikkpit ggbadam ka ussinɛ ka lutte a vveeng ’wɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng uffubong kikkpit ssɔn kɔsaal ka ɛkɛtɛ bɛkkpa ɔkkpɛlɛ bile ka bɛkkɛtɛnɛ lakpeke. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm kɛyɛn akama ammɛ ɔkkpɔlɔ bubbi balɔɔt.
Lutini ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn vvenɛ ubbe kikkpit ssɔn tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaal kɛkaal ammɛ.

Christ ɔgbaa bassɛ basammɛ banaang lɛtɔm ka kikkpit ssɔn nkwaaning ɔkkpɔlɔ bubbi balɔɔt ggbadam. Vvenɛ ɔbbal kikkpit kɛlɔk liffu, ɔzzànga kwa kɔlɔɔk a bubbi ba uffu, uffu kwa kɛkkala balɔɔt ba bataanɛ bakatmɛ.

Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews lissi lalenɛ iyɔɔ bɛfɛɛn bya bbwak. Ule gbɔɔ kɛyɔɔ bɛfɛɛn bya bile bɛnaang ka lusso. Banaang kɛssanga lɛtɔm ’zɔng baang zzɔn la kukkpa la kukkpa yoyyoyyo. Lafɔɔ lale lanaang nang lakɔɔm latɔm lanaang balɔɔt ba baffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayyɛɛp baffata?
Balɔɔt ba batelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bulenɛ lɛyyɛɛp nzang bɛ ba ɔwwɛɛk kwa bubbi bwa banaangnɛ. Gɔɔ nzang kɛnaang a latɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ kittun.
Nkkpa kɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ baang, latɔm ’zɔng baang ule kikke balɔɔt bubbi abbɛ la kukkpa la kukkpa.
Linnyi igɔdɔ la sa ibal ba likkwoong likkpɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ.
Kwakkwɛ baang Christ ɔlɔɔknɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ule ka uffunɛ ka vveeng ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ba aggyan kɛnaang a latɔm la bigwugwulu, Ɔzzànga alɔngɔlɔbong kkwɔɔt annyinɛ.
Wɔ ba kɔsaap ka bafɔɔpnɛ uwɔlɔlɔ ɛsɛɛn ka labun a luzɔɔm. Gɔɔ bigwugwulu bya banaangnɛ bɛzzaa bubbi wa ba bɛsaap.
Ɔzzánga nlɔɔk nttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm yɛnnɛ mung ka nbeenɛ nttɛ nnaang bwa aggyannɛ attɛ nnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ lɛkkpɔk ka luvva Lafɔɔ tɛ.’ ”

Ɔlɔɔk ka ikeeng ɔttɛ, “Bigwugwulu la latɔm wɔ ba bɛsaap, gɔɔ kɛfɔɔp isɛɛn ka labun a luzɔɔm la bigwugwulu bya bɛzzaanɛ bubbi.” Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung tɔttɔt mkkpa ɔsan ɔttɛ bigwugwulu bya banaangnɛ, banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ.
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, yɛnnɛ mung, nle ka nnaangnɛ bwa aggyannɛ attɛ nnaang tɛ.” Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam batɔm a latɔm ɔzzɔɔk, ɔsam ufaa lɛtɔm wa Christ ɔppyɛlɛ uloko ka ɛfɛɛn a za ɔtɔm.
Jesus ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyanmɛnɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ɔzzaabong bubbi ayyɔɔt ka bigwugwulu bya ɔnaangnɛ la linnyi ammɛ unnyiyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn kɔsaal.
Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews la vvɔn ɔnaang kɛnaang ’sɔng mung la bigwugwulu ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm. Ɔzzànga bigwugwulu ’byɔng baang ba bikkwoong bikkpɔlɔ bubbi bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ.
Christ ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang bigwugwulu bubbi kikkpit ssɔn kɔsaal, bɛyyɛɛp yoyyoyyo, ammɛ umii ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Bakang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a ɔtaanɛ ɔkat ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ammɛ ulokomɛ ɔtaa using bukkpɔ.
Ka bigwugwulu ’byɔng baang bbyɔn, ɔnaangbong balɔɔt ba balenɛ bubbi abbɛ lɛkkpɔlɔ bayyɛɛp baffata kɛfal a kɛfal.
Kuyeeng ɔgbaa kɔlɔɔk kubee la Christ. Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, kɔttɛ,
“Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa nle nnaang la abbɛ ka ussoonɛ, Vvenɛ nssɛɛnbɛ lafɔɔ anaam ka ippyam, nkkpɔkbɛzɛ ka ittina.”
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ “Ba nbɛlɛ likke bubbi abbɛ la babbu linaang abbɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.”
Ulenɛbɛ ’kwɔng lɛsɔɔk, bigwugwulu bya bile bɛkkpɔlɔ balɔɔt bubbi bwa banaangnɛ ba babɛlɛ lɛggyan.
Ikpana anaam, iyangayɔngbong kufuk kwa kɛmal ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak ka ussinɛ ka lubbe gwa Christ ubbenɛ.
Uwongolobong ufaa ɛtɔk ulokoyɛlɛ, ɛtɔk a kuddu ya ɛsaknɛ ubba lusso Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak. Ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang elenɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
Iyangayɔngbong ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang wa ulenɛ ka kizzi lɛttɔ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ittɔm ikkɛtɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la luppyam gwa doddo la kiyila, la luttina gwa ilenɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛtta, la kkwɔɔt sa balenɛyɛlɛsɛ lɛzzaa ka bannyi Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ikɔɔm kiyila sa iyanganɛ kkpɔk ka kwa ikopolonɛ, ka isannɛ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uloko nsekele ammɛ.
Ittinayɔng kwa ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn, iyaamyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn, iyɔɔyɔng kɛsaap ka kɛnaang a budoddo.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikkyaayɔng eleme ya kiduda ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ifɔngɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk balenɛ lɛnaang. Lutini ’gwɔng ibba ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn bikɔɔm, gaang gaang ka asannɛ attɛyɔng Kɛtɔm-Uyini ule ka uffunɛ kɛkkɛtɛbong.
Bigwugwulu bɛlɔk ba babɛlɛ lile bya bile bɛkkpɔlɔ bubbi ayyɔɔt, ikongonɛ lukongo inaang bubbi ka balenɛyɛlɛ lɔkkwɔɔn lɛbwɔɔlɔ.
Lutini ’gwɔng, kwa kussekenɛ ule ka kwa kule kɔnaang kɔbwɔpɔnɛyɛlɛ: Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa kɛkaal la lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔbbɔlnɛ, gwa lule lɔbɛpɛ balɔɔt ba bafimnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ufimnɛ kwa lafɔɔ Moses vvenɛ ubbe, kibbe-lɛttɔ ba kile, balɔɔt baffa ɔlɔk bakkyaat ba balenɛ ittɛɛsɛ annɔ, balenɛ lɛttɛ kɔbbɔlwɔbong.

Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule kɔbbɔlmɛ nang? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ linnyi kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ bɛɛ? Kule kɔbbɔlmɛ nang? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkpɛnnɛ Kuyeeng kwa kɔsɔɔknɛ bubbi bɛɛ? Kule kɔbbɔlmɛ nang? Attina kɛssanga akama wa ule ɔyɛn.
Isan mung ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ npipili, vvenɛ nppyɛlɛbɛ.” la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini vvenɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ammɛ.”
Ule kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ lɔbbɔl kɔsak ka attɔnɛ ka kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu.

Akke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ kɔnaangwɔyɔng ka isimi. Ka bɛtɔm bya isimi ka buppwolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bulenɛ lippwolo buvvoongwɔyɔng, ayɛnyɔng akama ka lilɔɔk ggbadam, ɔzzànga gɔɔ akama ’wɔng baang usiwɔyɔng lɛbɛtɛ.
Bakpɛnwɔyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk kkpal ka lusso balɔɔt, banaangwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bbɔlbbɔl. Ɔzzànga abamayɔng kɛmal tɔttɔt ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛbɛ bbɔlbbɔl.
Atulyɔng akama balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ayɛnyɔng. Ka bannaawɔnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ayɛnyɔng akama la laggele ka asannɛ attɛyɔng atii ka ale ayangayɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa buttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛfal a kɛfal.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkyaayɔng ntɛtɛ afɔngɔyɔng. Kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng, lɛsɔɔk za lɛbaang lile baang ka akkwɛ.
Abbeyɔng luppyam anaangyɔng kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nkwaaning atɔkyɔng bwa ulenɛ lisekele.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ɛmmɛnɛ ssup, ammɛ wa ulenɛ ka kiffu, ɛkɛtɛ baala ɔbɛpɛ.
Balɔɔt anaam ba doddo vvenɛ bayanga kiyila baddu, ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbbalnɛ kiyila lisi lɛyanga baala kɔsaapnɛ la ammɛ.”
Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba iyanganɛ kiyila kkpal ikkyaa ifɔngɔ ile lɛtaak lissi, lutini ’gwɔng ikɔɔm kiyila kkpɔk kɛkkalayɛlɛ.
Kɛyanga kiyila ulenɛ kɛssɛɛn a kɔlɔɔk kwa ittinanɛ itum ka luppyam mkkpa isikwɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn.
Balɔɔt iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ bakɔɔm kiyila bayanga kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ikɔɔm kiyila isan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl ɔnaang ɛkpansi. Bɛfɛɛn bya iyɛnnɛ mung ɔkɔɔm bɔfɛɛn bwa isinɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn ɔnaang.

Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Abel ɔnaang lɛtɔm za doddo unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtta Cain. Ka ussinɛ ka kiyila ammɛ ɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsɔɔk ammɛ lɛtɔk. Abel ka ɔyanganɛ kiyila, utii baang ka ɔlɔɔknɛ mkkpa ule libbe.

Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Enoch usi libbe. Lutini ’gwɔng, badɔkɔ basammɛ bafee Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyɛnnɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ usi lile, ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ lɛsam umii ka libat. Luvva lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam Enoch umii ka libat, Enoch ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ba ule. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyanga kiyila ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule baang, ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt ba baggyanmɛnɛ bɛfɛɛn.

Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Noah ɔgɔpɔlɔ nttama Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utum bɛfɛɛn bya bile bɛnaang ka lusso ɔtakabyɛ lɛyɛn. Utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔnaang akkpaat wa ammɛ la itutum ammɛ bamalnɛ bataa ka kuddu. Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng mung unnyi vveeng kibbi. Ɔtɔk budoddo ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka kiyila.
Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Abraham utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ ɔttɛ umii ka ɛkpansi ya ammɛ ulenɛ lɛttɛ vvenɛ unnyimɛ. Ɔgbata lɔkaan ammɛ ɔkɔngɔ umii ka ɛfɛɛn a usinɛ lɛsan.
Ɔtaa ka ɛkpansi ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛttɛ vvenɛ unnyimɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukekeen ka kiyila ammɛ. Ɔtaa ka bwaan a ssoon la Isaac la Jacob ba bassɛnɛ batɔk nsekele wa ussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Abraham ɔdɔkɔ ɔkat lɛffɛ za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang lɛyyɛɛp. Azzɛ za lilenɛ la lutte gwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Abraham ɔfɔɔn waan ɔ̀zzánga abassɛ waan ammɛ, mkkpa ndɔk ule lɛkkpɛɛm, avva Sarah usi wa lɛmaat lɛbɛlɛ lile. Uyila ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uloko nsekele ammɛ.

Mkkpandɔk ɔdɔkɔ ule lɛkkpɛɛm gaang gaang, ka ussinɛ ka ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn, balɔɔt itutum ammɛ bayipi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan ittuma ka lukpaaggbeede. Bayipi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kususuk kwa isinɛ likkwoong ikkwoon ka lɔyɔngɔ.

Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ babbe la kiyila. Basi lɛtɔk bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ. Ɔzzànga babee fulufulu bayɛn bakang. Bawomobyɛ, babwɔɔlɔ ppwool ppwool battɛ abbɛ bakekeen la bamma-lilɔɔk baffu ka vveeng ’wɔng.
Balɔɔt ba batolonɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung babwɔɔlɔ ppwool battɛ badɔkɔ ka kɛggyan a lɔkaan gwa abbɛ biini.
Basi lɛbɛlɛ littina batum lɛffɛ za bagbatanɛ ka azzɛ, battinanɛ batumzɛ nzang vvenɛ bappyɛlɛ isimisimi.
Badɔkɔ baggyan lɔkaan gwa doddo, lɔkaan gwa lulenɛ ka libat. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm izzit isimɛ lɛnaang ka bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ, ka ulenɛ killu lɛnaang ulokobɛ.

Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Abraham ɔttɛ ɔsam waan ammɛ Isaac ɔnaang bigwugwulu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔllɛmɛnɛ. Abraham ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛ nsekele la ammɛ, ɔzzánga ɔbama ɔsam waan ammɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang bigwugwulu.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔkbong la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ale akɔɔm Isaac ayanga balɔɔt ka kikkwu annɔ.”
Abraham ɔsan ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ufungala Isaac ka lubbe. Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, Abraham ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtɔk Isaac ka lùbbe.
Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Isaac uyila kamma ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang Jacob la Esau ppyɛɛ.
Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Jacob ɔnaang waan a Joseph la vvɔn ppyɛɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ubbe. Ubee ning utele lɛttɔ ka lukut ammɛ ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Joseph ɔlɔɔk utum kɛgbata balɔɔt a Israel ka Egypt. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaang la bɛkɔp ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ubbe.
Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ abassɛ a Moses la abakka basammɛ balup ka ittuma ikkyaat ka ɛkɛtɛ bamaatmɛnɛ. Bayɛnnɛ battɛ ule waan wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ, basi kɛbɛpɛ lafɔɔ ubeet lɛmma.
Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Moses ufim ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bakkwɔɔmɛ batum ka waan a Pharoah wa wanavva ka ɛkɛtɛ ulenɛ liggbenge.
Kɛyɛn akama la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛsaapmɛ kɛtta kɛkɔɔm a bubbi kittele kippe ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup.
Ɔsan ɔttɛ kɛyɛn akama la izzit ka lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ kɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛtta iyyɛɛp a balɔɔt a Egypt ka utelenɛ zzeen ka lɛsɔɔk za lusso.
Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Moses ɔgbata ka Egypt usi lɛmma kwa kutunnɛ ubeet. Ka isimi usi lɛppyɛɛk, ayɛnnɛ attɛ ɔyɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa asinɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn.
Kiyila kɛnaangmɛnɛ utte Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, ɔttɛ balɔɔt bammyɔng linnyi ka ikkpelekku-lamma ssoon, nkwaaning Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi bakɔɔm-ɛtɔk a bwɔɔn ba balɔɔt a Israel bafɔɔnnɛ lɛwwɔɔl.
Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ balɔɔt a Israel bakum Ukolo-lɔyɔngɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassɛnɛ ka lisse sa gbɔɔ. Balɔɔt Egypt battɛ baffu bakum, bannyi bamɛɛlbɛ.
Ɔdɔkɔ kiyila kɛnaangnɛ kɛbat a Jericho kɛttɔ ka balɔɔt a Israel balenɛ lɛssɛ bakkpitsɛ ka bɛtɔm bɛnnambɛkkyaat.
Kiyila kɛkkalanɛ Rahab wa àkkpàlà basimɛ lɛssɛ bawwɔɔl la balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, ka ɔtɔknɛ bakoolo-ɛfɛɛn ɔssɛɛn ka ssala.
Nlɔɔk tɔttɔt ɔɔ? Ɛkɛtɛ ba ɛbɛlɛ lile ya nle nlɔɔk ntum Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David, Samuel la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Bakɔɔm kiyila ballu la lɔkaan uwɔlɔlɔ babɛtɛ. Banaang kwa bbwak batɔk bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lisekele. Bavvoong kamma lanngwing.
Bazum lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛ gaang gaang. Basɛɛm lubbe ogge. Badɔkɔ bakkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bakkaam; bakkaam ka lɛkɔɔng, babɛtɛ isɔgya ikaan ilɔk.
Ka kiyila sa bwanavva bayanganɛ, bafungala babbu abbɛ bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu. Balɔk ba bafimnɛ ikkala babbe nkwaaning bafungala bataa ka kuddu kwa doddo.
Batup balɔk, banaang balɔk bɛfɛɛn izzit, baggbɔ balɔk izzi, basambɛ bassɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ.
Batɔɔpbɛ lattaal, bafakabɛ bɛfaak bɛffa, bawwɔɔlbɛ la ogge. Bakwula ikkpa-isɛɛn la ikkpa-itɔɔn bassɛ bakkpit, ɔbbɔlbɛ, bayɛn akama basibɛ doddo lɛppyɛɛk.
Ɛkpansi esibɛ doddo lɛsaap. Bassɛ bakkpit tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bammanɛ lɛkɔɔng ka kasɛkɛ atingating la libat a lɛttaal, ballu ka lihuk la ibbe ka tɔkɔlɔ lisse.
Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bayila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, banaang kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ usi lile.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utinibong ɛtɔk ya ɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp ulokoyɛlɛ, luttina ammɛ lulemɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaangbɛ bayyɛɛp la ayyɔɔt.

Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa ayyɔɔt mung, iyanga kibbi ittɛɛsɛ ka kikkpitnɛyɛlɛ. Ikkyaayɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bile bitunuyɛlɛ ifɔngɔ, la bubbi bwa bunnengenɛyɛlɛ ka kkwɔɔt ilaa zzeen immayɔng lɔfat gwa ilenɛ ka aggwɛ mung.

Iteleyɔng zzeen ka Jesus, wa iyanganɛ kiyila itummɛ ka ussinɛ ka lutte ɔffɔ ka lakpeke. Usi kɔlɔɔk a Cross lɛmma. Usi kwa izzit ya kibbe ka Cross littina. Ka isimi kukele, bɔwaa bwa bulenɛ bakang ka butaanɛ bukatmɛ budɛmnɛ usi littina kwa izzit ya kibbe ka cross. Gedegede mung ule ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ɔtaanɛ.
Attinayɔng akama wa ɔyɛnnɛ. Attinayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtaanɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ latun a banaang a bubbi. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ uttunwɔyɔng, ɔlɔk akkyaayɔng kiyila annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng.
Ka lubum gwa alenɛyɔng baang ka abumnɛ atumyɔng bubbi, ba ataka alluyɔng kullu aggyanyɔng lubbe.

Asumalayɔngbong lɛmmwɔɔl a lɔttama za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ la annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan ammɛ ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam, agɔpɔlɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ Ebinukkpaapi ɛbbawɔnɛ bikɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkpɛpwɔ ka luppyam ka ule ɔlɔɔkwɔ kkɔkɔlɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa ɔsaapnɛ Ebinukkpaapi, Ebinukkpaapi ɛyɔɔmɛ akama. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa ɛtɔkmɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ awaan vvenɛ ɛyɔɔmɛ akama.”

Akkaam luppyam ka akama wa ayɛnnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ akama wa ssaawɔ ɔyɔɔwɔnɛ. Kɛyɛn akama annyɔɔng kɛyɔɔnɛ kɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan ammɛ. Waan ule baang wa abassɛ ɔtakamɛnɛ akama lɛyɔɔ ɔɔ?
Usiwɔnɛyɔng akama lɛyɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyɔɔnɛ bwaan ammɛ, ba bbwak assiyɔngbong lile, annyɔɔng basɛlɛ ibassɛ balɔɔt.
Idedde ayyɔɔt ba vveeng kaang bayɔɔyɛlɛ akama ilɔngɔlɔ itelebɛ, ba attina attɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ Dedde ayyɔɔt wa libat vvenɛ itelemɛ gaang gaang ɔlɔk iddu ɔɔ?
Idedde ayyɔɔt iyɔɔyɛlɛ akama ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ, kulebɛ bbwak. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangkwɛ ka budoddo ayyɔɔt biini, nkwaaning iyanga etini budoddo ammɛ.

Bayɔɔnɛyɛlɛ akama, ɔbalyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ bukee usiyɛlɛ lɛwaa. Ɔ̀zzànga ulenɛ lɛnaang balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ kɛyɔɔ akama bakopolobɛ kɔlɔɔk, vvenɛ bayanga lɛsɔɔk a bɔllɛ lɛfal ffɛngɛm.
Atɔnɔyɔng inɛngɛnɛngɛ labɔɔk annyɔɔng ka libat annyiyɔng igbeke-gbeke laddu annyɔɔng lakke.
Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng assɛyɔng ka ɛtɔk ya bit, nkwaaning ubbu-kikkpɔ annɔ usi kinuka linuka, ɔppwasɛ.
Abum ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Abum ataayɔng ka kuddu kwa doddo. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛkwɛ, Uyini baala ɔyɛn.
Asan anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔgbata usseke ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Asan anaangyɔng, afɔngɔyɔng kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛsan a kɛssɛ za lɛkkpannɛ, lɛkɔɔm bussi azzɛ lɛggyan kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ggbadam.
Asan anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uffu ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ɔlɔk ɔsɛlɛ luttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Esau wa ɔsammɛ bigɛlɛnya ammɛ ufoolo la kazzi.

Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng gaang gaang ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ abassɛ ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔzzànga ppyɛɛ usimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile, ka usinɛ lɛsan bwa ule ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm ufoolo kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang, mkkpandɔk ɔkɔɔm liyyeen ɔggyan ppyɛɛ.
Asiyɔngbong liffu ka kwa attinanɛ atumyɔng lɛttaal a Sinai la lalaak a lɔkɔɔn azzɛ, la kisul la bukee, la kɛffa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Israel baffunɛ
la lɔsap gwa luffi lɔttanɛ la lɛmmwɔɔl a bɛfɛɛn. Balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang ka lɛttanɛ, bakkpenge battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ lɛmmwɔɔl lɛlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ azzɛ baang lippyee.
Ka basinɛ lɛbbɔ babee ɔssanga nttama wa ɔttɛnɛ, “Gɔɔ ɛsɛɛn ka kɛmat esinginɛ lɛttaal ’zɔng baang, batɔɔpyɛ lattaal bawwɔɔl.”
Biyɛnɛ bisak lɛttala, Moses ɔttɛ, “Abbwɔpɔnɛbong kiffula kɛtɔmmɛ.”
Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng affuyɔngbong ka lɛttaal a Zion, ka lɛffɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu. Azzɛ lilenɛ Jerusalem wa libat la innɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka tɔkɔlɔ.

Affuyɔngbong ka laggele kuddu bwaan-ikeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ lakɔɔl abbɛ lɛkkpɔk ka libat. Affuyɔngbong ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ ɔkaal a kɛkaal ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ, la liyeeng a banaang a budoddo.
Affuyɔngbong ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus wa utininɛ lutini ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ la kɛllɔt a linnyi ammɛ sa libwɔɔlɔnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp bɛtta kwa linnyi Abel.

Asan anaangyɔng, afɔngɔyɔng kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyiwɔyɔng kisi lɛgɔpɔlɔ. Balɔɔt ba bafimnɛ kɛgɔpɔlɔ kwa ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛ ɔssɛbibit kuttu kwa doddo, basi lɛsɛɛm ka lubbe. Ayyɔɔt ile inaang nang itta ka akkwɛ ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn isinɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka libat ɔlɔɔknɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ vvenɛ lɛnnyɛkɛ ɛkpansi ka ɛkɛtɛ yɔng baang. Ɔnaangbong nsekele ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nbbal ɛkpansi lɛnnyɛkɛ. Annyɛ keem lissi, vvenɛ nssɛ lɛnnyɛkɛ libat.”
Lɛmmwɔɔl za lɛttɛnɛ, “Nbbal.” ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛyɔɔnɛ ppwool ppwool lɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnnyɛkɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔlɔɔmnɛ nkwaaning bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ lɛnnyɛkɛ bɛtaa.
Iwomomɛyɔng kɛnaang ka ilenɛ itutum lɛyanga ya isinɛ lɛnnyɛkɛ. Ɔwaayɔngyɛlɛ izɔɔm innyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛtɔk ya kule kɔsaapmɛ la latele za lɛbaang a lɛbaang. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔyɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt ulenɛ lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔbɛpɛnɛ ɛfɛɛn ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ateleyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakpana ba bakupnɛ Christ.
Akke atɔkyɔng bakekeen assɛɛnyɔng ka ssala. Balɔɔt balɔk banaangbong ning kkpal batɔk bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bassɛɛn ka ssala basi lɛsan.
Akkeyɔng balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng bulenɛyɔng ka igbakkɔpɔ la abbɛ. Akkeyɔng balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng assɛnɛ aleyɔng ka akama wa bayɛnnɛ.
Killu a wanavva la ulam kile bɔfɛɛn bwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batelenɛ. Bwaanbwalam la bwanavva abbɛ bayanga kiyila batumbɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal a bassɛ-kɛzak la bakup a bwanavva balɔɔt.
Akatyɔng kɛfal annyɔɔng, ikkpoko ifɔngɔwɔyɔng gaang kɛsaap. Bwa alenɛyɔng lɛyanga buffiwɔyɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ, “Baala ngbata nkɔngɔwɔyɔng; baala nkkyaawɔyɔng nfɔngɔ.”
Ikkaamyɔng luppyam ilɔɔk ittɛyɔng, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ Ɔkkala-ikkala anaam, Nɛ baala ɔbbwɔpɔ. Ɔlɔɔt ule ukkwoong ɔnaangnɛ ’bɔng?”
Akkeyɔng bazzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng ba isimi, ba babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Attinayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bataanɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babbenɛ, usseke akeetyɔng kiyila abbɛ.
Jesus Christ ule kɛssanga ssɔn, lisee, mmwɔɔn, gɔɔ yoyyoyyo.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ufaa lukopolo ɔnaangwɔyɔng agbatayɔng ka ɛtɔk ya bbwak. Kɔyyɛɛp ka ikkaamnɛ luppyam ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba kɔyyɛɛp ka itelenɛ lafɔɔ kazzi. Balɔɔt ba batelenɛ lafɔɔ kazzi bɛ ba lataka lattele.
Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ka ggwoon a luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews ba babɛlɛ lɔkkɔnɔ ba bazzinɛ kazzi kwa banaangnɛ bigwugwulu ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews wa lɛbaang ɔkɔɔm linnyi umii ka ɛfɛɛn a lafɔɔ ɔnaang bigwugwulu bya kɛkkpɔlɔ bubbi, ɔ̀zzànga isɛɛn biini bafɔɔp ka isimi a ssala.
Kwakkwɛ baang, Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔssɛ ubbe ka kɛmat nkwaaning ɔkkpɔlɔ bubbi balɔɔt la linnyi ammɛ.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt itta imii ka vveeng itaayɔng ka izzit la ammɛ.
Lɛffɛ za ile itaa ka kɛfal a kɛfal, yɛlɛ ba lile mung ka ɛkpansi, iggyan lɛffɛ za lile ka liffunɛ.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔtaayɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bigwugwulu bya issɛnɛ ka Jesus inaang ka lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma za lɛttɛnɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini.
Afɔngɔyɔng kisumala kɛnaang budoddo la kittele ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ bigwugwulu bya bɛsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ateleyɔng bazzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng, akupyɔng lafɔɔ abbɛ. Bakat ippyam annyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ gɔɔ ba bafɛkɛlɛ, ka bale bakkpele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang abbɛ. Atelenɛyɔngbɛ, vvenɛ banaang kɛnaang abbɛ la laggele. Usinɛ ning baang lile, bale banaangsɛ la bukee, ning baang baala ayangayɔng kɛyaam.
Azɔɔm annyiyɔngyɛlɛ. Isan lɔsan ittɛ iyanga luppyam gwa doddo ka iggyannɛ ittɛ inaang kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Nkpengewɔyɔngbong gaang gaang nttɛ azɔɔm annyinɛyɔng nkwaaning nppyɛlɛ nffu nkupwɔyɔng like like.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalabong Uyini ayyɔɔt, wa ulenɛ ɔkat-itɔɔn wa lɛbaang, ka lubbe gwa ubbenɛ ule kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ kɛfal a kɛfal lɛbɛtɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a bɔkaat unnyiwɔyɔng utini bɔfɛɛn duu bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ bwa aggyannɛyɔng nkwaaning anaangyɔng kɛnaang ammɛ. Ɔzzànga ikpenge ittɛ ka lakke Jesus Christ ɔnaang duu bwa busaapmɛnɛ la ayyɔɔt. Latele lataa la Christ yoyyoyyo. Kulening.
Ikpana anaam, nkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ abbeyɔng luppyam agɔpɔlɔyɔng bɔtɔɔm bwa bule bunnyiwɔyɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam. Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng za nkkpɔknɛ nfeewɔyɔng mung gaang ba lɛlɔm.
Nggyan nttɛ asan attɛyɔng basangabong ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Timothy ka igbakkɔpɔ. Ɔkkanɛ liffu vvenɛ nkɔɔmmɛ nffu ka ɛkɛtɛ nle nffu nyɛnwɔyɔng.
Awomoyɔng bazzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng, la balɔɔt Ebinukkpaapi ɔkkpɛlɛ annyiyɔngyɛlɛ. Ikpana ayyɔɔt ba bassinɛ Italy bawomowɔyɔngbong.
Numa lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lataa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka James, bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Jesus Christ, Uyini: Nwomobong isam a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm zzɔɔppiffa ya ikyakyamanɛ imii ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ikpana anaam, atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka kɛyyɛɛp a lɔfɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bɛssanga illɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bile biffu ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng.
Asan lɔsan attɛyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng kɛbɛtɛnɛ bɛssanga illɛ ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, vvenɛ ayangayɔng lakke kɛbbɔ akama.
Ɔzzànga asan attɛ ale abbɔyɔng akama ning baang tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka lakpeke. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ammayɔng akama nkwaaning ayyɛɛp asaalyɔng bulɔk asiyɔng lɛggyan.
Ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔlɔk ɔsɛlɛnɛ bikɔɔm, ɔzɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ule ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ. Ammɛ ɔsɔɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛsɔɔk ka kɛsaap usi ka isimi lɛppyɛɛk.

Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ayangayɔng kiyila ka assɛɛnnɛyɔng luzɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayangayɔng ndeeta ka luppyam. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanganɛ ndeeta ka luppyam ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛbba-bannyi za kɛffa kɛffanɛzɛ kikkpit ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu.
Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt wa ning baang ɔzzànga ɔkkala-lɛlaak. Luttina ggwɔn ba ɔyanga ka kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa ɔnaangnɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ uttina uttina ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk lɛlɔk za lissinɛ ka Uyini.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔlmɛnɛ vvenɛ uggele ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔnaangmɛ uggbenge.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpmɛnɛ ɔssɛ uggele ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔnaangmɛ ɔbbɔlmɛ ka iyyɛɛp ile isaal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo ya iyaalanɛ ka bɛssɛ ka kɛmat.

Livve-luwee lɛttanɛ la kɛfɔɔp azzɛ, luwee lutup bɛssɛ ’byɔng baang, idodo abbyɛ ikkpɛɛ ittɔ. Ɔzzánga bɔllɛ abbyɛ bubɛpɛbong. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpmɛnɛ ule ɔssɛ ubbe ning baang ka ɛkɛtɛ kɔbɛtɛmɛnɛ ka kɛnaang iyyɛɛp ammɛ.

Laggele lale za ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ kiyila lɛkkyaa ɔzzɔɔk ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk. Uggele ka ɔ̀zzànganɛ ɔttɛ ukumnɛ ka illɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ɔyanga ikipili ya ilenɛ lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ammɛ ba ɔsaapnɛbɛ.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a ballɛnɛ ɔlɔɔt la kɛssanga illɛ la duu, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔttɛ “Illɛ ’yɔng mung issi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iffu.” Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi mɛ ba bukkwoong bullɛ. Ammɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ɔllɛ.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ikkɔlɔ ubbu luppyam ammɛ idɛmmɛnɛ issɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk.
Babbu linaang ammɛ liyɛɛmnɛ limaat bubbi. Bubbi buggbengenɛ, bumaat lubbe.
Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ badɛmwɔyɔng attɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk.
Lɛsɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ za lissinɛ ka libat lile bɔfɛɛn bwa doddo. Lissi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔlɔɔmnɛ vveengodde. Eleme ammɛ ba efoolo ezuku ning.
Kussimɛ ka luppyam ɔkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔmyɛlɛ, nkwaaning ile bazzilɛttɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔlɔɔmnɛ.
Ikpana anaam, ikkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔyanga luttina gwa kɛkka kɔlɔɔk lippyee. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uttina doddo tɛ́ttɛ́ ukingi kɔlɔɔk. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔlɔɔk kɔkkamɛ litun.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kitun a kɔlɔɔk ka luppyam, baala ukkwoong ɔnaang bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang.

Akkyaayɔng babbu linaang la ibbyap ɔkkpɛlɛ afɔngɔyɔng, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ayilayɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ za ulewɔnɛyɔng ka luppyam lɛssɛɛn. Azzɛ lɛyanganɛ lakke za likkwoongnɛ lɛkkalawɔyɔng.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ addawɔyɔng kikun kɛyɔɔng ka kɛgɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ gbɔɔ. Anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛlɔɔknɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gbɔɔ usi lɛnaang kwa lɛlɔɔknɛ, ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛkmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kiyenge.
Ɔsamnɛ lɛppyɛɛk ka kiyenge, usumala eseese tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ.

Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ gbegbe kwa lifɔɔ za likkalanɛ balɔɔt, ulokozɛ doddo, usizɛ lisumala, ɔnaang kwa lifɔɔ ’zɔng baang lilɔɔknɛ, Ebinukkpaapi vvenɛ ɛnaang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ppyɛɛ ka itɔk a lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔt a luzɔɔm wa doddo ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang usinɛ lɛlaak ammɛ lɛkat, kile ka luzɔɔm sa ulenɛ kile bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, ɔddamɛ bikun kɛyɔɔng.

Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa Dedde, Ebinukkpaapi, ettinanɛ ɛttɛ akkwɛ kulenɛ luzɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn: Appyɛɛk bwɔɔntiti ba basɛlɛnɛ ibassɛ la ibakka, la bwanavva ba bwalam babbenɛ bakɔngɔ bale ka akama; Asan akɔɔmwɔ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ bɛfɛɛn a vveengodde bɛnaangwɔ abbɔl.
Ikpana anaam, ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kiyila ka Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ, wa ulenɛ Uyini lakke, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng balɔɔt buubuu akupyɔng linaang abbɛ.
Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya doddo, ɔssɛɛn waan-ɛlla gold ka kɛnnɔ uffu ka mitin annyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔlmɛnɛ ɔssɛ uffu la bissaka iwɔkɔlɔ.

Attanɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya doddo latele linnyi, attɛ, “Ataa mung ka kɛtaa sa doddo,” alɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ bissaka iwɔkɔlɔ attɛ, “Afeele abee-lubee,” ɔlɔk attɛ “Ataa mung ka lisse ka lataak anaam.”
Ning baang azzibong kibbi ka alenɛ bubuubuu litte ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ɔgbaa ka alenɛ ubbu luppyam lɛkɔɔm akaal kɛkaal.

Gɔpɔlɔyɔng, Ikpana anaam! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssang balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔnaangbɛ baggbenge ka kiyila, batɔk Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayanga. Annyɛ ya ulenɛ lisekele ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba batelemɛnɛ.
Ɔzzànga asiyɔng balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ latele linnyi! Babang bayɔɔwɔnɛyɔng akama, battuluwɔyɔng bamii ka idda kɛkaal? Balɔɔt ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ!
Abbɛ baang balenɛ balɔɔt ba balɔɔknɛ bubbi batum ubeet a lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng baang za balewɔnɛyɔng linnyi.
Vvenɛ anaangyɔng kwa kulenɛ bbwak ulenɛ ka atelenɛ lifɔɔ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, za ayɛnnɛyɔng ka luvva lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lattɛnɛ, “Wa annyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
Ulenɛ ka akɔɔmnɛ balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɛnnɛ linaang abbɛ, azzibong kibbi. Lafɔɔ vvenɛ lannyiwɔ kibbi ka alenɛ ɔbɛpɛ-lafɔɔ.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbɛpɛnɛ lifɔɔ zzɔn ɔbɛpɛbong lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt.” ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl balɔɔt.” Gɔɔ mkkpa asi wanavva ɔlɔɔt likup, alenɛ ɔlɔɔt lɛwwɔɔl azzangabong ɔbɛpɛ-lafɔɔ.
Atoloyɔng kutolo, anaangyɔng linaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba lafɔɔ za lasanganɛyɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lale lakaal kɛkaal abbɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kibbe-lɛttɔ baala ɔyanga ka kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ. Ɔzzànga kaang kibbe-lɛttɔ kɛbɛtɛnɛ kɛkaal.
Ikpana anaam, budoddo bulenɛ bɔkka abbwɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ɔyanga kiyila, linaang ammɛ lisi kiyila ’sɔng baang lɛyɔɔ? Kiyila ’sɔng baang vvenɛ kikkwoong kɛkkalamɛ ɔɔ?
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ikpana annyɔɔng baggyannɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ɔbɛtɛ la kazzi bɛɛ?
Bɔkka budoddo bwa alenɛbɛ lɛnaang ka kɛttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ! Ataayɔng bbwak azziyɔng budoddo!” –asinɛbɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya kuddu abbɛ kɔggyannɛ linnyi.
Kule ning baang la kiyila, Kiyila kilenɛ kɛyɔɔng kɛsɛlɛ linaang, nzang kibbebong.

Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyanga kiyila, wa vvɔn ɔyanga linaang.” Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma anaam kile kɛttɛ, “Ayɔɔnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ kiyila ɔsɛlɛ linaang. Vvenɛ anaam nyɔɔwɔyɔng kiyila anaam ka linaang anaam.
Ayilayɔng mung attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn keem ɔɔ? Kɔyyɛɛp mung! Babbu liyeeng lissɛ liffula ning liyila littɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn.
Annyɔɔng bakun ’bɔng. Aggyan attɛ bayɔɔwɔyɔng battɛ kiyila sa kɛsɛlɛnɛ linaang ba kɛyyɛɛp ɔɔ?
Mung ɔgɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt Abraham ɔdɔkɔ ɔtaa bbwak nang la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm? Ɔdɔkɔ ka linaang ammɛ ka ɔttɛnɛ ɔsam awaan Isaac ɔnaang bigwugwulu unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ba ayɛnyɔng ɔɔ? Kiyila ammɛ la linaang bɛnaangnɛ kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Kiyila ammɛ kɛdɔkɔ kile bbwak ka ussinɛ ka linaang ammɛ.

Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka lɔttɛnɛ, “Abraham uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka kiyila ammɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.” Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kussi ning baang bakkwɔɔ Abraham ɛnngwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Asan attɛyɔng linaang linaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kwa ɔyanganɛ kiyila utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem lissi kɔnaangmɛnɛ.

Kɔdɔkɔ kɛssanga ssɔn la Rahab, wa àkkpàla; Linaang ammɛ lidɛmmɛnɛ ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ɔtɔknɛ balɔɔt a Israel ba batɔɔmnɛbɛ battɛ bamii bakoolo ɛfɛɛn, ɔssɛɛn ka ssala uttelebɛ bassɛ ka ɛtɔk ɛlɔk bamma basɛɛm.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kkwɔɔt sa lisɛlɛnɛ kuyeeng libbenɛ, kiyila sa kɛsɛlɛnɛ linaang kɛssɛbong kibbe ning baang.
Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng azzangayɔng bakopolo-lukopolo. Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔtta kɛkaal sa ayyɔɔt, bakopolo-lukopolo, lɛssɛɛn ɔtta sa balɔɔt balɔk.
Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt itaa-lɔtaa isɛpɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔtakanɛ lɛsɛpɛ ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ukkwoong lukkwoong ɔkɔɔm lɛfal ammɛ.
Issɛɛn eyim luzzi ka kamma nkwaaning eteleyɛlɛ, ikkwoong inaangyɛ emii ka ɛfɛɛn iggyannɛ ittɛ emii.
Attina kwa akkpaat wa lɛbaang: Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uggbengenɛ baang, kɛffa kikkwoong mung kɛffamɛ. Akkwoong mung asikilimɛ la waan a bissɛ ning umii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɔwaat-ɔwaat ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ umii.

Kule ning baang la lɛlaak, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lissupnɛ baang, likkwoong mung lɛnaang kamma litum bɛfɛɛn bya lɛbaang. Attina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan a lɛlaak a lɔkɔɔn ssup ning ukkwoongnɛ ɔssɛɛn lɛkɔɔt za lɛbaang a lɛbaang lɛkkɔm!

Lɛlaak lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn. Azzɛ lilenɛ ɛkpansi bubbi ya elenɛyɛlɛ ka kkwɔɔt, ɛnaang bubbi buwaala kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Lɛkɔɔm lɔkɔɔn gwa lussinɛ ka Hell biini luffu lukupzɛ lɛssɛɛn kɛfal ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛkkɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt ukkwoong mung ɔbɛtɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ. Ɔbɛtɛbong isɛɛn ka kɛmat la bunɔɔn la izzɔkɔ ɔbɛtɛ la isɛɛnabannyi.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔbɛtɛ lɛlaak ba ule. Lɛyanga ibbyap. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoong ɔkatzɛ ba ule. Lɛyanga bussi lubbe lubbe.
Ikɔɔmzɛ azzɛ iwomo Dedde Uyini Ayyɔɔt kɛnaang. Ikɔɔmzɛ azzɛ ɔgbaa izɔɔm wayyɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔbalmɛ ammɛ biini.
Lɛmmwɔɔl za kiwomo kɛnaang la lɛmmwɔɔl za kɛzɔɔm wannyɔɔng bissi ka kamma kkwɔn. Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ’kwɔng kɔnaang.
Lubbebannyi gwa lussinɛ bannyi ba baggwoomnɛ la bannyi ba bakkpannɛ ka lɛmma zzɔn ba lule.
Ikpana anaam, ɛkɔɔng ya ɛwɔmnɛ lakkpo manggolo ba ele. Manggolo wa ɔwɔmnɛ lakkpo ɛkɔɔng ba ule. Lubbe-bunɔk bannyi ba doddo ba lukkwoong lussi.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng wa ɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk, ukkwoong uppyeekwɛ doddo ɔɔ? Ulenɛ baang, ɔyɔɔ kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ka lɛfal ammɛ za doddo, ka linaang a bukee-waan la kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk.
Ɔzzànga ayanganɛ luleep la kitun-a-kɔlɔɔk, la kɛssɔp-a-bɔfɛɛn ka luppyam annɔ, ɔfɔngɔ kɛkkyaa anaang kamma atum lɔkkwɔɔn-a-kɔlɔɔk.
Kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng mung ka libat mɛ ba kissi, kile sa ɛkpansi, sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi, sa ubbu.
Ɛfɛɛn a luleep ɔlɔk kɛssɔp a bɔfɛɛn kilenɛ, kɔwɔlɔ la bubbi bussɛ bule baang.

Ɔzzànga bisana pya bissinɛ ka libat biyyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp bisak. Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, biyanga bɔkaat ɔgbaa la kibbe-luppyam la bunngwa, bile akama akama ɔzzànga appyɛ bimaatnɛ linaang sa doddo. Lɔgbɛɛk ba lule la kɛkkala-lɛlaak.
Budoddo bulenɛ liyaat ayyɔɔt sa lissinɛ ka ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya baggyan a bɔkaat bakɔɔnnɛ.
Kullu la kɔwɔlɔ ’kwɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng bissi yang? Bissi ka kusapa ladoddo za lalenɛ baang ka kullu ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Aggyanyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔzzànga ba akkwoong ayangayɔngbwɛ, kwakkwɛ assekenɛ ka aggyannɛyɔng kɛwwɔɔl. Bɛfɛɛn bɛsaapwɔyɔng ɔ̀zzànga ba ayɛnyɔngbyɛ, ɔ̀zzánga awɔlɔyɔng akɔɔm alluyɔng. Baala ayangayɔng bwa aggyannɛyɔng ka asinɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛbap.
Abapnɛyɔng, baala ayɛnyɔng bwɛ, ka linaang annyɔɔng libbɔlnɛ. Abapyɔng kwa bɛfɛɛn bya binnyiwɔnɛyɔng laggele.

Basɛlɛ kiyila balɔɔt ’bɔng! Ba asan attɛyɔng alenɛyɔng ɛnngwa vveeng ’wɔng, aleyɔng balɔɔt a kɔfɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ ɛnngwa vveengodde, ɔnaangmɛbong kɛyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛyɔng luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔkkwɔɔn ba lɔlɔɔk ka lɔttɛnɛ, “Luppyam gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛyɛlɛ ka kkwɔɔt lɔyanga kusapa kwa lɛbaang.”

Ɔzzànga lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛyɛlɛ lattanɛ lɛkkaam. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufim balɔɔt ba basaapnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔnaang balɔɔt ba batɔknɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng ka bukeewaan ppyɛɛ.”
Kule ning baang ayilayɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Afimnɛyɔng kwa Ubbu, vvenɛ ɔmma ussekewɔyɔng.
Attɔm akkɛtɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ammɛ vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛwɔyɔng. Ayilayɔng labɔɔk, annyɔɔng banaang-a-bubbi. Azzaayɔng ippyam annyɔɔng, annyɔɔng banaang-a-lalaak.
Bukee bunaangwɔyɔng, akɔɔm akkwayɔng, amanyɔng, asikiliyɔng kɛsɛɛk annyɔɔng usseke kullu, laggele annyɔɔng lasseke bukee.
Akunyɔng laddu ka lusso Uyini, vvenɛ ɔlɔmwɔyɔng ufeele.

Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akpɛnyɔng ba annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkpɛnnɛ ɔkpana wa ukupnɛ Christ ɔlɔk unnyimɛ kibbi, ɔkpɛnbong Lafɔɔ unnyizɛ kibbi ɔgbaa. Annyinɛ Lafɔɔ kibbi nzang asibong ɔlɔɔt wa utelenɛzɛ lile, asseke ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛzɛ kibbi.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛ lafɔɔ ɔbbal ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal lile. Ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔkkala ɔfɔngɔ, ukkwoong ɔbɛpɛ. Attina attɛ annɔ alenɛ nnyinɔɔng wa annyinɛ wannyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt kibbi?
Agɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng gedegede mung, annyɔɔng ba alɔɔknɛ attɛyɔng, “Mmwɔɔn ɔlɔk lufat vvenɛ imii ka lɛffɛ lɛlɔk, ka ɛfɛɛn ile itaa ka kukkpa, inaang kɛnaang, iyanga ikkpoko ggbadam.”
Ba asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛfal annyɔɔng lile lile lufat. Ale yɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kibut sa ayɛnnɛyɔng lɔfɔm, kikoon kisi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
Kwa ale alɔɔkyɔng ulenɛ ’kwɔng! “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔsaapmɛnɛ vvenɛ iddu inaang ’bwɔng ɔlɔk ’bwɔng kang.”
Gedegede mung ɔkkyaawɔyɔng lɔkkyaa, anaangyɔng kamma, Kɛnaang a kamma ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bbwak ba kile.
Kule ning baang, ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lɛnaang kwa ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaangnɛ kɔyyɛɛp mung, ɔnaangbong bubbi.
Balɔɔt iyyɛɛp, gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Akkwa attɔlyɔng layilili ka akama wa ale ka ayɛnnɛyɔng.
Iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng iddɔlɔbong isaal. Bisili bizzibong ibba annyɔɔng bivve.

Gold annyɔɔng la silver bittelebong itilikɔɔt. Itilikɔɔt ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ibee ittɛɛsɛ ittɛ issɛɛnwɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk. Vvenɛ ibee bbwak izziwɔyɔng ɛkkpakkwɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn. Afaanyɔngbong iyyɛɛp ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke ’byɔng mung.

Ba ataka akipiliyɔng balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ka itɔɔm annyɔng. Agɔpɔlɔyɔng ibwɔɔlɔ ya babwɔɔlɔnɛ. Kullu kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ka itɔɔm annyɔɔng bakkwanɛ kɔffɔbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Uyini wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Lafal annyɔɔng ka ɛkpansi laggba lissi lale za kizzi ladoddo la kɛtaa ka laggele. Azzibong aggbengeyɔng ka kɛtɔm sa bale bawwɔɔlwɔyɔng.
Annyiyɔng balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwɛ lɛsan kibbi, awwɔɔlyɔngbɛ. Ɔzzànga wɔyɔng ba bapipili.

Ikpana anaam, abbeyɔng luppyam tɔttɔt Uyini uffu. Ayɛnyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwoop-a-bɔtɔɔm ubbenɛ luppyam ɔtaa ɔkat ɛkpansi ammɛ ya uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm ennyimɛ liyaat sa doddo. Ubbe luppyam bɛɛm ɔkat ɛkɛtɛ ya uteepnɛ.
Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa assɛ abbeyɔng luppyam. Alokoyɔng ittina annyɔɔng kkpɔk ka Kɛtɔm-a-kiffu Uyini kilenɛ lɛkkɛtɛ.
Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛyɔng lɔzzɔ kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk atumyɔng wannyɔɔng nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiwɔyɔng kibbi linnyi. Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal utii kɛtɛkɛtɛ, ɔbamabong, ule ka uffunɛ.
Ikpana anaam, akkeyɔng kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba balɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk ka lakke Uyini. Atɔkyɔngbɛ ka iyɔɔ kibbe luppyam la kɛbbɔ akama.
Ikkwɔɔbɛ balɔɔt a laggele ka babbɔnɛ akama. Appyeeyɔngbong kibbe luppyam a Job. Asanyɔng bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ ka lakuma. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ uyini kibbelɛttɔ la kɛyyɛɛp eleme.

Ikpana anaam, kwa kɔttanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya anaangnɛyɔng nsekele. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng libat ɔlɔk ɛkpansi ɔlɔk bɔfɛɛn duu. Attɛnɛyɔng “Iii” ɔkɔɔngwɔyɔng “Iii” ’wɔng baang. Attɛnɛyɔng “Mmaaye”, ɔkɔɔngwɔyɔng “Mmaaye” ’wɔng baang nkwaaning asiyɔng ka kɛkaal a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ulewɔyɔng baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ wa ulenɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛttɔ ɔɔ? Ulenɛ baang, ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔlɔk ule baang wa ulenɛ ka laggele ɔɔ? Ulenɛ baang, usoom ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa usimɛnɛ lɛppwa ɔɔ? Ulenɛ baang, ɔkkwɔɔ bagɛlɛnya-luzɔɔm baffu bazɔɔm bassɛɛnmɛ, bappwɔɔngmɛ bannɛ ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus.
Luzɔɔm ’gwɔng gwa azɔɔmnɛ la kiyila ka tɔkɔlɔ vvenɛ lɔnaang ɔlɔɔt iffaak ɔppwamɛ, Uyini ɔnaangmɛ ɔppwamɛ, ɔsɔɔkmɛ bubbi bwa ulenɛ lɛnaang.
Ɔ̀zzànga abwɔɔlɔyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng annyɔɔng azɔɔm assɛɛnwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng nkwaaning ɔppwawɔyɔng. Luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔt wa doddo lɔnaang kɛnaang kɛttala.
Elijah ɔdɔkɔ kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt mung. Ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔ kiteep. Usi liteep ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka likkpa liffa la kufaak.
Ɔbbal lɛzɔɔm ɔttɛ uteep. Uteep ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔllɔt ka ɛkpansi iwopowopo iyyɛɛp.
Ikpana anaam, ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt ɔgbatanɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng usseke lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔnaangmɛnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ uffu,
akke attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt duu wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang ɔnaang-a-bubbi ɔkkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi ɔfɔngɔ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkalabong lɛfɛkɛlɛ ɔnaang-a-bubbi ’wɔng baang, ɔnaang kɛsɔɔk a bubbi ppwap kile.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Peter, uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ. Ɔtɔɔm ufee balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ba bammanɛ lɛkɔɔng bamii ɛkpansi a Pontus, la Galatia la Cappadocia la Asia ɔbɛtɛ la Bithynia.

Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔdɔkɔ ɔsangawɔyɔng ɔssanga bwa uttinanɛ la annyɔɔng, Kuyeeng ammɛ kɔnaangwɔyɔng azzangayɔng balɔɔt ba doddo kɔttɛ ateleyɔng Jesus Christ usseke linnyi ammɛ likkpɔlɔyɛlɛ laggbo. Numa lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bɔkaat bile bya annyɔɔng bɛttala-ɔttala.
Iwomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, kɛnaang! Unnyiyɛlɛ ufaa kɛfal ka kibbelɛttɔ ammɛ ka ufungalanɛ Jesus Christ ka lubbe. Nkwɔng kunnyinɛyɛlɛ luttina gwa doddo.
Ile baang ka ikatnɛ kɛtɔk a ppyɛɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ balɔɔt ammɛ. Ulokobɛ ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn a ule usi lɛddɔlɔ, usi lɛbɛpɛ, usi bannyi libbe.
Ppyɛɛ ule wa annyɔɔng, balɔɔt ba ussinɛ ka kiyila, lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lakkalawɔyɔng kwa kuddu kwa kulenɛ ka lakpeke.
Aggeleyɔng mkkpandɔk asan attɛyɔng kule bbwak ka illɛ ya ayɛnnɛyɔng akama ka annyɛ mung.

Akama annyɔɔng ulenɛ kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ kiyila annyɔɔng kile sa lɔkkwɔɔn. Bakɔɔm lɔkɔɔn ballɛ gold wa ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa bubɛpɛnɛ. Kwakkwɛ bale ballɛ kiyila annyɔɔng sa kɛttanɛ gold nkwaaning kɛbbɔ; atɔkyɔng kuttu la lakke la latele ka Kɛtɔm sa Jesus Christ ule uffu.
Atelemɛyɔng, ɔzzàngà mɛ ba ataka ayɛnyɔng. Ayilayɔng kwa ammɛ, ɔzzàngà mɛ ba ataka ayɛnyɔng. Ɔzzànga ɔwaawɔyɔng gaang gaang ɔsak kɛlɔɔk ka kamma,
ka alenɛyɔng ka kɛtɔk a kuddu lɛfɛkɛlɛ annyɔɔng. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kiyila annɔ kɛnaangnɛ.
Kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babbenɛ luppyam baggyan kɔdɔkɔ kutum kuddu ’kwɔng mung. Babwɔɔlɔ lilɔɔk batum lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule unnyiwɔyɔng.
Babum battɛ basan ɛkɛtɛ kule kule la tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule kuffu. Uwɔng ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya Kuyeeng a Christ kwa kɔdɔkɔnɛbɛ ka kkwɔɔt kɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ka babwɔɔlɔnɛ akama wa Christ ule ɔyɛn la latele za ule ɔyanga.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔ bappyee-kutolo ammɛ ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ kɛnaang abbɛ ba banaang ka budoddo bwa abbɛ biini, banaang kwa annyɔɔng ka balɔɔknɛ batum bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bya alenɛyɔng lippyee gedegede mung ka babwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kussinɛ ka libat. Uwɔng ulenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baggyannɛ kɛsan bagbaa.
Abama ippyam annyɔɔng akatyɔng linaang. Agepeleyɔng ppyɛɛ wa ale ayangayɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus ule uffu.
Ateleyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bya bɛsaapwɔnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya atakanɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk lɛsan bɛkɔɔm lafal annyɔɔng.
Lutini ’gwɔng ataayɔng ka budoddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛ ulenɛ doddo.
Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Ataa ka budoddo, ka anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo.”

Ka azɔɔmnɛyɔng luzɔɔm annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔssanga bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ lɛnaang, akkwɔɔmɛyɔng Dedde. Ka kulenɛ ning baang akɔɔmyɔng ɛkɛtɛ kuddu annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi ka kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ.

Asanyɔng lɔsan bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔkkalawɔyɔng ka babbu linaang ba bassinɛwɔnɛyɔng ka bagɛlɛnya annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Ba ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa akkwoongnɛ abɛpɛbwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ silver ɔlɔk gold.
Bigwugwulu bya bakɔɔmnɛ bɛdɔkɔ Christ wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan ɛtɔɔn wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔsɛlɛ lɛggba banaang bɛsangawɔnɛyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangamɛbong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔm vveeng. Ɔzzanga uffubong ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke ’byɔng mung uzzenge luzzi annyɔɔng.
Kussi kwa ammɛ ayilayɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe unnyimɛ latele. Kwakkwɛ alokonɛyɔng kiyila la luttina annyɔɔng ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Gedegede mung ka alenɛyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk litele, azzaawɔyɔngbong kɛyɔɔng ayangayɔng kɛsaap sa lɔkkwɔɔn la bannyɔɔng a bayanga-kiyila, atele wannyɔɔng la vvɔn la luppyam gwa doddo.
Ka lakke lɛmmwɔɔl a kuddu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za kɛfal a kɛfal bappyɛlɛbong bamaatwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔn ɔlɔɔt ba ibakka abbɛ la ibassɛ bale babbe basi eggwu lɛkɔɔng.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lifaat ka kɛmat, Lakke abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo, lifaat libbenɛ, idodo ikkpɛɛ ittɔ.
Ɔzz̀ang̀a lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini lɛtaa ka kɛfal a kɛfal.” Uwɔng ulenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za Kuttu-Budoddo kɔkɔɔmnɛ kufeewɔyɔng.
Akkyaayɔng bubbi annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɔɔkyɔng, kɛkkala lɛlaak ba kɛbɛlɛ lile, ɔlɔk kɛnaang a lagban, ɔlɔk luleep, ɔlɔk ɔbbaatyɔng lifɔk.
Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔn ba bassumanɛ lɛmaat, aggyanyɔng libee za doddo avvayɔng la ɛkɛtɛ la ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ ka avvanɛyɔngzɛ ammalayɔng aleyɔng ba kɛkkala.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Allɛyɔngbong kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Affuyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn Uyini, lɛttaal-a-kuddu za balɔɔt bafimnɛzɛ battɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛzɛ azzɛ ɔttɛ, lile bɔfɛɛn a kukkam.

Affuyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakkpɔ lattaal-a-kuddu, afɔngɔ bakɔɔmwɔyɔng annyɔɔng biini babɔɔk ggwoon a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ɛfɛɛn ale assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba bbwak ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la lɛtɔm za bale banaang bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka labɔɔk a Jesus Christ.
Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Nsangabong lɛttaal a kukkam ntte lutte kɛbat a ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Zion ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa azzɛ baala usi lɛyɛn bwa ɔggyannɛ.”

Lɛttaal ’zɔng mung lile lɛttaal a kukkam za lɛbaang ka ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba ayilanɛyɔng. Ɔzzanga kwa balɔɔt ba basinɛ liyila, “Lɛttaal ’zɔng baang za babɔɔk a ssoon bafimnɛ lɛppyɛɛbong lɛzzánga lɛttaal za doddo.”
Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛlɔk lɛttɛ, “Lɛttaal ’zɔng mung lile lɛnaang balɔɔt bavvun battɔ”. Bavvun ka basinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila. Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ utumbɛ.

Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba balewɔnɛyɔng lɛsanga. Bassɛɛn a luzɔɔm Ubeet Ebinukkpaapi, lɔfɔɔn gwa latele, balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini, ba ɔsangawɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ abwɔɔlɔyɔng linaang a bikɛɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul uffu ka buppwolo bikɛɛlɛ ammɛ biini.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn, annyɔɔng balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm adɔkɔ asiyɔng lile, ɔzzànga gedegede mung atiiyɔng ba ammɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn, kibbelɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm adɔkɔ asiyɔng lɛsan ɔzzàngà mung atɔkyɔngbong kibbelɛttɔ ammɛ.

Inngwa anaam, nkkpengewɔyɔng annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng bakekeen la bamma-lɛkɔɔng ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya billeknɛ kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng. Gbisii bile ka lɛkɔɔng la luppyam.
Akɔɔmyɔng ileme ya doddo ateleyɔng ikpana annyɔɔng ya itakanɛ kɔlɔɔk Ebinukkpaapi lɛsan, nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ ya bakaawɔnɛyɔng basan budoddo annyɔɔng; nkwaaning babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Kɛtɔm sa ule uffu.
Ateleyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ attinayɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm: Ateleyɔng Ubeet wa uzzinɛ lɛttɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ,
la bakɔɔm ɛkpansi ba ɔtɔɔmnɛbɛ ɔttɛ bayɔɔ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi akama, babungu balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ doddo.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛnɛ anaangyɔng. Anaangyɔng budoddo, balɔɔt ba basinɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛsan bataa zzum.
Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ batta ka kɔlɔɔk, ɔzzanga tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng lakke annyɔɔng alupyɔng bubbi bwa anaangnɛyɔng. Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili Ebinukkpaapi.
Ateleyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng. Ebinukkpaapi ɛbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, ateleyɔng Uzzilɛttɔ.

Annyɔɔng ibɔɔyi, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng issaawɔ annyɔɔng, annyiyɔngbɛ latele za lɔkkwɔɔn. Balɔɔt ba baggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk, ɔlɔɔt ubbebɛ lɛttɔ keem lissi ka ale ateleyɔng. Balɔɔt ba banyangawɔnɛyɔng ɔgbaa assɛ annyiyɔngbɛ latele.
Ebinukkpaapi vvenɛ ɛnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ ka ’kwɔng alenɛyɔng baang ka appyeenɛyɔng bɔssɔp gbɔɔ ka lɛsɔɔk ka alenɛyɔng bwa ɔttɛnɛ anaangyɔng lɛsan.
Isak ilewɔnɛyɔng ka ’bɔng abbɔnɛyɔng akama ka battupwɔnɛyɔng ka asinɛyɔng bbwak lɛnaang. Ɔzzànga appyɛɛnɛ abbɔyɔng akama ka anaangnɛyɔng budoddo, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ ka akkwɛ.
Kɔdɔkɔ ka ’kwɔng ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng, ka Christ biini ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng ɔ̀zzánga ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyɔɔ ɔkkɔɔnɛ akeetmɛyɔng.
Bubbi usi lɛnaang, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ wa ulenɛ lippyee ka ɔnaangnɛ lɛlaak ba ule.
Ka ɛkɛtɛ babbaatmɛnɛ, kamma usi lɛppyɛlɛ la lifɔk. Ɛkɛtɛ ɔyɛnnɛ akama, kusimɛ lɛssɔp. Ɔzzanga luttina ammɛ lulemɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal wa Bbwak.
Christ biini ɔsamnɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt uzzenge ka kkwɔɔt ubbe ka Cross, nkwaaning ibbe innyi bubbi, iddu kuddu kwa budoddo. Ka bidopo ammɛ uttulabongyɛlɛ.
Adɔkɔ aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ya itaaknɛ, ɔzzànga gedegede mung, bakɔɔmwɔyɔngbong bappyɛlɛ isimi-simi affuyɔng akupyɔng Ɔkat-itɔɔn la Ɔkat-a-kuddu annyɔɔng.
Bwanavva, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng bwalam annyɔɔng, nkwaaning linaang annyɔɔng lidɛm bwaanbwalam balɔk ba basinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila bassɛ baang bayila. Gɔɔ lɛmmwɔɔl baala azza atum kwɛ,
ka bale bayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linaang annyɔɔng liyyɛɛpnɛ liyanga latele liffɔ.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya vveeng kaang ning, anaang ɔkkɔɔnɛ akwɛnyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alokonɛyɔng kittulu annyɔɔng, ɔlɔk bɛfɛɛn a gold bya akwulanɛyɔng ka lukat, ɔlɔk iwɔkɔlɔ ya awɔkɔlɔnɛyɔng ka kkwɔɔt.
Lutini ’gwɔng bɔllɛ annyɔɔng bule bɔllɛ luppyam. Bɔllɛ bwa businɛ likpeke la latele, la kuyeeng kwa zzum. Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa lɛbaang ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Bwanavva ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ba basamnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi ka luzɔɔm, ba battinanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, banaangbɛ abbɛ biini kɛyɔɔng bayyɛɛp ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng, ka basamnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi bwalam abbɛ.

Sarah ɔdɔkɔ ule ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwanavva ’bɔng baang, utele Abraham, ɔkkwɔɔmɛ “Dedde anaam.” Gedegede mung annyɔɔng bwaan ammɛ ba bwanavva, ulenɛ ka anaangnɛyɔng budoddo, kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kusiwɔyɔng lɛbbwɔpɔ.

Annyɔɔng bwalam ɔgbaa ka allunɛyɔng la bwanavva annyɔɔng, akɔɔlɔyɔng asan attɛyɔng abbɛ balenɛ kukup a balɔɔt ba basɔɔnɛ. Akɔɔmyɔngbɛ ka latele. Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ atɔkyɔng lɛsɔɔk a kuddu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Anaangyɔng ’kwɔng nkwaaning bulɔk busi luzɔɔm annyɔɔng lɛnaang.

Kitele lɛttɔ ulenɛ kɛttɛ, vvenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ayangayɔng luttina la kɛssanga linaang ssɔn. Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikpana annyɔɔng; ayyɛɛpyɔng bɛnaang la lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzanga atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka bukee.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ apipili wannyɔɔng wa ɔnaangwɔnɛ bubbi, ɔlɔk abbaat wannyɔɔng wa ɔbbaatwɔnɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng anaangmɛ ppyɛɛ, ka ppyɛɛ ulenɛ nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔtaa ka laggele ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛfal ammɛ, ɔkkyaa kɛlɔɔk a lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ ɔfɔngɔ, ɔkkyaa kɛnaang a lɛlaak ɔfɔngɔ.
Ɔkkyaa lilɔɔk a bubbi ɔfɔngɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔnaang budoddo. Vvenɛ kɔbɛtɛmɛ kwa bɔkaat.
Uyini ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa bbwak ɔgɔpɔlɔ luzɔɔm abbɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɔlɔɔk kutunmɛ la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi.”
Nnyinɔɔng ule uddopowɔ ka aggyannɛ attɛ anaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ?
Ɔzzànga mkkpa ayɛn akama ka aggyannɛ attɛ anaang kwa bbwak, ale aggele nang? Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt babbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ittina ibbɔlwɔyɔng.
Ɔzzànga asam Christ assɛɛnwɔ kɛyɔɔng ka luppyam. Atelemɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini annɔ. Abama ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, appyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔt duu kamma wa ule ɔbapwɔ ɔttɛ abwɔɔlɔmɛ luttina gwa ayanganɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ.

Anaangkwɛ bɛtɛbɛtɛ la latele. Aloko luttina annɔ kkpaladada, nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ ya banyɔɔkawɔnɛ, balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balɔɔknɛ bubbi batum kɛyyɛɛp a linaang annɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ Christ, battɔ ka izzit ka lukopolo abbɛ.
Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka kɛnaang a budoddo, kulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ, lutini kɛnaang a ubbu kɔlɔɔk.

Christ biini ubbe ka lɛttɔ ayɔɔt kikkpit ssɔn kɔsaal. Ubbe ffet kwa banaang a bubbi. Ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ubbe ɔkkala lɛttɔ babbu balɔɔt ba basinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔkɔɔmwɔyɔng umii ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bawwɔɔlmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bawwɔɔlnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ ufungala ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa ka kuddu.
Ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛ ka kuddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kuyeeng, umii ukopolo liyeeng sa lilenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ.

Uwɔng ulenɛ liyeeng a balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba basinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele. Ka ubbenɛ luppyam bɛɛm ɔtaa ɔkat bɛtɔm a Noah ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kɛnaang akkpaat. Bwaan a balɔɔt badɔkɔ ssup ning ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bale balɔɔt bannambanna ka bannyi basinɛbɛ lɛmmɛɛl.

Baang ɔdɔkɔ iyɔɔ ya kɛnaang a baptizim, ya ikkalawɔnɛyɔng gedegede mung. Kwa kɛzzaa bɔkkpɔtɔ a kkwɔɔt lissi. Ule kwa nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ussinɛ ka luppyam gwa doddo. Kɔkkalawɔyɔng ka kifungala ka lubbe sa Jesus Christ ufungalanɛ.
Ammɛ wa ulenɛ ka libat limii ɔzzánga ùlé ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ammɛ ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lakke libat ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ka Christ ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini, annyɔɔng ɔgbaa assɛ attinayɔng ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ baala ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
Ka ussinɛ gedegede mung umii ka lusso, akkyaayɔng lafal annyɔɔng ka vveeng ’wɔng mung afɔngɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm, afɔngɔyɔng kɛtaa la luttina gwa ɔssɛbibit.

Ka isimi ka isimi aleyɔng baang ka anaangnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila banaangnɛ. Adɔkɔyɔng la babbu ittina, la lɔgbɛɛk, la kɛvva batak, la kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn izzit, la lakup a kɛvva la lakup ilat.
Gedegede mung balɔɔt ba basinɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila kɔkɛɛlɛbongbɛ ka basiwɔnɛyɔng lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn ka atulnɛyɔng la abbɛ anaangyɔng babbu lilɔɔk, kwakkwɛ babbaatwɔnɛyɔng.
Vvenɛ babwɔɔlɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkaalnɛ bakokolo la babbu kɔlɔɔk duu kwa balenɛ lɛnaang.
Kwakkwɛ bakopolonɛ babbu lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa la balɔɔt ba balenɛbɛ lɛkaal ka linaang abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakaalnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, bakopolobɛ nkwaaning bataa ka lafal abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
Lakpeke bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ lakkɛtɛbong. Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, abeeyɔng kkpɔk akkwoong assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm.
Kwa kɔttanɛ liggbenge ulenɛ kɛttɛ, bannyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng gaang gaang. Kɛsaap kɛbɛtɛnɛ bubbi ppwap.
Awongoloyɔng ssala annyɔɔng alokoyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, afɔngɔyɔng lɔzzɔ kɛssɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔkɔɔm lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm lɛsɔɔk ammɛ ’zɔng baang za lissimɛnɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttele babbɛ balɔɔt balɔk.

Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ibwɔɔlɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ɔkɔɔm lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ ɔnaang, nkwaaning ka utini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ussinɛ ka Jesus Christ, wa latele la lakke lalenɛ za ammɛ ka kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.
Inngwa anaam ka luppyam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng ka akama wa ayɛnnɛyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa butakawɔnɛ kkpal lɛnaang.
Lutini ’gwɔng aggeleyɔng attɛyɔng ayɛnyɔng akama la Christ, nkwaaning aggeleyɔng gaang gaang ɛkɛtɛ ule ɔyɔɔ lakke ammɛ.
Laggele lale za annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba banaangwɔnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn izzit ka akupnɛyɔng Christ. Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛttɛ lakke Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule baang la annyɔɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔyɛn akama ammɛ ulenɛ ɔwwɔɔl a balɔɔt, ɔlɔk ussip, ɔlɔk ɔttɔ-ka-lafɔɔ, ɔlɔk ubum kɛtɔk a kɛnaang a balɔɔt.
Ɔzzànga ayɛnnɛ akama ka alenɛ ɔlɔɔt a Christ tɛ̀ttɛ́ izzit inaangwɔ, awomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang alenɛ la lɛkɔɔl a Christ.

Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya kɛkaal kile ka kittenɛ, Balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balenɛ balɔɔt ba bale batte lɛkaal kɛkaal abbɛ. Kittenɛ ka ayyɔɔt kile kikpeke nang la balɔɔt ba basinɛ kiyila lɛyanga batum kuttu budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Kɔkɔɔt lɔkɔɔt tɛ́ttɛ́ bakkala balɔɔt ba doddo, nkka kule kɔtaa nang la balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile la banaang a bubbi?”
Kule ning baang la balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛ akama ka kɔlɔɔk a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batelebɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka budoddo kɛnaang abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulokonɛ nsekele ammɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Nkkpenge batumalɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng, anaam biini wa nssɛnɛ nle utumalɔɔt ka luzɔɔm. Anaam nlenɛ ttɛɛsɛ kɛyɛn akama Christ. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nyanga etini ka ppyɛɛ wa ule uffu. Nkkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge.

Azzangayɔng bakat-itɔɔn ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛyɔng, appyɛɛkyɔngyɛ annyɛ ka luppyam gwa doddo, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ anaangyɔng. Ɔzzànga ka luppyam gwa bbɔl bbɔl lissi. Anaangyɔng kɛnaang afɔngɔyɔng kwa kikkpele kiffik, ɔzzàngà kussiwɔyɔng ka luppyam annyɔɔng anaangyɔng.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abum attɛ annyɔɔng azzangayɔng bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balewɔnɛyɔng linnyi battɛ appyɛɛkyɔngbɛ. Ɔzzànga ataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyɔɔ ka kɛkaan ’sɔng baang.
Ɛkɛtɛ ya Uzzilɛttɔ kɛkat-itɔɔn utumanɛ, vvenɛ ɔttɔpɔwɔyɔng ododo wa unnyiwɔnɛyɔng lakke za lale lasi lɛbɛlɛ lɛsaal.

Kɔssɛ kule ning baang la annyɔɔng. Ɔgbaa, annyɔɔng bakolobya annyiyɔng batumalɔɔt latele. Ɔzzànga ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ayɔɔyɔng linaang annyɔɔng sa doddo kkpelegedee, abum atelewɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ, lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ba ɔkkyaanɛbɛ, unnyi bakee-bwɔɔn latele.”
Atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka bukee-waan. Ɔzzànga ataayɔng ka lakke labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nkwaaning ɔsamwɔyɔng uyeek ka libat ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ammɛ biini ya bbwak.
Asamyɔng lilɔɔk annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyimɛyɔng ka ulemɛnɛ ammɛ ɔkatwɔnɛyɔng.
Asan anaangyɔng, akatyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk annyɔɔng, Ɔnaanga-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng, ule baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ukkpit ɔkɔɔm ubungu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ugɛbɛ ulenɛ ka kɛggyan a bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔkaanɛ uzzi.
Kiyila annyɔɔng kɛkkaam lɔkkaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔ ɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng ka asannɛ attɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi ba bayanganɛ kiyila bassɛ bayɛn akama kɛssanga ssɔn.

Ɔzzǹga alenɛyɔng akama lɛyɛn ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ning, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ affu ayangayɔng etini ka lakke ammɛ za kɛfal a kɛfal ka bɔkaat la Christ, ammɛ biini vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng aleyɔng bbwak, unnyiwɔyɔng bɔkkaam la lagabwɔ, ka lutte gwa lɔkkwɔɔn.
Lakke za kɛfal a kɛfal lale ka ammɛ. Kule ning.

Silas uttelenɛbong nkkpɔkwɔyɔng waan a lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung. Ammɛ ulenɛ wa nttinanɛ nttɛ ule ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila. Nggyan nttɛ nttamawɔyɔng ka lafɔɔ za nle ka nnyiwɔnɛyɔng za lalenɛ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Abeeyɔng bbwak ka azzɛ.
Ikpana annyɔɔng ya ilenɛ ka Babylon ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lɛssang ɔgbaa, batɔɔm luwomo bafeewɔyɔng. Waan anaam Mark ɔssɛ uwomowɔyɔng.
Awomoyɔng bannyɔɔng la kigbugba kɛsaap a balɔɔt a Christ. Bɔkaat butaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ba alenɛyɔng ba Christ.

Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Simon Peter, Uyilabɔtɔɔm la bɔɔyi a Jesus Christ, ɔtɔɔm ufee balɔɔt ba budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ, bunnyinɛbɛ kiyila sa lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa ayyɔɔt.
Latele la bɔkaat bɛtaa la annyɔɔng ka ussinɛ ka kɛsan sa asannɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt.
Lakke ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lannyibongyɛlɛ utini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya iggyannɛ ittɛ ikɔɔm iddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ka ussinɛ ka kɛsan sa isannɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɛnɛ itul latele ammɛ, la budoddo ammɛ.

Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng unnyibongyɛlɛ lɛsɔɔk za lɛbaang a lɛbaang za lɔkkwɔɔn za ɔggbanɛ lisekele, nkwaaning ka ussinɛ ka lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang amma akɔngɔyɔng kɛbɛpɛ la ibbyap ya ilenɛ ka vveeng, amii atulyɔng kɛfal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ka ’kwɔng, abum anaangyɔng budoddo agbaayɔng la kiyila annyɔɔng. Agbaayɔng bisana ka budoddo annyɔɔng.
Abum ayangayɔng kɛkat a kɛyɔɔng agbaayɔng la bisana annyɔɔng. Abum ayangayɔng kibbe-luppyam agbaayɔng la kɛkat a kɛyɔɔng. Abum ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm agbaayɔng la kibbe-luppyam.
Abum ayangayɔng kɛsaap sa bukpana tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ayangayɔng kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm agbaayɔng la kɛsaap sa bukpana.
Uwɔng ulenɛ ileme ya buyanganɛyɔng. Ayanganɛyɔngyɛ ggbadam vvenɛ inaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng akkwoongyɔng kɛnaang ka bisana annyɔɔng pya bitumnɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛbyɛ lɛyanga nzang fulu fulu ba ɔyɛn, usseke ssup ussi ifim. Usumalabong Jesus Christ wa ɔkkpɔlɔmɛnɛ bubbi bwa ɔggbanɛ lɛnaang.
Ikpana anaam, abumyɔng gaang gaang anaangyɔng kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛsanga sa ɔsangawɔnɛyɔng kile kɔlɔɔk kwa alenɛyɔng lɛsan. Anaangnɛyɔng ning mung, isimi-simi baala appyɛlɛyɔng.
Anaangnɛyɔng ning, vvenɛ ayangayɔng lakke za bbwak, za kɛmal ka Itutum-Uyini, Ɔkkala-ikkala ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ya kɛfal a kɛfal.
Kwakkwɛ baang nkkewɔnɛyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang mkkpa aleyɔngsɛ lɛsan, bilewɔyɔng, ka ippyam lile ka assɛɛnnɛyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa alenɛyɔng lɛtɔk.
Nttina nttɛ kulenɛ bbwak ka nfeelewɔnɛyɔng ittina ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ka ntiinɛ ikokolo.
Nsan lɔsan nttɛ usseke ssup nzzɔɔk kkwɔɔt ’sɔng mung sa lile libbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ulenɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ pwool.
Vvenɛ nbum nnaang ɛtɔk nlokowɔyɔng ya ale akkeyɔng lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka nle nle libbe.
Ba kɔtaka kɔbɛtɛyɛlɛ kwa lissa ka ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng uggboggbo kiffu Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ. Iyɛn lakke ammɛ ka zzeen ayyɔɔt biini.
Idɔkɔ baang ka Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ lakke la latele. Ippyee ka lɛmmwɔɔl lissinɛ ka ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke za lɛbaang lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ waan a luppyam anaam, ɔsaapnɛ gaang gaang.”
Ayyɔɔt biini ippyee lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang ka lissinɛ ka libat liffu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya idɔkɔnɛ la ammɛ ka libat a lɛttaal a budoddo.

Ɔbbalyɛlɛ ssik lɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm bwa bappyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babwɔɔlɔnɛ. Kɔyyɛɛp mung ka ale agɔpɔlɔyɔngkwɛ doddo. Kɔ̀táa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ otinika wa uppwolonɛ ka kisul ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ussolo. Buppwolo Ubbele-ettuma buppwolo buvvoongwɔyɔng ka ippyam.
Kwa kɔttanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, akke attɛyɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ubee kɛyɔɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔ kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkpɔknɛ ba ule.
Lɛmmwɔɔl a Bappyee-kutolo ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lissinɛ ka lakke ɔlɔɔt ba lile. Balɔɔt ka balɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛbɛ lakke.

Bakkala-lɛlaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batuma ka ɛkɛtɛ iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng, kùlé kúlè kɛssanga ssɔn; bakkala-lɛlaak bakopolo-ukopolo vvenɛ batuma ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng. Vvenɛ bakɔɔm kɛbɛpɛ baffu, la lukopolo gwa lusinɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn lile. Vvenɛ bakala Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkalanɛbɛ, basambɛ kɛyɔɔng bassɛɛn ka kɛbɛpɛ sa kitipili.
Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bakup itɔk ya ibbɔlnɛ, ka linaang sa banaangnɛ, balɔɔt balɔk vvenɛ balɔɔk bubbi batum lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ittikkya ’yɔng baang bazzi isak ka ibala ya balɔɔt babalanɛ ka kuwɔnɔk abbɛ. Ɔmmɛbong ka Ɔkaal a kɛkaal ɔbamanɛ, Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbɛpɛbɛ utii kwetkwet.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba banaangnɛ bubbi lɛbɔngɔlɔ. Ɔsambɛ ɔssɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn ka ɛfɛɛn a bassɛɛnnɛbɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ bataa baang ka kisul bakat Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi ɛkpansi ya iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ lɛbɔngɔlɔ. Ɔkɔɔm ɛlɔlɔ uffu ka ɛkpansi balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛ ɔdɔkɔ Noah wa ukopolonɛ kwa bbwak la balɔɔt balɔk bannambakkyaat.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛpɛ laffɛ Sodom la Gomorrah la lɔkɔɔn. Ɔyɔɔ kwa kule kɔnaang la balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile.
Ɔkkala Lot, ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, wa balɔɔt ba babbyapnɛ basi lafɔɔ litele banaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kusimɛnɛ lɛsaap.
Ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ’wɔng baang ɔtaa baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ, la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm ɔyɛn, ɔkɔɔm uppyee bɛfɛɛn bya luppyam gwa doddo lusinɛ lɛggyan.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkalanɛ balɔɔt ammɛ ka lubum abbɛ, ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulokonɛ balɔɔt ba babbɔlnɛ bɛnaang ka akama tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal.

Kpongkpong balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ kwa kkwɔɔt abbɛ, banaang bubbi bakpɛn lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bakkala-lalaak ittikkya ’yɔng baang banaang biggboggbo la kɛkkaam a luppyam, latele ba bayanga ka lakke za libat, lutini ’gwɔng bakpɛnbɛ lɔkpɛn.
Gɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ba bakkaamnɛ baggbenge-uggbenge batta ittikkya yɔng mung, basibɛ kibbi linnyi, ɔlɔk banaangbɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit ka lusso Uyini.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung basɛlɛ luttina, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isɛɛn a kɛmat ya bamaatnɛ battɛ ikaa iwwɔɔl izzi. Bakpɛn bɛfɛɛn bya basinɛ lɛsan. Vvenɛ bawwɔɔlbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isɛɛn a kɛmat.

Vvenɛ bapipilibɛ la akama ka baggyannɛ akama. Laggele za abbɛ lale ka banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya kkwɔɔt abbɛ liggyannɛ ka kpelegedee. Bale ka izzit la bɛnnyɔɔka ka batulnɛ kazzi la annyɔɔng, baggele ka babbu lalaak abbɛ.

Bulɔk ba bappyɛɛk ɔgbaa la bwanavva ba bassɛnɛ kɛzak. Kusapa kɛnaang a bubbi bɛ kɔsaal. Bakɔɔm balɔɔt ba kiyila abbɛ kisinɛbɛ lɛkkaam bamii battɔ ka ɔnnya. Ippyam abbɛ iwɔnɔ-wɔnɔ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbaatbongbɛ.
Bagbatabong ɛtɔk ya zzip bakɔngɔ bamii bassɛɛp ɛtɔk ya Balaam, waan a Bosor, ukupnɛ, wa ikkpoko ya ɔyanganɛ ka kɛnaang a bubbi isaapmɛnɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔwɔlɔmɛ ka bubbi ammɛ. Eyim ya esinɛ kɛlɔɔk likkwoong ɛlɔɔk ka lɛmmwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt etunu bizingizingi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ issa ya ilenɛ lɛkaan, bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkpala ya kɛffa sa lɛbaang kɛffanɛyɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokobongbɛ ɛfɛɛn ka kisul sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang.
Ɔkkyaabɛ la babbu lammwɔɔl, bakɔɔm babbu ibbyap a kkwɔɔt abbɛ bakaa balɔɔt ba babumnɛ kɛmma kɛgbata ka bɛzzɔkɔ balɔɔt ba basinɛ bbwak lɛnaang.
Banaangbong nsekele battɛ, vvenɛ bakkalabɛ ka bubbi abbɛ, uvve abbɛ biini kang bappyɛɛ bale babili kɛbɛpɛ ka ileme abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ule ubili bɔfɛɛn duu bwa buttamɛnɛ lakke.
Balɔɔt balenɛ lɛtta ka ibbyap ɛkpansi ka kɛsan sa basannɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ba babbalnɛbɛ lɛkaa bannyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang vvenɛ bayɛn akama ka lakpeke batta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayɛnnɛ ka lutte.
Kɔdɔkɔ kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka basinɛ kwa bbwak lɛsan nakanaka, lutini basannɛ bappyɛɛ bassang basikili basi lɔttama gwa doddo gwa bannyinɛbɛ lɛtɔk.
Kwa kɔnaangnɛbɛ kɔyɔɔbong kɔttɛ ifɛɛt ya bassanɛ ile ka lɔkkwɔɔn, “Ɛbbwa ɛppyɛlɛ emii ka bɔfɛɛn bwa ɛkkwɔɔknɛ.” “Ɔkkumma wa balemɛnɛ lɛzzaa ɔppyɛlɛ umii umini ka kɛbat ɔlak.”

Inngwa anaam, ’wɔng mung ulenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za nbbalwɔnɛyɔng lɛkkpɔk. Ka lammwɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ laffa, nbumbong nttɛ nzang nssɛɛnwɔyɔng ittina ya bbwak ka ippyam annyɔɔng ka nkkewɔnɛyɔng kwa bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung.
Nggyan nttɛ akkeyɔng lammwɔɔl za Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba doddo baggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk bakang mmɛmmɛ, la lɔdda gwa lussinɛ ka Uyini la Ɔkkala-ikkala wa bayilabɔtɔɔm annyɔɔng badɔkɔnɛ bannyiwɔyɔng.
Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, vvenɛ asan attɛyɔng balɔɔt balɔk ba lafal abbɛ lale lakup kuwɔnɔk abbɛ vvenɛ batta ka vveeng ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke. Vvenɛ bakpɛnwɔyɔng
battɛ, “Usekele ɔttɛ vvenɛ uffu, ning usi lisekele ɔɔ? Ngkka ule yang? Idedde ayyɔɔt baggba libbe bakang, ɔzzànga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bitii kɛssanga ssɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussinɛ ɔnaang ɛkpansi!”
Bakongo lukongo bafim lɔkkwɔɔn gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk, ɔzzànga ɔnaang libat la ɛkpansi. Ɛkpansi ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔmyɛ la bannyi, ka bannyi.
Kɔdɔkɔ ka bannyi ɔgbaa, bannyi ɛlɔlɔ, ba babɛpɛnɛ ɛkpansi ya iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ.

Ɔzzànga libat la ɛkpansi ya elenɛ lulenɛ gedegede mung, lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkɔɔmnɛ ka kɛbɛpɛyɛ la lɔkɔɔn. Basambongbɛ baloko ka kɛtɔm sa bale bakaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile. Basambɛ bawwɔɔl.

Inngwa luppyam anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ asumalayɔng bɔfɛɛn bwɔng mung bbwɔn! kwa kulenɛ zzekep ba kule ka lusso Uyini ka kɛtɔm ssɔn gɔɔ ka innɔ likkpa. Innɔ likkpa ulemɛ kɛtɔm ssɔn. Ka ammɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bɛffa bile kɛssanga ssɔn.

Uyini bɛtɛbɛtɛ ba ɔnaang ka kwa ulenɛ lisekele ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk battinanɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng ɔyanga kibbe-luppyam la annyɔɔng ka usinɛ lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔbɛpɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ bakkyaa bubbi abbɛ bafɔngɔ.

Kɛtɔm Uyini kile kiffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip. Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang libat likkyaap la lɔsap gwa lɛbaang, bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka libat vvenɛ bɛkkɔm bɛbɛpɛ. Ɛkpansi la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɛ vvenɛ bɛkkyaap.
Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bilenɛ ka bɛbɛpɛnɛ ning mung, annyɔɔng ale aleyɔng bɔka kɛssanga balɔɔt? Lafal annyɔɔng lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa.
Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ataanɛyɔng akatyɔng Kɛtɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abumyɔng likke lɛsaal ɔkkɔɔnɛ kɛkka liffu. Assɛ kilenɛ sa libat lile likkɔm libɛpɛ, bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka libat vvenɛ bɛyɛtɛ ka kɛfɔɔp.
Ɔzzànga itaa ikat kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lisekele. Ufaa libat la ufaa ɛkpansi, ka ɛfɛɛn a lilɔɔk sa bbwak lile lile ka ssala.
Inngwa anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ataanɛ akatyɔng Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, abum ataayɔng kpaladada ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asɛlɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa azzinɛyɔng bubbi nkwaaning ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la ammɛ.

Appyɛɛkyɔng kibbe luppyam Uyini ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kufuk kwa ulewɔnɛyɔng linnyi ɔttɛ ayangayɔng ikkala. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Paul ulewɔnɛyɔng lɛkkpɔk, ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ kɛsana kɔlɔɔk sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ linnyi.

Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ ka lammwɔɔl ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɔknɛ utum lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung. Bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk bile baang bya bikoolonɛ ka lammwɔɔl ammɛ. Bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk bile baang bya balɔɔt ba basinɛbyɛ lɛsan, la balɔɔt ba basinɛ luppyam libbe, basinɛbyɛ bbwak lɛbwɔɔlɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛ ka kufoom kɔlɔk ka luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga ning baang bakɔɔmbong kɛbɛpɛ sa abbɛ biini bafeebɛ kɛyɔɔng.
Inngwa anaam, ɔzzànga annyɔɔng aggbayɔng ’kwɔng lɛsan. Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, nkwaaning balɔɔt ba basinɛ lafɔɔ litele basiwɔyɔng lɛnaang attɔyɔng, vvenɛ agbata assekeyɔng ɛfɛɛn a alenɛyɔng ka kuddu.
Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng ammalayɔng ka lakke la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk Uyini ayyɔɔt, Ɔkkala-ikkala ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ. Lakke lataa la ammɛ gedegede mung ka kɛfal a kɛfal, kulening.
Ikkpɔk kɔlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl a kuddu za lɛggbanɛ lissi ka lutte ifeewɔyɔng: Ippyeebongzɛ, iyɛnbongzɛ ka zzeen ayyɔɔt. Iii, ikɔɔlɔbongzɛ, isingizɛ ka labɔɔk.
Iyɛn kuddu ’kwɔng ka kɔttanɛ ka vveeng. Ɔzzánga ilɔɔk kɔlɔɔk akkwɛ. Ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kwa kulenɛ la Dedde, ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛnaang isankwɛ.
Ɔgbaa ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong bwa iyɛnnɛ ile lippyee nkwaaning atooloyɔng la ayyɔɔt ka kɔssɛ kwa iyanganɛ la Dedde la Awaan, Jesus Christ.
Ikkpɔk ’kwɔng nkwaaning laggele ayyɔɔt lattala.
Uwɔng ulenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za ippyeenɛ ka Waan ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng: Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ buppwolo, kisul ba kile la ammɛ.
Ittɛnɛ ayyɔɔt ile ka kɔssɛ la ammɛ, ilɔngɔlɔ ibbal ka kisul lɛtaa, nzang ikkalabong lɛlaak ka lɛmmwɔɔl la linaang ɔgbaa.
Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt itaanɛ ka buppwolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ulenɛ ka buppwolo, nzang iyanga bɔkaat la ba ayyɔɔt, linnyi Waan ammɛ, Jesus, linaangbongyɛlɛ itta ka bubbi.
Ittɛnɛ ayyɔɔt bubbi ba inaang, ibbwa-lɔbbwa, idɛmyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng, lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka ayyɔɔt ba lule.
Ɔzzànga ibwɔɔlɔnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi ayyɔɔt, vvenɛ ɔnaang kwa ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang: Vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt, ɔsangayɛlɛ ka lilɔɔk sa linaangyɛlɛ ibbɔl.
Ittɛnɛ bubbi ba itaka inaang, nzang ikkwɔɔbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala-lɛlaak. Lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ ka luppyam yɛlɛ ba lile.
Bwaan anaam, nkkpɔk ’kwɔng nfeewɔyɔng nkwaaning asiyɔng bubbi lɛnaang. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi, iyanga Jesus Christ wa ulenɛ bbwak, ukkwoong ukkpenge abassɛ unnyiyɛlɛ.
Christ biini ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa kussinɛ ka ammɛ basɔɔkyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt. Gɔɔ bubbi ayyɔɔt keem lissi, bubbi balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔgbaa.
Itelenɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nzang isanmɛ mung.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔttɛnɛ ɔsan mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, usi lafɔɔ ammɛ litele, kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt ’sɔng baang ɔkkala-lɛlaak, ɔgbaa lɔkkwɔɔn ka ammɛ ba lule.
Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ, Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulenɛ wa ɔyanganɛ kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa lɔkkwɔɔn. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isannɛ ittɛ ile ka bɔkaat bwa lɔkkwɔɔn la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uddu ɔggyan bɔkaat bwa lɔkkwɔɔn la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus Christ ɔtaanɛ.
Inngwa anaam ya luppyam, lifɔɔ za nkkpɔkwɔnɛyɔng mung ufaa lissi; lile ɔtɔm a lifɔɔ za aggbanɛ lissi ayangayɔng ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Ɔtɔm a lifɔɔ ulenɛ kuttu kwa aggbanɛyɔng lippyee.
Ɔzzànga mkkpa kɔnaang, lifɔɔ za nkkpɔkwɔnɛyɔng mung ufaa, lɔkkwɔɔn azzɛ ayɛnyɔng ka Christ la annyɔɔng. Kisul kile ka kɛsaknɛ, buppwolo biini butii ka kippwolo.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ utii ka buppwolo, ɔkpana ammɛ utunmɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang utii ka kisul tɔttɔt ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ ɔkpana ammɛ ɔsaapmɛ lɔsaap, ule ka buppwolo. Bulɔk mɛ ba bule bwa bule bunaang ɔkpana ammɛ ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkpana ammɛ utunmɛnɛ, ule ka kisul. Ɔssɛ ka ɔssɛnɛ baang, ba ɔsan ka ɛfɛɛn umiinɛ ka kisul kilemɛnɛ lɛnaang ussi ifim.
