Bwaan anaam, nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng ka balewɔnɛyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng lɛsɔɔk ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus Christ.
Nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng idedde, asanmɛyɔng lɔsan, ammɛ wa ɔggbanɛ lissi ule ka lutte. Nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng bakolobya ka alenɛyɔng Ubbu lɛbɛtɛ.

Bwaan anaam, nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng, ka asannɛyɔng Dedde. Nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng idedde, ka asannɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ lissi ule ka lutte. Nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng bakolobya ka akkaamnɛyɔng. Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛtaa la annyɔɔng. Abɛtɛyɔngbong Ɔlɔɔt-wa-ɔbbɔlnɛ bɛnaang.
Tɛ̀ttɛ́ vveeng ’wɔng ɔsaapwɔyɔng, gɔɔ bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bulenɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng, nzang kɛsaap ba ayangayɔng atumyɔng Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng.

Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bulenɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng, bwa kkwɔɔt ɔnaang-a-bubbi liggyannɛ, balɔɔt bayɛnnɛ baggyanbwɛ kɛyanga la bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa balɔɔt ɔkkyaanɛbɛ kwa abbwɛ. Nbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Dedde ba bissi, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bissi ka ɛkpansi.
Vveeng la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛsaapnɛ balɔɔt vvenɛ bɛsak. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ, ule ɔtaa ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Bwaan anaam, lakpeke lakkɛtɛbong. Babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong battɛ Ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ vvenɛ uffu, gedegede mung balɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ ggbadam batumabong, kwakkwɛ baang isannɛ ittɛ lakpeke lakkɛtɛbong.

Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ka likup ayyɔɔt ba bale ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kwakkwɛ baang bagbatanɛ bakɔngɔyɛlɛ. Balenɛ ka balenɛ ka likup ayyɔɔt, nzang bataa la ayyɔɔt. Ɔzzànga bagbata nkwaaning kɔnaang ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ppwool isan ittɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka likup ayyɔɔt ba bale.
Ɔzzànga ayangayɔngbong Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa Christ unnyiwɔnɛyɔng, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asanyɔng mung lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ɔzzànga ba nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng ka asinɛyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɛsan, nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng ka asannɛyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng lɛlaak ka lɔkkwɔɔn ba lissi.
Nggka nnyinɛ ulenɛ ɔkkala-lɛlaak? Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ Jesus lissi ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ. Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kilenɛ ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ, ufim Abassɛ la Waan ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ufimnɛ Awaan, ɔssɛbong ufim Abassɛ ɔgbaa. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa Awaan-Ɔssɛbong uyila kwa Abassɛ ɔgbaa.
Asan ka lɔkkwɔɔn attɛ alokobong bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luppyam annɔ bwa appyeenɛ ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Alokonɛ kwa appyeenɛ ka ussinɛ ka lutte, vvenɛ ataa ka bɔkaat la Abassɛ la Awaan ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Ɔzzànga Christ biini usekelebong ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyiyɛlɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Nkkpɔkwɔyɔng ’kwɔng ntum kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba babumwɔnɛyɔng kɛfɛɛt.

Kwa annyɔɔng mung, Christ ɔtɔɔmbong Kuyeeng ammɛ ufeewɔyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng kule kɔtaa la annyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛggyan ɔttɛ uffu ukupolowɔyɔng. Kuyeeng ammɛ kukopolowɔyɔngbong kutum bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kwa kukopolonɛ, kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, lɛlaak lissi. Atele lukopolo Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la Christ.
Iii, bwaan anaam ataayɔng la ammɛ nkwaaning ayangayɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam ka ɛkɛtɛ ya utumanɛ, ifɔngɔ kɛmma iddumu la izzit ka Kɛtɔm sa ule uffu.
Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Christ ule wa bbwak; asan attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa bbwak, ammɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ayɛnyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isaapnɛ Dedde. Utelebongyɛlɛ bul ɔsak ɔppyɛɛ ɔkkwɔɔyɛlɛ bwɔɔn ammɛ. Izzangayɔng bwɔɔn ammɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kwakkwɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung usinɛyɛlɛ lɛsan ka usinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛssɛ ɔsan.
Inngwa luppyam anaam, gedegede mung itii bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga ba itaka isan doddo bwa ile ile. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ka Christ ule utuma, vvenɛ ile isseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ka ile iyɛnmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanganɛ luttina ’gwɔng ka Christ, ɔkatmɛ kɛyɔɔng usseke bubbi. Ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔtaanɛ ɔsɛlɛ bubbi.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi, ɔttɔbong ka kɔlɔɔk, ka ɔbɛpɛnɛ lifɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ka bubbi bulenɛ lɛbɛpɛ lifɔɔ.
Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Christ utuma ka vveeng ’wɔng mung nkwaaning ɔsam bubbi ɔssɛbibbit. Ammɛ bubbi mɛ ba bule.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ bubbi ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛnaang. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ mɛ ba ɔtaka ɔyɛn, ɔlɔk ɔsanmɛ.
Bwaan anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa bbwak, ule wa bbwak, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ulenɛ bbwak.

Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ule wa Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng, ka ɔggbanɛ bubbi lɛnaang ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffu ka ’kwɔng mung. Uffu kɛbɛpɛ kɛnaang a Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛnaang, ka lɛfal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lilenɛ ka ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ Abassɛ ammɛ, bubbi ba ɔbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.

Nggyan nttɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ppwool kwa bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bwaan a Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng balenɛ buubuu. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ kwa bbwak lɛnaang, ɔlɔk ɔkpana ammɛ usimɛ lɛsaap, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi.
Bɔtɔɔm bwa appyeenɛyɔng ka ussinɛ ka lutte ulenɛ kɛttɛ: itele wayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itelenɛyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng.

Baala ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Cain, wa ussinɛ ka kikkwu Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng, ka ɔwwɔɔlnɛ etele ammɛ, Abel. Nbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Cain ɔwwɔɔl etele ammɛ Abel? Ka bɛfɛɛn bya Cain ɔnaangnɛ bisinɛ bbwak lile, bya Abel ɔnaangnɛ bile bbwak.
Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng, atunnɛyɔng balɔɔt a vveeng ’wɔng.
Isan lɔsan ittɛ igbatabong ikɔngɔ lubbe, iffu ka tɔkɔlɔ kuddu. Isan kwa ikpana ayyɔɔt isaapnɛyɛlɛ; ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kɛsaap utii ka lubbe.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkpana ammɛ utunmɛnɛ, ammɛ ulenɛ ɔwwɔɔl-a-balɔɔt. Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng ɔwwɔɔl-a-balɔɔt kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kwa ammɛ ba kule.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa isannɛ bwa kɛsaap kilenɛ. Christ ɔsam kuddu ammɛ unnyiyɛlɛ. Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa issɛ isam kuddu ayyɔɔt innyi ikpana ayyɔɔt.
Ulenɛ ka ɔyanga-bɔfɛɛn ɔyɛnnɛ ɔkpana ammɛ ka ulenɛ ka kɛggyan a bɔfɛɛn, ɔkkaamnɛ luppyam ufim ɔkpana ammɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔggyannɛ kinnyi, ule ɔnaang nang ɔttɛ ammɛ unnyi mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm latele?
Bwaan anaam, kɛsaap ayyɔɔt kɛfɔngɔ kile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lammwɔɔl za ilɔɔknɛ ka kamma, kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa lɔkkwɔɔn, sa kɛyɔɔnɛsɛ kɛyɔɔng ka linaang.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ile isan ittɛ ayyɔɔt ile ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔkkwɔɔn. Nkwɔng kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ippyam ayyɔɔt ile iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ippyam ibɛpɛnɛyɔngyɛlɛ isanbong ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttanɛ ippyam ayyɔɔt liggbenge; ɔsan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Inngwa anaam, ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ippyam ayyɔɔt isinɛyɛlɛ lɛbɛpɛ, iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ibapnɛ ka ammɛ vvenɛ itɔkbwɛ ka itelenɛ lafɔɔ ammɛ, inaang kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, iyanga kiyila ka lɛkɔɔl a Waan ammɛ, Jesus Christ. Wayyɔɔt ɔsaapyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ.

Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ ule wa ammɛ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa isannɛ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ullu ka tɔkɔlɔ ayyɔɔt ka ulenɛyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ linnyi.

Inngwa luppyam anaam, Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayila akupyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba battɛnɛ bayanga mung Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga allɛbɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ ulenɛ ka kuyeeng kwa bayanganɛ kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asan. Bakkala-lalaak, ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ggbadam batii ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale asan Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ Jesus Christ ɔdɔkɔ uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔyanga Kuyeeng kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuffu.

Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkalanɛ ’kwɔng utum Jesus, Kuyeeng kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔyanga. Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kussi ka Ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ. Appyeebong attɛyɔng vvenɛ kuffu, gɔɔ gedegede mung kutii ka vveengodde.

Ɔzzànga, bwaan anaam, aleyɔng ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Abɛtɛyɔngbong bakkala-lɛlaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka Kuyeeng kwa kulenɛ ka annyɔɔng kɔttanɛ liggbenge kɔtta kuyeeng kwa balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka vveengodde.
Litolo abbɛ litum lilɔɔk a vveengodde, vveengodde ɔgɔpɔlɔsɛ ka lilenɛ lilɔɔk sa ammɛ.

Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt ile ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsannɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgɔpɔlɔ kwa ayyɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile kwa ayyɔɔt ba ɔgɔpɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga ’wɔng ulenɛ ɛtɔk ya ikkwoongnɛ ibwɔɔlɔ bubuubuu Kuyeeng kwa lɔkkwɔɔn la kuyeeng kwa kusinɛ kwa lɔkkwɔɔn lile.
Inngwa anaam, isaapyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɔngɔwɔyɔng kitun ka kɛsaap kissinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanganɛ kɛsaap la balɔɔt ule Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔsan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kɛsaap, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ɔsan ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ kɛsaap.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛyɛlɛ kɛsaap ammɛ. Ɔtɔɔm waan ammɛ wa ɔyanganɛ keem, uffu ka vveeng ’wɔng nkwaaning iyanga kuddu kwa kussinɛ ka ammɛ.
Kɛsaap kile ning mung; Kɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsaap mung yɛlɛ lissi. Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt isaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔtɔɔm waan ammɛ uffu nkwaaning ule ɛtɔk a kɛsɔɔk a bubbi ayyɔɔt.
Inngwa anaam, ulenɛ ka isaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ning mung, nzang wayyɔɔt ɔ́saapyɛlɛ.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka zzeen lɛyɛn ba ule. Ulenɛ ka wayyɔɔt ɔsaapnɛyɛlɛ nzang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa ka bɔkaat la ayyɔɔt. Ɔnaang kɛsaap ammɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ayyɔɔt kile sa doddo ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ isan ka lɔkkwɔɔn ittɛ ile ka bɔkaat la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ammɛ ɔssɛ ule ka bɔkaat la ayyɔɔt ka ulenɛyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ linnyi.
Ɔzzànga iyɛnbong isan, ibwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt balɔk ittɛ Abassɛ ɔtɔɔmnɛ Waan ammɛ ɔttɛ uffu ɔzzánga Ɔkkala-ikkala vveeng ’wɔng.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ppwool ɔttɛ Jesus ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule la ammɛ, ammɛ ɔssɛ ule la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ayyɔɔt biini isan, iyila kwa kɛsaap sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanganɛ la ayyɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ kɛsaap, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtaanɛ ka kɛsaap, ɔtaa ka bɔkaat la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ ɔtaa ka bɔkaat la ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang kɛsaap kigbengeyɛlɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔkkɔɔnɛ iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam ka kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ iyangasɛ ka kuddu ayyɔɔt ka vveeng ’wɔng kulenɛ kɛssanga ssɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa Christ.
Bbwɔp ka kɛsaap ba lile. Kɛsaap sa lɔkkwɔɔn kɛggba lilɔɔk a bbwɔp ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga ka kulenɛ ning mung, kɛsaap sa doddo ba kile ka luppyam ɔbbwɔp ka bbwɔp lissɛnɛ ka kɛyɛn akama.
Iyanga kɛsaap, ka ayyɔɔt ittenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsaap.

Ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Ntele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm”, wabbɛ utunmɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkala-lɛlaak. Ba ukkwoong utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtakamɛnɛ lɛyɛn ka zzeen ka usinɛ wabbɛ wa ulemɛnɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn litele.
Uwɔng ulenɛ lafɔɔ za Christ unnyinɛyɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsaapmɛnɛ wabbɛ ɔssɛ ɔsaapmɛ ɔgbaa.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt-wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ulenɛ waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ abassɛ ɔlɔɔt, ɔssɛbong utele awaan ɔgbaa.
Nkwɔng kɔnaangnɛ isan ittɛ bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basaapyɛlɛ lɔsaap; Kule ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔsaapyɛlɛ, itele lafɔɔ ammɛ.
Ifɛɛt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsaapnɛyɛlɛ ilenɛ ka ile itele lafɔɔ ammɛ. Lafɔɔ ammɛ gaang yɛlɛ ba lakoolo.
Waan ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ulenɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong lukkwoong ɔbɛtɛ vveengodde. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inaangnɛ ikkwoong ibɛtɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung ka kiyila ayyɔɔt.
Nyinɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔbɛtɛ vveeng ’wɔng? Ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem kɛyɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ.

Jesus Christ uffu la bannyi baptizim ammɛ la linnyi lubbe ammɛ. Bannyi ’bɔng baang keem lissi ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ uffu, ɔkɔɔm bannyi la linnyi uffu. Kuyeeng biini kɔbwɔɔlɔ kɔttɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ka Kuyeeng kulenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ittɛɛsɛ ile ikkyaat.
Kuyeeng la bannyi la linnyi. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bɛlɔɔk kɛssanga ssɔn.
Iyilanɛ kwa ittɛɛsɛ ya ɔssɛbibit ubeenɛ, ɔzzànga ittɛɛsɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinyɛlɛ ittanɛ lɛkkaam. Ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng ilenɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ utum Awaan.

Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa Awaan ɔyanga ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang ka luppyam ammɛ biini. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ liyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔkkwɔɔbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala-lɛlaak ka ufimnɛ kiyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ utum Waan ammɛ.
Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng kulenɛ ittɛɛsɛ: Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyibongyɛlɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Kuddu ’kwɔng kussi ka Awaan.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa balenɛ ka bɔkaat la Awaan, ɔyanga kuddu ’kwɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ ka bɔkaat la Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile, kuddu ba ɔyanga.
Nkkpɔk ’wɔng nfeewɔyɔng nkwaaning asan attɛyɔng ayangayɔng kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal, annyɔɔng ba ayanganɛyɔng kiyila atumyɔng Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam ka isannɛ ittɛ ibapmɛnɛ bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ammɛ uffiknɛ, bule bbwak, vvenɛ ɔgɔpɔlɔ uppyee.
Uppyeeyɛlɛ luppyee ɛkɛtɛ duu ya ibapmɛnɛ, ka isannɛ ittɛ ’kwɔng kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔgbaa isan lɔsan ittɛ unnyi mung yɛlɛ bwa ibapmɛnɛ.

Ayɛnnɛ ɔkpana annɔ ka ɔnaangnɛ bubbi bwa bule busimɛ lɛwwɔɔl, azɔɔm annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ule unnyimɛ kuddu. Nkwɔng mung kule kwa balɔɔt ba bubbi abbɛ bule busi bɛ lɛwwɔɔl. Ɔzzànga bubbi bule baang bwa buwwɔɔlnɛ ɔlɔɔt, ba nlɔɔk nttɛ azɔɔm annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ’kwɔng baang.
Kɛnaang a lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bubbi, ɔzzànga bubbi bule baang bwa businɛ ɔlɔɔt lɛwwɔɔl.
Isan mung ittɛ waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi kkpɛt kkpɛt ba ule, ka Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkatmɛnɛ; Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ba ukkwoong uddopomɛ.
Isan lɔsan ittɛ ile ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mkkpa vveeng ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka kɔkɔɔm Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng.

Isan lɔsan ittɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffubong. Unnyiyɛlɛ kippyee kɔlɔɔk nkwaaning isan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔkkwɔɔn. Itaa ka bɔkaat la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔkkwɔɔn, itaa ka bɔkaat la Jesus Christ, Waan Ammɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔkkwɔɔn. Uwɔng ulenɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Bwaan anaam, akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng ilat!
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Ɔgɛlɛnya– Nfee waanawanavva luppyam anaam la bwɔɔn ammɛ ba basaapnɛnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Anaam kɛyɔɔng keem lissi ka asaapnɛnɛ, assɛ asaap balɔɔt balɔk ba basannɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɔtaa la ayyɔɔt lule gwa ayyɔɔt ka kɛfal a kɛfal.
Numa Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Jesus, la Jesus Christ biini bannyiwɔyɔng kɛsaap, la kibbelɛttɔ, la bɔkaat! Numa bile bya ayyɔɔt ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka kɛsaap.
Ndɔkɔ nggele gaang gaang ka nsannɛ nttɛ bwɔɔn annyɔɔng bayanga lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka tɔkɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Dedde ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ.
Kwakkwɛ nkkpengewɔnɛ waanawanavva luppyam anaam, nttɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt isaapyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng. Uwɔng mung ufaa lifɔɔ lissi ka ikkpɔknɛ ifeewɔyɔng, ule lifɔɔ za liggbanɛ lissi lile ka lutte.
Kɛsaap sa nlɔɔknɛ ntum mung ulenɛ kɛtaa ka bɔkaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛ lifɔɔ. Lifɔɔ ’zɔng za aggbanɛyɔng lippyee ka lutte lɛttɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt itaa ka kɛsaap.
Bafɛɛt-ifɛtɛ ggbadam baffubong ka vveeng. Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ liyila battɛ Jesus Christ uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt. Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt wa ning baang ulenɛ ɔfɛɛt-ifɛtɛ, ule ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ ɔgbaa.
Akatwɔ kɛyɔɔng nkwaaning asi bwa ayanganɛ lɛtaka, ɔlɔk atɔk lɛsɔɔk annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ lukopolo a Christ ka luppyam lɛssɛɛn, ɔnaang ɔsak, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kkwɔɔt mɛ ba ule. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔssɛɛnnɛ lukopolo ’gwɔng baang ka luppyam, ɔyanga Abassɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Awaan ka kkwɔɔt.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ, usi ’kwɔng likopolo, tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkmɛ assɛɛn ka ssala, gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ attɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annɔ.”
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ bɔkaat butaa la ammɛ usseke ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka babbu linaang sa ɔnaangnɛ.
Nyanga bɛfɛɛn ggbadam bya nle nbwɔɔlɔwɔ. Ndɔkɔ nttɛ gɔɔ baala nkkpɔkkwɛ ka ɛbbanga; lutini ’gwɔng nttinawɔ kiffu kɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔk nlɔɔk la annɔ biini, nkwaaning iggele gaang gaang.
Bwɔɔn a etele annɔ ya luppyam battɛ nwomowɔ.
Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Ɔgɛlɛnga– Nfee Gaius wa ɔsaapnɛnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Ɛnngwa anaam, Gaius, nzɔɔm nttɛ kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔfɔngɔwɔ kikoolo, ɔzzànga vvenɛ ataa ka buppwolo a kkwɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nsannɛ nttɛ aggba mung la kuyeeng.
Ndɔkɔ nggele gaang ka ikpana anaam ilɔk baffunɛ babwɔɔlɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayanganɛ kiyila ka lɔkkwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggbanɛ lissi ataa ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Bulɔk bwa bunaangnɛnɛ nggele gaang ba bule ɔgbaa la kwa nppyeenɛ nttɛ bwaan anaam bale ka lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
Ɛnngwa anaam ya luppyam, àyàngà kiyila gaang gaang ka kɛnaang sa anaangnɛ annyi ikpana annɔ, ɔgbaa la ɛkɛtɛ ya batiinɛ bakekeen.
Balɔɔkbong kɔlɔɔk a kɛsaap annɔ babwɔɔlɔ luzɔɔm. Ellee, attelebɛ ka kɔssɛ abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ka bafeelenɛ kɔssɛ abbɛ bamii kɛnaang a Christ, basi lɛggyan battɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila uttelebɛ.
Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ittele balɔɔt ’bɔng mung nkwaaning itul lɔkkwɔɔn a kɛnaang abbɛ iyanga.
Nkkpɔk waan a lɛmmwɔɔl bbwɛt ning nfee luzɔɔm, ɔzzànga Diotrephes, wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ule ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk abbɛ, baala ɔgɔpɔlɔ kwa nlɔɔknɛ.

Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nffu, vvenɛ nssɛɛl bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ulenɛ lɛnaang. Babbu lilɔɔk sa ɔlɔɔknɛ utumyɛlɛ, la lalaak za ɔkkalanɛ utumyɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng baang keem ba kɔtaka kɔyyɛɛpmɛ, baala ɔtɔk ikpana ammɛ ka laggele ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bale baffu, gɔɔ vvenɛ utunu balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ nzang batɔkbɛ. Gɔɔ ɔggyanbɛ kɛggba batta basseke ggwoon a luzɔɔm.

Ɛnngwa anaam ya luppyam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akeet kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ, ɔzzànga akeet kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ nzang ammɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtaka ɔyɛn.
Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔlɔɔk budoddo utum Demetrius, lɔkkwɔɔn biini lɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a budoddo lutummɛ. Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa, igbaa buttɛɛsɛ ayyɔɔt, ɔsan ɔttɛ kwa ilɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
Nyanga lilɔɔk ggbadam sa bubwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ, ɔzzànga ba nggyan nttɛ nkkpɔk ka luvva nbwɔɔlɔwɔ.
Nggyanwɔ kɛyɛn ssuma ssuma mung nkwaaning ilɔɔk ka isso ka isso.
Bɔkaat butaa la annɔ. Inngwa annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ bawomowɔbong. Akɔɔm kamma annɔ awomo inngwa ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Lissi ka Jude, bɔɔyi a Jesus Christ, etele a James– Ɔtɔɔm ufee balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ, bataa ka kɛsaap a Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la ikata Jesus Christ.
Ayangayɔng kibbelɛttɔ la bɔkaat, la kɛsaap uggboggbo.

Inngwa anaam ka luppyam, ndɔkɔ nbum nttɛ nkkpɔk ntum kɔlɔɔk a kuddu kwa itulnɛ itɔkyɔng gedegede mung. Mung nkkpɔk nbbawɔyɔng bikɔɔm nttɛ abum ayangayɔng kiyila sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ balɔɔt ammɛ linnyi ukpeke.

Balɔɔt balɔk ba basinɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila bamalbongyɛlɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ ba isan. Abbɛ bassangnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt basikili ɔlɔk lɛtaa bbwak la babbu linaang abbɛ. Bafimbong Jesus Christ, Dedde ayyɔɔt la Uyini ayyɔɔt, ka isimi ka isimi. Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔkbong lutum lubbe gwa balenɛ lɛtɔk.
Mkkpandɔk aleyɔng ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛsan, nggyan nttɛ nkkewɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ɔkkalanɛ balɔɔt a Israel ka ɛkpansi Egypt ɔppyɛɛ ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila.

Akkeyɔng bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba basinɛ lakke za bannyinɛbɛ lɛkɔɔm bakpeke ka ɛfɛɛn a battɛnɛ bakpeke, bappyɛɛ bamma basseke ssala abbɛ. Bassɛɛnbongbɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ya kɛfal a kɛfal ka kisul kuttɔɔk, ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛbɛ ɔkat Kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke za ule ɔwwɔɔlbɛ.

Akkeyɔng Sodom la Gomorrah, la laffɛ za lakkɛtɛnɛbɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang badɔkɔ banaang kɛbɛpɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’bɔng baang. Bakup bwanavva balɔɔt, banaang bɛfɛɛn a lakkpi, vvenɛ bayɛn akama ka lɔkɔɔn gwa kɛfal a kɛfal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔttama wa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bayɛnnɛ buyɛnɛ bwa budɛmnɛbɛ banaang bubbi batum kkwɔɔt abbɛ. Bafim lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bassɛɛn balɔɔt a latele ba libat ka izzit.

Gɔɔ Michael, ubeet a bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ’kwɔng usi lɛnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ kɔwɔlɔ abbɛ la Ubbu-kuyeeng ka ɛkɛtɛ batutalanɛ kkwɔɔt a Moses. Michael usi Ubbu-kuyeeng lɛkpɛn la lammwɔɔl za labbɔlnɛ. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Uyini ɔnaangwɔ mkpatamkpat.”
Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakpɛn bɛfɛɛn bya basinɛ lɛsan, la bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bya bɛnaangwɔnɛ ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat. Abbyɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bɛwwɔɔlnɛbɛ.

Vvenɛ kɔbbɔl kɔsak la balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ ɛtɔk ya Cain ɔssɛnɛ. Basambongbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi kɛsɛpɛ sa Balaam ɔsɛpɛnɛ bakup kusapa ikkpoko. Bafimbong lakke ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Korah ufimnɛ. Mung bawwɔɔlbongbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ.

Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ labil za lalenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ kazzi kɛkaan; izzit ba basan. Bassɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ bavva batak babimi, bazzi lizzi. Kɔbɛtɛbɛ kwa abbɛ biini kɛyɔɔng. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkpálá ya isɛlɛnɛ bannyi ka kɛffa kɛffanɛyɛ. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛssɛ bya bisinɛ lakkpɔ lɛwɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya buwɔmnɛ. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛssɛ bya balenɛbyɛ lɛmmɔk. Babbebong ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ labba bannyi ka lihu. Bɛfɛɛn izzit bya banaangnɛ bɛfɔl bɛ̀tɔ̀kɔ̀ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iffuku. Bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan-ittuma ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ ɛfɛɛn liloko ka kisul sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang basseke ka bassɛnɛ gbɔɔ bakkpit.
Ɔdɔkɔ Enoch wa ɔnaangnɛ ka balɔɔt bwɔlaaning ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu Adam bbwak, ka ɔyɛnnɛ biyɛnɛ utumbɛ ka isimi ka isimi ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk, Uyini vvenɛ uffu la innɔ innɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba doddo.
Vvenɛ uffu ɔkaal kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi basi ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile ka babbu linaang sa banaangnɛ, la babbu lammwɔɔl za balɔɔknɛ batum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung batutala lututala bakɔɔm bannyi babbɛ kibbi bakup kuwɔnɔk abbɛ biini. Banaang kamma abbɛ biini. Bakɔɔm kɛyyɛɛp a kamma baggyan ɛtɔk a budoddo ya abbɛ.
Akkeyɔng tɛ, inngwa anaam. Akkeyɔng kwa bayilabɔtɔɔm Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng tɛ!
Babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng battɛ, “Ɔffɔnɛ ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke, balɔɔt vvenɛ baffu ba bakkalanɛ lalaak la annyɔɔng. Mbɔng baang bakkɔlɔnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsaap.”
Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba bazzɔɔknɛ nyakala ka kɔlɔɔk, bakup kuwɔnɔk abbɛ biini. Abbɛ balenɛ ba basɛlɛnɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng inngwa anaam, akɔɔmyɔng ning baang, ka kiyila annyɔɔng sa lɔkkwɔɔn. Azɔɔmyɔng ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Ataayɔng ka kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka alenɛyɔng ka kɛkat a Jesus wa ule unnyiwɔyɔng kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ka kibbe lɛttɔ sa abbemɛnɛyɔng.
Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ ikangala ka luppyam babbewɔyɔng lɛttɔ.
Akkalayɔngbɛ, asangayɔngbɛ ka lɔkɔɔn. Babbewɔyɔng lɛttɔ ɔgbaa. Ɔzzànga babwɔpɔwɔyɔng kinnyi kibbi, ka linaang abbɛ lilenɛ lɛbbɔl ka kusapa bubbi abbɛ.
Abungumɛyɔng ammɛ wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng asiyɔng lɛttɔ. Ukkwoong utunu babbu lilɔɔk ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng, ataayɔng ka laggele ka lusso ammɛ.
Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔkkala-ikkala, ayyɔɔt keem. Latele la Mgbeede la kizzi lɛttɔ ka ussinɛ ka bɛkkpa bya isimi la bya gedegede mung, bɛssɛ ka Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt bɛffɔmɛ kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.

Luvva ’gwɔng mung lutum kɔlɔɔk kwa Jesus Christ ɔyɔɔnɛ, kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ ɔttɛ ɔyɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ kwa kule kɔnaang gedegede mung. Christ ɔtɔɔm uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ umii ɔnaang bɔɔyi ammɛ, John, ɔyɛn lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
John ɔbwɔɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ulenɛ lɛyɛn. Uwɔng ulenɛ ibwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ.

Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bakkwɔɔnɛ luvva ’gwɔng. Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bagɔpɔlɔnɛ lammwɔɔl a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batele bwa bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva ’gwɔng. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛkkɛtɛbong ya bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bɛnaang.

Kussi ka John ufee izɔɔm ya innaammikkyaat ya ilenɛ ka ɛkpansi Asia. Ppyɛɛ la bɔkaat bwa bussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm butaa la annyɔɔng. Ammɛ wa ulenɛ gedegede mung, ɔdɔkɔ, wa ule uffu la liyeeng linnangikkyaat ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ.
Ɔbɛtɛ la ppyɛɛ wa ussinɛ ka Jesus Christ, ttɛɛsɛ ammɛ wa doddo. Waan ikeeng wa ufungalanɛ ka lubbe ule uzzilɛttɔ babeet ɛkpansi. Isaapmɛ gaang gaang. Ɔsangayɛlɛ ka bubbi ka lubbe gwa ubbenɛ.
Ɔnaangyɛlɛ itutum a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔttɛ itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ammɛ la Abassɛ ammɛ. Latele la lakke lale za Jesus Christ kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.
Ppyɛɛkmɛ ka ule ka uffunɛ la ikkpálá. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn vvenɛ ɔyɛnmɛ, ngbaa la balɔɔt ba bakɔmmɛnɛ kɛfɔl. Balɔɔt ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bataamɛ kullu. Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Kulening.
“Anaam nlenɛ Alpha nle Omega.” Uyini ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔlɔɔknɛ. Ammɛ wa ulenɛ gedegede mung wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ule, la wa ule ka uffunɛ.

Anaam nlenɛ John, ɔkpana annyɔɔng wa nlenɛ la Jesus ka kɛyɛn akama, la ka Itutum ammɛ ka kɛbbɔ akama. Badɔkɔ balokonɛ ka likkpɔ ɛkpansi za lɛzzanganɛ Patmos ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛkpansi ya bannyi bakkpitnɛyɛ, ka nbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa Jesus ɔyɔɔnɛ.
Ka Kɛtɔm-Uyini, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtɔknɛ kɔyanga. Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛttanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luffi, lɛlɔɔk likupnɛ ka isimi.
Lɛttɛ, “Akkpɔk bwa ayɛnnɛ, atɔɔm luvva ’gwɔng baang afee izɔɔm ’yɔng mung innammikkyaat: Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, la Laodicea.
Nssang nsikili nttɛ nyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa utolonɛ unnyinɛ. Nppyɛɛknɛ nyɛn ikkandul innammikkyaat ya gold baang ka ibeenɛ.
Bɔfɛɛn bubee ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt la uwɔkɔlɔ ka buwɔkɔlɔnɛ ɔffɔbwɛ ka bukkpɔ, la ɛkkpa ya banaangnɛyɛ la gold ka buggbɔnɛ ka ukwukwulu.
Kittulu abbwɛ kɛllaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwuu. Zzeen abbwɛ lɛnyanga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn.
Bukkpɔ abbwɛ bukoot tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lukkpi ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn. Lɛmmwɔɔl abbwɛ lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔl sa lɛbaang.
Ɔkɔɔm bwaanttuma bannambakkyaat ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk, ogge lafoom laffa ɔttabwɛ ka kamma. Lusso abbwɛ luwongolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ livve luwee lɛnyanyanɛ ka kikoon ɔggbɔggba.
Nyɛnnɛbwɛ, nttɔ ka lataak ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubbu ɔlɔɔt. Utelenɛ kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ! Anaam nlenɛ lutte la lakpeke.
Anaam nlemɛnɛ ammɛ wa ulenɛ ka kuddu. Ndɔkɔbong nbbe. Ɔzzanga ppyɛɛk, ntii ka kuddu ka kɛfal a kɛfal. Nyangabong lakke ntta lubbe la ɛkpansi babbu.
Ɔzzànga akkpɔk bɛfɛɛn bya alenɛ lɛyɛn, bya bilenɛ gedegede mung la bya bile bɛnaang ka lusso.

Mung ulenɛ ifɛɛt a bwaannttuma ba ayɛnnɛyɔng ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk anaam, la ikkandul ya innammikkyaat; Bwaannttuma ba bannambakkyaat ulenɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka izɔɔm ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat. Ikkandul ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat ilenɛ izɔɔm ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat.

“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ ka Ephesus: “Bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng bulenɛ bwa bussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ bwaannttuma bannambakkyaat ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ, wa ɔssɛnɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ ikkandul ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat ya gold.

Nsan lɔsan bwa alenɛyɔng lɛnaang. Nsan lɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng kɛnaang gaang lɛnaang la kibbe luppyam sa alenɛyɔng libbe. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ kwa banaang-a-bubbi baala ayilayɔng. Nttina nttɛ, allɛyɔngbong balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ, ɔzzànga usibɛ abbɛ lile. Asanyɔngbong attɛyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakkala-lalaak.
Abbeyɔngbong luppyam ayɛnyɔng akama ka lɛttɔ anaam, ɔzzànga ba ataka akkyaa afɔngɔyɔng.
Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng kulenɛ kwa nfimwɔnɛyɔng kwɛ: Nɛ yɔng ba abɛlɛyɔng litele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ adɔkɔnɛ atelenɛyɔng ka ikeeng.

Akkeyɔng bufulu bwa alenɛyɔng lɛttɔ. Akkyaa bubbi annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng, appyɛlɛ anaangyɔng kwa agbanɛyɔng lissi anaangyɔng ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk. Asinɛyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, vvenɛ nffu nsam ikkandul ’yɔng ka kibee annyɛ ngbata ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
Ɔzzànga mung ulenɛ bwa bubeenɛ la annyɔɔng: Lilɔɔk sa balɔɔt a Nicolaitan banaangnɛ litunwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ litunnɛnɛ anaam.

“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ la izɔɔm. “Vvenɛ nnyi balɔɔt bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛbɛtɛ lakke za kizzi likkpo lɛsan a kɛssɛ kuddu za libeenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ulenɛ ka luzɔɔm ka Smyrna attɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ulenɛ ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk la lakpeke, wa ubbenɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ ufungala ɔtaa ka kuddu.

Nsan lilɔɔk annyɔɔng lɔsan. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ annyɔɔng ɔbbɔlwɔyɔng lɔbbɔl; ɔzzànga ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng lɔyyɛɛp. Nsan babbu lilɔɔk sa balɔɔt ba babbwanɛ battɛ abbɛ balɔɔt a Jews balɔɔknɛ batumwɔyɔng. Abbɛ balenɛ kukup a balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba Satan.

Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akama wa ale ayɛnyɔng ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Satan vvenɛ ɔllɛwɔyɔng ka ule ɔssang balɔɔt balɔk ɔssɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ. Lilɔɔk annyɔɔng litaa littumu ka bɛtɔm zzɔɔp. Ayangayɔng kiyila ka anaam, gɔɔ mkkpa ule lubbe, vvenɛ nnyiwɔyɔng ododo-kuddu.
“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm. Balɔɔt ba babɛtɛnɛ baala bayɛn akama ka lubbe gwa lule lɔbbal liffu.”
“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luzɔɔm a Pergamum attɛ: “Bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng mung bussi ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔyanganɛ ogge wa ɔlamnɛ lafoom laffa laffa.

Nsan lɔsan ka ɛfɛɛn allunɛyɔng. Alluyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a Satan ayanganɛ ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ. Alenɛyɔng balɔɔt anaam ba lɔkkwɔɔn. Luppyam annyɔɔng asiyɔng lɛsam ka kkwɔɔt anaam gɔɔ gbaak ka ɛkɛtɛ ya badɔkɔnɛ bawwɔɔl Antipas, ttɛɛsɛ anaam ka ɛfɛɛn a Satan ullunɛ.

Ɔzzànga bwaan a lilɔɔk lile mung sa nlɔɔknɛ ntumwɔyɔng. Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ba bakupnɛ lukopolo a Balaam. Ammɛ ukopolonɛ Balak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ule ɔnaang balɔɔt a Israel banaang bubbi ka bazzinɛ kazzi kwa balenɛ ilat likkpele, la kikup a bwanavva.
Ɔgbaa assɛ ayangayɔng balɔɔt ba ning baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ba bakupnɛ lukopolo balɔɔt a Nicolaitan.
Akkyaa bubbi annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng. Nzang asinɛyɔng lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, nle ka nkɔɔmnɛ ogge wa ɔttanɛnɛ ka kamma gedegede mung nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng nllu kullu la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.

“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ! “Vvenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛbɛtɛ bazzi kazzi lalup kwa kazzanganɛ manna. Vvenɛ nnyi ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ulata lɛttaal za balenɛ ufaa lɛkɔɔl lɛkkpɔk; za balɔɔt balɔk bale basi lɛsan, ukpeke ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang keem wa ɔyanganɛzɛ ka ule ɔsan.”

“Akkpɔk afee Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ ka luzɔɔm ka Thyatira attɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa zzeen ammɛ lappwolonɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn, bukkpɔ ammɛ bullaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lukkpi gwa balenɛ gwɛ lɛkkpɔlɔ.

Nsan lɔsan bwa anaangnɛyɔng. Nsan mung kɛsaap annyɔɔng, la kiyila annyɔɔng, la kinnyi latele annyɔɔng la kibbe-lɛttɔ. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ anaangyɔngbong gaang gaang gedegede mung attayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔmɛlɔm.

Ɔzzànga mung ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa nyanganɛ ntumwɔyɔng: Ayilayɔngbong kwa wanavva ’wɔng baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Jezebel, wa ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ukopolo ɔdɛm ibɔɔyi anaam ippyɛlɛ ifula ka kɛnaang a babbu lilɔɔk, bazzi lizzi sa bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi ilat.
Nnyimɛbong ɛkɛtɛ nttɛ ɔkkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi ɔfɔngɔ, ɔzzànga ba ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔkkyaa kɛssɛ kɛzak ɔfɔngɔ.

Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nsammɛ nwulu ka igolo, ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ la balɔɔt ba bamininɛ la ammɛ bale bayɛn akama wa lɛbaang. Vvenɛ nkka ’kwɔng lɛnaang, ɔzzànga bakkyaanɛ kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn izzit bafɔngɔ, vvenɛ nkkyaa nfongo.
Vvenɛ nwwɔɔl balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔgbaa, nkwaaning izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ isan ittɛ anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nsannɛ ippyam a balɔɔt la ittina abbɛ. Vvenɛ nkipili ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn nssanga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ lɛnaang ɔffɔ.

“Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng balɔɔt balɔk ba alenɛyɔng ka Thyatira ba ataka akupyɔng ubbu lukopolo ’wɔng. Ba ataka akkoopyɔng kwa balɔɔt balɔk bakkwɔɔnɛ, ’kɔlɔɔk a lalup a Satan kwa ddɔng’. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, baala ngbaawɔyɔng akama ɔlɔk.
Ɔzzànga akɔɔmyɔng bwa bulewɔnɛyɔng ka eddu kkpɔk tɔttɔt nppyɛlɛ nffu.

Kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba babɛtɛnɛ, batiinɛ baang ka banaangnɛ kwa nggyannɛ nttɛ banaang tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka lakpeke, vvenɛ nnyibɛ kɛssanga lakke za ntɔknɛ ka Dedde anaam. Vvenɛ nnyibɛ lakke za kɛkɔɔm ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ la lɛgabwɔ. Babɔlbɛ sukusuku tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfaak ikkpo. Vvenɛ nnyibɛ ubbele-ettuma wa ɔttanɛ lɔfɔm.
“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ la izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ!”

“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a luzɔɔm a Sardis attɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ liyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm linnangkkyaat, la bwaannttuma bannambakkyaat. Nsan mung bwa anaangnɛ. Nsan mung nttɛ balɔɔt battɛ ale ka kuddu mkkpa ale libbe.
Afeele kkpalap, alɔm bwa ayanganɛ kkpɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bubbe busal ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nsanbong nttɛ bwa anaangnɛyɔng ba butaka buyyɛɛp buffata ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam.

Akke kwa appyeenɛyɔng la kwa bakopolowɔnɛyɔng, ateleyɔngkwɛ; afɔngɔyɔng kɛnaang a bubbi. Asinɛyɔng lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, vvenɛ nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip. Gɔɔ ligbɛkɛ baala asanyɔng za nle nffu.
Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng balɔk ka Sardis alokoyɔngbong iwɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng kpaladada. Vvenɛ assɛyɔng la anaam la balata iwɔkɔlɔ ka akkɔnɔnɛyɔng.

Balɔɔt ba babɛtɛnɛ bale bayanga balata iwɔkɔlɔ ning mung ka kkwɔɔt. Baala nkkpɔlɔ lakɔɔl abbɛ ka kɛkpaka luvva balɔɔt a kuddu. Vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔ kpelegedee ka lusso a Dedde la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ nttɛ abbɛ balɔɔt anaam bbwak.
“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk za kippyee kɔlɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔ appyeeyɔng kwa Kuyeeng kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ!”

“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa luzɔɔm a Philadelphia attɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ammɛ ulenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ a David, wa uwongolonɛ, ɔlɔɔt usi likkwoong ɔfɛɛn; wa ɔfɛɛnnɛ, ɔlɔɔt usi likkwoong uwongolo.
Nsan mung bwa anaangnɛyɔng. Nsan mung nttɛ likke lilewɔyɔng ssup. Akupyɔngbong lukopolo anaam, anaangyɔng bwa nggyannɛ. Nwongolobong lɛmma nlokowɔyɔng, za ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule usi likkwoong ɔfɛɛn.

Agɔpɔlɔyɔng! Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa likup a balɔɔt a Satan, bakkala-lalaak ’bɔng baang ba battɛnɛ abbɛ balɔɔt a Jews ka basinɛ ba Jews lile, vvenɛ nnaangbɛ baffu bakunwɔyɔng laddu ka lataak. Vvenɛ basan battɛ asaapnɛyɔng lɔsaap.
Ka alenɛyɔng lɔttama anaam liloko ka kibbe luppyam, vvenɛ nkkalawɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk kwa kule kuffu ka vveengodde ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔllɛ balɔɔt ɛkpansi.
Nle nkka liffu. Akɔɔmyɔng bwa ayanganɛyɔng kkpɔk. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uffu ɔnnaawɔyɔng lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang za basɔɔkwɔnɛyɔng.

Vvenɛ nnaang ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɛtɛnɛ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ likoop a ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam. Bwa bule bunaang ɔbbal lɛgbata ussekegwɛ ba bule. Vvenɛ nkkpɔk lɛkɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ la lɛkɔɔl a killu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam sa kɛzzanganɛ ufaa Jerusalem, sa kile kɛtta ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam kiffu. Vvenɛ nkkpɔkmɛ ufaa lɛkɔɔl anaam ka kkwɔɔt ɔgbaa.
“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Kuyeeng kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ!”

“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa luzɔɔm a Laodicea attɛ: “Uwɔng bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka ammɛ wa ɔzzanganɛ ‘Kulening’, wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila la buttɛɛsɛ bwa lɔkkwɔɔn, ulenɛ lutte bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ.
Nsan mung bwa alenɛyɔng lɛnaang. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ttuttu ba aleyɔng gɔɔ bɛmɛbɛmɛ ba aleyɔng. Buttɛnɛ adɔkɔyɔng ’bwɔng ɔlɔk bbwakang nzang kɔyyɛɛp!
Ɔzzànga mung ka alenɛyɔng bekebeke, asiyɔng ttuttu ɔlɔk bɛmɛbɛmɛ lile, vvenɛ nkkwɔɔkwɔyɔng nzzɔɔk.
Attɛyɔng, ‘Ɔyyɛɛpnɛ lɔyyɛɛp, nyanga bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa nggyannɛ,’ ɔzzànga ba asan attɛyɔng aleyɔng ba akama gaang la kibbe-lɛttɔ. Ɔbbɔlwɔyɔng lɔbbɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ. Aleyɔng kɛkɔɔ, assiyɔng afim agbaayɔng.
Nbbawɔyɔng bikɔɔm nttɛ alɛɛpyɔng gold biini, nkwaaning ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng. Alɛɛpyɔng balata ibba akulayɔng, kɛkɔɔ kɛnaang izzit. Alɛɛpyɔng kɛssɛ ɔgbaa assɛɛnyɔng ka zzeen, nkwaaning ayɛnyɔng.
Nwɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basaapnɛnɛ, nyɔɔbɛ akama. Kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng, akkyaayɔng kɛnaang a bubbi afɔngɔyɔng.
Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Nbee ka lɛmma ggwoon nlip nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam uwongolonɛ lɛmma, vvenɛ nmal ka ggwoon ammɛ itul kazzi izzi.
Vvenɛ nnyi balɔɔt ba babɛtɛnɛ lakke za bataanɛnɛ ka lufoom ka ugbaal a kibeet anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nlenɛ lɛbɛtɛ nle ka lufoom a Dedde ka ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ ka ntaanɛ.
“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔ kwa kuyeeng kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.!”

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng nbbal biyɛnɛ bilɔk lɛyɛn ka lɛmma ggwoon liwongolonɛ ka libat. Lɛmmwɔɔl za nlenɛzɛ kkpal lippyee lɛtta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luffi, lɛlɔɔk la anaam lɛttɛ, “Affu kaang ning, vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔ kwa kule kɔnaang ’kwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal.”
Eseese, Kuyeeng kɔtɔknɛ kɔyanga. Ugbaal a kibeet ule bakang ka libat la ɔlɔɔt baang ka ɔtaanɛ ka ammɛ.
Lusso ammɛ luwongolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛttaal za lɛzzanganɛ Jasper la Carnelian. Egwugwulu ɛtta ekkpit ugbaal a kibeet la ubili buppwolo bwa ititiban-ititiban.
Lɔlɔp la igbaal a kibeet inna itaa ligbolo ikkpit ugbaal a kibeet ’wɔng baang. Lɔlɔp la bagɛlɛnya banna bale baang la balata iwɔkɔlɔ ka bawɔkɔlɔnɛ la bɛttɔpɔ a gold ka bataanɛ.

Ìkkpálá la immwalang la latumu bɛtta baang ka ɛfɛɛn a kibeet ’sɔng baang. Ikɔɔn innammikkyaat ile baang ka ikutnɛ ka lusso kibeet ’sɔng baang. Ikɔɔn ’yɔng baang ilenɛ liyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa linnaangikkyaat.
Bɔfɛɛn budɔkɔ baang ka lusso kibeet bwa bubalnɛ kibboko kiyenge sa kitiinɛ bannyi bannyi, kɛllaat gaang gaang. Isɛɛn inna ibee ikkpit ugbaal a kibeet la zzeen ka lusso la zzeen ka isimi.
Ɛsɛɛn ya ikeeng ɛbal lɛnngwing. Ya nnyɔn ɛbal ɔgɔdɔ, ka ikkyaat lusso annyɛ lɔbal gwa ɔlɔɔt. ka inna ɛbal ekkpo-lubat.

Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɛ inna iyanga bifekele bwɔlaaning bwɔlaaning. Bifekele ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bile zzeen a zzeen ɔgbaa la tɔkɔlɔ. Ba ifɛkɛlɛ kisoom, kikoon la kɛtɔm. Ibungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ittɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt a doddo, ɔlɔɔt a doddo, ɔlɔɔt a doddo, ulenɛ Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ, wa ulenɛ lule, wa ule uffu.”
Isɛɛn ’yɔng baang inna isoom kisoom a latele la laggele la liwomo ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka kibeet kɛnaang. Ammɛ wa uddunɛ ka kɛfal a kɛfal. Inaangnɛ ning baang,
lɔlɔp la bagɛlɛnya banna ba bataanɛ baang bakpɔkɔ banaang ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ baang ka ugbaal a kibeet mgbeede. Ammɛ wa uddunɛ kɛfal a kɛfal. Bakkpɛɛ bɛttɔpɔ abbɛ bazzɔɔk ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet battɛ,
“Uyini,Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt annɔ akkɔnɔnɛ wa atɔknɛ budoddo, la lakke ka ulewɔnɛ annɔ alɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɔsaapwɔ annɔ annyibyɛ kuddu.”
Nyɛn luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet, lɔdɔkɔ la likkpɔk lafoom azzɛ laffa laffa. Bassɛɛngwɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ innaammikkyaat.
Nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka ɔzɔɔmnɛ ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɛ ɔkkɔnɔnɛ wa ule uwongolo ikpɔkɔlɔ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?”
Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usi lile ka libat, gɔɔ ka ɛkpansi, gɔɔ ka ɛkpansi ya kuttɔɔk, wa ukkwoongnɛ uwongolo luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛɛk ka tɔkɔlɔ.
Nkkwa gaang gaang ka ɔlɔɔt ɔkkɔnɔnɛ usinɛ lile wa ukkwoongnɛ uwongolo luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛɛk ka tɔkɔlɔ.

Ɔgɛlɛnya vvɔn ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkwa, ppyɛɛk Lenngwing za lissinɛ ka lɔkaan a Judah, ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu a David wa lɛbaang ɔbɛtɛbong. Ukkwoong mung ɔkkyaa ikpɔkɔlɔ ’yɔng banng innammikkyaat ka luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”

Nyɛn Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ ka kasɛkɛ ugbaal a kibeet, isɛɛn ya inna la bagɛlɛnya babee bakkpitmɛ. Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balemɛnɛ lɛwwɔɔl. Ɔyanga iffi innammikkyaat la zzeen lannangakkyaat za lalenɛ liyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa linnangikkyaat sa balenɛsɛ lɛtɔɔm liffu ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufeele umii ɔsam luvva ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet.

Ɔsamnɛgwɛ ning baang, isɛɛn ya inna ’yɔng baang la bagɛlɛnya lɔlɔp la balɔɔt banna ba bataanɛ baang ka kibeet, battɔ ka lusso Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔyanga biggɔ la kɛkkpala sa ɔssɛɛnnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom, bya bilenɛ luzɔɔm a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Basoom ufaa lɔssa battɛ, “Akkɔnɔ-lɔkkɔnɔ kɛsam luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akkyaa ikpɔkɔlɔ aggwɛ. Badɔkɔ bawwɔɔlwɔ. Lubbe annɔ lɔkɔɔmbong balɔɔt a kikkwu, lɔkaan duu, lɔfɔɔn duu la kɛkkpa duu lufee Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Anaangbongbɛ bazzanga itutum a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ya ile itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, vvenɛ bayanga lakke ka ɛkpansi.”
Nbbal lɛppyɛɛk, nyɛn bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm innɔ npuku ka babeenɛ bakkpit ugbaal a kibeet, la isɛɛn ya inna la bagɛlɛnya.
Nppyeebɛ ka basoomnɛ bagaga battɛ, “Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bawwɔɔlnɛ ɔkkɔnɔnɛ ka ɔyanganɛ lakke, la iyyɛɛp, la bisana, la lɛgabwɔ, la latele, la bɔkaat la kɛsaap.”

Nppyee isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi, la ɛkpansi ya kuttɔɔk la isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bannyi. Isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveengodde idɔkɔ ka kisoom. “Itelemɛ ammɛ wa ɔtaanɛ ka kibeet la Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ibungumɛ ammɛ wa ɔyanganɛ lakke la lɛgabwɔ za kɛfal a kɛfal!”
Isɛɛn ’yɔng baang inna iyila ittɛ, “Kulening.” Bagɛlɛnya battɔ ka lisse bazɔɔm bannyimɛ.
Keem nyɛn Waan-ɛtɔɔn ka ɔlɔmnɛ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya ikeeng ɔkkyaa. Ɔ̀zzánga nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ɛsɛɛn nnyɔn ka kɛkaan isɛɛn inna ’yɔng baang ka lɛlɔɔknɛ lɛgaga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔttanɛ àkkpálá lɛttɛ, “Affu.”
Nppyɛɛknɛ, ulata eyim ɔdɔkɔ baang. Ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛyɛ ɔdɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm kubɔk, bannyimɛ ododo. Ufeele umii ka vveeng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ullunɛ lɛkɔɔng ɔbɛtɛ. Umii kɛbɛtɛ balɔɔt.
Ɔzzánga Waan-ɛtɔɔn ɔbbal ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya nnyɔn liwongolo. Nbbal ɛsɛɛn ya nnyɔn lippyee ka ɛttɛnɛ, “Affu.”
Eyim ya nyyɔn ɛbbal lɛtta effu, ɛdɔkɔ ukolo ukolo. Uttele annyɛ bannyimɛbong lakke za kɛkɔɔm lɛkɔɔng kiffu ka ɛkpansi, nkwaaning balɔɔt bawwɔɔl ba abbɛ. Bannyimɛ ogge wa lɛbaang.

Waan-ɛtɔɔn ɔbbal ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya nnyɔn lɛkkyaa ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat. Ɔzzánga nppyee ɛsɛɛn ɛlɔk ka ɛbbalnɛ lɛttɛ, “Affu.” Ɔ̀zzánga nppyɛɛk nyɛn ubili eyim. Uttele-uttele ɔkɔɔm bɔfɛɛn bwa balɔɔmnɛ kazzi ka kɔbɔɔk.

Nppyee bɔfɛɛn ka busanganɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ka bɛzzɔkɔ isɛɛn ya inna ’yɔng baang buttɛ, “Kɔɔp-alaasi vvɔn ka ikipili kɛnaang a kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ. Ikkɔɔp igwugwulu ikkyaat ka ikipili kɛnaang a kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛpɛyɔng bannɛ la batak.”
Waan-ɛtɔɔn ɔbbal ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya nnyɔn lɛkkyaa ka ikpɔkɔlɔ inna. Nppyee ɛsɛɛn ya ɛnaangnɛ ka isɛɛn inna ka ɛttɛnɛ “Affu.”

Nppyɛɛknɛ, eyim ɛdɔkɔ baang ya elenɛ yengeyenge. Ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛyɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ “Lubbe”. Ssala-lubbe lidɔkɔ lile baang ka likupnɛgwɛ ka isimi. Bannyibɛ lakke za kɛkɔɔm a lɛkɔɔng la buwɔɔng, la iffaak la isɛɛn a kɛmat, kɛwwɔɔl kufaak ɛkpansi kkwɔn keem ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak linna.

Ɔzzángá Waan-ɛtɔɔn ɔbbal ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ɛlɔk lɛkkyaa, ɔnaang ka ikpɔkɔlɔ kubbwɔɔk. Nppyɛɛknɛ, kuttɔɔk a labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nyɛn ippyam a balɔɔt ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ ka babwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, babee ittɛɛsɛ azzɛ bbwak.

Babungu bagaga battɛ, “Uyini wa ɔnaangnɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ɔlɔɔt a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, mung ule ɔmmɛ ɔffɔ nang tɛ́ttɛ́ akaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ɛkpansi apipilibɛ ka kɛwwɔɔl sa bawwɔɔlnɛyɛlɛ ee?”
Bannyi kuyeeng la kkwɔn ulata ewuulu battɛ kɔwɔkɔlɔ. Babwɔɔlɔsɛ battɛ likeele lɛtaa ɔmmɛ ssup ɔddɔkɔ-ddɔkɔ liyeeng a babbɛ ibɔɔyi la ikpana abbɛ ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ liggba.

Nyɛn Waan-ɛtɔɔn ka ɔbbalnɛ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya nnyɔn lɛkkyaa, ɔnaang ka ikpɔkɔlɔ bwɔlaaning. Ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ, livve luwee lisikili lɛppyɛɛ libil lubil tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kibili ubba. Ɛttuma esikili ikoot tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linnyi.
Bwaanettuma baffaat ka libat a lukkpagbeede baffu battɔ ka ɛkpansi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakkpo bɛssɛ za latakanɛ lɛlak lattɔnɛ ka ɔffanɛ kɛffa sa lɛbaang.
Lukkpaagbeede lɔkkyaap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkɔtnɛ ewula basam bagbata, lɛttaal la zzɔn la lakkpɔ ɛkpansi ka bannyi bɛgbata ka ɛfɛɛn a baggbanɛ lissi bibee.

Babeet ɛkpansi la bakɔɔm ɛkpansi la bazzilɛttɔ isɔgya, balɔɔt ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ la ba baggbengenɛ la balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, babili la ba basinɛ babili lile, bamma bamii baddumu ka ibbe la lihuk ikpana ka libat a lɛttaal.
Babungu bakkwɔɔ lattaal la ikpana battɛ, “Attɔ abɛtɛyɔngyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ iffu iyɛn lusso ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet la kitun a kɔlɔɔk Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng baang.
Kɛtɔm-a-kɔlɔɔk kutunnɛbɛ kitii mung. Nyinɔɔng ule ɔbbɔ ufeele ubee ufimkwɛ?”
Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsak. Nyɛn bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm banna ka babeenɛ ka laggook a ɛkpansi lanna babwɔɔp bɛssanga bɛffa bɛnna baloko nkwaaning bisi ɛkpansi la lihu ɔlɔk kɛssɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛffa.

Nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔk ka ussinɛ ka lusso gwa livve luwee lɔfɔm la bɔfɛɛn a kuddu ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔnaang eleme ka bɔfɛɛn. Ɔkkwɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba banna ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lakke za kɛbɛpɛ ɛkpansi la lihu linnyi ɔgaga.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛpɛ ɛkpansi gɔɔ lihu, gɔɔ kɛssɛ kɛlɔk ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ inaang ibbɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm eleme ka lɛttɔ lusso.”
Babwɔɔlɔnɛ buyipi balɔɔt ba banaangnɛbɛ eleme Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛttɔ lusso. Badɔkɔ lalɔp innɔ zzillalakkyaat. Abbɛ badɔkɔnɛ isam Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya Israel, ya zzɔɔppiffa.
Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Judah badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Reuben badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba Gad badɔkɔ lɔlɔp ka ubbɔ zzɔɔp.
Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Asher badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Naphtali badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Manasseh badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp.
Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Simeon badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Levi badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Issachar badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp.
Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Zebulun badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Joseph badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Benjamin badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp.

Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, nyɛn kibbi sa lɛbaang. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ukkwoon balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ule. Badɔkɔ bassi ka kikkwu la ssɔn ka ɛkpansi. Ɔzzánga babee ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet ’sɔng baang la balata iwuulu ka bawɔkɔlɔnɛ, bakɔɔm litteet ka labɔɔk.
Bakkwɔɔ bagaga battɛ, “Kuddu ayyɔɔt kussi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, la Waan-ɛtɔɔn ammɛ, wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet.”
Bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ babee bakkpit ugbaal a kibeet la bagɛlɛnya la isɛɛn ’yɔng baang inna. Battɔ ka lisse bakun lusso bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ,
“Kulening! Kibungu, lakke, bisana, kiwomo kɛnaang, latele, lagabwɔ la lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt kɛfal a kɛfal, kulening.”
Ɔgɛlɛnya vvɔn ɔbapnɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bawɔkɔlɔnɛ balata iwuulu babang? Bassi yang baffu?”

Nppyɛlɛmɛ kamma nttɛ, “Ba nsan nttɛ, Dedde. Annɔ asannɛ.” Ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ balɔɔt ba battanɛ ka akama kɔlɔɔk a Christ. Bakɔɔmbong linnyi Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng baang bazzaa iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ. Kwakkwɛ illaatnɛ ning baang.
Kwakkwɛ babeenɛ ka lusso Ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kikoon la kɛtɔm batelemɛ ka labun ammɛ. Ammɛ wa ɔtaanɛ ka kibeet vvenɛ ɔkatbɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
Buwɔɔng gɔɔ bannyi baala busaapbɛ. Luwee gɔɔ lɔkɔɔn baala lutupbɛ.
Ka Waan-ɛtɔɔn wa ulenɛ ka kasɛkɛ kibeet ule usseke ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatnɛbɛ, vvenɛ ɔkɔɔmbɛ umii ka ɛggbɔlɔ kuddu. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkkpɔlɔbɛ liyyeen.”
Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng baang ɔkkyaa ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya innammikkyaat, libat lizum kulak ka kufaak ɛkalangka.
Ɔzzánga nyɛn bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bannambakkyaat ka babeenɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la iffi innammikkyaat. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt la luffi ggwɔn ggwɔn.

Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa vvɔn ɔkɔɔm ettotto ya banaangnɛyɛ la gold la bannɛ ba bayyɛɛpnɛ kizoom ka tɔkɔlɔ. Uffu ubee ka lusso labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bagbaayɛ bannɛ ba bayyɛɛpnɛ kizoom battɛ ɛgbaa ka luzoom a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la bigugulu bya banaangnɛ ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, za banaagnnɛzɛ la gold labee ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Isɔngɔ ya issinɛ ka bannɛ ’bɔng baang la luzɔɔm a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itukulu ka labɔɔk uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ubeenɛ baang ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam ettotto ’yɔng baang ttɔng lɔkɔɔn ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baang eseese ɛssɛɛnyɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔsam ɔtɔɔp ka ɛkpansi. Eseese utum, immwalang inaang, àkkpálá ɔtta, ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat batte kɛwɔl iffi ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat.
Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk ɔwɔl luffi gwa ammɛ, lattaal la lɔkɔɔn bitoolo la linnyi bissi ka libat bɛllɔt ka ɛkpansi. Kufaak ɛkpansi kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak likkyaat, kɔkkɔm kɔssal gbaak la bɛssɛ la lifaak ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ɔssɛ-ɔttɛlɛ ɔbbal luffi gwa ammɛ lɛwɔl. Bɔfɛɛn bwa bubalnɛ lɛttaal za lɛbaang bussi ka libat la lalaak a lɔkɔɔn ka kkwɔɔt buttɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu. Kufaak a lihu kkwɔn, ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak likkyaat kusikili kusseke linnyi linnyi.
Kukup isɛɛn kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lakup lakkyaat ibbe kwɛɛnɛ kwɛɛnɛ isaal. Kukup ikkpaat kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lakup lakkyaat ibɛpɛ isaal ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu.
Úkup-ɔssɛ-ɔttɛlɛ ɔbbal lɛwɔl, waannttuma wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang wa ukutnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn mung, ɔffaat ka libat a lukkpaagbeede uffu ɔttɔ ka lafoom iyɔngɔ la bwaan iggbɔlɔ.
(Lɛkɔɔl a waannttuma ’wɔng baang ulenɛ “Bɔkkpan”.) Kufoom a bannyi ’kwɔng baang kusikili kusseke ka kɔkkpannɛ lɔkkpan. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ggbadam babbe ka bavvanɛ bannyi ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛkkpan.

Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ ka banna ɔbbal luffi gwa ammɛ lɛwɔl. Kufaak a livve-luwee kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak likkyaat kɔbɛpɛ. Ettuma la bwaannttuma ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛssɛ bɛyanga kɛbɛpɛ. Kwakkwɛ bɛtakanɛ kufoom a buppwolo abbyɛ kkwɔn kɛtɔm, kwa kkwɔn kikoon.

Nppyɛɛknɛ, nyɛn ekkpolobat ka ekutnɛ ka libat ɛlɔɔk ɛttɛ, “Wololo oo! wololo oo! wololo oo! akama. Balɔɔt ɛkpansi vvenɛ bayɛn akama wa ɔsaknɛ, bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba bakkyaat bakeelenɛ iffi ya abbɛ lɛwɔl.”
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ ka kubbwɔɔk ɔwɔl luffi ammɛ. Nyɛn waannttuma wa ussinɛ ka libat ule lɛttɔ ka ɛkpansi. Bannyimɛ waanɛkpɔkɔlɔ wa kiwongolo lubbe gwa lɔddɔngnɛ.
Waannttuma ’wɔng baang uwongolo lubbe ’gwɔng baang isɔngɔ itta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ittanɛ ka lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn. Isɔngɔ ya ittanɛ ka lubbe ’gwɔng baang inaang luwee la kɛffa bibil.
Ogelese ussi ka isɔngɔ ’yɔng baang usini uffu ka ɛkpansi. Bannyimɛ lakke ’zɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ za ɛlaang.
Babwɔɔlɔ ogelese battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbɛpɛ lifaat, gɔɔ kɛssɛ, gɔɔ lɛsan a kɛssɛ kɛlɔk. Ɔzzànga ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ba basinɛ eleme Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛyanga ka lɛttɔ lusso.
Basi liyila ogelese ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ɔzzànga ɔdɔkɔ ɔyɔɔbɛ akama ka ittuma kubbwɔɔk. Bɔssɔp bwa bappyeenɛ ka akama ’wɔng baang bule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp bwa ɔlɔɔt uppyeenɛ ka ɛlaang ɛtɔɔpmɛnɛ.
Ka ittuma ’yɔng baang kubbwɔɔk, balɔɔt ’bɔng baang vvenɛ baggyan lubbe, ɔzzànga baala babbe. Vvenɛ baggyan battɛ lubbe lɔtɔkbɛ ɔzzànga vvenɛ lufimbɛ.
Ogelese ’wɔng baang ɔbal iyim ya ikatnɛ killu lɛkɔɔng. Ɔyanga bɔfɛɛn bwa bubalnɛ kɛttɔpɔ a gold ka lɛttɔ ammɛ. Lusso ammɛ lɔbal lusso balɔɔt.
Bittulu ammɛ bɛbal bittulu a bwanavva. Lasaal ammɛ lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lasaal a lenngwing.

Ogelese ’wɔng baang ugupu bɔfɛɛn bwa bubalnɛ ɛllɛlla ka ukukulu. Lɔsap gwa bifekele ammɛ bɛnaangnɛ, lɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔsap gwa iyim inaangnɛ ka ilenɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn a kimii lɛkɔɔng la lakulu ka ittulunɛ ka lisse.
Ɔyanga busɛɛl la bugɔmɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlaang, bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔtɔɔp balɔɔt ka ittuma kubbwɔɔk.

Ogelese ’wɔng bang ɔyanga ubeet wa ɔkɔɔmnɛbɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkatnɛ lúbbé ’gwɔng baang. Lɛkɔɔl ammɛ ka Hebrew ɔ̀zzànga Abaddon, ka Greek ɔ̀zzànga Appolyon (ifɛɛt ilenɛ “Ɔbɛpɛ-ɔbɛpɛ”).
Akama wa ikeeng ikeeng ɔsaalbong. Usseke ikama iffa ka ’kwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ ka bwɔlaaning, ɔwɔl luffi gwa ammɛ. Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛttanɛ ka lusso a gold a labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛlɔɔk la Uyilabɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang wa bwɔlaaning lɛttɛ, “Akkyaayɔng bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba banna ba bakɔnnɛ ka lɔyɔngɔ Euphrates afɔngɔyɔng.”

Bakkyaa bayilabɔtɔɔm ba banna ’bɔng baang bafɔngɔ. Baggbabɛ lɛbama baloko ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng mung la ettuma ’yɔng mung la kukkpa ’kwɔng mung battɛ bawwɔɔl kukup a balɔɔt kkwɔn ka lakup ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ lakkyaat.
Babwɔɔlɔnɛ battɛ kɛkaan a ballu kullu ’kwɔng baang kɛdɔkɔ 200,000,000.

Ka biyɛnɛ anaam, nyɛn iyim ’yɔng baang la battele-uttele, bayanga bɛfaak a bɛkkpala bya bagupunɛ ka luppyam, bya bikootnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn. Bibil tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akpana, bikoot lɛgɔk a lɛgɔk. Lattɔ iyim ’zɔng baang lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lattɔ lannwing, lɔkɔɔn lɔ̀ttáyɛ ka kamma, la isɔngɔ la bɛggbansukulu.
Bawwɔɔl kukup a balɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ lakup za lakkyaat ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ka lɛmaat abbɛ, ka ɛkɛtɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang sa likkyaat, lɔkɔɔn, la isɔngɔ, la bɛggbansukulu bɛttanɛ ka kamma iyim.
Lakke iyim lale ka kamma la lasɛɛl. Lasɛɛl annyɛ lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ izzɔkɔ la lattɔ, bakɔɔmbyɛ abbyɛ baddopo balɔɔt.

Ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔtakanɛ libbe ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung, basi lɛkkyaa kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn bya abbɛ biini banaangnɛ bafɔngɔ. Basi kɛzɔɔm a babbu la ilat lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ, gɔɔ bwaanilɔɔp a gold la bronze la lattaal la bumele bya bisinɛ likkwoong bɛyɛn, bippyee, bɛssɛ.
Gɔɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang akama usibɛ lɛnaang ka kɛwwɔɔl sa bawwɔɔlnɛ ba abbɛ, gɔɔ ilat gɔɔ babbu linaang abbɛ, gɔɔ ssip abbɛ.

Nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk wa lɛbaang ka ussinɛ ka libat. Ɔdɔkɔ ule ka tɔkɔlɔ ikkpálá, la egugulu ka ekkpitmɛnɛ ka lɛttɔ, lusso ammɛ lɔdɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ livve-luwee, bukkpɔ ammɛ budɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn.
Ɔyanga waan a luvva wa ulenɛ ppwool ka kɔbɔɔk ammɛ. Ɔyan kikkpɔ ammɛ sa ɛlaabɔɔk ka lihu, sa ɛbyakɔm ka likum.
Ɔkkwɔɔ ɔgaga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lanngwing. Ulenɛ livve lɛkkwɔɔ, ikkpálá ya innammikkyaat ikeetmɛ.
Ìkkpálá ilɔɔknɛ ɛlɔɔk ɛlɔɔk ivve, nttɛ nffu nkkpɔk, ɔzzánga nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lissinɛ ka libat lɛlɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Aloko kɔlɔɔk kwa ikkpálá ya innammikkyaat ilɔɔknɛ ka lalup, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkpɔkkwɛ.”
Ɔzzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm wa nyɛnnɛ ka ubeenɛ ka lihu la likum, uyeek kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ ka libat.

Uyilabɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang uyim Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa uddunɛ ka kɛfal a kɛfal, wa ɔlɔɔmnɛ libat la befɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka azzɛ, wa ɔlɔɔmnɛ ɛkpansi la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka annyɛ, ɔlɔɔm lihu la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka azzɛ. Ɔlɔɔk ɛttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa kɛtaa kɛkat ba kɔbɛlɛ lile.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa innammikkyaat ɔwɔlnɛ luffi ammɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uvve kɛnaang a lalup ammɛ sa ulenɛ littina, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyaamnɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ ibbɔɔyi ammɛ, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Lɛmmwɔɔl za nppyeenɛ ka lɛlɔɔknɛ la anaam ka libat lɛbbal lɛttɛ, “Amii atɔk luvva gwa ppwool ’gwɔng baang ka kɔbɔɔk uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ubeenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu la likum.”

Nmii nkup uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang, nbapmɛ nttɛ unnyinɛ waan a luvva ’wɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Atɔkgwɛ azzi, vvenɛ lusikili lɔkkpanwɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛmmɛ, ɔzzànga vvenɛ luggwoomwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔngɔtɔngɔ ka kamma.”
Ntɔk waan a luvva ’wɔng baang ka eddu ammɛ nzzi. Luggwoommɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔngɔtɔngɔ ka kamma. Nmɛɛlnɛ lusikili lɔkkpannɛ ka lɛmmɛ.
Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ abwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa butumnɛ ifɔɔn ggbadam, la ikaan la ikaan la babeet.”
Unnyinɛ bissɛ pya lɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lukut, ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele amii alɔɔm ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Akkwoon balɔɔt ba balenɛ baang ka luzɔɔm ka tɔkɔlɔ ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Afɔngɔ kɛsana ssala a ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛlɔɔm. Basambongsɛ bannyi balɔɔt ba bafimnɛ kwa Jesus, ba bale basing ubeet-a-lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang bukkpɔ ka likkpa likkyaat la ittuma bwɔlaaning.
Vvenɛ ntɔɔm ittɛɛsɛ anaam iffa la bissaka iwɔkɔlɔ ka bawɔkɔlɔnɛ. Vvenɛ bayaam babwɔɔlɔ kuttu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka likkpa ’sɔng baang likkyaat la ittuma bwɔlaaning.”
Ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang iffa ilenɛ lasan-a-olive laffa la itinika iffa ya ibeenɛ ka lusso Uyini ɛkpansi.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ubumnɛ ɔttɛ ɔbɛpɛyɛ, lɔkɔɔn lɔttayɛ ka kamma luffu lɔbɛpɛ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk abbɛ ning baang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ubumnɛbyɛ kɛbɛpɛ, vvenɛ bɛwwɔɔlmɛ.

Ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng mung iyanga lakke za itununɛ lukpaggbeede kiteep a bannyi, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ilenɛ ka kɛ̀yaam a kuttu bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Iyanga lakke ka iggbɔlɔ bannyi ɔgbaa, lakke kisikili bannyi ka iggbɔlɔ basseke linnyi. Iyanga lakke za inaangnɛ ɛkpansi esseke iffaak iffaak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛyɛ.
Ivvenɛ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛyaam ibwɔɔlɔ, ɛsɛɛn ya essinɛ ka lubbe gwa ddɔng ’gwɔng baang vvenɛ ɛtta effu elluyɛ kullu. Vvenɛ ɛbɛtɛbɛ, ɛwwɔɔlbɛ.
Babbu ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ limini ka ɛtɔk a laffɛ za lɛbaang a lɛbaang ka ɛfɛɛn a bakamanɛ Uyini abbɛ bakaka ka Cross. Ifɛɛt a lɛkɔɔl a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ulenɛ Sodom ɔlɔk Egypt.
Balɔɔt ifɔɔn la ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi vvenɛ bappyɛɛk babbu ’bɔng baang ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat la kufaak. Baala bayila basambɛ bamii balli.

Balɔɔt ɛkpansi vvenɛ baggele gaang gaang ka lubbe balɔɔt ’bɔng mung baffa. Vvenɛ banaang lawaa, batɔɔm lasɔɔk bafee ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ka ulenɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’bɔng baang baffa bakɔɔmnɛ akama bafee balɔɔt ɛkpansi.
Bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat la kufaak bɛ́saknɛ, lɛfɛkɛlɛ kuddu lissi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liffu lɛmalbɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ, ɔzzánga bafeele babee ubee. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayɛnnɛbɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang.

Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’bɔng baang baffa bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lissinɛ ka libat lɛlɔɔk la abbɛ lɛttɛ, “Affuyɔng mung.” Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk abbɛ balenɛ baang ka babeenɛ bappyɛɛkbɛ, bamii ka libat ka ikkpala lukkpaaggbeede.

Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ. Kufaak a lɛffɛ kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak zzɔɔp sa linaangnɛ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang kɔbɛpɛ. Innɔ balɔɔt zilliffa la kufaak babbe ɔssanga kɛnnyɛkɛ ɛkpansi ’sɔng baang. Balɔɔt ba bassekenɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, babungu bakkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat.
Akama wa ibaala ɔsakbong, ɔzzànga ppyɛɛk! wa ukupnɛ wa ibaala ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛmmɛ uffu.

Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ ka bannambakkyaat ɔwɔlnɛ luffi gwa ammɛ, lammwɔɔl lagaga ka libat lattɛ, “Lakke za kɛkɔɔm a vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ lasseke za Uyini ayyɔɔt gedegede mung la Ɔlɔɔt wa Ammɛ biini ɔsanganɛ. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm vveeng ’wɔng kɛfal a kɛfal.”
Lɔlɔp la bagɛlɛnya banna ba bataanɛ ka igbaal a kibeet abbɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balli lattɔ, bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Battɛ, “Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa ulenɛ lule mung, ɔ́ggba lissi ule. Iwomowɔ kɛnaang ka alenɛ lakke annɔ za lɛbaang a lɛbaang lɛkɔɔm atte kɛkɔɔm a vveeng ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan banyanga gaang gaang ka ɛkɛtɛ kitun a kɔlɔɔk annɔ elenɛ lɛffɔ, kɛkaal a babbu kile la kɔzza. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya kikipili ibɔɔyi annɔ, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la balɔɔt annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ ba batelewɔnɛ, ba baggbengenɛ la ba bassupnɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya ale ka awwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba babɛpɛnɛ Ɛkpansi!”
Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat luwongolo. Iyɛn Likulu a nsekele ka tɔkɔlɔ immwalang, utum, ɔtta ikkpálá, ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ, ɔffa kɛffa sa lɛbaang.
Bɛmaanga bya lɛbaang bituma ka lukkpaaggbeede. Wanavva ɔdɔkɔ baang wa uwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ɔdɔkɔnɛ livve-luwee. Bukkpɔ utele ka ettuma, la kɛttɔpɔ bwaannttuma zzɔɔppabaffa ka lɛttɔ.
Ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛppwɔlɔ imala. Bɔssɔp la akama lɛmaat bɛnaangmɛ ɔkkwa.
Bɛmaanga bɛlɔk bya bɛkɛɛlɛnɛ gaang gaang bɛnaang ka lukkpaaggbeede. Uggboggbo ukolo ɛsɛɛn ya ɛ̀zzànganɛ “Dragon” ɛdɔkɔ baang. Ɛyanga lattɔ lannangakkyaat la iffi zzɔɔp la ododo ka lɛttɔ la zzɔn.

Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛkɔɔm lɛsɛɛl annyɛ ɛkpakala kukup a bwaannttuma ka tɔkɔlɔ lakup lakkyaat ɛzzɔɔk ka ɛkpansi. Emii ebee ka lusso wanavva wa ɔppwɔlɔnɛ imala ’wɔng baang nkwaaning ɔmaatnɛ ɛmaat ɛmaat, ɛsam waan ammɛ ezzi.
Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔmaat waanawalam, wa ule ɔkɔɔm ɛkpansi ka lakke. Bannaa waan ’wɔng baang bakɔɔm bafee Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ.
Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔmma ɔssɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ kɛmat ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛlɔngɔ ulokomɛ. Ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang elenɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔppyɛɛkmɛ ka lavve 1,260 (Likkpa likkyaat la ittuma bwɔlaaning).
Ɔzzánga lɛkɔɔng lɛttɔ ka libat. Michael la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ballu kullu la ɔbbyap-ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang. Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la bayilabɔtɔɔm annyɛ esikili ebee bbwak ellubɛ kullu.
Ɔzzánga babɛtɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang. Basiyɛ lɛfɔngɔ ɛtaa ka libat.
Basamyɛ bazzɔɔk ka vveeng. Annyɛ elenɛ Ɔgɛlɛnya ɛzzɔkɔ ya ikkwɔɔnɛyɛ Ubbu ɔlɔk Satan, ya ɛfɛɛtnɛ ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ. Basamyɛ bazzɔɔk ka ɛkpansi la bayilabɔtɔɔm annyi ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ɔzzánga nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛgaganɛ ka libat lɛttɛ, “Gedegede mung ikkala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iffubong! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbong lakke ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ubeet. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsanganɛ ɔyɔɔbong kizzi lɛttɔ ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatanɛ ikpana ayyɔɔt kɔlɔɔk, wa ubeenɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkatabɛ kɔlɔɔk kikoon la kɛtɔm basangamɛbong ka libat bazzɔɔk.
Ikpana ayyɔɔt ikɔɔm linnyi Waan-ɛtɔɔn la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa bakopolonɛ battamɛ likke. Badɔkɔ bayila lubbe.

Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng ka libat, killu kilewɔyɔng bakang, aggeleyɔng. Akama vvenɛ ɔttala ka ɛkpansi la lihu. Ubbu usinibong uffu ukupwɔyɔng la kitun a kɔlɔɔk ka luppyam, ka ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ɛkɛtɛ essekemɛ ssup.”
Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang elenɛ lɛsan ɛttɛ basangabongyɛ bazzɔɔk ka ɛkpansi, esikili ɛggba wanavva wa ɔmaatnɛ waanawalam ’wɔng baang.
Ɔzzánga bannyi wanavva ’wɔng baang bifekele ekkpolubat ya lɛbaang a lɛbaang, ɔkkɔɔnɛ ukut umii ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔtaanɛ ka kɛmat bakatmɛ ka likkpa likkyaat la kufaak, ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang esimɛ lɛkaa.
Ɔzzánga ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛkkwɔɔk ɛlɔlɔ ɛttɛ ezzi wanavva ’wɔng baang.
Ɛkpansi ettele wanavva ’wɔng baang. Ewongolo kamma ɛwɔpɔlɔ ɛlɔlɔ ’yɔng baang ya ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛkkwɔɔknɛ.

Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang kutunyɛ la wanavva ’wɔng baang ɛgbata emii ellu kullu la balɔɔt a kikkwu a wanavva ’wɔng baang, la balɔɔt ba batelenɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayanga kiyila batum lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ.
Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛkɔɔng ka likum a lihu ebee.
Nyɛn ɛsɛɛn a likum ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu. Ɛyanga iffi zzɔɔp la lattɔ lannangakkyaat, la kɛttɔpɔ ododo ka luffi la ggwɔn. Lɛkɔɔl ibbyap lileyɛ baang ka bakkpɔknɛyɛ ka lɛttɔ.

Ɛsɛɛn ya nyɛnnɛ ɛbal ɛgɔɔt, la bukkpɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwa bikkwɛɛ; la kamma tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kamma lenngwing. Dragon ’wɔng baang unnyi ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat ’yɔng baang lakke ammɛ biini, la kibeet ammɛ, la kizzilɛttɔ ammɛ sa lɛbaang.
Lɛttɔ ɛsɛɛn zzɔn ɔbal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lilenɛ la kiddopo sa lɛbaang. Ɔzzànga bɔssɔp ’bwɔng baang busaalbong. Ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛyɛ bakup ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang.

Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batele ɛsɛɛn ya bakkwɔɔnɛyɛ ‘dragon’ ka elenɛ lakke annyɛ lɛsam ennyi ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat. Batele ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat ’yɔng baang balɔɔk battɛ, “Nnyinɛ ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat ’yɔng? Nnyinɛ ukkwoongnɛ ulluyɛ kullu?”
Bafɔngɔ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛlɔɔk babbu lilɔɔk, ɛyanga lakke ka likkpa likkyaat la ittuma iffa.
Ɛbbaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɛbbaat lɛkɔɔl ammɛ la ɛfɛɛn ya ullunɛ, la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ la ammɛ.
Bafɔngɔyɛ ellu balɔɔt-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kullu ɛttabɛ lakke. Bannyiyɛ kizzilɛttɔ la ɛsam la ɛsam, lɔfɔɔn la duu la ikaan, la kɛkkpa la duu.

Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ka ɛkpansi vvenɛ bateleyɛ, balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtakanɛ lakɔɔl abbɛ lɛkkpɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luvva-kuddu tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔmnɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung. Luvva ’gwɔng lule gwa Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa balemɛnɛ lɛwwɔɔl.
“Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk za kippyee kɔlɔɔk.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ wa kɛkaa, vvenɛ bakaamɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ wa kɛwwɔɔl la ogge, vvenɛ bakɔɔm ogge bawwɔɔlmɛ. Nkwɔng kɔggyan kɛbbɔ akama la kɛyanga kiyila ka lufoom a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔzzánga nyɛn ɛsɛɛn ɛlɔk ka ɛttanɛ ka ɛkpansi. Ɛyanga iffi iffa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ya waan-ɛtɔɔn. Ɛlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbbyap ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
Ɛkɔɔm lakke za ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat ka lusso annyɛ. Ɛbɛtɛ ɛkpansi la balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ka annyɛ ɛttɛ batele ɛsɛɛn ya ikeeng, ya kiddopo annyɛ sa lubbe kilenɛ libbe.
Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya ibaala ɛnaáng bɛmaanga bya lɛbaang. Ɛnaang lɔkɔɔn lussi ka libat lɔttɔ ka ɛkpansi ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Ɛkɔɔm bɛmaanga bya bayilanɛyɛ battɛ ɛnaang ka lusso ɛsɛɛn ya ikeeng, ɛfɛɛt balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ka ɛkpansi. Ɛbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛttɛ babɔɔk ɛlɔɔp ka latele ɛsɛɛn ya ɛddoponɛ ka ɔgge etii ka kuddu.
Bafɔngɔ ɛsɛɛn ya ibaala ɛfɛkɛlɛ kuddu ɛssɛɛn ɛlɔɔp ’yɔng baang, nkwaaning ɛlɔɔp ’yɔng baang ɛlɔɔk kɛlɔɔk ɛwwɔɔl balɔɔt ba bale basiyɛ litele.
Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang etut balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba lɛbaang la ba utiti, ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ la ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, babili la ba basinɛ babili lile, Ɛttɛ banaang eleme kɛyɔɔng ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk la lɛttɔ-lusso.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbbal bɔfɛɛn lɛtaan ɔlɔk ɔlɛɛp ba ɔbɛlɛ lile, usinɛ eleme ’yɔng baang ya ɛtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛkɔɔl ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang lɛyanga ka ɔkkpɔknɛ.
Akɔɔm bikɔɔm ka ’kwɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk, ukkwoong mung ɔbwɔɔlɔ bwa eleme ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang elenɛ. Annyɛ ebeenɛ ka etini ya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang. Eleme lɛkɔɔl annyɛ ele 666.

Ɔzzánga nppyɛɛknɛ nyɛn Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ ka lɛttaal a Zion. Ka ɛfɛɛn a ubeenɛ, lalɔp innɔ balɔɔt zzillalakkyaat badɔkɔ baang ba bayanganɛ lakɔɔl ammɛ la za Abassɛ ammɛ ka lɛttɔ-lusso ka bakkpɔknɛ.
Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛttanɛ ka libat, lɛfɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔl a bannyi. Lɛ̀bál lɔsap ìkkpálá. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk appyeenɛ attɛ bánaang-ibin bakkpanɛ buggɔ.

Lalɔp innɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang zzillalakkyaat babee bappyɛɛk ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la isɛɛn ’yɔng baang inna la bagɛlɛnya. Basoom ufaa kisoom sa abbɛ batta-ka-kɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng bakkwoongnɛ bakkoop. Ule balɔɔt ’bɔng baang keem ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalabɛ.

Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba balenɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng doddo liloko ka basinɛ bwanavva likup. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba batakanɛ kwa kimini la ɔlɔɔt lɛsan. Abbɛ bakupnɛ Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya umiinɛ. Bakkalabongbɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ. Abbɛ balenɛ ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk a lakkpele za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Lɛlaak ba bataka bakkala; kwɛ ba basan.
Ɔzzánga nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk ka ukutnɛ fulufulufulu ka libat. Ɔbwɔɔlɔ ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ la ifɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ la isam ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
Ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Ebinukkpaapi ɛbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Abunguyɔng lakke annyɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔmɛbong ya ele ka ɛkaalnɛ kɛkaal ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ. Azɔɔm annyimɛyɔng ammɛ wa ɔnaangnɛ libat la ɛkpansi, la lihu la iggbɔlɔ.”
Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ibaala ukup wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk, ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɛttɔbong! Ɛkpansi a Babylon ya lɛbaang ɛttɔbong. Ennyibong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batak a Kɛssɛ-kɛzak annyɛ bavva.”
Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ussekenɛ isimi ukup ba baffa ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk, ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ ɛsɛɛn ya ikeeng la ɛlɔɔp annyɛ, ɔyanga eleme ka lɛttɔ-lusso ɔlɔk ka isimi kɔbɔɔk,

vvenɛ ɔvva batak a binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ulenɛ lɛsam ɔssɛɛn la lagabwɔ ka ommonggo batak a binyanga ’wɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang, vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama ka lɔkɔɔn a ndegeledum ka lusso bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Waan-ɛtɔɔn ammɛ.
Isɔngɔ lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔyɔɔnɛbɛ akama imiibong ka libat kɛfal a kɛfal. Balɔɔt ba batelenɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɛlɔɔp annyɛ, bayanga lɛkɔɔl annyɛ ka bakkpɔknɛ, ka akama baala batta kikoon la kɛtɔm.
Nkwɔng kɔggyan kɛbbɔ akama ka kufoom kwa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba batelenɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bayanga kiyila batum Jesus.

Ɔzzánga nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ ka libat lɛttɛ, “Akkpɔk ’kwɔng: Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bale babbe kwa Uyini ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso.” Kuyeeng kɔttɛ, “Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Akama kɛnaang abbɛ vvenɛ ɔnaangbɛ bayanga kɛfɛkɛlɛ ka budoddo linaang abbɛ bule ka buppyɛlɛnɛ bukupbɛ.”
Nppyɛɛknɛ, nyɛn balata ìkkpálá lukkpaaggbeede. Ka ìkkpálá ’yɔng baang, bɔfɛɛn budɔkɔ baang ka butaanɛ la kɛttɔpɔ sa banaangnɛsɛ la gold la ɛggɛ ya ɛlamnɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ka bukɔɔmnɛ
Ɔzzánga Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔk ɔgbata ka labun, ubungu ɔgaga unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ìkkpálá lukkpaaggbeede ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔm ɛggɛ annɔ ayaat liyaat. Ɛkɛtɛ liyaat ɛkpansi ɛffɔbong.”
Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔtaanɛ ka ìkkpálá lukkpaaggbeede, uwung ogge ammɛ ɔfɔngɔ kuttɔɔk, liyaat ɛkpansi lìlé la kɔyaat.
Nbbal uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk lɛyɛn ka ɔttanɛ ka libat. Ammɛ ɔgbaa ɔyanga ɛggɛ ya ɛlamnɛ.

Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔk wa ɔkatnɛ lɔkɔɔn utuma ka labun a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat ɔtta. Ubungu ɔgaga unnyi uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ ɛggɛ ya ɛlamnɛ ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔm ɛggɛ annɔ abbɔk lakkpobɛssɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ɛkpansi, lalakbong.”
Ɔzzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang uwung ɛggɛ ammɛ ɔfɔngɔ ɛkpansi. Ɔbbɔk lakkpobɛssɛ ka bɛbɔɔk ɔsam ɔssɛɛn ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛnaang a batak a binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Bakaam lakkpobɛssɛ ’zɔng baang bassɛɛn ka ɛfɛɛn a banaangnɛ batak ka killu a vveeng. Linnyi litta ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛnaang a batak littɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔlɔ. Ele lalɔp imal zzɔɔp ka bɔlɔm. Ele bukkpɔ kubbwɔɔk ka bɔddɔng.

Nbbal kɔlɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ kɔlɔk lɛyɛn ka libat a lukkpaaggbeedde kuggbenge-uggbenge kɔkɛɛlɛ kɔgbaa. Bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm badɔkɔ bannambakkyaat la lilɔɔk akama sa linnangikkyaat, sa lilenɛ sa lakpeke. Assɛ lilenɛ lakuma ìyɔ́ɔ kitun a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Ɔzzánga nppyɛɛk, nyɛn bɔfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ libbwe kiyenge ka utoolonɛ la lɔkɔɔn. Nssɛ nyɛn balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba babɛtɛnɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɛlɔɔp. Ɔbɛtɛ la ɔlɔɔt wa bannyimɛnɛ lɛkɔɔl ka lukkwoon. Badɔkɔ bale ka kibee ka libbwe kiyenge, bakɔɔm buggɔ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbɛ.

Badɔkɔ basoom kisoom a Moses, bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kisoom a Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, linaang annɔ liggbenge, likɛɛlɛ. Ubeet a vveengodde ɔkkpɛlɛ, itɔk annɔ ile ya bbwak ka lɔkkwɔɔn.

Uyini, nyinɔɔng ulenɛ wa annɔ ale asimɛ lɛbbwɔpɔ? Nnyinɔɔng ule usi lɛbwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggbengenɛ affɔ? Annɔ keem appyɛɛnɛ asɛlɛ bubbi. Vveengodde ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ baffu babee ka lusso annɔ bazɔɔm bannyiwɔ ka linaang annɔ lilenɛ sa bbwak, balésɛ lɛyɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal, nyɛn ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat ka luwongolonɛ la Ugala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka tɔkɔlɔ aggwɛ.
Bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat ba bayanganɛ ikama innammikkyaat batta ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu. Badɔkɔ bawɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ ya illaatnɛ inyanya. Bayanga gold ka baggbɔnɛ bakkpit ka ikukulu.

Ɛsɛɛn nnyɔn ɛfakala ka isɛɛn a kuddu ya inna ennyi bayilabɔtɔɔm ba bannambakkyaat bɛfɔɔm bɛnnammbɛkkyaat bya banaangnɛbyɛ la gold la kitun a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtaanɛ ka kuddu kɛfal a kɛfal ffit ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɛ.

Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔdɔkɔ lusseke isɔngɔ isɔngɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ ya issinɛ ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lakke ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ule ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ikama lilɔɔk sa linnaangikkyaat sa bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat bakɔɔmnɛ baffu lisaal.
Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lissinɛ ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛlɔɔk la bayilabɔtɔɔm wa bannammikkyaat lɛttɛ, “Amii asikiliyɔng binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm allɔtyɔng ka ɛkpansi.”

Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ikeeng umii usikili binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulɔlɔ wa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka lisse. Lassɔp la akama wa lɛbaang bɛtta bikup balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ eleme ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ka kkwɔɔt, la balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛzɔɔm bannyi ɛlɔɔp annyɛ.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ibaala usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka lihu. Bannyi basikili basseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linnyi ubbu ɔlɔɔt. Bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bulenɛ ka lihu bwa buyanganɛ kuddu, bubbe.
Wa ikkyaat usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka issa la iggbɔlɔ. Ɔzzánga bannyi basikili linnyi.
Nppyee uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ɔkatnɛ bannyi ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Ale bbwak ka kɛkaal sa akaalnɛ, annɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, wa ulenɛ lule mung la wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ.
Abbɛ banaangnɛ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm linnyi lissibɛ. Kwakkwɛ bannyinɛbɛ linnyi bavva. Bayɛnbong bwa baggyannɛ.”
Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ ka labun lɛttɛ, “Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, kɛkaal annɔ kile ka lɔkkwɔɔn bbwak.”
Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa inna ’wɔng baang usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka livve-luwee. Bafɔngɔ kɛfɔɔp azzɛ sa lɛbaang kitup balɔɔt.
Ɔzzánga balɔɔt bakkɔm ka kɛfɔɔp a livve-luwee, babbaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔtta ikama ’yɔng baang. Basi bubbi abbɛ lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ babungu lakke ammɛ.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa kubbwɔɔk usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka kɛtaa kibeet ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang. Kisul kɛttɔ ka itutum annyɛ, balɔɔt bazzi lasaal ka ɔssɔpnɛbɛ.
Babbaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat ka akama wa bayɛnnɛ la bɔssɔp bwa bappyeenɛ. Ɔzzànga kɛnaang a bubbi basi lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bwɔlaaning usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka lɔyɔngɔ Euphrates. Lɔyɔngɔ lɔkkaam luloko babeet ɛtɔk ba bassinɛ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm ɛtɔk bassɛ.
Ɔzzánga nyɛn liyeeng sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp likkyaat, lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibubwaak ka littanɛ ka kamma ɛzzɔkɔ la ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɔkkala-lɛlaak wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Assɛ lilenɛ liyeeng a banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm sa linaangnɛ bɛmaanga. Liyeeng ’sɔng mung limiinɛ likup babeet ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ likkwɔɔbɛ baffu lɛkɔɔng ka kɛtɔm sa lɛbaang sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ɔttanɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ.
“Gɔpɔlɔyɔng, nle nffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip. Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bataanɛ kwet kwet bakat iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ, nkwaaning basi kɛkɔɔ lɛssɛ bakkpit izzit inaangbɛ, ka kpelegedee.”
Liyeeng ’sɔng baang likɔɔm babeet baffu babbi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, ka ɛfɛɛn a bakkwɔɔnɛ Armageddon ka kukaan a Hebrew.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa innammikkyaat usikili ulɔlɔ wa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka kɛffa. Agagaga lɛmmwɔɔl lɛtta ka ugbaal a kibeet lɛttɛ, “Kɔsaalbong.”
Immwalang inaang, àkkpálá ɔtta, ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ. Ka ɔlɔɔt ussinɛ ɔfal, ɛkpansi ning baang ba ɛtaka ɛnnyɛkɛ. Uwɔng baang ɔdɔkɔnɛ kɛnnyɛkɛ ɛkpansi sa kɛttanɛ lɛbbɔl.
Lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang lɛfaka bɛfaak bɛkkyaat. Billu ka ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛbɛpɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukke Babylon killu sa lɛbaang, ɔnaangsɛ kɛvva batak ommonggo ammɛ. Batak ’bɔng baang, batak a binyanga ammɛ.
Lakkpɔ ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ lataak ka bannyi. Ikpok ɔkkpɛlɛ ikkyaap.
Uteep lattaal za lalɔɔpnɛ gaang gaang uvvoong balɔɔt. Balɔɔt babbaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa lattaal ’zɔng baang. Ɔdɔkɔ akama wa lɛbaang.

Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat ba bayanganɛ bɛfɔɔm bɛnnambɛkkyaat, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam, ɔttɛ, “Affu nyɔɔwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayɔɔnɛ wanavva àkkpàlà akama wa lɛbaang. Wanavva àkkpàlà ’wɔng baang ulenɛ lɛffɛ za lɛbaang ’zɔng baang za babɔɔknɛzɛ bakkɛtɛ iyɔngɔ ggbadam.
Babeet ɛkpansi bàkúp wanavva àkkpàlà wa lɛbaang ’wɔng baang. Balɔɔt a vveengodde babimi ka bavvanɛ batak a kɛssɛ-kɛzak ammɛ.”

Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnnaanɛ lakke kɔsamnɛ umii ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat. Nyɛn wanavva ka ɔtaanɛ ka libat ukolo ɛsɛɛn la lakɔɔl ibbyap ka bakkpɔknɛyɛ ka kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛyanga lattɔ lannangakkyaat la iffi zzɔɔp.

Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ɔwɔkɔlɔ babili la bakolo iwɔkɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubeet. Bagbɔgbɔmɛ bɛfɛɛn a kitook bya banaangnɛ byɛ la gold, ɔbɛtɛ la ifɔɔk akpana la lattaal za lakkaamnɛ kappya. Ɔkɔɔm ommonggo wa banaangmɛnɛ la gold. Laggbo la bɛfɛɛn bya bɛppwanɛ ɔlɔɔt bya bissimɛnɛ ka kɛssɛ-kɛzak ammɛ biyipibong baang.
Ka lɛttɔ lusso ammɛ, bakkpɔkmɛ lɛkɔɔl za lɛyanganɛ ifɛɛt a lalup. “Ɔgabwɔ a Babylon, abakka ikkpàlà ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔfɛɛt-ifɛtɛ a vveengodde.”
Nyɛn nsan nttɛ wanavva ’wɔng baang linnyi balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la linnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ ka batelenɛ Jesus libimimɛnɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ya nyɛnmɛnɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛnɛ gaang gaang.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbapnɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔkɛɛlɛwɔ ’bɔng? Vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔ kɔlɔɔk ifɛɛt a wanavva ’wɔng baang la ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya ɛyanganɛ lattɔ lannangakkyaat la iffi zzɔɔp, ya ɛtɔkɔmɛnɛ.

Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya ayɛnnɛ ɛdɔkɔ ele ka kuddu, ɔzzànga mung ebbebong. Ɛdɔkɔ ɛttɛ ɛtta ka lubbe gwa lɛbaang effu, ɔzzànga mung vvenɛ emii bawwɔɔlyɛ. Balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ka ɛkpansi ba lakɔɔl abbɛ latakanɛ la kɛkkpɔk lile ka luvva balɔɔt a kuddu vvenɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka bale bayɛn ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya ɛdɔkɔnɛ ele ka kuddu, gedegede mung ele libbe. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ɛppyɛlɛ ɛbbal liffu.
“Akɔɔm bikɔɔm asan ’kwɔng. Lattɔ lanngakkyaat lalenɛ ikpok innammikkyaat, ya wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔtaanɛ. Babeet bassɛ bale bannambakkaat.
Ba kubbwɔɔk battɔbong. Vvɔn utii baang ka kizzi-lɛttɔ. Ɔzzànga wa vvɔn ba ɔtaka uffu. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ule uffu baala uttumu ka kibeet.

Ɛsɛɛn ya ɛdɔkɔnɛ etii ikokolo ɔ̀zzánga mung esi ka kuddu lɛbɛlɛ lile, ulenɛ ubeet wa ɔnaangnɛ ka babeet bannambanna wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a kɛkaan a babeet ba bannambakkyaat wa ufeelenɛ umii bawwɔɔlmɛ.
“Iffi ’yɔng baag zzɔɔp ya ayɛnnɛ ilenɛ babeet zzɔɔp ba batakanɛ litte kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn. Abbɛ balenɛ ba bale bannyibɛ lakke kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babeet ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup la ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
Babeet ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ba zzɔɔp bayanga luttina ggwɔn, basam lakke abbɛ bannyi ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang.

Vvenɛ ballu Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng baang kullu; ɔzzànga Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba ɔsanganɛ, bayila kwa ammɛ, vvenɛ ballu kullu babɛpɛ babeet ’bɔng baang ka ulenɛ Uyini Bayini, ule Ubeet a Babeet.”
Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Bannyi ba ayɛnnɛ baang ba wanavva àkkpàlà ’wɔng baang ɔtaanɛ, balenɛ ifɔɔn, balɔɔt a kikkwu ɔkkpɛlɛ la ikaan.

Iffi ’yɔng baang zzɔɔp ya ayɛnnɛ la ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang vvenɛ bayanga kɔlɔɔk la wanavva àkkpàlà ’wɔng baang. Vvenɛ batɔkmɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔyanganɛ, bakkyaamɛ bafɔngɔ umii kɛkɔɔ. Vvenɛ bazzimɛ ɛsɛɛn a kkwɔɔt basammɛ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn ɔkkɔm.

Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛbɛ lɔnngwa gwa kɛnaang kwa kulemɛnɛ ka luppyam ɔttɛ bayanga luttina ggwɔn, basam lakke abbɛ za kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn bannyi ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
“Wanavva ’wɔng baang wa ayɛnnɛ ulenɛ lɛffɛ za lɛbaang za lɛkɔɔmnɛ babeet ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi.”
Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk ka ussinɛ ka libat uffu. Ɔyanga lakke za lɛbaang. Lakke ammɛ lanaangnɛ ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ eppwolo.

Ubungu ka lɛmmwɔɔl za lɛbaang ɔttɛ, “Ɔttɔbong! Babylon wa lɛbaang ɔttɔbong! Usseke wa labun a babbu ɔkkpɛlɛ la liyeeng sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, la bunɔɔn a latun bɛppyɛɛ billu baang.
Unnyimɛ batak ɔttɛ ufee balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔnaangbɛ bavva bɛ. Batak a kɛssɛ-kɛzak ammɛ. Babeet ɛkpansi bamini la ammɛ. Bakkpɛɛkɔ ɛkpansi, ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka babbu linaang ammɛ sa usinɛ likkwoong ɔkkyaa ɔfɔngɔ.”
Nbbal lippyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ ka libat lɛttɛ, “Attayɔng, balɔɔt anaam. Atta assekemɛyɔng! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akupmɛyɔng anaangyɔng bubbi bwa ammɛ ɔnaangnɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu atulyɔng akama ammɛ ayɛnyɔng!
Bakkwonobong bubbi ammɛ buggolo buffɔ ka libat. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkebong babbu linaang ammɛ.
Akɔɔmmɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔkɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng bbwak. Akatmɛ asakyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng. Ass}e}enmɛyɔng batak ba bakkaamnɛ bayipi ka ommonggo bikkpit ppwap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔssɛɛnwɔnɛyɔng.

Ayɔɔmɛyɔng akama wa lɛbaang ɔsak lakke la bizozo pya ɔnaangmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ɔtaa uffik kɛyɔɔng ka luppyam ɔttɛ, ‘Anaam mung Ubeet a wanavva. Anaam ɔlɔɔt wa walam ubbenɛ ɔkɔngɔnɛ lissi, bukee ba nbɛlɛ lɛsan!’
Ka kulenɛ ning mung, akama la iffaak, la buwɔɔng vvenɛ bɛwwɔɔlmɛ kɛtɔm ssɔn. Vvenɛ bafɔɔpmɛ ka lɔkɔɔn ka Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal ammɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge.”
Babeet ɛkpansi ba bassɛnɛ la ammɛ banaang bubbi vvenɛ bakkwa ka bale bayɛn isɔngɔ ya bafɔɔpmɛnɛ ka ittanɛ ittukulu ka lɛffɛ ammɛ.
Bale babee fulufulu ka akama ammɛ ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ balɔɔt, balɔɔk battɛ, “Kɔbbɔl gaang kɔgbaa ka ɔgabwɔ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang Babylon bale ka bayɛnnɛ akama!”
Bassɛ-kappya ka ɛkpansi bakkwa, bataa kullu ka ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɛɛpnɛbɛ bɛfɛɛn usinɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbalnɛ gold la silver, la lattaal za layyɛɛpnɛ, la ibba la iwuu, bɛssɛ la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛkkaamnɛ kappya lɛlɛɛp usi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɛɛpnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom, bɛfɛɛn bya bɛnaangnɛ ubbu usi lɛddɔlɔ, batak la bannɛ, iwee la igwugwulu, ibal la igɔdɔ, iyim la immutu, babili la balɔɔt, usi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
Bassɛ-kappya balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Bɛfɛɛn bya doddo ɔkkpɛlɛ bya aggyannɛ bɛkkyaapbong. Iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng la litaan ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛtaakbong. Ba abɛlɛyɔng byɛ lɛggyan akopoyɔng.”
Bassɛ-kappya ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ ka kɛssɛ-kappya ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang vvenɛ babee fulufulu. Akama wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ. vvenɛ bakkwa bataa kullu,
balɔɔk battɛ, “Kɔttalabong! Kɔbbwɔpɔ kɛlɔɔk la lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang za lɛbaang! Ɔtaa ɔwɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ ya ikkaamnɛ kappya, ɔbɛtɛ la gold la lattaal za layyɛɛpnɛ.
Iyyɛɛp ammɛ itaakbong gbɔɔ sukusuku ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn!” Bazzilɛttɔ ka ikkpaat la battele-ka-ikkpaat la balɔɔt balɔk ba baddunɛ kwa lɔyɔngɔ basseke ka babeenɛ fulufulu,
bakkwa ka bayɛnnɛ isɔngɔ ya bafɔɔpmɛnɛ battɛ, “Lɛffɛ lɛlɔk ba lile za lɛbaang ɔgbaa la lɛffɛ ’zɔng mung.”

Ballɔt ibut ka lattɔ bakkwa battɛ, “Kɔttalabong gaang tɛ. Kɔbbɔlbong gaang la lɛffɛ ’zɔng za lɛbaang tɛ. Azzɛ lilenɛ lɛffɛ za balɔɔt bassɛnɛ lɔssa lɔssa ɔyyɛɛpbɛ. Mung ɔtakabong bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn.”
Annyɔɔng ba libat, aggeleyɔng ka lubbe ammɛ. Balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aggeleyɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛbong kibbi ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔnaangnɛ la annyɔɔng!

Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ɔttɔngbong lɛttaal za liggbengenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kukook ɔssɛɛn ka lɔyɔngɔ ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale bazzɔɔk lɛffɛ a Babylon za lɛbaang ka lɛgabwɔ, ɔlɔɔt usizɛ ka zzeen lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn.
Kisoom a bakkpa-buggɔ la basoom-a-kisoom la bawɔl a lippet la bawɔl iffi ba abɛlɛyɔng lippyee. Ɔssɛ-kappya ɔlɔk ba abɛlɛyɔng lɛyanga, gɔɔ lɔsap a kukook ba abɛlɛyɔng lippyee.

Buppwolo otinika bulɔk ba bubɛlɛ lile ka tɔkɔlɔ annɔ. Lɛmmwɔɔl a batɔk-a-bwanavva la ballu-bwalam ba abɛlɛyɔng lippyee ka tɔkɔlɔ annɔ. Bassɛ-kappya annɔ badɔkɔ bayanga lakke za lɛbaang ka ɛkpansi. Akɔɔm kɛkkala lɛlaak a bɛmaanga afɛɛt balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi.”
Babylon ɔyɛn akama ka bayɛnnɛ linnyi bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la linnyi balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛffɛ ammɛ. Iii, linnyi balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ ka ɛkpansi.
Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, nppyee lɔsap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛkaan a balɔɔt ka libat ka balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Lakke, la ikkala la lɛgabbwɔ bile ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt.
Kɛkaal ɔkaal ka lɔkkwɔɔn bbwak. Ɔwwɔɔlbong wa àkkpàlà wa ɔbɛpɛnɛ ɛkpansi la kɛssɛ-kɛzak ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔmɛbong akama ka awwɔɔlnɛ ibɔɔyi ammɛ.”
Babbal libungu battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Isɔngɔ ya lɛffɛ ’zɔng lɛkkɔmnɛ imiibong ka libat kɛfal a kɛfal!”
Lɔlɔp la bagɛlɛnya banna la isɛɛn inna ’yɔng baang ittɔ ka lisse iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kulening.”
Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lissinɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet lɛlɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Babili Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ, waan gɔɔ ɔgɛlɛnya wa utelemɛnɛ, abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt.”

Ɔzzánga nppyee lɔsap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lammwɔɔl a kɛkaan a balɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔl a bannyi la lɔsap akkpálá. Nppyee ka balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Uyini ayyɔɔt, wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ubeet.
Affu iggeleyɔng, ɔwaayɔngyɛlɛ. Ibunguyɔng lakke ammɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya libbeel a Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Wanavva ɔbamamɛbong kɛyɔɔng ɔkatsɛ.
Bannyimɛbong ulata ubba battɛ ukwula.” (Ulata ubba ’wɔng baang ulenɛ linaang a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa bbwak.)

Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Akkpɔk ’kwɔng: Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ libbeel a Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng lammwɔɔl za lɔkkwɔɔn, lassi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”

Nttɔ ka lisse nwomo uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang. Ɔzzánga ɔttɛ, “Fɔngɔ ning kɛnaang. Anaam nssɛ nle bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ la ikpana annɔ la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayilanɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ. Atele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɔddanɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
Lukpaaggbeede luwongolonɛ nyɛn ulata eyim. Ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛyɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ ‘Kiyila la Lɔkkwɔɔn.’ Ɔzza bɛkaal la bɔkaat, ullu lakɔɔng ammɛ.

Zzeen ammɛ lakoot tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn. Ɔyanga bɛttɔpɔ ggbadam ka lɛttɔ ka kɔttɔpɔnɛ. Ɔyanga lɛkɔɔl baang ka ɔkkpɔknɛ ka kkwɔɔt. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng baang ɔgbaa la ammɛ biini ba ule.
Ewuulu ya ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ ele linnyi linnyi. Bakkwɔɔmɛ ‘Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm’.
Isɔgya ya libat ittele ka balata iyim ikupmɛ la balata iwɔkɔlɔ ka kkwɔɔt.
Ogge wa ɔlamnɛ, wa ule ɔkɔɔm ɔbɛtɛ ifɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttamɛ ka kamma. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm ibbyap ɔkɔɔmbɛ. Vvenɛ ɔkaam batak ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaamnɛ batak a binyanga ammɛ.
Ɔkkpɔk lɛkɔɔl ka ubba ammɛ la kikkpɔ ɔttɛ, “Ubeet a babeet, la Uyini bayini.”
Nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ ka livve-luwee. Ubungu ɔkkwɔɔ bunɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat ɔttɛ, “Affu ataayɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, azziyɔng libbeel Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lɛbaang.
Affu azziyɔng ikkpa-kkwɔɔt a babeet la bazzilɛttɔ isɔgya, la ikkpa-kkwɔɔt iyim la battele-uttele, la ikkpa-kkwɔɔt a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, babili la ba basinɛ babili lile, ba labaang la ba ssup!”
Ɔzzánga nyɛn ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la babeet ɛkpansi la isɔgya abbɛ ka baggbanɛ ballu ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛ ka eyim la isɔgya ammɛ kullu.

Bakaa ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang bassɛɛn igbakkpɔpɔ, la ɔkkala-lɛlaak wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ bɛmaanga ka lusso annyɛ. (Ɔkɔɔm bɛmaanga ’byɔng baang ɔfɛɛt balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ eleme ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ba batelenɛ ɛlɔɔp annyɛ.) Basam ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɔkkala-lɛlaak bassɛɛn ka lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn a ndegeledum.
Ogge wa ɔttanɛ ka kamma ɔlɔɔt wa uttele ka eyim ɔwwɔɔl isɔgya abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bunɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ buzzi ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bukkwoongnɛ.
