Nyɛn Uyilabɔtɔɔm ka ussinɛ ka libat usini uffu kuttɔɔk la ɛkpɔkɔlɔ lúbbé ’gwɔng baang gwa lɔddɔngnɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ la iyɛɛgba ya ilɔɔpnɛ.
Ɔkaa ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya elenɛ utumalɔɔt ɛzzɔkɔ ya elenɛ Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ɔlɔk Satan ɔssɛɛnmɛ nggbakkɔpɔ ka innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak.

Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔsammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ lúbbé ’gwɔng baang ɔssɛɛn ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ɔkakamɛ nkwaaning usi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔtta uffu ɔfɛɛt vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak ’yɔng baang liggba. Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsak vvenɛ bakkyaamɛ bafɔngɔ ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup.

Nyɛn igbaal a kibeet. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bataanɛ ka annyɛ, bannyibongbɛ lakke za kɛkaal a kɛkaal. Ɔgbaa, nyɛn liyeeng a balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ ka babwɔɔlɔnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ la kwa lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɛlɔɔp annyɛ ba bataka batele. Gɔɔ eleme ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ba bataka banaang ka lɛttɔ-lusso la labɔɔk abbɛ. Baffubong bataa ka kuddu bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babeet la Christ ka innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak.
Babbu balɔk basi lifungala ka lubbe bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu tɔttɔt innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak ’yɔng baang isak. Uwɔng ulenɛ ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a kifungala babbu ka lubbe.

Laggele la ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ule wa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba batoolonɛbɛ la babbu ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk bafungalabɛ ka lubbe. Lùbbe gwa lule ka lɔbbalnɛ liffu lakke ka kwɔɔt abbɛ ba lɔbɛlɛ lɛyanga. Bale basseke bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Christ. Vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn la Christ ka innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak.
Innɔ likkpa ’sɔng iffa la kufaak lilenɛ lɛsaal, vvenɛ basanga Satan ka igbakkɔpɔ.
Vvenɛ umii ɔfɛɛt balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ka ɛkpansi. Uwɔng ulenɛ Gog la Magog. Satan vvenɛ ɔkɔɔmbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu lɛkɔɔng, bayipi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kususuk ka tɔkɔlɔ lɔyɔngɔ.
Bawaala ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi bakkpit laffɛ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la laffɛ za lasaapmɛnɛ. Keem lɔkɔɔn lussi ka libat luffu luzzibɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.

Bakaa Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng wa ɔfɛɛtnɛbɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn za lɛbaang la ndegeledum ka ɛfɛɛn a baggbanɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɔkkala-lɛlaak wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkaa bamii bassɛɛn. Bale bataa baang bayɛn akama bappyee bɔssɔp kikoon la kɛtɔm kɛfal a kɛfal.
Nyɛn ulata ugbaal a kibeet wa lɛbaang la ɔlɔɔt wa ataanɛ ka ammɛ. Ɛkpansi la libat bɛmma bimii ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ulenɛ, la kɛyɛn bisi lɛbɛlɛ lile.

Keem nyɛn babbu ba labaang la ba utiti ɔkkpɛlɛ ka babeenɛ ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bawongolo livva. Bawongolo luvva gwa lulenɛ luvva kuddu. Kɛkaal a babbu badɔkɔ bakaal bakup kwa balenɛ lɛnaang bale lɛkkpɔk bassɛɛn ka livva ’sɔng baang.
Lihu lɛsanga babbu ba tɔkɔlɔ azzɛ linnyi. Lubbe lɔsanga babbu ba aggwɛ lɔtta ka vveeng. Badɔkɔ bakaal kɛkaal abbɛ bakup kwa balenɛ lɛnaang.
Basam lùbbé la ɛkpansi aggwɛ bassɛɛn ka lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn gwa lɛbaang. (Lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn ’zɔng baang lilenɛ lùbbé gwa ibaala).
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa basimɛnɛ lɛkɔɔl ammɛ lɛkkpɔk ka luvva kuddu badɔkɔ basammɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn gwa lɛbaang.
Nyɛn ufaa libat la ufaa ɛkpansi. Ɛkpansi ya ikeeng la libat za ikeeng bɛtaak, iyɔngɔ ikkyaap.
Nyɛn Killu sa Doddo, Ufaa-Jerusalem, ka ussinɛ ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffu. Ɔbamabong bbwak ɔkat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wanavva killu ɔnaangnɛ ilɔngɔlɔ ukup ulam.

Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ lɛgaga ka ugbaal a kibeet lɛttɛ, “Ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile ka balɔɔt! Vvenɛ ɔtaa la abbɛ, abbɛ bàzzánga balɔɔt ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ule ule baang la abbɛ, vvenɛ ule Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ.
Vvenɛ ɔkkpɔlɔbɛ liyeen. Lubbe ba lɔbɛlɛ lile gɔɔ akama. Gɔɔ kullu la bɔssɔp. Batɔm a bɛfɛɛn bɛtaakbong.”

Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Gɔɔ gedegede mung nppyɛlɛbong nnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛzzanga bɛfaa.” Ɔlɔɔk unnyinɛ ɔgbaa ɔttɛ, “Akkpɔk ’kwɔng, lammwɔɔl ’zɔng lale lɔkkwɔɔn, lale ka kiyila.”
Ɔzzanga ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaalbong. Anaam nlenɛ Alpha, nle Omega, lutte la lakpeke. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa bannyi basaapmɛnɛ, vvenɛ nnyimɛ bannyi ba bassinɛ ka bannyi kuddu.
Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbɛtɛnɛ, vvenɛ ɔtɔk ’kwɔng ka anaam: vvenɛ anaam nle Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ammɛ, ammɛ ule ɔlɔɔt anaam.

Ɔzzanga ssala babbwɔp a bazzi-issɛ, la banaang a bubbi, la bawwɔɔl a balɔɔt, la banaang a babbu lilɔɔk, la banaang a bɛmaanga, la batele ilɔɔp, la bakkala lalaak, ɛfɛɛn ya abbɛ elenɛ lɛkkɔm a lɔkɔɔn ’zɔng baang za likutnɛ la ndegeledum ka tɔkɔlɔ, baang ulenɛ lubbe gwa ibaala.

Uyilabɔtɔɔm vvɔn, ka tɔkɔlɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat ba bayanganɛ bɛfɔɔm bɛnnambɛkkyaat, ya ikama ya lakpeke innammikkyaat ilenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam ɔttɛ, “Affu vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔ wanavva libbeel ’wɔng wa Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Kuyeeng kɔnnaanɛ lakke, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔsamnɛ umii utele ka libat a lɛttaal. Ɔyɔɔnɛ Jerusalem, killu sa doddo ka kisininɛ ka libat ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiffu kuttɔɔk.
Kippwolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang lippwolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jasper, ulata lɛttaal.
Lɛyanga kɛbat sa kiggolonɛ la bikkwu zzɔɔppabɛffa, la bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm zzɔɔppabaffa ba bakatnɛyɛ. Ka bikkwu ’byɔng baang bakkpɔk lakɔɔl a ifɔɔn ’yɔng baang zzɔɔppiffa ya balɔɔt a Israel.
Ɔdɔkɔ bikkwu bɛkkyaat ka kufoom kkwɔn. Bɛkkyaat ka lusso livve luwee lɔfɔm, bɛkkyaat ka libat a lɔfɔɔn, bɛkkyaat ka kuttɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn.
Kɛbat a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang badɔkɔ babɔɔksɛ ka lattaal zɔɔppalaffa za bakkpɔknɛ lakɔɔl a bayilabɔtɔɔm a Waanɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba zzɔɔppabaffa.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔlɔɔknɛ la anaam ɔyanga bissɛ-lɔlɔɔm pya banaangnɛpyɛ la gold pya ɔlɔɔmnɛ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, la bikkwu la kɛbat.

Lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ka bɔggbam lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔlɔm, lɛyanga lagook lanna. Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔm lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang la bissɛ-lɔlɔɔm ammɛ. Lɛdɔkɔ innɔ mile ikkyaat la lalɔp lakkyaat la mile kubbwɔɔk ka bɔlɔm la bɔggbam la buggolo.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔm kɛbat ɔgbaa. Kɛdɔkɔ lalɔp zzɔɔp la bukkpɔ zzillavvɔn ka buggolo ka bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔlɔɔm.
Kɛbat a ggwoon ’sɔng baag bakɔɔm lattaal a Jasper banaangnɛ. Killu biini banaangsɛ la gold wa uyekelenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ biyenge.

Lutte kɛbat a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang badɔkɔ banaangsɛ la lattaal za doddo, Lɛttaal za ikeeng sa bakɔɔmnɛ batte lutte lɛ̀zzànga ‘Jasper’ lɛttaal za ibaala lɛ̀zzànga ‘Sapphire’ za lakkyaat lɛ̀zzànga ‘Agate’ ka lanna lɛ̀zzànga ‘Emerald’.

Ka kubbwɔɔk, ‘Onyx’, ka bwɔlaaning, lɛ̀zzànga ‘Carnelian’, za lannangakkyaat lɛ̀zzànga ‘Quartz’ wa lɛgɔk a lɛgɔk, za lannanganna lɛ̀zzànga ‘Beryl’, za ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp lɛ̀zzànga ‘Topaz’, za zzɔɔp lɛ̀zzànga ‘Chalcedony’, za zzɔɔppavvon lɛ̀zzànga ‘Turquoise’, za zzɔɔppiffa lɛzzanga ‘Amethyst’.
Bikkwu ’byɔng baang zzɔɔppabɛffa bɛdɔkɔnɛ ifɔɔk akpana. Kikkwu la ssɔn bakɔɔm ɛfɔɔk akpana banaagnsɛ. Itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang banaangyɛ la gold. Appyɛɛknɛ ayɛnwɔ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kiyenge.
Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nsi lɛyɛn ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, ka ggwoon ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, la Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.

Lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang kwa livve-luwee gɔɔ kwa ettuma ba battina battɛ bippwolo bivvoongbɛ, ka buppwolo lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bulenɛ baang ka buppwolonɛ bullɔtbɛ. Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛtaanɛbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ otinika.
Balɔɔt ɛkpansi vvenɛ bakɔɔm buppwolo ammɛ bassɛ. Babeet ɛkpansi vvenɛ bakɔɔm iyyɛɛp abbɛ baffu bassɛɛn ka abbwɛ.
Bikkwu lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang bile bɛtaa ppwool ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. La kɛfɛɛn baala bile ka kisul kisinɛ lile.
Vvenɛ bakɔɔm lakke la iyyɛɛp ɛkpansi baffu ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang.

Ɔzzànga bwa businɛ lɛyyɛɛp bulɔk baala bumal ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit ɔlɔk ɔkkala lɛlaak baala ɔmalzɛ. Ule balɔɔt ba lakɔɔl abbɛ lalenɛ ka luvva Waan-ɛtɔɔn a kuddu keem ka bale bamal ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang.
Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛ lɔyɔngɔ bannyi kuddu mgbaa. Lɔttɔɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa kkpaladada. Bannyi bassi ka ugbaal a kibeet, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Waan-ɛtɔɔn baffu.

Battɔl basak ka kasɛkɛ lɛffɛ. Lasan a bɛssɛ kuddu ladɔkɔ baang ka labeenɛ ka lafoom a lɔssa azzɛ laffa laffa, bɛwɔm lakkpo bikkpit zzɔɔppabɛffa ka kukkpa, kikkpit ssɔn ka ettuma. Ɔzzànga livva assɛ bakɔɔm battula ɛkpansi.

Bɔfɛɛn bwa bulenɛ ka lifɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwɛ baala ayɛn ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la wa Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bile baang ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Ibbɔɔyi ammɛ vvenɛ bazɔɔm, bannyimɛ latele.
Vvenɛ bayɛn lusso ammɛ. Lɛkɔɔl ammɛ bale bakkpɔkzɛ ka lɛttɔ lusso abbɛ.
Kisul kɛlɔk vvenɛ ba kɛbɛlɛ lile. Itinika vvenɛ ba babɛlɛ lɛggyan ka Uyini ule usseke buppwolo abbɛ. Vvenɛ bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babeet ba bayanganɛ lakke za kɛfal a kɛfal.

Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Lammwɔɔl ’zɔng mung lale ka lɔkkwɔɔn, lale za kɛtɔk kɛssɛɛn ka luppyam. Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsamnɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ unnyi bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanga uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ ɔyɔɔ ibbɔɔyi ammɛ kwa kule kɔkka lɛnaang.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Nle ka nffunɛ gedegede mung, laggele lale za balɔɔt ba batelenɛ lammwɔɔl za babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ kwa kule kɔnaang ka tɔkɔlɔ luvva ’gwɔng mung.”
Anaam John nppyeebong bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng, nyɛnbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka nppyeenɛ, nyɛnbyɛ nvve, nkun laddu ka lataak Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ulenɛnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang lɛyɔɔ, nzɔɔm nnyimɛ.

Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Ning kanaang, anaam nssɛ nle bɔɔyi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ la ikpana annɔ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba batelenɛ lammwɔɔl za luvva ’gwɔng mung. Azɔɔm annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
Ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asam lammwɔɔl a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luvva ’gwɔng mung aloko tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔlɔɔk a lalup. Liggbili lɛkkɛtɛbong za bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bile ka bɛnaangnɛ.

Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ ɔnaang-a-bubbi, ɔtaa baang la kɛnaang a bubbi ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa eleme ammɛ esinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ɔtaa baang la ubbu eleme ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka ɔnaangnɛ budoddo, ɔkkaammɛ ɔnaang ning baang. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛnɛ ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔkkaammɛ ɔnaang ning baang.”
Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Nle nkka liffu. Vvenɛ nkɔɔm lɛsɔɔk anaam nffu nnyi ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaagnnɛ ɔffɔ.
Anaam nlenɛ Alpha la Omega–Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk la Usseke-isimi. Anaam nlenɛ lutte la lakpeke.

Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bazzaanɛ iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ illaat. Ning baang bayangabong lakke za kizzi lakkpo bɛssɛ za lawɔmnɛ ka lɛsan a kɛssɛ-kuddu, la lakke za kɛssɛ́ ssɔng ka lɛmma kikkwu kɛmal ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala.

Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ba basinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang lile, balenɛ ba bamininɛ abbɛ-abbɛ. Bwaanbwalam bamini la babbɛ bwaanbwalam. Bwanavva bamini la babbɛ bwanavva. Bakkoop kɛnaang a ilat la kɛnaang babbu lilɔɔk, la kɛwwɔɔl a balɔɔt. Mbɔng baang bazɔɔm ilɔɔp, bakkala lɛlaak ka lammwɔɔl ɔgbaa la linaang.
“Anaam Jesus, ntɔɔmbong uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka idda luzɔɔm. Anaam nssi ka kikkwu a David. Anaam nlenɛ annyannyannya waanettuma lɔfɔm.”
Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Wanavva killu battɛ, “Affu!” Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa uppyeenɛ ’kwɔng vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Affuyɔng!” Ɔlɔɔt duu wa bannyi basaapmɛnɛ uffu ɔtɔk bannyi kuddu ɔvva ka lɛsɔɔk.

Anaam, John, nttama ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa uppyeenɛ lammwɔɔl a uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luvva ’gwɔng. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔgbaanɛ bɔfɛɛn bulɔk ka azzɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔgbaamɛ akama wa balenɛ lɛlɔɔk ka luvva ’gwɔng mung.

Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔsanganɛ bɔfɛɛn bulɔk ɔzzɔɔk ka lammwɔɔl za uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luvva ’gwɔng mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔtɔk etini likkpo kɛssɛ kuddu ya ammɛ la etini ammɛ ya lɛffɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya balenɛ lɛlɔɔk ka luvva ’gwɔng mung.
Ammɛ wa ubeenɛ ttɛɛsɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nle nkka lɛppyɛlɛ nffu.” Kule ning baang. Affu, Uyini, Jesus.
Numa ppyɛɛ a Jesus, Uyini, ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ!
